   // aṣṭasāhasrikā prajñāpāramitā //	// azwa sAhasrikA prajQApAramitA //
   om namo bhagavatyai āryaprajñāpāramitāyai /	om namaH BagavatyE Arya prajQApAramitAyE /
   ASP_1: sarvākārajñatācaryā prathamaḥ parivartaḥ /	ASP_1: sarva AkAra jQa tA caryA praTamaH parivartaH /
   evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe	evam mayA Srutam / ekasmin samaye BagavAn rAjagRhe viharati sma gRDa kUwe
   parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,	parvate mahatA Bikzu saMGena sArDam arDa trayodaSaBiH Bikzu SatEH,
   sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ	sarvEH arhadBiH kzINa AsravEH niHkleSEH vaSIBUtEH su vimukta cittEH
   suvimuktaprajñairājñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ	su vimukta prajQEH AjQEH AjAneyEH mahA nAgEH kRtakRtyEH
   kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ	kRta karaNIyEH apahRta BArEH anuprApta svaka arTEH parikzINa Bava saMyojanEH
   samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptairekaṃ pudgalaṃ	samyak AjQA su vimukta cittEH sarva cetaH vaSi parama pArami prAptEH ekam pudgalam
   sthāpayitvā yaduta āyuṣmantamānandam //	sTApayitvA yat uta Ayuzmantam Anandam //
   (Vaidya 2) tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate	(VEdyaH 2) tatra Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim sTaviram Amantrayate
   sma   pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	sma  pratiBAtu te suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitAm AraBya yaTA boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQApAramitA
   niryāyuriti //	niryAyuH iti //
   atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat   kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ	aTa Kalu AyuzmataH SAriputrasya etat aBavat  kim ayam AyuzmAn suBUtiH
   sthavira ātmīyena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena svakena	sTaviraH AtmIyena svakena prajQA pratiBAna bala ADAnena svakena
   prajñāpratibhānabalādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	prajQA pratiBAna bala aDizWAnena boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyati utāho buddhānubhāveneti?	prajQApAramitAm upadekzyati uta aho budDa anuBAvena iti?
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH budDa anuBAvena AyuzmataH SAriputrasya
   imamevarūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ	imam eva rUpam cetasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya Ayuzmantam
   śāriputrametadavocat   yatkiṃcidāyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā	SAriputram etat avocat  yat kiMcid Ayuzman SAriputra BagavataH SrAvakA
   bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti udīrayanti prakāśayanti saṃprakāśayanti, sa	BAzante deSayanti upadiSanti udIrayanti prakASayanti saMprakASayanti, sa
   sarvastathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi	sarvaH taTAgatasya puruzakAraH veditavyaH / tat kasya hetoH? yaH hi
   tathāgatena dharmo deśitaḥ, tatra dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāste tāṃ	taTAgatena DarmaH deSitaH, tatra Darma deSanAyAm SikzamANAH te tAm
   dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti dhārayanti, tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya dhārayitvā	DarmatAm sAkzAtkurvanti DArayanti, tAm Darma tAm sAkzAtkRtya DArayitvA
   yadyadeva bhāṣante, yadyadeva deśayanti, yadyadeva upadiśanti,	yat yat eva BAzante, yat yat eva deSayanti, yat yat eva upadiSanti,
   yadyadevodīrayanti, yadyadeva (Vaidya 3) prakāśayanti, yadyadeva	yat yat eva udIrayanti, yat yat eva (VEdyaH 3) prakASayanti, yat yat eva
   saṃprakāśayanti, sarvaṃ taddharmatayā aviruddham / tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā	saMprakASayanti, sarvam tad Darma tayA avirudDam / taTAgata Darma deSanAyAH 
   eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ	eva Ayuzman SAriputraH eza nizyandaH yat te kula putrAH upadiSantaH tAm
   dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti //	Darma tAm Darma tayA na viroDayanti //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH budDa anuBAvena Bagavantam etat avocat  
   yadbhagavānevamāha   pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	yat BagavAn evam Aha  pratiBAtu te suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ	prajQApAramitAm AraBya yaTA boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQApAramitAm
   niryāyuriti / bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,	niryAyuH iti / boDisattvaH boDisattvaH iti yat idam Bagavan= ucyate,
   katamasyaitadbhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti? nāhaṃ	katamasya etat Bagavan Darmasya aDivacanam yat uta boDisattvaH iti? na aham
   bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti / tamapyahaṃ	Bagavan= tam Darmam samanupaSyAmi yat uta boDisattvaH iti / tam api aham
   bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma / so 'haṃ	Bagavan Darmam na samanupaSyAmi yat uta prajQApAramitA nAma / saH aham
   bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno	Bagavan boDisattvam vA boDisattva Darmam vA avindan anupalaBamAnaH 
   'samanupaśyan, prajñāpāramitāmapyavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan	asam anupaSyan, prajQApAramitAm api avindan anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan
   katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi	katamam boDisattvam katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi
   anuśāsiṣyāmi? api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne	anuSAsizyAmi? api tu Kalu punar Bagavan saced evam BAzyamANe deSyamAne
   upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na	upadiSyamAne boDisattvasya cittam na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vizIdati na
   viṣādamāpadyate, nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati,	vizAdam Apadyate, na asya vipRzWIBavati mAnasam, na Bagna pRzWIBavati,
   notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, eṣa eva bodhisattvo	na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate, ezaH eva boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmanuśāsanīyaḥ / eṣaivāsya bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm anuSAsanIyaH / ezA eva asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā / eṣo 'vavādaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA veditavyA / ezaH avavAdaH prajQApAramitAyAm /
   sacedevaṃ tiṣṭhati, eṣaivāsyāvavādānuśāsanī //	saced evam tizWati, ezA eva asya avavAda anuSAsanI //
   punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi	prajQApAramitAyAm BAvayatA evam Sikzitavyam yaTA asO SikzyamANaH tena api
   bodhicittena na manyeta / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi   taccittamacittam /	boDi cittena na manyeta / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi  tat cittam acittam /
   prakṛtiścittasya prabhāsvarā //	prakRtiH cittasya praBAsvarA //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kiṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kim
   punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam? evamukte āyuṣmān	punar Ayuzman suBUte asti tat cittam yat cittam acittam? evam ukte AyuzmAn
   subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā	suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra yA
   acittatā, tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?	acitta tA, tatra acitta tAyAm astitAH vA na astitA vA vidyate vA upalaByate vA?
   śāriputra āha   na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /	SAriputraH Aha  na hi etat Ayuzman suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā	suBUtiH Aha  saced Ayuzman SAriputra tatra acitta tAyAm astitAH vA na astitA vA
   na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā, api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati	na vidyate vA na upalaByate vA, api nu te yuktaH eza paryanuyogaH Bavati
   yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha   asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?	yat AyuzmAn SAriputraH evam Aha  asti tat cittam yat cittam acittam iti?
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kā punareṣā	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kA punar ezA
   āyuṣman subhūte acittatā? subhūtirāha   avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā	Ayuzman suBUte acitta tA? suBUtiH Aha  avikArAH Ayuzman SAriputra avikalpA
   acittatā //	acitta tA //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt   sādhu	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmate suBUtaye sADukAram adAt  sADu
   sādhvāyuṣman subhūte / yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ	sADu Ayuzman suBUte / yaTA api nAma tvam BagavatA araNA vihAriNAm agra tAyAm
   nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi /	nirdizwaH nirdiSasi /
   ataś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ	atas ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodherupaparīkṣitavyaḥ, avirahitaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	samyaksaMboDeH upaparIkzitavyaH, avirahitaH ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ / śrāvakabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva	prajQApAramitAyAH veditavyaH / SrAvaka BUmO api Sikzitu kAmena iyam eva
   (Vaidya 4) prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā	(VEdyaH 4) prajQApAramitA SrotavyA udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA
   paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā / ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ	paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA / iha eva prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   yogamāpattavyam / pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva	yogam Apattavyam / pratyekabudDa BUmO api Sikzitu kAmena iyam eva
   prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā	prajQApAramitA SrotavyA udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA
   paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā / ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ	paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA / iha eva prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   yogamāpattavyam / bodhisattvabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva	yogam Apattavyam / boDisattva BUmO api Sikzitu kAmena iyam eva
   prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā	prajQApAramitA SrotavyA udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA
   paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā / ihaiva	paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA / iha eva
   prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalyasamanvāgatena	prajQApAramitAyAm upAya kOSalya samanvAgatena
   sarvabodhisattvadharmasamudāgamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	sarva boDisattva Darma samudAgamAya yogaH karaNIyaH / tat kasya hetoH?
   ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,	iha eva hi prajQApAramitAyAm vistareNa sarva boDisattva DarmAH upadizwAH,
   yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yogamāpattavyam / anuttarāyām	yatra boDisattvena mahAsattvena Sikzitavyam yogam Apattavyam / anuttarAyAm
   api samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā	api samyaksaMboDO Sikzitu kAmena iyam eva prajQApAramitA SrotavyA
   udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /	udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA /
   ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalyasamanvāgatena	iha eva prajQApAramitAyAm upAya kOSalya samanvAgatena
   sarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? ihaiva hi	sarva budDa Darma samudAgamAya yogaH karaNIyaH / tat kasya hetoH? iha eva hi
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ, yatra	prajQApAramitAyAm vistareNa sarva budDa DarmAH upadizwAH, yatra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yogamāpattavyam //	boDisattvena mahAsattvena Sikzitavyam yogam Apattavyam //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yo 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yaH aham Bagavan etat eva
   bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi, prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva nAmaDeyam na vedmi na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi, prajQApAramitAm
   api na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi / so 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva	api na vedmi na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi / saH aham Bagavan etat eva
   bodhisattvanāmadheyamavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva nAmaDeyam avindan anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan prajQApAramitAm
   api avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ	api avindan anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam boDisattvam katamasyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi? etadeva bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi? etat eva Bagavan kOkRtyam
   syāt, yo 'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa	syAt, yaH aham vastu avindan anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyat nAmaDeya mAtreNa
   āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti / api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstad	Aya vyayam kuryAm yat uta boDisattvaH iti / api tu Kalu punar Bagavan= tat 
   api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam / tatkasya	api nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya / evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ	hetoH? avidyamAna tvena tasya nAmaDeyasya / evam tat nAmaDeyam na sTitam
   nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam / sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam / saced boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	evam gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm cittam na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vizIdati na
   viṣādamāpadyate, nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati,	vizAdam Apadyate, na asya vipRzWIBavati mAnasam, na Bagna pRzWIBavati,
   notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate / adhimucyate 'dhyāśayena	na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate / aDimucyate aDyASayena
   avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ, sthito	avirahitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAH veditavyaH, sTitaH 
   'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau, susthito 'sthānayogena / punaraparaṃ	avinivartanIyAyAm boDisattva BUmO, susTitaH asTAna yogena / punar aparam
   bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na	prajQApAramitAm BAvayatA na rUpe sTAtavyam na vedanAyAm na saMjQAyAm na
   saṃskāreṣu, na vijñāne sthātavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedrūpe tiṣṭhati,	saMskAra izu, na vijQAne sTAtavyam / tat kasya hetoH? saced rUpe tizWati,
   rūpābhisaṃskāre carati, na carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ sacedvedanāyāṃ	rUpa aBisaMskAre carati, na carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam saced vedanAyAm
   saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu / sacedvijñāne tiṣṭhati, vijñānābhisaṃskāre carati,	saMjQAyAm saMskArezu / saced vijQAne tizWati, vijQAna aBisaMskAre carati,
   na carati prajñāpāramitāyām / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi abhisaṃskāre caran	na carati prajQApAramitAyAm / tat kasya hetoH? na hi aBisaMskAre caran
   prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, nāpi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate, nāpi	prajQApAramitAm parigRhNAti, na api prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apadyate, na api
   prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayate / aparipūrayamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na	prajQApAramitAm paripUrayate / aparipUrayamANaH prajQApAramitAm na
   niryāsyati (Vaidya 5) sarvajñatāyāmaparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhṇan / tatkasya	niryAsyati (VEdyaH 5) sarvajQa tAyAm aparigRhItam parigRhNan / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi aparigṛhītaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā	hetoH? rUpam hi aparigRhItam prajQApAramitAyAm / evam vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ hi aparigṛhītaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām / yaś ca	saMskArAH / vijQAnam hi aparigRhItam prajQApAramitAyAm / yaH ca
   rūpasyāparigrahaḥ, na tadrūpam / evaṃ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /	rUpasya aparigrahaH, na tad rUpam / evam yaH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm /
   yo vijñānasyāparigrahaḥ, na tadvijñānam / sāpi prajñāpāramitā aparigṛhītā	yaH vijQAnasya aparigrahaH, na tad vijQAnam / sA api prajQApAramitA aparigRhItA
   / evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /	/ evam hi atra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam /
   ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma	ayam ca boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sarva Darma aparigRhItaH nAma
   samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato 'sādhāraṇaḥ /	samADiH vipulaH puraskRtaH apramANa niyataH asADAraNaH /
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sāpi sarvajñatā aparigṛhītā, na hi nimittato	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH sA api sarvajQa tA aparigRhItA, na hi nimittataH 
   grahītavyā / sacennimittato grahītavyā abhaviṣyat, na ceha śreṇikaḥ	grahItavyA / saced nimittataH grahItavyAH aBavizyat, na ca iha SreNikaH
   parivrājakaḥ śraddhāmalapsyata / tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ	parivrAjakaH SradDAm alapsyata / tatra hi SreNikaH parivrAjakaH
   sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ / so	sarvajQa jQAne aDimucya SradDA anusArI prAdeSikena jQAnena avatIrNaH / saH 
   'vatīrya na rūpaṃ parigṛhṇīte / evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /	avatIrya na rUpam parigRhNIte / evam na vedanAm na saMjQAm na saMskArAn /
   na vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇīte / nāpi tatra prītisukhena tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati	na vijQAnam parigRhNIte / na api tatra prIti suKena tat jQAnam samanupaSyati
   / nādhyātmaṃ rūpasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati / na vahirdhā rūpasya	/ na aDyAtmam rUpasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati / na vahirDA rUpasya
   tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati / nādhyātmabahirdhā rūpasya tajjñānaṃ	tat jQAnam samanupaSyati / na aDyAtma bahirDA rUpasya tat jQAnam
   samanupaśyati / nāpyanyatra rūpāttajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati / evaṃ nādhyātmaṃ	samanupaSyati / na api anyatra rUpAt tat jQAnam samanupaSyati / evam na aDyAtmam
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / nādhyātmaṃ vijñānasya tajjñānaṃ	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / na aDyAtmam vijQAnasya tat jQAnam
   samanupaśyati / na vahirdhā vijñānasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati /	samanupaSyati / na vahirDA vijQAnasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati /
   nādhyātmavahirdhā vijñānasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati / nāpyanyatra	na aDyAtma vahirDA vijQAnasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati / na api anyatra
   vijñānāttajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati / atra padaparyāye śreṇikaḥ parivrājako	vijQAnAt tat jQAnam samanupaSyati / atra pada paryAye SreNikaH parivrAjakaH 
   'dhimuktaḥ / so 'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ	aDimuktaH / saH atra sarvatra SradDA anusArI sarvajQa jQAne Darma tAm
   pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti / tena na kaściddharmaḥ parigṛhītaḥ / nāpi	pramANIkRtya evam aDimuktaH iti / tena na kaScid DarmaH parigRhItaH / na api
   sa kaściddharmo ya upalabdhaḥ, yaṃ gṛhṇīyānmuñcedvā / sa nirvāṇam api na	sa kaScid DarmaH yaH upalabDaH, yam gRhNIyAt muQcet vA / sa nirvANam api na
   manyate / iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā	manyate / iyam api Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA
   veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte / evaṃ yadvedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān /	veditavyA yat rUpam na parigRhNIte / evam yat vedanAm saMjQAm saMskArAn /
   yadvijñānaṃ na parigṛhṇīte / na cāntarā parinirvāti,	yat vijQAnam na parigRhNIte / na ca antarA parinirvAti,
   aparipūrṇairdaśabhistathāgatabalaiścaturbhistathāgatavaiśāradyairaṣṭādaśabhiś	aparipUrNEH daSaBiH taTAgata balEH caturBiH taTAgata vESAradyEH azwAdaSaBiH 
   ca āveṇikairbuddhadharmaiḥ / tasmādiyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya	ca AveNikEH budDa DarmEH / tasmAt iyam api Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā //	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA veditavyA //
   punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam  	prajQApAramitAm BAvayatA evam upaparIkzitavyam evam upaniDyAtavyam  
   katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kasya caiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kiṃ yo dharmo na	katamA ezA prajQApAramitA? kasya ca ezA prajQApAramitA? kim yaH DarmaH na
   vidyate nopalabhyate, sā prajñāpāramiteti? sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ	vidyate na upalaByate, sA prajQApAramitA iti? saced evam upaparIkzamANaH
   evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,	evam upaniDyAyat na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vizIdati na vizAdam Apadyate,
   nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na	na asya vipRzWIBavati mAnasam, na Bagna pRzWIBavati, na utrasyati na
   saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate, avirahitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ //	prajQApAramitayA veditavyaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kiṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kim
   kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā	kAraNam Ayuzman suBUte avirahitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitayA
   veditavyaḥ? yadā rūpameva virahitaṃ rūpasvabhāvena, evaṃ yadā vedanaiva	veditavyaH? yadA rUpam eva virahitam rUpa svaBAvena, evam yadA vedanA eva
   saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva, yadā vijñānameva virahitaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena, yadā	saMjQA eva saMskArAH eva, yadA vijQAnam eva virahitam vijQAna svaBAvena, yadA
   prajñāpāramitaiva virahitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena, yadā sarvajñataiva	prajQApAramitA eva virahitA prajQApAramitA svaBAvena, yadA sarvajQa tA eva
   virahitā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena //	virahitA sarvajQa tA svaBAvena //
   (Vaidya 6) evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	(VEdyaH 6) evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   etametadāyuṣman śāriputra evam etat / rūpamevāyuṣman śāriputra virahitaṃ	etam etat Ayuzman SAriputra evam etat / rUpam eva Ayuzman SAriputra virahitam
   rūpasvabhāvena / evaṃ vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva / vijñānamevāyuṣman	rUpa svaBAvena / evam vedanA eva saMjQA eva saMskArAH eva / vijQAnam eva Ayuzman
   śāriputra virahitaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena / prajñāpāramitaiva āyuṣman	SAriputra virahitam vijQAna svaBAvena / prajQApAramitA eva Ayuzman
   śāriputra virahitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena / sarvajñataiva āyuṣman	SAriputra virahitA prajQApAramitA svaBAvena / sarvajQa tA eva Ayuzman
   śāriputra virahitā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena / prajñāpāramitālakṣaṇenāpi	SAriputra virahitA sarvajQa tA svaBAvena / prajQApAramitA lakzaNena api
   prajñāpāramitā virahitā / lakṣaṇasvabhāvenāpi lakṣaṇaṃ virahitam /	prajQApAramitA virahitA / lakzaNa svaBAvena api lakzaNam virahitam /
   lakṣyasvabhāvenāpi lakṣyaṃ virahitam / svabhāvalakṣaṇenāpi svabhāvo	lakzya svaBAvena api lakzyam virahitam / svaBAva lakzaNena api svaBAvaH 
   virahitaḥ //	virahitaH //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kiṃ	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kim
   punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate, sa	punar Ayuzman suBUte yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH atra Sikzizyate, sa
   niryāsyati sarvajñatāyām? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha   evametadāyuṣman śāriputra,	niryAsyati sarvajQa tA AyAm? AyuzmAn suBUtiH Aha  evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra,
   evam etat / yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate, sa niryāsyati	evam etat / yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH atra Sikzizyate, sa niryAsyati
   sarvajñatāyām / tatkasya hetoḥ? ajātā hyanirjātā hyāyuṣman śāriputra	sarvajQa tAyAm / tat kasya hetoH? ajAtA hi anirjAtAH hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   sarvadharmāḥ / evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva DarmAH / evam carataH Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   sarvajñatā āsannībhavati / yathā yathā sarvajñatā āsannībhavati, tathā	sarvajQa tA AsannIBavati / yaTA yaTA sarvajQa tA AsannIBavati, taTA
   tathā sattvaparipācanāya kāyacittapariśuddhirlakṣaṇapariśuddhiḥ	taTA sattva paripAcanAya kAya citta pariSudDiH lakzaNa pariSudDiH
   buddhakṣetraśuddhiḥ / buddhaiś ca samavadhānaṃ bhavati / evaṃ ca	budDa kzetra SudDiH / budDEH ca samavaDAnam Bavati / evam ca
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	punar Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati //	sarvajQa tAyAH AsannIBavati //
   punaraparamāyuṣmān subhūtirbodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhyaivamāha  	punar aparam AyuzmAn suBUtiH boDisattvam mahAsattvam AraBya evam Aha  
   sacedrūpe carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpanimitte carati, nimitte carati	saced rUpe carati, nimitte carati / saced rUpa nimitte carati, nimitte carati
   / sacedrūpaṃ nimittamiti carati, nimitte carati / sa cedrūpasyotpāde	/ saced rUpam nimittam iti carati, nimitte carati / sa ced rUpasya utpAde
   carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpasya nirodhe carati, nimitte carati /	carati, nimitte carati / saced rUpasya niroDe carati, nimitte carati /
   sacedrūpasya vināśe carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati,	saced rUpasya vinASe carati, nimitte carati / saced rUpam SUnyam iti carati,
   nimitte carati / ahaṃ carāmīti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva	nimitte carati / aham carAmi iti carati, nimitte carati / aham boDisattva
   iti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa	iti carati, nimitte carati / aham boDisattvaH iti hi upalamBe eva sa
   carati / evaṃ sacedvidanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu / sacedvijñāne carati,	carati / evam saced vidanAyAm saMjQAyAm saMskArezu / saced vijQAne carati,
   nimitte carati / sacedvijñānanimitte carati, nimitte carati sacedvijñānaṃ	nimitte carati / saced vijQAna nimitte carati, nimitte carati saced vijQAnam
   nimittamiti carati, nimitte carati / sacedvijñānasyotpāde carati, nimitte	nimittam iti carati, nimitte carati / saced vijQAnasya utpAde carati, nimitte
   carati / sacedvijñānasya nirodhe carati, nimitte carati / sacedvijñānasya	carati / saced vijQAnasya niroDe carati, nimitte carati / saced vijQAnasya
   vināśe carati, nimitte carati / sacedvijñānaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nimitte	vinASe carati, nimitte carati / saced vijQAnam SUnyam iti carati, nimitte
   carati / ahaṃ carāmīti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti	carati / aham carAmi iti carati, nimitte carati / aham boDisattvaH iti
   carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /	carati, nimitte carati / aham boDisattvaH iti hi upalamBe eva sa carati /
   sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati   ya evaṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,	saced punar asya evam Bavati  yaH evam carati, sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati,
   sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatīti, nimitta eva sa carati / ayaṃ bodhisattvo	sa prajQApAramitAm BAvayati iti, nimittaH eva sa carati / ayam boDisattvaH 
   'nupāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ //	anupAya kuSalaH veditavyaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kathaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kaTam
   punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati	punar Ayuzman suBUte caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ	prajQApAramitA AyAm? evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam
   śāriputrametadavocat   sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na	SAriputram etat avocat  saced Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na
   rūpe carati, na rūpanimitte carati, na rūpaṃ nimittamiti carati, na	rUpe carati, na rUpa nimitte carati, na rUpam nimittam iti carati, na
   rūpasyotpāde carati, na rūpasya nirodhe (Vaidya 7) carati, na rūpasya	rUpasya utpAde carati, na rUpasya niroDe (VEdyaH 7) carati, na rUpasya
   vināśe carati, na rūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nāhaṃ carāmīti carati, nāhaṃ	vinASe carati, na rUpam SUnyam iti carati, na aham carAmi iti carati, na aham
   bodhisattva iti carati / evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu	boDisattvaH iti carati / evam saced na vedanAyAm na saMjQAyAm na saMskArezu
   / sacenna vijñāne carati, na vijñānanimitte carati, na vijñānaṃ	/ saced na vijQAne carati, na vijQAna nimitte carati, na vijQAnam
   nimittamiti carati, na vijñānasyotpāde carati, na vijñānasya nirodhe	nimittam iti carati, na vijQAnasya utpAde carati, na vijQAnasya niroDe
   carati, na vijñānasya vināśe carati, na vijñānaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nāhaṃ	carati, na vijQAnasya vinASe carati, na vijQAnam SUnyam iti carati, na aham
   carāmīti carati, nāhaṃ bodhisattva iti carati / sacetpunarnāsyaivaṃ	carAmi iti carati, na aham boDisattvaH iti carati / saced punar na asya evam
   bhavati   ya evaṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāṃ	Bavati  yaH evam carati, sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati, sa prajQApAramitAm
   bhāvayatīti / evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /	BAvayati iti / evam caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati prajQApAramitAyAm /
   sa hi caraṃścarāmīti nopaiti, na carāmīti nopaiti, carāmi ca na carāmi	sa hi caran= carAmi iti na upEti, na carAmi iti na upEti, carAmi ca na carAmi
   ceti nopaiti, naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti, cariṣyāmīti nopaiti, na	ca iti na upEti, na eva carAmi na na carAmi iti na upEti, carizyAmi iti na upEti, na
   cariṣyāmīti nopaiti, cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti, naiva	carizyAmi iti na upEti, carizyAmi ca na carizyAmi ca iti na upEti, na eva
   cariṣyāmi na cariṣyāmīti nopaiti / tatkasya hetornopaiti? sarvadharmā	carizyAmi na carizyAmi iti na upEti / tat kasya hetoH na upEti? sarva DarmA
   hyanupagatā anupāttāḥ / ayamucyate sarvadharmānupādāno nāma	hi anupagatAH anupAttAH / ayam ucyate sarva Darma anupAdAnaH nAma
   samādhirbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, vipulaḥ puraskṛto 'pramāṇaniyato	samADiH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya, vipulaH puraskRtaH apramANa niyataH 
   'sādhāraṇaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ / anenaiva samādhinā viharan	asADAraNaH sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH / anena eva samADinA viharan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzipram anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate //
   buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha   vyākṛto 'yaṃ bhagavan	budDa anuBAvena AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH evam Aha  vyAkRtaH ayam Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pUrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH
   samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, yo 'nena samādhinā viharati	samyaksaMbudDEH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO, yaH anena samADinA viharati
   / sa tam api samādhiṃ na samanupaśyati, na ca tena samādhinā manyate  	/ sa tam api samADim na samanupaSyati, na ca tena samADinA manyate  
   ahaṃ samāhitaḥ, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadye, ahaṃ	aham samAhitaH, aham samADim samApatsye, aham samADim samApadye, aham
   samādhisamāpannaḥ, iti, evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na	samADi samApannaH, iti, evam tasya sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam na
   saṃvidyate //	saMvidyate //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   katamenāyuṣman	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  katamena Ayuzman
   subhūte samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ	suBUte samADinA viharan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH taTAgatEH arhadBiH
   samyaksaṃbuddhairvyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? śakyaḥ sa	samyaksaMbudDEH vyAkriyate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? SakyaH sa
   samādhirdarśayitum? subhūtirāha   no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra / tatkasya	samADiH darSayitum? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman SAriputra / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? tam api hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti, na saṃjānīte / āyuṣmān	hetoH? tam api hi sa kula putraH samADim na jAnAti, na saMjAnIte / AyuzmAn
   śāriputra āha   na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi? āyuṣmān	SAriputraH Aha  na jAnAti na saMjAnIte iti Ayuzman suBUte vadasi? AyuzmAn
   subhūtirāha   na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi /	suBUtiH Aha  na jAnAti na saMjAnIte iti Ayuzman SAriputra vadAmi /
   tatkasya hetorna jānāti na saṃjānīte? avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ	tat kasya hetoH na jAnAti na saMjAnIte? avidyamAna tvena tasya samADeH tam
   samādhiṃ na jānāti na saṃjānīte / atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye	samADim na jAnAti na saMjAnIte / aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmate suBUtaye
   sādhukāramadāt   sādhu sādhu subhūte / evametatsubhūte, evam etat /	sADukAram adAt  sADu sADu suBUte / evam etat suBUte, evam etat /
   yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena te pratibhāti,	yaTA api nAma taTAgata anuBAvena te pratiBAti,
   tathāgatādhiṣṭhānenopadiśasi / evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	taTAgata aDizWAnena upadiSasi / evam ca atra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   śikṣitavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	Sikzitavyam / tat kasya hetoH? evam hi SikzamANaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   evaṃ śikṣamāṇo	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam SikzamANaH 
   bhagavan bodhisattvo (Vaidya 8) mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?	Bagavan boDisattvaH (VEdyaH 8) mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate?
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  evam SikzamANaH
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam SikzamANaH Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate? evamukte	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH katamasmin Darme Sikzate? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra	BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat evam SikzamANaH SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣate / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na kasmiMScid Darme Sikzate / tat kasya hetoH? na hi
   te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto	te SAriputra DarmAH taTA saMvidyante yaTA bAla pRTagjanAH aSrutavantaH 
   'bhiniviṣṭāḥ / āyuṣmān śāriputra āha   kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan	aBinivizwAH / AyuzmAn SAriputraH Aha  kaTam tarhi te Bagavan
   saṃvidyante? bhagavānāha   yathā śāriputra na saṃvidyante, tathā	saMvidyante? BagavAn Aha  yaTA SAriputra na saMvidyante, taTA
   saṃvidyante evamavidyamānāḥ / tenocyante avidyeti / tān bālapṛthagjanā	saMvidyante evam avidyamAnAH / tena ucyante avidyA iti / tAn bAla pRTagjanA
   aśrutavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ / tairasaṃvidyamānāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kalpitāḥ / te	aSrutavantaH aBinivizwAH / tEH asaMvidyamAnAH sarva DarmAH kalpitAH / te
   tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti /	tAn kalpayitvA dvayoH antayoH saktAH tAn DarmAn na jAnanti na paSyanti /
   tasmātte 'saṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanti / kalpayitvā	tasmAt te asaMvidyamAnAn sarva DarmAn kalpayanti / kalpayitvA
   dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān	dvO= antO= aBiniviSante aBiniviSya tat nidAnam upalamBam niSritya atItAn
   dharmān kalpayanti, anāgatān dharmān kalpayanti, pratyutpannān dharmān	DarmAn kalpayanti, anAgatAn DarmAn kalpayanti, pratyutpannAn DarmAn
   kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ / tairasaṃvidyamānāḥ	kalpayanti te kalpayitvA nAma rUpe aBinivizwAH / tEH asaMvidyamAnAH
   sarvadharmāḥ kalpitāḥ / te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto	sarva DarmAH kalpitAH / te tAna saMvidyamAnAn sarva DarmAn kalpayantaH 
   yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti / yathābhūtaṃ mārgamajānanto	yaTABUtam mArgam na jAnanti na paSyanti / yaTABUtam mArgam ajAnantaH 
   'paśyanto na niryānti traidhātukāt, na budhyante bhūtakoṭim / tena te bālā	apaSyantaH na niryAnti trEDAtukAt, na buDyante BUtakowim / tena te bAlA
   iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti / te satyaṃ dharmaṃ na śraddhadhati / na khalu punaḥ	iti saMjQAm gacCanti / te satyam Darmam na SradDaDati / na Kalu punar 
   śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante //	SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvA kaMcid Darmam aBiniviSante //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam SikzamANaH Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate? bhagavānāha   evaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate? BagavAn Aha  evam
   śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyām api na śikṣate	SikzamANaH SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm api na Sikzate
   / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate	/ evam SikzamANaH SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva Darmezu Sikzate
   / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,	/ evam SikzamANaH SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate,
   sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //	sarvajQa tAyAH AsannIBavati, sarvajQa tAyAm niryAsyati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yo bhagavan evaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yaH Bagavan evam
   paripṛcchet   kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate, sarvajñatāyā	paripRcCet  kim ayam mAyA puruzAH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzizyate, sarvajQa tAyA
   āsannībhaviṣyati, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti? tasya bhagavan evaṃ	AsannI Bavizyati, sarvajQa tAyAm niryAsi ati iti? tasya Bagavan evam
   paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	paripRcCataH kaTam nirdezwavyam syAt? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam
   subhūtimetadavocat   tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi / yathā te	suBUtim etat avocat  tena hi suBUte tvAm eva atra pratiprakzyAmi / yaTA te
   kṣamate, tathā vyākuryāḥ / sādhu bhagavannityāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavataḥ	kzamate, taTA vyAkuryAH / sADu Bagavan= iti AyuzmAn suBUtiH BagavataH
   pratyaśrauṣīt / bhagavānetadavocat   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,	pratyaSrOzIt / BagavAn etat avocat  tat kim manyase suBUte anyA sA mAyA,
   anyattadrūpam, anyā sā māyā, anyā sā vedanā / anyā sā saṃjñā, anye te	anyat tad rUpam, anyA sA mAyA, anyA sA vedanA / anyA sA saMjQA, anye te
   saṃskārāḥ / anyā sā māyā, anyattadvijñānam? subhūtirāha   na	saMskArAH / anyA sA mAyA, anyat tat vijQAnam? suBUtiH Aha  na
   hyetadbhagavan / na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam / rūpameva	hi etat Bagavan / na hi Bagavan anyA sA mAyA anyat tad rUpam / rUpam eva
   bhagavan māyā, māyaiva rūpam / na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā,	Bagavat mAyA, mAyA eva rUpam / na hi Bagavan anyA sA mAyA anyA sA vedanA,
   anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ / vedanā saṃjñā (Vaidya 9) saṃskārā eva	anyA sA saMjQA anye te saMskArAH / vedanA saMjQA (VEdyaH 9) saMskArAH eva
   bhagavan māyā, māyaiva vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / na bhagavan anyā sā māyā	Bagavat mAyA, mAyA eva vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / na Bagavan anyA sA mAyA
   anyattadvijñānam / vijñānameva bhagavan māyā, māyaiva vijñānam //	anyat tad vijQAnam / vijQAnam eva Bagavat mAyA, mAyA eva vijQAnam //
   bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā	BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase suBUte atra ezAm saMjQA sama jQA
   prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti?	prajQaptiH vyavahAraH paQca su upAdAna skanDezu yat uta boDisattvaH iti?
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   evametadbhagavan,	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam etat Bagavan ,
   evametatsugata / tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	evam etat sugataH / tena hi Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ	prajQapAramitAyAm SikzamANena mAyA puruzeNa iva Sikzitavyam
   bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tatkasya hetoḥ? sa eva hi bhagavan	Bavati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / tat kasya hetoH? saH eva hi Bagavan
   māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā	mAyA puruzaH DArayitavyaH yat uta paQca upAdAna skanDAH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA
   hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā / yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te	hi Bagavat mAyA upamam rUpam uktam BagavatA / yat ca rUpam tat zaz indriyam te
   pañca skandhāḥ / tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ /	paQca skanDAH / taTA hi Bagavat mAyA upamAH vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH uktAH /
   tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā / yacca vijñānaṃ	taTA hi Bagavat mAyA upamam vijQAnam uktam BagavatA / yat ca vijQAnam
   tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ / mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā	tad zaz indriyam te paQca skanDAH / mA Bagavat nava yAna saMprasTitA
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH imam nirdeSam SrutvA utrasizuH saMtrasizuH
   saṃtrāsamāpatsyante / bhagavānāha   yadi subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā	saMtrAsam Apatsyante / BagavAn Aha  yadi suBUte nava yAna saMprasTitA
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti, utrasiṣyanti	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH pApa mitra hasta gatAH Bavizyanti, utrasizyanti
   saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante / atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā	saMtrasizyanti saMtrAsam Apatsyante / aTa ced suBUte nava yAna saMprasTitA
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH kalyANa mitra hasta gatAH Bavizyanti, na utrasizyanti
   na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //	na saMtrasizyanti na saMtrAsam Apatsyante //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   kāni punarbhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  kAni punar Bagavan
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni? bhagavānāha   ya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi vedita vyAni? BagavAn Aha  ya
   enaṃ pāramitāsu avavadanti anuśāsati / ye 'smai mārakarmāṇyupadiśanti /	enam pAramitAsu avavadanti anuSAsati / ye asmE mAra karmANi upadiSanti /
   evaṃ māradoṣā boddhavyāḥ   ime māradoṣāḥ / evaṃ mārakarmāṇi boddhavyāni  	evam mAra dozAH bodDavyAH  ime mAra dozAH / evam mAra karmANi bodDavyAni  
   imāni mārakarmāṇi / tāni tvayā buddhvā vivarjayitavyānīti / imāni subhūte	imAni mAra karmANi / tAni tvayA budDvA vivarjayitavyAni iti / imAni suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahA saMnAha saMnadDasya
   mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /	mahAyAna saMprasTitasya mahAyAna samArUXasya kalyANa mitrANi veditavyAni /
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yadbhagavānevamāha  	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yat BagavAn evam Aha  
   imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya	imAni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahA saMnAha saMnadDasya
   mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyānīti	mahAyAna saMprasTitasya mahAyAna samArUXasya kalyANa mitrANi veditavyAni iti
   / yacca bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti bhagavannucyate, tatra bodhisattva iti	/ yat ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti Bagavan= ucyate, tatra boDisattvaH iti
   bhagavan kaḥ padārtha? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	Bagavan kaH padArTa? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   apadārthaḥ subhūte bodhisattvapadārthaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ	apadArTaH suBUte boDisattva padArTaH / tat kasya hetoH? sarva DarmANAm
   hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate / sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi	hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH asakta tAyAm Sikzate / sarva DarmANAm hi
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuboDana arTena asakta tAyAm anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate / bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate / boDi arTena tu suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva ityucyate / subhūtirāha   yatpunarbhagavānevamāha   bodhisattvo	mahAsattvaH iti ucyate / suBUtiH Aha  yat punar BagavAn evam Aha  boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva iti, kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate?	mahAsattvaH iti, kena kAraNena Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate?
   bhagavānāha   mahataḥ sattvarāśermahataḥ sattvanikāyasya agratāṃ	BagavAn Aha  mahataH sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tAm
   kārayiṣyati, tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate //	kArayizyati, tena arTena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   mamāpi bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  mama api Bagavan
   pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate / bhagavānāha  	pratiBAtiyena arTena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate / BagavAn Aha  
   pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase / āyuṣmān śāriputra āha  	pratiBAtu te SAriputra yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase / AyuzmAn SAriputraH Aha  
   mahatyā ātmadṛṣṭyāḥ sattvadṛṣṭyāḥ jīvadṛṣṭyāḥ pudgaladṛṣṭyāḥ (Vaidya 10)	mahatyAH Atma dRzwyAH sattva dRzwyAH jIva dRzwyAH pudgala dRzwyAH (VEdyaH 10)
   bhavadṛṣṭyāḥ vibhavadṛṣṭyāḥ ucchedadṛṣṭyāḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭyāḥ svakāyadṛṣṭyāḥ,	Bava dRzwyAH viBava dRzwyAH ucCeda dRzwyAH SASvata dRzwyAH sva kAya dRzwyAH,
   etāsāmevamādyānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti, tenārthena	etAsAm evamAdyAnAm dRzwInAm prahANAya Darmam deSayizyati iti, tena arTena
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate / atha khalvāyuṣmān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena	suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  mama api Bagavan pratiBAti yena arTena
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate / bhagavānāha   pratibhātu te subhūte	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate / BagavAn Aha  pratiBAtu te suBUte
   yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase / subhūtirāha   bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti	yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase / suBUtiH Aha  boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti
   bhagavannucyate / yad api tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ	Bagavan= ucyate / yat api tat Bagavan boDi cittam
   sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ	sarvajQa tA cittam anAsravam cittam asamam cittam asamasamam cittam asADAraNam
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ, tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ / tatkasya	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH, tatra api citte asaktaH aparyApannaH / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? tathā hi tatsarvajñatācittamanāsravamaparyāpannaṃ tat, yad api	hetoH? taTA hi tat sarvajQa tA cittam anAsravam aparyApannam tat, yat api
   tatsarvajñatācittamanāsravamaparyāpannam / tatrāpi citte asakto	tat sarvajQa tA cittam anAsravam aparyApannam / tatra api citte asaktaH 
   'paryāpannaḥ / tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //	aparyApannaH / tena arTena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti saMKyAm gacCati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kena kāraṇena	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kena kAraNena
   āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ? subhūtirāha  	Ayuzman suBUte tatra api citte asaktaH aparyApannaH? suBUtiH Aha  
   acittatvādāyuṣman śāriputra tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ //	acitta tvAt Ayuzman SAriputra tatra api citte asaktaH aparyApannaH //
   śāriputra āha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?	SAriputraH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman suBUte asti tat cittam yat cittam acittam?
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā	suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra tatra acitta tAyAm astitA vA
   nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā? śāriputra āha   no hīdamāyuṣman	na astitAH vA vidyate vA upalaByate vA? SAriputraH Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman
   subhūte / subhūtirāha   tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā	suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  tat yadi Ayuzman SAriputra tatra acitta tAyAm astitA
   vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā, tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra	vA na astitAH vA na vidyate vA na upalaByate vA, tat kaTam AyuzmAn SAriputra
   evamāha   asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti? śāriputra āha   sādhu sādhu	evam Aha  asti tat cittam yat cittam acittamiti? SAriputraH Aha  sADu sADu
   āyuṣman subhūte / yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ	Ayuzman suBUte / yaTA api nAma tvam BagavatA araNA vihAriNAm agra tAyAm
   nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi //	nirdizwaH nirdiSasi //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat   mahāsattvo	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Bagavantam etat avocat  mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate, mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ sa sattvaḥ /	mahAsattvaH iti yat idam Bagavan= ucyate, mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH sa sattvaH /
   mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍhaś ca sa sattvaḥ / tasmātsa	mahAyAna saMprasTitaH mahAyAna samArUXaH ca sa sattvaH / tasmAt sa
   mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //	mahAsattvaH mahAsattvaH iti saMKyAm gacCati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH 
   mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate, kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo	mahAyAna saMnadDaH iti yat idam Bagavan= ucyate, kiyatA Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ? bhagavānāha   iha subhūte	mahAsattvaH mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH Bavati ? BagavAn Aha  iha suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati   aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evam Bavati  aprameyAH mayA sattvAH
   parinirvāpayitavyā iti / asaṃkhyeyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /	parinirvApayitavyAH iti / asaMKyeyAH mayA sattvAH parinirvApayitavyAH iti /
   na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti / sa tāṃstāvataḥ sattvān	na ca te santi yEH ye parinirvApayitavyAH iti / sa tAn= tAvataH sattvAn
   parinirvāpayati / na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca	parinirvApayati / na ca sa kaScid sattvaH yaH parinirvRtaH yena ca
   parinirvāpito bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ	parinirvApitaH Bavati / tat kasya hetoH? Darma tA ezA suBUte DarmANAm
   māyādharmatāmupādāya syāt / yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā	mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya syAt / yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA karaH vA
   māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte /	mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe mahAntam jana kAyam aBinirmimIte /
   abhinirmāya tasyaiva mahato janakāyasyāntardhānaṃ kuryāt / tatkiṃ manyase	aBinirmAya tasya eva mahataH jana kAyasya antarDAnam kuryAt / tat kim manyase
   subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?	suBUte api nu tatra kenacid kaScid hataH vA mRtaH vA nASitaH vA antarhitaH vA?
   subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   evameva subhūte	suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvo (Vaidya 11) mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān	boDisattvaH (VEdyaH 11) mahAsattvaH aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn sattvAn
   parinirvāpayati / na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca	parinirvApayati / na ca sa kaScid sattvaH yaH parinirvRtaH yena ca
   parinirvāpito bhavati / sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ	parinirvApitaH Bavati / saced boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imam nirdeSam evam
   nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, iyatā	nirdiSyamAnam SrutvA na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate, iyatA
   ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ //	ayam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH veditavyaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yathāhaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yaTA aham Bagavan
   bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan	BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi, taTA asaMnAha saMnadDaH bata ayam Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ / bhagavānāha   evametatsubhūte, evam	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH / BagavAn Aha  evam etat suBUte, evam
   etat / asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /	etat / asaMnAha saMnadDaH bata ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā / te	tat kasya hetoH? akRtA hi suBUte sarvajQa tA avikRtAH anaBisaMskRtAH / te
   'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ, yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ayaṃ	api sattvAH akRtAH avikRtAH anaBisaMskRtAH, yezAm sattvAnAm arTAya ayam
   saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ //	saMnAha saMnadDaH //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   evametadbhagavan,	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam etat Bagavan ,
   evametatsugata / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpamabaddhamamuktam /	evam etat sugataH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavan rUpam abadDam amuktam /
   evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / tathā hi bhagavan vijñānamabaddhamamuktam /	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / taTA hi Bagavan vijQAnam abadDam amuktam /
   rūpatathatāpi bhagavan abaddhā amuktā / evaṃ vedanātathatāpi	rUpa taTatA api Bagavan abadDA amuktAH / evam vedanA taTatA api
   saṃjñātathatāpi saṃskāratathatāpi / vijñānatathatāpi bhagavan abaddhā	saMjQA taTatA api saMskAra taTatA api / vijQAna taTatA api Bagavan abadDA
   amuktā //	amuktAH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi / evaṃ	rUpam Ayuzman suBUte abadDam amuktam iti vadasi / evam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam Ayuzman suBUte abadDam amuktam iti vadasi
   / rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi / evaṃ	/ rUpa taTatA api Ayuzman suBUte abadDA amuktA iti vadasi / evam
   vedanātathatāpi saṃjñātathatāpi saṃskāratathatāpi /	vedanA taTatA api saMjQA taTatA api saMskAra taTatA api /
   vijñānatathatāpyāyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi / atha	vijQAna taTatA api Ayuzman suBUte abadDA amuktA iti vadasi / aTa
   katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi? evaṃ	katamat tat Ayuzman suBUte rUpam yat rUpam abadDam amuktam iti vadasi? evam
   katamā sā vedanā, katamā sā saṃjñā, katame te saṃskārāḥ? katamattadāyuṣman	katamA sA vedanA, katamA sA saMjQA, katame te saMskArAH? katamat tat Ayuzman
   subhūte vijñānaṃ yadvijñānamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi? katamā sā āyuṣman	suBUte vijQAnam yat vijQAnam abadDam amuktam iti vadasi? katamA sA Ayuzman
   subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi? evaṃ katamā	suBUte rUpa taTatA yA rUpa taTatA api abadDA amuktA iti vadasi? evam katamA
   sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā? katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte	sA vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA? katamA sA Ayuzman suBUte
   vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi? evamukte	vijQAna taTatA yA vijQAna taTatA api abadDA amuktA iti vadasi? evam ukte
   āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat   yadāyuṣman	AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam pUrNam mEtrAyaNI putram etat avocat  yat Ayuzman
   pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam / evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya	pUrNa mAyA puruzasya rUpam tat abadDam amuktam / evam yA mAyA puruzasya
   vedanā, yā māyāpuruṣasya saṃjñā, ye māyāpuruṣasya saṃskārāḥ / yadāyuṣman	vedanA, yA mAyA puruzasya saMjQA, ye mAyA puruzasya saMskArAH / yat Ayuzman
   pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam / yā āyuṣman pūrṇa	pUrNa mAyA puruzasya vijQAnam tat abadDam amuktam / yAH Ayuzman pUrNa
   māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā / evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya	mAyA puruzasya rUpa taTatA sA abadDA amuktAH / evam yA mAyA puruzasya
   vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā / yā āyuṣman pūrṇa	vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA / yAH Ayuzman pUrNa
   māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā / tatkasya hetoḥ?	mAyA puruzasya vijQAna taTatA sA abadDA amuktAH / tat kasya hetoH?
   asadbhūtatvādabaddhā amuktā, viviktatvādabaddhā amuktā,	asat BUta tvAt abadDA amuktA, vivikta tvAt abadDA amuktA,
   anutpannatvādabaddhā amuktā / ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktAH / ayam sa boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya	mahA saMnAha saMnadDasya mahAyAna saMprasTitasya mahAyAna samArUXasya
   mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ / evamukte āyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputrastūṣṇīmabhūt	mahA saMnAhaH asaMnAhaH / evam ukte AyuzmAn pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH tUzNIm aBUt 
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   evaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (Vaidya 12) mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH (VEdyaH 12) mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH san
   mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati / katamacca tanmahāyānam?	mahAyAna saMprasTitaH mahAyAna samArUXaH Bavati / katamat ca tat mahAyAnam?
   kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kuto vā tanmahāyānaṃ niryāsyati?	kaTam vA tad saMprasTitaH veditavyaH? kutas vA tat mahAyAnam niryAsyati?
   kena vā tanmahāyānaṃ saṃprasthitam? kva vā tanmahāyānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā	kena vA tat mahAyAnam saMprasTitam? kva vA tat mahAyAnam sTAsyati? kaH vA
   anena mahāyānena niryāsyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	anena mahAyAnena niryAsyati? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam
   subhūtimetadavocat   mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /	suBUtim etat avocat  mahAyAnam iti suBUte aprameya tAyAH etat aDivacanam /
   aprameyamiti subhūte apramāṇatvena / yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi   kathaṃ	aprameyam iti suBUte apramANa tvena / yat api suBUte evam vadasi  kaTam
   vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kuto vā tanmahāyānaṃ niryāsyati? kena vā	vA tad saMprasTitaH veditavyaH? kutas vA tat mahAyAnam niryAsyati? kena vA
   tanmahāyānaṃ saṃprasthitam? kva vā tanmahāyānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā anena	tat mahAyAnam saMprasTitam? kva vA tat mahAyAnam sTAsyati? kaH vA anena
   mahāyānena niryāsyatīti? pāramitābhiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /	mahAyAnena niryAsi ati iti? pAramitABiH saMprasTitaH /
   traidhātukānniryāsyati / yenārambaṇaṃ tena saṃprasthitam / sarvajñatāyāṃ	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati / yena ArambaNam tena saMprasTitam / sarvajQa tAyAm
   sthāsyati / bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niryāsyati, api tu khalu punarna	sTAsyati / boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH niryAsyati, api tu Kalu punar na
   kutaścinniryāsyati / na kenāpi saṃprasthitam / na kvacitsthāsyati / api tu	kutaScid niryAsyati / na kena api saMprasTitam / na kvacid sTAsyati / api tu
   sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāmasthānayogena / nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto	sTAsyati sarvajQa tA AyAma sTAna yogena / na api kaScid tena mahAyAnena niryAtaH 
   nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yaś ca niryāyāt, yena ca	na api niryAsyati na api niryAti / tat kasya hetoH? yaH ca niryAyAt, yena ca
   niryāyāt, ubhāvetau dharmau na vidyete nopalabhyete / evamavidyamāneṣu	niryAyAt, uBO= etO DarmO na vidyete na upalaByete / evam avidyamAnezu
   sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati? evaṃ hi subhūte	sarva Darmezu katamaH DarmaH katamena DarmeNa niryAsyati? evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna saMnadDaH mahAyAna saMprasTitaH 
   mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati //	mahAyAna samArUXaH Bavati //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  mahAyAnam mahAyAnam iti
   bhagavannucyate / sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanniryāsyati	Bagavan= ucyate / sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBavat niryAsyati
   ākāśasamatayā atimahattayā tanmahāyānam / yathā ākāśe	AkASa sama tayA ati mahat tayA tat mahAyAnam / yaTA AkASe
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ, evameva bhagavan asmin yāne	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH, evam eva Bagavan asmin yAne
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ / anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH / anena Bagavan paryAyeNa
   mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām / naivāsyāgamo dṛśyate,	mahAyAnam idam boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm / na eva asya AgamaH dRSyate,
   naivāsya nirgamo dṛśyate, nāpyasya sthānaṃ saṃvidyate / evamasya bhagavan	na eva asya nirgamaH dRSyate, na api asya sTAnam saMvidyate / evam asya Bagavan
   mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate, nāpyaparānta upalabhyate, nāpi	mahAyAnasya na eva pUrva ante upalaByate, na api aparAntaH upalaByate, na api
   madhya upalabhyate / atha samaṃ bhagavaṃstadyānam / tasmānmahāyānaṃ	maDye upalaByate / aTa samam Bagavan= tat yAnam / tasmAt mahAyAnam
   mahāyānamityucyate / atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt	mahAyAnam iti ucyate / aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmate suBUtaye sADukAram adAt 
     sādhu sādhu subhūte / evametatsubhūte, evam etat / evaṃ mahāyānamidaṃ	 sADu sADu suBUte / evam etat suBUte, evam etat / evam mahAyAnam idam
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām / atra śikṣitvā bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm / atra SikzitvA boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH
   sarvajñatā anuprāptā, anuprāpsyate anuprāpyate ca //	sarvajQa tA anuprAptA, anuprApsyate anuprApyate ca //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat   ayaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Bagavantam etat avocat  ayam
   bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo	Bagavan suBUtiH sTaviraH prajQApAramitAyAH kRtaSas aDIzwaH 
   mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate / atha khalvāyuṣmān	mahAyAnam upadezwavyam manyate / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya	suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  na aham Bagavan prajQApAramitAm vyatikramya
   mahāyānamavocam / bhagavānāha   no hīdaṃ subhūte / anulomatvaṃ subhūte	mahAyAnam avocam / BagavAn Aha  no hi idam suBUte / anuloma tvam suBUte
   prajñāpāramitāyā mahāyānamupadiśasi / evamukte āyuṣmān	prajQApAramitAyAH mahAyAnam upadiSasi / evam ukte AyuzmAn
   subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   buddhānubhāvādbhagavan / api nu khalu	suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  budDa anuBAvAt Bagavan / api nu Kalu
   punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, aparāntato bodhisattvo	punar Bagavan pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti, apara antataH boDisattvaH 
   nopaiti, madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti / tatkasya hetornopaiti?	na upEti, maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti / tat kasya hetoH na upEti?
   rūpāparyantatayā hi bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ	rUpa aparyanta tayA hi boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA, evam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / (Vaidya 13) vijñānāparyantatayā hi	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / (VEdyaH 13) vijQAna aparyanta tayA hi
   bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā / rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti nopaiti / idam api	boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA / rUpam boDisattvaH iti na upEti / idam api
   na vidyate nopalabhyate / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ	na vidyate na upalaByate / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam
   bodhisattva iti nopaiti, idam api na vidyate nopalabhyate / evaṃ bhagavan	boDisattvaH iti na upEti, idam api na vidyate na upalaByate / evam Bagavan
   sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ	sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam boDisattva Darmam anupalaBamAnaH na aham
   bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva	Bagavan tam Darmam samanupaSyAmi yasya etat nAmaDeyam yat uta boDisattva
   iti / prajñāpāramitām api na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe / sarvajñatām api na	iti / prajQApAramitAm api na samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe / sarvajQa tAm api na
   samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe / so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ	samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe / saH aham Bagavan sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam
   taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa	tam Darmam anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam Darmam katamena DarmeNa
   katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi? buddha iti bhagavan	katamasmin Darme avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi? budDaH iti Bagavan
   nāmadheyamātram etat / bodhisattva iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat /	nAmaDeya mAtram etat / boDisattvaH iti Bagavat nAmaDeya mAtram etat /
   prajñāpāramiteti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat / tacca	prajQApAramitA iti Bagavat nAmaDeya mAtram etat / tat ca
   nāmadheyamanabhinirvṛttam / yathā ātmā ātmeti ca bhagavannucyate,	nAmaDeyam anaBinirvRttam / yaTA AtmA AtmA iti ca Bagavan= ucyate,
   atyantatayā ca bhagavannanabhinirvṛtta ātmā / evamasvabhāvānāṃ	atyanta tayA ca Bagavan= anaBinirvRttaH AtmA / evam asvaBAvAnAm
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamattadrūpaṃ yadagrāhyamanabhinirvṛttam? katame te	sarva DarmANAm katamat tad rUpam yat agrAhyam anaBinirvRttam? katame te
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ? katamattadvijñānaṃ yadagrāhyamanabhinirvṛttam?	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH? katamat tat vijQAnam yat agrAhyam anaBinirvRttam?
   evameteṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā asvabhāvatā, sā anabhinirvṛttiḥ / yā ca	evam etezAm sarva DarmANAm yA asvaBAva tA, sA anaBinirvRttiH / yA ca
   sarvadharmāṇāmanabhinirvṛttirna te dharmāḥ /	sarva DarmANAm anaBinirvRttiH na te DarmAH /
   tatkimanabhinirvṛttimanabhinirvṛttyāṃ	tat kim anaBinirvRttim anaBinirvRttyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmyanuśāsiṣyāmi? na cānyatra bhagavan	prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi? na ca anyatra Bagavan
   anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā	anaBinirvRttitaH sarva DarmAH vA budDa DarmA vA boDisattva DarmA vA
   upalabhyante, yo vā bodhāya caret / sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ	upalaByante, yaH vA boDAya caret / saced Bagavan evam BAzyamANe evam
   deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate	deSyamAne evam upadiSyamAne boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya cittam na avalIyate
   na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate, nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ	na saMlIyate na vizIdati na vizAdam Apadyate, na asya vipRzWIBavati mAnasam
   na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,	na Bagna pRzWIBavati na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate,
   evaṃ veditavyam   caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /	evam veditavyam  carati ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm /
   bhāvayatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām / upaparīkṣate 'yaṃ	BAvayati ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm / upaparIkzate ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām / upanidhyāyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm / upaniDyAyati ayam boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmiti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yasmin hi samaye bhagavan	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm iti / tat kasya hetoH? yasmin hi samaye Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imAn DarmAn prajQApAramitAyAm vyupaparIkzate,
   tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti, na rūpamupagacchati, na rūpasyotpādaṃ	tasmin samaye na rUpam upEti, na rUpam upagacCati, na rUpasya utpAdam
   samanupaśyati, na rūpasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati / evaṃ na vedanāṃ na	samanupaSyati, na rUpasya niroDam samanupaSyati / evam na vedanAm na
   saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān / na vijñānamupaiti, na vijñānamupagacchati, na	saMjQAm na saMskArAn / na vijQAnam upEti, na vijQAnam upagacCati, na
   vijñānasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na vijñānasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati /	vijQAnasya utpAdam samanupaSyati, na vijQAnasya niroDam samanupaSyati /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam / yo rūpasyāvyayo	tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH na tad rUpam / yaH rUpasya avyayaH 
   na tadrūpam / ityanutpādaś ca rūpaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /	na tad rUpam / iti anutpAdaH ca rUpam ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram /
   ityavyayaś ca rūpaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram / yatpunaretaducyate	iti avyayaH ca rUpam ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / yat punar etat ucyate
   rūpamiti, advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā / evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ	rUpam iti, advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA / evam taTA hi yaH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH
   saṃskārāṇām / tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam, yo	saMskArANAm / taTA hi yaH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tad vijQAnam, yaH 
   vijñānasyāvyayo na tadvijñānam / ityanutpādaś ca vijñānaṃ ca	vijQAnasya avyayaH na tad vijQAnam / iti anutpAdaH ca vijQAnam ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram / ityavyayaś ca vijñānaṃ ca	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / iti avyayaH ca vijQAnam ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram / yatpunaretaducyate vijñānamiti, advayastaiṣā	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / yat punar etat ucyate vijQAnamiti, advayaH tA ezA
   gaṇanā kṛtā / evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān	gaNanA kRtA / evam Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm sarva AkAram sarva DarmAn
   vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti, na rūpamupagacchati, na	vyupaparIkzamANaH tasmin samaye na rUpam upEti, na rUpam upagacCati, na
   rūpasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na rūpasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati / evaṃ na	rUpasya utpAdam samanupaSyati, na rUpasya niroDam samanupaSyati / evam na
   vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān / na vijñānamupaiti, (Vaidya 14) na	vedanAm na saMjQAm na saMskArAn / na vijQAnam upEti, (VEdyaH 14) na
   vijñānamupagacchati, na vijñānasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na vijñānasya	vijQAnam upagacCati, na vijQAnasya utpAdam samanupaSyati, na vijQAnasya
   nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na	niroDam samanupaSyati / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH na
   tadrūpam / yo rūpasyāvyayo na tadrūpam / ityanutpādaś ca rūpaṃ ca	tad rUpam / yaH rUpasya avyayaH na tad rUpam / iti anutpAdaH ca rUpam ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram / ityavyayaś ca rūpaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / iti avyayaH ca rUpam ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram
   / yatpunaretaducyate rūpamiti, advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā / evaṃ tathā hi yo	/ yat punar etat ucyate rUpam iti, advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA / evam taTA hi yaH 
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / taTA hi yaH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na
   tadvijñānam, yo vijñānasyāvyayo na tadvijñānam / ityanutpādaś ca vijñānaṃ	tad vijQAnam, yaH vijQAnasya avyayaH na tad vijQAnam / iti anutpAdaH ca vijQAnam
   ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram / ityavyayaś ca vijñānaḥ ca	ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / iti avyayaH ca vijQAnaH ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram / yatpunaretaducyate vijñānamiti, advayasyaiṣā	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / yat punar etat ucyate vijQAnam iti, advayasya ezA
   gaṇanā kṛtā //	gaNanA kRtA //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   tena hi	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  tena hi
   yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā bodhisattvo	yaTA aham AyuzmataH suBUteH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi, taTA boDisattvaH 
   'pyanutpādaḥ / yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ	api anutpAdaH / yadi ca Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH api anutpAdaH kim
   bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati? yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo	boDisattvaH duzkara cArikAm carati? yAni vA tAni sattvAnAm kRtaSo
   duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ	duHKAni utsahate pratyanuBavitum? evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam
   śāriputrametadavocat   nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ	SAriputram etat avocat  na aham Ayuzman SAriputraH icCAmi boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo	mahAsattvam duzkara cArikAm carantam na api sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yaH 
   duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi āyuṣman śāriputra	duzkara saMjQayA carati / tat kasya hetoH? na hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ	duzkara saMjQAm janayitvA SakyaH aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm arTaH
   kartum / api tu sukhasaṃjñāmeva kṛtvā / sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ	kartum / api tu suKa saMjQAm eva kRtvA / sarva sattvAnAm antike mAtR saMjQAm
   pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu / evametāḥ	pitR saMjQAm putra saMjQAm duhitR saMjQAm kRtvA strI puruzezu / evam etAH
   saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /	saMjQAH kRtvA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH boDisattva cArikAm carati /
   tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena	tasmAt mAtR saMjQA pitR saMjQA putra saMjQA duhitR saMjQA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā / yathā	mahAsattvena sarva sattvAnAm antike yAvat Atma saMjQA utpAdayitavyA / yaTA
   ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ, evaṃ	AtmA sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam sarva duHKeByaH mocayitavyaH, evam
   sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā	sarva sattvAH sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam sarva duHKeByaH mocayitavyA
   iti / evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā   mayaite sarvasattvā na	iti / evam ca sarva sattvezu saMjQA utpAdayitavyA  mayA ete sarva sattvAH na
   parityaktavyāḥ / mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā aparimāṇato	parityaktavyAH / mayA ete sarva sattvAH parimocayitavyAH aparimANataH 
   duḥkhaskandhāt / na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo	duHKa skanDAt / na ca mayA etezu citta pradozaH utpAdayitavyaH antaSas SataSas 
   'pi chidyamāneneti / evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	api CidyamAnena iti / evam hi boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī	cittam utpAdayitavyam saced evaMcittaH viharizyati, na duzkara saMjQI
   cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī vihariṣyati / punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra	carizyati, na duzkara saMjQI viharizyati / punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam   yathā sarveṇa	boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam  yaTA sarveNa
   sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ	sarvam sarvaTA sarvam AtmA na vidyate na upalaByate, evam sarveNa sarvam
   sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /	sarvaTA sarvam sarva DarmAH na saMvidyante na upalaByante /
   evamādhyātmikabāhyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā /	evam ADyAtmika bAhyezu sarva Darmezu saMjQA utpAdayitavyA /
   sacedevaṃcittaścariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī	saced evaMcittaH carizyati, na duzkara saMjQI carizyati, na duzkara saMjQI
   vihariṣyati / yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha   anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /	viharizyati / yat api Ayuzman SAriputraH evam Aha  anutpAdaH boDisattvaH iti /
   evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat / anutpādo bodhisattva iti //	evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra, evam etat / anutpAdaH boDisattvaH iti //
   śāriputra āha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ, utāho	SAriputraH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH eva anutpAdaH, uta aho
   bodhisattvadharmā apyanutpādaḥ? subhūtirāha   bodhisattvadharmā api	boDisattva DarmAH api anutpAdaH? suBUtiH Aha  boDisattva DarmAH api
   āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte	Ayuzman SAriputra anutpAdaH SAriputraH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman suBUte
   bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ, utāho sarvajñatāpyanutpādaḥ? subhūtirāha  	boDisattva DarmAH eva anutpAdaH, uta aho sarvajQa tA apya nutpAdaH? suBUtiH Aha  
   sarvajñatāpyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ / āha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte	sarvajQa tA apya Ayuzman SAriputra anutpAdaH / Aha  kim punar Ayuzman suBUte
   (Vaidya 15) sarvajñataivānutpādaḥ, utāho sarvajñatādharmā apyanutpādaḥ?	(VEdyaH 15) sarvajQa tA eva anutpAdaH, uta aho sarvajQa tA DarmAH api anutpAdaH?
   āha   sarvajñatādharmā apyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ / āha   kiṃ	Aha  sarvajQa tA DarmAH api Ayuzman SAriputra anutpAdaH / Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ, utāho pṛthagjano	punar Ayuzman suBUte sarvajQa tA DarmAH eva anutpAdaH, uta aho pRTagjanaH 
   'pyanutpādaḥ? āha   pṛthagjano 'pyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ / āha   kiṃ	api anutpAdaH? Aha  pRTagjanaH api Ayuzman SAriputra anutpAdaH / Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ, utāho pṛthagjanadharmā	punar Ayuzman suBUte pRTagjanaH eva anutpAdaH, uta aho pRTagjana DarmA
   apyanutpādaḥ? āha   pṛthagjanadharmā āpyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /	api anutpAdaH? Aha  pRTagjana DarmAH ApyAyuzman SAriputra anutpAdaH /
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   yadyāyuṣman	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yadi Ayuzman
   subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ, bodhisattvadharmā apyanutpādaḥ,	suBUte boDisattvaH api anutpAdaH, boDisattva DarmAH api anutpAdaH,
   sarvajñatāpyanutpādaḥ, sarvajñatādharmā apyanutpādaḥ, pṛthagjano	sarvajQa tA api anutpAdaH, sarvajQa tA DarmAH api anutpAdaH, pRTagjanaH 
   'pyanutpādaḥ, pṛthagjanadharmā apyanutpādaḥ, nanvāyuṣman subhūte	api anutpAdaH, pRTagjana DarmAH api anutpAdaH, nanu Ayuzman suBUte
   anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /	anuprAptA eva ayatnena boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarvajQa tA Bavati /
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   nāhamāyuṣman	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  na aham Ayuzman
   śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi, nāpyabhisamayam /	SAriputra anutpannasya Darmasya prAptim icCAmi, na api aBisamayam /
   nāpyanutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate / āha   kiṃ	na api anutpannena DarmeNa anutpannA prAptiH prApyate / Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,	punar Ayuzman suBUte anutpannena DarmeNa anutpannA prAptiH prApyate,
   utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate? āha   kiṃ	uta aho utpannena DarmeNa anutpannA prAptiH prApyate? Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ, utāho anutpanna eva	punar Ayuzman SAriputra anutpannaH DarmaH utpannaH, uta aho anutpannaH eva
   dharmo 'nutpannaḥ? āha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo	DarmaH anutpannaH? Aha  kim punar Ayuzman suBUte utpAdaH eva DarmaH 
   'nutpādaḥ, utāho anutpādo dharma utpādaḥ? āha   utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo	anutpAdaH, uta aho anutpAdaH DarmaH utpAdaH? Aha  utpAdaH DarmaH anutpAdaH 
   dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum / āha   anutpādo 'pi te	DarmaH iti Ayuzman SAriputra na pratiBAti jalpitum / Aha  anutpAdaH api te
   āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum / āha   anutpāda evāyuṣman śāriputra	Ayuzman suBUte pratiBAti jalpitum / Aha  anutpAdaH eva Ayuzman SAriputra
   jalpaḥ / anutpāda eva āyuṣmān śāriputra pratibhāti / anutpāda eva āyuṣman	jalpaH / anutpAdaH eva AyuzmAn SAriputra pratiBAti / anutpAdaH eva Ayuzman
   śāriputra pratibhānam / evamevāyuṣman śāriputra atyantaṃ pratibhāti //	SAriputra pratiBAnam / evam eva Ayuzman SAriputra atyantam pratiBAti //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	DArma kaTikAnAm AyuzmAn suBUtiH agra tAyAm sTApitavyaH / tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,	taTA hi AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH yatas yatas eva paripraSnIkriyate,
   tatastata eva niḥsarati, dharmatāyāś ca na calati, tāṃ ca dharmatāṃ na	tatas tatas eva niHsarati, DarmatAyAH ca na calati, tAm ca Darma tAm na
   virodhayati / evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	viroDayati / evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām / te	DarmatA ezA Ayuzman SAriputra BagavataH SrAvakANa Am a niSrita DarmANAm / te
   yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyante, tatastata eva niḥsaranti, dharmatāṃ ca	yatas yatas eva paripraSnIkriyante, tatas tatas eva niHsaranti, Darma tAm ca
   na virodhayanti, dharmatāyāś ca na vyativartante / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi	na viroDayanti, DarmatAyAH ca na vyativartante / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api
   nāma aniśritattvātsarvadharmāṇām / evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ	nAma aniSri tattvAt sarva DarmANAm / evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam
   subhūtimetadavocat   sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte / katamaiṣā	suBUtim etat avocat  sADu sADu Ayuzman suBUte / katamA ezA
   sarvadharmāniśritapāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām? subhūtirāha  	sarva Darma aniSrita pAramitA boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm? suBUtiH Aha  
   prajñāpāramitaiva āyuṣman śāriputra sārvayānikī, sarvadharmāniśritatayā	prajQApAramitA eva Ayuzman SAriputra sArvayAnikI, sarva Darma aniSrita tayA
   sarvadharmāniśritapāramitā ca / iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva Darma aniSrita pAramitA ca / iti hi yasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ	evam gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm evam
   deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam, na	deSyamAnAyAm evam upadiSyamAnAyAm na Bavati cittasya avalIna tvam, na
   bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam, na bhavati dhaṃdhāyitatvam, na bhavati	Bavati kAFkzAyita tvam, na Bavati DaMDAyita tvam, na Bavati
   cittasyānyathātvam, veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena	cittasya anyaTAtvam, veditavyam ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH viharati anena
   prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti // (Vaidya 16)	prajQApAramitA vihAreNa avirahitaH ca anena manasikAreNa iti // (VEdyaH 16)
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kathamāyuṣman	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmatam suBUtim etat avocat  kaTam Ayuzman
