   subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,	suBUte avirahitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avirahitaH manasikAreNa Bavati,
   yaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati? yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo	yaH prajQApAramitA vihAreNa viharati? yadi hi Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati, evaṃ sa virahitaḥ	mahAsattvaH avirahitaH manasikAreNa Bavati, evam sa virahitaH
   prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati / yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito	prajQApAramitA vihAreNa Bavati / yadi ca Ayuzman suBUte avirahitaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati, evaṃ sa virahito	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA vihAreNa Bavati, evam sa virahitaH 
   manasikāreṇa bhavati / yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito	manasikAreNa Bavati / yadi ca Ayuzman suBUte manasikAreNa avirahitaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, avirahita eva prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati /	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH, avirahitaH eva prajQApAramitA vihAreNa Bavati /
   evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /	evam sati sarva sattvAH api avirahitAH Bavizyanti prajQApAramitA vihAreNa /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvā api hyavirahitā manasikāreṇa viharanti //	tat kasya hetoH? sarva sattvAH api hi avirahitAH manasikAreNa viharanti //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   sādhu sādhu	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  sADu sADu
   āyuṣman śāriputra / api tu upālapsye tvā / artha eva tvāyuṣmatā	Ayuzman SAriputra / api tu upAlapsye tvA / arTaH eva tu AyuzmatA

   sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā /	sattva asvaBAva tayA Ayuzman SAriputra manasikAra asvaBAva tA veditavyA /

   sattvānabhisaṃbodhanatayā āyuṣman śāriputra manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā	sattva anaBisaMboDana tayA Ayuzman SAriputra manasikAra anaBisaMboDana tA

   viharantamanena vihāreṇeti //	viharantam anena vihAreNa iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākārajñatācaryāparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm sarva AkAra jQa tA caryA parivartaH nAma
   prathamaḥ //	praTamaH //
   (Vaidya 17)	(VEdyaH 17)
   ASP_2: śakraparivarto dvitīyaḥ /	ASP_2: Sakra parivartaH dvitIyaH /
   tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi	tena Kalu punar samayena SakraH devAnAm indraH tasyAm eva parzadi
   saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā	saMnipatitaH saMnizaNNaH aBUt catvAriMSatA
   trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham / catvāraś ca lokapālā	trAyastriMSat kAyikEH deva putra sahasrEH sArDam / catvAraH ca lokapAlA
   viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham / brahmāpi	viMSatyA cAturmahArAja kAyikEH deva putra sahasrEH sArDam / brahmA api
   sahāpatirdaśabhirbrahmakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham / pañca ca	sahApatiH daSaBiH brahmakAyikEH deva putra sahasrEH sArDam / paQca ca
   śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni	SudDAvAsAnAm deva putrANAm sahasrANi tasyAm eva parzadi saMnipatitAni
   saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan / yo 'pi ca devānāṃ svakarmavipākajo 'vabhāsaḥ, so 'pi	saMnizaNNAni aBUvan / yaH api ca devAnAm sva karma vipAka jaH avaBAsaH, saH api
   sarvo buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhibhūto 'bhūt //	sarvaH budDa anuBAvena budDa tejasA budDa aDizWAnena aBiBUtaH aBUt //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat  	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim sTaviram etat avocat

   tatkathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam, kathaṃ	tat kaTam boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm sTAtavyam, kaTam
   śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ yogamāpattavyam? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha   tena hi	Sikzitavyam, kaTam yogam Apattavyam? sTaviraH suBUtiH Aha  tena hi
   kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /	kOSikaH upadekzyAmi te budDa anuBAvena budDa tejasA budDa aDizWAnena /
   yairdevaputrairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditam,	yEH deva putrEH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam na utpAditam,
   tairutpādayitavyam / ye tvavakrāntāḥ samyaktvaniyāmam, na te bhavyā	tEH utpAdayitavyam / ye tu avakrAntAH samyaktu a niyAmam, na te BavyA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum / tatkasya hetoḥ?	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdayitum / tat kasya hetoH?
   baddhasīmāno hi te saṃsārasrotasaḥ / abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya	badDa sImAnaH hi te saMsAra srotasaH / aBavyAH hi te punar punar saMsaraNAya

   dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ //	DarmeByaH viSizwatamAH DarmAH aDyAlambitavyAH //
   atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma   sādhu sādhu	aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim Amantrayate sma  sADu sADu

   mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca, saṃparigrahītavyāḥ	mahAsattvAH anuparigrahItavyAH anuparivArayitavyAH ca, saMparigrahItavyAH

   kauśika śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā	kOSika SRNu, sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru, BAzizye aham te yaTA
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam / śūnyatāyāṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm sTAtavyam / SUnyatAyAm

   tena hi kauśika (Vaidya 18) bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	tena hi kOSika (VEdyaH 18) boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena bhavitavyam / na rūpe sthātavyam / na vedanāyāṃ na	mahA saMnAha saMnadDena Bavitavyam / na rUpe sTAtavyam / na vedanAyAm na
   saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu / na vijñāne sthātavyam / na cakṣuṣi sthātavyam /	saMjQAyAm na saMskArezu / na vijQAne sTAtavyam / na cakzuzi sTAtavyam /

   sthātavyam / na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sthātavyam / evaṃ na	sTAtavyam / na cakzuH saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm sTAtavyam / evam na

   na manaḥsaṃsparśe, na manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sthātavyam / na	na manaH saMsparSe, na manaH saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm sTAtavyam / na

   / na samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣu, na mārgāṅgeṣu sthātavyam	/ na samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga izu, na mArga aFgezu sTAtavyam
   / na srotaāpattiphale sthātavyam / na sakṛdāgāmiphale, na anāgāmiphale,	/ na srotaApatti Pale sTAtavyam / na sakRdAgAmi Pale, na anAgAmi Pale,
   nārhattve sthātavyam / na pratyekabuddhatve sthātavyam / na buddhatve	na arhat tve sTAtavyam / na pratyekabudDa tve sTAtavyam / na budDa tve
   sthātavyam / iti hi rūpamiti na sthātavyam / iti hi vedaneti, saṃjñeti,	sTAtavyam / iti hi rUpam iti na sTAtavyam / iti hi vedanA iti, saMjQA iti,
   saṃskārā iti / iti hi vijñānamiti na sthātavyam / iti hi cakṣuriti,	saMskArAH iti / iti hi vijQAnam iti na sTAtavyam / iti hi cakzuH iti,
   yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti na sthātavyam / iti hi pṛthivīdhāturiti,	yAvat manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA iti na sTAtavyam / iti hi pRTivI DAtuH iti,
   yāvadvijñānadhāturiti na sthātavyam / iti hi smṛtyupasthānānīti na	yAvat vijQAna DAtuH iti na sTAtavyam / iti hi smRti upasTAnAni iti na
   sthātavyam / iti hi samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānīti, iti hi	sTAtavyam / iti hi samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga Ani iti, iti hi
   mārgāṅgānīti na sthātavyam / iti hi srotaāpattiphalamiti na sthātavyam,	mArga aFgAni iti na sTAtavyam / iti hi srotaApatti Palam iti na sTAtavyam,
   iti hi sakṛdāgāmiphalamiti, anāgāmiphalamiti, arhattvamiti na sthātavyam /	iti hi sakRdAgAmi Palam iti, anAgAmi Palam iti, arhat tvam iti na sTAtavyam /
   iti hi pratyekabuddhatvamiti na sthātavyam / iti hi buddhatvamiti na	iti hi pratyekabudDa tvam iti na sTAtavyam / iti hi budDa tvam iti na
   sthātavyam / rūpaṃ nityamanityamiti na sthātavyam / evaṃ	sTAtavyam / rUpam nityam anityam iti na sTAtavyam / evam

   sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti na sthātavyam / rūpaṃ śūnyamaśūnyamiti na sthātavyam /	suKam duHKam iti na sTAtavyam / rUpam SUnyam aSUnyam iti na sTAtavyam /

   vijñānamātmānātmeti na sthātavyam / rūpaṃ śubhamaśubhamiti na sthātavyam /	vijQAnam AtmA anAtmA iti na sTAtavyam / rUpam SuBam aSuBam iti na sTAtavyam /

   rūpaṃ śūnyamupalabhyate veti na sthātavyam / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /	rUpam SUnyam upalaByate vA iti na sTAtavyam / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH /

   srotaāpattiphalamasaṃskṛtaprabhāvitamiti na sthātavyam / evaṃ	srotaApatti Palam asaMskRta praBAvitam iti na sTAtavyam / evam
   sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalamarhattvamasaṃskṛtaprabhāvitamiti na	sakRdAgAmi Palam anAgAmi Palam arhat tvam asaMskRta praBAvitam iti na
   sthātavyam / pratyekabuddhatvamasaṃskṛtaprabhāvitamiti na sthātavyam /	sTAtavyam / pratyekabudDa tvam asaMskRta praBAvitam iti na sTAtavyam /
   srotaāpanno dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam / srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto	srotaApannaH dakziNIyaH iti na sTAtavyam / srotaApannAH sapta kRtaH 
   bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam / sakṛdāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam /	Bava paramAH iti na sTAtavyam / sakRdAgAmI dakziNIyaH iti na sTAtavyam /
   sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ	sakRdAgAmya parinizWi tattvAt sakRt imam lokam Agamya duHKasya antam
   kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam / anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī	karizyati iti na sTAtavyam / anAgAmI dakziNIyaH iti na sTAtavyam anAgAmI
   anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam / arhan	anAgamya imam lokam tatra eva parinirvAsyati iti na sTAtavyam / arhan
   dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam / arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau	dakziNIyaH iti na sTAtavyam / arhan= iha eva anupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO
   parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam / pratyekabuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na	parinirvAsyati iti na sTAtavyam / pratyekabudDaH dakziNIyaH iti na
   sthātavyam / pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ	sTAtavyam / pratyekabudDaH atikramya SrAvaka BUmim aprApya budDa BUmim
   parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam / buddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam /	parinirvAsyati iti na sTAtavyam / budDaH dakziNIyaH iti na sTAtavyam /
   buddho 'tikramya (Vaidya 19) pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya	budDaH atikramya (VEdyaH 19) pRTagjana BUmim atikramya
   śrāvakabhūmimatikramya pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprabheyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	SrAvaka BUmim atikramya pratyekabudDa BUmim apraBeyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi	sattvAnAm arTam kRtvA aprameyANi asaMKyeyAni sattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi
   parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān	parinirvApya aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn sattvAn
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa samyaksaMbudDa tva niyatAn kRtvA budDa BUmO sTitvA
   buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena	budDa kRtyam kRtvA anupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO budDa parinirvANena
   parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam //	parinirvAsyati iti evam api anena na sTAtavyam //
   atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat   yadi buddho 'tikramya	aTa Kalu AyuzmataH SAriputrasya etat aBavat  yadi budDaH atikramya
   pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya śrāvakabhūmimatikramya	pRTagjana BUmim atikramya SrAvaka BUmim atikramya
   pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā	pratyekabudDa BUmim aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm arTam kRtvA
   aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya	aprameyANi asaMKyeyAni sattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi parinirvApya
   aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān	aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn sattvAn
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa samyaksaMbudDa tva niyatAn kRtvA budDa BUmO sTitvA
   buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena	budDa kRtyam kRtvA anupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO budDa parinirvANena
   parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam, tatkathaṃ punaranena	parinirvAsyati iti evam api anena na sTAtavyam, tat kaTam punar anena
   sthātavyaṃ, kathaṃ śikṣitavyamiti? atha khalvāyuṣmān	sTAtavyan, kaTam Sikzitavyam iti? aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva	suBUtiH budDa anuBAvena AyuzmataH SAriputrasya cetasA eva
   cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   tatkiṃ manyase	cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  tat kim manyase
   āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ? āyuṣmān	Ayuzman SAriputra kva taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH sTitaH? AyuzmAn
   śāriputra āha   na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ	SAriputraH Aha  na kvacid Ayuzman suBUte taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH
   sthitaḥ / tatkasya heto? apratiṣṭhitamānaso hi tathāgato 'rhan	sTitaH / tat kasya heto? apratizWita mAnasaH hi taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ / sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau	samyaksaMbudDaH / sa na eva saMskRte DAtO sTitaH na api asaMskRte DAtO
   sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ //	sTitaH na ca tatas vyutTitaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   evameva	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  evam eva
   āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam, evaṃ śikṣitavyam	Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena sTAtavyam, evam Sikzitavyam
     yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na	 yaTA taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH na kvacid sTitaH na AsTitaH na
   viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ, tathā sthāsyāmītyevamanena śikṣitavyam / yathā	vizWitaH na avizWitaH, taTA sTAsyAmi iti evam anena Sikzitavyam / yaTA
   tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti, tathā śikṣiṣye iti, yathā	taTAgata sTAnam taTA sTAsyAmi iti, taTA Sikzizye iti, yaTA
   tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti, tathā śikṣiṣye iti, yathā	taTAgata sTAnam taTA sTAsyAmi iti, taTA Sikzizye iti, yaTA
   tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra	taTAgata sTAnam taTA sTAsyAmi iti susTitaH asTAna yogena iti evam atra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam / evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo	boDisattvena mahAsattvena sTAtavyam evam Sikzitavyam / evam hi SikzamANaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH viharati anena prajQApAramitA vihAreNa
   avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti //	avirahitaH ca anena manasikAreNa iti //
   atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt   yāni tāni	aTa Kalu tatra parzadi kezAMcid deva putrANAm etat aBUt  yAni tAni
   yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni	yakzANAm yakza BAzitAni yakza rutAni yakza padAni yakza mantritAni
   yakṣapravyāhṛtāni, tāni vijñāyante jalpyamānāni / na punaridaṃ vijñāyate	yakza pravyAhRtAni, tAni vijQAyante jalpyamAnAni / na punar idam vijQAyate
   yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati / atha	yat suBUtiH sTaviraH BAzate pravyAharati deSayati upadiSati / aTa
   khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ	Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH budDa anuBAvena tezAm deva putrANAm imam evaMrUpam
   cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma   na	cetasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya tAn deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  na
   vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ / tathā hi nātra kiṃcitsūcyate,	vijQAyate na vijQAyate idam deva putrAH / taTA hi na atra kiMcid sUcyate,
   nātra kiṃcit śrūyate //	na atra kiMcid SrUyate //
   atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt   uttānīkariṣyati bata	aTa Kalu tezAm deva putrANAm punar eva etat aBUt  uttAnIkarizyati bata
   ayamāryasubhūtiḥ / uttānīkariṣyati batāyamāryasubhūtiriti /	ayam Arya suBUtiH / uttAnIkarizyati bata ayam Arya suBUtiH iti /
   dūrāddūrataramāryasubhūtiḥ praviśati, sūkṣmātsūkṣmataram /	dUrAt dUrataram Arya suBUtiH praviSati, sUkzmAt sUkzmataram /
   gambhīrādgambhīrataramāryasubhūtiḥ praviśati deśayati bhāṣata iti / atha	gamBIrAt gamBIrataram Arya suBUtiH praviSati deSayati BAzate iti / aTa
   khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ	Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH budDa anuBAvena punar api tezAm eva deva putrANAm
   cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate (Vaidya 20)	cetasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya tAn deva putrAn Amantrayate (VEdyaH 20)
   sma   tena hi devaputrāḥ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ	sma  tena hi deva putrAH yaH srotaApatti Palam prAptu kAmaH
   srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmaḥ, sa nemāṃ kṣāntimanāgamya....peyālam / yaḥ	srotaApatti Pale sTAtu kAmaH, sa na imAm kzAntim anAgamya....peyAlam / yaH
   sakṛdāgābhiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ, sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmaḥ, yo	sakRdAga aBiPalam prAptu kAmaH, sakRdAgAmi Pale sTAtu kAmaH, yaH 
   'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāptukāmo 'nāgāmiphale sthātukāmaḥ, yo 'rhattvaṃ prāptukāmo	anAgAmi Palam prAptu kAmaH anAgAmi Pale sTAtu kAmaH, yaH arhat tvam prAptu kAmaH 
   'rhattve sthātukāmaḥ, yaḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptukāmaḥ pratyekabodhau	arhat tve sTAtu kAmaH, yaH pratyeka boDim prAptu kAmaH pratyeka boDO
   sthātukāmaḥ, sa nemāṃ kṣāntimanāgamya..... / yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ	sTAtu kAmaH, sa na imAm kzAntim anAgamya..... / yaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   prāptukāmo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmaḥ, sa nemāṃ	prAptu kAmaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO sTAtu kAmaH, sa na imAm
   kṣāntimanāgamya............. //	kzAntim anAgamya............. //
   atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat   kiṃrūpā asya	aTa Kalu punar api tezAm deva putrANAm etat aBavat  kiMrUpAH asya
   āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ? atha khalvāyuṣmān	Arya suBUteH DArma SravaNikAH ezwavyAH? aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva	suBUtiH budDa anuBAvena tezAm deva putrANAm cetasA eva
   cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma   māyānirmitasadṛśā	cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya tAn deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  mAyA nirmita sadRSA
   hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te	hi deva putrAH mama DArmaSravaNikAH ezwavyAH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi te
   naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti //	na eva Srozyanti na ca sAkzAtkarizyanti //
   atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan   kiṃ punarārya	aTa Kalu te deva putrAH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocan  kim punar Arya
   subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān	suBUte mAyA upamAH te sattvAH na te mAyA? evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH tAn
   devaputrānetadavocat   māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ / svapnopamāste	deva putrAn etat avocat  mAyA upamAH te deva putrAH sattvAH / svapna upamAH te
   devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ / iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,	deva putrAH sattvAH / iti hi mAyA ca sattvAH ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram,
   iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram / sarvadharmā api	iti hi svapnaH ca sattvAH ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / sarva DarmAH api
   devaputrā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ / srotaāpanno 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ /	deva putrAH mAyA upamAH svapna upamAH / srotaApannaH api mAyA upamaH svapna upamaH /
   srotaāpattiphalam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam / evaṃ sakṛdāgāmy api	srotaApatti Palam api mAyA upamam svapna upamam / evam sakRdAgAmi api
   sakṛdāgāmiphalamapi, anāgāmy api anāgāmiphalamapi, arhann api arhattvam	sakRdAgAmi Palam api, anAgAmI api anAgAmi Palam api, arhan api arhat tvam
   api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam / pratyekabuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ /	api mAyA upamam svapna upamam / pratyekabudDaH api mAyA upamaH svapna upamaH /
   pratyekabuddhatvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam / samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi	pratyekabudDa tvam api mAyA upamam svapna upamam / samyaksaMbudDaH api
   māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ / samyaksaṃbuddhatvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /	mAyA upamaH svapna upamaH / samyaksaMbudDa tvam api mAyA upamam svapna upamam /
   atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan   samyaksaṃbuddho	aTa Kalu deva putrAH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocan  samyaksaMbudDaH 
   'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi? samyaksaṃbuddhatv api	api Arya suBUte mAyA upamaH svapna upamaH iti vadasi? samyaksaMbudDatu api
   māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? subhūtirāha   nirvāṇam api devaputrā	mAyA upamam svapna upamam iti vadasi? suBUtiH Aha  nirvANam api deva putrA
   māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam / te devaputrā	mAyA upamam svapna upamam iti vadAmi, kim punar anyam Darmam / te deva putrA
   āhuḥ   nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? āyuṣmān	AhuH  nirvANam api Arya suBUte mAyA upamam svapna upamam iti vadasi? AyuzmAn
   subhūtirāha   tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ	suBUtiH Aha  tat yadi deva putrAH nirvANAt api anyaH kaScid DarmaH viSizwataraH
   syāt, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadeyam / iti hi devaputrā māyā	syAt, tam api aham mAyA upamam svapna upamam iti vadeyam / iti hi deva putrAH mAyA
   ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram / iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca	ca nirvANam ca advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / iti hi svapnaH ca nirvANam ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram //	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputraḥ, āyuṣmāṃś	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH, AyuzmAn ca pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH, AyuzmAn= 
   ca mahākoṣṭhilaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyanaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśapaḥ,	ca mahA kozWilaH, AyuzmAn ca mahAkAtyAyanaH, AyuzmAn ca mahAkASapaH,
   anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ	anye ca mahA SrAvakAH anekEH boDisattva sahasrEH sArDam Ayuzmantam suBUtim
   sthaviramāmantrayante sma   ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ	sTaviram Amantrayante sma  ke asyAH Ayuzman suBUte prajQApAramitAyAH evam
   nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti? atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān	nirdiSyamAnAyAH pratyezakAH Bavizyanti? aTa Kalu AyuzmAn AnandaH tAn
   sthavirānetadavocat   te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā	sTavirAn etat avocat  te Kalu AyuzmantaH veditavyA avinivartanIyA
   bodhisattvā (Vaidya 21) mahāsattvāḥ, dṛṣṭisaṃpannā vā pudgalāḥ, arhanto vā	boDisattvAH (VEdyaH 21) mahAsattvAH, dRzwi saMpannAH vA pudgalAH, arhantaH vA
   kṣīṇāsravāḥ, ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā	kzINa AsravAH, ye asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH evam nirdiSyamAnAyAH pratyezakA
   bhaviṣyanti //	Bavizyanti //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat   nāsyā	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH tAn sTavirAn etat avocat  na asyAH 
   āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā	AyuzmantaH prajQApAramitAyAH evam nirdiSyamAnAyAH kecid pratyezakA
   bhaviṣyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi   atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate, na	Bavizyanti / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi  atra na kaScid DarmaH sUcyate, na
   kaściddharmaḥ paridīpyate, na kaściddharmaḥ prajñapyate / tadyathaivātra	kaScid DarmaH paridIpyate, na kaScid DarmaH prajQapyate / tat yaTA eva atra
   na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate, na kaściddharmaḥ paridīpyate, na kaściddharmaḥ	na kaScid DarmaH sUcyate, na kaScid DarmaH paridIpyate, na kaScid DarmaH
   prajñapyate, tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na	prajQapyate, taTA eva asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH evam nirdiSyamAnAyAH na
   kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati //	kaScid pratyezakaH Bavizyati //
   atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   asya dharmaparyāyasya	aTa Kalu Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  asya Darma paryAyasya
   āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya	AryeNa suBUtinA BAzyamANasya pUjA arTam yat nu aham puzpANi aBinirmAya
   āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti / atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ	Aryam suBUtim aByavakireyam iti / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH tasyAm
   velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat / atha	velAyAm puzpANi aBinirmAya Ayuzmantam suBUtim aByavAkirat / aTa
   khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ	Kalu AyuzmataH suBUteH sTavirasya Sakram
   devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt   na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā	devAnAm indram anuvyAharaNAya etat aBUt  na Kalu punar imAni puzpANi mayA
   trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi, yānīmāni śakreṇa	trAyastriMSezu devezu pracaranti dRzwa pUrvANi, yAni imAni SakreNa
   devānāmindreṇa abhyavakīrṇāni / nirmitānyetāni puṣpāṇi / naitāni puṣpāṇi	devAnAm indreNa aByavakIrNAni / nirmitAni etAni puzpANi / na etAni puzpANi
   vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni, yāni śakreṇa devānāmindreṇābhyavakīrṇāni,	vRkza gulma latA nirjAta ani, yAni SakreNa devAnAm indreNa aByavakIrNAni,
   manomayānyetāni puṣpāṇīti / atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ	manaH mayAni etAni puzpANi iti / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH AyuzmataH
   subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	suBUteH cetasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi manonirjātāni	anirjAtAni etAni Arya suBUte puzpANi / tat kasya hetoH? na hi manaH nirjAtAni
   kānicitpuṣpāṇi, nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni / atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ	kAnicid puzpANi, na api vRkza gulma latA nirjAtAni / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH
   śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi  	Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  yat tvam kOSika evam vadasi  
   anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi, naitāni manonirjātāni, nāpi	anirjAtAni etAni puzpANi, na etAni manaH nirjAtAni, na api
   vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīti / yatkauśika anirjātaṃ na tatpuṣpam / atha khalu	vRkza gulma latA nirjAtAni iti / yat kOSika anirjAtam na tat puzpam / aTa Kalu
   śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /	Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  gamBIra prajQaH bata ayam AryaH suBUtiH /
   tāṃ ca nāma padaprajñaptiṃ nirdiśati, tāṃ ca na virodhayati, tāṃ	tAm ca nAma pada prajQaptim nirdiSati, tAm ca na viroDayati, tAm
   cottānīkaroti, tāmeva copadiśati / atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ	ca uttAnIkaroti, tAm eva ca upadiSati / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmatam
   subhūtimetadavocat   evametadārya subhūte, evam etat / evaṃ cātra	suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat Arya suBUte, evam etat / evam ca atra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /	boDisattvena mahAsattvena Sikzitavyam yaTA Arya suBUtiH upadiSati /
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat  	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  
   evametatkauśika, evam etat / evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	evam etat kOSika, evam etat / evam atra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   śikṣitavyam / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na	Sikzitavyam / evam SikzamANaH kOSika boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na
   srotaāpattiphale śikṣate, na sakṛdāgāmiphale, na anāgāmiphale, nāhartve	srotaApatti Pale Sikzate, na sakRdAgAmi Pale, na anAgAmi Pale, na AhaRtve
   śikṣate, na pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate, na buddhatve śikṣate / yo nāsu	Sikzate, na pratyekabudDa tve Sikzate, na budDa tve Sikzate / yaH na asu
   bhūmiṣu śikṣate, sa buddhatve sarvajñatve vā śikṣate / yo buddhatve	BUmizu Sikzate, sa budDa tve sarvajQa tve vA Sikzate / yaH budDa tve
   sarvajñatve vā śikṣate, so 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate /	sarvajQa tve vA Sikzate, saH aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu budDa Darmezu Sikzate /
   yo 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate, sa na rūpasya vivṛddhaye	yaH aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu budDa Darmezu Sikzate, sa na rUpasya vivRdDaye
   śikṣate, na parihāṇāya / evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /	Sikzate, na parihANAya / evam sa na vedanAyAH na saMjQAyAH na saMskArANAm /
   sa na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate, na parihāṇāya / yo na rūpasya	sa na vijQAnasya vivRdDaye Sikzate, na parihANAya / yaH na rUpasya
   vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya / evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na	vivRdDaye Sikzate na parihANAya / evam na vedanAyAH na saMjQAyAH na
   saṃskārāṇām / yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya, sa na	saMskArANAm / yaH na vijQAnasya vivRdDaye Sikzate na parihANa aya, sa na
   rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya / (Vaidya 22) evaṃ sa na vedanāyā	rUpasya parigrahAya Sikzate na utsargAya / (VEdyaH 22) evam sa na vedanAyAH 
   na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām / sa na vijñānasya parigrahāya śikṣate,	na saMjQAyAH na saMskArANAm / sa na vijQAnasya parigrahAya Sikzate,
   notsargāya, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya	na utsargAya, na api kasyacid Darmasya parigrahAya Sikzate, na utpAdAya
   nāntardhānāya śikṣate / yo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,	na antarDAnAya Sikzate / yaH na kasyacid Darmasya parigrahAya Sikzate,
   notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate, sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya	na utpAdAya na antarDAnAya Sikzate, sa na sarvajQa tAyAH api parigrahAya
   śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate / evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo	Sikzate, na utpAdAya na antarDAnAya Sikzate / evam SikzamANaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //	mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate, sarvajQa tAyAm niryAsyati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   ya āyuṣman	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yaH Ayuzman
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na kasyacid Darmasya parigrahAya Sikzate,
   notpādāya nāntardhānāsya śikṣate, sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya	na utpAdAya na antarDAna asya Sikzate, sa na sarvajQa tAyAH api parigrahAya
   śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate / evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte	Sikzate, na utpAdAya na antarDAnAya Sikzate / evam SikzamANaH AyuzmAn suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate, sarvajQa tAyAm niryAsyati //
   āyuṣmān subhūtirāha   evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat / ya āyuṣman	AyuzmAn suBUtiH Aha  evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra, evam etat / yaH Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na kasyacid Darmasya parigrahAya Sikzate,
   notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate, sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya	na utpAdAya na antarDAnAya Sikzate, sa na sarvajQa tAyAH api parigrahAya
   śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate / sarvabuddhadharmāṇām api na	Sikzate, na utpAdAya na antarDAnAya Sikzate / sarva budDa DarmANAm api na
   parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate / evaṃ cāyuṣman	parigrahAya Sikzate, na utpAdAya na antarDAnAya Sikzate / evam ca Ayuzman
   śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,	SAriputra SikzamANaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate,
   sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //	sarvajQa tAyAm niryAsyati //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto	prajQApAramitA Arya SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena kuto
   gaveṣitavyāḥ? śāriputra āha   prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena	gavezitavyAH? SAriputraH Aha  prajQApAramitA kOSika boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā / evamukte śakro	mahAsattvena AyuzmataH suBUteH parivartAt gavezitavyA / evam ukte SakraH 
   devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra	devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  kasya ezaH Arya SAriputra
   anubhāvo veditavyaḥ? kasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ	anuBAvaH veditavyaH? kasya etat aDizWAnam veditavyam yat A Arya suBUtiH
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha   tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika	prajQApAramitAm BAzate? AyuzmAn SAriputraH Aha  taTAgatasya eza kOSika
   anubhāvo veditavyaḥ / tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān	anuBAvaH veditavyaH / taTAgatasya etat aDizWAnam veditavyam yat AyuzmAn
   subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate / atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ	suBUtiH prajQApAramitAm BAzate / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Sakram
   devānāmindrametadavocat   yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi   kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvo	devAnAm indram etat avocat  yat kOSika evam vadasi  kasya ezaH anuBAvaH 
   veditavyaḥ, kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ	veditavyaH, kasya etat anuzWAnam veditavyam yat A Arya suBUtiH prajQApAramitAm
   bhāṣate iti? tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /	BAzate iti? taTAgatasya eza kOSika anuBAvaH veditavyaH /
   tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe / yad	taTAgatasya etat aDizWAnam veditavyam yat aham prajQApAramitAm BAze / yat 
   api kauśika evaṃ vadasi   prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto	api kOSika evam vadasi  prajQApAramitA boDisattvena mahAsattvena kuto
   gaveṣitavyeti? prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na	gavezita vyA iti? prajQApAramitA kOSika boDisattvena mahAsattvena na
   rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā / evaṃ na vedanāyā na	rUpAt gavezitavyA na api anyatra rUpAt gavezitavyA / evam na vedanAyAH na
   saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ, nāpyanyatra	saMjQAyAH na saMskAreByaH na vijQAnAt gavezitavyAH, na api anyatra
   vijñānādgaveṣitavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā,	vijQAnAt gavezitavyAH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi na rUpam prajQApAramitA,
   nāpyanyatra rūpātprajñāpāramitā / evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /	na api anyatra rUpAt prajQApAramitA / evam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH /
   na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā, nāpyanyatra vijñānātprajñāpāramitā //	na vijQAnam prajQApAramitA, na api anyatra vijQAnAt prajQApAramitA //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	mahApAramitA iyam Arya suBUte yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   apramāṇapāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	apramANa pAramitA iyam Arya suBUte yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   aparimāṇapāramiteyamārya (Vaidya 23) subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	aparimANa pAramitA iyam Arya (VEdyaH 23) suBUte yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   anantapāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā / sthaviraḥ	ananta pAramitA iyam Arya suBUte yat uta prajQApAramitA / sTaviraH
   subhūtirāha   evametatkauśika, evam etat / mahāpāramiteyaṃ kauśika yaduta	suBUtiH Aha  evam etat kOSika, evam etat / mahA pAramitA iyam kOSika yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā / apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	prajQApAramitA / apramANa pAramitA iyam kOSika yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā / anantapāramiteyaṃ	aparimANa pAramitA iyam kOSika yat uta prajQApAramitA / ananta pAramitA iyam
   kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā / tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpamahattayā hi kauśika	kOSika yat uta prajQApAramitA / tat kasya hetoH? rUpa mahat tayA hi kOSika
   mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /	mahA pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH /
   vijñānamahattayā hi kauśikamahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	vijQAna mahat tayA hi kOSika mahA pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   rūpāpramāṇatayā kauśika apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / evaṃ	rUpa apramANa tayA kOSika apramANa pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / evam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānāpramāṇatayā kauśika apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAna apramANa tayA kOSika apramANa pAramitA iyam
   yaduta prajñapāramitā / rūpāparimāṇatayā kauśika aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ	yat uta prajQapAramitA / rUpa aparimANa tayA kOSika aparimANa pAramitA iyam
   yaduta prajñāpāramitā / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānāparimāṇatayā	yat uta prajQApAramitA / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAna aparimANa tayA
   kauśika aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñapāramitā / rūpānantatayā kauśika	kOSika aparimANa pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQapAramitA / rUpa ananta tayA kOSika
   anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /	ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH /
   vijñānānantatayā kauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / evaṃ	vijQAna ananta tayA kOSika ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / evam
   mahāpāramiteti kauśika nābhiniviśate / evamapramāṇapāramiteti,	mahApAramitA iti kOSika na aBiniviSate / evam apramANa pAramitA iti,
   evamaparimāṇapāramiteti, evamanantapāramiteti nābhiniviśate /	evam aparimANa pAramitA iti, evam ananta pAramitA iti na aBiniviSate /
   tasmātkauśika mahāpāramiteyam, apramāṇapāramiteyam, aparimāṇapāramiteyam,	tasmAt kOSika mahA pAramitA iyam, apramANa pAramitA iyam, aparimANa pAramitA iyam,
   anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //	ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA //
   ārambaṇānantatayā kauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	ArambaNa ananta tayA kOSika ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   sattvānantatayā kauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / kathaṃ	sattva ananta tayA kOSika ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / kaTam
   punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?	punar kOSika ArambaNa ananta tayA ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA?
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na	sarva DarmANAm hi kOSika yatas na antaH na maDyam na
   paryavasānamupalabhyate, tataḥ kauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta	paryavasAnam upalaByate, tatas kOSika ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā / anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā	prajQApAramitA / anena kOSika paryAyeNa ArambaNa ananta tayA
   anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / punaraparaṃ kauśika	ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / punar aparam kOSika
   yasmātsarvadharmā anantā aparyantāḥ, na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā	yasmAt sarva DarmAH anantAH aparyantAH, na tezAm antaH vA maDyam vA
   paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate, tasmātkauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta	paryavasAnam vA upalaByate, tasmAt kOSika ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā / tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na	prajQApAramitA / tat kasya hetoH? rUpasya hi kOSika na antaH na maDyam na
   paryavasānamupalabhyate / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /	paryavasAnam upalaByate / evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm /
   vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /	vijQAnasya hi kOSika na antaH na maDyam na paryavasAnam upalaByate /
   anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta	anena api kOSika paryAyeNa ArambaNa ananta tayA ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā //	prajQApAramitA //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika sattvo 'nanto 'paryantaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi	punar aparam kOSika sattvaH anantaH aparyantaH / tat kasya hetoH? na hi
   sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate / tasmātkauśika	sattvasya antaH vA maDyam vA paryavasAnam vA upalaByate / tasmAt kOSika
   sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / atha khalu śakro	sattva ananta tayA ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA / aTa Kalu SakraH 
   devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kathamāyuṣman subhūte	devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kaTam Ayuzman suBUte
   sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ	sattva ananta tayA ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA? sTaviraH
   subhūtirāha   na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā	suBUtiH Aha  na hi kOSika gaNanA yogena vA gaNanA bahutvena vA
   sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //	sattva ananta tayA ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA //
   śakra āha   kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā	SakraH Aha  kaTam tarhi idAnIm Arya suBUte sattva ananta tayA
   anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta (Vaidya 24) prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha	ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta (VEdyaH 24) prajQApAramitA? sTaviraH suBUtiH Aha
     tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ	 tat kam manyase kOSika katamasya etat Darmasya aDivacanam yat uta sattvaH
   sattva iti? śakra āha   naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na	sattvaH iti? SakraH Aha  na etat Arya suBUte Darmasya aDivacanam na
   adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti / āgantukametannāmadheyaṃ	aDarma aDivacanam yat uta sattvaH sattvaH iti / Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam
   prakṣiptam / avastukametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptam / anātmīyametannāmadheyaṃ	prakziptam / avastukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam / anAtmIyam etat nAmaDeyam
   prakṣiptam / anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva	prakziptam / anArambaNam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat uta sattvaH sattva
   iti / sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha   tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra	iti / sTaviraH suBUtiH Aha  tat kim manyase kOSika kAcid atra
   sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā? śakra āha   no hīdamārya subhūte / subhūtirāha  	sattva paridIpanA kRtA? SakraH Aha  no hi idam Arya suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  
   yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā, tatra kā sattvānantatā?	yatra kOSika na kAcid sattva paridIpanA kRtA, tatra kA sattva ananta tA?
   sacetkauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa	saced kOSika taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH ananta vijQapti GozeNa
   gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ	gamBIra nirGozeNa svareNa gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn api vitizWamAnaH
   sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta, api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va	sattvaH sattvaH iti vAcam BAzeta, api nu tatra kaScid sattvaH utpannaH va
   utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā, niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā? śakra	utpatsyate vA utpadyate vA, nirudDaH vA nirotsyate vA niruDyate vA? Sakra
   āha   no hīdamārya subhūte / tatkasya hetoḥ?	Aha  naH hi idam Arya suBUte / tat kasya hetoH?
   ādiśuddhatvādādipariśuddhatvātsattvasya / subhūtirāha   anenāpi kauśika	Adi SudDa tvAt Adi pariSudDa tvAt sattvasya / suBUtiH Aha  anena api kOSika
   paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	paryAyeNa evam sattva ananta tayA ananta pAramitA iyam yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā //	evam ca punar kOSika sattva ananta tayA prajQApAramitA ananta tA veditavyA //
   atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ	aTa Kalu sa indrakAH devAH sa brahmakAH sa prajApatikAH
   sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma   aho dharmaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho	sa Rzi nara nArI gaNAH tris udAnam udAnayanti sma  aho DarmaH, aho DarmaH, aho
   dharmasya dharmatā / yastathāgatasya prādurbhāvaḥ, sa āryeṇa subhūtinā	Darmasya DarmatA / yaH taTAgatasya prAdurBAvaH, saH AryeNa suBUtinA
   sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /	sTavireNa su BAzitena iha sUcyate deSyate prakASyate praBAvyate /
   tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa	taTAgatam tam vayam Bagavan boDisattvam mahAsattvam adya agreNa
   dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati, yo 'pi ca	DArayizyAmaH yaH anayA prajQApAramitayA avirahitaH Bavizyati, yaH api ca
   anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati //	anena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA vihAreNa viharizyati //
   atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān	aTa Kalu BagavAn= tAn sa indrakAn sa brahmakAn sa prajApatikAn
   sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma   evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /	sa Rzi nara nArI gaNAn Amantrayate sma  evam etat deva putrAH, evam etat /
   yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike	yadA aham deva putrAH dIpaMkarasya taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya antike
   dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā	dIpavatyAm rAjaDAnyAm antarAyaNa maDya gataH anayA prajQApAramitayA
   avirahito 'bhūvam, tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena	avirahitaH aBUvam, tadA aham dIpaMkareNa taTAgatena arhatAm samyaksaMbudDena
   vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau   bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate	vyAkRtaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO  Bavizyasi tvam mANava anAgate
   'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan	aDvani asaMKyeyEH kalpEH SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ	samyaksaMbudDaH vidyA caraNa saMpannaH sugataH loka vid anuttaraH
   puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /	puruza damya sAraTiH SAstA devAnAm ca manuzyAnAm ca budDaH BagavAn iti /
   atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan   āścaryaṃ bhagavan,	aTa Kalu te deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  AScaryam Bagavan ,
   paramāścaryaṃ sugata / yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ	parama AScaryam sugataH / yAvat iyam prajQApAramitA boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti //	mahAsattvAnAm sarvajQa tAyAH AhArikA anuparigrAhikA ca iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakraparivarto nāma dvitīyaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm SakraparivartaH nAma dvitIyaH //
   (Vaidya 25)	(VEdyaH 25)
   ASP_3: aprameyaguṇadhāraṇapāramitāstūpasatkāraparivartastṛtīyaḥ /	ASP_3: aprameya guNa DAraNa pAramitA stu upasatkAra parivartaH tRtIyaH /
   atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ	aTa Kalu BagavAn ye tatra deva putrAH parzadi saMnipatitAH
   saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan, yāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ	saMnizaNNAH ca aBUvan, yAH ca Bikzu BikzuNI upAsa kopAsikAH saMnipatitAH
   saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan, tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,	saMnizaNNAH ca aBUvan, tAn deva putrAn saMnipatitAn saMnizaNNAn ca viditvA,
   tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,	tAH ca sarvAH catasraH parzadaH saMnipatitAH saMnizaNNAH ca viditvA,
   kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān	kAma avacarAn rUpAvacarAn ca deva putrAn brahmakAyikAn ca deva putrAn
   ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ	ABAsvarAn ca parIttaSuBAn ca akanizWAn ca deva putrAn sAkziNaH
   sthāpayitvā, śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān	sTApayitvA, Sakradeva indra pramuKAn kAma avacarAn deva putrAn
   mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca	mahA brahma pramuKAn ca brahmakAyikAn deva putrAn ABAsvarAn ca
   devaputrānāmantrayate sma   yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  yaH hi kaScid deva putrAH kula putraH vA kula duhitA
   vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati	vA imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati
   pravartayiṣyati, na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo	pravartayizyati, na tasya mAraH vA mAra kAyikA vA devatAH avatAra prekziNyaH 
   'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante / nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā	avatAra gaveziNyaH avatAram lapsyante / na api tasya kula putrasya vA
   kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo	kula duhituH vA manuzyAH vA amanuzyAH vA avatAra prekziNaH avatAra gaveziNaH 
   'vatāraṃ lapsyante / nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa	avatAram lapsyante / na api sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA vizama aparihAreNa
   kālaṃ kariṣyati //	kAlam karizyati //
   punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	punar aparam deva putrAH ye deva putrAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   saṃprasthitāḥ, yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā	saMprasTitAH, yEH ca deva putrEH iyam prajQApAramitA na udgRhItA na DAritA
   na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā, te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā	na vAcitA na paryavAptA na pravartitA, te deva putrAH tam kula putra vA
   kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante, tasya ca kulaputrasya vā	kula duhitaram vA upasaMkramitavyam maMsyante, tasya ca kula putrasya vA
   kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ	kula duhituH vA imAm prajQApAramitAm udgRhNataH DArayataH vAcayataH
   paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti, śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti	paryavApnuvataH pravartayamAnasya antikAt Srozyanti, SrutvA ca udgrahIzyanti
   dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti / na ca khalu	DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti / na ca Kalu
   punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ	punar deva putrAH tasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ	prajQApAramitAm udgRhNataH DArayataH vAcayataH paryavApnuvataH
   pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya vā śūnyāgāragatasya vā	pravartayamAnasya araNya gatasya vA vRkza mUla gatasya vA SUnya AgAra gatasya vA
   abhyavakāśagatasya vā pathi gatasya vā utpathagatasya vā aṭavīgatasya vā	aByavakASa gatasya vA paTi gatasya vA utpaTa gatasya vA awavI gatasya vA
   mahāsamudragatasya vā tatra tatropasaṃkrāmato vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā	mahA samudra gatasya vA tatra tatra upasaMkrAmataH vA caMkramyamANasya vA
   sthitasya vā niṣaṇṇasya vā vipannasya vā bhayaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,	sTitasya vA nizaNNasya vA vipannasya vA Bayam vA Bavizyati,
   stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati, utpatsyate vā //	stamBita tvam vA Bavizyati, utpatsyate vA //
   atha khalu catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantametadavocan   āścaryaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu catvAraH mahA rAjAnaH Bagavantam etat avocan  AScaryam Bagavan
   yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan	yat imAm prajQApAramitAm udgRhNan DArayan vAcayan paryavApnuvan pravartayan
   sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yānatraye sattvān vinayati, na ca	sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA yAna traye sattvAn vinayati, na ca
   sattvasaṃjñāmutpādayati / vayaṃ bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā	sattva saMjQAm utpAdayati / vayam Bagavan= tasya kula putrasya vA
   kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ, ya imāṃ	kula duhituH vA rakzA AvaraNa guptim saMviDAsyAmaH, yaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati
   pravartayiṣyati //	pravartayizyati //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   aham api	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  aham api
   bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ	Bagavan= tasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA rakzA AvaraNa guptim
   saṃvidhāsyāmi, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati	saMviDAsyAmi, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati
   vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //	vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati //
   brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikairdevaputrairbhagavantametadavocat	brahmA api sahApatiH sArDam brahmakAyikEH deva putrEH Bagavantam etat avocat 
     aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ	 aham api Bagavan= tasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA rakzA AvaraNa guptim
   saṃvidhāsyāmi, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati	saMviDAsyAmi, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati
   vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //	vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati //
   (Vaidya 26) atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   āścaryaṃ	(VEdyaH 26) aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  AScaryam
   bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan	Bagavan yat imAm prajQApAramitAm udgRhNan DArayan vAcayan paryavApnuvan
   pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān yato dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān	pravartayan sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAn yatas dRzwa DArmikAn guNAn
   pratilabhate parigṛhṇāti, kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ	pratilaBate parigRhNAti, kim punar Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm udgRhItAyAm
   sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ	sarvAH zaw pAramitA udgRhItA Bavanti? evam ukte BagavAn Sakram
   devānāmindrametadavocat   evametatkauśika, evam etat / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	devAnAm indram etat avocat  evam etat kOSika, evam etat / prajQApAramitAyAm
   kauśika udgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti / punaraparaṃ	kOSikaH udgRhItAyAm sarvAH zaw pAramitAH udgRhItAH Bavanti / punar aparam
   kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dhāritāyāṃ vācitāyāṃ paryavāptāyāṃ	kOSika prajQApAramitAyAm udgRhItAyAm DAritAyAm vAcitAyAm paryavAptAyAm
   pravartitāyāṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān	pravartitAyAm sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA dRzwa DArmikAn guNAn
   parigṛhṇāti / tān kauśik sarvān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,	parigRhNAti / tAn kOSiS sarvAn SRNu, sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru,
   bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti śakro devānāmindro bhagavataḥ	BAzizye aham te / sADu Bagavan= iti SakraH devAnAm indraH BagavataH
   pratyaśrauṣīt / bhagavānetadavocat   tatra kauśika ye mama dharmaṃ	pratyaSrOzIt / BagavAn etat avocat  tatra kOSika ye mama Darmam
   vigrahītavyaṃ maṃsyante, vivaditavyaṃ maṃsyante, virodhayitavyaṃ	vigrahItavyam maMsyante, vivaditavyam maMsyante, viroDayitavyam
   maṃsyante, teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ	maMsyante, tezAm vigrahItu kAmAnAm vivaditu kAmAnAm
   virodhayitukāmānāmutpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ,	viroDayitu kAmAnAm utpanna utpannAH vigrahAH vivAdAH viroDAH,
   punarevāntardhāsyanti, na sthāsyanti / teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ	punar eva antar DAsyanti, na sTAsyanti / tezAm vigrahItu kAmAnAm
   vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /	vivaditu kAmAnAm viroDayitu kAmAnAm na te aBiprAyAH paripUrim gamizyanti /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati   ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	tat kasya hetoH? evam hi etat kOSika Bavati  yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati
   paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati	paryavApsyati pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati
   svādhyāsyati, tasyaivaṃ tānyutpannotpannānyadhikaraṇāni	svADyAsyati, tasya evam tAni utpanna utpannAni aDikaraNAni
   punarevāntardhāsyanti, na sthāsyanti / teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ	punar eva antar DAsyanti, na sTAsyanti / tezAm vigrahItu kAmAnAm
   vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /	vivaditu kAmAnAm viroDayitu kAmAnAm na te aBiprAyAH paripUrim gamizyanti /
   imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ	imam api sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA dRzwa DArmikam guNam
   parigṛhṇāti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati	parigRhNAti, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm udgRhNAti DArayati vAcayati
   paryavāpnoti pravartayati deśayati upadiśati uddiśati svādhyāyati /	paryavApnoti pravartayati deSayati upadiSati uddiSati su ADyAyati /
   tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghī nāmauṣadhī sarvaviṣapraśamanī / tatra	tat yaTA api nAma kOSika maGI nAma ozaDI sarva viza praSamanI / tatra
   āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitena āhārārthinā āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścideva	ASIvizeNa jantunA buBukzitena AhAra arTinA AhAra gaveziNA kaScid eva
   prāṇakajāto janturdṛṣṭo bhavet / sa āśīviṣastaṃ prāṇakajātaṃ	prANaka jAtaH jantuH dRzwaH Bavet / saH ASIvizaH tam prANaka jAtam
   gandhenānubadhnīyādanugacchedāhārahetorbhakṣayitukāmaḥ / atha sa	ganDena anubaDnIyAt anugacCet AhAra hetoH Bakzayitu kAmaH / aTa sa
   prāṇakajāto yena sā madhī nāmauṣadhī tenopasaṃkramet, tenopasaṃkramya	prANaka jAtaH yena sA maDI nAma ozaDI tena upasaMkramet, tena upasaMkramya
   tiṣṭhet / atha sa āśīviṣastasyā oṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvarteta /	tizWet / aTa saH ASIvizaH tasyAH ozaDyAH ganDena eva pratyudAvarteta /

   vivardhiketi / catvāraś ca tasya mahārājānaḥ (Vaidya 27) śakraś ca	vivarDikA iti / catvAraH ca tasya mahA rAjAnaH (VEdyaH 27) SakraH ca
   devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ sarve ca buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś	devAnAm indraH brahmA ca sahApatiH sarve ca budDAH BagavantaH boDisattvAS

   dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati	DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati deSayizyati
   upadekṣyatiḥ uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati / ayaṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā	upadekzyatiH uddekzyati su ADyAsyati / ayam tena kula putreNa vA kula duhitA

   manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā viheṭhayituṃ vā vyāpādayituṃ vā āveśayituṃ vā	manuzyEH vA amanuzyEH vA viheWayitum vA vyApAdayitum vA AveSayitum vA

   sthāpayet, enāṃ ca divyābhiḥ	sTApayet, enAm ca divyABiH

   samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt	samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH satkuryAt gurukuryAt 
   mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet, yaś ca (Vaidya 29) tathāgatasyārhataḥ	mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet, yaH ca (VEdyaH 29) taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet	samyaksaMbudDasya parinirvRtasya SarIrANi stu upezu pratizWApayet

   devānāmindrametadavocat   tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /	devAnAm indram etat avocat  tena hi kOSika tvAm eva atra pratiprakzyAmi /
   yathā te kṣamate, tathā vyākuryāḥ / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yo 'yaṃ	yaTA te kzamate, taTA vyAkuryAH / tat kim manyase kOSika yaH ayam
   tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatātmabhāvo 'bhinirvartitaḥ,	taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya sarvajQa tA Atma BAvaH aBinirvartitaH,
   sa katamasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	sa katamasyAm pratipadi SikzamANena taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvajñatā pratilabdhā abhisaṃbuddhā? evamukte	anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH sarvajQa tA pratilabDAH aBisaMbudDA? evam ukte
   śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   ihaiva bhagavan bhagavatā	SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  iha eva Bagavan BagavatA
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzamANena taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvajñatā pratilabdhā abhisaṃbuddhā / bhagavānāha  	samyaksaMboDiH sarvajQa tA pratilabDAH aBisaMbudDAH / BagavAn Aha  
   tasmāttarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatastathāgata	tasmAt tarhi kOSika na anena Atma BAva SarIra pratilamBena taTAgataH taTAgata
   iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati / sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ	iti saMKyAm gacCati / sarvajQa tAyAm tu pratilabDAyAm
   tathāgatastathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati / yeyaṃ kauśika sarvajñatā	taTAgataH taTAgataH iti saMKyAm gacCati / yA iyam kOSika sarvajQa tA
   tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya, prajñāpāramitānirjātaiṣā / eṣa ca	taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya, prajQApAramitA nirjAtA ezA / eza ca
   kauśika tathāgatasyātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhaḥ	kOSika taTAgatasya Atma BAva SarIra pratilamBaH
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyanirjātaḥ san sarvajñajñānāśrayabhūto bhavati /	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya nirjAtaH san sarvajQa jQAna ASraya BUtaH Bavati /
   enaṃ hyāśrayaṃ niśritya sarvajñajñānasya prabhāvanā bhavati,	enam hi ASrayam niSritya sarvajQa jQAnasya praBAvanA Bavati,
   buddhaśarīraprabhāvanā bhavati, dharmaśarīraprabhāvanā bhavati,	budDa SarIra praBAvanA Bavati, Darma SarIra praBAvanA Bavati,
   saṃghaśarīraprabhāvanā bhavati / ityevaṃ sarvajñajñānahetuko	saMGa SarIra praBAvanA Bavati / iti evam sarvajQa jQAna hetu ko
   'yamātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhaḥ sarvajñajñānāśrayabhūtatvātsarvasattvānāṃ	ayam Atma BAva SarIra pratilamBaH sarvajQa jQAna ASraya BUta tvAt sarva sattvAnAm
   caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo	cEtya BUtaH vandanIyaH satkaraNIyaH gurukaraNIyaH mAnanIyaH pUjanIyaH 
   'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati / evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi	arcanIyaH apacAyanIyaH saMvRttaH Bavati / evam ca mama parinirvRtasya api
   sataḥ eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati / tasmāttarhi kauśika yaḥ	sataH ezAm SarIrANAm pUjA Bavizyati / tasmAt tarhi kOSika yaH
   kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā	kaScid kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA
   pustakagatāṃ vā kṛtvā sthāpayet, enāṃ ca divyābhiḥ	pustaka gatAm vA kRtvA sTApayet, enAm ca divyABiH
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkABiH
   satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet, ayameva kauśika	satkuryAt gurukuryAt mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet, ayam eva kOSika
   tayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya	tayoH kula putrayoH kula duhitroH vA bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā pūjā	hetoH? sarvajQa jQAnasya hi kOSika tena kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA pUjA
   kṛtā bhaviṣyati, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	kRtA Bavizyati, yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA iha prajQApAramitAyAm
   likhyamānāyāṃ pustakagatāyāṃ vā satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ	liKyamAnAyAm pustaka gatAyAm vA satkAram gurukAram mAnanAm
   pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ pūjāṃ ca vividhāṃ kuryāt, ayameva tato bahutaraṃ	pUjanAm arcanAm apacAyanAm pUjAm ca viviDAm kuryAt, ayam eva tatas bahutaram
   puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena pūjā	puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? sarvajQa jQAnasya hi kOSika tena pUjA
   kṛtā bhaviṣyati, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai pūjāṃ kariṣyati //	kRtA Bavizyati, yaH prajQApAramitAyE pUjAm karizyati //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   ya ime bhagavan	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  ye ime Bagavan
   jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti, nodgrahīṣyanti	jAmbUdvIpakAH manuzyAH imAm prajQApAramitAm na liKizyanti, na udgrahIzyanti
   na dhārayiṣyanti, na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na	na DArayizyanti, na vAcayizyanti na paryavApsyanti na pravartayizyanti na
   deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti, tāṃ caināṃ	deSayizyanti na upadekzyanti na uddekzyanti na su ADyAsyanti, tAm ca enAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ	prajQApAramitAm
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ,	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkABiH,
   samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhirna satkariṣyanti, na	samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH na satkarizyanti, na
   gurukariṣyanti, na (Vaidya 30) mānayiṣyanti, na pūjayiṣyanti,	gurukarizyanti, na (VEdyaH 30) mAnayizyanti, na pUjayizyanti,
   nārcayiṣyanti, nāpacāyiṣyanti, kiṃ nu te bhagavan na jñāsyanti evaṃ	na arcayizyanti, na apacAyizyanti, kim nu te Bagavat na jQAsyanti evam
   mahārthikā bhagavatoktā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti? kiṃ nu	mahArTikA BagavatA uktA prajQApAramitAyAH pUjA kRtA Bavizyati iti? kim nu
   te bhagavan na vetsyanti   evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā evaṃ mahāphalā evaṃ mahāvipākā	te Bagavat na vetsyanti  evam mahA anuSaMsA evam mahA PalA evam mahA vipAkA

   vedayiṣyanti, uta jñāsyanti vetsyanti, vedayiṣyanti, na ca punaḥ	vedayizyanti, uta jQAsyanti vetsyanti, vedayizyanti, na ca punar 
   śraddhāsyanti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   tatkiṃ	SradDAsyanti? evam ukte BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  tat kim
   manyase kauśika kiyantaste jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā te buddhe 'vetya prasādena	manyase kOSika kiyantaH te jAmbUdvIpakAH manuzyA te budDe avetya prasAdena
   samanvāgatāḥ, ye dharme 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ, ye saṃghe 'vetya	samanvAgatAH, ye Darme avetya prasAdena samanvAgatAH, ye saMGe avetya

     alpakāste bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetya prasādena	 alpakAH te Bagavan jAmbUdvIpakAH manuzyAH ye budDe avetya prasAdena
   samanvāgatāḥ, ye dharme 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ, ye saṃghe 'vetya	samanvAgatAH, ye Darme avetya prasAdena samanvAgatAH, ye saMGe avetya

   'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ, ye dharme 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ, ye	avetya prasAdena samanvAgatAH, ye Darme avetya prasAdena samanvAgatAH, ye
   saṃghe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ / tebhyaḥ kauśika alpebhyo	saMGe avetya prasAdena samanvAgatAH / teByaH kOSika alpeByaH 
   'lpatarakāste, ye srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuvanti, tataḥ	alpatarakAH te, ye srotaApatti Palam prApnuvanti, tatas 
   sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalam / tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāsteye	sakRdAgAmi Palam anAgAmi Palam / teByaH api alpeByaH alpataraka Asteye
   'rhattva prāpnuvanti / tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye pratyekabodhiṃ	arhat tva prApnuvanti / teByaH api alpeByaH alpatarakAH te ye pratyeka boDim

   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya taṃ cittotpādaṃ bṛṃhayanti /	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittAni utpAdya tam citta utpAdam bRMhayanti /

   'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā anuttarāṃ	alpatarakAH te ye prajQApAramitAyAm carantaH GawamAnA anuttarAm

   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante / te te kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante / te te kOSika boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye

   sattvānāṃ bodhāya caratām api yadyeko vā dvau vā avinivartanīyāyāṃ (Vaidya	sattvAnAm boDAya caratAm api yadi ekaH vA dvO vE avinivartanIyAyAm (VEdya
   31) bodhisattvabhūmāvavatiṣṭheyātām / tatkasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi	31) boDisattva BUmO= avatizWeyAtAm / tat kasya hetoH? duraBi saMBavAH hi
   kauśika anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirhīnavīryaiḥ	kOSika anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH hIna vIryEH
   kusīdairhīnasattvairhīnacittairhīnasaṃjñairhīnādhimuktikairhīnaprajñaiḥ /	kusIdEH hIna sattvEH hIna cittEH hIna saMjQEH hIna aDimuktikEH hIna prajQEH /
   tasmāttarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ	tasmAt tarhi kOSika kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA kzipram ca anuttarAm

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH pUrvam

   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha   ataḥ sa	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  atas sa

   prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya	prajQApAramitAm aBiSraddaDat avakalpayan= aDimucya prasanna cittaH boDAya

   śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayetparyavāpnuyātpravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśet	SRNuyAt udgRhNIyAt DArayet vAcayet paryavApnuyAt pravartayet deSayet upadiSet uddiSet
   svādhyāyet, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet, arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt,	svADyAyet, pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayet, arTam asyAH vivRNuyAt ,
   manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,	manasA anvavekzeta, yaTA aDikayA ca prajQayA atra parimImAMsAm Apadyeta,
   antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayet sthāpayet saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ	antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA DArayet sTApayet sadDarma cira sTiti hetoH
     mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ	 mA budDa netrI samucCedaH BUt, mA sadDarma antarDAnam / boDisattvAnAm

   tvaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareḥ, svādhyāyeḥ, evaṃ	tvam kOSika imAm prajQApAramitAm samanvAhareH, svADyAyeH, evam

   yaduta prajñāpāramitā / apramāṇeyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	yat uta prajQApAramitA / apramANA iyam Bagavan vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   aparimāṇeyaṃ bhagavan (Vaidya 37) vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	aparimANA iyam Bagavan (VEdyaH 37) vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   niruttareyaṃ bhagavān vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā / anuttareyaṃ bhagavan	niruttarA iyam BagavAn vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA / anuttarA iyam Bagavan
   vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā / asameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta	vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA / asameyam Bagavan vidyA yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā / asamasameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	prajQApAramitA / asamasamA iyam Bagavan vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   evametatkauśika, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  evam etat kOSika, evam
   etat / mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā / apramāṇeyaṃ kauśika	etat / mahAvidyA iyam kOSika yat uta prajQApAramitA / apramANA iyam kOSika
   vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā / aparimāṇeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta	vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA / aparimANA iyam kOSika vidyA yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā / niruttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	prajQApAramitA / niruttarA iyam kOSika vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA /

   yaduta prajñāpāramitā / asamasameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /	yat uta prajQApAramitA / asamasamA iyam kOSika vidyA yat uta prajQApAramitA /
   tatkasya hetoḥ?imāṃ hi kauśika vidyāmāgamya paurvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ	tat kasya hetoH?imAm hi kOSika vidyAm Agamya pOrvakAH taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, yaduta	samyaksaMbudDAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH, yat uta
   prajñāpāramitām / ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā	prajQApAramitAm / ye api te kOSika Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani taTAgatA
   arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante, te	arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH, anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante, te
   'pi kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ	api kOSikaH imAm eva vidyAm Agamya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante yaduta prajñāpāramitā / ye 'pi	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante yat uta prajQApAramitA / ye api
   kecitkauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu	kecid kOSika etarhi aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu
   lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante,	lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante,
   te 'pi kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ	te api kOSikaH imAm eva vidyAm Agamya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante yaduta prajñāpāramitām / aham api kauśika	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante yat uta prajQApAramitAm / aham api kOSika
   imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yaduta	imAm eva vidyAm Agamya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH yat uta
   prajñāpāramitām / imāmeva kauśika vidyāmāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā	prajQApAramitAm / imAm eva kOSika vidyAm Agamya daSa kuSalAH karma paTA
   loke prabhāvyante, catvāri dhyānāni bodhyaṅgasaṃprayuktāni loke	loke praBAvi ante, catvAri DyAnAni boDi aFga saMprayuktAni loke
   prabhāvyante, catvāryapramāṇāni bodhyaṅgasaṃprayuktāni loke prabhāvyante,	praBA vi ante, catvAri apramANAni boDi aFga saMprayuktAni loke praBAvi ante,
   catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo bodhyaṅgaparigṛhītā loke prabhāvyante,	catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH boDi aFga parigRhItAH loke praBAvi ante,
   ṣaḍabhijñā bodhyaṅgasaṃprayuktā loke prabhāvyante, saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā	zaxaBijQA boDi aFga saMprayuktAH loke praBAvi ante, saptatriMSat boDi pakzA
   dharmā loke prabhāvyante, saṃkṣepeṇa caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi loke	DarmAH loke praBAvi ante, saMkzepeNa caturaSIti Darma skanDa sahasrANi loke

   imāmeva kauśika vidyāmāgamya yaduta prajñāpāramitām / yadāpi kauśika	imAm eva kOSika vidyAm Agamya yat uta prajQApAramitAm / yadA api kOSika
   tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke notpadyante, tadāpi kauśika	taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH loke na utpadyante, tadA api kOSika
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaśrutena prajñāpāramitāniṣyandena ye	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH pUrva Srutena prajQApAramitA nizyandena ye
   upāyakauśalyasamanvāgatā bhavanti, te 'pi kauśika sattvānāmanukampakāḥ	upAya kOSalya samanvAgatAH Bavanti, te api kOSika sattvAnAm anukampakAH
   anukampāmupādāya imaṃ lokamāgamya daśa kuśalān karmapathān loke	anukampAm upAdAya imam lokam Agamya daSa kuSalAn karma paTAn loke

   bodhyaṅgaviprayuktā loke prabhāvayanti / tadyathāpi nāma kauśika	boDi aFga viprayuktAH loke praBAvayanti / tat yaTA api nAma kOSika
   candramaṇḍalamāgamya sarvā oṣadhīḥ tārā yathābalaṃ	candra maNxalam Agamya sarvAH ozaDIH tArA yaTAbalam

   bodhisattvapramāvitā (Vaidya 38) bodhisattvopāyakauśalyapravartitā / tacca	boDisattva pramAvitA (VEdyaH 38) boDisattva upAya kOSalya pravartitA / tat ca
   bodhisattvānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaṃ veditavyam //	boDisattvAnAm upAya kOSalyam prajQApAramitA nirjAtam veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇaṃtāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ	punar aparam kOSika imAm prajQApAramitAm udgRhNaMtAm DArayatAm vAcayatAm

   likhatāṃ manasi kurvatāṃ samanvāharatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā	liKatAm manasi kurvatAm samanvAharatAm ca kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm vA

   bhaviṣyanti ? bhagavānāha   na te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā	Bavizyanti ? BagavAn Aha  na te kOSika kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA
   viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na śastreṇa	vizama aparihAreNa kAlam karizyanti, na vizeNa kAlam karizyanti, na SastreNa
   kālaṃ kariṣyanti, nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati, nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na	kAlam karizyanti, na agninA kAlam karizyati, na udakena kAlam karizyanti, na

   utpannotpannāścaiṣāmupadravā rājato vā rājaputrato vā rājamantrito vā	utpanna utpannAH ca ezAm upadravAH rAjataH vA rAja putrataH vA rAja mantritaH vA
   rājamahāmātrato vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā	rAja mahAmAtrataH vA imAm prajQApAramitAm samanvAharatAm vA su ADyAya tAm vA
   punarevāntardhāsyanti / teṣāṃ ca enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ punaḥ	punar eva antarDAsyanti / tezAm ca enAm prajQApAramitAm punar punar 
   samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā ye tatropasaṃkrāmeyuravatāraprekṣiṇo	samanvAharatAm vA su ADyAya tAm vA ye tatra upasaMkrAmeyuH avatAra prekziNaH 
   'vatāragaveṣiṇo rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamantriṇo vā rājamahāmātrā vā,	avatAra gaveziNaH rAjAnaH vA rAja putrAH vA rAja mantriNaH vA rAja mahAmAtrAH vA,
   na te 'vatāraṃ lapsyante yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītatvāt /	na te avatAram lapsyante yaTA api nAma prajQApAramitA parigRhIta tvAt /
   upasaṃkrāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vā rājaputrāṇāṃ vā rājamantriṇāṃ vā,	upasaMkrAntAnAm ca tezAm rAjQAm vA rAja putrANAm vA rAja mantriNAm vA,
   rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ vā ālapitukāmatā bhaviṣyati, abhibhāṣitukāmatā	rAja mahAmAtrANAm vA Alapitu kAma tA Bavizyati, aBiBAzitu kAma tA
   bhaviṣyati, pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ ca te maṃsyante / tatkasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ hi	Bavizyati, pratisaMmoditavyam ca te maMsyante / tat kasya hetoH? iyam hi
   kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvasattvānāmantike maitropasaṃhāreṇa	kOSika prajQApAramitA sarva sattvAnAm antike mEtra upasaMhAreNa
   maitracittatayā karuṇopasaṃhāreṇa karuṇacittatayā pratyupasthitā /	mEtra citta tayA karuNA upasaMhAreNa karuNa citta tayA pratyupasTitA /
   tasmāttarhi kauśika ye 'pi te vyālasarīsṛpakāntāramadhyagatāḥ, teṣāṃ	tasmAt tarhi kOSika ye api te vyAla sarIsRpa kAntAra maDya gatAH, tezAm
   kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo	kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm vA manuzyAH vA amanuzyAH vA avatAra prekziNaH 
   'vatāragaveṣiṇaḥ, te 'pi teṣāṃ kauśika avatāraṃ na lapsyante sthāpayitvā	avatAra gaveziNaH, te api tezAm kOSika avatAram na lapsyante sTApayitvA
   pūrvakarmavipākam //	pUrva karma vipAkam //
   atha khalvanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ śataṃ tasyāṃ	aTa Kalu anya tIrTyAnAm parivrAjakAnAm upAlamBa aBiprAyANAm Satam tasyAm
   velāyāṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma / atha khalu śakro devānāmindro	velAyAm yena BagavAn= tena upasaMkrAmati sma / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH 
   dūrata eva āgacchatastānanyatīrthyān parivrājakān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ cittāni	dUratas eva AgacCataH tAn anya tIrTyAn parivrAjakAn dRzwvA tezAm cittAni
   vyavalokya evaṃ cintayāmāsa   ime khalu anyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā	vyavalokya evam cintayAmAsa  ime Kalu anya tIrTyAH parivrAjakA

   yāvanmātro mayāṃ bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa	yAvanmAtraH mayAm BagavataH antikAt asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH pradeSa
   udgṛhītaḥ, tāvanmātraṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyam,	udgRhItaH, tAvat mAtram smRtyA samanvAhareyam su ADyAyeyam pravartayeyam,
   yathaite 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā bhagavantaṃ nopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ / evamasyāḥ	yaTA ete anya tIrTAH parivrAjakAH Bagavantam na upasaMkrAmeyuH / evam asyAH
   prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā nāntarāyaḥ syāditi / atha khalu śakro	prajQApAramitAyAH BAzyamANAyAH na antarAyaH syAt iti / aTa Kalu SakraH 
   devānāmindro yāvanmātro bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśaḥ	devAnAm indraH yAvanmAtraH BagavataH antikAt asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH pradeSaH
   udgṛhītaḥ, tāvanmātraṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma, svādhyāyati sma,	udgRhItaH, tAvat mAtram smRtyA samanvAharati sma, su ADyAyati sma,
   pravartayati sma / atha te 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ	pravartayati sma / aTa te anya tIrTAH parivrAjakAH dUrAt dUrataram
   bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva	Bagavantam pradakziNIkRtya tena eva dvAreNa tena eva mArgeNa punar eva
   niṣkrāntāḥ / atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt (Vaidya 39)  	nizkrAntAH / aTa Kalu AyuzmataH SAriputrasya etat aBUt (VEdyaH 39)  
   kimatra kāraṇaṃ yena ime 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ	kim atra kAraNam yena ime anya tIrTyAH parivrAjakAH dUrAt dUrataram
   bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva	Bagavantam pradakziNIkRtya tena eva dvAreNa tena eva mArgeNa punar eva
