   cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	cetasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   śakreṇa śāriputra devānāmindreṇa teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ	SakreNa SAriputra devAnAm indreNa tezAm anya tIrTyAnAm
   parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ cittāni vyavalokya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā	parivrAjakAnAm upAlamBa aBiprAyANAm cittAni vyavalokya iyam prajQApAramitA
   smṛtyā samanvāhṛtā svādhyāyitā pravartitā, teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ	smRtyA samanvAhRtA svADyAyitA pravartitA, tezAm anya tIrTyAnAm
   parivrājakānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ	parivrAjakAnAm vigrahItu kAmAnAm vivaditu kAmAnAm viroDayitu kAmAnAm
   nivartanārtham, yathā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā ete 'nyatīrthyāḥ	nivartana arTam, yaTA asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH BAzyamANAyAH ete anya tIrTyAH
   parivrājakā nopasaṃkrāmeyuriti, māntarāyaṃ kārṣuḥ prajñāpāramitāyā	parivrAjakAH na upasaMkrAmeyuH iti, mA antarAyam kArzuH prajQApAramitAyAH 
   bhāṣyamāṇāyā iti / mayā ca śakrasya devānāmindrasyābhyanujñātam / tatkasya	BAzyamANAyAH iti / mayA ca Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya aByanujQAtam / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmekasyāpi śuklaṃ	hetoH? na aham SAriputra tezAm anya tIrTyAnAm parivrAjakAnAm ekasya api Suklam
   dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi / sarve te śāriputra upālambhābhiprāyāḥ	Darmam samanupaSyAmi / sarve te SAriputraH upAlamBa aBiprAyAH
   pratihatacittā upasaṃkramitukāmā abhūvan //	pratihata cittAH upasaMkramitu kAmAH aBUvan //
   atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasya etadabhūt   imāstathāgatasyārhataḥ	aTa Kalu mArasya pApIyasya etat aBUt  imAH taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāstathāgatasya	samyaksaMbudDasya catasraH parzadaH saMnipatitAH saMnizaNNAH taTAgatasya
   saṃmukhībhūtāḥ / ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ	saMmuKIBUtAH / ime ca kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrAH
   saṃmukhībhūtāḥ / niyatamatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākariṣyante	saMmuKIBUtAH / niyatam atra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH vyAkarizyante
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / yannvahamupasaṃkrāmeyaṃ vicakṣuḥkaraṇāyeti /	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / yat nu aham upasaMkrAmeyam vicakzuH karaNAya iti /
   atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena	aTa Kalu mAraH pApIyAn= caturaFga balakAyam aBinirmAya yena
   bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma / atha khalu śakrasya	BagavAn= tena upasaMkrAmati sma / aTa Kalu Sakrasya
   devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   māro batāyaṃ	devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  mAraH bata ayam
   pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /	pApIyAn= caturaFga balakAyam aBinirmAya yena BagavAn= tena upasaMkrAmati sma /
   yaścāyaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya	yaH ca ayam caturaFgasya bala kAyasya vyUhaH, na ayam rAjQaH bimbisArasya
   caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāpi rājñaḥ prasenajitaścaturaṅgasya	caturaFgasya bala kAyasya vyUhaH, na api rAjQaH prasenajitaH caturaFgasya
   balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāpi śākyānāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāpi	bala kAyasya vyUhaH, na api SAkyAnAm caturaFgasya bala kAyasya vyUhaH, na api
   licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, yo 'yaṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā	licCavInAm caturaFgasya bala kAyasya vyUhaH, yaH ayam mAreNa pApIyasA
   abhinirmitaḥ / samanubaddho dīrgharātraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato	aBinirmitaH / samanubadDaH dIrGarAtram mAraH pApIyAn BagavataH 
   'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī, sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ /	avatAra prekzI avatAra gavezI, sattvAnAm ca viheWana aBiprAyaH /
   yannvahamimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ	yat nu aham imAm eva prajQApAramitAm smRtyA samanvAhareyam su ADyAyeyam
   pravartayeyamiti / atha khalu śakro devānāmindra imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ	pravartayeyam iti / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm
   smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma / yathā yathā ca	smRtyA samanvAharati sma su ADyAyati sma pravartayati sma / yaTA yaTA ca
   śakro devānāmindra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma	SakraH devAnAm indraH imAm prajQApAramitAm smRtyA samanvAharati sma
   svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma, tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃstenaiva	su ADyAyati sma pravartayati sma, taTA taTA mAraH pApIyAn= tena eva
   mārgeṇa punareva pratyudāvṛttaḥ //	mArgeNa punar eva pratyudAvRttaH //
   atha khalu trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyāni māndārapuṣpāṇyabhinirmāya	aTa Kalu trAyastriMSat kAyikA deva putrAH divyAni mAndAra puzpANi aBinirmAya
   vihāyasā antarīkṣagatā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma, yena	vihAyasA antarIkza gatAH yena BagavAn= tena aByavakiranti sma, yena
   bhagavāṃstena tāni divyāni māndāravapuṣpāṇyabhiprakiranti sma, evaṃ	BagavAn= tena tAni divyAni mAndArava puzpANi aBiprakiranti sma, evam
   codānamudānayanti sma   cirasya bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ	ca udAnam udAnayanti sma  cirasya bata iyam prajQApAramitA jAmbUdvIpakAnAm
   manuṣyāṇāmupāvṛtteti / punareva ca divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā	manuzyANAm upAvRttA iti / punar eva ca divyAni mAndAravANi puzpANi gRhItvA
   yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma, abhiprakiranti sma / evaṃ cāvocan  	yena BagavAn= tena aByavakiranti sma, aBiprakiranti sma / evam ca avocan  
   ye kecidbhagavan sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante bhāvayiṣyanti,	ye kecid Bagavan sattvAH prajQApAramitAm BAzizyante BAvayizyanti,
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti, na teṣāṃ māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā	prajQApAramitAyAm carizyanti, na tezAm mAraH vA mArakAyikA vA devatA
   avatāraṃ lapsyante / na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena (Vaidya	avatAram lapsyante / na te Bagavan sattvAH avarakeNa kuSala mUlena (VEdya
   40) samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti, ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti, śrutva	40) samanvAgatA Bavizyanti, ye imAm prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti, Srutva
   codgrahīṣyanti, dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	ca udgrahIzyanti, DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyanti, upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /	deSayizyanti, upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti /
   pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti, yeṣāmiyaṃ	pUrva jina kRta aDikArAH te Bagavan sattvAH Bavizyanti, yezAm iyam
   prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati / kaḥ punarvādo ye	prajQApAramitA Srotra avaBAsam Agamizyati / kaH punar vAdaH ye
   enāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	enAm udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti,
   tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya	taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya
   yogamāpatsyante, tathāgataparyupāsitāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti /	yogam Apatsyante, taTAgata paryupAsitAH te Bagavan sattvAH Bavizyanti /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi sarvajñatā gaveṣitavyā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /	tat kasya hetoH? atas hi sarvajQa tA gavezitavyA yat uta prajQApAramitAtaH /
   tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yāni kānicidratnāni mahāratnāni, sarvāṇi tāni	tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan yAni kAnicid ratnAni mahA ratnAni, sarvANi tAni
   mahāsamudraprabhāvitāni, sarvāṇi tāni mahāsamudrādgaveṣitavyāni, evameva	mahA samudra praBAvitAni, sarvANi tAni mahA samudrAt gavezita vyAni, evam eva
   bhagavan sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ	Bagavan sarvajQa tA mahA ratnam taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm
   prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrādgaveṣitavyam / evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ	prajQApAramitA mahA samudrAt gavezitavyam / evam ukte BagavAn Sakram
   devānāmindrametadavocat   evametatkauśika, evam etat / atonirjātaṃ	devAnAm indram etat avocat  evam etat kOSika, evam etat / atonirjAtam
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ yaduta	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sarvajQa tA mahA ratnam yat uta
   prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrāt //	prajQApAramitA mahA samudrAt //
   atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat   na bhagavan dānapāramitāyā	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn AnandaH Bagavantam etat avocat  na Bagavan dAna pAramitAyAH 
   varṇaṃ bhāṣate, na nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati / na śīlapāramitāyāḥ, na	varNam BAzate, na nAmaDeyam parikIrtayati / na SIla pAramitAyAH, na
   kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ, na vīryapāramitāyāḥ / na bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā	kzAnti pAramitAyAH, na vIrya pAramitAyAH / na Bagavan DyAna pAramitAyAH 
   varṇaṃ bhāṣate, na nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati / api tu prajñāpāramitāyā	varNam BAzate, na nAmaDeyam parikIrtayati / api tu prajQApAramitAyAH 
   evaikasyā bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣate, nāmadheyaṃ ca parikīrtayati /	eva ekasyAH BagavAn varNam BAzate, nAmaDeyam ca parikIrtayati /
   bhagavānāha evametadānanda, evam etat / prajñāpāramitāyā evāhamānanda	BagavAn Aha evam etat Ananda, evam etat / prajQApAramitAyAH eva aham Ananda
   varṇaṃ bhāṣe nāmadheyaṃ ca parikīrtayāmi, nānyāsāṃ pāramitānām / tatkasya	varNam BAze nAmaDeyam ca parikIrtayAmi, na anyAsAm pAramitAnAm / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi ānanda pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām / tatkiṃ	hetoH? prajQApAramitA hi Ananda pUrvaMgamA paQcAnAm pAramitAnAm / tat kim
   manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitānāmadheyaṃ	manyase Ananda apariNAmitam dAnam sarvajQa tAyAm dAna pAramitA nAmaDeyam
   labhate? āyuṣmānānanda āha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ	laBate? AyuzmAn AnandaH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  tat kim
   manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ śīlamapariṇāmitā kṣāntirapariṇāmitaṃ	manyase Ananda apariNAmitam SIlam apariNAmi tA kzAntiH apariNAmitam
   vīryamapariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam? tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitā prajñā	vIryam apariNAmitam DyAnam? tat kim manyase Ananda apariNAmi tA prajQA
   sarvajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate? ānanda āha   no hīdaṃ	sarvajQa tAyAm prajQApAramitA nAmaDeyam laBate? AnandaH Aha  no hi idam
   bhagavan / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase tvamānanda acintyā sā prajñā yā	Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase tvam Ananda acintyA sA prajQA yA
   kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayati? ānanda āha  	kuSala mUlAni sarvajQa tA pariNAmena pariNAmayati? AnandaH Aha  
   evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata / acintyā sā bhagavan prajñā,	evam etat Bagavan, evam etat sugataH / acintyA sA Bagavan prajQA,
   paramācintyā sā bhagavan prajñā, yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena	parama acintyA sA Bagavan prajQA, yA kuSala mUlAni sarvajQa tA pariNAmena
   pariṇāmayati bhagavānāha   tasmāttarhi ānanda paramatvātsā prajñā	pariNAmayati BagavAn Aha  tasmAt tarhi Ananda parama tvAt sA prajQA
   pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate, yayā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitāni kuśalamūlāni	pAramitA nAmaDeyam laBate, yayA sarvajQa tAyAm pariNAmitAni kuSala mUlAni
   pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante / tasmāttarhi ānanda	pAramitA nAmaDeyam laBante / tasmAt tarhi Ananda
   sarvajñatāpariṇāmitakuśalamūlatvātprajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ	sarvajQa tA pariNAmita kuSala mUla tvAt prajQApAramitA paQcAnAm pAramitAnAm
   pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā / anena yogena antargatāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ	pUrvaMgamA nAyikA pariNAyikAH / anena yogena antargatAH paQca pAramitAH
   prajñāpāramitāyāmeva ānanda ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇādhivacanametadyaduta	prajQApAramitAyAm eva Ananda zaz pAramitA paripUrNa aDivacanam etat yat uta
   prajñāpāramiteti / tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parikīrtitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitA iti / tasmAt tarhi Ananda prajQApAramitAyAm parikIrtitAyAm
   sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parikīrtitā bhavanti / tadyathāpi nāma ānanda	sarvAH zaw pAramitAH parikIrtitAH Bavanti / tat yaTA api nAma Ananda
   mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmagrīṃ labhamānāni virohanti /	mahA pRTivyAm bIjAni prakIrNAni sAmagrIm laBamAnAni virohanti /
   mahāpṛthivī ca teṣāṃ bījānāṃ pratiṣṭhā / (Vaidya 41)	mahA pRTivI ca tezAm bIjAnAm pratizWA / (VEdyaH 41)
   mahāpṛthivīpratiṣṭhitāni ca tāni bījāni virohanti / evameva ānanda	mahA pRTivI pratizWitAni ca tAni bIjAni virohanti / evam eva Ananda
   prajñāpāramitāsaṃgṛhītāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhante /	prajQApAramitA saMgRhItAH paQca pAramitAH sarvajQa tAyAm pratizWante /
   prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhitāḥ pañca pāramitā virohanti /	prajQApAramitA pratizWitAH paQca pAramitA virohanti /
   prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītatvācca pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante / tasmāttarhi	prajQApAramitA parigRhIta tvAt ca pAramitA nAmaDeyam laBante / tasmAt tarhi
   ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyakā	Ananda prajQApAramitA eva paQcAnAm pAramitAnAm pUrvaMgamA nAyikA pariNAyakA
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   na tāvadime	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  na tAvat ime
   bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve guṇāḥ	Bagavan= taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena prajQApAramitAyAH sarve guNAH
   parikīrtitāḥ, yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇīte	parikIrtitAH, yAn guNAn sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA parigRhNIte
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvā	prajQApAramitAm udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryavApya pravartya deSayitvA
   upadiśya uddiśya svādhyāyya / atha hi mayā yo bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ	upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya / aTa hi mayA yaH BagavataH antikAt asyAH
   prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa udgṛhītaḥ, sa pravartitaḥ / bhagavānāha   sādhu	prajQApAramitAyAH pradeSaH udgRhItaH, sa pravartitaH / BagavAn Aha  sADu
   sādhu kauśika / na khalu punaḥ kauśika kevalaṃ yaḥ	sADu kOSika / na Kalu punar kOSika kevalam yaH
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati
   pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati, tasyaiva	pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati svADyAsyati, tasya eva
   kevalamamī guṇā bhaviṣyanti / yo 'pi kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	kevalam amI guNAH Bavizyanti / yaH api kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati	imAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA pustaka gatAm kRtvA DArayizyati
   sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ   mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā	sTApayizyati sadDarma cira sTiti hetoH  mA budDa netrI samucCedaH BUt, mA
   saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ	sadDarma antarDAnam / boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm ca anugraha upasaMhAraH
   kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti / tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	kRtaH Bavizyati netryavEkalyena iti / tAm ca enAm prajQApAramitAm
   satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati	satkarizyati gurukarizyati mAnayizyati pUjayizyati arcayizyati
   apacāyiṣyati	apacAyizyati
   puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ	puzpEH DUpEH ganDEH mAlyEH vilepanEH cUrNEH vastrEH CatrEH DvajEH GaNwABiH
   patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ	patAkABiH, samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH
   pūjayiṣyati, tasyāpyahaṃ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā enān	pUjayizyati, tasya api aham kOSika kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vE enAn
   dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān vadāmi //	dRzwa DArmikAn guNAn vadAmi //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   aham api	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  aham api
   bhagavaṃstasyāpi kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ	Bagavan= tasya api kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA rakzA AvaraNa guptim
   saṃvidhāsyāmi, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā	saMviDAsyAmi, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA pustaka gatAm kRtvA
   dhārayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ   mā	DArayizyati sTApayizyati sadDarma cira sTiti hetoH  mA
   buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ	budDa netrI samucCedaH BUt, mA sadDarma antarDAnam / boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti / tāṃ	mahAsattvAnAm ca anugraha upasaMhAraH kRtaH Bavizyati netryavEkalyena iti / tAm
   caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati	ca enAm prajQApAramitAm satkarizyati gurukarizyati mAnayizyati pUjayizyati
   arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati	arcayizyati apacAyizyati
   puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ	puzpEH DUpEH ganDEH mAlyEH vilepanEH cUrNEH vastrEH CatrEH DvajEH GaNwABiH
   patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati	patAkABiH, samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH pUjayizyati
   / kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati udgrahīṣyati	/ kaH punar vAdaH yaH enAm prajQApAramitAm liKizyati udgrahIzyati
   dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati	DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati
   deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati	deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati su ADyAsyati satkarizyati gurukarizyati
   mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati	mAnayizyati pUjayizyati arcayizyati apacAyizyati
   puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ	puzpEH DUpEH ganDEH mAlyEH vilepanEH cUrNEH vastrEH CatrEH DvajEH GaNwABiH
   patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati	patAkABiH, samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH pUjayizyati
   bhagavānāha   sādhu sādhu kauśika / tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya	BagavAn Aha  sADu sADu kOSika / tasya Kalu punar kOSika kula putrasya
   kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyato bahūni	kula duhituH vA imAm prajQApAramitAm su ADyAyataH bahUni
   devaputraśatānyupasaṃkramiṣyanti / bahūni devaputrasahasrāṇi (Vaidya 42)	deva putra SatAni upasaMkramizyanti / bahUni deva putra sahasrANi (VEdyaH 42)
   bahūni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyanti / te ca	bahUni deva putra Sata sahasrANi Darma SravaNAya upasaMkramizyanti / te ca
   devaputrā dharmaṃ śṛṇvantastasya dharmabhāṇakasya	deva putrAH Darmam SRNvantaH tasya Darma BANakasya
   pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante / yadāpi sa dharmabhāṇako na	pratiBAnam upasaMhartavyam maMsyante / yadA api sa Darma BANakaH na
   jalpitukāmo bhaviṣyati, tadāpi tasya te devaputrāstenaiva dharmagauraveṇa	jalpitu kAmaH Bavizyati, tadA api tasya te deva putrAH tena eva Darma gOraveNa
   pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante, yathā tasya kulaputrasya vā	pratiBAnam upasaMhartavyam maMsyante, yaTA tasya kula putrasya vA
   kuladuhiturvā bhāṣitumeva chando bhaviṣyati / imam api sa kauśika	kula duhituH vA BAzitum eva CandaH Bavizyati / imam api sa kOSika
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti, ya imāṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA dRzwa DArmikam guNam parigRhNAti, yaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati
   pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //	pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati su ADyAsyati //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	punar aparam kOSika tasya kula putrasya kula duhituH vA imAm prajQApAramitAm
   bhāṣamāṇasya catasṝṇāṃ parṣadāmagrato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati   mā	BAzamANasya catasLNAm parzadAm agratas na avalIna citta tA Bavizyati  mA
   khalu māṃ kaścitparyanuyuñjīta upālambhābhiprāya iti / tatkasya hetoḥ?	Kalu mAm kaScid paryanuyuQjIta upAlamBa aBiprAyaH iti / tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi tasya prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karoti / sa upālambhān api	taTA hi tasya prajQApAramitA rakzA AvaraNa guptim karoti / saH upAlamBAn api
   prajñāpāramitāvihārī na samanupaśyati, upālambhakarān api	prajQApAramitA vihArI na samanupaSyati, upAlamBa karAn api
   prajñāpāramitāvihārī na samanupaśyati, yo 'pyupālabhyeta tam api na	prajQApAramitA vihArI na samanupaSyati, yaH api upAlaByeta tam api na
   samanupaśyati, tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati / evaṃ	samanupaSyati, tAm api prajQApAramitAm na samanupaSyati / evam
   prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anena paryāyeṇa	prajQApAramitA parigRhItasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA anena paryAyeNa
   na kaścitparyanuyogo bhaviṣyati / sa ca notrasiṣyati, na saṃtrasiṣyati, na	na kaScid paryanuyogaH Bavizyati / sa ca na utrasizyati, na saMtrasizyati, na
   saṃtrāsamāpatsyate / imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	saMtrAsam Apatsyate / imAn api sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati	dRzwa DArmikAn guNAn parigRhNAti, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati
   dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati	DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati
   deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //	deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati su ADyAsyati //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā priyo bhaviṣyati	punar aparam kOSika sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA priyaH Bavizyati
   mātāpitṝṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaśramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ hitānāṃ ca,	mAtA pitLNAm mitra amAtya jQAti sAlohita SramaNa brAhmaNAnAm hitAnAm ca,
   pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati, śaktaś ca bhaviṣyati utpannotpannānāṃ	pratibalaH ca Bavizyati, SaktaH ca Bavizyati utpanna utpannAnAm
   parapravādināṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahāya, paraiś ca pratyanuyujyamānaḥ	para pravAdinAm sahaDarmeNa nigrahAya, parEH ca pratyanuyujyamAnaH
   pratyanuyogavyākaraṇasamartho bhaviṣyati / imān api sa kauśika kulaputro	pratyanuyoga vyAkaraNa samarTaH Bavizyati / imAn api sa kOSika kula putraH 
   vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti, yaḥ kulaputro vā	vA kula duhitA vA dRzwa DArmikAn guNAn parigRhNAti, yaH kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati	kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati
   paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati	paryavApsyati pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati
   svādhyāsyati //	su ADyAsyati //
   yatra khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	yatra Kalu punar kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm
   likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,	liKitvA pustaka gatAm kRtvA pUjA pUrvaMgamam sTApayizyati pUjayizyati,
   tatra kauśika ye keciccāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ	tatra kOSika ye kecid cAturmahArAja kAyikezu devezu deva putrAH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatra āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante / te 'pi	samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH, te api tatra Agantavyam maMsyante / te api
   tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante	tatra Agatya enAm prajQApAramitAm pustaka gatAm prekzizyante vandizyante
   namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	namaskarizyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti /
   prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryāvāpya pravartya	prekzya vanditvA namaskRtya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryAvApya pravartya
   deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya (Vaidya 43) svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ	deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya (VEdyaH 43) su ADyAyya punar eva prakramitavyam
   maṃsyante / evaṃ ye kecitkauśika trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu devaputrā	maMsyante / evam ye kecid kOSika trAyastriMSezu devezu deva putrA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH, te api tatra Agantavyam maMsyante
   / te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante	/ te api tatra Agatya enAm prajQApAramitAm pustaka gatAm prekzizyante
   vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti	vandizyante namaskarizyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti
   paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti	paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti
   svādhyāsyanti / prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā	su ADyAsyanti / prekzya vanditvA namaskRtya udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA
   paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśya uddiśya svādhyāyya punareva	paryavApya pravartya deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya punar eva
   prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante / ye 'pi kecitkauśika yāmeṣu deveṣu devaputrā	prakramitavyam maMsyante / ye api kecid kOSika yAmezu devezu deva putrA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH, te api tatra Agantavyam maMsyante
   / te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante	/ te api tatra Agatya enAm prajQApAramitAm pustaka gatAm prekzizyante
   vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti	vandizyante namaskarizyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti
   paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti	paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti

   / te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante	/ te api tatra Agatya enAm prajQApAramitAm pustaka gatAm prekzizyante

   maṃsyante / te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ	maMsyante / te api tatra Agatya enAm prajQApAramitAm pustaka gatAm

   brahmaloke brahmakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	brahma loke brahmakAyikAH deva putrAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante / te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ	saMprasTitAH, te api tatra Agantavyam maMsyante / te api tatra Agatya enAm

   namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya	namaskRtya udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryavApya pravartya

   te 'tra kauśika evaṃ bhūdyathā brahmakāyikā eveti / yathā brahmakāyikāḥ,	te atra kOSika evam BUt yaTA brahmakAyikAH eva iti / yaTA brahmakAyikAH,
   evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika brahmapurohiteṣu deveṣu (Vaidya 44)	evam ye api kecid kOSika brahma purohitezu devezu (VEdyaH 44)
   devaputrā..........peyālam / evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika mahābrahmāsu	deva putra a. .........peyAlam / evam ye api kecid kOSika mahA brahmAsu
   parīttābheṣvapramāṇābheṣvābhāsvareṣu parīttasubheṣvapramāṇaśubheṣu	parIttABezu apramANA Bezu ABAsvarezu parIttasuBezu apramANa SuBezu
   śubhakṛtsneṣvanabhrakeṣu puṇyaprasaveṣu	SuBa kRtsnezu anaBrakezu puNya prasavezu

   pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ	pravartya deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya punar eva prakramitavyam
   maṃsyante / evaṃ ca kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā	maMsyante / evam ca kOSika tena kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA
   cittamutpādayitavyam   ye keciddaśasu dikṣu aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu	cittam utpAdayitavyam  ye kecid daSasu dikzu aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu
   lokadhātuṣu devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā	lokaDAtuzu devAH nAgAH yakzAH ganDarvAH asurAH garuxAH kinnarA mahA uragA
   manuṣyā amanuṣyāḥ, te itaḥ pustakātprajñāpāramitāṃ paśyantu vandantāṃ	manuzyAH amanuzyAH, te itas pustakAt prajQApAramitAm paSyantu vandantAm
   namaskurvantu udgṛhṇantu dhārayantu paryavāpnuvantu pravartayantu	namaskurvantu udgRhNantu DArayantu paryavApnuvantu pravartayantu
   deśayantu upadiśantu uddiśantu svādhyāyantu / prekṣya vanditvā	deSayantu upadiSantu uddiSantu su ADyAyantu / prekzya vanditvA

   upadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva svabhavanāni gacchantu   teṣāmidaṃ	upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya punar eva sva BavanAni gacCantu  tezAm idam
   dharmadānameva dattaṃ bhavatviti / mā te 'tra kauśika evaṃ bhūt   ye	Darma dAnam eva dattam Bavatu iti / mA te atra kOSika evam BUt  ye
   asminneva cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā	asmin= eva cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ, te eva kevalaṃ tatrāgantavyaṃ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTitAH, te eva kevalam tatra Agantavyam
   maṃsyanta iti / na te kauśika evaṃ draṣṭavyam / api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika	maMsyante iti / na te kOSika evam drazwavyam / api tu Kalu punar kOSika
   yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca	yAvantaH tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca
   devaputrā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi	deva putrAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTitAH, te api
   tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante / te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	tatra Agantavyam maMsyante / te api tatra Agatya enAm prajQApAramitAm
   pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti	pustaka gatAm prekzizyante vandizyante namaskarizyanti udgrahIzyanti

   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti / prekṣya vanditvā	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti / prekzya vanditvA
   namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya	namaskRtya udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryavApya pravartya
   deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /	deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya punar eva prakramitavyam maMsyante /
   tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā gṛhaṃ vā layanaṃ	tasya Kalu punar kOSika kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA gRham vA layanam
   vā prāsādo vā surakṣito bhaviṣyati / na ca tasya kaścidviheṭhako	vA prAsAdaH vA su rakzitaH Bavizyati / na ca tasya kaScid viheWa ko
   bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākena / imam api sa kauśika kulaputro	Bavizyati sTApayitvA pUrva karma vipAkena / imam api sa kOSika kula putraH 
   vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati   yatra hi nāma evaṃ	vA kula duhitA vA dRzwa DArmikam guNam parigrahIzyati  yatra hi nAma evam
   mahaujaskā devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā	mahA ojaskAH devAH nAgAH yakzAH ganDarvAH asurAH garuxAH kinnarA mahA uragA
   manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante //	manuzyAH amanuzyAH vE Agantavyam maMsyante //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   kathaṃ punarbhagavan	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  kaTam punar Bagavan
   sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ jānīyāt   iha devā vā nāgā vā yakṣā vā	sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vE evam jAnIyAt  iha devAH vA nAgAH vA yakzAH vA

   vā āgacchanti imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotuṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ	vA AgacCanti imAm prajQApAramitAm Srotum drazwum vanditum

   udāramavabhāsaṃ saṃjānīte, niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa vā (Vaidya 45)	udAram avaBAsam saMjAnIte, nizWA tena kula putreNa vA (VEdyaH 45)
   kuladuhitrā vā tatra gantavyā   iha devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā	kula duhitrA vA tatra gantavyAH  iha devaH vA nAgaH vA yakzaH vA ganDarvaH vA

   iti, upasaṃkrānta iti / punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	iti, upasaMkrAntaH iti / punar aparam saced kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA
   vā tatra amānuṣaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyatyanāghrātapūrvam, ghrātvā ca tadgandhaṃ	vA tatra amAnuzam ganDam GrAsyati anAGrAta pUrvam, GrAtvA ca tad ganDam

   vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati, śucisamudācāro bhaviṣyati, tasya tayā	vA cOkza samudAcAraH Bavizyati, Suci samudAcAraH Bavizyati, tasya tayA

   gurugauravatāparipūrimupādāya //	guru gOrava tA paripUrim upAdAya //

     yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogānuyuktatvāttasya kulaputrasya vā	 yaTA api nAma prajQApAramitA BAvanA yoga anuyukta tvAt tasya kula putrasya vA

   parigṛhṇāti //	parigRhNAti //

   śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayetparyavāpnuyātpravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet,	SRNuyAt udgRhNIyAt DArayet vAcayet paryavApnuyAt pravartayet deSayet upadiSet uddiSet svADyAya it,

   antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ  	antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA DArayet sTApayet sat Darma cira sTiti hetoH

   kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhiśraddhātavyā	kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA iyam eva prajQApAramitA aBiSradDAtavyA
   (Vaidya 47) avakalpayitavyā adhibhoktavyā / prasannacittena bodhāya	(VEdyaH 47) avakalpayitavyAH aDiBoktavyA / prasanna cittena boDAya
   cittamutpādya satkṛtya adhyāśayena śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā	cittam utpAdya satkRtya aDyASayena SrotavyA udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA
   vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā	vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA deSayitavyA upadezwavyA
   uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā, arthato	uddezwavyA su ADyAtavyA, pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitavyA, arTataH 
   vivaritavyā, manasānvavekṣitavyā, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra	vivaritavyA, manasA anvavekzitavyA, yaTA aDikayA ca prajQayA atra
   parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta / antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā sthāpayitavyā	parimImAMsAm Apadyeta / antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA sTApayitavyA
   pūjayitavyā saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ   mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā	pUjayitavyA sadDarma cira sTiti hetoH  mA budDa netrI samucCedaH BUt, mA
   saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ	sadDarma antarDAnam / boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm ca anugraha upasaMhAraH
   kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti / arthikānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ	kRtaH Bavizyati netryavEkalyena iti / arTikAnAm ca kula putrANAm
   kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmi, mama ca pareṣāṃ ca	kula duhitLNAm ca saMviBAgam karizyAmi, mama ca parezAm ca
   kalyāṇasattvānāṃ buddhanetrīmahācakṣuravaikalyatā bhaviṣyatīti / sadā ca	kalyANa sattvAnAm budDa netrI mahA cakzuH avEkalya tA Bavizyati iti / sadA ca
   satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā	satkartavyA guru kartavyA mAnayitavyA pUjayitavyA arcayitavyA apacAyitavyA
   puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ	puzpEH DUpEH ganDEH mAlyEH vilepanEH cUrNEH vastrEH CatrEH DvajEH GaNwABiH
   patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ	patAkABiH, samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH
   pūjayitavyeti //	pUjayitavyA iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmaprameyaguṇadhāraṇapāramitāstūpasatkāraparivarto nāma	prajQApAramitAyAm aprameya guNa DAraNa pAramitA stu upasatkAra parivartaH nAma
   tṛtīyaḥ //	tRtIyaH //
   (Vaidya 48)	(VEdyaH 48)
   ASP_4: guṇaparikīrtanaparivartaścaturthaḥ /	ASP_4: guNa parikIrtana parivartaH caturTaH /
   punaraparaṃ bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma   sacetkauśika	punar aparam BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram Amantrayate sma  saced kOSika
   ayaṃ te jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta, iyaṃ	ayam te jambUdvIpaH paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH taTAgata SarIrANAm dIyeta, iyam
   ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvopanāmyeta, tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo	ca prajQApAramitA liKitvA upanAmi eta, tatas ekatareNa BAgena pravAryamANaH 
   'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ katamaṃ tvaṃ kauśika bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāḥ?	anayoH dvayoH BAgayoH sTApitayoH katamam tvam kOSika BAgam gRhNIyAH?
   śakra āha   sacenme bhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ	SakraH Aha  saced me Bagavan ayam jambUdvIpaH
   paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā	paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH taTAgata SarIrANAm dIyeta, iyam ca prajQApAramitA
   likhitvopanāmyeta, tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo	liKitvA upanAmi eta, tatas ekatareNa BAgena pravAryamANaH 
   'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ	anayoH dvayoH BAgayoH sTApitayoH imAm eva aham Bagavan prajQApAramitAm
   parigṛhṇīyām / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma tathāgatanetrīcitrīkāreṇa /	parigRhNIyAm / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api nAma taTAgata netrI citrIkAreNa /
   etaddhi tathāgatānāṃ bhūtārthikaṃ śarīram / tatkasya hetoḥ? uktaṃ	etat hi taTAgatAnAm BUta arTikam SarIram / tat kasya hetoH? uktam
   hyetadbhagavatā   dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavantaḥ / mā khalu punarimaṃ	hi etat BagavatA  Darma kAyAH budDAH BagavantaH / mA Kalu punar imam
   bhikṣavaḥ satkāyaṃ kāyaṃ manyadhvam / dharmakāyapariniṣpattito māṃ	BikzavaH sat kAyam kAyam manyaDvam / Darma kAya parinizpattitaH mAm
   bhikṣavo drakṣyatha / eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito draṣṭavyo	BikzavaH drakzyaTa / eza ca taTAgata kAyaH BUtakowi praBAvitaH drazwavyaH 
   yaduta prajñāpāramitā / na khalu punarme bhagavaṃsteṣu	yat uta prajQApAramitA / na Kalu punar me Bagavan= tezu
   tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam / gauravameva me bhagavaṃsteṣu	taTAgata SarIrezu agOravam / gOravam eva me Bagavan= tezu
   tathāgataśarīreṣu / api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto	taTAgata SarIrezu / api tu Kalu punar Bagavan itas prajQApAramitAtaH 
   nirjātāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante / tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayaiva	nirjAtAni taTAgata SarIrANi pUjAm laBante / tasmAt tarhi Bagavan anayA eva
   prajñāpāramitayā pūjitayā teṣām api tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇā pūjā kṛtā	prajQApAramitayA pUjitayA tezAm api taTAgata SarIrANAm paripUrNA pUjA kRtA
   bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitānirjātattvāttathāgataśarīrāṇām /	Bavati / tat kasya hetoH? prajQApAramitA nirjA tattvAt taTAgata SarIrANAm /
   tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmahaṃ yasmin samaye divye	tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan suDarmAyAm deva saBAyAm aham yasmin samaye divye
   svake āsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi, tadā mama devaputrā upasthānāyāgacchanti /	svake Asane nizaNNaH BavAmi, tadA mama deva putrAH upasTAnAya AgacCanti /
   yasmin samaye na niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi, atha tasmin samaye yanmamāsanaṃ tatra	yasmin samaye na nizaNNaH BavAmi, aTa tasmin samaye yat mama Asanam tatra
   devaputrā mama gauraveṇa tadāsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva	deva putrAH mama gOraveNa tad Asanam namaskRtya pradakziNIkRtya punar eva
   prakrāmanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? iha hi kila āsane niṣadya śakro devānāmindro	prakrAmanti / tat kasya hetoH? iha hi kila Asane nizadya SakraH devAnAm indraH 
   devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatīti / evameva bhagavan	devAnAm trAyastriMSAnAm Darmam deSayati iti / evam eva Bagavan
   maheśākhyahetupratyayabhūtā prajñāpāramitā / tathāgatasyārhataḥ	maheSa AKya hetu pratyaya BUtA prajQApAramitA / taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatāyā āhārikā / sarvajñatāyāś ca	samyaksaMbudDasya sarvajQa tAyAH AhArikAH / sarvajQa tAyAH ca
   tathāgataśarīrāṇyāśrayabhūtāni / na tu tāni pratyayabhūtāni, na	taTAgata SarIrANi ASraya BUtAni / na tu tAni pratyaya BUtAni, na
   kāraṇabhūtāni jñānasyotpādāya / evameva bhagavan sarvajñajñānahetukā	kAraNa BUtAni jQAnasya utpAdAya / evam eva Bagavan sarvajQa jQAna hetukA
   tathāgataśarīreṣu pūjā kṛtā bhavati / tasmāttarhi bhagavan	taTAgata SarIrezu pUjA kRtA Bavati / tasmAt tarhi Bagavan
   anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ	anayoH dvayoH BAgayoH sTApitayoH imAm eva aham Bagavan prajQApAramitAm
   parigṛhṇīyām / na khalu punarme bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /	parigRhNIyAm / na Kalu punar me Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu agOravam /
   gauravameva me bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣu / api tu khalu	gOravam eva me Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu / api tu Kalu
   punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvātpūjāṃ	punar Bagavan= tAni taTAgata SarIrANi prajQApAramitA pariBAvita tvAt pUjAm
   labhante / tiṣṭhatu khalu punarbhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ	laBante / tizWatu Kalu punar Bagavan ayam jambUdvIpaH taTAgata SarIrANAm
   paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ / tiṣṭhatu cāturmahādvīpako	paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH / tizWatu cAturmahAdvIpakaH 
   lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ / tiṣṭhatu sāhasro	lokaDAtuH taTAgata SarIrANAm paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH / tizWatu sAhasraH 
   lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ / tiṣṭhatu bhagavan	lokaDAtuH taTAgata SarIrANAm paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH / tizWatu Bagavan

   ayameva bhagavaṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ	ayam eva Bagavan= tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH taTAgata SarIrANAm
   paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ, eko bhāgaḥ kṛtvā sthāpyeta, iyaṃ ca	paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH, ekaH BAgaH kRtvA sTApya ita, iyam ca
   prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta / anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ	prajQApAramitA liKitvA dvitIyaH BAgaH sTApyeta / anayoH dvayoH BAgayoH
   sthāpitayorekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ	sTApitayoH ekatareNa BAgena pravAryamANaH anayoH dvayoH BAgayoH
   sthāpitayoryaste bhāgo 'bhipretastamekaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhāṇeti, tatra imāmevāhaṃ	sTApitayoH yaH te BAgaH aBipretaH tam ekam BAgam gRhANa iti, tatra imAm eva aham
   bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām / na khalu (Vaidya 49)	Bagavan prajQApAramitAm parigRhNIyAm / na Kalu (VEdyaH 49)
   punarbhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam / gauravameva me	punar Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu agOravam / gOravam eva me
   bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣu / api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni	Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu / api tu Kalu punar Bagavan= tAni
   tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante /	taTAgata SarIrANi prajQApAramitA pariBAvitAni pUjAm laBante /
   tathāgataśarīrāṇi hi sarvajñajñānāśrayabhūtāni / tad api sarvajñajñānaṃ	taTAgata SarIrANi hi sarvajQa jQAna ASraya BUtAni / tat api sarvajQa jQAnam
   prajñāpāramitānirjātam / tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ	prajQApAramitA nirjAtam / tasmAt tarhi Bagavan anayoH dvayoH BAgayoH

   punar me bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam / gauravameva me	punar me Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu agOravam / gOravam eva me
   bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣu / api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ	Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu / api tu Kalu punar Bagavan itas 
   prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante yaduta	prajQApAramitAtaH nirjAtAni tAni taTAgata SarIrANi pUjAm laBante yat uta
   prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan anarghaṃ	prajQApAramitA pariBAvita tvAt / tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan anarGam
   maṇiratnamebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ syāt / tadyathā   tadyatra	maNi ratnam eBiH evaMrUpEH guNEH samanvAgatam syAt / tat yaTA  tat yatra
   yatra sthāpyeta, tatra tatra manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ na labheran /	yatra sTApya ita, tatra tatra manuzyAH vA amanuzyAH vA avatAram na laBeran /
   yatra yatra vā amanuṣyagṛhītaḥ kaścidbhavet puruṣo vā strī vā, tatra tatra	yatra yatra vA amanuzya gRhItaH kaScid Bavet puruzaH vA strI vA, tatra tatra
   tasmin maṇiratne praveśitamātre so 'manuṣyastato 'pakrāmet / vātenāpi	tasmin maNi ratne praveSita mAtre saH amanuzyaH tatas apakrAmet / vAtena api
   bādhyamānasya dhamyamāne śarīre tanmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta / tasya taṃ vātaṃ	bADyamAnasya DamyamAne SarIre tat maNi ratnam sTApyeta / tasya tam vAtam
   nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / pittenāpi dahyamāne śarīre	nigRhNIya at, na vivarDayet, upaSamayet / pittena api dahyamAne SarIre
   sthāpyeta / tasya tad api pittaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet /	sTApyeta / tasya tat api pittam nigRhNIya at, na vivarDayet, upaSamayet /
   śleṣmaṇāpi parigṛddhe sarvato bādhyamāne śarīre sthāpyeta, tasya tam api	SlezmaNA api parigRdDe sarvatas bADyamAne SarIre sTApya ita, tasya tam api
   śleṣmāṇaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / sāṃnipātikenāpi	SlezmANam nigRhNIya at, na vivarDayet, upaSamayet / sAMnipAtikena api
   vyādhinā duḥkhitasya śarīre sthāpyeta, tasya tam api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhiṃ	vyADinA duHKitasya SarIre sTApya ita, tasya tam api sAMnipAtikam vyADim
   nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / andhakāratamisrāyāṃ ca	nigRhNIya at, na vivarDayet, upaSamayet / anDakAra tamisrAyAm ca
   rātrāvapyavabhāsaṃ kuryāt / uṣṇe cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe	rAtrO= api avaBAsam kuryAt / uzNe ca api vartamAne yasmin pRTivI pradeSe
   sthāpyeta, sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ śītalo bhavet / śīte cāpi vartamāne yasmin	sTApya ita, sa pRTivI pradeSaH SItalaH Bavet / SIte ca api vartamAne yasmin
   pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta, sa pṛthivīpradeśa uṣṇo bhavet / yasmiṃś ca	pRTivI pradeSe sTApya ita, sa pRTivI pradeSaH uzNaH Bavet / yasmin ca
   pṛthivīpradeśe āśīviṣā anuvicareyuḥ, tathā anye 'pi kṣudrajantavaḥ,	pRTivI pradeSe ASIvizAH anuvicareyuH, taTA anye api kzudra jantavaH,
   tatrāpi pṛthivīpradeśe dhāryeta, sthāpitaṃ vā bhavet, te 'pyāśīviṣāste ca	tatra api pRTivI pradeSe DAryeta, sTApitam vA Bavet, te api ASIvizAH te ca
   kṣudrajantavastato 'pakrāmeyuḥ / sacedbhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa	kzudra jantavaH tatas apakrAmeyuH / saced Bagavan strI vA puruzaH vA ASIvizeNa
   daṣṭo bhavet, tasya tanmaṇiratnaṃ daśyeta, tasya sahadaṃśanenaiva	dazwaH Bavet, tasya tat maNi ratnam daSyeta, tasya saha daMSanena eva
   maṇiratnasya tadviṣaṃ pratihanyeta vigacchet / ebhiścānyaiś ca bhagavan	maNi ratnasya tat vizam pratihanyeta vigacCet / eBiH ca anyEH ca Bagavan
   evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet / yeṣām api	evaMrUpEH guNEH samanvAgatam tat maNi ratnam Bavet / yezAm api
   keṣāṃcidbhagavan akṣiṣvarbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā akṣirogo vā paṭalaṃ vā	kezAMcid Bagavan akzizu arbudam vA timiram vE akzi rogaH vA pawalam vA
   bhavet, teṣāṃ ca tanmaṇiratnamakṣiṣu sthāpyeta, teṣāṃ sthāpitamātreṇaiva	Bavet, tezAm ca tat maNi ratnam akzizu sTApya ita, tezAm sTApita mAtreNa eva
   te 'kṣidoṣā nirghātaṃ praśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ / etaiś ca anyaiś ca bhagavan	te akzi dozAH nirGAtam praSamam gacCeyuH / etEH ca anyEH ca Bagavan
   evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet / yatra codake	evaMrUpEH guNEH samanvAgatam tat maNi ratnam Bavet / yatra ca udake
   sthāpyeta, tadapyudakamekavarṇaṃ kuryātsvakena varṇena / sacetpāṇḍareṇa	sTApya ita, tat api udakam eka varNam kuryAt svakena varNena / saced pANxareNa
   vastreṇa pariveṣṭya udake prakṣipyeta, tadudakaṃ pāṇḍarīkuryāt / evaṃ	vastreNa parivezwyaH udake prakzipya ita, tat udakam pANxarIkuryAt / evam
   sacennīlena pītena lohitena māñjiṣṭhena eteṣāmanyeṣāṃ vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ	saced nIlena pItena lohitena mAQjizWena etezAm anyezAm vA nAnA prakArANAm
   vastrāṇāmanyatamena vastreṇa tanmaṇiratnaṃ veṣṭayitvā vā baddhvā vā udake	vastrANAm anyatamena vastreNa tat maNi ratnam vezwayitvA vA badDvA vA udake
   prakṣipyeta, tena tena vastrarāgeṇa tattatsvabhāvavarṇaṃ tadudakaṃ kuryāt	prakzipya ita, tena tena vastra rAgeNa tad tad svaBAva varNam tat udakam kuryAt 
   / yo 'pi tasyodakasya kaluṣabhāvastam api prasādayet / ebhir api bhagavan	/ yaH api tasya udakasya kaluza BAvaH tam api prasAdayet / eBiH api Bagavan
   evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet //	evaMrUpEH guNEH samanvAgatam tat maNi ratnam Bavet //
   atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   kiṃ punaḥ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn AnandaH Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  kim punar 
   kauśika devaloka (Vaidya 50) eva tāni maṇiratnāni santi, uta	kOSika deva loke (VEdyaH 50) eva tAni maNi ratnAni santi, uta
   jāmbūdvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ tāni maṇiratnāni santi? śakra āha  	jAmbUdvIpakAnAm api manuzyANAm tAni maNi ratnAni santi? SakraH Aha  
   deveṣvāryānanda tāni maṇiratnāni santi / api tu khalu punarjāmbudvīpakānām	devezu Ari Ananda tAni maNi ratnAni santi / api tu Kalu punar jAmbudvIpakAnAm
   api manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni santi / tāni tu gurukāṇi alpāni parīttāni	api manuzyANAm maNi ratnAni santi / tAni tu gurukANi alpAni parIttAni
   guṇavikalāni, na taistathārūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatāni / tatteṣāṃ divyānāṃ	guNa vikalAni, na tEH taTArUpEH guNEH samanvAgatAni / tat tezAm divyAnAm
   maṇiratnānāṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti, sahasratamīmapi,	maNi ratnAnAm SatatamIm api kalAm na upayAnti, sahasratamIm api,
   śatasahasratamīmapi, koṭītamīmapi, koṭīśatatamīmapi, koṭīsahasratamīmapi,	Sata sahasratamIm api, kowItamIm api, kowI SatatamIm api, kowI sahasratamIm api,
   koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi, koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti,	kowI Sata sahasratamIm api, kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm api kalAm na upayAnti,
   saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api	saMKyAm api kalAm api gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam api upanisAm api
   upaniṣadam api na kṣamante nopayānti / yāni khalu punardeveṣu, tāni	upanizadam api na kzamante na upayAnti / yAni Kalu punar deva izu, tAni
   laghūni sarvākāraguṇaparipūrṇāni / yatra ca karaṇḍake tanmaṇiratnaṃ	laGUni sarva AkAra guNa paripUrNAni / yatra ca karaNxake tat maNi ratnam
   prakṣiptaṃ bhavati utkṣiptaṃ vā, tata uddhṛte 'pi tasmin maṇiratne	prakziptam Bavati utkziptam vA, tatas udDRte api tasmin maNi ratne
   karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīya eva sa karaṇḍako bhavati / tairmaṇiratnaguṇaiḥ parā	karaNxakAt spRhaNIyaH eva sa karaNxakaH Bavati / tEH maNi ratna guNEH parA
   tatra karaṇḍake spṛhotpadyate / evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā ete	tatra karaNxake spRhA utpadyate / evam eva Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH ete
   guṇāḥ sarvajñajñānasya ca / yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ	guNAH sarvajQa jQAnasya ca / yena parinirvRtasya api taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante  	samyaksaMbudDasya tAni taTAgata SarIrANi pUjAm laBante  
   sarvajñajñānasyemāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanabhūtānyabhūvanniti / yathā	sarvajQa jQAnasya imAni taTAgata SarIrANi BAjana BUtAni aBUvan= iti / yaTA
   ca bhagavan sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā	ca Bagavan sarva loka DAtuzu budDAnAm BagavatAm Darma deSanA
   prajñāpāramitānirjātatvātpūjyā, evaṃ dharmabhāṇakasya dharmadeśanā	prajQApAramitA nirjAta tvAt pUjyA, evam Darma BANakasya Darma deSanA
   prajñāpāramitānirjātatvātpūjyā / yathā ca bhagavan rājapuruṣo	prajQApAramitA nirjAta tvAt pUjyA / yaTA ca Bagavan rAja puruzaH 
   rājānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ, evaṃ sa dharmabhāṇako	rAja anuBAvAt mahataH jana kAyasya akutoBayaH pUjyaH, evam sa Darma BANakaH 
   dharmakāyānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ / yathā ca	DarmakAya anuBAvAt mahataH jana kAyasya akutoBayaH pUjyaH / yaTA ca
   dharmadeśanā dharmabhāṇakāś ca pūjāṃ labhante, evaṃ tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi	Darma deSanAH Darma BANakAH ca pUjAm laBante, evam tAni taTAgata SarIrANi
   pūjāṃ labhante / tasmāttarhi bhagavan tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro	pUjAm laBante / tasmAt tarhi Bagavan tizWatu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH 
   lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ, ye 'pi bhagavan	lokaDAtuH taTAgata SarIrANAm paripUrNaH cUlikA badDaH, ye api Bagavan
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ, te 'pi sarve tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH lokaDAtavaH, te api sarve taTAgata SarIrANAm
   paripūrṇāścūlikābaddhā eko bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā	paripUrNAH cUlikA badDAH ekaH BAgaH sTApyeta, iyam ca prajQApAramitA
   likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta / tatra cenmāṃ bhagavan kaścideva	liKitvA dvitIyaH BAgaH sTApyeta / tatra ced mAm Bagavan kaScid eva
   pravārayedanyatareṇa bhāgena, pravāryamāṇo 'nayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ  	pravArayet anyatareNa BAgena, pravAryamANaH anayoH BAgayoH sTApitayoH  
   yaste bhāgo 'bhipretaḥ tamekaṃ bhāgaṃ parigṛhṇīṣveti, tatra imāmevāhaṃ	yaH te BAgaH aBipretaH tam ekam BAgam parigRhNIzva iti, tatra imAm eva aham
   bhagavaṃstayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yaduta	Bagavan= tayoH dvayoH BAgayoH sTApitayoH BAgam gRhNIyAm yat uta
   prajñāpāramitām / na khalu punarbhagavan mama teṣu	prajQApAramitAm / na Kalu punar Bagavat mama tezu
   tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam / gauravameva bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣu /	taTAgata SarIrezu agOravam / gOravam eva Bagavan= tezu taTAgata SarIrezu /
   api tu khalu punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitā sarvajñatā,	api tu Kalu punar Bagavan prajQApAramitA pariBAvitA sarvajQa tA,
   sarvajñatānirjātā ca tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhavati / tasmāttarhi	sarvajQa tA nirjAtA ca taTAgata SarIrANAm pUjA Bavati / tasmAt tarhi
   bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ	Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm pUjitAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ pūjā kṛtā bhavati //	BagavatAm pUjA kRtA Bavati //
   punaraparaṃ bhagavan ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanta	punar aparam Bagavan ye aprameyezu asaMKyezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH Bagavanta
   etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, tān dharmatayā draṣṭukāmena	etarhi tizWanti Driyante yApayanti, tAn Darma tayA drazwu kAmena
   kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,	kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam,
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpattavyam / prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā //	prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apattavyam / prajQApAramitA BAvayitavyA //
   evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   evametatkauśika, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  evam etat kOSika, evam
   etat / ye 'pi te kauśika abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ	etat / ye api te kOSika aBUvan= atIte aDvani taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi kauśika	samyaksaMbudDAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH, te api kOSika
   imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /	imAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH /
   (Vaidya 51) ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā	(VEdyaH 51) ye api te kOSika Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani taTAgatA
   arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH, te api kOSikaH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante / ye 'pi te kauśika etarhi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante / ye api te kOSika etarhi
   aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante	aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti, te 'pi kauśika buddhā bhagavantaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	yApayanti, te api kOSika budDAH BagavantaH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ / aham api kauśika etarhi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH / aham api kOSika etarhi
   tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ	taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   mahāpāramiteyaṃ	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  mahA pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā / sarvasattvānāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgato	Bagavan yat uta prajQApAramitA / sarva sattvAnAm hi Bagavan= taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaścittacaritāni samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati /	arhan samyaksaMbudDaH citta caritAni samyak prajAnAti saMpaSyati /
   bhagavānāha   evametatkauśika, evam etat / tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo	BagavAn Aha  evam etat kOSika, evam etat / taTA hi kOSika boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tena sarvasattvānāṃ	mahAsattvaH dIrGarAtram prajQApAramitAyAm carati, tena sarva sattvAnAm
   cittacaritāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati //	citta caritAni prajQApAramitAyAm samyak prajAnAti saMpaSyati //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   kiṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  kim Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?	prajQApAramitAyAm eva boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati na anyAsu pAramitAsu?
   bhagavānāha   sarvāsu kauśika ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bodhisattvo	BagavAn Aha  sarvAsu kOSika zawsu pAramitAsu boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaścarati / api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva atra	mahAsattvaH carati / api tu Kalu punar kOSika prajQApAramitA eva atra
   pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ vā dadataḥ, śīlaṃ vā	pUrvaMgamA boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAnam vA dadataH, SIlam vA
   rakṣataḥ, kṣāntyā vā saṃpādayamānasya, vīryaṃ vā ārabhamāṇasya, dhyānaṃ vā	rakzataH, kzAntyA vA saMpAdayamAnasya, vIryam vA AraBamANasya, DyAnam vA
   samāpadyamānasya, dharmān vā vipaśyataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	samApadyamAnasya, DarmAn vA vipaSyataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitaivātra pūrvaṃgamā / na ca kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ	prajQApAramitA eva atra pUrvaMgamA / na ca kOSikaH AsAm zaNNAm
   pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ	pAramitAnAm upAya kOSalya parigRhItAnAm prajQApAramitA pariNAmitAnAm
   sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ viśeṣaḥ, na ca nānākaraṇamupalabhyate / tadyathāpi	sarvajQa tA pariNAmitAnAm viSezaH, na ca nAnA karaNam upalaByate / tat yaTA api
   nāma kauśika jambudvīpe nānāvṛkṣā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāpatrā	nAma kOSika jambudvIpe nAnA vRkzAH nAnA varNA nAnA saMsTAnA nAnA patrA
   nānāpuṣpā nānāphalā nānārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāḥ, na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ	nAnA puzpAH nAnA PalAH nAnA Aroha pariNAha saMpannAH, na ca tezAm vRkzANAm
   chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate, api tu chāyā chāyetyevaṃ	CAyAyAH viSezaH vA nAnA karaNam vA prajQAyate, api tu CAyA CAyA iti evam
   saṃkhyāṃ gacchati, evameva kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ	saMKyAm gacCati, evam eva kOSikaH AsAm zaNNAm
   pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ	pAramitAnAm upAya kOSalya parigRhItAnAm prajQApAramitA pariNAmitAnAm
   sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ, na ca nānākaraṇamupalabhyate /	sarvajQa tA pariNAmitAnAm na viSezaH, na ca nAnA karaNam upalaByate /
   evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   mahāguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  mahA guNa samanvAgatA iyam
   bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā / aprameyaguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan	Bagavan yat uta prajQApAramitA / aprameya guNa samanvAgatA iyam Bagavan
   yaduta prajñāpāramitā / aparyantaguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan yaduta	yat uta prajQApAramitA / aparyanta guNa samanvAgatA iyam Bagavan yat uta
   prajñāpāramiteti //	prajQApAramitA iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ guṇaparikīrtanaparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm guNa parikIrtana parivartaH nAma
   caturthaḥ //	caturTaH //
   (Vaidya 52)	(VEdyaH 52)
   ASP_5: puṇyaparyāyaparivartaḥ pañcamaḥ /	ASP_5: puNya paryAya parivartaH paQcamaH /
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   yo bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  yaH Bagavan
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya	prajQApAramitAm aBiSraddaDat avakalpayan= aDimucya prasanna cittaH boDAya
   cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt	cittam utpAdya aDyASayataH SRNuyAt udgRhNIyAt DArayet vAcayet paryavApnuyAt 
   pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa	pravartayet deSayet upadiSet uddiSet svADyAyet, pareByaH ca vistareNa
   saṃprakāśayet, arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca	saMprakASayet, arTam asyAH vivRNuyAt, manasA anvavekzeta, yaTA aDikayA ca
   prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta, antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā	prajQayA atra parimImAMsAm Apadyeta, antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA
   dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ   mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,	DArayet sTApayet sat Darma cira sTiti hetoH  mA budDa netrI samucCedaH BUt,
   mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca	mA sadDarma antarDAnam / boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm ca
   anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti / evamimaṃ nirdeśaṃ	anugraha upasaMhAraH kRtaH Bavizyati netryavEkalyena iti / evam imam nirdeSam
   śrutvā evaṃmahārthikā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, evaṃmahānuśaṃsā,	SrutvA evaMmahArTikA bata iyam prajQApAramitA, evaMmahA anuSaMsA,
   evaṃmahāphalā, evaṃmahāvipākā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, evaṃ	evaMmahA PalA, evaMmahA vipAkAH bata iyam prajQApAramitA, evam
   bahuguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, aparityajanīyā mayā prajñāpāramitā,	bahu guNa samanvAgatA iyam prajQApAramitA, aparityajanIyAH mayA prajQApAramitA,
   rakṣitavyā mama prajñāpāramitā, gopāyitavyā mama prajñāpāramitā,	rakzitavyA mama prajQApAramitA, gopAyitavyA mama prajQApAramitA,
   paramadurlabhā hīyaṃ prajñāpāramitetyadhimuñcet / svayameva caināṃ	parama durlaBA hi iyam prajQApAramitA iti aDimuQcet / svayam eva ca enAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ	prajQApAramitAm
   satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyetpuṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ	satkuryAt gurukuryAt mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet puzpEH DUpEH ganDEH mAlyEH vilepanEH cUrNEH vastrEH CatrEH DvajEH GaNwABiH
   patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ yo vā anyaḥ	patAkABiH, samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH yaH vE anyaH
   saṃpūjya parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā	saMpUjya parasmE ca arTikAya CandikAya kula putrAya kula duhitre vA
   yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajet, antaśaḥ pustakagatām api	yAcamAnAya dadyAt upanAmayet niryAtayet parityajet, antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā / katarastayorbhagavan kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	kRtvA / kataraH tayoH Bagavan kula putrayoH kula duhitroH vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet   yo vā parityāgabuddhiryo vā na parityāgabuddhiḥ? evamukte	prasavet  yaH vA parityAga budDiH yaH vA na parityAga budDiH? evam ukte
   bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra	BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  tena hi kOSika tvAm eva atra
   pratiprakṣyāmi / yathā te kṣamate vyākuryāḥ / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yaḥ	pratiprakzyAmi / yaTA te kzamate vyAkuryAH / tat kim manyase kOSika yaH
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śarīraṃ satkṛtya	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA taTAgatasya parinirvRtasya SarIram satkRtya
   paricareddhārayet satkuryādgurukuryānmānayet pūjayedarcayedapacāyet	paricaret DArayet satkuryAt gurukuryAt mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet 
   svayameva / yo vā anyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīraṃ svayaṃ	svayam eva / yaH vE anyaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA taTAgata SarIram svayam
   ca satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet, parebhyaś ca	ca satkuryAt gurukuryAt mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet, pareByaH ca
   vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet, dadyāt saṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti	vistareNa saMprakASayet, dadyAt saMviBajet vEstArikI pUjA Bavizyati iti
   sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya / katarastayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ	sattvAnAm ca anukampAm upAdAya / kataraH tayoH dvayoH kula putrayoH
   kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet? kiṃ yaḥ svayaṃ ca pūjayet	kula duhitroH vA bahutaram puNyam prasavet? kim yaH svayam ca pUjayet 
   parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyāt saṃvibhajet, kiṃ vā yaḥ	pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayet dadyAt saMviBajet, kim vA yaH
   svayameva pratyātmaṃ pūjayet? śakra āha   yo bhagavan kulaputro vā	svayam eva pratyAtmam pUjayet? SakraH Aha  yaH Bagavan kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ ca tathāgataśarīraṃ	kula duhitA vA svayam ca taTAgata SarIram
   satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa	satkuryAt gurukuryAt mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet, pareByaH ca vistareNa
   saṃprakāśayeddadyātsaṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ	saMprakASayet dadyAt saMviBajet vEstArikI pUjA Bavizyati iti sattvAnAm
   cānukampāmupādāya, ayamevānayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā	ca anukampAm upAdAya, ayam eva anayoH dvayoH kula putrayoH kula duhitroH vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati / bhagavānāha   evametatkauśika, evam etat /	bahutaram puNyam prasavati / BagavAn Aha  evam etat kOSika, evam etat /
   evametatkauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	evam etat kOSika yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm
   likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt	liKitvA pustaka gatAm kRtvA udgRhNIyAt DArayet vAcayet paryavApnuyAt 
   pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet, parasmai cārthikāya	pravartayet deSayet upadiSet uddiSet svADyAyet, parasmE ca arTikAya
   chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya	CandikAya kula putrAya kula duhitre vA yAcamAnAya
   dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajedantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā /	dadyAt upanAmayet niryAtayet parityajet antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA /
   ayameva kauśika tayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ (Vaidya 53) kuladuhitrorvā	ayam eva kOSika tayoH dvayoH kula putrayoH (VEdyaH 53) kula duhitroH vA
   parānugrahakaraḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parityāgabuddhistannidānaṃ	para anugraha karaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA parityAga budDiH tad nidAnam
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	bahutaram puNyam prasavati //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra	punar aparam kOSika yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA yatra yatra
   bhājanībhūtāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā syuḥ asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,	BAjanIBUtAH kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA syuH asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH,
   tatra tatra gatvā tebhyaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,	tatra tatra gatvA teByaH imAm prajQApAramitAm dadyAt saMviBAgam kuryAt ,
   ayameva kauśika tataḥ kulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	ayam eva kOSika tatas kula putrAt kula duhituH vA sakASAt bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet //	prasavet //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye jambūdvīpe	punar aparam kOSika yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA ye jambUdvIpe
   sattvāstān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayet pratiṣṭhāpayet,	sattvAH tAn sarvAn daSasu kuSalezu karma paTezu samAdApayet pratizWApayet ,
   tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ	tat kim manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam
   bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha	bahu puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha
     ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,	 atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam prasavet ,
   yaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā	yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA
   abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimucyate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcannaDim ucyate, prasanna cittaH prasanna cittAya aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpyakilāsitayā	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api akila asitayA
   saṃpādayet   udyukto 'muṃ grāhayet saṃdarśayet samādāpayet samuttejayet	saMpAdayet  udyuktaH amum grAhayet saMdarSayet samAdApayet samuttejayet 
   saṃpraharṣayet, vācā neṣyati vineṣyati, arthamasyā asmai	saMpraharzayet, vAcA nezyati vinezyati, arTam asyAH asmE
   saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ	saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam
   kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva	karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi tvam kula putra asmin= eva
   bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ	boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH
   kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca	kzipram eva anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca
   aparimitaṃ sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	aparimitam sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / ayam kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   parityāgabuddhyā tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ	parityAga budDyA tatas pOrvakAt kula putrAt kula duhituH vA sakASAt bahutaram
   puṇyaṃ prasavet / tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpe sarvasattvāḥ,	puNyam prasavet / tizWantu Kalu punar kOSika jambUdvIpe sarva sattvAH,
   etena kauśika paryāyeṇa ye 'pi te kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau	etena kOSika paryAyeNa ye api te kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu	sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA daSasu

   kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ	kuSalezu karma paTezu samAdApayet pratizWApayet / tizWantu Kalu punar
