   kauśika paryāyeṇa yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu	kOSika paryAyeNa yAvantaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu
   lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa	caturzu DyAnezu pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase kOSika api nu sa
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha  	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  
   bahu bhagavan bahu sugata //	bahu Bagavan bahu sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimucyate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcannaDim ucyate, prasanna cittaH prasanna cittAya aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayet, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayet saṃdarśayet samādāpayet	akila asitayA saMpAdayet, udyuktaH amum grAhayet saMdarSayet samAdApayet 
   samuttejayeta saṃpraharṣayet, vācā neṣyati, vineṣyati anuneṣyati,	samuttejayeta saMpraharzayet, vAcA nezyati, vinezyati anunezyati,
   arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati,	arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati,
   nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra	nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi tvam kula putra
   asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran	asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam SikzamANaH caran
   vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /	vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase /
   abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye	aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye
   'bhivineṣyasi yaduta bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / punaraparaṃ kauśika	aBivinezyasi yat uta BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / punar aparam kOSika
   yāvanto jambudvīpe sattvāḥ, tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	yAvantaH jambudvIpe sattvAH, tAn sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA
   vā caturṣu apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet, evaṃ peyālena kartavyam / yathā	vA caturzu apramANezu pratizWApayet, evam peyAlena kartavyam / yaTA
   caturṣvapramāṇeṣu, evaṃ catasṛṣvārūpyasamāpattiṣu, pañcasvabhijñāsu,	caturzu apramANa izu, evam catasRzu ArUpya samApattizu, paQcasu aBijQAsu,
   yāvatsamastāsu dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet /	yAvat samastAsu DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApayet /
   tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ	tat kim manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam
   bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan bahu sugata //	bahu puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan bahu sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimucyate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcannaDim ucyate, prasanna cittaH prasanna cittAya aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃgrāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amuMgrAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati	samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati
   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā (Vaidya 56) asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH (VEdyaH 56) asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam
   cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati	ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati
     ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ	 ehi tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika jAmbUdvIpakAn
   sarvasattvān dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya	sarva sattvAn DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, anena paryāyeṇa ye 'pi te kauśika cāturmahādvīpake	puNya aBisaMskAraH, anena paryAyeNa ye api te kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake
   lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvān	kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye	DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, ye
   'pi te kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	api te kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu
   pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau	pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO
   sarvasattvān dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāttyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya	sarva sattvAn DyAna apramANA rUpya samAtti aBijQAsu pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye 'pi te kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, ye api te kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvān	kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye	DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, ye
   'pi te kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān	api te kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn
   kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu	kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu
   pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre	pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre
   lokadhātau sarvasattvān dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya	lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, anena paryāyeṇa ye 'pi kecitkauśika	puNya aBisaMskAraH, anena paryAyeNa ye api kecid kOSika
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api
   sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase	DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti aBijQAsu pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase
   kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ	kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam
   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan bahu sugata //	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan bahu sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimucyate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcannaDim ucyate, prasanna cittaH prasanna cittAya aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati	samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati
   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya
   cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi	cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi
   tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ	tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi, yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi, yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti //	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti //
   (Vaidya 57) punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ	(VEdyaH 57) punar aparam kOSika yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā svayaṃ ca vācayet, parebhyaś ca likhitvā	prajQApAramitAm liKitvA svayam ca vAcayet, pareByaH ca liKitvA
   pūrvavaddadyāt, ayatnataḥ kauśika pūrvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā	pUrvavat dadyAt, ayatnataH kOSika pUrvakAt kula putrAt kula duhituH vA
   sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā	sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet / punar aparam kOSika yaH kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmarthakuśalo vācayet, parebhyaś ca	kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm arTa kuSalaH vAcayet, pareByaH ca
   likhitvā pūrvavaddadyāt, sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet paridīpayet,	liKitvA pUrvavat dadyAt, sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet paridIpayet ,
   ayatnataḥ kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet	ayatnataH kOSika sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam prasavet 
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   iyam api bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  iyam api Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā upadeṣṭavyāḥ? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ	prajQApAramitAH upadezwavyAH? evam ukte BagavAn Sakram
   devānāmindrametadavocat   iyam api kauśika prajñāpāramitā upadeṣṭavyā	devAnAm indram etat avocat  iyam api kOSika prajQApAramitA upadezwavyA
   abudhyamānasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā / tatkasya hetoḥ? utpatsyate	abuDyamAnasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA / tat kasya hetoH? utpatsyate
   hi kauśika anāgate 'dhvani prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā / tatra abudhyamānaḥ	hi kOSika anAgate aDvani prajQApAramitA prativarNikA / tatra abuDyamAnaH
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo mā	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmaH mA
   praṇaṃkṣīttāṃ prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikāṃ śrutvā //	praNaMkzIt tAm prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm SrutvA //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   kathaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  kaTam Bagavan
   anāgate 'dhvani prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā veditavyā   iyaṃ sā	anAgate aDvani prajQApAramitA prativarNikA veditavyA  iyam sA
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikopadiśyata iti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ	prajQApAramitA prativarNikA upadiSyate iti? evam ukte BagavAn Sakram
   devānāmindrametadavocat   bhaviṣyanti kauśika anāgate 'dhvani eke	devAnAm indram etat avocat  Bavizyanti kOSika anAgate aDvani eke
   bhikṣavaḥ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitaśīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñā	BikzavaH aBAvitakAyAH aBAvita SIlAH aBAvita cittA aBAvita prajQA
   eḍamūkajātīyā prajñāparihīṇāḥ / te prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyāma iti tasyāḥ	examUka jAtIyA prajQA parihINAH / te prajQApAramitAm upadekzyAmaH iti tasyAH
   prativarṇikāmupadekṣyanti / kathaṃ ca kauśika	prativarNikAm upadekzyanti / kaTam ca kOSika
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāmupadekṣyanti? rūpavināśo	prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti? rUpa vinASaH 
   rūpānityatetyupadekṣyanti / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānavināśo	rUpa anitya tA iti upadekzyanti / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAna vinASaH 
   vijñānānityatetyupadekṣyanti / evaṃ copadekṣyanti   ya evaṃ gaveṣayiṣyati,	vijQAna anitya tA iti upadekzyanti / evam ca upadekzyanti  yaH evam gavezayizyati,
   sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyatīti / iyaṃ sā kauśika	sa prajQApAramitAyAm carizyati iti / iyam sA kOSika
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā veditavyā / na khalu punaḥ kauśika rūpavināśo	prajQApAramitA prativarNikA veditavyA / na Kalu punar kOSika rUpa vinASaH 
   rūpānityatā draṣṭavyā / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / na khalu punaḥ	rUpa anitya tA drazwavyA / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / na Kalu punar 
   kauśika vijñānavināśo vijñānānityatā draṣṭavyā / sacedevaṃ paśyati,	kOSika vijQAna vinASaH vijQAna anitya tA drazwavyA / saced evam paSyati,
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ carati / tasmāttarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā	prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm carati / tasmAt tarhi kOSika kula putreNa vA
   kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyā artha upadeṣṭavyaḥ / prajñāpāramitāyā	kula duhitrA vA prajQApAramitAyAH arTaH upadezwavyaH / prajQApAramitAyAH 
   arthamupadiśan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //	arTam upadiSan kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam prasavet //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, tān sarvān kaścideva	punar aparam kOSika yAvantaH jambUdvIpe sattvAH, tAn sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayet / tat kim
   manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu	manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu
   puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha  	puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  
   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā	prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA
   abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati (Vaidya 58) samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā	samAdApayizyati (VEdyaH 58) samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA
   neṣyati vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ	nezyati vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam
   cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati	ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati
     ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ	 ehi tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase, aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta   eteṣāmeva tvaṃ	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  etezAm eva tvam
   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti /
   ayameva kauśika tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā	ayam eva kOSika tatas pOrvakAt kula putrataH kula duhitRtaH vA
   sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   srotaāpattiphalaṃ prabhāvyate //	srotaApatti Palam praBAvyate //
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sarvasattvān srotaāpattiphale	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika jAmbUdvIpakAn sarva sattvAn srotaApatti Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake	pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake
   lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet //	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayet //
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvān	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika sAhasre
   cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā	cUlike lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet //	kula duhitA vA srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayet //
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvān	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro	dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH 
   vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet //	vA kula duhitA vA srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayet //
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvān	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet //	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayet //
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api
   sarvān kaścideva kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale	sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH va kula duhitA vA srotaApatti Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA
   vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu	vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu
   sugata //	sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati	samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati
   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya
   cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ (Vaidya 59) cainaṃ	cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam (VEdyaH 59) ca enam
   vakṣyati   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra	vakzyati  ehi tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra
   hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	hi tvam SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta   eteṣām api tvaṃ	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  etezAm api tvam
   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti /
   ayameva kauśika tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā	ayam eva kOSika tatas pOrvakAt kula putrataH kula duhitRtaH vA
   sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   srotaāpattiphalaṃ prabhāvyate //	srotaApatti Palam praBAvyate //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto	punar aparam kOSika yaH hi kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA yAvantaH 
   jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, tān sarvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ	jambUdvIpe sattvAH, tAn sarvAn sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tat kim
   manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu	manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu
   puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha  	puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  
   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā	prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA
   abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāyādhyaśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi akilāsitayā	boDisattvAya aDya Sayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api akila asitayA
   saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati samadāpayiṣyati	saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati samadApayizyati
   samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati vineṣyati anuneṣyati,	samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati vinezyati anunezyati,
   arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati,	arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati,
   nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra	nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi tvam kula putra
   asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran	asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam SikzamANaH caran
   vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /	vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase /
   abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye	aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye
   'bhivineṣyasi yaduta bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta  	aBivinezyasi yat uta BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  
   eteṣāmeva tvaṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta	etezAm eva tvam kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti / ayameva kauśika tataḥ	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti / ayam eva kOSika tatas 
   paurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /	pOrvakAt kula putrataH kula duhitRtaH vA sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvyate / tiṣṭhatu	tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika sakRdAgAmi Palam praBAvyate / tizWatu
   khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sarvasattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale	Kalu punar kOSika jAmbUdvIpakAn sarva sattvAn sakRdAgAmi Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake	pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake
   lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika	sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika
   cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasatvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya	cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sarva satvAn sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApya
   puṇyabhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau (Vaidya 60)	puNyaBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO (VEdyaH 60)
   sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre	sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre
   cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya	cUlike lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhātu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre	sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tizWAtu Kalu punar kOSika dvi sAhasre
   madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya	maDyame lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika	sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika
   trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase
   kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ	kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam
   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata //	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH //

   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati	samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati
   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya
   cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi	cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi
   tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ	tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta   eteṣāmeva tvaṃ	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  etezAm eva tvam
   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti /
   ayameva kauśika tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā	ayam eva kOSika tatas pOrvakAt kula putrataH kula duhitRtaH vA
   sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvyate //	sakRdAgAmi Palam praBAvyate //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto	punar aparam kOSika yaH hi kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA yAvantaH 
   jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, tān sarvānanāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase	jambUdvIpe sattvAH, tAn sarvAn anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase
   kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ	kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam
   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan bahu sugata //	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan bahu sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati	samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati
   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya
   cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi	cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi
   tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ	tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ (Vaidya 61)	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm (VEdyaH 61)
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta   eteṣāmevaṃ tvaṃ	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  etezAm evam tvam
   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava, yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava, yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti
   / ayameva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	/ ayam eva tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   anāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvyate / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpakān	anAgAmi Palam praBAvyate / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika jambUdvIpakAn
   sarvasattvānanāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	sarva sattvAn anAgAmi Pale pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   caturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā	catur mahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika	kula duhitA vA anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika
   cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvānanāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya	cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn anAgAmi Pale pratizWApya

   api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anāgāmiphale	api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anAgAmi Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau	pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO
   sarvasattvānanāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	sarva sattvAn anAgAmi Pale pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro	dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH 
   vā kuladuhitā vā anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	vA kula duhitA vA anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvānanāgāmiphale	kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn anAgAmi Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre	pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre
   lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA

   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase

   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata //	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA

   pustakagatām api kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate,	pustaka gatAm api kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate,
   avakalpayannavakalpayate, adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ	avakalpayan= avakalpayate, aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH
   prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno 'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya	prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya
   cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt,	cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt ,
   antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ	antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum
   grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati	grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati
   saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai	saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE
   saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ	saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam
   kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva	karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi tvam kula putra asmin= eva
   bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ	boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH

   / ayameva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	/ ayam eva tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   anāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvyate //	anAgAmi Palam praBAvyate //
   (Vaidya 62) punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va	(VEdyaH 62) punar aparam kOSika yaH hi kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA va
   yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, tān api sarvānarhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ	yAvantaH jambUdvIpe sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn arhat tve pratizWApayet / tat kim
   manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu	manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu
   puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha  	puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  
   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā	prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA
   abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,

   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya

   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti /
   ayameva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	ayam eva tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   arhattvaṃ prabhāvyate / evaṃ cāsya utsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyati   yathā yathā hi	arhat tvam praBAvyate / evam ca asya utsAham varDayizyati  yaTA yaTA hi
   tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyase, tathā tathā tvamanupūrveṇa	tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzizyase, taTA taTA tvam anupUrveNa
   buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi, āsannaś ca bhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāḥ	budDa DarmANAm lABI Bavizyasi, AsannaH ca Bavizyasi anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ	samyaksaMboDeH / atra hi tvam SikzAyAm SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH
   srotaāpattiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi,	srotaApatti Palam praBAvayizyasi, sakRdAgAmi Palam praBAvayizyasi,

   pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, samyaksaṃbuddhatvaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasīti	pratyekabudDa tvam praBAvayizyasi, samyaksaMbudDa tvam praBAvayizyasi iti
   / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sarvasattvānarhatve	/ tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika jAmbUdvIpakAn sarva sattvAn arha tve
   pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake	pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake
   lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake	arhat tve pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake
   lokadhātau sarvasattvānarhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ	lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn arhat tve pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH
   kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA arhat tve pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvānarhattve pratiṣṭhāpya	kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn arhat tve pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā arhattve	sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA arhat tve
   pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame	pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame
   lokadhātau sarvasattvānarhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ	lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn arhat tve pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH
   kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA arhat tve pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvānarhattve pratiṣṭhāpya	kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn arhat tve pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu (Vaidya 63)	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu (VEdyaH 63)
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ manyase	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA arhat tve pratizWApayet / tat kim manyase
   kauśike api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ	kOSike api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam
   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / saṃkhyā api	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / saMKyAH api
   bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum / gaṇanāpi upamāpi	Bagavan= tasya puNya skanDasya na sukarA kartum / gaNanA api upamA api
   aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na	Opamyam api upanisA api upanizad api Bagavan= tasya puNya skanDasya na
   sukarā kartum //	sukarA kartum //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, samādāpayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, samAdApayizyati
   samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati vineṣyati anuneṣyati,	samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati vinezyati anunezyati,
   arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati,	arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati,
   nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra	nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi tvam kula putra
   asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran	asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam SikzamANaH caran
   vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /	vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase /
   abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye	aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye
   'bhivineṣyasi yaduta bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta  	aBivinezyasi yat uta BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  
   eteṣāmeva tvaṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava, yaduta	etezAm eva tvam kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava, yat uta
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti / ayameva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti / ayam eva tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavet 
   / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika arhattvaṃ prabhāvyate / evaṃ ca	/ tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika arhat tvam praBAvyate / evam ca
   asyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyati   yathā yathā hi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	asya utsAham varDayizyati  yaTA yaTA hi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣiṣyase, tathā tathā tvamanupūrveṇa buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi,	Sikzizyase, taTA taTA tvam anupUrveNa budDa DarmANAm lABI Bavizyasi,
   āsannaś ca bhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣāyāṃ	AsannaH ca Bavizyasi anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / atra hi tvam SikzAyAm
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi,	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH srotaApatti Palam praBAvayizyasi,
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, anāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, arhattvaṃ	sakRdAgAmi Palam praBAvayizyasi, anAgAmi Palam praBAvayizyasi, arhat tvam
   prabhāvayiṣyasi, pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, samyaksaṃbuddhatvaṃ	praBAvayizyasi, pratyekabudDa tvam praBAvayizyasi, samyaksaMbudDa tvam
   prabhāvayiṣyasi / iti //	praBAvayizyasi / iti //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	punar aparam kOSika yAvantaH jambUdvIpe sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayet / tat kim
   manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu	manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu
   puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugataḥ / bhagavānāha  	puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  
   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā	prasavet yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api kRtvA
   abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt, antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, udyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, udyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   (Vaidya 64) samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā	(VEdyaH 64) samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA
   neṣyati vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ	nezyati vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam
   cāsya cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati	ca asya cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati
     ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva / atra hi tvaṃ	 ehi tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva / atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam
   sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta	sattvaDAtum anuttare upaDi saMkzaye aBivinezyasi yat uta
   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta   eteṣāmeva tvaṃ	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  etezAm eva tvam
   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti /
   ayameva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	ayam eva tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prabhāvyate / evaṃ cāsyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyati   yathā	pratyekabudDa tvam praBAvyate / evam ca asya utsAham varDayizyati  yaTA
   yathā hi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyase, tathā tathā	yaTA hi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzizyase, taTA taTA
   tvamanupūrveṇa buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi, āsannaś ca	tvam anupUrveNa budDa DarmANAm lABI Bavizyasi, AsannaH ca
   bhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣāyāṃ	Bavizyasi anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / atra hi tvam SikzAyAm
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣiprameva srotaāpattiphalaṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva srotaApatti Palam
   prabhāvayiṣyasi, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, anāgāmiphalaṃ	praBAvayizyasi, sakRdAgAmi Palam praBAvayizyasi, anAgAmi Palam
   prabhāvayiṣyasi, arhattvaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, pratyekabuddhatvaṃ	praBAvayizyasi, arhat tvam praBAvayizyasi, pratyekabudDa tvam
   prabhāvayiṣyati, samyaksaṃbuddhatvaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasīti / tiṣṭhatu khalu	praBAvayizyati, samyaksaMbudDa tvam praBAvayizyasi iti / tizWatu Kalu
   punaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpakān sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpya	punar kOSika jambUdvIpakAn sarva sattvAn pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ,	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sattvAH,
   tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve	tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA pratyekabudDa tve
   pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake loakadhātau	pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake loakaDAtO
   sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ	sarva sattvAn pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH
   kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayet / tizWatu
   khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvān	Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn
   pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro	dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH 
   vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	vA kula duhitA vA pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhatve	kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn pratyekabudDa tve
   pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye 'pi kecitkauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre	pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, ye api kecid kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre
   lokadhātau sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	lokaDAtO sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika	pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika
   trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhatve	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sarva sattvAn pratyekabudDa tve
   pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	pratizWApya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, tān api sarvān kaścideva	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tAn api sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet / tatkiṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayet / tat kim
   manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu	manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu
   puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata //	puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm antaSas pustaka gatAm api
   kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate, avakalpayannavakalpayate,	kRtvA aBiSraddaDat aBiSraddaDate, avakalpayan= avakalpayate,
   adhimuñcannadhimuñcate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya, adhyāśayasaṃpanno	aDimuQcan= aDimuQcate, prasanna cittaH prasanna citta aya, aDyASaya saMpannaH 
   'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya	aDyASaya saMpannAya boDAya cittam utpAdya samutpAdita boDi cittAya
   bodhisattvāyādhyāśayena dadyāt, (Vaidya 65) antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi	boDisattvAya aDyASayena dadyAt, (VEdyaH 65) antaSas liKanAya api vAcanAya api
   akilāsitayā saṃpādayiṣyati, adyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati	akila asitayA saMpAdayizyati, adyuktaH amum grAhayizyati, saMdarSayizyati
   samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati, vācā neṣyati	samAdApayizyati samuttejayizyati saMpraharzayizyati, vAcA nezyati
   vineṣyati anuneṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃ cāsya	vinezyati anunezyati, arTam asyAH asmE saMprakASayizyati, evam ca asya
   cittaṃ viśodhayiṣyati, nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati   ehi	cittam viSoDayizyati, nirvicikitsam karizyati, evam ca enam vakzyati  ehi
   tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva   atra hi tvaṃ	tvam kula putra asmin= eva boDisattva mArge Sikzasva  atra hi tvam
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / aBisaMbuDya ca aparimitam

   bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti / evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta   eteṣāmeva tvaṃ	BUtakowi praBAvana tAyAm iti / evam ca vAcam BAzeta  etezAm eva tvam
   kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /	kula putra DarmANAm lABI Bava yat uta prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAnAm iti /
   ayameva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika	ayam eva tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? atas hi kOSika
   pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prabhāvyate / evaṃ cāsya utsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyasi   yathā	pratyekabudDa tvam praBAvyate / evam ca asya utsAham varDayizyasi  yaTA
   yathā hi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyase, tathā tathā	yaTA hi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzizyase, taTA taTA
   tvamanupūrveṇa buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi, āsannaś ca	tvam anupUrveNa budDa DarmANAm lABI Bavizyasi, AsannaH ca
   bhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / atra hi tvaṃ śikṣāyāṃ	Bavizyasi anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / atra hi tvam SikzAyAm
   śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi,	SikzamANaH caran vyAyacCamAnaH srotaApatti Palam praBAvayizyasi,
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, anāgāmiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi, arhattvaṃ	sakRdAgAmi Palam praBAvayizyasi, anAgAmi Palam praBAvayizyasi, arhat tvam
   prabhāvayiṣyasi, samyaksaṃbuddhatvaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasīti //	praBAvayizyasi, samyaksaMbudDa tvam praBAvayizyasi iti //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ kaścideva	punar aparam kOSika yAvantaH jambUdvIpe sattvAH, tezAm sarvezAm kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam
   samutpādayet, yaścānyaḥ kaścitkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ	samutpAdayet, yaH ca anyaH kaScid kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tezAm
   sarveṣāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya tebhya imāṃ	sarvezAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya teByaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dadyāt / yo vā kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	prajQApAramitAm liKitvA dadyAt / yaH vA kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   avinivartanīyāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā	avinivartanIyAya boDisattvAya mahAsattvAya enAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA
   upanāmayet, atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate, yogamāpatsyate / atraiva	upanAmayet, atra eva prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzizyate, yogam Apatsyate / atra eva
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāṃ gataḥ paripūrayiṣyati	prajQApAramitAm BAvayan vRdDim virUXim vipula tAm gataH paripUrayizyati
   buddhadharmāniti / ayaṃ tasmātpaurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā	budDa DarmAn iti / ayam tasmAt pOrvakAt kula putrataH kula duhitRtaH vA
   sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? niyatameṣo 'nuttarāṃ	sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? niyatam ezaH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti /	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya sattvAnAm duHKasya antam karizyati iti /
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika jAmbUdvIpakAnAm sarva sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ, teṣām api sarveṣāṃ kaścideva	cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sattvAH, tezAm api sarvezAm kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet /	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdayet /
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO
   sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,	sarva sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya puNya aBisaMskAraH,
   yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ, teṣām api sarveṣāṃ	yAvantaH kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO sattvAH, tezAm api sarvezAm
   kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   cittamutpādayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau	cittam utpAdayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO
   sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,	sarva sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya puNya aBisaMskAraH,
   yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ, teṣām api	yAvantaH kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sattvAH, tezAm api
   sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	sarvezAm kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   cittamutpādayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame	cittam utpAdayet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame
   lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya	lokaDAtO sarva sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, teṣām api sarveṣāṃ (Vaidya 66) kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	sattvAH, tezAm api sarvezAm (VEdyaH 66) kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA
   vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	vA anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdayet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ	kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sarva sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika	samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, teṣām	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, tezAm
   api sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ	api sarvezAm kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet / yaścānyaḥ kaścitkauśika kulaputro vā	samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdayet / yaH ca anyaH kaScid kOSika kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya	kula duhitA vA tezAm sarvezAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdya
   tebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dadyāt / yo vā kauśika kulaputro vā	teByaH imAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA dadyAt / yaH vA kOSika kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā avinivartanīyāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya enāṃ	kula duhitA vA avinivartanIyAya boDisattvAya mahAsattvAya enAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dadyāt, upanāmayet, atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAm liKitvA dadyAt, upanAmayet, atra eva prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣiṣyate, yogamāpatsyate / evamasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā	Sikzizyate, yogam Apatsyate / evam asya iyam prajQApAramitA BUyasyA mAtrayA
   bhāvanāṃ vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāṃ paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti / ayaṃ kauśiaka	BAvanAm vRdDim virUXim vipula tAm paripUrim gamizyati iti / ayam kOSiaka
   tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	tatas pOrvakAt kula putrataH kula duhitRtaH vA sakASAt bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet / tatkasya hetoḥ? niyatameṣo 'nuttarāṃ	prasavet / tat kasya hetoH? niyatam ezaH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya sattvAnAm duHKasya antam karizyati iti //
   punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, te sarve avinivartanīyā	punar aparam kOSika yAvantaH jambUdvIpe sattvAH, te sarve avinivartanIyA
   bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / tebhyaḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā	BaveyuH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / teByaH kaScid eva kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitebhya imāṃ	kula duhitA vA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTiteByaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet / yaś ca tebhyaḥ	prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA dadyAt upanAmayet / yaH ca teByaH
   kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ	kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm
   kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet, sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet / tatkiṃ manyase	kRtvA dadyAt upanAmayet, sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet / tat kim manyase
   kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ	kOSika api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam
   prasavet? śakra āha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / saṃkhyāpi	prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / saMKyA api
   bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum / gaṇanāpi upamāpi	Bagavan= tasya puNya skanDasya na sukarA kartum / gaNanA api upamA api
   aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na	Opamyam api upanisA api upanizad api Bagavan= tasya puNya skanDasya na
   sukarā kartum //	sukarA kartum //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH tezAm avinivartanIyAnAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya	mahAsattvAnAm kziprataram anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmeBya
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt, upanāmayet, sārthāṃ	imAm prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA dadyAt, upanAmayet, sArTAm
   savyañjanāmupadiśet, iha ca tān prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt	sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet, iha ca tAn prajQApAramitAyAm avavadet anuSizyAt 
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyo	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika jAmbUdvIpakeByaH sarva sattveByaH 
   'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,	avinivartanIyeByaH imAm prajQApAramitAm upanAmya puNya aBisaMskAraH,
   yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve	yAvantaH kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sattvAH, te api sarve
   'vinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / tebhyo 'pi kaścideva	avinivartanIyAH BaveyuH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / teByaH api kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA
   dadyādupanāmayet, sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	dadyAt upanAmayet, sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya	kOSika cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO sarva sattveByaH avinivartanIyeByaH 
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre	imAm prajQApAramitAm upanAmya puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika sAhasre
   cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve 'vinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ	cUlike lokaDAtO sattvAH, te api sarve avinivartanIyAH BaveyuH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ / tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ	samyaksaMboDeH / teByaH api kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā (Vaidya 67) dadyādupanāmayet,	prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA (VEdyaH 67) dadyAt upanAmayet,
   sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike	sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet / tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika sAhasre cUlike
   lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya	lokaDAtO sarva sattveByaH avinivartanIyeByaH imAm prajQApAramitAm upanAmya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve 'vinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /	sattvAH, te api sarve avinivartanIyAH BaveyuH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH /
   tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	teByaH api kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm
   pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet, sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet /	pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA dadyAt upanAmayet, sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet /
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO
   sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya	sarva sattveByaH avinivartanIyeByaH imAm prajQApAramitAm upanAmya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve 'vinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /	sattvAH, te api sarve avinivartanIyAH BaveyuH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH /
   tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	teByaH api kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm
   pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet, sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet /	pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA dadyAt upanAmayet, sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet /
   tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau	tizWatu Kalu punar kOSika tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO
   sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya	sarva sattveByaH avinivartanIyeByaH imAm prajQApAramitAm upanAmya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH kOSika gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve 'vinivartanīyā	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te api sarve avinivartanIyA
   bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā	BaveyuH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / teByaH api kaScid eva kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,	kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA dadyAt upanAmayet,
   sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro	sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet / tat kim manyase kOSika api nu sa kula putraH 
   vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha   bahu	vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet? SakraH Aha  bahu
   bhagavan, bahu sugata / saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā	Bagavan, bahu sugataH / saMKyA api Bagavan= tasya puNya skanDasya na sukarA
   kartum / gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi bhagavaṃstasya	kartum / gaNanA api upamA api Opamyam api upanisA api Bagavan= tasya
   puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum //	puNya skanDasya na sukarA kartum //
   bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā	BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar sa kOSika kula putraH va kula duhitA vA
   bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	bahutaram puNyam prasavet, yaH tezAm avinivartanIyAnAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya	mahAsattvAnAm kziprataram anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmeBya
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet, sārthāṃ	imAm prajQApAramitAm pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA dadyAt upanAmayet, sArTAm
   savyañjanāmupadiśet, iha ca tān prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt /	sa vyaQjanAm upadiSet, iha ca tAn prajQApAramitAyAm avavadet anuSizyAt /
   athāparaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpadyeta, sa evaṃ vadet  	aTa aparaH kOSika boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH utpadyeta, saH evam vadet  
   ahameteṣāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsya iti / yastaṃ	aham etezAm kziprataram anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyaH iti / yaH tam
   kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣiprābhijñataraṃ bodhisattvaṃ	kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA kzipra aBijQataram boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt, ayaṃ tataḥ	mahAsattvam prajQApAramitAyAm avavadet anuSizyAt, ayam tatas 
   paurvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //	pOrvakAt kula putrAt kula duhituH vA sakASAt bahutaram puNyam prasavet //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   yathā yathā bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  yaTA yaTA Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tathā	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH AsannIBavati anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH, taTA
   tathā prajñāpāramitāyāmavavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ, tathā tathā	taTA prajQApAramitAyAm avavaditavyaH anuSAsitavyaH, taTA taTA
   prajñāpāramitāyāmavodyamāno 'nuśiṣyamāṇastathatāyā āsannībhavati /	prajQApAramitAyAm avodyamAnaH anuSizyamANaH taTatAyAH AsannIBavati /
   tathatāyā āsannībhavan yeṣāṃ paribhuṅke	taTatAyAH AsannIBavan yezAm pariBuFke
   cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān, teṣāṃ tān kārān	cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArAn, tezAm tAn kArAn
   kṛtān mahāphalān karoti mahānuśaṃsān / ataḥ sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati	kRtAn mahA PalAn karoti mahA anuSaMsAn / atas sa bahutaram puNyam prasavati
   / (Vaidya 68) tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati   yadbodhisattvo	/ (VEdyaH 68) tat kasya hetoH? evam hi etat Bagavan Bavati  yat boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ //	mahAsattvaH AsannIBavati anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   sādhu sādhu	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  sADu sADu
   kauśika yastvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmutsāhaṃ dadāsi anugṛhṇīṣe	kOSika yaH tvam boDisattva yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm utsAham dadAsi anugRhNIze
   anuparivārayasi / evaṃ ca kauśika tvayā karaṇīyam   ya āryaśrāvakaḥ	anuparivArayasi / evam ca kOSika tvayA karaNIyam  yaH Arya SrAvakaH
   sarvasattvānāmanugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ, sa bodhisattvānāṃ	sarva sattvAnAm anugraham kartu kAmaH, sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutsāhaṃ vardhayati anugṛhṇīte	mahAsattvAnAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO= utsAham varDayati anugRhNIte
   'nuparivārayati, evametatkaraṇīyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? ataḥprasūtā hi	anuparivArayati, evam etat karaNIyam / tat kasya hetoH? atas prasUtA hi
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / yadi hi bodhisattvā	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / yadi hi boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā etadbodhicittaṃ notpādayeran, na caite bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	mahAsattvAH etat boDi cittam na utpAdayeran, na ca ete boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣeran, na ṣaṭpāramitāsu śikṣeran,	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO Sikzeran, na zaz pAramitAsu Sikzeran,

   (Vaidya 69)	(VEdyaH 69)
   ASP_6: anumodanāpariṇāmanāparivartaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ /	ASP_6: anumodanA pariNAmanA parivartaH zazWaH /
   atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ	aTa Kalu mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Ayuzmantam suBUtim
   sthaviramāmantrayate sma   yacca khalu punaḥ ārya subhūte bodhisattvasya	sTaviram Amantrayate sma  yat ca Kalu punar Arya suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, yacca	mahAsattvasya anumodanA pariNAmanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu, yat ca

   evamukte āyupyān subhūtiḥ sthaviraṃ maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	evam ukte AyupyAn suBUtiH sTaviram mEtreyam boDisattvam
