   nityamiti duḥkhe sukhamiti anātmanyātmeti aśubhe śubhamiti vikalpya	nityam iti duHKe suKam iti anAtmani AtmA iti aSuBe SuBam iti vikalpya
   saṃkalpya utpadyate, saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ /	saMkalpya utpadyate, saMjQA viparyAsaH citta viparyAsaH dRzwi viparyAsaH /
   athāpi yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,	aTa api yaTA vastu yaTA ArambaNam yaTA AkAraH taTA boDiH taTA cittam,
   evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadhātavaḥ / yadi ca yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ	evam sarva DarmAH sarva DAtavaH / yadi ca yaTA vastu yaTA ArambaNam
   yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,	yaTA AkAraH taTA boDiH taTA cittam,
   tatkatamairvastubhiḥkatamairārambaṇaiḥ katamairākāraiḥ katamaṃ	tad katamEH vastuBiH katamEH ArambaNEH katamEH AkArEH katamam
   cittamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati? katamadvā	cittam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati? katamadvA
   anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu kva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu kva anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmayati?	pariNAmayati?
   (Vaidya 71) atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ	(VEdyaH 71) aTa Kalu mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Ayuzmantam suBUtim
   sthavirametadavocat   nedamārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitasya	sTaviram etat avocat  na idam Arya suBUte nava yAna saMprasTitasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyaṃ nopadeṣṭavyam / tatkasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya puratas BAzitavyam na upadezwavyam / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? yad api hi syāttasya śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ	hetoH? yat api hi syAt tasya SradDA mAtrakam prema mAtrakam prasAda mAtrakam
   gauravamātrakam, tad api tasya sarvamantardhīyeta /	gOrava mAtrakam, tat api tasya sarvam antarDIyeta /
   avinivartanīyasyedamārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato	avinivartanIyasya idam Arya suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya puratas 
   bhāṣitavyamupadeṣṭavyam / yo vā kalyāṇamitropastabdho sattvo mahāsattvo	BAzitavyam upadezwavyam / yaH vA kalyANa mitra upastabDo sattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   bhavet, so 'tra nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate na vipatsyati na	Bavet, saH atra na avalezyate na saMlezyate na vipatsyati na
   viṣādamāpatsyate, na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyati,	vizAdam Apatsyate, na vipRzWIkarizyati mAnasam, na Bagna pRzWIkarizyati,
   notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate / evaṃ ca	na utrasizyati na saMtrasizyati na saMtrAsam Apatsyate / evam ca
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	boDisattvena mahAsattvena anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu
   sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayitavyam //	sarvajQa tAyAm pariNAmayitavyam //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH mEtreyam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvametadavocat   yena maitreya cittenānumodya yatpariṇāmayati,	mahAsattvam etat avocat  yena mEtreya cittena anumodya yat pariNAmayati,
   taccittaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatam / tatkatamattaccittaṃ yena	tat cittam kzINam nirudDam vigatam vipariNatam / tat katamat tat cittam yena
   pariṇāmayati anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye? katamadvā	pariNAmayati anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye? katamadvA
   taccittamanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yatpariṇāmayatyanuttarāyai	tad cittam anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu yat pariNAmayati anuttarAyE
   samyaksaṃbodhaye? kathaṃ vā śakyaṃ cittena cittaṃ pariṇāmayituṃ yadā	samyaksaMboDaye? kaTam vA Sakyam cittena cittam pariNAmayitum yadA
   dvayościttayoḥ samavadhānaṃ nāsti, na ca taccittasvabhāvatā śakyā	dvayoH cittayoH samavaDAnam nAsti, na ca tad citta svaBAva tA SakyA
   pariṇāmayitum?	pariNAmayitum?
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat   mā	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim sTaviram etat avocat  mA
   khalvārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ	Kalu Arya suBUte nava yAna saMprasTitAH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH imam
   nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante? kathaṃ cārya	nirdeSam SrutvA utrasizuH saMtrasizuH saMtrAsam Apatsyante? kaTam ca Arya
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tadanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena tad anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyam? kathaṃ ca	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayitavyam? kaTam ca
   anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu parigṛhṇatā anumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ	anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu parigRhNatA anumodanA sahagatam cittam
   pariṇāmayatā tadanumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ	pariNAmayatA tad anumodanA sahagatam cittam su parigRhItam su pariNAmitam
   bhavati?	Bavati?
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH mEtreyam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvamārabhya maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā	mahAsattvam AraBya mEtreyam boDisattvam mahAsattvam aDizWAnam kRtvA
   maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma   iha maitreya	mEtreyam boDisattvam mahAsattvam Amantrayate sma  iha mEtreya
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāmatītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tezAm atItAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm Cinna vartmanAm
   chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāṃ paryāttabāṣpāṇāṃ	Cinna vartmanInAm Cinna prapaQca Bava netrIkANAm paryAtta bAzpANAm
   marditakaṇṭakānāmapahṛtabhārāṇāmanuprāptasvakārthānāṃ	mardita kaNwakAnAm apahRta BArANAm anuprApta svaka arTAnAm
   parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanānāṃ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittānāṃ	parikzINa Bava saMyojanAnAm samyak AjQA su vimukta cittAnAm
   sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptānāṃ daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu	sarva cetaH vaSi parama pAramitA prAptAnAm daSasu dikzu aprameya asaMKyeyezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi ekaikasmiṃś ca	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu ekEkasyAm diSi ekEkasmin ca
   trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO aprameya asaMKyeyAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ	parinirvRtAnAm yAvat praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat ca anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAnAm yAvat ca anupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO
   parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ	parinirvRtAnAm yAvat ca sadDarmaH na antarhitaH, etasmin= antare yAni tezAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlāni pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ	budDAnAm BagavatAm kuSala mUlAni pAramitA pratisaMyuktAni, yaH ca tezAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraḥ, yaś ca	budDAnAm BagavatAm puNya aBisaMskAraH kuSala mUla aBisaMskAraH, yaH ca
   teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho	tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm SIla skanDaH samADi skanDaH prajQA skanDaH 
   vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, (Vaidya 72) yā ca hitaiṣitā,	vimukti skanDaH vimukti jQAna darSana skanDaH, (VEdyaH 72) yA ca hita ezitA,
   yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ,	yA ca mahA mEtrI, yA ca mahA karuNA, ye ca aprameya asaMKyeyAH budDa guNAH,
   yaś ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśitaḥ, ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitā	yaH ca tEH budDEH BagavadBiH DarmaH deSitaH, ye ca tasmin Darme SikzitA
   adhimuktāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, ye ca	aDimuktAH pratizWitAH, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni, ye ca
   tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvāvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ	tEH budDEH BagavadBiH boDisattvAH mahAsattva avyAkRtAH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni, ye	samyaksaMboDO, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni zaz pAramitA pratisaMyukta ani, ye
   ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni	ca pratyekabudDa yAnikAH pudgalAH vyAkRtAH pratyeka boDO, tezAm ca yAni
   kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni	kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca SrAvaka yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm dAna mayAni kuSala mUlAni
   śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca	SIla mayAni kuSala mUlAni BAvanA mayAni kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca
   śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,	SEkzANi anAsravANi kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca aSEkzANi anAsravANi kuSala mUlAni,
   yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca	yEH ca tasmin Darme pRTagjanEH kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni, yEH ca
   devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa	deva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uraga manuzya amanuzyEH vA sa
   dharmaḥ śrutaḥ, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca	DarmaH SrutaH, SrutvA ca kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni, yEH ca
   tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ, śrutvā ca	tiryagyoni gatEH api sattvEH sa DarmaH SrutaH, SrutvA ca

   kuśalamūlāni, tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā	kuSala mUlAni, tAni sarvANi ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA
   niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodeta / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ	niravaSezya niravaSezam anumodeta / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam
   puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayate, pariṇāmayato	puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayate, pariNAmayataH

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai	boDisattvena mahAsattvena anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyE

   taccittamiti / evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na	tat cittam iti / evam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na saMjQA viparyAsaH na

   / evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso	/ evam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya saMjQA viparyAsaH citta viparyAsaH 
   dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati / sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ	dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati / saced punar boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yat cittam
   pariṇāmayati, taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte, evaṃ samanvāharati / taccittaṃ	pariNAmayati, tat cittam evam saMjAnIte, evam samanvAharati / tad cittam
   samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte, niruddhaṃ vigataṃ	samanvAhriyamANam eva kzINam kzINam iti evam saMjAnIte, nirudDam vigatam
   vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte / yacca kṣīṇaṃ na tacchakyaṃ pariṇāmayitum /	vipariNatam iti evam saMjAnIte / yat ca kzINam na tat Sakyam pariNAmayitum /
   yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate, tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā / yair api	yena api cittena pariNAmyate, tasya api cittasya sA eva DarmatA / yEH api
   dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmatā / yeṣv api	DarmEH pariNAmyate, tezAm api DarmANAm sA eva DarmatA / yezu api

   pariṇāmayati, samyakpariṇāmayati, na mithyā pariṇāmayati / evaṃ ca	pariNAmayati, samyak pariNAmayati, na miTyA pariNAmayati / evam ca
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariṇāmayitavyam //	boDisattvena mahAsattvena pariNAmayitavyam //

   parinirvāsyanti, yāvacca saddharmo nāntardhāsyati, etasminnantare yāni	parinirvAsyanti, yAvat ca sadDarmaH na antarDAsyati, etasmin= antare yAni
   teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yaś ca	tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm pAramitA pratisaMyuktAni kuSala mUlAni, yaH ca
   teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho	tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm SIla skanDaH samADi skanDaH prajQA skanDaH 
   vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca	vimukti skanDaH vimukti jQAna darSana skanDaH, yA ca hita ezitA, yA ca
   mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, ye ca	mahA mEtrI, yA ca mahA karuNA, ye ca aprameya asaMKyeyAH budDa guNAH, ye ca
   te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti, ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣiṣyante	te budDAH BagavantaH Darmam deSayizyanti, ye ca tasmin Darme Sikzizyante
   'dhimokṣayiṣyanti pratiṣṭhāsyanti, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni yāṃś ca te	aDimokzayizyanti pratizWAsyanti, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni yAn ca te
   buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākariṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ	budDAH BagavantaH boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn vyAkarizyanti anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,	samyaksaMboDO, tezAm ca yAni zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAni kuSala mUlAni,

   pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ	pratyeka boDO, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca SrAvaka yAnikAnAm
   pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni	pudgalAnAm dAna mayAni kuSala mUlAni SIla mayAni kuSala mUlAni BAvanA AmayAni

   aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ	aSEkzANi anAsravANi kuSala mUlAni, ye ca tasmin Darme pRTagjanAH

   kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ	kuSala mUlAni avaropayizyanti, ye ca tiryagyoni gatAH api sattvAH tam Darmam
   śroṣyanti, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, ye ca sattvāsteṣu	Srozyanti, SrutvA ca kuSala mUlAni avaropayizyanti, ye ca sattvAH tezu
   buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca	budDezu Bagavatsu parinirvAyatsu parinirvRtezu ca
   kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni, tāni	kuSala mUlAni avaropayizyanti, tezAm ca sarvezAm yAni kuSala mUlAni, tAni
   sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya	sarvANi ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya
   niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	niravaSezam anumoditavyAni / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?	kaTam na saMjQA viparyAsaH na citta viparyAsaH na dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati?
   sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati, tasmiṃścitte na	saced boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yena cittena yat pariNAmayati, tasmin= citte na
   cittasaṃjñī bhavati / evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ	citta saMjQI Bavati / evam boDisattvena mahAsattvena anumodanA sahagatam
   puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati / sa	puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmitam Bavati / sa
   yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ cittamiti, evaṃ bodhisattvasya	yaTA tat cittam na saMjAnIte idam cittamiti, evam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso	mahAsattvasya na saMjQA viparyAsaH na citta viparyAsaH na dRzwi viparyAsaH 
   bhavati / atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte   idaṃ	Bavati / aTa yena cittena yat pariNAmayati tat cittam saMjAnIte  idam
   taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati / evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	tat cittam iti citta saMjQI Bavati / evam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /	saMjQA viparyAsaH citta viparyAsaH dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati /
   sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati taccittamevaṃ	saced punar boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yat cittam pariNAmayati tat cittam evam
   saṃjānīte evaṃ samānvāharati, taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ	saMjAnIte evam samA anvAharati, tat cittam samanvAhriyamANam eva kzINam
   kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte, niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte /	kzINam iti evam saMjAnIte, nirudDam vigatam vipariNatam iti evam saMjAnIte /
   yacca kṣīṇaṃ na tacchakyaṃ pariṇāmayitum / yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate,	yat ca kzINam na tat Sakyam pariNAmayitum / yena api cittena pariNAmyate,
   tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā / yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api	tasya api cittasya sA eva DarmatA / yEH api DarmEH pariNAmyate, tezAm api
   dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmatā / yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate, teṣām api	DarmANAm sA eva DarmatA / yezu api Darmezu pariNAmyate, tezAm api
   dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti / sacedevaṃ pariṇāmayati, samyakpariṇāmayati,	DarmANAm sA eva Darma tA iti / saced evam pariNAmayati, samyak pariNAmayati,
   na mithyā pariṇāmayati / evaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	na miTyA pariNAmayati / evam ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   pariṇāmayitavyam //	pariNAmayitavyam //
   (Vaidya 74) punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	(VEdyaH 74) punar aparam Arya suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   pratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ	pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm Cinna vartmanAm Cinna vartmanInAm
   chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu	Cinna prapaQca Bava netrIkANAm aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aprameya asaMKyeyezu
   trisāhasra mahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu tizWatAm DriyamANAnAm yApayatAm
   yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ	yAvat praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat ca anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante, yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante, yAvat ca nirupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO
   parinirvānti, yāvacca saddharmo nāntardadhāti, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ	parinirvAnti, yAvat ca sadDarmaH na antardaDAti, etasmin= antare yAni tezAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ	budDAnAm BagavatAm pAramitA pratisaMyuktAni kuSala mUlAni, yaH ca tezAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho	budDAnAm BagavatAm SIla skanDaH samADi skanDaH prajQA skanDaH 
   vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca	vimukti skanDaH vimukti jQAna darSana skanDaH, yA ca hita ezitA, yA ca
   mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, yaṃ ca	mahA mEtrI, yA ca mahA karuNA, ye ca aprameya asaMKyeyAH budDa guNAH, yam ca
   te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣante	te budDAH BagavantaH Darmam deSayanti, ye ca tasmin Darme Sikzante
   'dhimokṣayanti pratitiṣṭhanti, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāṃś ca te	aDimokzayanti pratitizWanti, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni, yAn ca te
   buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ	budDAH BagavantaH boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn vyAkurvanti anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,	samyaksaMboDO, tezAm ca yAni zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAni kuSala mUlAni,
   yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākurvanti	yAn ca te budDAH BagavantaH pratyekabudDa yAnikAn pudgalAn vyAkurvanti
   pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ	pratyeka boDO, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca SrAvaka yAnikAnAm
   pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni	pudgalAnAm dAna mayAni kuSala mUlAni SIla mayAni kuSala mUlAni BAvanA AmayAni
   kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca	kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca SEkzANi anAsravANi kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca
   aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamulāni, ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ	aSEkzANi anAsravANi kuSalam ulAni, ye ca tasmin Darme pRTagjanAH
   kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, ye ca	kuSala mUlAni avaropayanti, ye ca
   devānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā taṃ	deva anAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uragAH manuzya amanuzyAH vA tam
   dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, ye ca tiryagyonigatā	Darmam SRNvanti, SrutvA ca kuSala mUlAni avaropayanti, ye ca tiryagyoni gatA
   api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, ye ca	api sattvAH tam Darmam SRNvanti, SrutvA ca kuSala mUlAni avaropayanti, ye ca
   teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca	tezu budDezu Bagavatsu parinirvAyatsu parinirvRtezu ca
   kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamulāni, tāni	kuSala mUlAni avaropayanti, tezAm ca sarvezAm yAni kuSala mulAni, tAni
   sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya	sarvANi ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya
   niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	niravaSezam anumoditavyAni / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?	kaTam na saMjQA viparyAsaH na citta viparyAsaH na dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati?
   sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati, tasmiṃścitte na	saced boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yena cittena yat pariNAmayati, tasmin= citte na
   cittasaṃjñī bhavati / evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ	citta saMjQI Bavati / evam boDisattvena mahAsattvena anumodanA sahagatam
   puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati   yathā	puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmitam Bavati  yaTA
   taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti / evaṃ bodhisattvasya	tat cittam na saMjAnIte idam tat cittam iti / evam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso	mahAsattvasya na saMjQA viparyAsaH na citta viparyAsaH na dRzwi viparyAsaH 
   bhavati / atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ	Bavati / aTa yena cittena yat pariNAmayati tat cittam saMjAnIte idam
   taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati / evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	tat cittam iti citta saMjQI Bavati / evam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /	saMjQA viparyAsaH citta viparyAsaH dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati /
   sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati, taccittamevaṃ	saced punar boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yat cittam pariNAmayati, tat cittam evam
   saṃjānīte evaṃ samanvāharati   taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ	saMjAnIte evam samanvAharati  tat cittam samanvAhriyamANam eva kzINam
   kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte, niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte /	kzINam iti evam saMjAnIte, nirudDam vigatam vipariNatam iti evam saMjAnIte /
   yacca kṣīṇaṃ na tacchakyaṃ pariṇāmayitum / yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate,	yat ca kzINam na tat Sakyam pariNAmayitum / yena api cittena pariNAmyate,
   tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā / yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api	tasya api cittasya sA eva DarmatA / yEH api DarmEH pariNAmyate, tezAm api
   dharmāṇāṃ (Vaidya 75) saiva dharmatā / yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate,	DarmANAm (VEdyaH 75) sA eva DarmatA / yezu api Darmezu pariNAmyate,
   teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti / sacedevaṃ pariṇāmayati,	tezAm api DarmANAm sA eva Darma tA iti / saced evam pariNAmayati,
   samyakpariṇāmayati, na mithyā pariṇāmayati / evaṃ ca bodhisattvena	samyak pariNAmayati, na miTyA pariNAmayati / evam ca boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena pariṇāmayitavyam //	mahAsattvena pariNAmayitavyam //
   punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ	punar aparam Arya suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ	budDAnAm BagavatAm Cinna vartmanAm Cinna vartmanInAm
   chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	Cinna prapaQca Bava netrIkANAm aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ	yAvat praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat ca anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca,	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH aBisaMBotsyante aBisaMbuDyante ca,
   yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ parinirvāsyanti	yAvat ca nirupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO parinirvRtAH parinirvAsyanti
   parinirvānti ca, yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti	parinirvAnti ca, yAvat ca sadDarmaH na antarhitaH na antarDAsyati na antardaDAti
   ca, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	ca, etasmin= antare yAni tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAni kuSala mUlAni, yaH ca tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho	SIla skanDaH samADi skanDaH prajQA skanDaH vimukti skanDaH 
   vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca	vimukti jQAna darSana skanDaH, yA ca hita ezitA, yA ca mahA mEtrI, yA ca
   mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, yaiś ca	mahA karuNA, ye ca aprameya asaMKyeyAH budDa guNAH, yEH ca
   tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśito deśayiṣyate deśyate ca, ye ca tasmin	tEH budDEH BagavadBiH DarmaH deSitaH deSayizyate deSyate ca, ye ca tasmin
   dharme śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca, adhimuktā adhimokṣayiṣyanti	Darme SikzitAH Sikzizyante Sikzante ca, aDimuktAH aDimokzayizyanti
   adhimokṣayanti ca, sthitāḥ sthāsyanti tiṣṭhanti ca, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni	aDimokzayanti ca, sTitAH sTAsyanti tizWanti ca, tezAm ca sarvezAm yAni
   kuśalamūlāni, ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā	kuSala mUlAni, ye ca tEH budDEH BagavadBiH boDisattvAH mahAsattvA vyAkRtA
   vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca	vyAkarizyante vyAkriyante ca anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO, tezAm ca
   sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni, ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā	sarvezAm yAni kuSala mUlAni, ye ca pratyekabudDa yAnikAH pudgalA vyAkRtA
   vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni	vyAkarizyante vyAkriyante ca pratyeka boDO, tezAm ca sarvezAm yAni
   kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni	kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca SrAvaka yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm dAna mayAni kuSala mUlAni
   śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca	SIla mayAni kuSala mUlAni BAvanA mayAni kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca
   śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,	SEkzANi anAsravANi kuSala mUlAni, yAni ca aSEkzANi anAsravANi kuSala mUlAni,
   yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante	yEH ca tasmin Darme pRTagjanEH kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni avaropayizyante
   'varopyante ca, yaiś ca	avaropyante ca, yEH ca
   devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa	deva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uragEH manuzya amanuzyEH vA sa
   dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni	DarmaH SrutaH Srozyate SrUyate ca, SrutvA ca kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni
   avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa	avaropayizyante avaropyante ca, yEH ca tiryagyoni gatEH api sattvEH sa
   dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlāni	DarmaH SrutaH Srozyate SrUyate ca, SrutvA ca kuSala mUlAni
   avaropitānyavaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yaiś ca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu	avaropitAni avaropayizyante avaropyante ca, yEH ca sattvEH tezu budDezu
   bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca	Bagavatsu parinirvRtezu parinirvAsyatsu parinirvAyatsu ca
   kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ	kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni avaropayizyante avaropyante ca, tezAm ca sarvezAm
   yāni kuśalamūlāni, tāni sarvāṇyakato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā	yAni kuSala mUlAni, tAni sarvANi akatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA
   niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta, śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā	niravaSezya niravaSezam agrayA anumodanayA anumodeta, SrezWayA jyezWayA
   varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā	varayA pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA anuttamayA niruttamayA asamayA
   asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta / evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ	asamasamayA anumodanayA anumodeta / evam anumodya anumodanA sahagatam
   puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta	puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayAmi iti vAcam BAzeta
     anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti / tasya kathaṃ	 anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH AhArakam Bavatu iti / tasya kaTam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na saMjQA viparyAsaH na citta viparyAsaH na
   dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati? sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati   te dharmāḥ	dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati? saced pariNAmayan evam samanvAharati  te DarmAH
   kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ, sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate	kzINAH nirudDAH vigatAH vipariNatAH, sa ca DarmaH akzayaH yatra pariNAmyate
   ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ (Vaidya 76) samyaksaṃbodhau /	iti evam pariNAmitam Bavati anuttarAyAm (VEdyaH 76) samyaksaMboDO /
   sacetpunarevamupaparīkṣate   na dharmo dharmaṃ pariṇāmayati, ity api	saced punar evam upaparIkzate  na DarmaH Darmam pariNAmayati, iti api
   pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte	pariNAmitam Bavati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / evam Badantam suBUte
   pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na	pariNAmayataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na saMjQA viparyAsaH na
   cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ	citta viparyAsaH na dRzwi viparyAsaH Bavati / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi sa tAm
   pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate / sacetpunarevaṃ saṃjānīte   na cittaṃ cittaṃ	pariNAmanAm na aBiniviSate / saced punar evam saMjAnIte  na cittam cittam
   jānāti, na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti, ity api pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyai	jAnAti, na DarmaH Darmam jAnAti, iti api pariNAmitam Bavati anuttarAyE
   samyaksaṃbodhaye / ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttaraḥ pariṇāmaḥ /	samyaksaMboDaye / ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya anuttaraH pariNAmaH /
   sacetpunarbodhisattvastaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ saṃjānīte, na	saced punar boDisattvaH tam puNya aBisaMskAram saMjAnIte, na
   pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ	pariNAmayati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi sa tAm
   pariṇāmanāmabhiniviśate / sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati   so 'pi	pariNAmanAm aBiniviSate / saced punar asya evam Bavati  saH api
   puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ, yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	puNya aBisaMskAraH viviktaH SAntaH, yat api anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu
   tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /	tat api viviktam SAntam iti pariNAmayati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO /
   sacedevam api na saṃjānīte   sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti, evamiyaṃ	saced evam api na saMjAnIte  sarva saMskArAH SAntAH viviktA iti, evam iyam
   tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ	tasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA yat api tat tezAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam / yādṛśa eva sa	budDAnAm BagavatAm parinirvRtAnAm kuSala mUlam / yAdRSaH eva sa
   pariṇāmastādṛśameva tatkuśalamūlam, yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api	pariNAmaH tAdRSam eva tat kuSala mUlam, yena api tad pariNAmitam tat api
   tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam / sacedevaṃ saṃjānīte, na	tad jAtikam tad lakzaNam tat nikAyam tad svaBAvam / saced evam saMjAnIte, na
   pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi buddhā	pariNAmayati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / tat kasya hetoH? na hi budDA
   bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti / yaccātītaṃ tatkṣīṇaṃ	BagavantaH nimitta yogena pariNAmanAm aByanujAnanti / yat ca atItam tad kzINam
   niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatam, yadapyanāgataṃ tadapyasaṃprāptam,	nirudDam vigatam vipariNatam, yat api anAgatam tat api asaMprAptam,
   pratyutpannasya sthitirnopalabhyate, yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ	pratyutpannasya sTitiH na upalaByate, yat ca na upalaByate tat na eva nimittam
   na viṣayaḥ / sacedevaṃ nimittīkaroti, na samanvāharati na	na vizayaH / saced evam nimittIkaroti, na samanvAharati na
   pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / atha smṛtivaikalyena na	pariNAmayati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / aTa smRti vEkalyena na
   nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti	nimittIkaroti na samanvAharati na manasi karoti
   smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā, evam api na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ	smRti vEkalyAt anavaboDAt vA, evam api na pariNAmayati anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau / atha tannimitaṃ samanvāharati, na ca nimittīkaroti, evaṃ	samyaksaMboDO / aTa tad nimitam samanvAharati, na ca nimittIka roti, evam
   pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ	pariNAmitam Bavati tat kuSala mUlam boDisattvena mahAsattvena anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau / evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam   idaṃ	samyaksaMboDO / evam atra boDisattvena mahAsattvena Sikzitavyam  idam
   tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam / yenopāyakauśalena	tat boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya upAya kOSalam veditavyam / yena upAya kOSalena
   kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati, sa āsannaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ / atra copāyakauśalaṃ	kuSala mUlam pariNAmayati, saH AsannaH sarvajQa tAyAH / atra ca upAya kOSalam
   śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhīkṣṇaṃ	Sikzitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena iyam eva prajQApAramitA aBIkzNam
   śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā	SrotavyA udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA
   pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā	pravartayitavyA deSayitavyA upadezwavyA uddezwavyA su ADyAtavyA
   paripraśnīkartavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya	paripraSnIkartavyA / tat kasya hetoH? na hi prajQApAramitAm anAgamya
   śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum / tatra ya evaṃ	SakyA iyam aSrutavatA prajQApAramitA pariNAmanA kriyA pravezwum / tatra yaH evam
   vadet   śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ	vadet  Sakyam anAgamya prajQApAramitAm tat puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti, sa maivaṃ vocaditi syādvacanīyaḥ /	samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayitum iti, sa mA evam vocat iti syAt vacanIyaH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? niruddhā hi te ātmabhāvāḥ, niruddhā hi te saṃskārāḥ, śāntā	tat kasya hetoH? nirudDAH hi te Atma BAvAH, nirudDAH hi te saMskArAH, SAntA
   viviktā virahitā upalabdhinaḥ / api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya	viviktAH virahitAH upalabDinaH / api tu Kalu punar sa pudgalaH nimittIkRtya
   vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe	vikalpya ca yaTABUtam ayaTABUte yaTABUta saMjQI upalamBam anupalamBe
   pariṇāmayet, tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ	pariNAmayet, tasya kuSala mUlam budDAH BagavantaH evam
   pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti / tatkasya hetoḥ?	pariNAmitam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO na aByanujAnanti / tat kasya hetoH?
   eṣa eva hi tasya (Vaidya 77) mahānupalambho bhavati, yatsa parinirvāṇam	ezaH eva hi tasya (VEdyaH 77) mahA anupalamBaH Bavati, yat sa parinirvANam
   api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca / ākārataś ca	api budDAnAm BagavatAm nimittIkaroti vikalpayati ca / AkArataH ca
   nirvāṇamupalabhate / na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ	nirvANam upalaBate / na ca upalamBa saMjQinaH taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti / tatkasya hetoḥ?	samyaksaMbudDAH pariNAmanAm mahA arTa karIm vadanti / tat kasya hetoH?
   saviṣaḥ saśalyo hyeṣaḥ pariṇāmaḥ / tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ	sa vizaH sa SalyaH hi ezaH pariNAmaH / tat yaTA api nAma praNItam Bojanam
   saviṣaṃ bhavet, kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataś ca gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś	savizam Bavet, kim ca api tad varNataH ca ganDataH ca rasataH ca sparSataH 
   ca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati, api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ	ca aBilazaNIyam Bavati, api tu Kalu punar sa viza tvAt parivarjanIyam
   bhavati paṇḍitānām, na paribhogāya / tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ	Bavati paNxitAnAm, na pariBogAya / tat eva bAla jAtIyaH duzprajQa jAtIyaH
   puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta / tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya	puruzaH pariBoktavyam manyeta / tasya tat Bojanam pariBuQjAnasya
   varṇatasya gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ	varNatasya ganDataH ca rasataH ca sparSataH ca svAdezu suKa karam
   pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati / sa tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā	pariNAme ca asya duHKa vipAkam Bavati / sa tatonidAnam maraNam vA
   nigacchet, maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham / evameva ārya subhūte ihaike	nigacCet, maraNa mAtrakam vA duHKam / evam eva Arya suBUte iha eke
   durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā	durgRhItena durupalakzitena duHsvADyAtena su BAzitasya arTam ajAnAnA
   yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti, evamanuśāsiṣyanti  	yaTABUtam arTam anavabuDyamAnAH evam avavadizyanti, evam anuSAsizyanti  
   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	ehi tvam kula putra atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ	SIla skanDam samADi skanDam prajQA skanDam vimukti skanDam
   vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham / teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra	vimukti jQAna darSana skanDam / tezAm ca SrAvakANAm yEH tatra
   teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni	tezu atIta anAgata pratyutpannezu budDezu Bagavatsu kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni
   avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito	avaropayizyante avaropyante ca, yAvat ca sadDarmaH na antarhitaH 
   nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca, etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	na antarDAsyati na antardaDAti ca, etasmin= antare tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ	yAvat praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat ca anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAnAm BagavatAm yAvat ca anupaDi Seze
   nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām, ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā	nirvANa DAtO parinirvRtAnAm, ye ca tEH budDEH BagavadBiH boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante	mahAsattvAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO vyAkRtAH vyAkarizyante vyAkriyante
   ca, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,	ca, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni avaropayizyante avaropyante ca,
   ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca	ye ca pratyekabudDa yAnikAH pudgalAH vyAkRtAH vyAkarizyante vyAkriyante ca
   pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante	pratyeka boDO, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni avaropayizyante
   'varopyante ca, ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante	avaropyante ca, ye ca SrAvaka yAnikAH pudgalAH vyAkRtAH vyAkarizyante
   vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni	vyAkriyante ca SrAvaka boDO, tezAm ca yAni kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni
   avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu	avaropayizyante avaropyante ca, yAni ca pRTagjanAnAm aprameya asaMKyeyezu
   lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	lokaDAtuzu atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā	sarva loka DAtuzu tat sarvam kuSala mUlam ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA
   tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ	tulayitvA niravaSezya niravaSezam anumodya anumodanA sahagatam
   puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati / evaṃ sa	puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati / evam sa
   pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate, tadyathāpi	pariNAmaH nimitta yogena pariNAmyamAnaH viza tvAya saMpravartate, tat yaTA api
   nāma tatsaviṣaṃ bhojanameva / nāstyupalambhasaṃjñinaḥ pariṇāmanā /	nAma tad sa vizam Bojanam eva / na asti upalamBa saMjQinaH pariNAmanAH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? saviṣatvādupalambhasya / tasmādbodhisattvayānikena	tat kasya hetoH? sa viza tvAt upalamBasya / tasmAt boDisattva yAnikena
   pudgalena naivaṃ śikṣitavyam / kathaṃ punaranena śikṣitavyam?	pudgalena na evam Sikzitavyam / kaTam punar anena Sikzitavyam?
   kathamatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlaṃ	kaTam atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm kuSala mUlam
   parigrahītavyam? kathaṃ ca parigṛhītaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ bhavati? kathaṃ ca	parigrahItavyam? kaTam ca parigRhItam su parigRhItam Bavati? kaTam ca
   pariṇāmayitavyam? kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ	pariNAmayitavyam? kaTam ca pariNAmitam su pariNAmitam Bavati anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau? ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā	samyaksaMboDO? iha anena boDisattva yAnikena kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA
   tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ	taTAgatam anaByAKyAtu kAmena evam tat sarvam kuSala mUlam anumoditavyam evam
   pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te (Vaidya 78) tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā	pariNAmayitavyam yaTA te (VEdyaH 78) taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDA
   buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ	budDa jQAnena budDa cakzuzA jAnanti paSyanti tat kuSala mUlam yat jAtikam
   yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam / yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate	yat nikAyam yAdRSam yat svaBAvam yat lakzaNam / yayA Darma tayA saMvidyate
   tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam, yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ	taTA anumode tat kuSala mUlam, yaTA ca te taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ	samyaksaMbudDAH aByanujAnanti pariNAmyamAnam tat kuSala mUlam anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, tathāhaṃ pariṇāmayāmīti / evamanumodamāna evaṃ	samyaksaMboDO, taTA aham pariNAmayAmi iti / evam anumodamAnaH evam
   pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'naparāddho bhavati / buddhānāṃ	pariNAmayan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anaparAdDaH Bavati / budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati	BagavatAm samyaktva anumoditam pariNAmitam ca Bavati
   tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye, na ca tāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ	tat kuSala mUlam anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye, na ca tAn= taTAgatAn arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhānabhyākhyāti / evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo	samyaksaMbudDa an aByAKyAti / evam ca asya pariNAmaH nirvizaH pariNAmaH 
   mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati	mahA pariNAmaH DarmaDAtu pariNAmaH paripUrNaH su paripUrNaH Bavati
   adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ //	aDyASayena aDimuktyA pariNAmayataH //
   punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ	punar aparam boDisattva yAnikena kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vE evam
   pariṇāmayitavyam   yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā	pariNAmayitavyam  yat SIlam yaH samADiH yA prajQA yA
   vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātau	vimuktiH yat vimukti jQAna darSanam tat yaTA aparyApannam kAmaDAtO
   aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na	aparyApannam rUpa DAtO aparyApannam ArUpya DAtO na api atItam na anAgatam na
   pratyutpannam / tatkasya hetoḥ? tryadhvatraidhātukāparyāpannatvāt /	pratyutpannam / tat kasya hetoH? tri aDva tra eDAtukA paryApanna tvAt /
   tathaiva pariṇāmo 'pyaparyāpannaḥ / yatrāpi dharme sa pariṇāmaḥ	taTA eva pariNAmaH api aparyApannaH / yatra api Darme sa pariNAmaH
   pariṇāmyate, so 'pi dharmo 'paryāpannaḥ / sacedevamadhimuñcati, evaṃ	pariNAmyate, saH api DarmaH aparyApannaH / saced evam aDimuQcati, evam
   pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo	pariNAmayataH tasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya avinazwaH pariNAmaH 
   bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ	Bavati aparyApannaH nirvizaH pariNAmaH mahA pariNAmaH DarmaDAtu pariNAmaH
   paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati / atha taṃ pariṇāmayati niviśate	paripUrNaH su paripUrNaH Bavati / aTa tam pariNAmayati niviSate
   nimittīkaroti, mithyā pariṇāmayati / tatra yo 'yaṃ pariṇāmo bodhisattvasya	nimittIka roti, miTyA pariNAmayati / tatra yaH ayam pariNAmaH boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya, anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto	mahAsattvasya, anayA DarmaDAtu pariNAmanayA yaTA budDAH BagavantaH 
   jānanti, yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	jAnanti, yaTA ca aByanujAnanti tat kuSala mUlam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti, tathāhaṃ pariṇāmayāmi ityayaṃ	pariNAmitam evam su pariNAmitam Bavati iti, taTA aham pariNAmayAmi iti ayam
   samyakpariṇāmaḥ / evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ	samyak pariNAmaH / evam ca pariNAmitam su pariNAmitam Bavati anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau //	samyaksaMboDO //
   atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt   sādhu sādhu subhūte	aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmate suBUtaye sADukAram adAt  sADu sADu suBUte
   / śāstṛkṛtyaṃ tvaṃ subhūte karoṣi, yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	/ SAstR kRtyam tvam suBUte karozi, yaH tvam boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   dharmaṃ deśayasi / tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyayaṃ subhūte pariṇāmaḥ,	Darmam deSayasi / tat kasya hetoH? yaH hi ayam suBUte pariNAmaH,
   dharmadhātupariṇāmo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya / asyāmeva	DarmaDAtu pariNAmaH ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya / asyAm eva
   dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti, tatkuśalamūlaṃ	DarmatAyAm yaTA budDAH BagavantaH jAnanti paSyanti, tat kuSala mUlam
   yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā	yad jAtikam yat nikAyam yAdRSam yat svaBAvam yat lakzaNam yayA Darma tayA
   saṃvidyate, tathā anumode / yathā ca abhyanujānanti, tathāhaṃ	saMvidyate, taTA anumode / yaTA ca aByanujAnanti, taTA aham
   pariṇāmayāmīti / atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaś ca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	pariNAmayAmi iti / atra yaH puNya skanDaH yaH ca gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ, tān sarvān kaścideva	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu ye sattvAH, tAn sarvAn kaScid eva
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA daSasu kuSalezu karma paTezu
   samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet, tasya yaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, tato 'yameva	samAdApayet pratizWApayet, tasya yaH puNya aBisaMskAraH, tatas ayam eva
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya DarmaDAtu pariNAma jaH puNya skanDaH agra
   ākhyāyate, śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate, vara ākhyāyate, pravara	AKyAyate, SrezWaH AKyAyate, jyezWaH AKyAyate, varaH AKyAyate, pravara
   ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate,	AKyAyate, praNItaH AKyAyate, uttamaH AKyAyate, anuttamaH AKyAyate,
   niruttama ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate / tiṣṭhatu khalu	niruttamaH AKyAyate, asamaH AKyAyate, asamasamaH AKyAyate / tizWatu Kalu
   punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	punar suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu (Vaidya 79) karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya	sarva sattvAn daSasu kuSalezu (VEdyaH 79) karma paTezu pratizWApya
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	puNya aBisaMskAraH, yAvantaH suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te sarve caturNAm DyAnAnAm
   lābhino bhaveyuḥ, teṣāṃ ca yaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, tato 'yameva	lABinaH BaveyuH, tezAm ca yaH puNya aBisaMskAraH, tatas ayam eva
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanāsahagataḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariNAmanA sahagataH puNya skanDaH agra
   ākhyāyate, śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate, vara ākhyāyate, pravara	AKyAyate, SrezWaH AKyAyate, jyezWaH AKyAyate, varaH AKyAyate, pravara
   ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate,	AKyAyate, praNItaH AKyAyate, uttamaH AKyAyate, anuttamaH AKyAyate,
   niruttama ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate / tiṣṭhatu khalu	niruttamaH AKyAyate, asamaH AKyAyate, asamasamaH AKyAyate / tizWatu Kalu
   punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	punar suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu

   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te

   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te
   sarve catasṛṇāmārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ	sarve catasRNAm ArUpya samApattInAm lABinaH BaveyuH / tizWatu Kalu punar 
   subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu

   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te
   sarve pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte	sarve paQcAnAm aBijQAnAm lABinaH BaveyuH / tizWatu Kalu punar suBUte
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu pañcābhijñānāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu paQca aBijQAnAm

   ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	ye suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu

   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
