   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve anuttarāyāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te sarve anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ / ye sarve anyeṣvanyeṣu	samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH BaveyuH / ye sarve anyezu anyezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ, tān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu ye sattvAH, tAn
   sarvānekaiko	sarvAn ekEkaH 
   bodhisattvaścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairgaṅgānadīvālukopamān	boDisattvaH cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArEH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   (Vaidya 80) kalpānupatiṣṭhet sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ, sarvaiḥ	(VEdyaH 80) kalpAn upatizWet sarva suKa upaDAnEH, sarvEH
   sukhasparśavihāraiḥ, tacca dānamupalambhasaṃjñino dadyuḥ / etena paryāyeṇa	suKa sparSa vihArEH, tat ca dAnam upalamBa saMjQinaH dadyuH / etena paryAyeNa
   tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko	tAn sarva sattvAn ekEkam parikalpya tAn ca sarva boDisattvAn ekEkaH 
   bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	boDisattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpānupatiṣṭheccīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ	kalpAn upatizWet cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArEH
   sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ, sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihāraiḥ	sarva suKa upaDAnEH, sarvEH suKa sparSa vihArEH
   satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet / evamekaikasteṣāṃ	satkuryAt gurukuryAt mAnayet pUjayet arcayet apacAyet / evam ekEkaH tezAm
   sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanena paryāyeṇa dānaṃ dadyāt, evaṃ sarve 'pi te	sarvezAm boDisattvAnAm anena paryAyeNa dAnam dadyAt, evam sarve api te
   dānaṃ dadyuḥ / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvāstatonidānaṃ	dAnam dadyuH / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu te boDisattvAH tatonidAnam
   bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata /	bahu puNyam prasaveyuH? suBUtiH Aha  bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH /
   aprameyaṃ bhagavan, aprameyaṃ sugata / saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya	aprameyam Bagavan, aprameyam sugataH / saMKyA api Bagavan= tasya
   puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum, gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi	puNya skanDasya na sukarA kartum, gaNanA api upamA api Opamyam api upanisA api
   upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /	upanizad api Bagavan= tasya puNya skanDasya na sukarA kartum /
   sacedbhagavan rūpī bhavet, sa puṇyaskandho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣv api	saced Bagavan rUpI Bavet, sa puNya skanDaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu api
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu na māyet //	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu na mAyet //
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmataṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat   evametatsubhūte,	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmatam suBUtim sTaviram etat avocat  evam etat suBUte,
   evam etat / yatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ	evam etat / yatra Kalu punar suBUte boDisattva yAnikaH pudgalaH
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'nena dharmadhātupariṇāmena	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhItaH anena DarmaDAtu pariNAmena
   tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet, puṇyaṃ prasavati /	tat kuSala mUlam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayet, puNyam prasavati /
   asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajasya asau pūrvaka	asya suBUte puNya skanDasya DarmaDAtu pariNAma jasya asO pUrvaka
   upalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm	upalamBa saMjQinAm boDisattvAnAm dAna mayaH puNya aBisaMskAraH SatatamIm
   api kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api	api kalAm na upEti, sahasratamIm api Sata sahasratamIm api kowItamIm api
   koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api	kowI SatatamIm api kowI sahasratamIm api kowI Sata sahasratamIm api
   koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api	kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm api kalAm na upEti, saMKyAm api kalAm api
   gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate	gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam api upanisAm api upanizadam api na kzamate
   / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ	/ tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi tezAm pOrvakANAm upalamBa saMjQinAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ subahv api dānaṃ dattaṃ subahvity api parisaṃkhyātaṃ	boDisattvAnAm su bahu api dAnam dattam su bahu iti api parisaMKyAtam
   bhavati //	Bavati //
   atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi prāñjalīni	aTa Kalu cAturmahArAja kAyikAnAm deva putrANAm viMSati sahasrANi prAQjalIni
   namasyanti bhagavantametadavocan   mahāpariṇāmo 'yaṃ bhagavan	namasyanti Bagavantam etat avocan  mahA pariNAmaH ayam Bagavan
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaduta	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm yat uta
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ sarvajñatāyai,	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhItAnAm kuSala mUla pariNAmaH sarvajQa tAyE,
   yatra hi nāma teṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvantaṃ dānamayaṃ	yatra hi nAma tezAm OpalamBikAnAm boDisattvAnAm tAvantam dAna mayam
   puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhibhavati / atha khalu trāyastriṃśakāyikānāṃ	puNya aBisaMskAram aBiBavati / aTa Kalu trAyastriMSa kAyikAnAm
   devaputrāṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi	deva putrANAm Sata sahasrANi
   divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇavarṣairdivyai ratnavarṣairdivyaiś	divya puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa varzEH divyEH ratna varzEH divyEH 
   ca vastravarṣairbhagavantamabhyavākirannabhiprākiran /	ca vastra varzEH Bagavantam aByavAkiran= aBiprAkiran /
   divyaiśchatrairdivyairdhvajairdivyābhirghaṇṭābhirdivyābhiḥ patākābhiḥ	divyEH CatrEH divyEH DvajEH divyABiH GaNwABiH divyABiH patAkABiH
   samantācca divyadīpamālābhirbahuvidhābhiś ca divyābhiḥ pūjābhirbhagavantaṃ	samantAt ca divya dIpa mAlABiH bahuviDABiH ca divyABiH pUjABiH Bagavantam
   satkurvanti sma, gurukurvanti sma mānayanti sma pūjayanti sma arcayanti	satkurvanti sma, gurukurvanti sma mAnayanti sma pUjayanti sma arcayanti
   sma apacāyanti sma, divyāni ca vādyānyabhipravādayāmāsuḥ / evaṃ ca	sma apacAyanti sma, divyAni ca vAdyAni aBipravAdayAmAsuH / evam ca
   vācamabhāṣanta   mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya	vAcam aBAzanta  mahA pariNAmaH bata ayam Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya yo 'yaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ, yatra hi nāma	mahAsattvasya yaH ayam DarmaDAtu pariNAmaH, yatra hi nAma
   tatteṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ	tat tezAm OpalamBikAnAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm dAna mayam
   puṇyābhisaṃskāraskandhamabhibhavati yathāpi nāma	puNya aBisaMskAra skanDam aBiBavati yaTA api nAma
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītatvādasya mahāpariṇāmasya /	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhIta tvAt asya mahA pariNAmasya /
   evamanyebhyo 'pi devanikāyebhyo devaputrā āgatya (Vaidya 81) bhagavantaṃ	evam anyeByaH api deva nikAyeByaH deva putrAH Agatya (VEdyaH 81) Bagavantam
   parameṇa satkāreṇa parameṇa gurukāreṇa paramayā mānanayā paramayā pūjanayā	parameNa satkAreNa parameNa gurukAreNa paramayA mAnanayA paramayA pUjanayA
   paramayā arcanayā paramayā apacāyanayā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā	paramayA arcanayA paramayA apacAyanayA satkRtya gurukRtya mAnayitvA
   pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyya evameva śabdamudīrayanti sma,	pUjayitvA arcayitvA apacAyya evam eva Sabdam udIrayanti sma,
   ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma / evaṃ peyālena kartavyam / yāmāstuṣitā	Gozam anuSrAvayanti sma / evam peyAlena kartavyam / yAmAH tuzitA
   nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā	nirmANaratayaH paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmakAyikA brahma purohitA
   brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ	brahma pArzadyAH mahA brahmANaH parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH
   parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā	parItta SuBAH apramANa SuBAH SuBa kRtsnA anaBrakAH puNya prasavA bRhatPalA
   asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ, te	asaMjQi sattvAH abRhAH atapAH sudRSAH sudarSanAH akanizWAH ca devAH, te
   'pyevamevāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantaṃ namasyanta etadavocan   āścaryaṃ	api evam eva aQjalim kRtvA Bagavantam namasyante etat avocan  AScaryam
   bhagavan yāvadayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	Bagavan yAvat ayam boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ,	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhItAnAm kuSala mUla pariNAmaH,
   yasteṣāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvaccirarātrasaṃcitamam api	yaH tezAm upalamBa saMjQinAm boDisattvAnAm tAvat cirarAtra saMcitamam api
   tathā mahāvistarasamudānītam api puṇyaskandhamabhibhavati //	taTA mahA vistarasam udAnItam api puNya skanDam aBiBavati //
   atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānādīn kṛtvā sarvāṃstān	aTa Kalu BagavAn= tAn SudDAvAsa kAyikAn deva putrAn AdIn kRtvA sarvAn= tAn
   devaputrānāmantrayate sma   tiṣṭhatu khalu punardevaputrā	deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  tizWatu Kalu punar deva putrA
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitānāmanuttarāyāḥ	sarva sattvAnAm anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTitAnAm anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratilambhāya dānaṃ dadatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ anena	samyaksaMboDeH pratilamBAya dAnam dadatAm puNya aBisaMskAraH anena
   paryāyeṇa, ye 'pi te devaputrā anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	paryAyeNa, ye api te deva putrAH anyezu anyezu gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve anuttarāyāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te api sarve anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā bodhāya cittamutpādya anyeṣvanyeṣu	samyaksaMboDO praNiDAnam kRtvA boDAya cittam utpAdya anyezu anyezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ	cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArEH
   sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihārairekaiko bodhisattvo	sarva suKa upaDAnEH sarvEH suKa sparSa vihArEH ekEkaH boDisattvaH 
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt, evaṃ sarve 'pi yāvatte	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWan dAnam dadyAt, evam sarve api yAvat te
   copalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ / etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ	ca upalamBa saMjQinaH dAnam dadyuH / etena paryAyeNa tAn sarva sattvAn ekEkam
   parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo yāvatsarve te	parikalpya tAn ca sarva boDisattvAn ekEkaH boDisattvaH yAvat sarve te
   bodhisattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantastān	boDisattvAH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWantaH tAn
   sarvasattvāṃścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ	sarva sattvAn= cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArEH
   sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihārairupatiṣṭheyuḥ, tacca	sarva suKa upaDAnEH sarvEH suKa sparSa vihArEH upatizWeyuH, tat ca
   dānamupalambhasaṃjñino dadyuḥ / yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	dAnam upalamBa saMjQinaH dadyuH / yaH ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhItaH atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ	BagavatAm SIla skanDam samADi skanDam prajQA skanDam vimukti skanDam
   vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ teṣāṃ ca	vimukti jQAna darSana skanDam tezAm ca
   bodhisattvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yaiś ca tatra anyair	boDisattva pratyekabudDa SrAvaka yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm yEH ca tatra anyEH 
   api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitānyavaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,	api sattvEH kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni avaropayizyante avaropyante ca,
   tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya	tat sarvam ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya
   niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodate / śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā	niravaSezam agrayA anumodanayA anumodate / SrezWayA jyezWayA varayA
   pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā	pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA anuttamayA niruttamayA uttarottarayA asamayA
   asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate / anumodya	asamasamayA apratisamayA acintyayA anumodanayA anumodate / anumodya
   anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmayati   anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /	pariNAmayati  anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH AhArakam Bavatu iti /
   asyānumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ so 'pi paurvaka	asya anumodanA pariNAmanA sahagatasya puNya kriyA vastunaH saH api pOrvaka
   aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ	OpalamBikAnAm boDisattvAnAm puNya aBisaMskAraH SatatamIm api kalAm
   nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm	na upEti, sahasratamIm api Sata sahasratamIm api kowItamIm api kowI SatatamIm
   api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api	api kowI sahasratamIm api kowI Sata sahasratamIm api
   koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api	kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm api kalAm na upEti, saMKyAm api kalAm api
   (Vaidya 82) gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam	(VEdyaH 82) gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam api upanisAm api upanizadam
   api na kṣamate / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve	api na kzamate / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi te boDisattvAH sarve
   'pyupalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadati //	api upalamBa saMjQinaH dAnam dadati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yadbhagavānevamāha  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yat BagavAn evam Aha  
   atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm sarvezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   bodhisattvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca	boDisattva pratyekabudDa SrAvaka saMGAnAm sarva sattvAnAm ca
   atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yannāma kuśalamūlaṃ tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya	atIta anAgata pratyutpannam yat nAma kuSala mUlam tat sarvam ekatas aBisaMkzipya
   piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /	piNxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya niravaSezam anumodate agrayA anumodanayA /
   śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā	SrezWayA jyezWayA varayA pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA anuttamayA
   niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā	niruttamayA uttarottarayA asamayA asamasamayA apratisamayA acintyayA
   anumodate iti / tatra kiyatā bhagavan agrānumodanā bhavati? evamukte	anumodate iti / tatra kiyatA Bagavan agrA anumodanA Bavati? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   yadi subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yadi suBUte boDisattva yAnikaH
   pudgalo 'tītāgatapratyutpannān gṛhṇīte na manyate nopalabhate na kalpayati	pudgalaH atIta Agata pratyutpannAn gRhNIte na manyate na upalaBate na kalpayati
   na vikalpayati na paśyati na samanupaśyati, evaṃ cainān	na vikalpayati na paSyati na samanupaSyati, evam ca enAn
   dharmānupaparīkṣate   kalpanāviṭhapitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, ajātā anirjātā	DarmAn upaparIkzate  kalpanA viWapitAH sarva DarmAH, ajAtA anirjAtA
   anāgatikā agatikāḥ / nātra kaściddharma utpanno nāpi kaściddharma	anAgatikAH agatikAH / na atra kaScid DarmaH utpannaH na api kaScid Darma
   utpatsyate nāpi kaściddharma utpadyate, nāpi kaściddharmo niruddho nāpi	utpatsyate na api kaScid DarmaH utpadyate, na api kaScid DarmaH nirudDaH na api
   kaściddharmo nirutsyate nāpi kaściddharmo nirudhyate / ityevametān	kaScid DarmaH nirutsyate na api kaScid DarmaH niruDyate / iti evam etAn
   dharmānupaparīkṣya yathaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathānumodate / anumodya	DarmAn upaparIkzya yaTA ezAm DarmANAm DarmatA taTA anumodate / anumodya
   tathaiva pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / iyatā subhūte	taTA eva pariNAmayati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / iyatA suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati / asya subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya agrA anumodanA Bavati / asya suBUte
   kuśalamūlapariṇāmasya teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāṃ	kuSala mUla pariNAmasya tezAm pOrvakANAm
   bodhisattvānāmupalambhasaṃjñināmupalambhadṛṣṭikāṇāṃ taddānamayaṃ	boDisattvAnAm upalamBa saMjQinAm upalamBa dRzwikANAm tad dAna mayam
   puṇyakriyāvastu śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api	puNya kriyA vastu SatatamIm api kalAm na upEti, sahasratamIm api
   śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api	Sata sahasratamIm api kowItamIm api kowI SatatamIm api kowI sahasratamIm api
   koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,	kowI Sata sahasratamIm api kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm api kalAm na upEti,
   saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api	saMKyAm api kalAm api gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam api upanisAm api
   upaniṣadam api na kṣamate //	upanizadam api na kzamate //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena	punar aparam suBUte boDisattva yAnikena pudgalena
   atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm sarvezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   dānamanumoditukāmena śīlamanumoditukāmena kṣāntimanumoditukāmena	dAnam anumoditu kAmena SIlam anumoditu kAmena kzAntim anumoditu kAmena
   vīryamanumoditukāmena dhyānamanumoditukāmena prajñāmanumoditakāmena	vIryam anumoditu kAmena DyAnam anumoditu kAmena prajQAm anumodita kAmena
   evamanumoditavyam   yathā vimuktistathā dānam, yathā vimuktistathā śīlaṃ,	evam anumoditavyam  yaTA vimuktiH taTA dAnam, yaTA vimuktiH taTA SIlaM,
   yathā vimuktistathā kṣāntiḥ, yathā vimuktistathā vīryam, yathā	yaTA vimuktiH taTA kzAntiH, yaTA vimuktiH taTA vIryam, yaTA
   vimuktistathā dhyānam, yathā vimuktistathā prajñā, yathā vimuktistathā	vimuktiH taTA DyAnam, yaTA vimuktiH taTA prajQA, yaTA vimuktiH taTA
   vimuktijñānadarśanam, yathā vimuktistathā anumodanā, yathā vimuktistathā	vimukti jQAna darSanam, yaTA vimuktiH taTA anumodanA, yaTA vimuktiH taTA
   anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, yathā vimuktistathā pariṇāmanā, yathā	anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu, yaTA vimuktiH taTA pariNAmanA, yaTA
   vimuktistathā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhāśca, yathā vimuktistathā	vimuktiH taTA budDAH BagavantaH pratyekabudDAH ca, yaTA vimuktiH taTA
   teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye parinirvṛtāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'tītā	tezAm SrAvakAH ye parinirvRtAH, yaTA vimuktiH taTA te DarmAH ye atItA
   niruddhāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'nāgatā anutpannāḥ, yathā	nirudDAH, yaTA vimuktiH taTA te DarmAH ye anAgatAH anutpannAH, yaTA
   vimuktistathā te dharmā ye etarhi pratyutpannā vartamānāḥ, yathā	vimuktiH taTA te DarmAH ye etarhi pratyutpannAH vartamAnAH, yaTA
   vimuktistathā te 'tītā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ, yathā	vimuktiH taTA te atItAH budDAH BagavantaH tezAm ca SrAvakAH, yaTA
   vimuktistathā te 'nāgatā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ, yathā	vimuktiH taTA te anAgatAH budDAH BagavantaH tezAm ca SrAvakAH, yaTA
   vimuktistathā te pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ, ye	vimuktiH taTA te pratyutpannAH budDAH BagavantaH tezAm ca SrAvakAH, ye
   etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,	etarhi aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu tizWanti Driyante yApayanti,
   yathā vimuktistathātītānāgata pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ / evameteṣāṃ	yaTA vimuktiH taTA atItAn Agata pratyutpannAH budDAH BagavantaH / evam etezAm
   dharmāṇāmabaddhānāmamuktānāmasaktānāṃ yā dharmatā, tāmanuttarayā	DarmANAm abadDAnAm amuktAnAm asaktAnAm yA Darma tA, tAm anuttarayA
   anumodanayā anumode / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	anumodanayA anumode / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu
   anuttarāyaṃ (Vaidya 83) samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi apariṇāmanāyogena	anuttarAyam (VEdyaH 83) samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayAmi apariNAmanA yogena
   asaṃkrāntito 'viṃnāśata iti / iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	asaMkrAntitaH aviMnASate iti / iyatA suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   agrā anumodanā bhavati / tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte te 'pi ye	agrA anumodanA Bavati / tizWantu Kalu punar suBUte te api ye
   'nyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	anyezu anyezu gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, anuttarāyāṃ	sarva sattvAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH, anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	samyaksaMboDO saMprasTAya anyezu anyezu gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpādya	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm boDAya cittam utpAdya
   sarve 'pyekaiko bodhisattvaḥ ekaikasmai bodhisattvāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	sarve api ekEkaH boDisattvaH ekEkasmE boDisattvAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyādupalambhasaṃjñī	kalpAn= tizWan dAnam dadyAt upalamBa saMjQI
   cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ	cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArEH
   sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvasukhasparśavihārairupatiṣṭhan, anena paryāyeṇa	sarva suKa upaDAnEH sarva suKa sparSa vihArEH upatizWan, anena paryAyeNa
   sarve 'pi te sarvebhya upatiṣṭhantaḥ upalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ / ye	sarve api te sarveByaH upatizWantaH upalamBa saMjQinaH dAnam dadyuH / ye
   subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,	suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH,
   te sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃpratiṣṭheran / anuttarāṃ	te sarve anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMpratizWeran / anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn kAya su caritam
   vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya varteran /	vAc su caritam manaH su caritam upalamBa saMjQinaH SIlam samAdAya varteran /
   anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo	anena paryAyeNa sarve api te boDisattvAH ekEkaH boDisattvaH 
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWan gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn
   kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñī śīlaṃ samādāya	kAya su caritam vAc su caritam manaH su caritam upalamBa saMjQI SIlam samAdAya
   varteta / etena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ	varteta / etena paryAyeNa sarve api te boDisattvAH upalamBa saMjQinaH
   śīlaṃ samādāya varteran / yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	SIlam samAdAya varteran / yaH ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhItaH atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca	BagavatAm SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca
   pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca	pratyekabudDAnAm SIla samADi prajQA vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca
   śrāvakāṇāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān	SrAvakANAm SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn
   sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvamekato	sarva sattvAnAm ca atIta anAgata pratyutpannam kuSala mUlam sarvam ekatas 
   'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate 'grayā	aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya niravaSezam anumodate agrayA
   anumodanayā / śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā	anumodanayA / SrezWayA jyezWayA varayA pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA
   anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā	anuttamayA niruttamayA uttarottarayA asamayA asamasamayA apratisamayA
   acintayā anumodanayā anumodate / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ	acintayA anumodanayA anumodate / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam
   puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati / asya subhūte	puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati / asya suBUte
   anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ	anumodanA sahagatasya puNya kriyA vastunaH asO pOrvakaH OpalamBikAnAm
   bodhisattvāna śīlamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,	boDisattvAna SIla mayaH puNya aBisaMskAraH SatatamIm api kalAm na upEti,
   sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api	sahasratamIm api Sata sahasratamIm api kowItamIm api kowI SatatamIm api
   koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm	kowI sahasratamIm api kowI Sata sahasratamIm api kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm
   api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam	api kalAm na upEti, saMKyAm api kalAm api gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam
   api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te	api upanisAm api upanizadam api na kzamate / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi te
   bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya vartanta iti / tiṣṭhantu	boDisattvAH upalamBa saMjQinaH SIlam samAdAya vartante iti / tizWantu
   khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu	Kalu punar suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu
   lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ,	lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTitAH,
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn
   kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritaṃ śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānā	kAya su caritam vAc su caritam manaH su caritam SIlam samAdAya vartamAnA
   upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	upalamBa saMjQinaH, ye suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve anuttarāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te sarve anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃpratiṣṭheran / anuttarāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMpratizWeran / anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhanto	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWantaH 
   'nyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu (Vaidya 84) trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu	anyezu anyezu gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu (VEdyaH 84) tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu
   lokadhātuṣu sarvairekaiko bodhisattva ākruṣṭo 'bhihataḥ paribhāṣitaḥ	lokaDAtuzu sarvEH ekEkaH boDisattvaH AkruzwaH aBihataH pariBAzitaH
   samāna eva, sarve 'pi te upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteran,	samAnaH eva, sarve api te upalamBa saMjQinaH kzAntim samAdAya varteran,
   yāvatsarve te bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartamānāḥ, etena paryāyeṇa	yAvat sarve te boDisattvAH kzAntim samAdAya vartamAnAH, etena paryAyeNa
   sarve te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	sarve te boDisattvAH ekEkaH boDisattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpāṃstiṣṭhan gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānanyeṣvanyeṣu	kalpAn= tizWan gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn anyezu anyezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvairākruṣṭo	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sarvEH AkruzwaH 
   'bhihataḥ paribhāṣitaḥ samānaḥ upalambhasaṃjñī kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteta /	aBihataH pariBAzitaH samAnaH upalamBa saMjQI kzAntim samAdAya varteta /
   evaṃ sarve 'pi te sarvairākruṣṭā abhihatāḥ paribhāṣitāḥ samānā	evam sarve api te sarvEH AkruzwAH aBihatAH pariBAzitAH samAnA
   upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteran / yaś ca bodhisattvo	upalamBa saMjQinaH kzAntim samAdAya varteran / yaH ca boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto	mahAsattvaH anayA prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca parigRhItaH 
   'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm SIla skanDam
   samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ	samADi skanDam prajQA skanDam vimukti skanDam vimukti jQAna darSana skanDam
   teṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ	tezAm ca pratyekabudDAnAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca SrAvakANAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān sarvasattvānāṃ ca	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn sarva sattvAnAm ca
   atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā	atIta anAgata pratyutpannam kuSala mUlam sarvam ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA
   tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā / śreṣṭhayā	tulayitvA niravaSezya niravaSezam anumodate agrayA anumodanayA / SrezWayA
   jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā	jyezWayA varayA pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA anuttamayA niruttamayA
   uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintayā anumodanayā	uttara uttarayA asamayA asamasamayA apratisamayA acintayA anumodanayA
   anumodate / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ	anumodate / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati / asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya	samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati / asya suBUte anumodanA sahagatasya
   puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvakāṇāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	puNya kriyA vastunaH asO pOrvakANAm OpalamBikAnAm boDisattvAnAm
   kṣāntisahagataḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,	kzAnti saha gataH puNya aBisaMskAraH SatatamIm api kalAm na upEti,
   sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api	sahasratamIm api Sata sahasratamIm api kowItamIm api kowI SatatamIm api
   koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm	kowI sahasratamIm api kowI Sata sahasratamIm api kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm
   api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam	api kalAm na upEti, saMKyAm api kalAm api gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam
   api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te	api upanisAm api upanizadam api na kzamate / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi te
   bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartante / tiṣṭhantu khalu	boDisattvAH upalamBa saMjQinaH kzAntim samAdAya vartante / tizWantu Kalu
   punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	punar suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvasattvāḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ / anuttarāṃ	sarva sattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTitAH / anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMprasTAya anyezu anyezu gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvairākruṣṭā abhihatāḥ paribhāṣitāḥ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sarvEH AkruzwAH aBihatAH pariBAzitAH
   samānāḥ upalambhasaṃjñino gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kṣāntiṃ samādāya	samAnAH upalamBa saMjQinaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn kzAntim samAdAya
   vartamānāḥ / ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu	vartamAnAH / ye suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu
   lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā	lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te sarve anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitA
   bhaveyuḥ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	BaveyuH, anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpāṃstiṣṭhantaścaṃkramābhirūḍhā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān aviṣīdanto	kalpAn= tizWantaH caMkrama aBirUXAH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn avizIdantaH 
   'nabhībhūtāḥ styānamiddhenopalambhasaṃjñino vīryaṃ samādāya varteran / yaś	anaBIBUtAH styAnam idDena upalamBa saMjQinaH vIryam samAdAya varteran / yaH 
   ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto	ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya parigRhItaH 
   'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca
   pratyekabuddhānāṃ	pratyekabudDAnAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca SrAvakANAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān (Vaidya 85)	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn (VEdyaH 85)
   sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānān kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārān	sarva sattvAnAm ca atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAn kuSala mUla aBisaMskArAn
   sarvānekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya	sarvAn ekatas aBisaMkzipya piNxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya
   niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā / śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā	niravaSezam anumodate agrayA anumodanayA / SrezWayA jyezWayA varayA
   pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā	pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA anuttamayA niruttarayA uttarottarayA asamayA
   asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate / anumodya	asamasamayA apratisamayA acintyayA anumodanayA anumodate / anumodya
   anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	anumodanA sahagatam puNya kriyA vastu anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmayati / asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau	pariNAmayati / asya suBUte anumodanA sahagatasya puNya kriyA vastunaH asO
   paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vīryamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ	pOrvakaH OpalamBikAnAm boDisattvAnAm vIrya mayaH puNya aBisaMskAraH
   śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api	SatatamIm api kalAm na upEti, sahasratamIm api Sata sahasratamIm api
   koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm	kowItamIm api kowI SatatamIm api kowI sahasratamIm api kowI Sata sahasratamIm
   api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api	api kowI niyuta Sata sahasratamIm api kalAm na upEti, saMKyAm api kalAm api
   gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate	gaNanAm api upamAm api Opamyam api upanisAm api upanizadam api na kzamate
   / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve 'pyupalambhasaṃjñino	/ tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi te boDisattvAH sarve api upalamBa saMjQinaH 
   vīryaṃ samādāya vartante / tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte	vIryam samAdAya vartante / tizWantu Kalu punar suBUte
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH, anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantaścaṃkramābhirūḍhā	saMprasTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWantaH caMkrama aBirUXA
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān aviṣīdanto 'nabhibhūtāḥ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn avizIdantaH anaBiBUtAH
   styānamiddhenopalambhasaṃjñino vīryaṃ samādāya vartamānāḥ / ye 'pi te	styAnam idDena upalamBa saMjQinaH vIryam samAdAya vartamAnAH / ye api te
   subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,	suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH,
   te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ / te sarve	te sarve anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitAH BaveyuH / te sarve
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpānupalambhasaṃjñinaścatvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran / yaś ca bodhisattvo	kalpAnupalamBa saMjQinaH catvAri DyAnAni samApadyeran / yaH ca boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto	mahAsattvaH anayA prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca parigRhItaH 
   'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm sarvezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca
   pratyekabuddhānāṃ	pratyekabudDAnAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn= tezAm ca SrAvakANAm
   śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān sarvasattvānāṃ ca	SIla samADi prajQA vimukti vimukti jQAna darSana skanDAn sarva sattvAnAm ca
   atītānāgatapratyutpannān kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārān sarvānekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAn kuSala mUla aBisaMskArAn sarvAn ekatas aBisaMkzipya
   pīṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /	pINxayitvA tulayitvA niravaSezya niravaSezam anumodate agrayA anumodanayA /
   śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā	SrezWayA jyezWayA varayA pravarayA praNItayA uttamayA anuttamayA
   niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā	niruttarayA uttarottarayA asamayA asamasamayA apratisamayA acintyayA
   anumodanayā anumodate / anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyatriyāvastu	anumodanayA anumodate / anumodya anumodanA sahagatam puNyatriyA vaH tu
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati / asya subhūte	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati / asya suBUte

   bodhisattvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ	boDisattvAnAm catur DyAna mayaH puNya aBisaMskAraH SatatamIm api kalAm
   nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm	na upEti, sahasratamIm api Sata sahasratamIm api kowItamIm api kowI SatatamIm

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām [NOTE: "na	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH saMjAnIte, carati prajQApAramitAyAm [NOTE: "na

   evamahaṃ sarvajñajñānasamanvāgata sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi, evamimān	evam aham sarvajQa jQAna samanvAgata sattveByaH Darmam deSayizyAmi, evam imAn
   sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyeṣa	sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmi iti / tat kasya hetoH? na hi eza
   prajñāpāramitāniṣyando ya imān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti	prajQApAramitA nizyandaH yaH imAn sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmi iti

   sattvāsvabhāvajātikā hi prajñāpāramitāveditavyā / sattvāsvabhāvatayā	sattva asvaBAva jAtikA hi prajQApAramitA veditavyA / sattva asvaBAva tayA

   tathaiva mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti / teṣāṃ tatrāpi suciraṃ	taTA eva mahAnirayAt mahAnirayam saMkramizyanti / tezAm tatra api su ciram
   mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī	mahAnirayAt mahAnirayam saMkrAmatAm tatra api taTA eva tejaH saMvartanI
   prādurbhaviṣyati / te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ punareva	prAdurBavizyati / te tasyAm tejaH saMvartanyAm prAdurBUtAyAm punar eva
   tataścyutāstenaiva akṣīṇena sāvaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā ihaiva lokadhātau punaḥ	tatas cyutAH tena eva akzINena sa avaSezeNa karmaNA iha eva lokaDAtO punar 
   kṣepsyante / kṣiptāḥ santo mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante / te punareva tāni	kzepsyante / kziptAH santaH mahAnirayezu upapatsyante / te punar eva tAni
   mahānirayeṣu mahānti mahānirayaduḥkhāni (Vaidya 91) pratyanubhaviṣyanti /	mahAnirayezu mahAnti mahAniraya duHKAni (VEdyaH 91) pratyanuBavizyanti /
   tāvatpratyanubhaviṣyanti, yāvatpunareva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /	tAvat pratyanuBavizyanti, yAvat punar eva tejaH saMvartanI prAdurBavizyati /
   evaṃ te bahuduḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma pratyanubhaviṣyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ?	evam te bahu duHKa vedanIyam karma pratyanuBavizyanti / tat kasya hetoH?
   yathāpi nāma durbhāṣitatvādvācaḥ //	yaTA api nAma durBAzita tvAt vAcaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   pañca bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  paQca Bagavan
   ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni asya manoduścaritasya vāgduścaritasya	AnantaryANi karmANi kRtAni upacitAni asya manaH duScaritasya vAc duScaritasya
   ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api bhavanti /	ca na prativarNikAni api na anurUpANi api na pratirUpANi api Bavanti /
   bhagavānāha   evametacchāriputra, evam etat / pañcānantaryāṇi śāriputra	BagavAn Aha  evam etat SAriputra, evam etat / paQca AnantaryANi SAriputra
   karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitānyasya manoduścaritasya ca vāgduścaritasya ca na	karmANi kRtAni upacitAni asya manaH duScaritasya ca vAc duScaritasya ca na
   prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api asya karmaṇaḥ	prativarNikAni api na anurUpANi api na pratirUpANi api asya karmaNaH
   kṛtasya saṃcitasya ācitasya upacitasya / ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā	kRtasya saMcitasya Acitasya upacitasya / ye kecid imAm gamBIrA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ	prajQApAramitAm BAzyamANAm deSyamAnAm upadiSyamAnAm uddiSyamAnAm
   pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante, pratikṣepsyanti, pratikrokṣyanti, nātra	pratibADitavyAm maMsyante, pratikzepsyanti, pratikrokzyanti, na atra
   śikṣitavyamiti vakṣyanti, neyaṃ tathāgatabhāṣiteti vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyante, tato	Sikzitavyam iti vakzyanti, na iyam taTAgata BAzitA iti vAcam BAzizyante, tatas 
   'nyān api sattvān vivecayiṣyanti / te svasaṃtānānupahatya	anyAn api sattvAn vivecayizyanti / te sva saMtAnAn upahatya
   parasaṃtānānupahaniṣyanti / te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān	para saMtAnAn upahanizyanti / te sva saMtAnAn savizAn kRtvA para saMtAnAn
   saviṣān kariṣyanti / svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ parān api nāśayiṣyanti / svayaṃ	savizAn karizyanti / svayam nazwAH parAn api nASayizyanti / svayam
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parān api grāhayiṣyanti,	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm ajAnAnAH anavabuDyamAnAH parAn api grAhayizyanti,
   nātra śikṣitavyamiti vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyante / nāhaṃ śāriputra evaṃrūpāṇāṃ	na atra Sikzitavyam iti vAcam BAzizyante / na aham SAriputraH evaMrUpANAm
   pudgalānāṃ darśanamapyabhyanujānāmi, kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā	pudgalAnAm darSanam api aByanujAnAmi, kutas tEH saha saMvAsam kutas vA
   lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam? tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra	lABa satkAram kutas sTAnam? tat kasya hetoH? Darma dUzakAH hi te SAriputra
   tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti / kasambakajātāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ	taTArUpAH pudgalAH veditavyAH iti / kasambaka jAtAH te SAriputra taTArUpAH
   pudgalā veditavyāḥ / kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ	pudgalAH veditavyAH / kRzNA nirjAtikAH kRzNa ahi jAtikAH te SAriputra taTArUpAH
   pudgalā veditavyāḥ / teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ	pudgalAH veditavyAH / tezAm SAriputra taTArUpANAm pudgAlAnAm ye Srotavyam
   maṃsyante, sarve te anayena vyasanamāpatsyante / ye ca śāriputra	maMsyante, sarve te anayena vyasanam Apatsyante / ye ca SAriputra
   prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayanti, ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā	prajQApAramitAm dUzayanti, ime te SAriputra Darma dUzakAH pudgalA
   veditavyāḥ / śāriputra āha   na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya	veditavyAH / SAriputraH Aha  na BagavatA tasya pudgalasya tatra upapannasya
   mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam / bhagavānāha   tiṣṭhatu	mahAniraya gatasya Atma BAvasya pramANam AKyAtam / BagavAn Aha  tizWatu
   śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya	SAriputra tasya pudgalasya tatra upapannasya mahAniraya gatasya Atma BAvasya
   pramāṇam / tatkasya hetoḥ? mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya	pramANam / tat kasya hetoH? mA taTArUpasya pudgalasya tad Atma BAvasya
   pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet, maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet,	pramANam SrutvA uzNam rUDiram muKAt AgacCet, maraNam vA nigacCet ,
   maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkhamāgāḍhamābādhaṃ spṛśet, dahyeta vā, śokaśalyo vā	maraNa mAtrakam vA duHKa mAgAXam AbADam spRSet, dahyeta vA, Soka SalyaH vA
   asyāviśet, mahāprapātaṃ vā prapatet, upaśuṣyeta vā mlāyeta vā / maiva	asya aviSet, mahA prapAtam vA prapatet, upaSuzyeta vA mlAyeta vA / mA eva
   mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante	mahA pratiBayam tasya Atma BAvasya pramANam aSrOzIt yasya ime dozAH saMvidyante
   na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti   iyattasyātmabhāvasya	na BagavAn AyuzmataH SAriputrasya avakASam karoti  iyat tasya Atma BAvasya
   pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro	pramANam Bavizyati iti / dvitIyakam api tRtIyakam api AyuzmAn SAriputraH 
   bhagavantametadavocat   ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya	Bagavantam etat avocat  AKyAtu me BagavAn= tasya pudgalasya Atma BAvasya
   pramāṇam / paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā	pramANam / paScimAyAH janatAyAH AlokaH kRtaH Bavizyatianena vA aFBanaH karmaNA
   kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ	kRtena saMcitena upacitena upacitena evam mahAntam mahAnirayezu Atma BAvam
   parigṛhṇīteti / bhagavānāha   eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ	parigRhNIta iti / BagavAn Aha  ezaH eva SAriputra paScimAyAH janatAyAH AlokaH
   kṛto bhaviṣyati, yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa	kRtaH Bavizyati, yat anena vA aFBana uduScaritena akuSalena karma aBisaMskAreNa
   abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ	aBisaMskRtena saMcitena Acitena upacitena iyat cira duHKam
   pratyanubhaviṣyatīti / yā etasyaiva śāriputra duḥkhasyāprameyatā	pratyanuBavizyati iti / yA etasya eva SAriputra duHKasya aprameya tA
   bahuduḥkhatā (Vaidya 92) vyākhyātā, eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya	bahu duHKa tA (VEdyaH 92) vyAKyAtA, ezaH eva Sukla aMSikasya kula putrasya
   kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati / tataḥ sa tebhyo	kula duhituH vA saMvegaH Bavizyati / tatas sa teByaH 
   dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva	Darma vyasana saMvartanIyeByaH karmaByaH vinivRtya puNya aBisaMskAram eva
   kuryāt, jīvitahetor api saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati   mā bhūdasmākam api	kuryAt, jIvita hetoH api sadDarmam na pratikzepsyati  mA BUt asmAkam api
   tādṛśairduḥkhai samavadhānamiti //	tAdRSEH duHKEH samavaDAnam iti //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  
   susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā	su saMvRta kAya karma vAkkarma manaskarmaNA Bagavan kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA
   vā bhavitavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa	vA Bavitavyam / tat kasya hetoH? yatra hi nAma Bagavan evaMrUpeNa
   vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate / katamena punarbhagavan	vAc durBAzitena iyAt mahA puNya skanDaH prasUyate / katamena punar Bagavan
   karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate / bhagavānāha   evaṃrūpeṇa	karmaNA iyAn mahA puNya skanDaH prasUyate / BagavAn Aha  evaMrUpeNa
   subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate / ihaiva te	suBUte vAc durBAzitena iyAn mahA puNya skanDaH prasUyate / iha eva te
   subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ	suBUte moha puruzAH su AKyAte Darma vinaye pravrajitA Bavizyanti, yaH imAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante, pratikṣeptavyāṃ	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm dUzayitavyAm maMsyante, pratikzeptavyAm
   maṃsyante, pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca	maMsyante, pratibADitavyAm maMsyante / prajQApAramitAyAm ca
   pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhabodhiḥ pratibādhitā bhavati /	pratibADitAyAm budDAnAm BagavatAm budDa boDiH pratibADitA Bavati /
   buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ	budDa boDO pratibADitAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati / sarvajñatāyāṃ pratibādhitāyāṃ	BagavatAm sarvajQa tA pratibADitA Bavati / sarvajQa tAyAm pratibADitAyAm
   saddharmaḥ pratibādhito bhavati / saddharme pratibādhite	sadDarmaH pratibADitaH Bavati / sadDarme pratibADite
   tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaḥ pratibādhito bhavati / tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe 'pi	taTAgata SrAvaka saMGaH pratibADitaH Bavati / taTAgata SrAvaka saMGe api
   pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ	pratibADite evam tasya sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam
   triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyataraś ca	tri ratnAt paribAhya BAvaH Bavati, aprameya asaMKyeyataraH ca
   mahānakuśalakarmābhisaṃskāraḥ parigṛhīto bhavati //	mahAn akuSala karma aBisaMskAraH parigRhItaH Bavati //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  kaH atra Bagavan hetuH
   kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	kaH pratyayaH yat sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm prajQApAramitAm
   pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate? bhagavānāha   mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa	pratibADitavyAm maMsyate? BagavAn Aha  mAra aDizWitaH vA suBUte sa
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati / duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA Bavizyati / duzprajQa saMvartanIyena vA karmaNA
   gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā, nāsya prasādaḥ / ābhyāṃ subhūte	gamBIrezu Darmezu na asya SradDA, na asya prasAdaH / AByAm suBUte
   dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	dvAByAm pApAByAm DarmAByAm samanvAgataH sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate / punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā	imAm prajQApAramitAm pratibADizyate / punar aparam suBUte sa kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati, anabhiyukto vā bhaviṣyati,	kula duhitA vA pApa mitra hasta gataH vA Bavizyati, anaBiyuktaH vA Bavizyati,
   skandhābhiniviṣṭo vā bhaviṣyati, ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako	skanDa aBinivizwaH vA Bavizyati, Atma utkarzI parezAm paMsakaH 
   doṣāntaraprekṣī vā bhaviṣyati / ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa	doza antara prekzI vA Bavizyati / eBiH api suBUte caturBiH AkArEH sa
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA samanvAgataH Bavizyati, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm
   bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate iti //	BAzyamANAm deSyamAnAm upadiSyamAnAm pratibADitavyAm maMsyate iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirayaparivarto nāma saptamaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm niraya parivartaH nAma saptamaH //
   (Vaidya 93)	(VEdyaH 93)
   ASP_8: viśuddhiparivarto 'ṣṭamaḥ /	ASP_8: viSudDi parivartaH azwamaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   duradhimocā bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  duraDimocAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena /	prajQApAramitA anaBiyuktena kuSala mUla virahitena pApa mitra hasta gatena /
   bhagavānāha   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / duradhimocā subhūte	BagavAn Aha  evam etat suBUte, evam etat / duraDimocA suBUte
   prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena	prajQApAramitA anaBiyuktena parItta kuSala mUlena durmeDasA anarTikena
   alpaśrutena hīnaprajñena pāpamitropastabdhena	alpa Srutena hIna prajQena pApa mitra upastabDena
   aśuśrūṣaṇāparipṛcchakajātīyena kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvanabhiyuktena //	aSuSrUzaNA paripRcCaka jAtIyena kuSalezu Darmezu anaBiyuktena //
   subhūtirāha   kiyadgambhīrā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā	suBUtiH Aha  kiyat gamBIrA bata iyam Bagavan prajQApAramitA
   duradhimocatayā? bhagavānāha   rūpaṃ subhūte abaddhamamuktam / tatkasya	duraDi mocatayA? BagavAn Aha  rUpam suBUte abadDam amuktam / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? rūpāsvabhāvatvātsubhūte rūpamabaddhamamuktam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā	hetoH? rUpa asvaBAva tvAt suBUte rUpam abadDam amuktam / evam vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ subhūte abaddhamamuktam / tatkasya hetoḥ?	saMskArAH / vijQAnam suBUte abadDam amuktam / tat kasya hetoH?
   vijñānāsvabhāvatvātsubhūte vijñānamabaddhamamuktam / rūpasya subhūte	vijQAna asvaBAva tvAt suBUte vijQAnam abadDam amuktam / rUpasya suBUte
   pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? pūrvāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte	pUrva antaH abadDaH amuktaH / tat kasya hetoH? pUrva anta asvaBAvam hi suBUte
   rūpam / rūpasya subhūte aparānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	rUpam / rUpasya suBUte apara antaH abadDaH amuktaH / tat kasya hetoH?
   aparāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte rūpam / pratyutpannaṃ subhūte	apara anta asvaBAvam hi suBUte rUpam / pratyutpannam suBUte
   rūpamabaddhamuktam / tatkasya hetoḥ? pratyutpannāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte	rUpam abadDam uktam / tat kasya hetoH? pratyutpanna asvaBAvam hi suBUte
   pratyutpannaṃ rūpam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñāṃ saṃskārāḥ / vijñānasya subhūte	pratyutpannam rUpam / evam vedanA saMjQAm saMskArAH / vijQAnasya suBUte
   pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? pūrvāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte	pUrva antaH abadDaH amuktaH / tat kasya hetoH? pUrva anta asvaBAvam hi suBUte
   vijñānam / vijñānasya subhūte aparānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	vijQAnam / vijQAnasya suBUte apara antaH abadDaH amuktaH / tat kasya hetoH?
   aparāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte vijñānam / pratyutpannaṃ subhūte	apara anta asvaBAvam hi suBUte vijQAnam / pratyutpannam suBUte
   vijñānamabaddhamamuktam / tatkasya hetoḥ? pratyutpannāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte	vijQAnam abadDam amuktam / tat kasya hetoH? pratyutpanna asvaBAvam hi suBUte
   pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam //	pratyutpannam vijQAnam //
   subhūtirāha   duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā, paramaduradhimocā	suBUtiH Aha  duraDimocA Bagavan prajQApAramitA, parama duraDi mocA
   bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena	Bagavan prajQApAramitA anaBiyuktena anavaropita kuSala mUlena
   pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā	pApa mitra hasta gatena mAra vaSa gatena kusIdena hIna vIryeNa muzita smRtinA
   duṣprajñena / bhagavānāha   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / duradhimocā	duzprajQena / BagavAn Aha  evam etat suBUte, evam etat / duraDimocA
   subhūte prajñāpāramitā, paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā	suBUte prajQApAramitA, parama duraDimocA suBUte prajQApAramitA
   anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena	anaBiyuktena anavaropita kuSala mUlena pApa mitra hasta gatena mAra vaSa gatena

   subhūte rūpaviśuddhiḥ, sā phalaviśuddhiḥ, yā phalaviśuddhiḥ, sā	suBUte rUpa viSudDiH, sA Pala viSudDiH, yA Pala viSudDiH, sA

   hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā	hi suBUte akRtAH sarva DarmAH taTAgatena arhatA
   samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ / subhūtirāha   tasmāttarhi bhagavan	samyaksaMbudDena aBisaMbudDAH / suBUtiH Aha  tasmAt tarhi Bagavan
   sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena?	sarva DarmAH anaBisaMbudDAH taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena?
   bhagavānāha   tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit / yā ca	BagavAn Aha  taTA hi suBUte prakRtyA eva na te DarmAH kiMcid / yA ca
   prakṛtiḥ, sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca prakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ	prakRtiH, sA aprakRtiH, yA ca prakRtiH, sA prakRtiH
   sarvadharmāṇāmekalakṣaṇatvādyaduta alakṣaṇatvāt / tasmāttarhi subhūte	sarva DarmANAm eka lakzaNa tvAt yat uta alakzaNa tvAt / tasmAt tarhi suBUte
   sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena / tatkasya	sarva DarmAH anaBisaMbudDAH taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? na hi subhūte dve dharmaprakṛtī / ekaiva hi subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ	hetoH? na hi suBUte dve Darma prakRtI / ekA eva hi suBUte sarva DarmANAm
   prakṛtiḥ / yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca	prakRtiH / yA ca suBUte sarva DarmANAm prakRtiH, sA aprakRtiH, yA ca
   aprakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ / evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā	aprakRtiH, sA prakRtiH / evam etAH suBUte sarvAH saFga kowyaH vivarjitA
   bhavanti //	Bavanti //
   subhūtirāha   gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / bhagavānāha  	suBUtiH Aha  gamBIrA Bagavan prajQApAramitA / BagavAn Aha

   duranubodhā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / bhagavānāha   tathā hi subhūte na	duranuboDA Bagavan prajQApAramitA / BagavAn Aha  taTA hi suBUte na
   kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate / āha   acintyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /	kaScid aBisaMbuDyate / Aha  acintyA Bagavan prajQApAramitA /
   bhagavānāha   tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na	BagavAn Aha  taTA hi suBUte prajQApAramitA na cittena jQAtavyAH na
   cittagamanīyā / āha   akṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / bhagavānāha  	citta gamanIyAH / Aha  akRtA Bagavan prajQApAramitA / BagavAn Aha

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm caran na rUpe carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam
   sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu / sacenna vijñāne carati,	saced na vedanAyAm na saMjQAyAm na saMskArezu / saced na vijQAne carati,

   na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sacedrūpaṃ śūnyamiti na carati,	na carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / saced rUpam SUnyam iti na carati,

   śūnyamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sacedrūpamapratipūrṇaṃ	SUnyam iti na carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / saced rUpam apratipUrNam

   prajñāpāramitāyām //	prajQApAramitAyAm //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   āścaryaṃ bhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  AScaryam Bagavan

   / bhagavānāha   rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati, carati	/ BagavAn Aha  rUpam sa saFgam asaFgam iti suBUte na carati, carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam

   carati prajñāpāramitāyām / srotaāpattiphalaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati,	carati prajQApAramitAyAm / srotaApatti Palam sa saFgam asaFgam iti na carati,

   sarvajñatāpi subhūte sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /	sarvajQa tA api suBUte sa saFgAsaFgA iti na carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm /
   evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati, na	evam caran suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na rUpe saFgam janayati, na
   vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu / na vijñāne saṅgaṃ janayati / na	vedanAyAm na saMjQAyAm na saMskArezu / na vijQAne saFgam janayati / na

   janayati / na pṛthivīdhātau saṅgaṃ janayati, yāvanna vijñānadhātau saṅgaṃ	janayati / na pRTivI DAtO saFgam janayati, yAvat na vijQAna DAtO saFgam
   janayati, na dānapāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati, na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na	janayati, na dAna pAramitAyAm saFgam janayati, na SIla pAramitAyAm na

   prajñāpāramitā nāma / yā deśyamānāpi na parihīyate, adeśyamānāpi na	prajQApAramitA nAma / yA deSyamAnA api na parihIyate, adeSyamAnA api na

   samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta, nākāśasya	samyaksaMbudDaH yAvajjIvam tizWan= AkASasya varNam BAzeta, na AkASasya

   namaskartavyāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yairayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ	namaskartavyAH te Bagavan boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH, yEH ayam saMnAhaH
   saṃnaddhaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ	saMnadDaH / tat kasya hetoH? AkASena sArDam sa Bagavan saMnadDu kAmaH yaH
   sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti / mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhagavan	sattvAnAm kRtaSas saMnAham baDnAti / mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / SUraH Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH ya
   ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ	AkASa samAnAm sattvAnAm DarmaDAtu samAnAm sattvAnAm kRtaSas saMnAham

   bhagavan parimocayitukāmaḥ / ākāśaṃ sa bhagavan utkṣeptukāmaḥ /	Bagavan parimocayitu kAmaH / AkASam sa Bagavan utkzeptu kAmaH /

   atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya	aTa Kalu anyatamaH BikzuH yena BagavAn= tena aQjalim praNamya

   nirodhayati //	niroDayati //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   ya ārya	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yaH Arya
   subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate, kva sa yogamāpatsyate?	suBUte atra prajQApAramitAyAm eva yogam Apatsyate, kva sa yogam Apatsyate?
   subhūtirāha   ākāśe sa kauśika yogamāpatsyate, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	suBUtiH Aha  AkASe sa kOSika yogam Apatsyate, yaH prajQApAramitAyAm

   / tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ	/ tasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA rakzA AvaraNa guptim karomi yaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati / atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ	prajQApAramitAm DArayati / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Sakram
   devānāmindrametadavocat   samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya	devAnAm indram etat avocat  samanupaSyasi tvam kOSika tam Darmam yasya
   dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi? śakra āha   no hīdamārya subhūte /	Darmasya rakzA AvaraNa guptim karizyasi? SakraH Aha  no hi idam Arya suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ	suBUtiH Aha  evam kOSika saced boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yaTA nirdizwAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati, saiva tasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptirbhaviṣyati /	prajQApAramitAyAm sTAsyati, sA eva tasya rakzA AvaraNa guptiH Bavizyati /
   atha virahito bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitayā, lapsyante 'sya avatāraprekṣiṇo	aTa virahitaH Bavizyati prajQApAramitayA, lapsyante asya avatAra prekziNaH 
   'vatāragaveṣiṇo manuṣyāś ca amanuṣyāś ca avatāram / api ca kauśika	avatAra gaveziNaH manuzyAH ca amanuzyAH ca avatAram / api ca kOSika
   ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta, yo bodhisattvasya	AkASasya sa rakzA AvaraNa guptim saMviDAtavyAm manyeta, yaH boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	mahAsattvasya rakzA AvaraNa guptim saMviDAtavyAm manyeta prajQApAramitAyAm
   carataḥ / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā	carataH / tat kim manyase kOSika pratibalaH tvam pratiSrutkAyA
   rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum? śakra āha   na hyetadārya subhūte /	rakzA AvaraNa gupti saMviDAtum? SakraH Aha  na hi etat Arya suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	suBUtiH Aha  evam eva kOSika boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti / sa ca tānna	caran viharan pratiSrutka upamAH sarva DarmAH iti parijAnAti / sa ca tAn na
   manyate, na samanupaśyati, na jānāti na saṃjānīte / te ca dharmā na	manyate, na samanupaSyati, na jAnAti na saMjAnIte / te ca DarmAH na
   vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati /	vidyante na saMdRSyante na saMvidyante na upalaByante iti viharati /
   sacedevaṃ viharati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //	saced evam viharati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm //
   atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro	aTa Kalu budDa anuBAvena ye tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO catvAraH 
   mahārājānaḥ, sarve ca śakrā devendrāḥ, sarve ca mahābrahmāṇaḥ, sahāpatiś	mahA rAjAnaH, sarve ca SakrAH deva indrAH, sarve ca mahA brahmANaH, sahApatiH 
   ca mahābrahmā, te sarve yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ / (Vaidya 99)	ca mahA brahmA, te sarve yena BagavAn= tena upasaMkrAntAH / (VEdyaH 99)
   upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ	upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya Bagavantam tris 
   pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'tiṣṭhan / ekānte sthitāś ca te mahārājānaḥ, sarve	pradakziNIkRtya ekAnte atizWan / ekAnte sTitAH ca te mahA rAjAnaH, sarve
   ca śakrā devendrāḥ, sarve ca brahmakāyikā devā mahābrahmāṇaśca, sahāpatiś	ca SakrAH deva indrAH, sarve ca brahmakAyikAH devAH mahA brahmANaH ca, sahApatiH

   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti //	prajQApAramitAm BAzizyate iti //

   (Vaidya 100)	(VEdyaH 100)
   ASP_9: stutiparivarto navamaḥ /	ASP_9: stuti parivartaH navamaH /

   bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat / tacca nāma idamiti nopalabhyate /	Bagavat nAmaDeya mAtram etat / tat ca nAma idam iti na upalaByate /
   vāgvastveva nāmetyucyate / sāpi prajñāpāramitā na vidyate nopalabhyate /	vAc vastu eva nAma iti ucyate / sA api prajQApAramitA na vidyate na upalaByate /
   yathaiva nāma, tathaiva prajñāpāramitā / yathā prajñāpāramitā tathā nāma /	yaTA eva nAma, taTA eva prajQApAramitA / yaTA prajQApAramitA taTA nAma /
