   sarvadharmāvikalpatāmupādāya / anāmapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma avikalpa tAm upAdAya / anAma pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   skandhānupalabdhitāmupādāya / agamanapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	skanDa anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / agamana pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāgamanatāmupādāya / asaṃhāryapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma Agamana tAm upAdAya / asaMhArya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāgrāhyatāmupādāya / akṣayapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma agrAhya tAm upAdAya / akzaya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   akṣayadharmayogatāmupādāya / anutpattipāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	akzaya Darma yoga tAm upAdAya / anutpatti pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmānabhinirvṛttitāmupādāya / akārakapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma anaBinirvRtti tAm upAdAya / akAraka pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   kārakānupalabdhitāmupādāya / ajānakapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	kAraka anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / ajAnaka pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāṇāmanātmatāmupādāya / asaṃkrāntipāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva DarmANAm anAtma tAm upAdAya / asaMkrAnti pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   cyutyupapattyanupattitāmupādāya / avinayapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	cyuti upapatti anupatti tAm upAdAya / avinaya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannārthānupalabdhitāmupādāya /	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpanna arTa anupalabDi tAm upAdAya /
   svapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsamarīcimāyāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	svapna pratiSrutka apratiBAsa marIci mAyA pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   anutpādavijñāpanatāmupādāya / asaṃkleśapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	anutpAda vijQApana tAm upAdAya / asaMkleSa pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   rāgadveṣamohāsvabhāvatāmupādāya / avyavadānapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	rAga dveza moha asvaBAva tAm upAdAya / avyavadAna pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   āśrayānupalabdhitāmupādāya / anupalepapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	ASraya anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / anupalepa pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   ākāśānupalepatāmupādāya / aprapañcapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	AkASAn upalepa tAm upAdAya / aprapaQca pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmamananasamatikramatāmupādāya / amananapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma manana sam atikramatAm upAdAya / amanana pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   aniñjanatāmupādāya / acalitapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	aniQjana tAm upAdAya / acalita pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   dharmadhātusthititāmupādāya / virāgapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	DarmaDAtu sTiti tAm upAdAya / virAga pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāvitathatāmupādāya / asamutthānapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma avitaTa tAm upAdAya / asamutTAna pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmanirvikalpatāmupādāya / śāntapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma nirvikalpa tAm upAdAya / SAnta pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmanimittānupalabdhitāmupādāya / nirdoṣapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma nimitta anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / nirdoza pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   guṇapāramitāmupādāya / niḥkleśapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan parikalpāsattāmupādāya	guNa pAramitAm upAdAya / niHkleSa pAramitA iyam Bagavan parikalpa asat tAm upAdAya
   / niḥsattvapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bhūtakoṭitāmupādāya / apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ	/ niHsattva pAramitA iyam Bagavan BUtakowi tAm upAdAya / apramANa pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan sarvadharmasamutthānāsamutthānatāmupādāya /	Bagavan sarva Darma samutTAna asamutTAna tAm upAdAya /
   antadvayānanugamapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmānabhiniveśanatāmupādāya /	anta dvayAn anugama pAramitA iyam Bagavan sarva Darma anaBiniveSana tAm upAdAya /
   asaṃbhinnapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāsaṃbhedanatāmupādāya /	asaMBinna pAramitA iyam Bagavan sarva Darma asaMBedana tAm upAdAya /
   aparāmṛṣṭapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	aparAmRzwa pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyaspṛhaṇatāmupādāya / avikalpapāramiteyaṃ	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi aspRhaNa tAm upAdAya / avikalpa pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan vikalpasamatāmupādāya / aprameyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	Bagavan vikalpa sama tAm upAdAya / aprameya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   apramāṇadharmatāmupādāya / asaṅgapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	apramANa Darma tAm upAdAya / asaFga pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāsaṅgatāmupādāya / anityapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma asaFga tAm upAdAya / anitya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāsaṃskṛtatāmupādāya / duḥkhapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma asaMskRta tAm upAdAya / duHKa pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   ākāśasamadharmatāmupādāya / śūnyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	AkASa sama Darma tAm upAdAya / SUnya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmānupalabdhitāmupādāya / anātmapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / anAtma pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmānabhiniveśanatāmupādāya / alakṣaṇapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	sarva Darma anaBiniveSana tAm upAdAya / alakzaNa pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmānabhinirvṛttitāmupādāya (Vaidya 103) / sarvaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ	sarva Darma anaBinirvRtti tAm upAdAya (VEdyaH 103) / sarva SUnyatA pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan anantāparyantatāmupādāya /	Bagavan ananta aparyanta tAm upAdAya /
   smṛtyupasthānādibodhipakṣadharmapāramiteyaṃ	smRti upasTAna Adi boDi pakza Darma pAramitA iyam
   bhagavaṃsteṣāmanupalabdhitāmupādāya / śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitapāramiteyaṃ	Bagavan= tezAm anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan trivimokṣamukhānupalabdhitāmupādāya / aṣṭavimokṣapāramiteyaṃ	Bagavan tri vimokza muKa anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / azwa vimokza pAramitA iyam
   bhagavaṃsteṣāmanupalabdhitāmupādāya / navānupūrvavihārapāramiteyaṃ	Bagavan= tezAm anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / nava anupUrva vihAra pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan prathamadhyānādīnāmanupalabdhitāmupādāya / catuḥsatyapāramiteyaṃ	Bagavan praTa ma DyAna AdInAm anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / catur satya pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan duḥkhādīnāmanupalabdhitāmupādāya / daśapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	Bagavan duHKa AdInAm anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / daSa pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   dānādīnāmanupalabdhitāmupādāya / balapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	dAna AdInAm anupalabDi tAm upAdAya / bala pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   anavamṛdyatāmupādāya / vaiśāradyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	anavamRdyatAm upAdAya / vESAradya pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   atyantānavalīnatāmupādāya / pratisaṃvitpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	atyantAnavalIna tAm upAdAya / pratisaMvid pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvajñatāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya / sarvabuddhadharmāveṇikapāramiteyaṃ	sarvajQa tA saFga apratiGAti tAm upAdAya / sarva budDa Darma AveNika pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan gaṇanāsamatikramatāmupādāya / tathāgatatathatāpāramiteyaṃ	Bagavan gaNanA samatikrama tAm upAdAya / taTAgata taTatA pAramitA iyam
   bhagavan sarvadharmāvitathatāmupādāya / svayaṃbhūpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan	Bagavan sarva Darma avitaTa tAm upAdAya / svayaMBU pAramitA iyam Bagavan
   sarvadharmāsvabhāvatāmupādāya / sarvajñajñānapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta	sarva Darma asvaBAva tAm upAdAya / sarvajQa jQAna pAramitA iyam Bagavan yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmasvabhāvasarvākāraparijñānatāmupādāyeti //	prajQApAramitA sarva Darma svaBAva sarva AkAra parijQAna tAm upAdAya iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ stutiparivarto nāma navamaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm stuti parivartaH nAma navamaH //
   (Vaidya 104)	(VEdyaH 104)
   ASP_10: dhāraṇaguṇaparikīrtanaparivarto daśamaḥ /	ASP_10: DAraNa guNa parikIrtana parivartaH daSamaH /
   atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste	aTa Kalu Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  pUrva jina kRta aDikArAH te
   kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,	kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca Bavizyanti bahu budDa avaropita kuSala mUlAH,
   kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāśca bhaviṣyanti, yeṣāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā	kalyANa mitra parigRhItAH ca Bavizyanti, yezAm iyam prajQApAramitA
   śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati / kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmevaṃ gambhīrāṃ	Srotra avaBAsam api Agamizyati / kaH punar vAdaH yaH enAm evam gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti /
   udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya	udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryavApya pravartya deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya
   svādhyāyya tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya	su ADyAyya taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya
   yogamāpatsyante / na te avaramātrakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā	yogam Apatsyante / na te avara mAtrakeNa kuSala mUlena samanvAgatA
   bhaviṣyanti / bahubuddhaparyupāsitāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca	Bavizyanti / bahu budDa paryupAsitAH te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca
   bhaviṣyanti / paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca te buddhā bhagavanto	Bavizyanti / paripRzwAH paripraSnIkRtAH ca te budDAH BagavantaH 
   bhaviṣyanti kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiścaināmeva prajñāpāramitām / śrutā	Bavizyanti kula putrEH kula duhitRBiH ca enAm eva prajQApAramitAm / SrutA
   ceyaṃ paurvakāṇāmapi tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt, ya	ca iyam pOrvakANAm api taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDa AnAm antikAt, ya
   enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmetarhyapi śroṣyanti / śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti	enAm prajQApAramitAm etarhi api Srozyanti / SrutvA ca udgrahIzyanti
   dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti, taTatvAya Sikzizyante,
   tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante /	taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante /
   bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ, ya	bahu budDa avaropita kuSala mUlAH te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca veditavyAH, ya
   etasyāmeva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	etasyAm eva gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm uddiSyamAnAyAm svADyAyyamAnAyAm na avalezyante
   na saṃleṣyante, na viṣatsyanti na viṣādamāpatsyante, na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti	na saMlezyante, na vizatsyanti na vizAdam Apatsyante, na vipRzWIkarizyanti
   mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na	mAnasam, na Bagna pRzWIkarizyanti, na utrasizyanti na saMtrasizyanti na
   saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //	saMtrAsam Apatsyante //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya imam evaMrUpam
   caitasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya bhagavantametadavocat   yo bhagavan	ca etasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya Bagavantam etat avocat  yaH Bagavan
   ihaivaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	iha evam gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   abhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya	aBiSraddaDat avakalpayan= aDimucya prasanna cittaH boDAya cittam utpAdya
   enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati	enAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati
   pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati, tathatvāya	pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzati uddekzyati svADyAsyati, taTatvAya
   śikṣiṣyate, tathatvāya pratipatsyate, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyate,	Sikzizyate, taTatvAya pratipatsyate, taTatvAya yogam Apatsyate,
   yathāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā sa dhārayitavyaḥ /	yaTA vinivartanIyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH taTA sa DArayitavyaH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? gambhīrā bhagavan iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā / na hi bhagavan	tat kasya hetoH? gamBIrAH Bagavan iyam prajQApAramitA / na hi Bagavan
   parīttakuśalamūlenāparipṛcchakajātīyena aśrutvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	parItta kuSala mUlena aparipRcCaka jAtIyena aSrutvA budDAnAm BagavatAm
   saṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamacaritavatā ihaiveyamevaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā	saMmuKIBAvataH pUrvam acaritavatA iha eva iyam evam gamBIrA prajQApAramitA
   adhimoktuṃ śakyā / ye punaranadhimucya enāmanavabudhyamānāḥ	aDimoktum SakyAH / ye punar anaDimucya enAm anavabuDyamAnAH
   pratikṣeptavyāṃ maṃsyante, pūrvāntato'pi bhagavaṃstaiḥ kulaputraiḥ	pratikzeptavyAm maMsyante, pUrva antataH api Bagavan= tEH kula putrEH
   kuladuhitṛbhiśceyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /	kula duhitRBiH ca iyam gamBIrA prajQApAramitA BAzyamANA pratikziptA /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma parīttatvātkuśalamūlānām / na hi bhagavan	tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api nAma parItta tvAt kuSala mUlAnAm / na hi Bagavan
   acaritavadbhiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śakyā adhimoktum /	acaritavadBiH pUrva antataH iyam gamBIrA prajQApAramitA SakyAH aDimoktum /
   ye'pi ca pratikṣepsyanti enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇām,	ye api ca pratikzepsyanti enAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm BAzyamANAm,
   te'pyevaṃ veditavyāḥ   pūrvāntato'pyebhiriyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā	te api evam veditavyAH  pUrva antataH api eBiH iyam gamBIrA prajQApAramitA
   bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā / tathā hyeṣāmasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	BAzyamANA pratikziptA / taTA hi ezAm asyAm gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāsti śraddhāḥ, nāsti kṣāntirnāsti rucirnāsti cchando nāsti	BAzyamANAyAm na asti SradDAH, na asti kzAntiH na asti ruciH na asti cCandaH na asti
   vīryaṃ (Vaidya 105) nāstyapramādo nāstyadhimuktiḥ, na caibhiḥ pūrvaṃ	vIryam (VEdyaH 105) na asti apramAdaH na asti aDimuktiH, na ca eBiH pUrvam
   buddhā bhagavanto buddhaśrāvakā vā paripṛṣṭāḥ, na ca paripraśnīkṛtā iti //	budDAH BagavantaH budDa SrAvakAH vA paripRzwAH, na ca paripraSnIkRtAH iti //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   gambhīrā	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  gamBIrA
   ārya śāriputra prajñāpāramitā / kimatrāścaryaṃ syādyadasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	Arya SAriputra prajQApAramitA / kim atra AScaryam syAt yat asyAm gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pūrvamacaritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm pUrvam acaritAvI boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   nādhimucyeta? atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat  	na aDimucya ita? aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  
   namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai / sarvajñajñānasya sa	namaskaromi Bagavan prajQApAramitAyE / sarvajQa jQAnasya sa
   bhagavannamaskāraṃ karoti, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /	Bagavat namaskAram karoti, yaH prajQApAramitAyE namaskAram karoti /
   bhagavānāha   evameva kauśika, evametat / sarvajñajñānasya sa kauśika	BagavAn Aha  evam eva kOSika, evam etat / sarvajQa jQAnasya sa kOSika
   namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti / tatkasya	namaskAram karoti yaH prajQApAramitAyE namaskAram karoti / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? atonirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /	hetoH? atonirjAtA hi kOSika budDAnAm BagavatAm sarvajQa tA /
   sarvajñajñānanirjātā ca punaḥ prajñāpāramitā prabhāvyate / evamasyāṃ	sarvajQa jQAna nirjAtA ca punar prajQApAramitA praBAvyate / evam asyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam / evamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /	prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam / evam asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm sTAtavyam /
   evamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipattavyam / evamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	evam asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm pratipattavyam / evam asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   yogamāpattavyam //	yogam Apattavyam //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   kathaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  kaTam Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito	prajQApAramitAyAm caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm sTitaH 
   bhavati? kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate?	Bavati? kaTam prajQApAramitAyAm caran prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apadyate?
   evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   sādhu sādhu kauśika /	evam ukte BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  sADu sADu kOSika /
   sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kauśika yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ	sADu Kalu punar tvam kOSika yaH tvam taTAgatam arhantam
   samyaksaṃbuddhamenamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase /	samyaksaMbudDam enam arTam pariprazwavyam paripraSnIkartavyam manyase /
   idamapi te kauśika buddhānubhāvena pratibhānamutpannam / iha kauśika	idam api te kOSika budDa anuBAvena pratiBAnam utpannam / iha kOSika
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati, rūpamiti	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran rUpe na tizWati, rUpam iti
   na tiṣṭhati / yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,	na tizWati / yatas kOSika boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH rUpe na tizWati,
   rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate / evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ	rUpam iti na tizWati, evam rUpe yogam Apadyate / evam vedanAyAm saMjQAyAm
   saṃskāreṣu / vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati / yataḥ kauśika	saMskArezu / vijQAne na tizWati, vijQAnam iti na tizWati / yatas kOSika
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vijQAne na tizWati, vijQAnam iti na tizWati, evam
   vijñāne yogamāpadyate / rūpamiti kauśika na yojayati, yataḥ kauśika	vijQAne yogam Apadyate / rUpam iti kOSika na yojayati, yatas kOSika
   rūpamiti na yojayati, evaṃ rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati / evaṃ	rUpam iti na yojayati, evam rUpam iti na tizWati / evam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamiti kauśika na yojayati, yataḥ kauśika	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam iti kOSika na yojayati, yatas kOSika
   vijñānamiti na yojayati, evaṃ vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati / evaṃ	vijQAnam iti na yojayati, evam vijQAnam iti na tizWati / evam
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati / evaṃ yogamāpadyate //	prajQApAramitAyAm sTitaH Bavati / evam yogam Apadyate //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā / duravagāhā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / durudgrahā bhagavan	prajQApAramitA / duravagAhAH Bagavan prajQApAramitA / durudgrahAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā / apramāṇā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / bhagavānāha  	prajQApAramitA / apramANA Bagavan prajQApAramitA / BagavAn Aha  
   evametacchāriputra, evametat / rūpaṃ gambhīramiti śāriputra na tiṣṭhati /	evam etat SAriputra, evam etat / rUpam gamBIram iti SAriputra na tizWati /
   yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate /	yatas SAriputra rUpam gamBIram iti na tizWati, evam rUpe yogam Apadyate /
   evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śāriputra gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati /	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam SAriputra gamBIram iti na tizWati /
   yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ vijñāne	yatas SAriputra vijQAnam gamBIram iti na tizWati, evam vijQAne
   yogamāpadyate / rūpaṃ śāriputra gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate (Vaidya 106)	yogam Apadyate / rUpam SAriputra gamBIram iti na yogam Apadyate (VEdyaH 106)
   / yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate, evaṃ rūpaṃ	/ yatas SAriputra rUpam gamBIram iti na yogam Apadyate, evam rUpam
   gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śāriputra	gamBIram iti na tizWati / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam SAriputra
   gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate / yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na	gamBIram iti na yogam Apadyate / yatas SAriputra vijQAnam gamBIram iti na
   yogamāpadyate, evaṃ vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati //	yogam Apadyate, evam vijQAnam gamBIram iti na tizWati //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā bhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā avinivartanīyasya vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	prajQApAramitA avinivartanIyasya vyAkRtasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   purato bhāṣitavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ? sa hi bhagavan na kāṅkṣiṣyati, na	puratas BAzitavyA / tat kasya hetoH? sa hi Bagavat na kAFkzizyati, na
   vicikitsiṣyati na dhaṃdhāyiṣyati na vivadiṣyati //	vicikitsizyati na DaMDAyizyati na vivadizyati //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   sacetpunarārya śāriputra avyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata	saced punar Arya SAriputra avyAkRtasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya purata
   iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta, ko doṣo bhavet? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ	iyam prajQApAramitA BAzyeta, kaH dozaH Bavet? evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH
   śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   dūrataḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva	Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  dUratas sa kOSika boDisattvaH mahAsattva
   āgato veditavyaḥ / cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa kauśika	AgataH veditavyaH / cira yAna saMprasTitaH paripakva kuSala mUlaH sa kOSika
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, yo'vyākṛta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH, yaH avyAkRtaH imAm prajQApAramitAm
   lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya / śrutvā ca	lapsyate darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya SravaNAya / SrutvA ca
   notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate / na cedānīmasau	na utrasizyati na saMtrasizyati na saMtrAsam Apatsyate / na ca idAnIm asO
   cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / āsannaṃ tasya	cireNa vyAkaraNam pratilapsyate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / Asannam tasya
   vyākaraṇaṃ veditavyam / sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naikaṃ vā dvau vā trīn	vyAkaraNam veditavyam / sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na ekam vA dvO vA trIn
   vā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānatikramiṣyati, tato vyākaraṇaṃ	vA taTAgatAn arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn atikramizyati, tatas vyAkaraNam
   pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / api tu tānārāgayiṣyati,	pratilapsyate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / api tu tAn ArAgayizyati,
   ārāgayitvā tāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānna virāgayiṣyati /	ArAgayitvA tAn= taTAgatAn arhataH samyaksaMbudDAt na virAgayizyati /
   tathāgatadarśanaṃ ca vyākaraṇenāvandhyaṃ kariṣyati, tathāgatadarśanācca	taTAgata darSanam ca vyAkaraNena avanDyam karizyati, taTAgata darSanAt ca
   tato vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / yāvacca	tatas vyAkaraNam pratilapsyate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / yAvat ca
   vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, tāvadavandhyaṃ	vyAkaraNam pratilapsyate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO, tAvat avanDyam
   kariṣyati tathāgatadarśanavandanaparyupāsanopasthānaṃ yāvannānuttarāṃ	karizyati taTAgata darSana vandana paryupAsana upasTAnam yAvat na anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddha iti //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH iti //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   dūrataḥ sa bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  dUratas sa Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato bhaviṣyati / cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ /	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH AgataH Bavizyati / cira yAna saMprasTitaH /
   paripakvakuśalamūlo hi bhagavan sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, ya	paripakva kuSala mUlaH hi Bagavan sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH, ya
   imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya	imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm lapsyate darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya
   śravaṇāya / kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati	SravaNAya / kaH punarvAdaH atra yaH SrutvA ca udgrahIzyati DArayizyati
   vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati	vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati
   svādhyāsyati //	su ADyAsyati //
   atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   evametacchāriputra,	aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  evam etat SAriputra,
   evametat / dūrataḥ sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /	evam etat / dUratas sa SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH AgataH veditavyaH /
   cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ / paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo	cira yAna saMprasTitaH / paripakva kuSala mUlaH hi sa SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate	mahAsattvaH Bavizyati, yaH imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm lapsyate
   darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya / kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā	darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya SravaNAya / kaH punarvAdaH atra yaH SrutvA
   codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati	ca udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati pravartayizyati
   deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //	deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati su ADyAsyati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   pratibhāti me	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  pratiBAti me
   bhagavan, pratibhāti me sugata aupamyodāharaṇam / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan	Bagavan, pratiBAti me sugataH Opamya udAharaNam / tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan
   yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svapnāntaragato'pi	yaH ayam boDisattva yAnikaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA svapna antara gataH api
   bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet, veditavyametadbhagavan, ayaṃ bodhisattvo (Vaidya 107)	boDimaNxe nizIdet, veditavyam etat Bagavan, ayam boDisattvaH (VEdyaH 107)
   mahāsattva āsanno'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti / evameva	mahAsattvaH AsannaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDeH aBisaMboDAya iti / evam eva
   bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	Bagavan yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm
   lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya, kaḥ punarvādaḥ	lapsyate darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya SravaNAya, kaH punar vAdaH
   śrutvā codgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ	SrutvA ca udgrahItum DArayitum vAcayitum paryavAptum pravartayitum
   deśayituṃ upadeṣṭuṃ uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyāpanāya / veditavyametadbhagavan	deSayitum upadezwum uddezwum svADyApanAya / veditavyam etat Bagavan
   dūrato'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgala āgataścirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ /	dUratas ayam boDisattva yAnikaH pudgalaH AgataH cira yAna saMprasTitaH /
   āsanno'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo vyākaraṇasya / vyākariṣyantyenaṃ	AsannaH ayam boDisattva yAnikaH pudgalaH vyAkaraNasya / vyAkarizyanti enam
   buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāḥ	budDAH BagavantaH boDisattvam mahAsattvam anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti / cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ	samyaksaMboDeH aBisaMboDAya iti / cira yAna saMprasTitaH
   paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, yasyeyaṃ	paripakva kuSala mUlaH hi sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH, yasya iyam
   gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate'ntaśaḥ śravaṇāyāpi / kaḥ punarvādo'tra	gamBIrA prajQApAramitA upapatsyate antaSas SravaNAya api / kaH punarvAdaH atra
   bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā enāṃ gambhīrāṃ	Bagavan yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vE enAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati paryavApsyati
   pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati / tatkasya	pravartayizyati deSayizyati upadekzyati uddekzyati su ADyAsyati / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? bhūyastvena hi bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ sattvāḥ	hetoH? BUyastvena hi Bagavan Darma vyasana saMvartanIyEH sattvAH
   karmopacayairavihitāḥ, teṣāṃ bhūyastvena asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	karma upacayEH avihitAH, tezAm BUyastvena asyAm gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cittāni pratikūlāni bhaviṣyanti, cittāni	prajQApAramitAyAm cittAni pratikUlAni Bavizyanti, cittAni
   parivellayiṣyanti / na hyanupacitakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā asyāṃ bhūyastvena	parivellayizyanti / na hi anupacita kuSala mUlAH sattvAH asyAm BUyastvena
   bhūtakoṭyāṃ praskandanti prasīdanti / upacitakuśalamūlāḥ khalu punaste	BUtakowyAm praskandanti prasIdanti / upacita kuSala mUlAH Kalu punar te
   bhagavan sūpacitakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,	Bagavan su upacita kuSala mUlAH kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca veditavyAH,
   yeṣāmasyāṃ bhūtakoṭyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati prasīdati / tadyathāpi nāma	yezAm asyAm BUtakowyAm cittam praskandati prasIdati / tat yaTA api nAma
   bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikādaṭavīkāntārād dviyojanaśatikādvā	Bagavan puruzaH yojana SatikAt awavI kAntArAt dvi yojana SatikAt vA
   triyojanaśatikādvā caturyojanaśatikādvā pañcayojanaśatikādvā	tri yojana SatikAt vA catur yojana SatikAt vA paQca yojana SatikAt vA
   daśayojanaśatikādvā aṭavīkāntārānniṣkrāmet / sa niṣkramya	daSa yojana SatikAt vA awavI kAntArAt nizkrAmet / sa nizkramya
   paśyetpūrvanimittāni gopālakān vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmasaṃpado vā	paSyet pUrva nimittAni gopAlakAn vA paSupAlakAn vA sImA vA ArAma saMpadaH vA
   vanasaṃpado vā, tato'nyāpi va nimittāni, yairnimittairgrāmo vā nagaraṃ vā	vana saMpadaH vA, tatas anyA api va nimitta ani, yEH nimittEH grAmaH vA nagaram vA
   nigamo va sūcyeta / tasya tāni pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭaivaṃ bhavati  	nigamaH va sUcyeta / tasya tAni pUrva nimittAni dRzwA evam Bavati  
   yathemāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante, tathā āsanno me grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā	yaTA imAni pUrva nimittAni dRSyante, taTA AsannaH me grAmaH vA nagaram vA
   nigamo vā iti / sa āśvāsaprāpto bhavati / nāsya bhūyaścoramanasikāro	nigamaH vA iti / saH ASvAsa prAptaH Bavati / na asya BUyas cora manasikAraH 
   bhavati / evameva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā	Bavati / evam eva Bagavan yasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya iyam gamBIrA
   prajñāpāramitā upavartate, veditavyaṃ tena bhagavan	prajQApAramitA upavartate, veditavyam tena Bagavan
   abhyāsanno'smyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, nacireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ	aByAsannaH asmi anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH, nacireNa vyAkaraNam
   pratilapsye'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti / nāpi tenotrasitavyaṃ na	pratilapsye anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH iti / na api tena utrasitavyam na
   saṃtrasitavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmervā pratyekabuddhabhūmervā /	saMtrasitavyam na Betavyam SrAvaka BUmeH vA pratyekabudDa BUmeH vA /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi asyemāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante yadutemāṃ	tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi asya imAni pUrva nimittAni saMdRSyante yat uta imAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm laBate darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya
   śravaṇāya / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	SravaNAya / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   evametacchāriputra, evametat / pratibhātu te śāriputra	evam etat SAriputra, evam etat / pratiBAtu te SAriputra
   punarapyetatsthānam, yathāpi nāmaitadbuddhānubhāvena vyāharasi	punar api etat sTAnam, yaTA api nAma etat budDa anuBAvena vyAharasi
   vyāhariṣyasi ca //	vyAharizyasi ca //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   tadyathāpi nāma	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  tat yaTA api nAma
   bhagavan iha kaścideva puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet / sa	Bagavan iha kaScid eva puruzaH mahA samudram drazwu kAmaH Bavet / sa
   gacchenmahāsamudraṃ darśanāya / yathā yathā ca sa gacchenmahāsamudraṃ	gacCet mahA samudram darSanAya / yaTA yaTA ca sa gacCet mahA samudram
   darśanāya, tathā tathā sacetpaśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā	darSana aya, taTA taTA saced paSyet stambam vA stamba nimittam vA parvatam vA
   (Vaidya 108) parvatanimittaṃ vā, tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre tāvadito	(VEdyaH 108) parvata nimittam vA, tena evam veditavyam dUre tAvat itas 
   mahāsamudra iti / sacenna bhūyaḥ paśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā	mahA samudraH iti / saced na BUyas paSyet stambam vA stamba nimittam vA
   parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā, tenaivaṃ veditavyam   abhyāsanna ito	parvatam vA parvata nimittam vA, tena evam veditavyam  aByAsannaH itas 
   mahāsamudra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ? anupūrvanimno hi mahāsamudraḥ, na	mahA samudraH iti / tat kasya hetoH? anupUrva nimnaH hi mahA samudraH, na
   mahāsamudrasyābhyantare kaścitstambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā	mahA samudrasya aByantare kaScid stambaH vA stamba nimittam vA parvataH vA
   parvatanimittaṃ veti / kiṃcāpi sa na mahāsamudraṃ sākṣātpaśyati cakṣuṣā,	parvata nimittam vA iti / kiMca api sa na mahA samudram sAkzAt paSyati cakzuzA,
   atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati   abhyāsanno'smi mahāsamudrasya, neto	aTa ca punar sa nizWAm gacCati  aByAsannaH asmi mahA samudrasya, neto
   bhūyo dūre mahāsamudra iti / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvena	BUyas dUre mahA samudraH iti / evam eva Bagavan boDisattvena
   mahāsattvenemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvatā veditavyam   kiṃcāpyahaṃ	mahAsattvena imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm SRNvatA veditavyam  kiMca api aham
   taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairna saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛtaḥ, atha ca	tEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH na saMmuKam vyAkRtaH, aTa ca
   punarabhyāsanno'smyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇasya / tatkasya	punar aByAsannaH asmi anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH vyAkaraNasya / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? tathā hyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya	hetoH? taTA hi enAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm laBate darSanAya vandanAya
   paryupāsanāya śravaṇāyeti / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante	paryupAsanAya SravaNAya iti / tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan vasante
   pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu nānāvṛkṣeṣu nānāpallavāḥ prādurbhavanti	pratyupasTite SIrNa parNa palASezu nAnA vRkzezu nAnA pallavAH prAdurBavanti
   / pallaveṣu prādurbhūteṣvāttamanaskā bhavanti jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ tāni	/ pallavezu prAdurBUtezu Atta manaskAH Bavanti jAmbUdvIpakAH manuzyAH tAni
   pūrvanimittāni vaneṣu dṛṣṭvā nacirādvanapuṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca	pUrva nimittAni vanezu dRzwvA nacirAt vana puzpANi ca PalAni ca
   prādurbhaviṣyanti / tatkasya heto? tathā hi imāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu	prAdurBavizyanti / tat kasya heto? taTA hi imAni pUrva nimittAni stambezu
   dṛśyanta iti / evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate imāṃ	dRSyante iti / evam eva Bagavan yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH laBate imAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya SravaNAya,
   upavartate tasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā / tadā paripakvakuśalaḥ sa	upavartate tasya iyam gamBIrA prajQApAramitA / tadA paripakva kuSalaH sa
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ   tenaiva pūrvakeṇa	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH  tena eva pUrvakeNa
   kuśalamūlenopanāmiteyaṃ tasmai gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā / tatra yā devatāḥ	kuSala mUlena upanAmitA iyam tasmE gamBIrA prajQApAramitA / tatra yAH devatAH
   pūrvabuddhadarśinyaḥ, tāḥ pramuditā bhavanti prītisaumanasyajātāḥ  	pUrva budDa darSinyaH, tAH pramuditAH Bavanti prIti sOmanasya jAtAH  
   paurvakāṇāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimānyeva	pOrvakANAm api boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm imAni eva
   pūrvanimittānyabhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇāya / nacireṇa	pUrva nimittAni aBUvan= anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH vyAkaraNAya / nacireNa
   batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ	bata ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vyAkaraNam pratilapsyate anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheriti / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strī gurviṇī gurugarbhā /	samyaksaMboDeH iti / tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan strI gurviNI guru garBAH /
   tasyā yadā kāyo veṣṭate, adhimātraṃ vā kāyaklamatho jāyate, na ca sā	tasyAH yadA kAyaH vezwate, aDimAtram vA kAya klamaTaH jAyate, na ca sA
   caṃkramaṇaśīlā bhavati / alpāhārā ca bhavati / alpastyānamiddhā ca bhavati	caMkramaNa SIlA Bavati / alpa AhArA ca Bavati / alpa styAna midDA ca Bavati
   / alpabhāṣyā ca bhavati / alpasthāmā ca bhavati / vedanābahulā ca bhavati	/ alpaBAzyA ca Bavati / alpa sTAmA ca Bavati / vedanA bahulA ca Bavati
   / krandantī ca bahulaṃ viharati / na ca saṃvāsaśīlā bhavati /	/ krandantI ca bahulam viharati / na ca saMvAsa SIlA Bavati /
   paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena	pOrvakeNa ayoni SomanasikAreNa Asevitena nizevitena BAvitena bahulIkRtena
   imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ pratyanubhavāmīti, tadā veditavyamidaṃ	imAm evaMrUpAm kAyena vedanAm pratyanuBavAmi iti, tadA veditavyam idam
   bhagavan   yathāsyāḥ pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante, tathā nacireṇa bateyaṃ	Bagavan  yaTA asyAH pUrva nimittAni saMdRSyante, taTA nacireNa bata iyam
   strī prasoṣyate iti / evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvasya	strI prasozyate iti / evam eva Bagavan yadA boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate darśanāya vandanāya	mahAsattvasya iyam gamBIrA prajQApAramitA upavartate darSanAya vandanAya
   paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya, śṛṇvataścaināṃ ramate cittamasyāṃ	paryupAsanAya SravaNAya, SRNvataH ca enAm ramate cittam asyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyām, arthikatayā cotpadyate, tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan  	prajQApAramitA AyAm, arTika tayA ca utpadyate, tadA veditavyam idam Bagavan  
   nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ	nacireNa bata ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vyAkaraNam
   pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //	pratilapsyate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH iti //
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   sādhu sādhu śāriputra /	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  sADu sADu SAriputra /
   idamapi te śāriputra buddhānubhāvena pratibhāti / atha khalvāyuṣmān	idam api te SAriputra budDa anuBAvena pratiBAti / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsuparigṛhītāśca	suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  AScaryam Bagavan yAvat su parigRhItAH ca
   suparīttāśca suparīnditāśca ime bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatenārhatā	su parIttAH ca su parInditAH ca ime boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH taTAgatena arhatA
   samyaksaṃbuddhena / bhagavānāha   tathā hi te subhūte bodhisattvā	samyaksaMbudDena / BagavAn Aha  taTA hi te suBUte boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya (Vaidya 109) pratipannā bahujanasukhāya	mahAsattvAH bahu jana hitAya (VEdyaH 109) pratipannAH bahu jana suKAya
   lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca	loka anukampAyE mahataH jana kAyasya arTAya hitAya suKAya devAnAm ca
   manuṣyāṇāṃ ca / anukampakā anukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ	manuzyANAm ca / anukampakAH anukampAm upAdAya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ / anuttarāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmAH / anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyānuttaraṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmāḥ //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya anuttaram Darmam deSayitu kAmAH //
   subhūtirāha   iha bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	suBUtiH Aha  iha Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carataḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati? bhagavānāha  	carataH kaTam prajQApAramitA BAvanA paripUrim gacCati? BagavAn Aha  
   yadi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasya	yadi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran na rUpasya
   vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ na vedanāyā na	vRdDim samanupaSyati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam na vedanAyAH na
   saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām / na vijñānasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati, carati	saMjQAyAH na saMskArANAm / na vijQAnasya vRdDim samanupaSyati, carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām / na rūpasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati, carati	prajQApAramitAyAm / na rUpasya parihANim samanupaSyati, carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām / na	prajQApAramitAyAm / evam na vedanAyAH na saMjQAyAH na saMskArANAm / na
   vijñānasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / dharmaṃ na	vijQAnasya parihANim samanupaSyati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / Darmam na
   samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / adharmamapi na samanupaśyati,	samanupaSyati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / aDarmam api na samanupaSyati,
   carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evamasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ	carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam asya prajQApAramitA BAvanA paripUrim
   gacchati //	gacCati //
   subhūtirāha   acintyamidaṃ bhagavan deśyate / bhagavānāha   rūpaṃ hi	suBUtiH Aha  acintyam idam Bagavan deSyate / BagavAn Aha  rUpam hi
   subhūte acintyam / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ hi subhūte	suBUte acintyam / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam hi suBUte
   acintyam / rūpamacintyamityapi subhūte na saṃjānīte, carati	acintyam / rUpam acintyam iti api suBUte na saMjAnIte, carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamacintyamityapi subhūte	prajQApAramitAyAm / evam vedanA saMskArAH / vijQAnam acintyam iti api suBUte
   na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //	na saMjAnIte, carati prajQApAramitAyAm //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   ko'tra bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  kaH atra Bagavan
   adhimokṣayiṣyati evaṃgambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha   yaḥ	aDimokzayizyati evaMgamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm? BagavAn Aha  yaH
   śāriputra caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyām,	SAriputra caritAvI boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Bavizyati prajQApAramitAyAm,
   so'tra prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣayiṣyati / āyuṣmān śāriputra āha   kathaṃ	saH atra prajQApAramitAyAm aDimokzayizyati / AyuzmAn SAriputraH Aha  kaTam
   bhagavan caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati, kathaṃ caritāvīti	Bagavan caritAvI boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Bavizyati, kaTam caritAvI iti
   nāmadheyaṃ labhate? bhagavānāha   iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	nAmaDeyam laBate? BagavAn Aha  iha SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   balāni na kalpayati, vaiśāradyāni na kalpayati, buddhadharmānapi na	balAni na kalpayati, vESAradyAni na kalpayati, budDa DarmAn api na
   kalpayati, sarvajñatāmapi na kalpayati / tatkasya hetoḥ? balāni hi	kalpayati, sarvajQa tAm api na kalpayati / tat kasya hetoH? balAni hi
   śāriputra acintyāni, vaiśāradyānyapyacintyāni, buddhadharmā apyacintyāḥ	SAriputra acintya ani, vESAradyAni api acintyAni, budDa DarmAH api acintyAH
   sarvajñatāpyacintyā, sarvadharmā apyacintyāḥ / evaṃ caritāvī śāriputra	sarvajQa tA apya cintyA, sarva DarmAH api acintyAH / evam caritAvI SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvaciccarati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ sa	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na kvacid carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam sa
   caritāvītyucyate, caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate //	caritAvI iti ucyate, caritAvI iti nAmaDeyam laBate //
   atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā / ratnarāśirbhagavan prajñāpāramitā / śuddharāśirbhagavan	prajQApAramitA / ratna rASiH Bagavan prajQApAramitA / SudDarASiH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā ākāśaśuddhatāmupādāya / āścaryaṃ bhagavan syādyadenāṃ	prajQApAramitA AkASa SudDa tAm upAdAya / AScaryam Bagavan syAt yat ena am
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ	prajQApAramitAm udgRhNatAm DArayatAm vAcayatAm paryavApnuvatAm
   pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca	pravartayatAm deSayatAm upadiSatAm uddiSatAm su ADyAyatAm liKatAm ca
   kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyeran / evamukte	kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca bahavaH antarAyAH utpadyeran / evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evametat /	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam etat /
   bahavaḥ subhūte antarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ	bahavaH suBUte antarAyAH imAm prajQApAramitAm udgRhNatAm DArayatAm
   vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ	vAcayatAm paryavApnuvatAm pravartayatAm deSayatAm upadiSatAm uddiSatAm
   svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca (Vaidya 110)	su ADyAya tAm liKatAm ca kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca (VEdyaH 110)
   bhaviṣyati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte imāṃ	Bavizyati / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi suBUte imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ	prajQApAramitAm udgRhNatAm DArayatAm vAcayatAm paryavApnuvatAm
   pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca	pravartayatAm deSayatAm upadiSatAm uddiSatAm su ADyAyatAm liKatAm ca
   kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate'ntarāyaṃ	kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca mAraH pApIyAn Otsukyam Apatsyate antarAyam
   kartum / tatra śīghraṃ likhatā sacenmāsena vā māsadvayena vā māsatrayeṇa	kartum / tatra SIGram liKatA saced mAsena vA mAsa dvayena vA mAsa trayeNa
   vā likhyeta, likhitavyaiva bhavet / sacetsaṃvatsareṇa tato vāpareṇa	vA liKyeta, liKitavyA eva Bavet / saced saMvatsareNa tatas vA apareNa
   likhitā bhavet, tathāpi likhitavyaiva khalu punaḥ subhūte bhavati tena	liKitAH Bavet, taTA api liKitavyA eva Kalu punar suBUte Bavati tena
   kulaputreṇa kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ	kula putreNa kula duhitrA vA iyam prajQApAramitA / tat kasya hetoH? evam
   hyetatsubhūte bhavati yanmahāratnānāṃ bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyante //	hi etat suBUte Bavati yat mahA ratnAnAm bahavaH antarAyAH utpadyante //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   iha bhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  iha Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm udgRhyamANAyAm DAryamANAyAm vAcyamAnAyAm
   paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ	paryavApyamAnAyAm pravartyamAnAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm uddiSyamAnAyAm svADyAyyamAnAyAm liKyamAnAyAm
   ca māraḥ pāpīyān bahuprakāramautsukyamāpatsyate, antarāyakarmaṇa udyogaṃ	ca mAraH pApIyAn bahu prakAram Otsukyam Apatsyate, antarAya karmaNaH udyogam
   ca kariṣyati / bhagavānāha   kiṃcāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānudyogamāpatsyate	ca karizyati / BagavAn Aha  kiMca api suBUte mAraH pApIyAn udyogam Apatsyate
   antarāyakarmaṇaḥ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ	antarAya karmaNaH asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm udgRhyamANAyAm DAryamANAyAm
   vācyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ	vAcyamAnAyAm paryavApyamAnAyAm pravartyamAnAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm uddiSyamAnAyAm svADyAyyamAnAyAm liKyamAnAyAm
   ca, atha ca punarna prasahiṣyate'cchidrasamādānasya bodhisattvasya	ca, aTa ca punar na prasahizyate acCidra samAdAnasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāntarāyaṃ kartum //	mahAsattvasya antarAyam kartum //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   yadā bhagavan imāṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  yadA Bagavan imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ	prajQApAramitAm udgRhNatAm DArayatAm vAcayatAm paryavApnuvatAm
   pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca	pravartayatAm deSayatAm upadiSatAm uddiSatAm su ADyAyatAm liKatAm ca
   kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate	kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca mAraH pApIyAn Otsukyam Apatsyate
   antarāyakaraṇāya, tadā kathametarhi bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca	antarAya karaNAya, tadA kaTam etarhi Bagavan kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti	imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti
   paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti	paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti
   svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca? kasya cānubhāvena bhagavaṃste kulaputrāḥ	su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti ca? kasya ca anuBAvena Bagavan= te kula putrAH
   kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti	kula duhitaraH ca imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti
   vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca? evamukte	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti ca? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   buddhānāṃ śāriputra bhagavatāṃ	BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  budDAnAm SAriputra BagavatAm
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanubhāvena te kulaputrāḥ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm anuBAvena te kula putrAH
   kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti	kula duhitaraH ca imAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti
   vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti ca,
   tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya	taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya
   yogamāpatsyante / tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi śāriputra dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, ye	yogam Apatsyante / tat kasya hetoH? ezA hi SAriputra DarmANAm Darma tA, ye
   te'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante	te aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti, te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti	yApayanti, te imAm prajQApAramitAm samanvAharizyanti parigrahIzyanti
   bhāṣyamāṇāmudgṛhyamāṇāṃ dhāryamāṇāṃ vācyamānāṃ paryavāpyamānāṃ	BAzyamANAm udgRhyamANAm DAryamANAm vAcyamAnAm paryavApyamAnAm
   pravartyamānāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ svādhyāyyamānāṃ	pravartyamAnAm deSyamAnAm upadiSyamAnAm uddiSyamAnAm svADyAyyamAnAm
   likhyamānāṃ ca / ye caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāḥ	liKyamAnAm ca / ye ca enAm prajQApAramitAm kula putrAH
   kuladuhitaraścodgrahīṣyanti (Vaidya 111) dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti	kula duhitaraH ca udgrahIzyanti (VEdyaH 111) DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti
   paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti	paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti
   svādhyāsyanti ca, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante,	su ADyAsyanti ca, taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante,
   tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, tāṃśca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāhariṣyanti	taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante, tAn= ca te budDAH BagavantaH samanvAharizyanti
   parigrahīṣyanti ca / na hi śāriputra buddhasamanvāhṛtānāṃ	parigrahIzyanti ca / na hi SAriputra budDa samanvAhRtAnAm
   buddhaparigṛhītānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śakyamantarāyaṃ	budDa parigRhItAnAm ca kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca Sakyam antarAyam
   kartum //	kartum //
   evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   ye'pi te bhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  ye api te Bagavan
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti
   udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti ca,
   tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya	taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya
   yogamāpatsyante, sarve te bhagavan buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena	yogam Apatsyante, sarve te Bagavan budDa anuBAvena budDa aDizWAnena
   buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti	budDa parigraheNa ca imAm prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti udgrahIzyanti
   dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti ca,
   tathatvāya ca śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya	taTatvAya ca Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya
   yogamāpatsyante, evaṃ ca saṃpādayiṣyanti //	yogam Apatsyante, evam ca saMpAdayizyanti //
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   evametacchāriputra,	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  evam etat SAriputra,
   evametat / sarve te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhānubhāvena	evam etat / sarve te SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH budDa anuBAvena
   buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	budDa aDizWAnena budDa parigraheNa ca imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm
   śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	Srozyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti
   likhiṣyanti ca, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante,	liKizyanti ca, taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante,
   tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante / jñātāste śāriputra tathāgatena /	taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante / jQAtAH te SAriputra taTAgatena /
   adhiṣṭhitāste śāriputra tathāgatena / dṛṣṭāste śāriputra tathāgatena /	aDizWitAH te SAriputra taTAgatena / dRzwAH te SAriputra taTAgatena /
   vyavalokitāste śāriputra tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā / ye te bodhisattvā	vyavalokitAH te SAriputra taTAgatena budDa cakzuzA / ye te boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti	mahAsattvAH imAm prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti
   vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti

   tathatvāya ca śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya	taTatvAya ca Sikzizyante, taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya
   yogamāpatsyante, śrutvo udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya	yogam Apatsyante, Srutvas udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryavApya pravartya
   deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣamāṇāstathatvāya	deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya liKitvA taTatvAya SikzamANAH taTatvAya
   pratipadyamānāstathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā āsannībhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāḥ	pratipadyamAnAH taTatvAya yogam ApadyamAnAH AsannIBavizyanti anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tathatvāya sthāsyantyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye / ye'pi	samyaksaMboDeH, taTatvAya sTAsyanti anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye / ye api
   śāriputra enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti	SAriputraH enAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti
   paryavāpsyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti	paryavApsyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti
   likhiṣyanti, na ca tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, na ca tathatvāya	liKizyanti, na ca taTatvAya Sikzizyante, na ca taTatvAya
   pratipatsyante, na ca tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, te na tathatvāya	pratipatsyante, na ca taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante, te na taTatvAya
   śikṣamāṇā na tathatvāya pratipadyamānā na tathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā na	SikzamANAH na taTatvAya pratipadyamAnAH na taTatvAya yogam ApadyamAnAH na
   tathatāyāṃ sthāsyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, te'pi śāriputra	taTatAyAm sTAsyanti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO, te api SAriputra
   tathāgatena jñātāḥ / te'pi tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitāḥ / te'pi tathāgatena	taTAgatena jQAtAH / te api taTAgatena aDizWitAH / te api taTAgatena
   dṛṣṭāḥ / te'pi tathāgatena vyavalokitā buddhacakṣuṣā / teṣāmapi śāriputra	dRzwAH / te api taTAgatena vyavalokitAH budDa cakzuzA / tezAm api SAriputra
   mahārthiko mahānuśaṃso mahāphalo mahāvipākaśca sa pariśramaḥ parispandaśca	mahArTikaH mahA anuSaMsaH mahA PalaH mahA vipAkaH ca sa pariSramaH parispandaH ca
   bhaviṣyati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā paramārthopasaṃhitā	Bavizyati / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi prajQApAramitA parama arTa upasaMhitA
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaprativedhāya pratyupasthitā sarvasattvānām /	sarva DarmANAm yaTABUta prativeDAya pratyupasTitA sarva sattvAnAm /
   (Vaidya 112) ime khalu punaḥ śāriputra ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ	(VEdyaH 112) ime Kalu punar SAriputra zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAH
   sūtrāntāstathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyanti,	sUtrAntAH taTAgatasya atyayena dakziNApaTe pracarizyanti,
   dakṣiṇāpathātpunareva vartanyāṃ pracariṣyanti, vartanyāḥ punaruttarapathe	dakziNApaTAt punar eva vartanyAm pracarizyanti, vartanyAH punar uttara paTe
   pracariṣyanti / navamaṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye	pracarizyanti / nava maNxa prApte Darma vinaye
   saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye samanvāhṛtāste śāriputra tathāgatena	sadDarmasya antarDAna kAla samaye samanvAhRtAH te SAriputra taTAgatena
   kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca / tasmin kāle ya imāṃ	kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca / tasmin kAle yaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti, vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti, vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, antaśo	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti, antaSas 
   likhitvā pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti, jñātāste śāriputra	liKitvA pustaka gatAm api kRtvA DArayizyanti, jQAtAH te SAriputra
   tathāgatena / adhiṣṭhitāste śāriputra tathāgatena / dṛṣṭāste śāriputra	taTAgatena / aDizWitAH te SAriputra taTAgatena / dRzwAH te SAriputra
   tathāgatena / vyavalokitāste śāriputra tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā //	taTAgatena / vyavalokitAH te SAriputra taTAgatena budDa cakzuzA //
   śāriputra āha   iyamapi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā evaṃgambhīrā paścime kāle	SAriputraH Aha  iyam api Bagavan prajQApAramitA evaMgamBIrA paScime kAle
   paścime samaye vaistārikī bhaviṣyatyuttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge?	paScime samaye vEstArikI Bavizyati uttarasyAm diSi uttare diS BAge?
   bhagavānāha   ye tatra śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge imāṃ	BagavAn Aha  ye tatra SAriputraH uttarasyAm diSi uttare diS BAge imAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyante,	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm SrutvA atra prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apatsyante,
   te vaistārikīṃ kariṣyati / cirayānasaṃprasthitāste śāriputra bodhisattvā	te vEstArikIm karizyati / cira yAna saMprasTitAH te SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti	mahAsattvAH veditavyAH, ye imAm prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti liKizyanti
   udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti, taTatvAya Sikzizyante,
   tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante //	taTatvAya pratipatsyante, taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante //
   śāriputra āha   kiyantaste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti	SAriputraH Aha  kiyantaH te Bagavan boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti
   uttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge, bahava utāho alpakāḥ? ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	uttarasyAm diSi uttare digBAge, bahavaH uta aho alpakAH? yaH imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti	prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti liKizyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti
   vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti	vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti
   upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya	upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti, taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya
   pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante? bhagavānāha   bahavaste	pratipatsyante, taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante? BagavAn Aha  bahavaH te
   śāriputra subahavaḥ uttarāpathe uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge bodhisattvā	SAriputra su bahavaH uttarApaTe uttarasyAm diSi uttare digBAge boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti / kiṃcāpi śāriputra bahavaste, tebhyo'pi	mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti / kiMca api SAriputra bahavaH te, teByaH api
   bahubhyo'lpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	bahuByaH alpakAH te boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti, yaH imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti	prajQApAramitAm Srozyanti liKizyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti
   vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti	vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti
   upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya	upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti, taTatvAya Sikzizyante, taTatvAya
   pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca	pratipatsyante, taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante, prajQApAramitAyAm ca
   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante, na viṣatsyanti na	BAzyamANAyAm na avalezyante na saMlezyante, na vizatsyanti na
   viṣādamāpatsyante, na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti mānasam, na	vizAdam Apatsyante, na vipRzWIkarizyanti mAnasam, na

   saṃtrāsamāpatsyante, cirayānasaṃprasthitāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	saMtrAsam Apatsyante, cira yAna saMprasTitAH te boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   veditavyāḥ / anubaddhāstaiḥ paurvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,	veditavyAH / anubadDAH tEH pOrvakAH taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH,
   paripṛṣṭāḥ paripṛcchitāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāḥ / pūjitāśca taiḥ	paripRzwAH paripRcCitAH paripraSnIkRtAH / pUjitAH ca tEH
   paurvakāstathāgatā arhanta samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca	pOrvakAH taTAgatAH arhanta samyaksaMbudDAH kula putrEH kula duhitRBiH ca
   bodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ / śīleṣu ca te paripūrṇakāriṇo bhaviṣyanti,	boDisattva yAnikEH pudgalEH / SIlezu ca te paripUrNa kAriNaH Bavizyanti,
   bahujanasya ca te'rthaṃ kariṣyanti, yaduta imāmevānuttarāṃ	bahu janasya ca te arTam karizyanti, yat uta imAm eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ (Vaidya 113)	samyaksaMboDim AraBya / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi tezAm (VEdyaH 113)
   kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca mayaiva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā	kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca mayA eva sarvajQa tA pratisaMyuktA eva kaTA
   kṛtā / teṣāṃ jātivyativṛttānāmapi eta eva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ	kRtA / tezAm jAti vyativRttAnAm api ete eva sarvajQa tA pratisaMyuktAH
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti / enāmeva ca te kathāṃ	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAH samudAcArAH Bavizyanti / enAm eva ca te kaTAm
   kariṣyanti, enāmeva ca kathāmabhinandiṣyanti, yaduta anuttarāṃ	karizyanti, enAm eva ca kaTAm aBinandizyanti, yat uta anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya / teṣu ca susthitāḥ samāhitāśca bhaviṣyanti asyāṃ	samyaksaMboDim AraBya / tezu ca susTitAH samAhitAH ca Bavizyanti asyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyām / māreṇāpi te na śakyā bhedayitum, kutaḥ punaranyaiḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm / mAreNa api te na SakyAH Bedayitum, kutas punar anyEH
   sattvaiḥ, yaduta cchandato vā mantrato vā / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma	sattvEH, yat uta cCandataH vA mantrataH vA / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api nAma
   taddṛḍhasthāmatvādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / te ca kulaputrāḥ	tad dRXa sTAma tvAt anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / te ca kula putrAH
   kuladuhitaraśca śrutvā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudāraṃ prītiprāmodyaprasādaṃ	kula duhitaraH ca SrutvA enAm prajQApAramitAm udAram prIti prAmodya prasAdam
   pratilapsyante / bahujanasya ca te kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti	pratilapsyante / bahu janasya ca te kuSala mUlAni avaropayizyanti

   kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca mamāntike saṃmukhaṃ vāgbhāṣitā   bahūni	kula putrEH kula duhitRBiH ca mama antike saMmuKam vAc BAzitA  bahUni
   prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni	prANi SatAni bahUni prANi sahasrANi bahUni prANi Sata sahasrANi bahUni
   prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi	prANi kowI SatAni bahUni prANi kowI sahasrANi bahUni prANi kowI Sata sahasrANi
   bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto	bahUni prANi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi boDisattva caryAm carantaH 
   vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ	vayam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO prasTApayizyAmaH saMdarSayizyAmaH
   samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ	samAdApayizyAmaH samuttejayizyAmaH saMpraharzayizyAmaH saMpraBAvayizyAmaH

   tatkasya hetoḥ? anumoditaṃ hi śāriputra mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ	tat kasya hetoH? anumoditam hi SAriputra mayA tezAm boDisattva yAnikAnAm
   kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya yairiyaṃ	kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca cittena cittam vyavalokya yEH iyam
   vāgbhāṣitā   bodhāya caranto vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni	vAc BAzitAH  boDAya carantaH vayam bahUni prANi SatAni bahUni

   saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ	saMdarSayizyAmaH samAdApayizyAmaH samuttejayizyAmaH saMpraharzayizyAmaH

   kariṣyāma iti / evaṃ ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca udārādhimuktikā	karizyAmaH iti / evam ca te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca udAra aDimuktikA
   bhaviṣyanti, yadanyānyapi te buddhakṣetrāṇyadhyālambitavyāni maṃsyante /	Bavizyanti, yat anyAni api te budDa kzetrANi aDyAlambitavyAni maMsyante /
   yatra saṃmukhībhūtāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ	yatra saMmuKIBUtAH taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH Darmam

   sūtrāntā upapatsyante upanaṃsyante, nānye? bhagavānāha   ye cānye'pi	sUtrAntAH upapatsyante upanaMsyante, na anye? BagavAn Aha  ye ca anye api
   śāriputra gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti, te'pi teṣāṃ	SAriputra gamBIrAH gamBIrAH sUtrAntAH Bavizyanti, te api tezAm

   daśamaḥ //	daSamaH //
   (Vaidya 115)	(VEdyaH 115)
   ASP_11: mārakarmaparivarta ekādaśaḥ /	ASP_11: mAra karma parivartaH ekAdaSaH /

   ityutthāyāsanātprakramiṣyanti / idam api subhūte mārakarma veditavyam / na	iti utTAya AsanAt prakramizyanti / idam api suBUte mAra karma veditavyam / na

   'tra grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nāmadheyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yatra no	atra grAmasya vA nagarasya vA nigamasya vA nAmaDeyam parigRhItam yatra no
   janma, na no 'tra nāma gotraṃ vā gṛhītam, na mātāpitrornāma gotraṃ vā	janma, na naH atra nAma gotram vA gRhItam, na mAtA pitroH nAma gotram vA

   tairyāvadbhiścittotpādaistathā tathā tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsārasya punaḥ punaḥ	tEH yAvadBiH citta utpAdEH taTA taTA tAvataH kalpAn saMsArasya punar punar

   tatkasmāt? imāṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmaśṛṇvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	tat kasmAt? imAm hi suBUte prajQApAramitAm aSRNvantaH boDisattvAH mahAsattvA

   mārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā imāṃ	mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalAH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya ye te sūtrāntā	prajQApAramitAm sarvajQa jQAnasya AhArikAm vivarjya utsRjya ye te sUtrAntA
   naiva sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāstān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante / idam api	na eva sarvajQa jQAnasya AhArikAH tAn paryezitavyAn maMsyante / idam api
   subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam / yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte na	suBUte tezAm mAra karma veditavyam / yaTA Kalu punar suBUte na
   laukikalokottareṣu śikṣitukāmā na laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryātukāmā	lOkika lokottarezu Sikzitu kAmA na lOkika lokottarezu Darmezu niryAtu kAmA
   iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣante / prajñāpāramitāyāmaśikṣamāṇā na	iha prajQApAramitAyAm na Sikzante / prajQApAramitAyAm aSikzamANAH na
   laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryānti / evaṃ te parīttabuddhayo	lOkika lokottarezu Darmezu niryAnti / evam te parItta budDayaH 
   laukikalokottarāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyā mūlaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya	lOkika loka uttarANAm yaTABUta parijQAyAH mUlam prajQApAramitAm vivarjya
   utsṛjya praśākhāmadhyālambitavyāṃ maṃsyante / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte	utsRjya praSAKAm aDyAlambitavyAm maMsyante / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   kukkuraḥ svāmino 'ntikātpiṇḍāṃśchorayitvā karmakarasyāntikātkavalaṃ	kukkuraH svAminaH antikAt piNxAn= CorayitvA karmakarasya antikAt kavalam
   paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta, evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke	paryezitavyam manyeta, evam eva suBUte Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani eke
   bodhisattvayānikāḥ, pudgalāḥ, ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasya	boDisattva yAnikAH, pudgalAH, ye imAm prajQApAramitAm sarvajQa jQAnasya
   mūlaṃ chorayitvā śākhāpatrapalālabhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne (Vaidya	mUlam CorayitvA SAKA patra palAla BUte SrAvaka pratyekabudDa yAne (VEdya
   116) sāraṃ vṛddhatvaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante / idam api subhūte teṣāṃ	116) sAram vRdDa tvam paryezitavyam maMsyante / idam api suBUte tezAm
   mārakarma veditavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi te 'lpabuddhayo jñāsyanti  	mAra karma veditavyam / tat kasya hetoH? na hi te alpabudDayaH jQAsyanti  
   prajñāpāramitā āhārikā sarvajñajñānasyeti / te prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya	prajQApAramitA AhArikA sarvajQa jQAnasya iti / te prajQApAramitAm vivarjya
   utsṛjya chorayitvā tato 'nye sūtrāntā ye śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,	utsRjya CorayitvA tatas anye sUtrAntAH ye SrAvaka BUmim aBivadanti,
   pratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivadanti, tānadhikataraṃ paryavāptavyān maṃsyante /	pratyekabudDa BUmim aBivadanti, tAn aDikataram paryavAptavyAn maMsyante /
   śākhāpatrapalālopamāḥ pratipannāste tathārūpā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /	SAKA patra palAla upamAH pratipannAH te taTArUpAH boDisattvAH veditavyAH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ	tat kasya hetoH? na hi suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam Sikzitavyam
   yathā śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante / kathaṃ ca	yaTA SrAvaka yAnikAH pratyekabudDa yAnikAH vA pudgalAH Sikzante / kaTam ca
   subhūte śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante? teṣāṃ	suBUte SrAvaka yAnikAH pratyekabudDa yAnikAH vA pudgalAH Sikzante? tezAm
   subhūte evaṃ bhavati   ekamātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ śamayiṣyāmaḥ,	suBUte evam Bavati  ekam AtmAnam damayizyAmaH, ekam AtmAnam SamayizyAmaH,
   ekamātmānaṃ parinirvāpayiṣyāmaḥ, ityātmadamaśamathaparinirvāṇāya	ekam AtmAnam parinirvApayizyAmaH, iti Atma dama SamaTa parinirvANAya
   sarvakuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraprayogānārabhante / na khalu punaḥ subhūte	sarva kuSala mUla aBisaMskAra prayogAn AraBante / na Kalu punar suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam / api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte	boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam Sikzitavyam / api tu Kalu punar suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam   ātmānaṃ ca tathatāyāṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam Sikzitavyam  AtmAnam ca taTatAyAm
   sthāpayiṣyāmi sarvalokānugrahāya, sarvasattvān api tathatāyāṃ	sTApayizyAmi sarva loka anugrahAya, sarva sattvAn api taTatAyAm
   sthāpayiṣyāmi, aprameyaṃ sattvadhātuṃ parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti /	sTApayizyAmi, aprameyam sattva DAtum parinirvApayizyAmi iti /
   sarvakuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraprayogā bodhisattvena	sarva kuSala mUla aBisaMskAra prayogAH boDisattvena
   mahāsattvenaivamārabdhavyāḥ, na ca tairmantavyam / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte	mahAsattvena evam ArabDavyAH, na ca tEH mantavyam / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   kaścideva puruṣo hastinamapaśyan hastino varṇasaṃsthāne paryeṣeta / so	kaScid eva puruzaH hastinam apaSyan hastinaH varNa saMsTAne paryezeta / saH 
   'ndhakāre hastinaṃ labdhvā yena prakāśaṃ tenopanidhyāyeta /	anDakAre hastinam labDvA yena prakASam tena upaniDyAyeta /
   tenopanidhyāyan hastipadaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta / hastipadācca hastino	tena upaniDyAyan hasti padam paryezitavyam manyeta / hasti padAt ca hastinaH 
   varṇasaṃsthāne grahītavye manyeta / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa	varNa saMsTAne grahItavye manyeta / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu sa
   paṇḍitajātīyaḥ purūṣo bhavet? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan /	paNxita jAtIyaH purUzaH Bavet? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan /
   bhagavānāha   evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā	BagavAn Aha  evam eva suBUte taTArUpAH te boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalA
   veditavyāḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā aparipṛcchantastāṃ chorayitvā	veditavyAH, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm ajAnAnA aparipRcCantaH tAm CorayitvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmā ye te sūtrāntāḥ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmAH ye te sUtrAntAH
   śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti, pratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivadanti, tān	SrAvaka BUmim aBivadanti, pratyekabudDa BUmim aBivadanti, tAn
   paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante / idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /	paryezitavyAn maMsyante / idam api suBUte tezAm mAra karma veditavyam /
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ratnārthikaḥ puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte ratna arTikaH puruzaH mahA samudram dRzwvA
   nāvagāheta, ratnāni na nidhyāyet nādhyālambeta / sa ratnahetorgoṣpadaṃ	na avagAheta, ratnAni na niDyAyet na aDyAlambeta / sa ratna hetoH gozpadam
   paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta / sa goṣpadodakena mahāsamudraṃ samīkartavyaṃ	paryezitavyam manyeta / sa gozpada udakena mahA samudram samIkartavyam
   manyeta / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte   api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo	manyeta / tat kim manyase suBUte  api nu sa paNxita jAtIyaH puruzaH 
   veditavyaḥ? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   evameva	veditavyaH? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  evam eva
   subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ, ya imāṃ	suBUte taTArUpAH te boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalAH veditavyAH, yaH imAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvāpyanavagāhamānā avijānantastakṣyanti / ye	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm labDvA api anavagAhamAnAH avijAnantaH takzyanti / ye
   ca sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti, pratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivadanti	ca sUtrAntAH SrAvaka BUmim aBivadanti, pratyekabudDa BUmim aBivadanti
   alpotsukavihāritayā tān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante / yatra bodhisattvayānaṃ	alpa utsuka vihAritayA tAn paryezitavyAn maMsyante / yatra boDisattva yAnam
   na saṃvarṇyate, kevalamātmadamaśamathaparinirvāṇameva ity api	na saMvarNyate, kevalam Atma dama SamaTa parinirvANam eva iti api
   pratisaṃlayanamiti / srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuyāmiti,	pratisaMlayanam iti / srotaApatti Palam prApnuyAm iti,
   sakṛdāgāmiphalamityanāgāmiphalamityarhattvaṃ prāpnuyāmiti, pratyekabodhiṃ	sakRdAgAmi Palam iti anAgAmi Palam iti arhat tvam prApnuya amiti, pratyeka boDim
   prāpnuyāmiti, dṛṣṭa eva dharme anupādāya āsravebhyaścittaṃ vimocya	prApnuya amiti, dRzwaH eva Darme anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittam vimocya
   parinirvāpayāmiti / idamucyate śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktamiti	parinirvApayAm iti / idam ucyate SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi pratisaMyuktam iti
   / nātra bodhisattvairmahāsattvairevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam / tatkasya	/ na atra boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH evam cittam utpAdayitavyam / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? mahāyānasaṃprasthitā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	hetoH? mahAyAna saMprasTitA hi suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhā bhavanti / na taiḥ (Vaidya 117) kadācidalpotsukatāyāṃ	mahA saMnAha saMnadDAH Bavanti / na tEH (VEdyaH 117) kadAcid alpa utsuka tAyAm
   cittamutpādayitavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? lokapariṇāyakā hi bhavanti te	cittam utpAdayitavyam / tat kasya hetoH? loka pariNAyakAH hi Bavanti te
   satpuruṣā lokārthakarāḥ / tasmāttairnityakālaṃ satatasamitaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsu	sat puruzAH loka arTa karAH / tasmAt tEH nityakAlam satata samitam zaz pAramitAsu
   śikṣitavyam / ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte aparipakvakuśalamūlāḥ	Sikzitavyam / ye ca Kalu punar suBUte aparipakva kuSala mUlAH
   parīttakubuddhikā mṛdukādhyāśayā bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ, te	parIttakubudDikAH mRduka aDyASayAH boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalAH, te

   prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ	prajQApAramitAm CorayitvA ye te sUtrAntAH

   idam api subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ	idam api suBUte mAra karma veditavyam tezAm taTArUpANAm
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā	boDisattva yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm tat yaTA api nAma suBUte palagaNxaH vA
   palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo	pala gaNxa antevAsI vA vEjayantasya prAsAdasya pramANena prAsAdam kartu kAmaH 
   nirmātukāmaḥ syāt / sa sūryācandramasorvimānapramāṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ paryeṣeta /	nirmAtu kAmaH syAt / sa sUryAcandramasoH vimAna pramANam maNxalam paryezeta /
   paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa sūryācandramasorvimānaṃ paśyet / sa tataḥ pramāṇaṃ	paryezamANaH sa sUryAcandramasoH vimAnam paSyet / sa tatas pramANam
   grahītavyaṃ manyate / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte vaijayantaprāsādapramāṇaṃ	grahItavyam manyate / tat kim manyase suBUte vEjayanta prAsAda pramANam
   prāsādaṃ kartukāmena nirmātukāmena sūryācandramasorvimānātpramāṇaṃ	prAsAdam kartu kAmena nirmAtu kAmena sUryAcandramasoH vimAnAt pramANam
   grahītavyaṃ bhavati? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha  	grahItavyam Bavati? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha

   pudgalāḥ, ye prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā	pudgalAH, ye prajQApAramitAm SrutvA prajQApAramitAm labDvA
