   paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante, ye te sūtrāntā evamabhivadanti   ekamātmānaṃ	paryezitavyAm maMsyante, ye te sUtrAntAH evam aBivadanti  ekam AtmAnam
   damayiṣyāmaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ śamayiṣyāmaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti	damayizyAmaH, ekam AtmAnam SamayizyAmaH, ekam AtmAnam parinirvApayizyAmaH iti
   / kevalamātmadamaśamathaparinirvāṇamevopanayanti, tathārūpān sūtrāntān	/ kevalam Atma dama SamaTa parinirvANam eva upanayanti, taTArUpAn sUtrAntAn
   paryeṣyante, tathā ca śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api	paryezyante, taTA ca Sikzitavyam maMsyante / tat kim manyase suBUte api
   nu te paṇḍitajātīyāḥ bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ	nu te paNxita jAtIyAH boDisattvAH veditavyAH? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam
   bhagavan / bhagavānāha   idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /	Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  idam api suBUte tezAm mAra karma veditavyam /
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rājānaṃ ca cakravartinaṃ	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte kaScid eva puruzaH rAjAnam ca cakravartinam
   bhraṣṭukāmo bhavet, sa rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ paśyet / dṛṣṭvā ca īdṛśo rājā	Brazwu kAmaH Bavet, sa rAjAnam cakravartinam paSyet / dRzwvA ca IdRSaH rAjA
   cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ceti nimittaṃ gṛhītvā	cakravartI varNena saMsTAnena tejasA RdDyA ca iti nimittam gRhItvA
   koṭṭarājaṃ paśyet / sa tasya koṭṭarājasya varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ teja ṛddhiṃ ca	kowwarAjam paSyet / sa tasya kowwarAjasya varNam saMsTAnam tejaH RdDim ca
   nimittaṃ ca gṛhītvā apratibalo viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ prati evaṃ vadet   īdṛśa eva	nimittam ca gRhItvA apratibalaH viSeza grahaNam prati evam vadet  IdRSaH eva
   sa rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ca nimittena ceti /	sa rAjA cakravartI varNena saMsTAnena tejasA RdDyA ca nimittena ca iti /
   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyo	tat kim manyase suBUte api nu sa paNxita jAtIyaH puruzaH veditavyaH 
   yaścakravartinaṃ koṭṭarājena samīkartavyaṃ manyeta? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ	yaH cakravartinam kowwarAjena samIkartavyam manyeta? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam
   bhagavan / bhagavānāha   evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke	Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  evam eva suBUte Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani eke
   bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā	boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalAH, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm SrutvA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya	prajQApAramitAm labDvA prajQApAramitAm riQcitvA prajQApAramitAm utsRjya
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi pratisaMyuktEH sUtrAntEH sarvajQa tAm
   paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante / idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam / na	paryezitavyAm maMsyante / idam api suBUte tezAm mAra karma veditavyam / na
   khalu punarahaṃ subhūte ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ	Kalu punar aham suBUte eBiH evaMrUpEH
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntairbodhisattvasya	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi pratisaMyuktEH sUtrAntEH boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ vadāmi / api tu khalu punaḥ	mahAsattvasya sarvajQa tAm paryezitavyAm vadAmi / api tu Kalu punar 
   subhūte yattathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	suBUte yat taTAgatena prajQApAramitAyAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāmupāyakauśalyamākhyātam, tatrāśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahAsattvAnAm upAya kOSalyam AKyAtam, tatra aSikzitvA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   na niryāsyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tatkasya hetoḥ? (Vaidya 118)	na niryAsyati anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / tat kasya hetoH? (VEdyaH 118)
   dhandhako hyanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisattvasamudāgamaḥ / tasmāttarhi subhūte	DanDakaH hi anyezu sUtrAntezu boDisattva samudAgamaH / tasmAt tarhi suBUte
   tathāgata enāmanuśaṃsāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ paśyan anekaparyāyeṇa	taTAgataH enAm anuSaMsAm prajQApAramitAyAm paSyan aneka paryAyeNa
   bodhisattvān mahāsattvānasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati	boDisattvAt mahAsattvAn asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm saMdarSayati samAdApayati
   samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati saṃniveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati   evaṃ	samuttejayati saMpraharzayati saMniveSayati pratizWApayati  evam
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH avinivartanIyAH BaveyuH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheriti / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste	samyaksaMboDeH iti / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu paNxita jAtIyAH te
   bodhisattvāḥ pratibhānti, ye avinivartanīyayānaṃ mahāyānamavāpya samāsādya	boDisattvAH pratiBAnti, ye avinivartanIya yAnam mahAyAnam avApya samAsAdya
   punareva tadvivarjya vivartya hīnayānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante?	punar eva tat vivarjya vivartya hIna yAnam paryezitavyam maMsyante?
   subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte	suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   bubhukṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ labdhvā hitavipākaṃ sukhavipākaṃ	buBukzitaH puruzaH Sata rasam Bojanam labDvA hita vipAkam suKa vipAkam
   yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ kṣutpipāsānivartakam, tadapāsya ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ	yAvat AyuH paryantam kzuD pipAsA nivarta kam, tad apAsya zazwikodanam
   paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta / ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ labdhvā śatarasaṃ bhojanamutsṛjya	paryezitavyam manyeta / zazwikodanam labDvA Sata rasam Bojanam utsRjya
   vivarjya taṃ ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte	vivarjya tam zazwikA udanam pariBoktavyam manyeta / tat kim manyase suBUte
   api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan /	api nu sa puruzaH paNxita jAtIyaH Bavet? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan /
   bhagavānāha   evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvāḥ,	BagavAn Aha  evam eva suBUte Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani eke boDisattvAH,
   ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ	yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm SrutvA prajQApAramitAm labDvA prajQApAramitAm
   riñciṣyanti, prajñāpāramitāmutsrakṣyanti prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayiṣyanti,	riQcizyanti, prajQApAramitAm utsrakzyanti prajQApAramitAm Corayizyanti,
   prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyanti, prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā	prajQApAramitAm dUrIkarizyanti, prajQApAramitAm riQcitvA
   prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ	prajQApAramitAm utsRjya prajQApAramitAm CorayitvA prajQApAramitAm
   dūrīkṛtya tataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān	dUrIkRtya tatas SrAvaka pratyekabudDa yAna pratisaMyuktAn sUtrAntAn
   paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante / ye te sūtrāntāḥ	paryezitavyAn maMsyante / ye te sUtrAntAH
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivadanti, taiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmim aBivadanti, tEH sarvajQa tAm paryezitavyAm
   maṃsyante / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā	maMsyante / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu paNxita jAtIyAH te boDisattvA
   veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   idam api	veditavyAH? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  idam api
   subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva	suBUte tezAm mAra karma veditavyam / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte kaScid eva
   puruṣo 'nardhyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ labdhvā alpārdhyeṇa alpasāreṇa maṇiratnena	puruzaH anarDyam maNi ratnam labDvA alpa ArDyeNa alpa sAreNa maNi ratnena
   sārdhaṃ samīkartavyaṃ manyeta / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa	sArDam samIkartavyam manyeta / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu sa
   paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan /	paNxita jAtIyaH puruzaH veditavyaH? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan /
   bhagavānāha   evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke	BagavAn Aha  evam eva suBUte Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani eke
   bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ, ya idaṃ gambhīraṃ prabhāsvaraṃ	boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalAH, yaH idam gamBIram praBAsvaram
   prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ labdhvā śrutvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena	prajQApAramitA ratnam labDvA SrutvA SrAvaka pratyekabudDa yAnena
   samīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante, śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau ca	samIkartavyam maMsyante, SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO ca
   sarvajñatāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante / tatkiṃ manyase	sarvajQa tAm upAya kOSalyam ca paryezitavyam maMsyante / tat kim manyase
   subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha   no	suBUte api nu paNxita jAtIyAH te boDisattvAH veditavyAH? suBUtiH Aha  no
   hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   idam api subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  idam api suBUte tezAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	mahAsattvAnAm mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte asyAm gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm BAsyamANAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm uddiSyamAnAyAm udgRhyamANAyAm vAcyamAnAyAm
   svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyām api bahūni pratibhānānyutpatsyante,	svADyAyyamAnAyAm antaSas liKyamAnAyAm api bahUni pratiBAnAni utpatsyante,
   yāni cittavikṣepaṃ kariṣyanti / idam api subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	yAni citta vikzepam karizyanti / idam api suBUte tezAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam //	mahAsattvAnAm mAra karma veditavyam //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   śakyā punarbhagavan	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  SakyA punar Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā likhitum? bhagavānāha   no hīdaṃ sūbhūte / ye kecitsubhūte	prajQApAramitA liKitum? BagavAn Aha  no hi idam sUBUte / ye kecid suBUte
   prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarairlikhitvā prajñāpāramitā likhiteti maṃsyante,	prajQApAramitAm lipi akzarEH liKitvA prajQApAramitA liKitA iti maMsyante,
   asatīti vā akṣareṣu prajñāpāramitāmabhinivekṣyante, anakṣareti vā, idam	asatI iti vE akzarezu prajQApAramitAm aBinivekzyante, anakzara iti vA, idam
   api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam //	api suBUte tezAm mAra karma veditavyam //
   (Vaidya 119) punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ	(VEdyaH 119) punar aparam suBUte prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm
   deśamanasikārā utpatsyante,	deSa manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīmanasikārā utpatsyante,	grAma nagara nigama janapada rAzwra rAjaDAnI manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   udyānamanasikārā utpatsyante, gurumanasikārā utpatsyante,	udyAna manasikArAH utpatsyante, guru manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   ākhyānamanasikārā utpatsyante, cauramanasikārā utpatsyante,	AKyAna manasikArAH utpatsyante, cOra manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   gulmasthānamanasikārā utpatsyante, viśikhāmanasikārā utpatsyante,	gulma sTAna manasikArAH utpatsyante, viSiKA manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   śibikāmanasikārā utpatsyante, sukhamanasikārā utpatsyante,	SibikA manasikArAH utpatsyante, suKa manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   duḥkhamanasikārā utpatsyante, bhayamanasikārā utpatsyante, strīmanasikārā	duHKa manasikArAH utpatsyante, Baya manasikArAH utpatsyante, strI manasikArA
   utpatsyante, puruṣamanasikārā utpatsyante, napuṃsakamanasikārā	utpatsyante, puruza manasikArAH utpatsyante, napuMsaka manasikArA
   utpatsyante, priyāpriyavyatyastamanasikārā utpatsyante,	utpatsyante, priya apriya vyatyasta manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   mātāpitṛpratisaṃyuktā manasikārā utpatsyante, bhrātṛbhaginīpratisaṃyuktā	mAtA pitR pratisaMyuktA manasikArAH utpatsyante, BrAtR BaginI pratisaMyuktA
   manasikārā utpatsyante, mitrabāndhavasālohitāmātyapratisaṃyuktā manasikārā	manasikArAH utpatsyante, mitra bAnDava sAlohita amAtya pratisaMyuktA manasikArA
   utpatsyante, prajāpatiputraduhitṛpratisaṃyuktā manasikārā utpatsyante,	utpatsyante, prajApati putra duhitR pratisaMyuktAH manasikArAH utpatsyante,
   gṛhabhojanapānapratisaṃyuktā manasikārā utpatsyante, cailamanasikārā	gRha Bojana pAna pratisaMyuktAH manasikArAH utpatsyante, cEla manasikArA
   utpatsyante, śayanāsanamanasikārā jīvitamanasikārā itikartavyatāmanasikārā	utpatsyante, Sayana Asana manasikArA jIvita manasikArA itikartavya tA manasikArA
   rāgamanasikārā dveṣamanasikārā mohamanasikārā ṛtumanasikārā	rAga manasikArA dveza manasikArA moha manasikArA Rtu manasikArA
   sukālamanasikārā duṣkālamanasikārā gītamanasikārā vādyamanasikārā	su kAla manasikArA duzkAla manasikArA gIta manasikArA vAdya manasikArA
   nṛtyamanasikārā kāvyanāṭaketihāsamanasikārāḥ śāstramanasikārā	nRtya manasikArA kAvya nAwaka itihAsa manasikArAH SAstra manasikArA
   vyavahāramanasikārā hāsyamanasikārā lāsyamanasikārāḥ śokamanasikārā	vyavahAra manasikArAH hAsya manasikArAH lAsya manasikArAH Soka manasikArA
   āyāsamanasikārā ātmamanasikārāḥ, ityetāṃścānyāṃś ca subhūte manasikārān	AyAsa manasikArAH Atma manasikArAH, iti etAn= ca anyAn ca suBUte manasikArAn
   māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃhariṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	mAraH pApIyAn upasaMharizyati asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm udgRhyamANAyAm vAcyamAnAyAm uddiSyamAnAyAm
   svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyāmantarāyaṃ kariṣyati, cittavikṣepaṃ	svADyAyyamAnAyAm antaSas liKyamAnAyAm antarAyam karizyati, citta vikzepam
   kariṣyati bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām / tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	karizyati boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm / tatra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   mārakarmāṇi boddhavyāni / buddhvā ca vivarjayitavyāni / punaraparaṃ	mAra karmANi bodDavyAni / budDvA ca vivarjayitavyAni / punar aparam
   subhūte utpatsyante rājamanasikārāḥ kumāramanasikārāhastimanasikārā	suBUte utpatsyante rAja manasikArAH kumAra manasikAra ahasti manasikArA
   aśvamanasikārā rathamanasikārā gulmadarśanamanasikārāḥ / idam api subhūte	aSva manasikArAH raTa manasikArAH gulma darSana manasikArAH / idam api suBUte
   teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante	tezAm mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte utpatsyante
   agnimanasikārā icchāmanasikārā dhanadhānyasamṛddhimanasikārāḥ / idam api	agni manasikArAH icCA manasikArAH Dana DAnya samRdDi manasikArAH / idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam //	suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmutpatsyante	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm utpatsyante
   lābhasatkāracīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmantarāyā	lABa satkAra cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArANAm antarAyA
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ	imAm prajQApAramitAm BAzamANAnAm deSayatAm upadiSatAm uddiSatAm
   svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ lābhasatkāraślokasvādāścittotpīḍā vā / idam	su ADyAya tAm antaSas liKatAm lABa satkAra Sloka svAdAH citta utpIxA vA / idam
   api subhūte bodhisattvairmahāsattvairmārakarma veditavyam / etāni taiḥ	api suBUte boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH mAra karma veditavyam / etAni tEH
   sarvāṇi mārakarmāṇi boddhavyāni, buddhvā ca vivarjayitavyāni //	sarvANi mAra karmANi bodDa vyAni, budDvA ca vivarjayitavyAni //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm imAm prajQApAramitAm
   bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ ye	BAzamANAnAm deSayatAm upadiSatAm uddiSatAm su ADyAya tAm antaSas liKa tAm ye
   te gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti	te gamBIrAH gamBIrAH sUtrAntAH Bavizyanti
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktāḥ, tān māraḥ pāpīyān	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi pratisaMyuktAH, tAn mAraH pApIyAn
   bhikṣuveṣaṇopasaṃkramya upasaṃhariṣyati   iha śikṣasva, idaṃ likha,	Bikzu vezaNa upasaMkramya upasaMharizyati  iha Sikzasva, idam liKa,
   idamuddiśa, idaṃ svādhyāya, itaḥ sarvajñatā niṣpatsyate iti / na khalu	idam uddiSa, idam svADyAya, itas sarvajQa tA nizpatsyate iti / na Kalu
   punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upāyakuśalena tebhyaḥ	punar suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena upAya kuSalena teByaH
   spṛhotpādayitavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ? kiṃ cāpi subhūte teṣu sūtrānteṣu	spRhA utpAdayitavyA / tat kasya hetoH? kim ca api suBUte tezu sUtrAntezu
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāṣitāni, (Vaidya 120) na khalu	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitAni BAzitA ani, (VEdyaH 120) na Kalu
   punarupāyakauśalyaṃ tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākhyātam / tatra ye	punar upAya kOSalyam tatra boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm AKyAtam / tatra ye
   'nabhijñā bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā upāyakauśalyajñānaviśeṣasya, te imāṃ	anaBijQAH Bavizyanti boDisattvAH upAya kOSalya jQAna viSezasya, te imAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitavyāṃ maṃsyante / te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm riQcitavyAm maMsyante / te imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyukteṣu	prajQApAramitAm riQcitvA SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi pratisaMyuktezu
   sūtrānteṣu upāyakauśalyaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante / idam api subhūte	sUtrAntezu upAya kOSalyam paryezitavyam maMsyante / idam api suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //	boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśchandiko bhaviṣyati	punar aparam suBUte DArmaSravaNikaH CandikaH Bavizyati
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītukāmaḥ, dharmabhāṇakaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati na	prajQApAramitAm udgrahItu kAmaH, Darma BANakaH ca kilAsI Bavizyati na
   dharmaṃ deśayitukāmaḥ / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	Darmam deSayitu kAmaH / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca	visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte Darma BANakaH ca
   akilāsī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāṃ dātukāmaḥ, dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī	akilAsI Bavizyati prajQApAramitAm dAtu kAmaH, DArmaSravaNikaH ca kila AsI
   vā bahukṛtyo vā bhaviṣyati / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	vA bahu kRtyaH vA Bavizyati / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte	visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte
   dhārmaśravaṇikaśchandiko bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītukāmo	DArmaSravaNikaH CandikaH Bavizyati prajQApAramitAm udgrahItu kAmaH 
   dhārayitukāmo vācayitukāmaḥ paryavāptukāmaḥ pravartayitukāmo 'ntaśo	DArayitu kAmaH vAcayitu kAmaH paryavAptu kAmaH pravartayitu kAmaH antaSas 
   likhitukāmo 'pi bhaviṣyati, gatimāṃś ca matimāṃś ca smṛtimāṃś ca	liKitu kAmaH api Bavizyati, gatimAn ca matimAn ca smRtimAn ca
   bhaviṣyati / dharmabhāṇakaścānyaddeśāntaraṃ kṣepsyate noddhaṭṭitajño vā na	Bavizyati / Darma BANakaH ca anyat deSa antaram kzepsyate na udDawwita jQaH vA na
   vā vipañcitajñaḥ, anabhijño vā bhaviṣyati / iyam api subhūte tatra	vA vipaQcita jQaH, anaBijQaH vA Bavizyati / iyam api suBUte tatra
   visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	visAmagrI Bavizyati prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ	deSyamAnAyAm upadiSyamAnAyAm uddiSyamAnAyAm su ADyAyyamAnAyAm
   śikṣyamāṇāyāmantaśaḥ likhyamānāyām / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena	SikzyamANAyAm antaSas liKyamAnAyAm / idam api suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte	mahAsattvena visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte
   dharmabhāṇakaś ca akilāsī bhaviṣyatyabhijño dātukāmo vācayitukāma imāṃ	Darma BANakaH ca akilAsI Bavizyati aBijQaH dAtu kAmaH vAcayitu kAmaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitām, dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca deśāntaraṃ prasthito bhaviṣyati	prajQApAramitAm, DArmaSravaNikaH ca deSa antaram prasTitaH Bavizyati
   noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajño 'nabhijño vā bhaviṣyati / idam api	na udDawwita jQaH vA na vA vipaQcita jQaH anaBijQaH vA Bavizyati / idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam /
   punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca āmiṣaguruko lābhasatkāracīvaraguruko	punar aparam suBUte Darma BANakaH ca Amiza gurukaH lABa satkAra cIvara guru kaH 
   bhaviṣyati / dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'rthaṃ vā	Bavizyati / DArmaSravaNikAH ca alpa icCaH saMtuzwaH praviviktaH arTam vA
   na dātukāmo bhaviṣyati / iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati	na dAtu kAmaH Bavizyati / iyam api suBUte tatra visAmagrI Bavizyati
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ likhyamānāyām / idam api subhūte	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzyamANAyAm liKyamAnAyAm / idam api suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte	boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte
   dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca śrāddho bhaviṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmo	DArmaSravaNikaH ca SrAdDaH Bavizyati imAm prajQApAramitAm Srotu kAmaH 
   'rthamavaboddhukāmo 'rthaṃ dātukāmo 'rthaṃ parityaktukāmaḥ /	arTam avabodDu kAmaH arTam dAtu kAmaH arTam parityaktu kAmaH /
   dharmabhāṇakaś ca aśrāddho bhaviṣyati alpeccho vā na vā bhāṣitukāmaḥ / ato	Darma BANakaH ca aSrAdDaH Bavizyati alpa icCaH vA na vA BAzitu kAmaH / atas 
   'pi subhūte visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte	api suBUte visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte
   dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca śrāddho bhaviṣyati śrotukāmo 'rthamavaboddhukāmaḥ /	DArmaSravaNikaH ca SrAdDaH Bavizyati Srotu kAmaH arTam avabodDu kAmaH /
   dharmabhāṇakasya ca tāni sūtrāṇi dharmāntarāyikatayā na saṃbhaviṣyanti	Darma BANakasya ca tAni sUtrANi Darma antarAyika tayA na saMBavizyanti
   nāvatariṣyanti / ato 'pi subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikasyāprāptadharmabhāṇinaḥ	na avatarizyanti / atas api suBUte DArmaSravaNikasya aprApta Darma BANinaH
   prativāṇī bhaviṣyati / iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati	prativANI Bavizyati / iyam api suBUte tatra visAmagrI Bavizyati
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ	prajQApAramitAm udgRhNatAm DArayatAm vAcayatAm paryavApnuvatAm
   pravartayatāmantaśo likhatām / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	pravartayatAm antaSas liKatAm / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   mārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca bhāṣitukāmo	mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam suBUte Darma BANakaH ca BAzitu kAmaH 
   bhaviṣyati / dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca acchandiko bhaviṣyati śravaṇāya / iyam	Bavizyati / DArmaSravaNikaH ca acCandikaH Bavizyati SravaNAya / iyam
   api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītuṃ (Vaidya	api suBUte tatra visAmagrI Bavizyati prajQApAramitAm udgrahItum (VEdya
   121) dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitumantaśo likhitum / idam	121) DArayitum vAcayitum paryavAptum pravartayitum antaSas liKitum / idam
   api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam / punaraparaṃ	api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma veditavyam / punar aparam
   subhūte dhārmaśravaṇiko middhaguruko bhaviṣyati, kāyaguruko bhaviṣyati /	suBUte DArmaSravaNikaH midDa gurukaH Bavizyati, kAya gurukaH Bavizyati /
   sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na	sa tena midDa guruka tvena samanvAgataH kAya klamaTena samanvAgataH na
   śrotukāmo bhaviṣyati / dharmabhāṇakaś ca bhāṣitukāmo bhaviṣyati / idam api	Srotu kAmaH Bavizyati / Darma BANakaH ca BAzitu kAmaH Bavizyati / idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam /
   punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako middhaguruko bhaviṣyati, kāyaguruko	punar aparam suBUte Darma BANakaH midDa gurukaH Bavizyati, kAya guru kaH 
   bhaviṣyati / sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena	Bavizyati / sa tena midDa guruka tvena samanvAgataH kAya klamaTena
   samanvāgato na bhāṣitukāmo bhaviṣyati / dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca śrotukāmo	samanvAgataH na BAzitu kAmaH Bavizyati / DArmaSravaNikaH ca Srotu kAmaH 
   bhaviṣyati / iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati likhanāya	Bavizyati / iyam api suBUte tatra visAmagrI Bavizyati liKanAya
   vācanāya paryavāptaye vā / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	vAcanAya paryavAptaye vA / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   mārakarma veditavyam //	mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	punar aparam suBUte prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ kaścideva tatrāgatya nirayāṇāmavarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,	SikzyamANAyAm kaScid eva tatra Agatya nirayANAm avarNam BAzizyate,
   tiryagyoneravarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, pretaviṣayasyāvarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,	tiryagyoneH avarNam BAzizyate, preta vizayasya avarNam BAzizyate,
   asurakāyānāmavarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate   evaṃduḥkhā nirayāḥ, evaṃduḥkhā	asura kAyAnAm avarNam BAzizyate  evaMduHKAH nirayAH, evaMduHKA
   tiryagyoniḥ, evaṃduḥkhaḥ pretaviṣayaḥ, evaṃduḥkhā āsurāḥ kāyāḥ,	tiryagyoniH, evaMduHKaH preta vizayaH, evaMduHKAH AsurAH kAyAH,
   evaṃduḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ / ihaiva duḥkhasyāntaḥ karaṇīya iti / idam api	evaMduHKAH saMskArAH / iha eva duHKasya antar karaNIyaH iti / idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam //	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ	punar aparam suBUte prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm BAzyamANAyAm
   śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ vā kaścideva tatrāgatya devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate  	SikzyamANAyAm vA kaScid eva tatra Agatya devAnAm varNam BAzizyate  
   evaṃsukhitā devāḥ, evaṃsukhāḥ svargāḥ, evaṃ kāmadhātau kāmāḥ sevitavyāḥ,	evaMsuKitAH devAH, evaMsuKAH svargAH, evam kAmaDAtO kAmAH sevitavyAH,
   evaṃ rūpadhātau dhyānāni samāpattavyāni, evamārūpyadhātau tatsamāpattayaḥ	evam rUpa DAtO DyAnAni samApatta vyAni, evam ArUpya DAtO tad samApattayaH
   samāpattavyāḥ / tad api ca sarvaṃ prajñatā vimṛśya sarvaiva	samApattavyAH / tat api ca sarvam prajQa tA vimRSya sarvA eva
   duḥkhopapattiriti / uktaṃ hīdaṃ bhagavatā   acchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakamapyahaṃ	duHKa upapattiH iti / uktam hi idam BagavatA  acCawA saMGAta mAtrakam api aham
   bhikṣavo bhavābhinirvṛttiṃ na varṇayāmi / sarvaṃ hi saṃskṛtamanityaṃ	BikzavaH Bava aBinirvRttim na varNayAmi / sarvam hi saMskRtam anityam
   sarvaṃ bhayāvagataṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvadharmā	sarvam Baya avagatam duHKam sarvam trEDAtukam SUnyam sarva DarmA
   anātmānaḥ / tadevaṃ sarvamaśāśvatamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmakaṃ	anAtmAnaH / tat evam sarvam aSASvatam anityam duHKam vipariNAma Darmakam
   viditvā paṇḍitairihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptavyam,	viditvA paNxitEH iha eva srotaApatti Palam prAptavyam,
   sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalam, ihaivārhattvaṃ prāptavyam / mā no	sakRdAgAmi Palam anAgAmi Palam, iha eva arhat tvam prAptavyam / mA no
   bhūyastābhiḥ saṃpattivipattibhirduḥkhabhūyiṣṭhābhiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhūditi /	BUyas tABiH saMpatti vipattiBiH duHKa BUyizWABiH samavaDAnam BUt iti /
   tatraike bodhisattvāḥ saṃvegamāpatsyante / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena	tatra eke boDisattvAH saMvegam Apatsyante / idam api suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam //	mahAsattvena visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bhikṣavo dharmabhāṇakāḥ, te ekākitābhiratā	punar aparam suBUte ye api te BikzavaH Darma BANakAH, te ekAkitA aBiratA
   bhaviṣyanti / ye 'pi dhārmaśravaṇikāste 'pi parṣadgurukā bhaviṣyanti / te	Bavizyanti / ye api DArmaSravaNikAH te api parzad gurukAH Bavizyanti / te
   'pi dharmabhāṇakā evaṃ vakṣyanti   ye māmanuvartsyanti, tebhyo 'hamimāṃ	api Darma BANakAH evam vakzyanti  ye mAm anuvartsyanti, teByaH aham imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ dāsyāmi / ye māṃ nānuvartsyanti, tebhyo na dāsyāmīti /	prajQApAramitAm dAsyAmi / ye mAm na anuvartsyanti, teByaH na dAsyAmi iti /
   evaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca arthikatayā chandikatayā	evam te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca arTika tayA CandikatayA
   dharmagauraveṇa taṃ dharmabhāṇakamanuvartsyanti, na cāvakāśaṃ dāsyanti, sa	Darma gOraveNa tam Darma BANakam anuvartsyanti, na ca avakASam dAsyanti, sa
   ca dharmabhāṇaka āmiṣakiṃcitkābhilāṣī, te ca na dātukāmāḥ / sa ca tena	ca Darma BANakaH Amiza kiMcid kA aBilAzI, te ca na dAtu kAmAH / sa ca tena
   tena gamiṣyati, yena yena durbhikṣaś ca ayogakṣemaś ca jīvitāntarāyaś ca	tena gamizyati, yena yena durBikzaH ca ayogakzemaH ca jIvita antarAyaH ca
   bhaviṣyati / te ca dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ parebhyaḥ śroṣyanti   asau pradeśo	Bavizyati / te ca DArmaSravaNikAH pareByaH Srozyanti  asO pradeSaH 
   (Vaidya 122) durbhikṣaś ca ayogakṣemaś ca / tasmiṃś ca pradeśe	(VEdyaH 122) durBikzaH ca ayogakzemaH ca / tasmin ca pradeSe
   jīvitāntarāyo bhavediti / sa ca dharmabhāṇakastān	jIvita antarAyaH Bavet iti / sa ca Darma BANakaH tAn
   kulaputrānevamabhivyāhariṣyati   amuṣmin kulaputrāḥ pradeśe	kula putrAn evam aBivyAharizyati  amuzmin kula putrAH pradeSe
   durbhikṣabhayam / kaccitkulaputrā yūyamāgamiṣyatha mā paścādvipratisāriṇo	durBikza Bayam / kaccit kula putrAH yUyam AgamizyaTa mA paScAt vipratisAriNaH 
   bhaviṣyatha durbhikṣabhayaṃ praviṣṭāḥ? evaṃ te tena dharmabhāṇakena	BavizyaTa durBikza Bayam pravizwAH? evam te tena Darma BANakena
   sūkṣmeṇopāyena pratikṣepsyate / te ca nirviṇṇarūpā evaṃ jñāsyanti  	sUkzmeNa upAyena pratikzepsyate / te ca nirviNNa rUpAH evam jQAsyanti  
   pratyākhyānanimittānyetāni, naitāni dātukāmatānimittānīti / nāyaṃ dātukāma	pratyAKyAna nimittAni etAni, na etAni dAtu kAma tA nimittAni iti / na ayam dAtu kAma
   iti viditvā nānuvartsyanti / iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati	iti viditvA na anuvartsyanti / iyam api suBUte tatra visAmagrI Bavizyati
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm SikzyamANAyAm

   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako yena jantubhayaṃ yena vyālabhayaṃ	punar aparam suBUte Darma BANakaH yena jantu Bayam yena vyAla Bayam
   yenāmanuṣyabhayaṃ tena saṃprasthito bhaviṣyati / sa tena caran viharan	yena amanuzya Bayam tena saMprasTitaH Bavizyati / sa tena caran viharan
   yena vyālakāntāraṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ	yena vyAla kAntAram sarIsRpa kAntAram cora kAntAram pAnIya kAntAram
   durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena prakramiṣyati / sa tān dhārmaśravaṇikānevaṃ	durBikza kAntAram tena prakramizyati / sa tAn DArmaSravaNikAn evam
   vakṣyati   yatkhalu kulaputrā jānīdhvaṃ yasmin pradeśe jantubhayaṃ	vakzyati  yat Kalu kula putrAH jAnIDvam yasmin pradeSe jantu Bayam
   vyālabhayaṃ kravyādabhayaṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ	vyAla Bayam kravyAda Bayam sarIsRpa kAntAram cora kAntAram pAnIya kAntAram
   durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena vayaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ / jānīdhvaṃ kulaputrāḥ  	durBikza kAntAram tena vayam saMprasTitAH / jAnIDvam kula putrAH  
   śakyatha yūyametāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavitum? evaṃ tān sūkṣmeṇopāyena	SakI aTa yUyam etAni duHKAni pratyanuBavitum? evam tAn sUkzmeNa upAyena
   pratyākhyāsyati / tataste nirvetsyante / nirviṇṇāḥ santo nānuvartsyanti /	pratyAKyAsyati / tatas te nirvetsyante / nirviNNAH santaH na anuvartsyanti /
   te punareva pratyudāvartsyante / ayam api subhūte	te punar eva pratyudAvartsyante / ayam api suBUte
   prajñāpāramitāyāmantarāya utpatsyate uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm antarAya utpatsyate uddiSyamAnAyAH svADyAyyamAnAyAH
   yāvallikhyamānāyāḥ / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	yAvat liKyamAnAyAH / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam //	visAmagrI mAra karma veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako bhikṣurmitrakulabhikṣādakulaguruko	punar aparam suBUte Darma BANakaH BikzuH mitra kula BikzA da kula guru kaH 
   bhaviṣyati / sa tayā mitrakulabhikṣādakulagurukatayā abhīkṣṇaṃ	Bavizyati / sa tayA mitra kula BikzA da kula guruka tayA aBIkzNam
   mitrakulabhikṣādakulānyavalokayitavyānyupasaṃkramitavyāni maṃsyate / sa	mitra kula BikzA da kulAni avalokayitavyAni upasaMkramitavyAni maMsyate / sa
   tayā abhīkṣṇāvalokanatayā bahukṛtyatayā tān dhārmaśravaṇikān	tayA aBIkzNa avalokana tayA bahu kRtya tayA tAn DArmaSravaNikAn
   pratyākhyāsyati   asti tāvanme kiṃcidavalokayitavyam, asti	pratyAKyAsyati  asti tAvat me kiMcid avalokayitavyam, asti
   tāvanmamopasaṃkramitavyamiti / iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati	tAvat mama upasaMkramitavyam iti / iyam api suBUte tatra visAmagrI Bavizyati
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām / idam api subhūte	prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm paryavApyamANAyAm / idam api suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //	boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma veditavyam //
   iti hi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃstaistaiḥ prakāraistathā tathā ceṣṭiṣyate,	iti hi suBUte mAraH pApIyAn= tEH tEH prakArEH taTA taTA cezwizyate,
   yathemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na kaścidudgrahīṣyati, na dhārayiṣyati, na	yaTA imAm prajQApAramitAm na kaScid udgrahIzyati, na DArayizyati, na
   vācayiṣyati, na paryavāpsyati, na pravartayiṣyati, na deśayiṣyati,	vAcayizyati, na paryavApsyati, na pravartayizyati, na deSayizyati,
   nopadekṣyati, noddekṣyati, na svādhyāsyati, na lekhayiṣyati, na likhiṣyati	na upadekzyati, na uddekzyati, na svADyAsyati, na leKayizyati, na liKizyati
   / tasmāttarhi subhūte yāvanto 'ntarāyā visāmagryāṃ saṃvartante, tāni	/ tasmAt tarhi suBUte yAvantaH antarAyAH visAmagryAm saMvartante, tAni
   sarvāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇīti boddhavyāni, buddhvā ca	sarvANi boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karmANi iti bodDa vyAni, budDvA ca
   vivarjayitavyānīti //	vivarjayitavyAni iti //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   kimatra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  kim atra Bagavan kAraNam
   yadiha māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate? tathā tathā copāyena	yat iha mAraH pApIyAn evam mahAntam udyogam Apatsyate? taTA taTA ca upAyena
   ceṣṭiṣyate, yathemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ (Vaidya 123) na kaścidudgrahīṣyati na	cezwizyate, yaTA imAm prajQApAramitAm (VEdyaH 123) na kaScid udgrahIzyati na
   dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyati na pravartayiṣyati na	DArayizyati na vAcayizyati na paryavApsyati na pravartayizyati na
   deśayiṣyati nopadekṣyati noddekṣyati na svādhyāsyati na lekhayiṣyati na	deSayizyati na upadekzyati na uddekzyati na su ADyAsyati na leKayizyati na
   likhiṣyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	liKizyati? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /	prajQApAramitA nirjAtA hi suBUte budDAnAm BagavatAm sarvajQa tA /
   sarvajñatānirjātaṃ ca tathāgataśāsanam / tathāgataśāsananirjātaṃ ca	sarvajQa tA nirjAtam ca taTAgata SAsanam / taTAgata SAsana nirjAtam ca
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kleśaprahāṇam / prahīṇakleśānāṃ ca	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm kleSa prahANam / prahINa kleSAnAm ca
   māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate / alabhamāno duḥkhārto durmanāḥ	mAraH pApIyAn avatAram na laBate / alaBamAnaH duHKa ArtaH durmanAH
   śokaśalyaparigato bhavati / ataḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ	Soka Salya parigataH Bavati / atas sa prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm
   paryavāpyamāṇāyāṃ mahatā saṃvegena mahāntamudyogamāpadyate / sa	paryavApyamANAyAm mahatA saMvegena mahAntam udyogam Apadyate / sa
   mahatodyogena tathā tathopāyena ceṣṭate, yathā na kaścidimāṃ	mahatA udyogena taTA taTA upAyena cezwate, yaTA na kaScid imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ likhedvā paryavāpnuyādveti //	prajQApAramitAm liKet vA paryavApnuyAt vA iti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati /	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn SramaNa vezeNa Agatya Bedam prakzepsyati /
   evaṃ ca navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrā vivecayiṣyanti naiṣā	evam ca nava yAna saMprasTitAH kula putrAH vivecayizyanti na ezA
   prajñāpāramitā yāmāyuṣmantaḥ śṛṇvanti / yathā punarmama sūtrāgataṃ	prajQApAramitA yAm AyuzmantaH SRNvanti / yaTA punar mama sUtra Agatam
   sūtraparyāpannam, iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā / ityevaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān	sUtra paryApannam, iyam sA prajQApAramitA / iti evam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn
   saṃśayaṃ prakṣepsyati / evaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān	saMSayam prakzepsyati / evam ca punar suBUte mAraH pApIyAn
   śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣipya navayānasaṃprasthitān	SramaNa vezeNa Agatya Bedam prakzipya nava yAna saMprasTitAn
   bodhisattvānalpabuddhikān mandabuddhikān	boDisattvAn alpabudDikAn manda budDikAn
   parīttabuddhikānandhīkṛtānavyākṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃśayaṃ	parItta budDikA nanDI kRta anavyAkRtAn anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMSayam
   pātayiṣyati / te saṃśayaprāptā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahīṣyanti na	pAtayizyati / te saMSaya prAptAH imAm prajQApAramitAm na udgrahIzyanti na
   dhārayiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na	DArayizyanti na vAcayizyanti na paryavApsyanti na pravartayizyanti na
   deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na lekhayiṣyanti	deSayizyanti na upadekzyanti na uddekzyanti na su ADyAsyanti na leKayizyanti
   na likhiṣyanti / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma	na liKizyanti / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma
   veditavyam //	veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣūnnirmāya buddhaveṣeṇāgatya evaṃ	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn BikzUn nirmAya budDa vezeNa Agatya evam
   mārakarmopasaṃhariṣyati   yo bodhisattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati, sa	mAra karma upasaMharizyati  yaH boDisattvaH gamBIrezu Darmezu carati, sa
   bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti / sa śrāvako bhavati, na bodhisattvo yathāyaṃ	BUtakowim sAkzAtkaroti / sa SrAvakaH Bavati, na boDisattvaH yaTA ayam
   bodhisattva iti / idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma	boDisattvaH iti / idam api suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena mAra karma
   veditavyam //	veditavyam //
   evaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānevamādikāni subahūni anyāny api	evam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn evam AdikAni su bahUni anyAni api
   mārakarmāṇyutpādayiṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ	mAra karmANi utpAdayizyati asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm liKyamAnAyAm
   paryavāpyamāṇāyām / tāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena boddhavyāni / buddhvā	paryavApyamANAyAm / tAni boDisattvena mahAsattvena bodDavyAni / budDvA
   ca vivarjayitavyāni / na bhaktavyāni / ārabdhavīryeṇa smṛtimatā	ca vivarjayitavyAni / na BaktavyAni / ArabDa vIryeNa smRtimatA
   saṃprajānatā ca bhavitavyam //	saMprajAnatA ca Bavitavyam //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   evametadbhagavan,	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam etat Bagavan ,
   evametatsugata / yāni tāni bhagavan mahāratnāni, tāni bahupratyarthikāni	evam etat sugata / yAni tAni Bagavat mahA ratnAni, tAni bahu pratyarTikAni
   bhavanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta durlabhatvānmahārghatvācca / agrāṇi hi	Bavanti / tat kasya hetoH? yat uta durlaBa tvAt mahArGa tvAt ca / agrANi hi
   tāni bhagavan bhavanti / tasmāttāni ca bahupratyarthikāni bhavanti /	tAni Bagavan Bavanti / tasmAt tAni ca bahu pratyarTikAni Bavanti /
   evameva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prāyeṇa bahavo 'ntarāyā	evam eva Bagavan asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH prAyeNa bahavaH antarAyAH 
   utpatsyante / tatra ye 'ntarāyavaśena kusīdā bhaviṣyanti, veditavyamidaṃ	utpatsyante / tatra ye antarAya vaSena kusIdA Bavizyanti, veditavyam idam
   bhagavan mārādhiṣṭhitāste bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti, navayānasaṃprasthitāś	Bagavat mAra aDizWitAH te boDisattvAH Bavizyanti, nava yAna saMprasTitAH 
   ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti, alpabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti,	ca te Bagavan Bavizyanti, alpabudDayaH ca te Bagavan Bavizyanti,
   (Vaidya 124) mandabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti, parīttabuddhayaś	(VEdyaH 124) manda budDayaH ca te Bagavan Bavizyanti, parItta budDayaH 
   ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti, viparyastabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti	ca te Bagavan Bavizyanti, viparyasta budDayaH ca te Bagavan Bavizyanti
   / nāpi teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati, ye imāṃ	/ na api tezAm udAra udArezu Darmezu cittam prakramizyati, ye imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante, na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ	prajQApAramitAm na udgrahItavyAm maMsyante, na DArayitavyAm na vAcayitavyAm
   na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ na deśayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ	na paryavAptavyAm na pravartayitavyAm na deSayitavyAm na upadezwavyAm
   noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api	na uddezwavyAm na su ADyAtavyAm na leKayitavyAmantaSas na liKitavyAm api
   maṃsyante //	maMsyante //
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam
   etat / mārādhiṣṭhitāste subhūte bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /	etat / mAra aDizWitAH te suBUte boDisattvAH veditavyAH /
   navayānasaṃprasthitāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti, alpabuddhayaś	nava yAna saMprasTitAH ca te suBUte boDisattvAH Bavizyanti, alpabudDa yaH 
   ca te bhaviṣyanti, mandabuddhayaś ca te bhaviṣyanti, parīttabuddhayaś ca	ca te Bavizyanti, manda budDayaH ca te Bavizyanti, parItta budDayaH ca
   te bhaviṣyanti, viparyastabuddhayaś ca te bhaviṣyanti / na ca	te Bavizyanti, viparyasta budDayaH ca te Bavizyanti / na ca
   teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	tezAm udAra udArezu Darmezu cittam prakramizyati, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm
   nodgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante, na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na	na udgrahItavyAm maMsyante, na DArayitavyAm na vAcayitavyAm na
   paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na	paryavAptavyAm na pravartayitavyAm na upadezwavyAm na uddezwavyAm na
   svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante //	su ADyAtavyAm na leKayitavyAmantaSas na liKitavyAm api maMsyante //
   kiṃcāpi subhūte imāni mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante, subahavaścātra māradoṣā	kiMca api suBUte imAni mAra karmANi utpatsyante, su bahavaH ca atra mAra dozA
   antarāyakarā utpatsyante / atha ca subhūte ya imāṃ	antarAya karAH utpatsyante / aTa ca suBUte yaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante dhārayitavyāṃ vācayitavyāṃ	prajQApAramitAm udgrahItavyAm maMsyante DArayitavyAm vAcayitavyAm
   paryavāptavyāṃ pravartayitavyāmupadeṣṭavyāmuddeṣṭavyāṃ svādhyātavyāṃ	paryavAptavyAm pravartayitavyAm upadezwavyAm uddezwavyAm su ADyAtavyAm
   lekhayitavyāmantaśo likhitavyām api maṃsyante, veditavyametatsubhūte	leKayitavyAm antaSas liKitavyAm api maMsyante, veditavyam etat suBUte
   buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena te maṃsyante /	budDa anuBAvena budDa aDizWAnena te maMsyante /
   buddhaparigraheṇodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	budDa parigraheNa udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti
   lekhayiṣyantyantaśo likhiṣyantīti / tatkasya hetoḥ? māro 'pi hyatra	leKayizyanti antaSas liKizyanti iti / tat kasya hetoH? mAraH api hi atra
   pāpīyān mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya / tathāgato 'pyarhan	pApIyAn mahAntam udyogam Apatsyate antarAya karaNAya / taTAgataH api arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddha udyogamāpatsyate 'nuparigrahāyeti //	samyaksaMbudDaH udyogam Apatsyate anuparigrahAya iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mārakarmaparivarto nāmaikādaśaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm mAra karma parivartaH nAma ekAdaSaH //
   (Vaidya 125)	(VEdyaH 125)
   ASP_12: lokasaṃdarśanaparivarto dvādaśaḥ /	ASP_12: loka saMdarSana parivartaH dvAdaSaH /
   atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma  	aTa Kalu BagavAn punar api Ayuzmantam suBUtim Amantrayate sma  
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyā bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ, pañca vā daśa vā	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte striyAH bahavaH putrAH BaveyuH, paQca vA daSa vA
   viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā / sarve	viMSatiH vA triMSat vA catvAriMSat vA paQcASat vA Satam vA sahasram vA / sarve
   te māturglānāyā udyogamāpadyeran   kathamasmākaṃ māturjīvitāntarāyo na	te mAtuH glAnAyAH udyogam Apadyeran  kaTam asmAkam mAtuH jIvita antarAyaH na
   bhavediti, kathamasmākaṃ mātā ciraṃ jīvet, kathamasmākaṃ mātuḥ kāyo na	Bavet iti, kaTam asmAkam mAtA ciram jIvet, kaTam asmAkam mAtuH kAyaH na
   vinaśyet, kathamasmākaṃ mātā cirasthitikā bhavet, kathamasmākaṃ māturnāma	vinaSyet, kaTam asmAkam mAtA cira sTitikA Bavet, kaTam asmAkam mAtuH nAma
   avinaṣṭaṃ bhavet, kathamasmākaṃ māturna duḥkhā vedanotpadyeta, na cāsyā	avinazwam Bavet, kaTam asmAkam mAtuH na duHKAH vedanA utpadyeta, na ca asya a
   asparśavihāraḥ amanaāpaḥ kāye utpadyeta / tatkasya hetoḥ? etayā hi vayaṃ	asparSa vihAraH amanaApaH kAye utpadyeta / tat kasya hetoH? etayA hi vayam
   janitāḥ / duṣkarakārikaiṣā asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī lokasya ca	janitAH / duzkara kArikA ezA asmAkam jIvitasya dAtrI lokasya ca
   saṃdarśayitrī / iti te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sudhṛtāṃ	saMdarSayitrI / iti te putrAH tAm mAtaram sarva suKa upaDAnEH su DRtAm
   dhārayeyuḥ, sugopāyitāṃ gopāyeyuḥ, sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyuḥ   mā khalvasyāḥ	DArayeyuH, su gopAyitAm gopAyeyuH, su kelAyitAm kelAyeyuH  mA Kalu asyAH
   kācidduḥkhā vedanā duḥkho vā sparśa utpadyeta, cakṣuṣo vā śrotrato vā	kAcid duHKAH vedanA duHKaH vA sparSaH utpadyeta, cakzuzaH vA SrotrataH vA
   ghrāṇato vā jihvāto vā kāyato vā manasto vā vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato	GrANataH vA jihvA atas vA kAyataH vA manastaH vA vA AtataH vA pittataH vA SlezmataH 
   vā saṃnipātato vā daṃśato vā maśakato vā sarīsṛpato vā manuṣyato vā	vA saMnipAtataH vA daMSataH vA maSakataH vA sarIsRpataH vA manuzyataH vA
   amanuṣyato vā āpātato vā utpātato vā aniṣṭanipātaḥ śarīre nipatet / evaṃ	amanuzyataH vA ApAtatas vA utpAtataH vA anizwa nipAtaH SarIre nipatet / evam
   te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ samanvāhṛtya	te putrAH tAm mAtaram sarva suKa upaDAnEH samanvAhRtya
   kelāyeyurmamāyeyurgopāyeyuḥ   eṣāsmākaṃ mātā janayitrī, duṣkarakārikaiṣā	kelAyeyuH mamAyeyuH gopAyeyuH  ezA asmAkam mAtA janayitrI, duzkara kArikA ezA
   asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī, lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrīti / evameva subhūte	asmAkam jIvitasya dAtrI, lokasya ca saMdarSayitrI iti / evam eva suBUte
   tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti /	taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH imAm prajQApAramitAm samanvAharanti /
   ye 'pi te likhanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti	ye api te liKanti udgRhNanti DArayanti vAcayanti paryavApnuvanti
   pravartayanti deśayantyupadiśantyuddiśanti svādhyāyanti, sarve te	pravartayanti deSayanti upadiSanti uddiSanti su ADyAyanti, sarve te
   tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānubhāvena adhiṣṭhānena samanvāhāreṇa	taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya anuBAvena aDizWAnena samanvAhAreNa
   / ye 'pi te 'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi	/ ye api te anyezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH etarhi
   tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya	tizWanti Driyante yApayanti bahu jana hitAya bahu jana suKAya
   lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya, hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca	loka anukampAyE mahataH jana kAyasya arTAya, hitAya suKAya devAnAm ca
   manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, sarvasattvānāṃ cānukampakā anukampāmupādāya, te 'pi sarve	manuzyANAm ca, sarva sattvAnAm ca anukampakAH anukampAm upAdAya, te api sarve
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti, autsukyamāpadyante   kimitīyaṃ	imAm prajQApAramitAm samanvAharanti, Otsukyam Apadyante  kimiti iyam
   prajñāpāramitā cirasthitikā bhavet, kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā nāma	prajQApAramitA cira sTitikA Bavet, kim iti asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH nAma
   avinaṣṭaṃ bhavet, kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā likhyamānāyāḥ	avinazwam Bavet, kim iti asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH BAzyamANAyAH liKyamAnAyAH
   śikṣyamāṇāyā māraḥ pāyīyān mārakāyikā vā devatā antarāyaṃ na kuryuriti /	SikzyamANAyAH mAraH pAyIyAt mAra kAyikA vA devatAH antarAyam na kuryuH iti /
   evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	evam hi suBUte taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH enAm prajQApAramitAm
   kelāyanti mamāyanti gopāyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi mātā janayitrī	kelAyanti mamAyanti gopAyanti / tat kasya hetoH? ezA hi mAtA janayitrI
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām / asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm / asyAH sarvajQa tAyAH darSayitrI
   lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī / atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ	lokasya ca saMdarSayitrI / atonirjAtAH hi suBUte taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ / prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	samyaksaMbudDAH / prajQApAramitA hi suBUte taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya sarvajñajñānasya janayitrī darśayitrī, evamasya	samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya sarvajQa jQAnasya janayitrI darSayitrI, evam asya
   lokasya saṃdarśayitrī / atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	lokasya saMdarSayitrI / atonirjAtA hi suBUte taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā / ye 'pi kecitsubhūte atīte 'dhvani	samyaksaMbudDAnAm sarvajQa tA / ye api kecid suBUte atIte aDvani
   tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ	taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH, te api sarve enAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ / ye 'pi te subhūte	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH / ye api te suBUte
   bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ (Vaidya 126) samyaksaṃbuddhā	Bavizyanti anAgate aDvani taTAgatAH arhantaH (VEdyaH 126) samyaksaMbudDA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante, te 'pi sarve enāmeva	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante, te api sarve enAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante / ye 'pi	prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante / ye api
   te subhūte etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ	te suBUte etarhi aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhā daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya	samyaksaMbudDAH daSa diSi loke tizWanti Driyante yApayanti bahu jana hitAya
   bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya, hitāya sukhāya	bahu jana suKAya loka anukampAyE mahataH jana kAyasya arTAya, hitAya suKAya
   devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, anukampakā anukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ	devAnAm ca manuzyANAm ca, anukampakAH anukampAm upAdAya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH, te api sarve enAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ / aham api subhūte etarhi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH / aham api suBUte etarhi
   tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ	taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH enAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ / evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH / evam iyam suBUte prajQApAramitA
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī, evamasya lokasya	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm janayitrI, evam asya lokasya
   saṃdarśayitrī //	saMdarSayitrI //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yadbhagavānevamāha  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yat BagavAn evam Aha  
   prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya	prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya
   saṃdarśayitrīti, kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	saMdarSayitrI iti, kaTam Bagavan prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī? katamaś ca bhagavan	samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI? katamaH ca Bagavan
   lokastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairākhyātaḥ? evamukte	lokaH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH AKyAtaH? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   pañca subhūte skandhāḥ tathāgatena	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  paQca suBUte skanDAH taTAgatena
   loka ityākhyātāḥ / katame pañca? yaduta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā	loke iti AKyAtAH / katame paQca? yat uta rUpam vedanA saMjQA saMskArA
   vijñānam / ime subhūte pañca skandhāstathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ //	vijQAnam / ime suBUte paQca skanDAH taTAgatena lokaH iti AKyAtAH //
   subhūtirāha   kathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā pañca skandhā	suBUtiH Aha  kaTam Bagavan= taTAgatAnAm prajQApAramitayA paQca skanDA
   darśitāḥ? kiṃ vā bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā darśitam? evamukte	darSitAH? kim vA Bagavan prajQApAramitayA darSitam? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   na lujyante na pralujyante iti	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  na lujyante na pralujyante iti
   subhūte pañca skandhā loka iti tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā darśitāḥ /	suBUte paQca skanDAH lokaH iti taTAgatAnAm prajQApAramitayA darSitAH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ na lujyante na pralujyante iti darśitāḥ? śūnyatāsvabhāvā hi	tat kasya hetoH na lujyante na pralujyante iti darSitAH? SUnyatA svaBAvAH hi
   subhūte pañca skandhāḥ, asvabhāvatvāt / na ca subhūte śūnyatā lujyate vā	suBUte paQca skanDAH, asvaBAva tvAt / na ca suBUte SUnyatA lujyate vA
   pralujyate vā / evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	pralujyate vA / evam iyam suBUte prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī / na ca subhūte ānimittaṃ vā	samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI / na ca suBUte Animittam vA
   apraṇihitaṃ vā anabhisaṃskāro vā anutpādo vā abhāvo vā dharmadhāturvā	apraNihitam vA anaBisaMskAraH vA anutpAdaH vE aBAvaH vA DarmaDAtuH vA
   lujyate vā pralujyate vā / evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā	lujyate vA pralujyate vA / evam iyam suBUte prajQApAramitA
   tathāgatānāmarhata samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //	taTAgatAnAm arhata samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyAH
   sattvāḥ, asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte	sattvAH, asaMKyeyAH sattvAH iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte
   tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ, asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā	taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyAH sattvAH, asaMKyeyAH sattvA
   iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sattvāsvabhāvatayā subhūte aprameyāḥ sattvā	iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? sattva asvaBAva tayA suBUte aprameyAH sattvA
   asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata	asaMKyeyAH sattvAH iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / evam hi suBUte taTAgata
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti	imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyAH sattvAH asaMKyeyAH sattvAH iti
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / yāny api tāni subhūte aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	yaTABUtam prajAnAti / yAni api tAni suBUte aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni, tāny api subhūte tathāgataḥ sattvāsadbhāvatayaiva	sattvAnAm citta caritAni, tAni api suBUte taTAgataH sattva asadBAva tayA eva
   prajānāti / evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitāmāgamya tathāgato	prajAnAti / evam Kalu suBUte prajQApAramitAm Agamya taTAgataH 
   'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni cittacaritāni ca	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm aprameyANi asaMKyeyAni citta caritAni ca
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	yaTABUtam prajAnAti / evam hi suBUte prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //	samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI //
   (Vaidya 127) punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	(VEdyaH 127) punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm saMkziptAni cittAni saMkziptAni
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm saMkziptAni
   cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sa saṃkṣepaṃ kṣayataḥ	cittAni saMkziptAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? sa saMkzepam kzayataH
   kṣayaṃ ca akṣayato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	kzayam ca akzayataH yaTABUtam prajAnAti / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm saMkziptAni
   cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni saMkziptAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	punar aparam suBUte taTAgatAH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm vikziptAni cittAni vikziptAni cittAni iti
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm vikziptAni
   cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? dharmatātaḥ subhūte	cittAni vikziptAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? Darma tAtaH suBUte
   tāni cittāni vikṣiptāni / alakṣaṇāni hi tāni cittāni	tAni cittAni vikziptAni / alakzaNAni hi tAni cittAni
   akṣīṇānyavikṣīṇānyavikṣiptāni tāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / evaṃ	akzINa ani avikzINAni avikziptAni tAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / evam
   hi subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	hi suBUte taTAgatAH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	sattvAnAm vikziptAni cittAni vikziptAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānyaprameyākṣayāṇi	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm aprameya akzayANi cittAni aprameya akzayANi
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm aprameya akzayANi
   cittāni aprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? tasya subhūte	cittAni aprameya akzayANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? tasya suBUte
   tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati taccittam,	taTAgatasya aDizWitam Bavati tat cittam,
   anirodhamanutpādamasthitamanāśrayamasamamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam, yenaiva	aniroDam anutpAdam asTitam anASrayam asamam aprameyam asaMKyeyam, yena eva
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti ākāśāprameyākṣayatayā cittāprameyākṣayateti / evaṃ	yaTABUtam prajAnAti AkASa aprameya akzaya tayA citta aprameya akzayatA iti / evam
   hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānyaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	sattvAnAm aprameya akzayANi cittAni aprameya akzayANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti //	prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti	sattvAnAm saMklizwAni cittAni saMklizwAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti
   / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	/ kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm saMklizwAni cittAni saMklizwAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   asaṃkleśasaṃkliṣṭāni subhūte tāni cittāni asaṃketāni / evaṃ hi subhūte	asaMkleSa saMklizwAni suBUte tAni cittAni asaMketAni / evam hi suBUte
   tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni	taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm saMklizwAni
   cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni saMklizwAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti	sattvAnAm asaMklizwAni cittAni asaMklizwAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti
   / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	/ kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm asaMklizwAni cittAni asaMklizwAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   prakṛtiprabhāsvarāṇi subhūte tāni cittāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	prakRti praBAsvarANi suBUte tAni cittAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   (Vaidya 128) prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni	(VEdyaH 128) prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm asaMklizwAni
   cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni asaMklizwAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ līnāni cittāni līnāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ	sattvAnAm lInAni cittAni lInAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam
   ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ	ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm
   līnāni cittāni līnāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? anālayalīnāni	lInAni cittAni lInAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? anAlaya lInAni
   subhūte tāni cittāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	suBUte tAni cittAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ līnāni cittāni līnāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm lInAni cittAni lInAni
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ pragṛhītāni cittāni pragṛhītāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti	sattvAnAm pragRhItAni cittAni pragRhItAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti
   / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	/ kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ pragṛhītāni cittāni pragṛhītāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm pragRhItAni cittAni pragRhItAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   agrāhyāṇi subhūte tāni cittāni pragrahītavyāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata	agrAhyANi suBUte tAni cittAni pragrahItavyAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgata
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ pragṛhītāni cittāni	imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm pragRhItAni cittAni
   pragṛhītāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	pragRhItAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sāsravāṇi cittāni sāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm sa AsravANi cittAni sa AsravANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sāsravāṇi cittāni sāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm sa AsravANi cittAni sa AsravANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   asvabhāvāni subhūte tāni cittāni asatsaṃkalpāni / evaṃ hi subhūte	asvaBAvAni suBUte tAni cittAni asat saMkalpAni / evam hi suBUte
   tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sāsravāṇi	taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sa AsravANi
   cittāni sāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni sa AsravANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmanāsravāṇi cittānyanāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm anAsravANi cittAni anAsravANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmanāsravāṇi cittānyanāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm anAsravANi cittAni anAsravANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   abhāvagatikāni subhūte tāni cittāni anābhogāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata	aBAva gatikAni suBUte tAni cittAni anABogAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgata
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanāsravāṇi	imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm anAsravANi
   cittānyanāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni anAsravANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sarāgāṇi cittāni sarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm sa rAgANi cittAni sa rAgANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sarāgāṇi cittāni sarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? yā	sattvAnAm sa rAgANi cittAni sa rAgANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? yA
   subhūte cittasya sarāgatā, na sā cittasya yathābhūtatā / yā cittasya	suBUte cittasya sarAgatA, na sA cittasya yaTABUta tA / yA cittasya
   yathābhūtatā, na sā cittasya sarāgatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	yaTABUta tA, na sA cittasya sarAga tA / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarāgāṇi cittāni sarāgāṇi	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sa rAgANi cittAni sa rAgANi
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   (Vaidya 129) punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	(VEdyaH 129) punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vītarāgāṇi cittāni vītarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm vIta rAgANi cittAni vIta rAgANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vītarāgāṇi cittāni vītarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm vIta rAgANi cittAni vIta rAgANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti? yaḥ subhūte cittasya vigamaḥ, na sā cittasya sarāgatā / yā	prajAnAti? yaH suBUte cittasya vigamaH, na sA cittasya sarAga tA / yA
   vītarāgasya cittasya yathābhūtatā, na sā cittasyā sarāgatā / evaṃ hi	vIta rAgasya cittasya yaTABUta tA, na sA cittasyA sarAga tA / evam hi
   subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ	suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm
   vītarāgāṇi cittāni vītarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	vIta rAgANi cittAni vIta rAgANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sadoṣāṇi cittāni sadoṣāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm sa dozANi cittAni sa dozANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sadoṣāṇi cittāni sadoṣāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? yā	sattvAnAm sa dozANi cittAni sa dozANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? yA
   subhūte cittasya sadoṣatā, na sā cittasya yathābhūtatā / yā cittasya	suBUte cittasya sadoza tA, na sA cittasya yaTABUta tA / yA cittasya
   yathābhūtatā, na sā cittasya sadoṣatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	yaTABUta tA, na sA cittasya sa doza tA / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sadoṣāṇi cittāni sadoṣāṇi	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sa dozANi cittAni sa dozANi
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //

   sattvānāṃ vītadoṣāṇi cittāni vītadoṣāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm vIta dozANi cittAni vIta dozANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ vītadoṣāṇi cittāni vītadoṣāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm vIta dozANi cittAni vIta dozANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   yaḥ subhūte cittasya vigamaḥ, na sā cittasya sadoṣatā / yā vītadoṣasya	yaH suBUte cittasya vigamaH, na sA cittasya sa doza tA / yA vIta dozasya
   cittasya yathābhūtatā, na sā cittasya sadoṣatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata	cittasya yaTABUta tA, na sA cittasya sa doza tA / evam hi suBUte taTAgata
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vītadoṣāṇi cittāni	imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm vIta dozANi cittAni
   vitadoṣāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	vita dozANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //

   sattvānāṃ samohāni cittāni samohāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm sa mohAni cittAni sa mohAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ samohāni cittāni samohāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? yā	sattvAnAm sa mohAni cittAni sa mohAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? yA

   imāṃ (Vaidya 130) prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vītamohāni	imAm (VEdyaH 130) prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm vIta mohAni

   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ vipulāni cittāni vipulāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm vipulAni cittAni vipulAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ vipulāni cittāni vipulāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? na	sattvAnAm vipulAni cittAni vipulAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? na
   hīyante subhūte tāni cittāni, na vivardhante tāni cittāni, na vigacchanti	hIyante suBUte tAni cittAni, na vivarDante tAni cittAni, na vigacCanti
   tāni cittāni, avigamatvādeva cittānām / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	tAni citta ani, avigama tvAt eva cittAnAm / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulāni cittāni vipulāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm vipulAni cittAni vipulAni
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //

   sattvānāmahadgatāni cittānyamahadgatāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm ahat gatAni citta ani amahat gatAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /

   sattvānāmamahadgatāni cittānyamahadgatāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm amahat gatAni citta ani amahat gatAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?

   cittānyamahadgatāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	citta ani amahat gatAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //

   imāṃ (Vaidya 131) prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmapramāṇāni	imAm (VEdyaH 131) prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm apramANAni
   cittāni apramāṇāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni apramANAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //

   sattvānāṃ sanidarśanāni cittāni sanidarśanāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	sattvAnAm sa nidarSanAni cittAni sa nidarSanAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sanidarśanāni cittāni sanidarśanāni cittānīti	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sa nidarSanAni cittAni sa nidarSanAni cittAni iti
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? samadarśanāni subhūte tāni cittāni cittasvabhāvāni	yaTABUtam prajAnAti? sama darSanAni suBUte tAni cittAni citta svaBAvAni
   / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	/ evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm

   / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	/ kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmanidarśanāni cittānyanidarśanāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm anidarSanAni cittAni anidarSanAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   alakṣaṇatvādarthaviviktatvātsubhūte adṛśyaṃ taccittaṃ trayāṇāṃ cakṣuṣāṃ	alakzaNa tvAt arTa vivikta tvAt suBUte adRSyam tat cittam trayANAm cakzuzAm
   sarveṣāṃ vā anavabhāsagatam / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	sarvezAm vA anavaBAsa gatam / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanidarśanāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm anidarSanAni
