   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sapratighāni cittāni sapratighāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	sattvAnAm sa pratiGAni cittAni sa pratiGAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sapratighāni cittāni sapratighāni cittānīti	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sa pratiGAni cittAni sa pratiGAni cittAni iti
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? asatsaṃkalpitāni subhūte tāni cittāni,	yaTABUtam prajAnAti? asat saMkalpitAni suBUte tAni cittAni,
   śūnyānyārambaṇavaśikāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	SUnyAni ArambaNa vaSikAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sapratighāni cittāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sa pratiGAni cittAni
   sapratighāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	sa pratiGAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmapratighāni cittānyapratighāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm apratiGAni cittAni apratiGAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmapratighāni cittānyapratighāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm apratiGAni cittAni apratiGAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   advayabhūtāni subhūte tāni cittāni abhūtasaṃbhūtāni / evaṃ hi subhūte	advaya BUtAni suBUte tAni cittAni aBUta saMBUtAni / evam hi suBUte
   tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmapratighāni	taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm apratiGAni
   cittānyapratighāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni apratiGAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ sottarāṇi cittāni sottarāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm sa uttarANi cittAni sa uttarANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm
   sottarāni cittāni sottarāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? yā subhūte	sa uttarAni cittAni sa uttarANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti? yA suBUte
   sottarasya cittasya yathābhūtatā, na tatrāsti manyamānatā / evaṃ hi	sa uttarasya cittasya yaTABUta tA, na tatra asti manyamAna tA / evam hi
   subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ	suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm
   sottarāṇi cittāni sottarāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	sa uttarANi cittAni sa uttarANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   (Vaidya 132) punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	(VEdyaH 132) punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanuttarāṇi cittānyanuttarāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm anuttarANi cittAni anuttarANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanuttarāṇi cittānyanuttarāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm anuttarANi cittAni anuttarANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti? aṇv api hi subhūte cittamanupalabdham / tato niṣprapañcāni tāni	prajAnAti? aNu api hi suBUte cittam anupalabDam / tatas nizprapaQcAni tAni
   cittāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	cittAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmanuttarāṇi cittānyanuttarāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	sattvAnAm anuttarANi cittAni anuttarANi cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmasamāhitāni cittānyasamāhitāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm asamAhitAni citta ani asamAhitAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmasamāhitāni cittānyasamāhitāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm asamAhitAni citta ani asamAhitAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   asamasamāni hi subhūte tāni cittāni asamavahitāni, evamasamāhitāni tāni	asama samAni hi suBUte tAni cittAni asamavahita ani, evam asamAhitAni tAni
   cittāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	cittAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmasamāhitāni cittānyasamāhitāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	sattvAnAm asamAhitAni citta ani asamAhitAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ samāhitāni cittāni samāhitāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm samAhitAni cittAni samAhitAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ samāhitāni cittāni samāhitāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm samAhitAni cittAni samAhitAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   samasamāni hi subhūte tāni cittāni samavahitāni / evaṃ samāhitāni	sama samAni hi suBUte tAni cittAni samavahitAni / evam samAhitAni
   cittānyākāśasamāni / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	cittAni AkASa samAni / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ samāhitāni cittāni samāhitāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm samAhitAni cittAni samAhitAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam
   prajānāti //	prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmavimuktāni cittānyavimuktāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm avimuktAni citta ani avimuktAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmavimuktāni cittānyavimuktāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm avimuktAni citta ani avimuktAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   svabhāvavimuktāni subhūte tāni cittāni abhāvasvabhāvāni / evaṃ hi subhūte	svaBAva vimuktAni suBUte tAni cittAni aBAva svaBAvAni / evam hi suBUte
   tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmavimuktāni	taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm avimuktAni
   cittānyavimuktāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	citta ani avimuktAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ vimuktāni cittāni vimuktāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	sattvAnAm vimuktAni cittAni vimuktAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāṃ vimuktāni cittāni vimuktāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm vimuktAni cittAni vimuktAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   cittaḥ hi subhūte tathāgatena na atītamupalabdhaṃ na anāgatam, na	cittaH hi suBUte taTAgatena na atItam upalabDam na anAgatam, na
   pratyutpannamupalabdham, asattvāccittasya / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	pratyutpannam upalabDam, asattvAt cittasya / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vimuktāni cittāni vimuktāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm vimuktAni cittAni vimuktAni
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmadṛśyāni cittānyadṛśyāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ	sattvAnAm adRSyAni cittAni adRSyAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam
   ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya (Vaidya 133) aprameyāṇāṃ	ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya (VEdyaH 133) aprameyANAm
   sattvānāmadṛśyāni cittānyadṛśyāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?	sattvAnAm adRSyAni cittAni adRSyAni cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti?
   asattvātsubhūte adṛśyaṃ taccittam / abhūtatvādavijñeyam, apariniṣpattito	asattvAt suBUte adRSyam tat cittam / aBUta tvAt avijQeyam, aparinizpattitaH 
   'grāhyaṃ prajñācakṣuṣā divyena cakṣuṣā / kutaḥ punarmāṃsacakṣuṣā?	agrAhyam prajQAcakzuzA divyena cakzuzA / kutas punar mAMsa cakzuzA?
   sarveṣāmanavabhāsagatatvāt / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	sarvezAm anavaBAsa gata tvAt / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmadṛśyāni cittānyadṛśyāni	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm adRSyAni cittAni adRSyAni
   cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā	cittAni iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / evam hi suBUte prajQApAramitA
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāmunmiñjitanimiñjitāni	aprameyANa asaMKyeyAnAm para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm unmiQjita nimiQjitAni
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ	yaTABUtam prajAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyāṇāṃ parasattvānāṃ	prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANAm asaMKyeyANAm para sattvAnAm
   parapudgalānāmunmiñjitanimiñjitāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sarvāṇi tāni	para pudgalAnAm unmiQjita nimiQjitAni yaTABUtam prajAnAti? sarvANi tAni
   subhūte rūpaniśritāni utpadyamānānyutpadyante iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /	suBUte rUpa niSritAni utpadyamAnAni utpadyante iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti /
   evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / sarvāṇi tāni vijñānaniśritāni	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / sarvANi tAni vijQAna niSritAni
   utpadyamānānyutpadyante iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / tatra subhūte kathaṃ	utpadyamAnAni utpadyante iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti / tatra suBUte kaTam
   tathāgatena tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni rūpaniśritāni vijñātāni bhavanti?	taTAgatena tAni unmiQjita nimiQjitAni rUpa niSritAni vijQAtAni Bavanti?
   evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ? kathaṃ tathāgatena tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH? kaTam taTAgatena tAni unmiQjita nimiQjitAni
   vijñānaniśritāni vijñātāni bhavanti? bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi	vijQAna niSritAni vijQAtAni Bavanti? Bavati taTAgataH param maraNAt iti
   rūpagatam etat / na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi rūpagatam etat /	rUpa gatam etat / na Bavati taTAgataH param maraNAt iti rUpa gatam etat /
   bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi rūpagatam etat /	Bavati ca na Bavati ca taTAgataH param maraNAt iti rUpa gatam etat /
   naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi rūpagatam etat /	na eva Bavati na na Bavati taTAgataH param maraNAt iti rUpa gatam etat /
   evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / Bavati taTAgataH param maraNAt iti
   vijñānagatam etat / na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vijñānagatam	vijQAna gatam etat / na Bavati taTAgataH param maraNAt iti vijQAna gatam
   etat / bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vijñānagatam	etat / Bavati ca na Bavati ca taTAgataH param maraNAt iti vijQAna gatam
   etat / naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi	etat / na eva Bavati na na Bavati taTAgataH param maraNAt iti
   vijñānagatam etat / śāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi	vijQAna gatam etat / SASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti
   rūpagatam etat / aśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi	rUpa gatam etat / aSASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti
   rūpagatam etat / śāśvataś ca aśāśvata ātmāvalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ	rUpa gatam etat / SASvataH ca aSASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam
   mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / naiva śāśvato nāśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca	moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / na eva SASvataH na aSASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca
   idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ	idam eva satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   / śāśvata ātmāvalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /	/ SASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat /
   aśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /	aSASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat /
   śāśvataścāśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi	SASvataH ca aSASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti
   vijñānagatam etat / naiva śāśvato nāśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva	vijQAna gatam etat / na eva SASvataH na aSASvataH AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva
   satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat / antavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva	satyam moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat / antavAn AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva
   satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / anantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva	satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / anantavAn AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva
   satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / antavāṃś ca anantavāṃścātmā avalokaś	satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / antavAn ca anantavAn= ca AtmA avalokaH 
   ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / naivāntavān	ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / na eva antavAn
   nānantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /	na anantavAn AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat /
   evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / antavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / antavAn AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam
   mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat / anantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ	moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat / anantavAn AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam
   mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat / antavāṃś ca anantavāṃścātmā avalokaś ca	moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat / antavAn ca anantavAn= ca AtmA avalokaH ca
   idameva (Vaidya 134) satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat / naivāntavān	idam eva (VEdyaH 134) satyam moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat / na eva antavAn
   nānantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat	na anantavAn AtmA avalokaH ca idam eva satyam moham anyat iti vijQAna gatam etat 
   / sa jīvastaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / anyo	/ sa jIvaH tat SarIram idam eva satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / anyaH 
   jīvo 'nyaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat / evaṃ	jIvaH anyat SarIram idam eva satyam moham anyat iti rUpa gatam etat / evam
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / sa jīvastaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / sa jIvaH tat SarIram idam eva satyam moham anyat iti
   vijñānagatam etat / anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi	vijQAna gatam etat / anyaH jIvaH anyat SarIram idam eva satyam moham anyat iti
   vijñānagatam etat / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	vijQAna gatam etat / evam hi suBUte taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ	imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya aprameyANa asaMKyeyAnAm para sattvAnAm
   parapudgalānāṃ tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni rūpaniśritāni vijñātāni bhavanti /	para pudgalAnAm tAni unmiQjita nimiQjitAni rUpa niSritAni vijQAtAni Bavanti /
   evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni vijñānaniśritāni	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / tAni unmiQjita nimiQjitAni vijQAna niSritAni
   vijñātāni bhavanti //	vijQAtAni Bavanti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	punar aparam suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāmamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ	aprameyANAm am asaMKyeyAnAm para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm
   tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / iha subhūte tathāgato	tAni unmiQjita nimiQjitAni yaTABUtam prajAnAti / iha suBUte taTAgataH 
   rūpaṃ jānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti? tathā subhūte	rUpam jAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH rUpam jAnAti? taTA suBUte
   tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti, yathā tathatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ	taTAgataH rUpam jAnAti, yaTA taTatA / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH rUpam
   jānāti / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / iha subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ	jAnAti / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / iha suBUte taTAgataH vijQAnam
   jānāti / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti? tathā subhūte	jAnAti / kaTam ca suBUte taTAgataH vijQAnam jAnAti? taTA suBUte
   tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti, yathā tathatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato	taTAgataH vijQAnam jAnAti, yaTA taTatA / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH 
   vijñānaṃ jānāti / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	vijQAnam jAnAti / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm
   tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / evaṃ hi subhūte	tAni unmiQjita nimiQjitAni yaTABUtam prajAnAti / evam hi suBUte
   tathāgatastathāgatatathatayā ca skandhatathatayā ca	taTAgataH taTAgata taTatayA ca skanDa taTa tayA ca
   unmiñjitanimiñjitatathatayā ca tathatāṃ prajñapayati / yaiva ca subhūte	unmiQjita nimiQjita taTa tayA ca taTatAm prajQapayati / yA eva ca suBUte
   skandhatathatā, saiva lokasyāpi tathatā / tatkasya hetoḥ? uktaṃ	skanDa taTatA, sA eva lokasya api taTatA / tat kasya hetoH? uktam
   hyetatsubhūte tathāgatena   pañca skandhā loka iti saṃjñātāḥ iti /	hi etat suBUte taTAgatena  paQca skanDAH lokaH iti saMjQAtAH iti /
   tasmāttarhi subhūte yā skandhatathatā, sā lokatathatā / yā lokatathatā, sā	tasmAt tarhi suBUte yA skanDa taTatA, sA lokataTatA / yA lokataTatA, sA
   sarvadharmatathatā / yā sarvadharmatathatā, sā srotaāpattiphalatathatā /	sarva Darma taTatA / yA sarva Darma taTatA, sA srotaApatti Pala taTatA /
   yā srotaāpattiphalatathatā, sā sakṛdāgāmiphalatathatā / yā	yA srotaApatti Pala taTatA, sA sakRdAgAmi Pala taTatA / yA
   sakṛdāgāmiphalatathatā, sā anāgāmiphalatathatā / yā anāgamiphalatathatā,	sakRdAgAmi Pala taTatA, sA anAgAmi Pala taTatA / yA anAgami Pala taTatA,
   sā arhattvaphalatathatā / yā arhattvaphalatathatā, sā	sA arhat tva Pala taTatA / yA arhat tva Pala taTatA, sA
   pratyekabuddhatvatathatā / yā pratyekabuddhatvatathatā, sā	pratyekabudDa tva taTatA / yA pratyekabudDa tva taTatA, sA
   tathāgatatathatā / iti hi tathāgatatathatā ca skandhatathatā ca	taTAgata taTatA / iti hi taTAgata taTatA ca skanDa taTatA ca
   sarvadharmatathatā ca sarvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatathatā ca ekaivaiṣā	sarva Darma taTatA ca sarva Arya SrAvaka pratyekabudDa taTatA ca ekA eva ezA
   tathatā anekabhāvābhāvāpagatā	taTatA aneka BAva aBAva apagatA
   anekatvādanānātvādakṣayatvādavikāratvādadvayatvādadvaidhīkāratvāt /	aneka tvAt anAnA tvAt akzaya tvAt avikAra tvAt advaya tvAdat vEDIkAra tvAt /
   evameṣā subhūte tathatā tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāmāgamya abhisaṃbuddhā /	evam ezA suBUte taTatA taTAgatena prajQApAramitAm Agamya aBisaMbudDAH /
   evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya	evam hi suBUte prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya
   lokasya saṃdarśayitrī / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato 'sya lokasya lokaṃ	lokasya saMdarSayitrI / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH asya lokasya lokam
   saṃdarśayati / evaṃ cāsya lokasya darśanaṃ bhavati   evaṃ hi subhūte	saMdarSayati / evam ca asya lokasya darSanam Bavati  evam hi suBUte
   prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī	prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm mAtA jananI
   janayitrī / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatastathatāmabhisaṃbudhya lokasya	janayitrI / evam hi suBUte taTAgataH taTatAm aBisaMbuDya lokasya
   tathatāṃ jānāti, avitathatāṃ jānāti, ananyatathatāṃ jānāti / evaṃ ca	taTatAm jAnAti, avitaTa tAm jAnAti, ananyataTatAm jAnAti / evam ca
   subhūte tathāgatastathatāmabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃstathāgata ityucyate //	suBUte taTAgataH taTatAm aBisaMbudDaH san= taTA gataH iti ucyate //
   (Vaidya 135) sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha   gambhīrā bhagavaṃstathatā / ato	(VEdyaH 135) sTaviraH suBUtiH Aha  gamBIrAH Bagavan= taTatA / atas 
   bhagavaṃstathatāto buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ prabhāvyate prakāśyate / ko	Bagavan= taTatA ataH budDAnAm BagavatAm boDiH praBAvyate prakASyate / kaH 
   'tra bhagavan anyo 'dhimokṣyate 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	atra Bagavan anyaH aDimokzyate avinivartanIyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'rhan vā paripūrṇasaṃkalpo dṛṣṭisaṃpanno vā pudgalaḥ? tathā hi bhagavan	arhan vA paripUrNa saMkalpaH dRzwi saMpannaH vA pudgalaH? taTA hi Bagavan
   imāni sthānāni paramagambhīrāṇi tathāgatenābhisaṃbudhya ākhyātāni /	imAni sTAnAni parama gamBIrANi taTAgatena aBisaMbuDya AKyAtAni /
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam
   etat / paramagambhīrāṇīmāni sthānāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbudhya ākhyātāni /	etat / parama gamBIrANi imAni sTAnAni taTAgatena aBisaMbuDya AKyAtAni /
   tathā hi subhūte akṣayaiṣā tathatā, yā tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhā,	taTA hi suBUte akzayA ezA taTatA, yA taTAgatena aBisaMbudDA,
   abhisaṃbudhya akṣayākṣayaivākhyātā //	aBisaMbuDya akzaya akzaya eva AKyAtAH //
   atha khalu śakradevendrapramukhāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā	aTa Kalu Sakradeva indra pramuKAH kAmAvacarAH rUpa avarAH ca deva putrA
   brahmakāyikānāṃ ca viṃśatidevaputrasahasrāṇi yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya	brahmakAyikAnAm ca viMSati deva putra sahasrANi yena BagavAn= tena upasaMkramya
   bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tasthuḥ / ekāntasthitāś ca te	BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte tasTuH / ekAnta sTitAH ca te
   kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan   gambhīrā	kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  gamBIrA
   bhagavan dharmāḥ prakāśyante / kathaṃ bhagavan atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante?	Bagavan DarmAH prakASyante / kaTam Bagavan atra lakzaNAni sTApyante?
   bhagavānāha   śūnyamiti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante / ānimittamiti	BagavAn Aha  SUnyam iti deva putrAH atra lakzaNAni sTApyante / Animittam iti
   apraṇihitamiti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante / anabhisaṃskāra iti	apraNihitam iti deva putrAH atra lakzaNAni sTApyante / anaBisaMskAraH iti
   anutpāda iti anirodha iti asaṃkleśa iti avyavadānamiti abhāva iti	anutpAdaH iti aniroDaH iti asaMkleSaH iti avyavadAnam iti aBAvaH iti
   nirvāṇamiti dharmadhāturiti tathateti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante	nirvANam iti DarmaDAtuH iti taTatA iti deva putrAH atra lakzaNAni sTApyante
   / tatkasya hetoḥ? aniśritāni hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni / ākāśasadṛśāni	/ tat kasya hetoH? aniSritAni hi deva putrAH etAni lakzaNAni / AkASa sadRSAni
   hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni / naitāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenārhatā	hi deva putrAH etAni lakzaNAni / na etAni lakzaNAni taTAgatena arhatA
   samyaksaṃbuddhena sthāpitāni / naitāni lakṣaṇāni rūpasaṃkhyātāni / evaṃ na	samyaksaMbudDena sTApitAni / na etAni lakzaNAni rUpa saMKyAtAni / evam na
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasaṃkhyātāni / naitāni lakṣaṇāni rūpaniśritāni,	vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna saMKyAtAni / na etAni lakzaNAni rUpa niSritAni,
   na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaniśritāni / naitāni lakṣaṇāni devairvā	na vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna niSritAni / na etAni lakzaNAni devEH vA
   nāgairvā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā sthāpitāni / naitāni lakṣaṇāni	nAgEH vA manuzyEH vA amanuzyEH vA sTApitAni / na etAni lakzaNAni
   sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena śakyāni cālayitum / tatkasya hetoḥ?	sa deva mAnuza asureNa lokena SakyAni cAlayitum / tat kasya hetoH?
   sadevamānuṣāsuro 'pi hi loka etallakṣaṇa eva / nāpyetāni lakṣaṇāni kenāpi	sa deva mAnuza AsuraH api hi loke etad lakzaNaH eva / na api etAni lakzaNAni kena api
   hastena sthāpitāni / yo devaputrā evaṃ vadet   idamākāśaṃ kenāpi	hastena sTApitAni / yaH deva putrAH evam vadet  idam AkASam kena api
   sthāpitamiti, api nu sa devaputrāḥ samyagvadan vadet? evamukte kāmāvacarā	sTApita miti, api nu sa deva putrAH samyak vadan vadet? evam ukte kAmAvacarA
   rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan   na bhagavan ākāśaṃ	rUpa avarAH ca deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  na Bagavan AkASam
   kenacitsthāpitam / tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃskṛtatvādbhagavan ākāśasya nākāśaṃ	kenacid sTApitam / tat kasya hetoH? asaMskRta tvAt Bagavan AkASasya na AkASam
   kenacitsthāpitam //	kenacid sTApitam //
   atha khalu bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān rūpāvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate	aTa Kalu BagavAn= tAn kAma avacarAn rUpa avarAn ca deva putrAn Amantrayate
   sma   evametaddevaputrāḥ / utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathaivaitāni	sma  evam etat deva putrAH / utpAdAt vA taTAgatAnAm anutpAdAt vA taTA eva etAni
   lakṣaṇāni sthitāni / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathaitāni hi sthitāni, tathābhūtāni	lakzaNAni sTitAni / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA etAni hi sTitAni, taTABUtAni
   tathāgatenābhisaṃbudhya ākhyātāni / tasmāddevaputrāstathāgatastathāgata	taTAgatena aBisaMbuDya AKyAtAni / tasmAt deva putrAH taTAgataH taTAgata
   ityucyate //	iti ucyate //
   (Vaidya 136) atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrāṇi	(VEdyaH 136) aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrANi
   bhagavan imāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāni / tathāgatānāṃ	Bagavan imAni lakzaNAni taTAgatena aBisaMbudDAni / taTAgatAnAm
   cāsaṅgajñānaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā / asaṅgajñānāya prajñāpāramitā	ca asaFga jQAnam yat uta prajQApAramitA / asaFga jQAnAya prajQApAramitA
   tathāgatānāṃ gocaraḥ / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	taTAgatAnAm gocaraH / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / evam hi suBUte prajQApAramitA
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī / yathā	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI / yaTA
   subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ dharmaṃ	suBUte taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH imAm Darmam
   prajñāpāramitāmupaniśritya viharanti, tathaivaite dharmāḥ sadā sthitāḥ,	prajQApAramitAm upaniSritya viharanti, taTA eva ete DarmAH sadA sTitAH,
   asthānatastathāgatairabhisaṃbuddhāḥ / ataste dharmamevopaniśritya	asTAnataH taTAgatEH aBisaMbudDAH / atas te Darmam eva upaniSritya
   viharanti, dharmaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti	viharanti, Darmam satkurvanti gurukurvanti mAnayanti
   pūjayantyarcayantyapacāyanti / prajñāpāramitaivaiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ	pUjayanti arcayanti apacAyanti / prajQApAramitA eva ezA suBUte DarmANAm
   dharmateti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvanti	DarmatA iti taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH prajQApAramitAm satkurvanti
   gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayantyarcayantyapacāyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? ato	gurukurvanti mAnayanti pUjayanti arcayanti apacAyanti / tat kasya hetoH? atas 
   hi subhūte prajñāpāramitātastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ	hi suBUte prajQApAramitAtaH taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm
   sarvajñatāyāḥ prabhāvanā bhavati / kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavedinaś ca tathāgatā	sarvajQa tAyAH praBAvanA Bavati / kRtajQAH kRtavedinaH ca taTAgatA
   arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ / yatkhalu subhūte samyagvadanto vadeyuḥ  	arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH / yat Kalu suBUte samyak vadantaH vadeyuH  
   kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti, tattathāgataṃ hi te samyagvadanto vadanti   kṛtajñaḥ	kRtajQaH kRtavedI iti, tat taTAgatam hi te samyak vadantaH vadanti  kRtajQaH
   kṛtavedīti / yatkhalu subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena yena	kRtavedI iti / yat Kalu suBUte taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH yena yena
   yānenāgataḥ, yayā yayā pratipadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,	yAnena AgataH, yayA yayA pratipadA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH,
   tathāgatastadeva yānaṃ tāmeva pratipadamanugṛhṇīte anuparipālayati,	taTAgataH tat eva yAnam tAm eva pratipadam anugRhNIte anuparipAlayati,
   tayaiva kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā / iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā	tayA eva kRtajQa tayA kRta veditayA / iyam suBUte taTAgatasya kRtajQa tA
   kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā / punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā akṛtā	kRta veditA drazwavyA / punar aparam suBUte taTAgatena sarva DarmA akRtA
   akṛtā ityabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, avikṛtā avikṛtā ityabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, anabhisaṃskṛtā	akRtAH iti aBisaMbudDAH, avikRtAH avikRtAH iti aBisaMbudDAH, anaBisaMskRtA
   anabhisaṃskṛtā ityabhisaṃbuddhāḥ / iyam api subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā	anaBisaMskRtAH iti aBisaMbudDAH / iyam api suBUte taTAgatasya kRtajQa tA
   kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā / prajñāpāramitāṃ hyāgamya subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ	kRta veditA drazwavyA / prajQApAramitAm hi Agamya suBUte taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasya evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravṛttam / anenāpi subhūte	samyaksaMbudDasya evam sarva Darmezu jQAnam pravRttam / anena api suBUte
   paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya	paryAyeNa prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya
   lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //	lokasya saMdarSayitrI //
   evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā	evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yadA Bagavan sarva DarmA
   ajānakā apaśyakāḥ, tadā kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	ajAnakAH apaSyakAH, tadA kaTam Bagavan prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam
   subhūtimetadavocat   sādhu sādhu subhūte, yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ	suBUtim etat avocat  sADu sADu suBUte, yaH tvam taTAgatam arhantam
   samyaksaṃbuddhametamarthaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase / subhūtirevamāha  	samyaksaMbudDam etam arTam paripraSnIkartavyam manyase / suBUtiH evam Aha  
   sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakā iti / evametatsubhūte, evam etat /	sarva DarmAH ajAnakAH apaSyakAH iti / evam etat suBUte, evam etat /
   sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ / kathaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā	sarva DarmAH ajAnakAH apaSyakAH / kaTam suBUte sarva DarmAH ajAnakA
   apaśyakāḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte śūnyāḥ / sarvadharmā hi subhūte	apaSyakAH? sarva DarmAH hi suBUte SUnyAH / sarva DarmAH hi suBUte
   aniśritāḥ / evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ / evamete	aniSritAH / evam hi suBUte sarva DarmAH ajAnakAH apaSyakAH / evam ete
   subhūte sarvadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya tathāgatairabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /	suBUte sarva DarmAH prajQApAramitAm Agamya taTAgatEH aBisaMbudDAH /
   evam api subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya	evam api suBUte prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya
   lokasya saṃdarśayitrī rūpasyādṛṣṭatvāt / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ	lokasya saMdarSayitrI rUpasya adRzwa tvAt / evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH
   saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyādṛṣṭatvātsaṃdarśayitrī / evaṃ hi subhūte	saMskArANAm vijQAnasya adRzwa tvAt saMdarSayitrI / evam hi suBUte
   prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya	prajQApAramitA taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya
   saṃdarśayitrī bhavati //	saMdarSayitrI Bavati //
   (Vaidya 137) subhūtirāha   kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati? kathaṃ	(VEdyaH 137) suBUtiH Aha  kaTam Bagavan rUpasya adRzwa tA Bavati? kaTam
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kathaṃ bhagavan vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm? kaTam Bagavan vijQAnasya adRzwa tA
   bhavati? bhagavānāha   yadi subhūte na rūpārambaṇaṃ vijñānamutpadyate,	Bavati? BagavAn Aha  yadi suBUte na rUpa ArambaNam vijQAnam utpadyate,
   evaṃ rūpasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / yadi subhūte	evam rUpasya adRzwa tA Bavati / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / yadi suBUte
   na vijñānārambaṇaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, evaṃ vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati / yā	na vijQAna ArambaNam vijQAnam utpadyate, evam vijQAnasya adRzwa tA Bavati / yA
   ca subhūte rūpasyādṛṣṭatā, yā ca vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, yā ca	ca suBUte rUpasya adRzwa tA, yA ca vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm, yA ca
   subhūte vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā, saiva lokasya dṛṣṭatā bhavati / evaṃ hi subhūte	suBUte vijQAnasya adRzwa tA, sA eva lokasya dRzwa tA Bavati / evam hi suBUte
   lokastathāgatena dṛṣṭo bhavati / evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā	lokaH taTAgatena dRzwaH Bavati / evam hi suBUte prajQApAramitA
   tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī / kathaṃ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm asya lokasya saMdarSayitrI / kaTam
   ca subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaṃ saṃdarśayati? iti lokaḥ śūnya iti lokaṃ	ca suBUte prajQApAramitA lokam saMdarSayati? iti lokaH SUnyaH iti lokam
   sūcayati, evaṃ prajñāpayati, evaṃ lokaṃ saṃdarśayati / iti loko 'cintya	sUcayati, evam prajQApayati, evam lokam saMdarSayati / iti lokaH acintya
   iti, lokaḥ śānta iti, loko vivikta iti lokaviśuddhyā lokaṃ sūcayati / evaṃ	iti, lokaH SAntaH iti, lokaH vivikte iti loka viSudDyA lokam sUcayati / evam
   lokaṃ prajñāpayati, evaṃ saṃdarśayatīti //	lokam prajQApayati, evam saMdarSayati iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ lokasaṃdarśanaparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm loka saMdarSana parivartaH nAma
   dvādaśaḥ //	dvAdaSaH //
   (Vaidya 138)	(VEdyaH 138)
   ASP_13: acintyaparivartastrayodaśaḥ /	ASP_13: acintya parivartaH trayodaSaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā / mahākṛtyena bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA / mahA kRtyena bata iyam Bagavan prajQApAramitA
   pratyupasthitā /	pratyupasTitA /
   acintyakṛtyenātulyakṛtyenāprameyakṛtyenāsaṃkhyeyakṛtyenāsamasamakṛtyena	acintya kRtyena atulya kRtyena aprameya kRtyena asaMKyeya kRtyena asama sama kRtyena
   bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / bhagavānāha  	bata iyam Bagavan prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA / BagavAn Aha  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / mahA kRtyena iyam suBUte prajQApAramitA
   pratyupasthitā /	pratyupasTitA /
   acintyakṛtyenātulyakṛtyenāprameyakṛtyenāsaṃkhyeyakṛtyenāsamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ	acintya kRtyena atulya kRtyena aprameya kRtyena asaMKyeya kRtyena asama sama kRtyena iyam
   subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / kathaṃ ca subhūte	suBUte prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA / kaTam ca suBUte
   acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? acintyaṃ hi subhūte	acintya kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA? acintyam hi suBUte
   tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam / evaṃ hi subhūte	taTAgata tvam budDa tvam svayaMBU tvam sarvajQa tvam / evam hi suBUte
   acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / na hīdaṃ śakyaṃ cittena	acintya kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA / na hi idam Sakyam cittena
   cintayitum / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi cittaṃ vā cetanā vā caitasiko vā atra	cintayitum / tat kasya hetoH? na hi cittam vA cetanA vA cEtasikaH vE atra
   dharmaḥ pravartate / kathaṃ ca subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā	DarmaH pravartate / kaTam ca suBUte atulya kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA
   pratyupasthitā? na śakyaṃ subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ	pratyupasTitA? na Sakyam suBUte taTAgata tvam budDa tvam svayaMBU tvam
   sarvajñatvaṃ cintayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā / evaṃ hi subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ	sarvajQa tvam cintayitum vA tulayitum vA / evam hi suBUte atulya kRtyena iyam
   prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / kathaṃ ca subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ	prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA / kaTam ca suBUte aprameya kRtyena iyam
   prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? aprameyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ	prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA? aprameyam hi suBUte taTAgata tvam
   buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam / evaṃ hi subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ	budDa tvam svayaMBU tvam sarvajQa tvam / evam hi suBUte aprameya kRtyena iyam
   prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / kathaṃ ca subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ	prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA / kaTam ca suBUte asaMKyeya kRtyena iyam
   prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? asaṃkhyeyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ	prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA? asaMKyeyam hi suBUte taTAgata tvam
   buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam / evaṃ hi subhūte	budDa tvam svayaMBU tvam sarvajQa tvam / evam hi suBUte
   asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / kathaṃ ca subhūte	asaMKyeya kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA / kaTam ca suBUte
   asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? nāsti subhūte	asama sama kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA? na asti suBUte
   tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ sarvajñasya samaḥ,	taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya svayaMBuvaH sarvajQasya samaH,
   kutaḥ punaruttaraḥ? evaṃ hi subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā	kutas punar uttaraH? evam hi suBUte asama sama kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA
   pratyupasthitā //	pratyupasTitAH //
   sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha   kiṃ	sTaviraH suBUtiH Aha  kim
   punarbhagavaṃstathāgatatvamevācintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam?	punar Bagavan= taTAgata tvam eva acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaMKyeyam asama samam?
   evaṃ buddhatvameva svayaṃbhūtvameva sarvajñatvameva	evam budDa tvam eva svayaMBU tvam eva sarvajQa tvam eva
   atulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam, utāho	atulyam aprameyam asaMKyeyam asama samam, uta aho
   rūpamapyacintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam? evaṃ vedanāpi	rUpam api acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaMKyeyam asama samam? evam vedanA api
   saṃjñāpi saṃskārā apiḥ?	saMjQA api saMskArAH apiH?
   vijñānamapyacintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam, utāho	vijQAnam api acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaMKyeyam asama samam, uta aho
   sarvadharmā apyacintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ? evamukte	sarva DarmAH api acintyAH atulyAH aprameyAH asaMKyeyAH asamasamAH? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / rūpam	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam etat / rUpam
   api subhūte acintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam / evaṃ vedanāpi	api suBUte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaMKyeyam asama samam / evam vedanA api
   saṃjñāpi saṃskārā api / vijñānam api subhūte	saMjQA api saMskArAH api / vijQAnam api suBUte
   acintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam / evaṃ sarvadharmā api	acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaMKyeyam asama samam / evam sarva DarmAH api
   subhūte acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	suBUte acintyAH atulyAH aprameyAH asaMKyeyAH asamasamAH / tat kasya hetoH?
   rūpasya hi subhūte yā dharmatā, na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā	rUpasya hi suBUte yA Darma tA, na tatra cittam na cetanA na cEtasikA
   dharmā na tulanā / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / vijñānasya hi	DarmAH na tulanA / evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / vijQAnasya hi
   subhūte yā dharmatā, na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na	suBUte yA Darma tA, na tatra cittam na cetanA na cEtasikAH DarmAH na
   tulanā / sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte yā dharmatā, na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā	tulanA / sarva DarmANAm hi suBUte yA Darma tA, na tatra cittam na cetanA
   na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā / evaṃ hi subhūte rūpamapyacintyamatulyam /	na cEtasikA DarmAH na tulanA / evam hi suBUte rUpam api acintyam atulyam /
   evaṃ vedanāpi saṃjñāpi saṃskārā api / vijñānamapyacintyamatulyam / evaṃ	evam vedanA api saMjQA api saMskArAH api / vijQAnam api acintyam atulyam / evam
   sarvadharmā apyacintyā atulyāḥ / rūpam api (Vaidya 139) subhūte aprameyam	sarva DarmAH api acintyAH atulyAH / rUpam api (VEdyaH 139) suBUte aprameyam
   / evaṃ vedanāpi saṃjñāpi saṃskārā api / vijñānam api subhūte aprameyam,	/ evam vedanA api saMjQA api saMskArAH api / vijQAnam api suBUte aprameyam,
   sarvadharmā api subhūte aprameyāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi subhūte	sarva DarmAH api suBUte aprameyAH / tat kasya hetoH? rUpasya hi suBUte
   pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / vijñānasya	pramANam na prajQAyate / evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / vijQAnasya
   hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate / sarvadharmāṇām api hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ	hi suBUte pramANam na prajQAyate / sarva DarmANAm api hi suBUte pramANam
   na prajñāyate / kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? kena	na prajQAyate / kena kAraNena suBUte rUpasya pramANam na prajQAyate? kena
   kāraṇena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya	kAraNena vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm? kena kAraNena suBUte vijQAnasya
   pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? kena kāraṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ	pramANam na prajQAyate? kena kAraNena suBUte sarva DarmANAm api pramANam
   na prajñāyate? rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ	na prajQAyate? rUpasya hi suBUte pramANam na vidyate / evam vedanAyAH
   saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /	saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / vijQAnasya hi suBUte pramANam na vidyate /
   sarvadharmāṇām api hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate / kena kāraṇena subhūte	sarva DarmANAm api hi suBUte pramANam na vidyate / kena kAraNena suBUte
   rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kena	rUpasya pramANam na vidyate? evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm? kena
   kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? kena kāreṇena subhūte	kAraNena suBUte vijQAnasya pramANam na vidyate? kena kAreNena suBUte
   sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? apramāṇatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇām	sarva DarmANAm api pramANam na vidyate? apramANa tvAt suBUte sarva DarmANAm
   / rūpam api subhūte asaṃkhyeyam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / vijñānam	/ rUpam api suBUte asaMKyeyam / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam
   api subhūte asaṃkhyeyam / sarvadharmā api subhūte asaṃkhyeyāḥ,	api suBUte asaMKyeyam / sarva DarmAH api suBUte asaMKyeyAH,
   gaṇanāsamatikrāntatvāt / rūpamapi subhūte asamasamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā	gaNanA samatikrAnta tvAt / rUpam api suBUte asama samam / evam vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārāḥ / vijñānam api subhūte asamasamam / evaṃ sarvadharmā api subhūte	saMskArAH / vijQAnam api suBUte asama samam / evam sarva DarmAH api suBUte
   asamasamāḥ, ākāśasamatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇām / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte	asama samAH, AkASa sama tvAt suBUte sarva DarmANAm / tat kim manyase suBUte
   api tu astyākāśasya samo vā gaṇanā vā pramāṇaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā cittaṃ vā	api tu asti AkASasya samaH vA gaNanA vA pramANam vA tulyam vA cittam vA
   caitasikā vā dharmāḥ? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha  	cEtasikAH vA DarmAH? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  
   evameva subhūte anena paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā api acintyā atulyā aprameyā	evam eva suBUte anena paryAyeNa sarva DarmAH api acintyAH atulyAH aprameyA
   asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ / ete ca subhūte tathāgatadharmā	asaMKyeyAH asamasamAH / ete ca suBUte taTAgata DarmA
   acintyāścittoparamatvāt, atulyāstulanāsamatikrāntatvāt / acintyā atulyā	acintyAH citta uparama tvAt, atulyAH tulanA samatikrAnta tvAt / acintyAH atulyA
   iti subhūte vijñānagatasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanam / evamaprameyā	iti suBUte vijQAna gatasya etat Darmasya aDivacanam / evam aprameyA
   asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā iti subhūte samasaṃkhyāpramāṇoparamatvādaprameyā	asaMKyeyAH asamasamAH iti suBUte sama saMKyA pramANa uparama tvAt aprameyA
   asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāstathāgatadharmāḥ / ākāśasamāsaṃkhyeyāprameyatayā	asaMKyeyAH asama samAH taTAgata DarmAH / AkASa samAsaMKyeya aprameya tayA
   asamasamā asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ / ākāśatulyatayā atulyā	asama samAH asaMKyeyAH aprameyAH ete DarmAH / AkASa tulya tayA atulyA
   asamavahitā bateme dharmāḥ / tasmātsubhūte atulyā ete dharmā ucyante /	asamavahitAH bata ime DarmAH / tasmAt suBUte atulyAH ete DarmAH ucyante /
   ākāśācintyatayā acintyā ete dharmāḥ / ākāśātulyatayā atulyā ete dharmāḥ /	AkASa acintya tayA acintyAH ete DarmAH / AkASa atulya tayA atulyAH ete DarmAH /
   ākāśāprameyatayā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ / ākāśāsaṃkhyeyatayā asaṃkhyeyā ete	AkASa aprameya tayA aprameyAH ete DarmAH / AkASa asaMKyeya tayA asaMKyeyAH ete
   dharmāḥ / ākāśāsamasamatayā asamasamā ete dharmāḥ / asyāṃ khalu	DarmAH / AkASa asama sama tayA asamasamAH ete DarmAH / asyAm Kalu
   punaracintyatāyāmatulyatāyāmaprameyatāyāmasaṃkhyeyatāyāmasamasamatāyāṃ	punar acintya tAyAm atulya tAyAm aprameya tAyAm asaMKyeya tAyAm asama samatAyAm
   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni	BAzyamANAyAm paQcAnAm Bikzu SatAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni
   vimuktāni, viṃśateś ca bhikṣuṇīśatānām anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittāni	vimuktA ani, viMSateH ca BikzuNI SatAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni
   vimuktāni, ṣaṣṭeścopāsakaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu	vimuktAni, zazweH ca upAsaka SatAnAm virajaH vigata malam Darmezu
   dharmacakṣurviśuddham, triṃśateścopāsikānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu	Darma cakzuH viSudDam, triMSateH ca upAsikAnAm virajaH vigata malam Darmezu
   dharmacakṣurviśuddham, viṃśatyā ca bodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu	Darma cakzuH viSudDam, viMSatyA ca boDisattvEH anutpattikezu Darmezu
   kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt / te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā	kzAntiH pratilabDA aBUt / te ca BagavatA iha eva Badra kalpe vyAkRtA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / ye 'pi te upāsakā upāsikāś ca yeṣāṃ virajo	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / ye api te upAsakAH upAsikAH ca yezAm virajaH 
   vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham, te 'pi bhagavatā vyākṛtāḥ /	vigata malam Darmezu Darma cakzuH viSudDam, te api BagavatA vyAkRtAH /
   teṣāmapyanupādāyāsravebhyaścittaṃ vimokṣyate //	tezAm api anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittam vimokzyate //
   (Vaidya 140) atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā	(VEdyaH 140) aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrA
   bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / mahākṛtyena bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā	Bagavan prajQApAramitA / mahA kRtyena bata iyam Bagavan prajQApAramitA
   pratyupasthitā / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	pratyupasTitA / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / gambhīrā subhūte prajñāpāramitā /	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / gamBIrA suBUte prajQApAramitA /
   mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā / tatkasya hetoḥ?	mahAkRtyena iyam suBUte prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitAH / tat kasya hetoH?
   atra hi subhūte sarvajñatā samāyuktā, atra pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ samāyuktā,	atra hi suBUte sarvajQa tA samAyuktA, atra pratyekabudDa BUmiH samAyuktA,
   atra sarvaśrāvakabhūmiḥ samāyuktā / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ	atra sarva SrAvaka BUmiH samAyuktA / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte rAjQaH
   kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya yāni tāni	kzatriyasya mUrDABiziktasya janapada sTAma vIrya prAptasya yAni tAni
   rājakṛtyāni, yāni ca nagarakṛtyāni, yāni ca janapadakṛtyāni, sarvāṇi tāni	rAja kRtya ani, yAni ca nagara kRtyAni, yAni ca janapada kRtya ani, sarvANi tAni
   amātyasamāyuktāni bhavanti / alpotsukastato rājā bhavatyapahṛtabhāraḥ /	amAtya samAyuktAni Bavanti / alpa utsukaH tatas rAjA Bavati apahRta BAraH /
   evameva subhūte ye kecidbuddhadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā	evam eva suBUte ye kecid budDa DarmA vA pratyekabudDa DarmA vA
   śrāvakadharmā vā, sarve te prajñāpāramitāsamāyuktāḥ / prajñāpāramitā tatra	SrAvaka DarmAH vA, sarve te prajQApAramitA samAyuktAH / prajQApAramitA tatra
   kṛtyaṃ karoti / anena subhūte paryāyeṇa mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā	kRtyam karoti / anena suBUte paryAyeNa mahA kRtyena iyam prajQApAramitA
   pratyupasthitā rūpasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ	pratyupasTitAH rUpasya aparigrahAya anaBiniveSAya / evam vedanAyAH
   saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / vijñānasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya,	saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / vijQAnasya aparigrahAya anaBiniveSAya,
   srotaāpattiphalasyāparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya, evaṃ	srotaApatti Palasya aparigrahAya anaBiniveSa aya, evam
   sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānāgāmiphalasyārhattvaphalasyāparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya,	sakRdAgAmi Palasya anAgAmi Palasya arhat tva Palasya aparigrahAya anaBiniveSAya,
   pratyekabodheraparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya, sarvajñatāyā	pratyeka boDeH aparigrahAya anaBiniveSa aya, sarvajQa tAyA
   aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā //	aparigrahAya anaBiniveSAya prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitAH //
   subhūtirāha   kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatāyā aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya	suBUtiH Aha  kaTam Bagavan sarvajQa tAyAH aparigrahAya anaBiniveSAya
   prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte	prajQApAramitA pratyupasTitA? BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase suBUte
   samanupaśyasi tvamarhattvaṃ yatra parigrahaṃ vā abhiniveśaṃ vā kuryāḥ?	samanupaSyasi tvam arhat tvam yatra parigraham vE aBiniveSam vA kuryAH?
   subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi	suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / na aham Bagavan= tam Darmam samanupaSyAmi
   yaṃ parigṛhṇīyāmabhiniveśeyaṃ vā arhattvamiti / bhagavānāha  	yam parigRhNIyAm aBiniveSeyam vE arhat tvam iti / BagavAn Aha  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / aham api subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ na	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / aham api suBUte taTAgata tvam na
   samanupaśyāmi / so 'haṃ subhūte tathāgatatvamasamanupaśyan na parigṛhṇāmi	samanupaSyAmi / saH aham suBUte taTAgata tvam asam anupaSyan na parigRhNAmi
   nābhiniveśe / tasmāttarhi subhūte sarvajñatāpyaparigrahā anabhiniveśā /	na aBiniveSe / tasmAt tarhi suBUte sarvajQa tApya parigrahAH anaBiniveSAH /
   subhūtirāha   sarvajñatāpi bhagavan aparigrahā anabhiniveśeti? mā bhagavan	suBUtiH Aha  sarvajQa tA api Bagavan aparigrahAH anaBiniveSa iti? mA Bagavan
   navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ parīttakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ	nava yAna saMprasTitAH parItta kuSala mUlAH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH imam
   nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante / api tu khalu	nirdeSam SrutvA utrasizuH saMtrasizuH saMtrAsam Apatsyante / api tu Kalu
   punarbhagavan ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā hetusaṃpannāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā	punar Bagavan ye boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH hetu saMpannAH pUrva jina kRta aDikArA
   dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti, ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	dIrGarAtra avaropita kuSala mUlA Bavizyanti, te imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti / bhagavānāha   evametatsubhūte, evam	prajQApAramitAm SrutvA aDimokzyanti / BagavAn Aha  evam etat suBUte, evam
   etat //	etat //
   atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan  	aTa Kalu te kAmAvacarAH rUpa avarAH ca deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  
   gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā, durdṛśā duranubodhā /	gamBIrA Bagavan prajQApAramitA, durdRSA duranuboDAH /
   pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bhagavan sattvā	pUrva jina kRta aDikArAH dIrGa rAtra avaropita kuSala mUlAH te Bagavan sattvA
   bhaviṣyanti, ya enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimokṣyanti /	Bavizyanti, yaH enAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm aDimokzyanti /
   sacedbhagavaṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ, te sarve	saced Bagavan= tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO ye sattvAH, te sarve
   śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā careyuḥ yaśceha gambhīrāyāṃ	SradDA anusAri BUmO kalpam vA kalpa avaSezam vA careyuH yaH ca iha gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmekadivasam api kṣāntiṃ rocayedgaveṣeta	prajQApAramitAyAm eka divasam api kzAntim rocayet gavezeta
   cintayettulayedupaparīkṣeta upanidhyāyet, ayameva bhagavaṃstebhyaḥ śreyān	cintayet tulayet upaparIkzeta upaniDyAyet, ayam eva Bagavan= teByaH SreyAn
   / evamukte bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān (Vaidya 141) rūpāvacarāṃś ca	/ evam ukte BagavAn= tAn kAma avacarAn (VEdyaH 141) rUpAvacarAn ca
   devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa   yadi devaputrāḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā	deva putrAn AmantrayAmAsa  yadi deva putrAH kaScid eva kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt, yāvadasya devaputrāḥ	kula duhitA vA imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm SRNuyAt, yAvat asya deva putrAH
   kṣiprataraṃ nirvāṇaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam, na tveva teṣāṃ śraddhānusāribhūmau	kziprataram nirvANam pratikAFkzitavyam, na tu eva tezAm SradDA anusAri BUmO
   kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā caratām / atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś	kalpam vA kalpa avaSezam vA caratAm / aTa Kalu te kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH 
   ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan   mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta	ca deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  mahA pAramitA iyam Bagavan yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā / ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantaṃ	prajQApAramitA / iti uktvA BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya Bagavantam
   triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikād gamiṣyāma ityārocya prakrāntāḥ / te	tris pradakziNIkRtya BagavataH antikAt gamizyAmaH iti Arocya prakrAntAH / te
   'vidūraṃ gatvā antarhitāḥ / kāmāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ kāmadhātau	avidUram gatvA antarhitAH / kAmAvacarAH ca deva putrAH kAmaDAtO
   prātiṣṭhantaḥ, rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā brahmaloke prātiṣṭhanteti //	prAtizWantaH, rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrAH brahma loke prAtizWanta iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmacintyaparivarto nāma trayodaśaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm acintya parivartaH nAma trayodaSaH //
   (Vaidya 142)	(VEdyaH 142)
   ASP_14: aupamyaparivartaścaturdaśaḥ /	ASP_14: Opamya parivartaH caturdaSaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yo bhagavan bodhisattvo	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yaH Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	mahAsattvaH saha SravaNena eva asyAm gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nāvatiṣṭhate na	prajQApAramitAyAm aDimucyate na avalIyate na saMlIyate na avatizWate na
   dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati, abhinandati ca prajñāpāramitām, sa	DanDAyati na vicikitsati na kAFkzati, aBinandati ca prajQApAramitAm, sa
   bhagavan kutaścyutvā kutropapannaḥ? bhagavānāha   yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo	Bagavan kutas cyutvA kutra upapannaH? BagavAn Aha  yaH suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	mahAsattvaH saha SravaNena eva asyAm gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na	prajQApAramitAyAm aDimokzyate na avalezyate na saMlezyate na avasTAsyate na
   dhandhāyiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati, abhinandiṣyati ca	DanDAyizyati na vicikitsizyati na kAFkzizyati, aBinandizyati ca
   darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca, dhārayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyatyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ	darSanam SravaNam ca, DArayizyati BAvayizyati enAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitām, prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃś ca manasikārānna vihāsyati,	prajQApAramitAm, prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAn ca manasikArAt na vihAsyati,
   na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati mānasam, chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ	na vipRzWIkarizyati mAnasam, Candam janayizyati udgrahItum DArayitum
   vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum, kariṣyatyanubandham, anugamiṣyati	vAcayitum paryavAptum pravartayitum, karizyati anubanDam, anugamizyati
   dharmabhāṇakaṃ notsrakṣyati / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā	Darma BANakam na utsrakzyati / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte taruNa vat sA
   gaurnotsṛjati vatsam, evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva enāṃ	gOH na utsRjati vatsam, evam eva suBUte yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH enAm
   gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ	gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm SrutvA tAvat na prahAsyati Darma BANakam
   yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā, ayaṃ	yAvat asya iyam prajQApAramitA kAya gatAH vA Bavizyati pustaka gatAH vA, ayam
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH manuzyeByaH eva cyutaH manuzyezu eva upapannaH
   subhūtirāha   syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo	suBUtiH Aha  syAt Bagavan etEH eva guNEH samanvAgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ? bhagavānāha  	mahAsattvaH anyeByaH budDa kzetreByaH cyutaH iha upapannaH? BagavAn Aha  
   syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān	syAt suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anyeByaH budDa kzetreByaH anyAn budDAn
   bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta	BagavataH paryupAsya paripRcCya paripraSnIkRtya teByaH cyuta
   ihopapannaḥ, etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato veditavyaḥ / punaraparaṃ subhūte	iha upapannaH, etEH eva guNEH samanvAgataH veditavyaH / punar aparam suBUte
   yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ, so	yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tuziteByaH deveByaH cyutaH iha upapannaH, saH 
   'pyetaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato veditavyaḥ / yena maitreyo bodhisattvo	api etEH eva guNEH samanvAgataH veditavyaH / yena mEtreyaH boDisattvaH

   prajñāpāramitāmārabhya, so 'pyetaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato veditavyaḥ /	prajQApAramitAm AraBya, saH api etEH eva guNEH samanvAgataH veditavyaH /

   ca, punarevāsaṃhāryā ca bhavati paripṛcchayā / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ	ca, punar eva asaMhAryA ca Bavati paripRcCayA / tat kasya hetoH? evam
   hyetatsubhūte bhavati   yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ	hi etat suBUte Bavati  yena pUrvam na saMparipRzwA Bavati iyam
   prajñāpāramitā, na saṃparipṛcchitā, (Vaidya 143) na saṃparipraśnīkṛtā, na	prajQApAramitA, na saMparipRcCitA, (VEdyaH 143) na saMparipraSnIkRtA, na

   taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati, yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	tam Candam prahAsyati, yaduta enAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm
