   dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā   śrāvakabhūmirvā	dvayoH BUmyoH anyatarA BUmiH pratikAFkzitavyA  SrAvaka BUmiH vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi	pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte mahA samudra gatAyAm nAvi
   bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā, mṛtaśarīraṃ vā	BinnAyAm te tatra kAzWam vA na gRhNanti Palakam vA, mRta SarIram vA
   nādhyālambante, veditavyam etat   aprāptā evaite pāramudake kālaṃ	na aDyAlambante, veditavyam etat  aprAptAH eva ete pAram udake kAlam
   kariṣyantīti / ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ	karizyanti iti / ye Kalu punar suBUte mahA samudra gatAyAm nAvi BinnAyAm
   tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā, mṛtaśarīraṃ vā adhyālambante,	tatra kAzWam vA gRhNanti Palakam vA, mRta SarIram vE aDyAlambante,
   veditavyametatsubhūte   naite udake kālaṃ kariṣyanti, svastinā	veditavyam etat suBUte  na ete udake kAlam karizyanti, svastinA
   anantarāyeṇa pāramuttariṣyanti, akṣatāścānupahatāś ca sthale sthāsyantīti	anantarAyeNa pAram uttarizyanti, akzatAH ca anupahatAH ca sTale sTAsyanti iti
   / evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa	/ evam eva suBUte yaH boDisattvaH SradDA mAtrakeNa prasAda mAtrakeNa
   premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ	prema mAtrakeNa Canda mAtrakeNa samanvAgataH sa ca prajQApAramitAm
   nādhyālambate, veditavyametatsubhūte antaraivaiṣa vyadhvani	na aDyAlambate, veditavyam etat suBUte antarA eva eza vyaDvani
   vyavasādamāpatsyate, aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve	vyavasAdam Apatsyate, aprAptaH eva sarvajQa tAm SrAvaka tve pratyekabudDa tve
   vā sthāsyatīti / yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ	vA sTAsyati iti / yezAm Kalu punar suBUte boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā, asti kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti	mahAsattvAnAm asti SradDA, asti kzAntiH, asti ruciH, asti CandaH, asti
   vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ, astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti	vIryam, asti apramAdaH, asti aDimuktiH, asti aDyASayaH, asti tyAgaH, asti
   gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema,	gOravam, asti prItiH, asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti prema,
   astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, te ca	asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum, te ca
   prajñāpāramitāmadhyālambante / evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ	prajQApAramitAm aDyAlambante / evam tezAm sA SradDA sA kzAntiH sA rUciH
   sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so 'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ so 'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ	sa cCandaH tad vIryam saH apramAdaH sa aDimuktiH saH aDyASayaH sa tyAgaH
   tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā	tat gOravam sA prItiH tad prAmodyam sa prasAdaH tad prema sA
   anikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / te ca	anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / te ca
   prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte	prajQApAramitAm prApya sarvajQa tAyAm sTAsyanti / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,	strI va puruzaH vE aparipakvena Gawena udakam parivahet ,
   veditavyametatsubhūte   nāyaṃ ghaṭaściramanuvartsyate, kṣiprameva	veditavyam etat suBUte  na ayam GawaH ciram anuvartsyate, kzipram eva
   paribhetsyate, pravileṣyate iti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma	pariBetsyate, pravilezyate iti / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api nAma
   tadaparipakvatvāddhaṭasya, sa bhūmiparyavasāna eva bhaviṣyatīti / evameva	tad aparipakva tvAt hawasya, sa BUmi paryavasAnaH eva Bavizyati iti / evam eva
   subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti	suBUte kiMca api boDisattvasya asti SradDA asti kzAntiH asti rUciH asti
   chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ asti	CandaH asti vIryam asti apramAdaH, asti aDimuktiH asti aDyASayaH asti
   tyāgaḥ / asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti	tyAgaH / asti gOravam, asti prItiH asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti
   prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / sa	prema, asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / sa
   ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,	ca prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca aparigRhItaH Bavati,
   veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani	veditavyam etat suBUte ayam boDisattvaH antarA vyaDvani
   vyavasādamāpatsyata iti / kaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani	vyavasAdam Apatsyate iti / kaH ca suBUte boDisattvasya antarA vyaDvani
   vyavasādaḥ   śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā? tadyathāpi nāma	vyavasAdaH  SrAvaka BUmiH vA pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA? tat yaTA api nAma
   subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā	suBUte strI vA puruzaH vA su paripakvena Gawena nadItaH vA sarastaH vA
   taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato 'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,	taxAgataH vA udapAnAt vA tatas anyeByaH vA udaka ADAreByaH udakam parivahet ,
   tasya tadudakaṃ parivahato veditavyametatsubhūte svastinā (Vaidya 144)	tasya tat udakam parivahataH veditavyam etat suBUte svastinA (VEdyaH 144)
   anantarāyeṇa ayaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyatīti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma	anantarAyeNa ayam GawaH gRham gamizyati iti / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api nAma
   suparipakvatvāddhaṭasya / evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti	su paripakva tvAt hawasya / evam eva suBUte yasya boDisattvasya asti
   śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ,	SradDA asti kzAntiH asti ruciH asti CandaH, asti vIryam, asti apramAdaH,
   astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ	asti aDimuktiH asti aDyASayaH, asti tyAgaH, asti gOravam, asti prItiH
   asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti premaḥ astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ	asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti premaH asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / sa ca prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca
   parigṛhīto bhavati / veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	parigRhItaH Bavati / veditavyam etat suBUte na ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyate / akṣato 'nupahataḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ	antarA vyaDvani vyavasAdam Apatsyate / akzataH anupahataH sarvajQa tAyAm
   sthāsyatīti / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ	sTAsyati iti / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte duzprajQa jAtIyaH puruzaH sAmudrikAm
   nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake 'vatārya	na avamanA kowi tAm aparikarma kRtAm cira banDana badDAm udake avatArya
   samāropitabhāṇḍāṃ paripūrṇāṃ bhārārtāmabhirūḍhaḥ syāt,	samAropita BANxAm paripUrNAm BAra ArtAm aBirUXaH syAt ,
   veditavyametatsubhūte   evaṃdharmeyaṃ naurbhaviṣyati, yaduta udake	veditavyam etat suBUte  evaMDarmA iyam nOH Bavizyati, yat uta udake
   'saṃtīrṇabhāṇḍaiva saṃsatsyatīti / tasyānyena bhāṇḍaṃ bhaviṣyati, anyena	asaMtIrNa BANxA eva saMsatsyati iti / tasya anyena BANxam Bavizyati, anyena
   sā naurvipatsyate iti / evaṃ sa sārthavāho 'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena	sA nOH vipatsyate iti / evam sa sArTavAhaH anupAya kuSalaH dOzprajQena
   mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, mahataś ca ratnākarātparihīṇo	mahatA arTa viyogena samanvAgataH Bavizyati, mahataH ca ratna AkarAt parihINaH 
   bhaviṣyatīti / evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti	Bavizyati iti / evam eva suBUte kiMca api boDisattvasya asti SradDA asti
   kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ,	kzAntiH, asti ruciH asti CandaH, asti vIryam, asti apramAdaH,
   astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ,	asti aDimuktiH asti aDyASayaH, asti tyAgaH, asti gOravam, asti prItiH,
   asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ	asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti prema, asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum, sa ca prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca
   virahito bhavati, veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ	virahitaH Bavati, veditavyam etat suBUte aprAptaH eva ayam boDisattvaH
   sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati, vyavasādamāpatsyate, mahataḥ	sarvajQa tA ratnAkaram antarA saMsatsyati, vyavasAdam Apatsyate, mahataH
   svārthātparihīṇo bhaviṣyati, mahataś ca parārtharatnarāśeḥ parihīṇo	sva arTAt parihINaH Bavizyati, mahataH ca para arTa ratna rASeH parihINaH 
   bhaviṣyati, yaduta sarvajñatāmahārtharatnākarātparihīṇatvāditi / kā punaḥ	Bavizyati, yat uta sarvajQa tA mahA arTa ratna AkarAt parihINa tvAt iti / kA punar 
   subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā? yaduta śrāvakabhūmirvā	suBUte boDisattvasya antarA vyaDvani saMsIdanA? yat uta SrAvaka BUmiH vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ	pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte paNxita jAtIyaH
   sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā	sArTavAhaH sAmudrikAm nAvam su badDAm banDayitvA svA kowita Am A kowayitvA
   suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake 'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā samaṃ	su parikarma kRtAm kRtvA udake avatArya BANxam Aropya pUrNAm kRtvA samam
   yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,	yojayitvA yuktena vAtena aBipretAm diSam anupUrveNa gacCet ,
   tatastadyānamiti, veditavyametatsubhūte neyaṃ naurudake saṃsatsyati /	tatas tad yAnam iti, veditavyam etat suBUte na iyam nOH udake saMsatsyati /
   gamiṣyatīyaṃ naustaṃ pradeśaṃ yatrānayā gantavyam / mahālābhena cāyaṃ	gamizyati iyam nOH tam pradeSam yatra anayA gantavyam / mahA lABena ca ayam
   sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti / evameva subhūte yasya	sArTavAhaH saMyokzyate yat uta lOkikEH ratnEH iti / evam eva suBUte yasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya asti SradDA asti kzAntiH asti ruci CandaH
   asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ astyadhimuktiḥ, astyādhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ,	asti vIryam, asti apramAdaH asti aDimuktiH, asti ADyASayaH, asti tyAgaH,
   asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema,	asti gOravam, asti prItiH asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti prema,
   astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, sa ca	asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum, sa ca
   prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,	prajQApAramitayA parigRhItaH upAya kOSalyena ca avirahitaH Bavati,
   veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani	veditavyam etat suBUte na ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH antarA vyaDvani
   saṃsatsyati, na vyavasādamāpatsyate, sthāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	saMsatsyati, na vyavasAdam Apatsyate, sTAsyati ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati  	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / tat kasya hetoH? evam hi etat suBUte Bavati  
   yato 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā, asti kṣāntiḥ, asti	yatas asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya asti SradDA, asti kzAntiH, asti
   ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ	ruciH, asti CandaH, asti vIryam, asti apramAdaH, asti aDimuktiH
   astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti (Vaidya 145) asti prītiḥ,	asti aDyASayaH, asti tyAgaH, asti gOravam, asti (VEdyaH 145) asti prItiH,
   asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ	asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti prema, asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / ete ca asya DarmAH prajQApAramitayA
   parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na	parigRhItAH upAya kOSalyena ca avirahitA na SrAvaka BUmim na
   pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante / api tu yena sarvajñatā, tenaite	pratyekabudDa BUmim vA pratipatsyante / api tu yena sarvajQa tA, tena ete
   dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato 'syā anuttarāyāḥ	DarmAH aBimuKAH saMprasTitAH tatas asyAH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte	samyaksaMboDeH aBisaMboDAya Bavizyanti iti / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā	kaScid eva puruzaH jIrNaH vRdDaH mahallakaH sa viMSati varza SatikaH jAtyA
   bhavet, tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā	Bavet, tasya kaScid eva SarIre vyADiH utpadyeta vA Atatas vA pittataH vA
   śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo	SlezmataH vA saMnipAtataH vA / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu sa puruzaH 
   'parigṛhīto mañcāduttiṣṭhet? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha	aparigRhItaH maQcAt uttizWet? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha
     sacetpunaḥ subhūte sa puruṣo mañcāduttiṣṭhet, atha ca punarna pratibalo	 saced punar suBUte sa puruzaH maQcAt uttizWet, aTa ca punar na pratibalaH 
   'rdhakrośāntaram api prakramitum / sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito	arDa kroSa antaram api prakramitum / sa tayA jarayA tena ca vyADinA kzapitaH 
   yady api mañcāduttiṣṭhet, tathāpi punarapratibalaḥ sa puruṣaḥ prakramaṇāya	yadi api maQcAt uttizWet, taTA api punar apratibalaH sa puruzaH prakramaNAya
   / evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā, asti kṣāntiḥ, asti	/ evam eva suBUte kiMca api boDisattvasya asti SradDA, asti kzAntiH, asti
   ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ,	ruciH, asti CandaH, asti vIryam, asti apramAdaH, asti aDimuktiH,
   astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam,	asti aDyASayaH, asti tyAgaH, asti gOravam, asti prItiH, asti prAmodyam,
   asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /	asti prema, asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum /
   sa ca prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,	sa ca prajQApAramitayA aparigRhItaH upAya kOSalyena ca virahitaH Bavati,
   kiṃcāpi saṃprasthito 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / atha ca	kiMca api saMprasTitaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / aTa ca
   punaḥ subhūte evaṃ veditavyam   ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani	punar suBUte evam veditavyam  ayam boDisattvaH antarA vyaDvani
   saṃsatsyati, vyavasādamāpatsyate, yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā	saMsatsyati, vyavasAdam Apatsyate, yat uta SrAvaka BUmO vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyatīti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma	pratyekabudDa BUmO vA sTAsyati iti / tat kasya hetoH? yaTA api nAma
   prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītatvādupāyakauśalyena ca virahitatvāt /	prajQApAramitayA aparigRhIta tvAt upAya kOSalyena ca virahita tvAt /
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte saH eva puruzaH jIrNaH vRdDaH mahallakaH
   saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet, tasya śarīre kaścideva vyādhirūtpadyeta	sa viMSati varza SatikaH jAtyA Bavet, tasya SarIre kaScid eva vyADiru utpadyeta
   vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā, sa ca mañcāduttiṣṭhet /	vAtatas vA pittataH vA SlezmataH vA saMnipAtataH vA, sa ca maQcAt uttizWet /
   tamenaṃ dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ	tam enam dvO balavantO puruzO vAma dakziNAByAm pArSvAByAm
   svadhyālambitamadhyālambya suparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhya evaṃ vadetām   gaccha	su aDyA Alambitam aDyAlambya su parigRhItam parigRhya evam vadetAm  gacCa
   tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi yāvaccākāṅkṣasi gantum,	tvam BoH puruza yena AkAFkzasi yAvat ca AkAFkzasi gantum,
   anuparigṛhītastvamāvābhyām, na tavāntarāmārge patanabhayaṃ bhaviṣyati,	anuparigRhItaH tvam AvAByAm, na tava antara amArge patana Bayam Bavizyati,
   yāvanna tvaṃ tadadhiṣṭhānamanuprāpto bhaviṣyasi, yatra tvayā gantavyamiti	yAvat na tvam tat aDizWAnam anuprAptaH Bavizyasi, yatra tvayA gantavyam iti
   / evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā, asti	/ evam eva suBUte yasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya asti SradDA, asti
   kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ,	kzAntiH, asti ruciH asti CandaH, asti vIryam, asti apramAdaH,
   astyadhimuktiḥ, astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ,	asti aDimuktiH, asti aDyASayaH, asti tyAgaH, asti gOravam, asti prItiH,
   asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ	asti prAma udyam, asti prasAdaH, asti prema asti anikzipta Dura tA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, sa ca prajñāpāramitayā anuparigṛhīto	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum, sa ca prajQApAramitayA anuparigRhItaH 
   bhavati, upāyakauśalyasamanvāgataś ca bhavati / veditavyametatsubhūte	Bavati, upAya kOSalya samanvAgataH ca Bavati / veditavyam etat suBUte
   nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati, na	na ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH antarA vyaDvani saMsatsyati, na
   vyavasādamāpatsyate, pratibalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo	vyavasAdam Apatsyate, pratibalaH ayam boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvastatsthānamanuprāptuṃ yadutānuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhisthānamiti //	mahAsattvaH tat sTAnam anuprAptum yat uta anuttaram samyaksaMboDi sTAnam iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmaupamyaparivarto nāma caturdaśaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm Opamya parivartaH nAma caturdaSaH //
   (Vaidya 146)	(VEdyaH 146)
   ASP_15: devaparivartaḥ pañcadaśaḥ /	ASP_15: deva parivartaH paQcadaSaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   ādikarmikeṇa bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  AdikarmikeNa Bagavan
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena kaTam prajQApAramitAyAm sTAtavyam kaTam
   śikṣitavyam? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   iha subhūte	Sikzitavyam? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  iha suBUte
   ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena	Adi karmikeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitu kAmena
   kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni / yānyenaṃ	kalyANa mitrANi sevitavyAni BaktavyAni paryupAsitavyAni / yAni enam
   prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti, yāni cāsmai prajñāpāramitāyā	prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyanti anuSAsizyanti, yAni ca asmE prajQApAramitAyAH 
   arthamupadekṣyanti, tānyeva cāsya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	arTam upadekzyanti, tAni eva ca asya suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni / evaṃ cāsmai prajñāpāramitāyā	kalyANa mitrANi veditavyAni / evam ca asmE prajQApAramitAyAH 
   arthamupadekṣyanti   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva,	arTam upadekzyanti  ehi tvam kula putra dAna pAramitAyAm yogam Apadya sva,
   evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ	evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva / yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra dānaṃ dadāsi,	prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apadyasva / yat yat eva tvam kula putra dAnam dadAsi,
   tatsarvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya / mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra	tat sarvam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmaya / mA ca tvam kula putra
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ, evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim rUpataH parAmRkzaH, evam mA vedanAtas mA saMjQAtaH 
   mā saṃskārebhyaḥ / mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ	mA saMskAreByaH / mA ca tvam kula putra anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāmṛṣṭā hi kulaputra sarvajñatā	vijQAnataH parAmRkzaH / tat kasya hetoH? aparAmRzwA hi kula putra sarvajQa tA
   / evaṃ yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra śīlaṃ	/ evam yat yat eva tvam kula putra SIlam
   rakṣasi..........peyālaṃ..............yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntyā	rakzasi..........peyAlaM..............yat yat eva tvam kula putra kzAntyA
   saṃpādayasi, yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra vīryamārabhase, yadyadeva tvaṃ	saMpAdayasi, yat yat eva tvam kula putra vIryam AraBase, yat yat eva tvam
   kulaputra dhyānaṃ samāpadyase, yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāyāṃ	kula putra DyAnam samApadyase, yat yat eva tvam kula putra prajQAyAm
   parijayaṃ karoṣi, tatsarvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya / mā ca	parijayam karozi, tat sarvam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmaya / mA ca
   tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ / evaṃ mā	tvam kula putra anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim rUpataH parAmRkzaH / evam mA
   vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ / mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ	vedanAtas mA saMjQAtaH mA saMskAreByaH / mA ca tvam kula putra anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāmṛṣṭā hi	samyaksaMboDim vijQAnataH parAmRkzaH / tat kasya hetoH? aparAmRzwAH hi
   kulaputra sarvajñatā / mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra śrāvakabhūmau vā	kula putra sarvajQa tA / mA ca tvam kula putra SrAvaka BUmO vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā spṛhāṃ kārṣīriti / evaṃ hi subhūte ādikarmiko	pratyekabudDa BUmO vA spRhAm kArzIH iti / evam hi suBUte AdikarmikaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrveṇa kalyāṇamitraiḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anupUrveNa kalyANa mitrEH
   prajñāpāramitāyāmavatārayitavyaḥ //	prajQApAramitAyAm avatArayitavyaH //
   subhūtirāha   duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ, ye	suBUtiH Aha  duzkara kArakAH Bagavan boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH, ye
   'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ / evaṃrūpaṃ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum saMprasTitAH / evaMrUpam
   dānamāgamya, evaṃrūpaṃ śīlam, evaṃrūpāṃ kṣāntim, evaṃrūpaṃ vīryam,	dAnam Agamya, evaMrUpam SIlam, evaMrUpAm kzAntim, evaMrUpam vIryam,
   evaṃrūpaṃ dhyānam, evaṃrūpāṃ prajñāmāgamya svādhīne 'pi parinirvāṇe	evaMrUpam DyAnam, evaMrUpAm prajQAm Agamya svADIne api parinirvANe
   necchanti parinirvātum / api tu paramaduḥkhitaṃ sattvadhātumabhisamīkṣya	na icCanti parinirvAtum / api tu parama duHKitam sattva DAtum aBisamIkzya
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ saṃsārānnotrasyanti / evamukte	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmAH saMsArAn na utrasyanti / evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam etat /	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam etat /
   duṣkarakārakāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye lokahitāya	duzkara kArakAH suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye loka hitAya
   saṃprasthitāḥ, lokasukhāya lokānukampāyai saṃprasthitāḥ, lokasya trāṇaṃ	saMprasTitAH, loka suKAya loka anukampAyE saMprasTitAH, lokasya trANam
   bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya layanaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ,	BavizyAmaH, lokasya SaraNam BavizyAmaH, lokasya layanam BavizyAmaH,
   lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya dvīpāṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasyālokā	lokasya parAyaNam BavizyAmaH, lokasya dvIpAm BavizyAmaH, lokasya AlokA
   bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya pariṇāyakā bhaviṣyāma, anuttarāṃ	BavizyAmaH, lokasya pariNAyakA BavizyAma, anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya lokasya gatirbhaviṣyāmaḥ,	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya lokasya gatiH BavizyAmaH,
   ityevaṃrūpamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vīryamārabhante / kathaṃ ca	iti evaMrUpam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO vIryam AraBante / kaTam ca
   subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ	suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
   santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti? yāni tāni subhūte saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni	santaH lokasya trANam Bavanti? yAni tAni suBUte saMsAra avacarANi duHKAni
   lokasya, tata enaṃ (Vaidya 147) trāyante, teṣāṃ duḥkhānāṃ prahāṇāya	lokasya, tatas enam (VEdyaH 147) trAyante, tezAm duHKAnAm prahANAya
   vyāyacchante, vīryamārabhante / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	vyAyacCante, vIryam AraBante / evam hi suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti /	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya trANam Bavanti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti? ye subhūte	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDA santaH lokasya SaraNam Bavanti? ye suBUte
   sattvā jātidharmiṇo jarādharmiṇo vyādhidharmiṇo maraṇadharmiṇaḥ	sattvAH jAti DarmiNaH jarA DarmiNaH vyADi DarmiNaH maraNa DarmiNaH
   śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmiṇaḥ sattvāḥ tān sarvān	Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsa DarmiNaH sattvAH tAn sarvAn
   jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocayanti	jAti jarA vyADi maraNa Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAseByaH parimocayanti
   / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	/ evam hi suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti / kathaṃ ca	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya SaraNam Bavanti / kaTam ca
   subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ	suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
   santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti? yatsubhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ	santaH lokasya layanam Bavanti? yat suBUte taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo 'śleṣāya dharmaṃ deśayanti / evaṃ hi subhūte	samyaksaMbudDAH sattveByaH aSlezAya Darmam deSayanti / evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH 
   lokasya layanaṃ bhavanati / subhūtirāha   kathaṃ bhagavan aśleṣo bhavati?	lokasya layanam Bavanati / suBUtiH Aha  kaTam Bagavan aSlezaH Bavati?
   bhagavānāha   yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, sa rūpasyāśleṣaḥ / yo	BagavAn Aha  yaH suBUte rUpasya asaMbanDaH, sa rUpasya ASlezaH / yaH 
   rūpasyāśleṣaḥ, sa rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ / yo rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, sa	rUpasya ASlezaH, sa rUpasya asaMbanDaH / yaH rUpasya asaMbanDaH, sa
   rūpasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ / yo rūpasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ, sa rūpasyāśleṣaḥ /	rUpasya anutpAdaH aniroDaH / yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH aniroDaH, sa rUpasya ASlezaH /
   yo rūpasyāśleṣaḥ, ayaṃ rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, ayaṃ rūpasyāśleṣaḥ / evaṃ	yaH rUpasya ASlezaH, ayam rUpasya asaMbanDaH, ayam rUpasya ASlezaH / evam
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / yaḥ subhūte vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, sa	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / yaH suBUte vijQAnasya asaMbanDaH, sa
   vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ / yo vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ, sa vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ / yo	vijQAnasya ASlezaH / yaH vijQAnasya ASlezaH, sa vijQAnasya asaMbanDaH / yaH 
   vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, sa vijñānasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ / yo	vijQAnasya asaMbanDaH, sa vijQAnasya anutpAdaH aniroDaH / yaH 
   vijñānasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ, sa vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ / yo vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ	vijQAnasya anutpAdaH aniroDaH, sa vijQAnasya ASlezaH / yaH vijQAnasya ASlezaH
   ayaṃ vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, ayaṃ vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ / evaṃ hi subhūte	ayam vijQAnasya asaMbanDaH, ayam vijQAnasya ASlezaH / evam hi suBUte
   sarvadharmā asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃbaddhā iti jñānadarśanādaśleṣo bhavati / evaṃ	sarva DarmAH asaMSlizwAH asaMbadDAH iti jQAna darSa nAt aSlezaH Bavati / evam
   hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ	hi suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
   santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti / kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	santaH lokasya layanam Bavanti / kaTam ca suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti?	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya parAyaNam Bavanti?
   yatsubhūte rūpasya pāraṃ na tadrūpam / yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā rūpam	yat suBUte rUpasya pAram na tad rUpam / yaTA ca suBUte pAram taTA rUpam
   / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / yatsubhūte vijñānasya pāraṃ na	/ evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / yat suBUte vijQAnasya pAram na
   tadvijñānam / yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā vijñānam / yathā ca subhūte	tad vijQAnam / yaTA ca suBUte pAram taTA vijQAnam / yaTA ca suBUte
   rūpam, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ /	rUpam, evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam pAram taTA sarva DarmAH /
   subhūtirāha   yadi bhagavan yathā rūpam, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ	suBUtiH Aha  yadi Bagavan yaTA rUpam, evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   vijñānaṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ, nanu bhagavan	vijQAnam pAram taTA sarva DarmAH, nanu Bagavan
   bodhisattvairmahāsattvairabhisaṃbuddhā evaṃ bhavanti sarvadharmāḥ /	boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH aBisaMbudDAH evam Bavanti sarva DarmAH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyatra bhagavan kaścidvikalpaḥ / bhagavānāha  	tat kasya hetoH? na hi atra Bagavan kaScid vikalpaH / BagavAn Aha  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / yattatpāraṃ na tatra kaścidvikalpaḥ /	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / yat tat pAram na tatra kaScid vikalpaH /
   avikalpatvātsubhūte bodhisattvairmahāsatvairabhisaṃbuddhā eva bhavanti	avikalpa tvAt suBUte boDisattvEH mahAsatvEH aBisaMbudDAH eva Bavanti
   sarvadharmāḥ / idam api subhūte paramaduṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	sarva DarmAH / idam api suBUte parama duzkaram boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānām, ya evaṃ ca sarvadharmānupanidhyāyanti, na ca	mahAsattvAnAm, yaH evam ca sarva DarmAnupaniDyAyanti, na ca
   sākṣātkurvanti, na cāvalīyante   evamasmābhirete dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ,	sAkzAtkurvanti, na ca avalIyante  evam asmABiH ete DarmAH aBisaMbodDavyAH,
   evaṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya enān dharmān deśayiṣyāmaḥ	evam ca anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya enAn DarmAn deSayizyAmaH
   prakāśayiṣyāma ityupanidhyāyanti / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	prakASayizyAmaH iti upaniDyAyanti / evam hi suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti /	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya parAyaNam Bavanti /
   kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	kaTam ca suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ (Vaidya 148) santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti?	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH (VEdyaH 148) santaH lokasya dvIpAH Bavanti?
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ye pradeśā udakaparicchinnā bhavanti nadīṣu vā	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte ye pradeSAH udaka paricCinnAH Bavanti nadIzu vA
   mahodadhiṣu vā, te ucyante dvīpā iti / evameva subhūte	mahodaDizu vA, te ucyante dvIpAH iti / evam eva suBUte
   pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnaṃ rūpam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / evameva	pUrva anta apara anta paricCinnam rUpam / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / evam eva
   subhūte pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnaṃ vijñānam / etena subhūte paricchedena	suBUte pUrva anta apara anta paricCinnam vijQAnam / etena suBUte paricCedena
   sarvadharmāḥ pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnāḥ / yaś ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ	sarva DarmAH pUrva anta apara anta paricCinnAH / yaH ca suBUte sarva DarmANAm
   paricchedaḥ, etacchāntam, etatpraṇītam, etatparinirvāṇam, etadyathāvat,	paricCedaH, etat SAntam, etat praNItam, etat parinirvANam, etat yaTAvat ,
   etadaviparītam / evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	etat aviparItam / evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti / kathaṃ ca	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya dvIpAH Bavanti / kaTam ca
   subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā	suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDA
   santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	santaH lokasya AlokAH Bavanti? iha suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH 
   dīrgharātramavidyāṇḍakośapaṭalaparyavanaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ tamobhibhūtānāṃ	dIrGarAtram avidyA aNxa koSa pawala paryavanadDAnAm sattvAnAm tamoBi BUtAnAm
   prajñayā avabhāsayantaḥ sarvājñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhunvanti / evaṃ khalu	prajQayA avaBAsayantaH sarva ajQAna tamonDakAram viDunvanti / evam Kalu
   subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ	suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
   santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti / kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	santaH lokasya AlokAH Bavanti / kaTam ca suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti?	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya pariNAyakAH Bavanti?
   iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ	iha suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
   santo rūpasya prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ deśayanti / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ	santaH rUpasya prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam deSayanti / evam vedanAyAH
   saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / vijñānasya prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ	saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / vijQAnasya prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam
   deśayanti / pṛthagjanadharmāṇām api prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ	deSayanti / pRTagjana DarmANAm api prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam
   deśayanti / śrāvakadharmāṇām api prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ	deSayanti / SrAvaka DarmANAm api prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam
   deśayanti / pratyekabuddhadharmāṇām api prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ	deSayanti / pratyekabudDa DarmANAm api prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam
   deśayanti / bodhisattvadharmāṇām api prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ	deSayanti / boDisattva DarmANAm api prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam
   deśayanti / buddhadharmāṇām api prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ deśayanti	deSayanti / budDa DarmANAm api prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam deSayanti
   / sarvadharmāṇām api prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ deśayanti / evaṃ	/ sarva DarmANAm api prakRti anutpAda aniroDAya Darmam deSayanti / evam
   khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	Kalu suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti / kathaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya pariNAyakAH Bavanti / kaTam
   ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ	ca suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
   santo lokasya gatirbhagavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	santaH lokasya gatiH Bagavanti? iha suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ākāśagatikaṃ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya AkASa gatikam
   rupamiti dharmaṃ deśayanti / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / ākāśagatikaṃ	rupam iti Darmam deSayanti / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / AkASa gatikam
   vijñānamiti dharmaṃ deśayanti / evameva subhūte sarvadharmā ākāśagatikā	vijQAnam iti Darmam deSayanti / evam eva suBUte sarva DarmA AkASa gatikA
   anāgatikā agatikā ākāśasamāḥ / yathā ākāśam	anAgatikAH agatikAH AkASa samAH / yaTA AkASam
   anāgatamagatamakṛtamavikṛtamanabhisaṃskṛtamasthitamasaṃsthitamavyavasthitamanutpannamaniruddham,	anAgatamagatam akRtam avikRtam anaBisaMskRtam asTitam asaMsTitam avyavasTitam anutpannam anirudDam,
   evameva subhūte sarvadharmā anāgatā āgatā ākṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā	evam eva suBUte sarva DarmAH anAgatAH AgatA AkRtA avikRtA anaBisaMskRtA
   asthitā asaṃsthitā avyavasthitā anutpannā aniruddhā	asTitA asaMsTitA avyavasTitA anutpannA anirudDA
   ākāśakalpatvādavikalpāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? yā subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā, na	AkASa kalpa tvAt avikalpAH / tat kasya hetoH? yA suBUte rUpasya SUnyatA, na
   sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām / yā	sA AgacCati vA gacCati vA / evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm / yA
   subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā, na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā / evameva	suBUte vijQAnasya SUnyatA, na sA AgacCati vA gacCati vA / evam eva
   subhūte yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā, na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /	suBUte yA sarva DarmANAm SUnyatA, na sA AgacCati vA gacCati vA /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? śūnyatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na	tat kasya hetoH? SUnyatA gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na
   vyativartante / ānimittagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na	vyativartante / Animitta gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na
   vyativartante / apraṇihitagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na	vyativartante / apraNihita gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na
   vyativartante / anabhisaṃskāragatikā hi subhūte (Vaidya 149) sarvadharmāḥ	vyativartante / anaBisaMskAra gatikAH hi suBUte (VEdyaH 149) sarva DarmAH
   / te tāṃ gatiṃ na vyativartante / anutpādagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ /	/ te tAm gatim na vyativartante / anutpAda gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH /
   te tāṃ gatiṃ na vyativartante / ajātigatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te	te tAm gatim na vyativartante / ajAti gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te
   tāṃ gatiṃ na vyativartante / abhāvagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ	tAm gatim na vyativartante / aBAva gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm

   gatiṃ na vyativartante / ātmagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ	gatim na vyativartante / Atma gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim
   na vyativartante / aparyantagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ	na vyativartante / aparyanta gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim
   na vyativartante / śāntagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na	na vyativartante / SAnta gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na

   na vyativartante / anāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na	na vyativartante / anAgatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na
   vyativartante / agatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na	vyativartante / agatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na

   vyativartante / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / vijñānagatikā hi subhūte	vyativartante / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAna gatikA hi suBUte
   sarvadharmāḥ / te tāṃ gatiṃ na vyativartante /	sarva DarmAH / te tAm gatim na vyativartante /
   arhatpratyekabuddhatvānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhigatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ	arhat pratyekabudDa tva anuttara samyaksaMboDi gatikAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH
   / te tāṃ gatiṃ na vyativartante / ataś ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	/ te tAm gatim na vyativartante / atas ca boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santa ākāśagatikāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH AkASa gatikAH sarva DarmAH iti Darmam
   deśayanti / evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	deSayanti / evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhavanti //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH lokasya gatiH Bavanti //
   subhūtirāha   ke bhagavan imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti?	suBUtiH Aha  ke Bagavan imAm gamBIrAm prajQApAramitAm AjQAsyanti?
   bhagavānāha   ye subhūte caritāvino bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti	BagavAn Aha  ye suBUte caritAvinaH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti
   paurvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike	pOrvakANAm taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm antike
   paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ, te subhūte bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	paripakva kuSala mUlAH, te suBUte boDisattvAH veditavyAH ye imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti / subhūtirāha   kiṃsvabhāvā bhagavaṃste	prajQApAramitAm AjQAsyanti / suBUtiH Aha  kiMsvaBAvAH Bagavan= te
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti, ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti, ye imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti? bhagavānāha   vainayikaviviktasvabhāvaste	prajQApAramitAm AjQAsyanti? BagavAn Aha  vEnayika vivikta svaBAvaH te
   subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti, yaH imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti //	prajQApAramitAm AjQAsyanti //
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ bhagavan evaṃgatikā eva te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	suBUtiH Aha  kim Bagavan evaMgatikAH eva te boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   bhaviṣyanti? enāmeva gatimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāmenāmeva gatiṃ	Bavizyanti? enAm eva gatim aBisaMbuDya sattvAnAm enAm eva gatim
   deśayiṣyanti? evaṃ te sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti? evamukte	deSayizyanti? evam te sattvAnAm gatiH Bavizyanti? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam etat /	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam etat /
   evaṃgatikā eva te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti / enāmeva	evaMgatikAH eva te suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH Bavizyanti / enAm eva
   gatimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānām enāmeva gatiṃ deśayiṣyanti / evaṃ te	gatim aBisaMbuDya sattvAnAm enAm eva gatim deSayizyanti / evam te
   sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	sattvAnAm gatiH Bavizyanti / evam hi suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH santaH aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti //	sattvAnAm gatiH Bavizyanti //
   subhūtirāha   duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ	suBUtiH Aha  duzkara kArakaH Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yena ayam
   saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti /	saMnAhaH saMnadDaH aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmi iti /
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam
   etat / duṣkarakārakaḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ	etat / duzkara kArakaH sa suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yena ayam saMnAhaH
   saṃnaddhaḥ   aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti / sa khalu	saMnadDaH  aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmi iti / sa Kalu
   punarayaṃ subhūte (Vaidya 150) saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	punar ayam suBUte (VEdyaH 150) saMnAhaH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya na rūpasaṃbaddho na rūpasyārthāya saṃbaddhaḥ /	mahA saMnAha saMnadDasya na rUpa saMbadDaH na rUpasya arTAya saMbadDaH /
   evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / na vijñānasaṃbaddho na vijñānasyārthāya	evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / na vijQAna saMbadDaH na vijQAnasya arTAya
   saṃbaddhaḥ / na śrāvakabhūmisaṃbaddho na śrāvakabhūmerarthāya saṃbaddhaḥ /	saMbadDaH / na SrAvaka BUmi saMbadDaH na SrAvaka BUmeH arTAya saMbadDaH /
   na pratyekabuddhabhūmisaṃbaddho na pratyekabuddhabhūmerarthāya saṃbaddhaḥ	na pratyekabudDa BUmi saMbadDaH na pratyekabudDa BUmeH arTAya saMbadDaH
   / nāpi buddhabhūmisaṃbaddho nāpi buddhabhūmerarthāya saṃbaddhaḥ / tatkasya	/ na api budDa BUmi saMbadDaH na api budDa BUmeH arTAya saMbadDaH / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? sarvadharmāsaṃnaddho batāyaṃ subhūte saṃnāho bodhisattvasya	hetoH? sarva Darma asaMnadDaH bata ayam suBUte saMnAhaH boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya //	mahAsattvasya mahA saMnAha saMnadDasya //
   subhūtirāha   asya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ	suBUtiH Aha  asya Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evam
   mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrārāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi	mahA saMnAha saMnadDasya evam gamBIra ArAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm carataH trINi
   sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni / katamāni trīṇi? yaduta śrāvakabhūmirvā	sTAnAni na pratikAFkzitavyAni / katamAni trINi? yat uta SrAvaka BUmiH vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā buddhabhūmirvā / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA budDa BUmiH vA / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam

     asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ	 asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evaMmahA saMnAha saMnadDasya evam
   gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni	gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm carataH trINi sTAnAni na pratikAFkzitavyAni

   buddhabhūmirveti? asthānaṃ subhūte hyetadanavakāśo 'sya bodhisattvasya	budDa BUmiH veti? asTAnam suBUte hi etat anavakASaH asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	mahAsattvasya evaMmahA saMnAha saMnadDasya evam gamBIrAyAm

   buddhabhūmirevāsya pratikāṅkṣitavyā yenāyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ	budDa BUmiH eva asya pratikAFkzitavyAH yena ayam sarva sattvAnAm kRtaSas 
   saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ //	saMnAhaH saMnadDaH //
   subhūtirāha   gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / sā na kenacidbhāvayitavyā	suBUtiH Aha  gamBIrA Bagavan prajQApAramitA / sA na kenacid BAvayitavyA
   / tāṃ hi na kaścidbhāvitavān, nāpi kaścidbhāvayati, nāpi	/ tAm hi na kaScid BAvitavAn , na api kaScid BAvayati, na api
   kaścidbhāvayiṣyati, nāpiṃ kiṃcidbhāvayitavyam, na kvacidbhāvayitavyam /	kaScid BAvayizyati, na apim kiMcid BAvayitavyam, na kvacid BAvayitavyam /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ	tat kasya hetoH? na hi Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm na kaScid DarmaH
   pariniṣpannaḥ / ākāśabhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /	parinizpannaH / AkASa BAvanA ezA Bagavan yat uta prajQApAramitA BAvanA /

   prajñāpāramitābhāvanā //	prajQApAramitA BAvanA //
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam
   etat / ato hi subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vihāreṇa viharan	etat / atas hi suBUte gamBIrAyAH prajQApAramitAyAH vihAreNa viharan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH upaparIkzitavyaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ   kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	samyaksaMboDeH  kaccit suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH asyAm gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nābhiniveśaṃ karoti / kaccitparabhaṇitāni paramantritāni	prajQApAramitAyAm na aBiniveSam karoti / kaccit para BaNitAni para mantritAni
   nābhiniviśate / kaccidbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati	na aBiniviSate / kaccit boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na parasya SradDayA gacCati
   / kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	/ kaccit suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH asyAm gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na	BAzyamANAyAm na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipRzWIBavati na utrasyati na
   saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati na	saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate, na kAFkzati na vicikitsati na
