   śravaṇaṃ ca / veditavyamidaṃ subhūte pūrvānte 'pyanena prajñāpāramitā	SravaNam ca / veditavyam idam suBUte pUrva ante api anena prajQApAramitA
   paripṛṣṭā / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	paripRzwAH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi suBUte gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate //	BAzyamANAyAm na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate //
   (Vaidya 151) subhūtirāha   yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ	(VEdyaH 151) suBUtiH Aha  yaH Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH gamBIrAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na	prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na
   saṃtrāsamāpadyate, katamena bhagavan ākāreṇa tena prajñāpāramitā	saMtrAsam Apadyate, katamena Bagavan AkAreNa tena prajQApAramitA
   vyavacāritā bhavati? bhagavānāha   sarvajñatānimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena	vyavacAritA Bavati? BagavAn Aha  sarvajQa tA nimnayA suBUte saMtatyA tena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati /	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA vyavacAritA Bavati /
   subhūtirāha   kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā bhavati?	suBUtiH Aha  kaTam Bagavan sarvajQa tA nimnA saMtatiH vyavacAritA Bavati?
   bhagavānāha   ākāśanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā ākāśapravaṇayā	BagavAn Aha  AkASa nimnayA suBUte saMtatyA AkASa pravaNayA
   ākāśaprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā	AkASa prAgBArayA suBUte saMtatyA sarvajQa tA nimnA saMtatiH vyavacAritA
   bhavati / yā khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvajñatānimnayā saṃtatyā vyavacāraṇā,	Bavati / yA Kalu punar suBUte sarvajQa tA nimnayA saMtatyA vyavacAraNA,
   iyaṃ sā subhūte vyavacāraṇā / tatkasya hetoḥ? aprameyā hi subhūte	iyam sA suBUte vyavacAraNAH / tat kasya hetoH? aprameyA hi suBUte
   sarvajñatā, apramāṇā hi subhūte sarvajñatā / yatsubhūte	sarvajQa tA, apramANA hi suBUte sarvajQa tA / yat suBUte
   aprameyamapramāṇam, na tadrūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na	aprameyam apramANam, na tad rUpam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na
   vijñānaṃ na prāptirnābhisamayo nādhigamo na mārgo na mārgaphalaṃ na jñānaṃ	vijQAnam na prAptiH na aBisamayaH na aDigamaH na mArgaH na mArga Palam na jQAnam
   na vijñānaṃ notpattirna vināśo notpādo na vyayo na nirodho na bhāvanā na	na vijQAnam na utpattiH na vinASaH na utpAdaH na vyayaH na niroDaH na BAvanA na
   vibhāvanā, nāpi kenacitkṛtaṃ nāpi kutaścidāgataṃ nāpi kvacid gacchati nāpi	viBAvanA, na api kenacid kRtam na api kutaScid Agatam na api kvacid gacCati na api
   kvaciddeśe nāpi kvacitpradeśe sthitam, api tu aprameyapramāṇamityevaṃ	kvacid deSe na api kvacid pradeSe sTitam, api tu aprameya pramANam iti evam
   saṃkhyāṃ gacchati / ākāśāprameyatayā sarvajñatāprameyatā / yā ca	saMKyAm gacCati / AkASa aprameya tayA sarvajQa tA prameya tA / yA ca
   aprameyatā, na sā śakyā kenacidabhisaṃboddhum / na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na	aprameya tA, na sA SakyA kenacid aBisaMbodDum / na rUpeNa na vedanayA na
   saṃjñayā na saṃskārairna vijñānena na dānapāramitayā na śīlapāramitayā na	saMjQayA na saMskArEH na vijQAnena na dAna pAramitayA na SIla pAramitayA na
   kṣāntipāramitayā na vīryapāramitayā na dhyānapāramitayā na	kzAnti pAramitayA na vIrya pAramitayA na DyAna pAramitayA na
   prajñāpāramitayā śakyā abhisaṃboddhum / tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpameva hi	prajQApAramitayA SakyAH aBisaMbodDum / tat kasya hetoH? rUpam eva hi
   subhūte sarvajñatā / evaṃ vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva / vijñānameva	suBUte sarvajQa tA / evam vedanA eva saMjQA eva saMskArAH eva / vijQAnam eva
   hi subhūte sarvajñatā / dānapāramitaiva hi subhūte sarvajñatā /	hi suBUte sarvajQa tA / dAna pAramitA eva hi suBUte sarvajQa tA /
   śīlapāramitaiva kṣāntipāramitaiva vīryapāramitaiva dhyānapāramitaiva	SIla pAramitA eva kzAnti pAramitA eva vIrya pAramitA eva DyAna pAramitA eva
   prajñāpāramitaiva hi subhūte sarvajñatā //	prajQApAramitA eva hi suBUte sarvajQa tA //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputrairbrahmāpi	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH sArDam kAma avacarEH deva putrEH brahmA api
   sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarairdevaputrairyena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /	sahApatiH sArDam rUpAvacarEH deva putrEH yena BagavAn= tena upasaMkrAntaH /
   upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ	upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya Bagavantam tris 
   pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthau / ekānte sthitaś ca śakro devendraḥ	pradakziNIkRtya ekAnte tasTO / ekAnte sTitaH ca SakraH deva indraH
   kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ	kAma avacarEH deva putrEH sArDam brahmA api sahApatiH rUpAvacarEH deva putrEH
   sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /	sArDam Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrA Bagavan prajQApAramitA /
   duravagāhā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / durdṛśā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /	duravagAhAH Bagavan prajQApAramitA / durdRSA Bagavan prajQApAramitA /
   duranubodhā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā / idamapyarthavaśaṃ	duranuboDA Bagavan prajQApAramitA / idam api arTa vaSam
   saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ	saMpaSyataH taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDa mAtrasya boDimaNxe nizaNNasya alpa utsuka tAyAm
   cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām //	cittam avanatam na Darma deSanAyAm //
   evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ kāmāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān	evam ukte BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram kAma avacarAn ca deva putrAn
   brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma  	brahmANam ca sahApatim rUpAvacarAn ca deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  
   evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat / gambhīrā bateyaṃ devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā	evam etat deva putrAH, evam etat / gamBIrAH bata iyam deva putrAH prajQApAramitA
   / duravagohayaṃ devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā / durdṛśeyaṃ devaputrāḥ	/ duravagohayam deva putrAH prajQApAramitA / durdRSeyam deva putrAH
   prajñāpāramitā / duranubodheyaṃ devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā /	prajQApAramitA / duranuboDeyam deva putrAH prajQApAramitA /
   idamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya (Vaidya	idam api arTa vaSam saMpaSyataH taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya (VEdya
   152) anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya	152) anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDa mAtrasya boDimaNxe nizaNNasya
   alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām   gambhīro batāyaṃ mayā	alpa utsuka tAyAm cittam avanatam na Darma deSanAyAm  gamBIraH bata ayam mayA
   dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti, yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbuddho na	DarmaH aBisaMbudDaH iti, yatra na kaScid aBisaMbudDaH na
   kaścidabhisaṃbhotsyate na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate / iyaṃ sā dharmasya	kaScid aBisaMBotsyate na kaScid aBisaMbuDyate / iyam sA Darmasya
   gambhīratā / ākāśagambhīratayā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ / ātmagambhīratayā	gamBIra tA / AkASa gamBIra tayA gamBIraH ayam DarmaH / Atma gamBIra tayA
   gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ / sarvadharmānāgamanatayā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ /	gamBIraH ayam DarmaH / sarva Darma anAgamana tayA gamBIraH ayam DarmaH /
   sarvadharmāgamanatayā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmo mayābhisaṃbuddha iti //	sarva Darma Agamana tayA gamBIraH ayam DarmaH mayA aBisaMbudDaH iti //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ kāmāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH kAmAvacarAH ca deva putrAH brahmA api sahApatiH
   rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan   āścaryaṃ bhagavan,	rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  AScaryam Bagavan ,
   adbhutaṃ sugata / sarvalokavipratyanīko 'yaṃ dharmo deśyate / anugrahāya	adButam sugataH / sarva loka vipratyanIkaH ayam DarmaH deSyate / anugrahAya
   ca bhagavan dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmo deśyate / udgrahe ca lokaścaratīti //	ca Bagavan DarmANAm ayam DarmaH deSyate / udgrahe ca lokaH carati iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ devaparivarto nāma pañcadaśaḥ //	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm devaparivartaH nAma paQcadaSaH //
   (Vaidya 153)	(VEdyaH 153)
   ASP_16: tathatāparivartaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ /	ASP_16: taTatA parivartaH zoxaSaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   sarvadharmānupalambho	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  sarva Darma anupalamBaH 
   batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate / nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ	bata ayam Bagavan DarmaH deSyate / na ayam Bagavan DarmaH
   kvacitpratihanyate / apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ	kvacid pratihanyate / apratihata lakzaNaH bata ayam Bagavan DarmaH
   ākāśasamatayā sarvapadānupalabdhitaḥ / apratimalakṣaṇo batāyāṃ bhagavan	AkASa sama tayA sarva pada anupalabDitaH / apratima lakzaNaH batAyAm Bagavan
   dharmo 'dvitīyatvāt / apratilakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo	DarmaH advitIya tvAt / apratilakzaNaH bata ayam Bagavan DarmaH 
   niṣpratyarthikatvāt / apado batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo 'nabhinirvṛttatvāt /	nizpratyarTika tvAt / apadaH bata ayam Bagavan DarmaH anaBinirvRtta tvAt /
   anutpādo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sarvopapatyanupapattitvāt / apatho	anutpAdaH bata ayam Bagavan DarmaH sarva upapati anupapatti tvAt / apaTaH 
   batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sarvapathānupalabdhitvāt //	bata ayam Bagavan DarmaH sarva paTa anupalabDi tvAt //
   atha khalu devānāmindro brahmā sahāpatiste ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca	aTa Kalu devAnAm indraH brahmA sahApatiH te ca kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca
   devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan   anujāto batāyaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ	deva putrAH Bagavantam etat avocan  anujAtaH bata ayam Bagavan BagavataH
   śrāvaka āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan yaṃ	SrAvakaH Arya suBUtiH sTaviraH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavan yam
   yameva ayamāryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro dharmaṃ deśayati, taṃ tameva dharmaṃ	yam eva ayam Arya suBUtiH sTaviraH Darmam deSayati, tam tam eva Darmam
   śūnyatāmārabhya deśayati //	SUnyatAm AraBya deSayati //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Sakram devAnAm indram brahmANam ca sahApatim
   tāṃś ca kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma  	tAn ca kAma avacarAn rUpAvacarAn ca deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  
   yaddevaputrā evaṃ vadatha   anujāto 'yaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatasyeti	yat deva putrAH evam vat aTa  anujAtaH ayam suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatasya iti
   / ajātatvātsubhūtiḥ sthaviro 'nujātastathāgatasya / anujātastathatāṃ	/ ajAta tvAt suBUtiH sTaviraH anujAtaH taTAgatasya / anujAtaH taTatAm
   subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatasya / yathā tathāgatatathatā anāgatā agatā,	suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatasya / yaTA taTAgata taTatA anAgatAH agatA,
   evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā anāgatā agatā / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ	evam hi suBUti taTa tA anAgatA agatA / evam hi suBUtiH
   sthavirastathāgatatathatāmanujātaḥ / ādita eva subhūtiḥ	sTaviraH taTAgata taTatAm anujAtaH / Aditas eva suBUtiH
   sthavirastathāgatatathatāmanujātaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? yā hi	sTaviraH taTAgata taTatAm anujAtaH / tat kasya hetoH? yA hi
   tathāgatatathatā, sā sarvadharmatathatā / yā sarvadharmatathatā, sā	taTAgata taTatA, sA sarva Darma taTatA / yA sarva Darma taTatA, sA
   tathāgatatathatā / yā ca tathāgatatathatā, yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, saiva	taTAgata taTatA / yA ca taTAgata taTatA, yA ca sarva Darma taTatA, sA eva
   subhūteḥ sthavirasya tathatā / tāṃ tathatāmanujātaḥ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ /	suBUteH sTavirasya taTatA / tAm taTatAm anujAtaH suBUtiH sTaviraH /
   ato 'nujātastathāgatasya / sāpi ca tathatā atathatā / tāṃ tathatāmanujātaḥ	atas anujAtaH taTAgatasya / sA api ca taTatA ataTatA / tAm taTatAm anujAtaH
   / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ / tathāgatasya yā sā	/ evam hi suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatam anujAtaH / taTAgatasya yA sA
   tathatāyāḥ sthititā, tayā sthititayā subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ	taTatAyAH sTiti tA, tayA sTiti tayA suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatam anujAtaH
   / yathā tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā, avikalpā nirvikalpā, evaṃ hi	/ yaTA taTAgata taTatA avikArAH nirvikArA, avikalpAH nirvikalpA, evam hi
   subhūtitathatā avikārā nirvikārā, avikalpā nirvikalpā / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ	suBUti taTa tA avikArA nirvikArA, avikalpA nirvikalpAH / evam hi suBUtiH
   sthavirastayā tathatayā avikāro nirvikāro 'vikalpo	sTaviraH tayA taTatayA avikAraH nirvikAraH avikalpaH 
   nirvikalpastathāgatasyānujātaḥ / yathā ca tathāgatatathatā avikārā	nirvikalpaH taTAgatasya anujAtaH / yaTA ca taTAgata taTatA avikArA
   nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā, na kvacitpratihanyate, evaṃ	nirvikArAH avikalpA nirvikalpA, na kvacid pratihanyate, evam
   sarvadharmatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā, na	sarva Darma taTatA avikArAH nirvikArAH avikalpA nirvikalpA, na
   kvacitpratihanyate / tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca tathāgatatathatā, yā ca	kvacid pratihanyate / tat kasya hetoH? yA ca taTAgata taTatA, yA ca
   sarvadharmatathatā, ekaivaiṣā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā / na	sarva Darma taTatA, ekA eva ezA taTatA advayAt vEDIkArAH advayataTa tA / na
   kvacittathatā, na kutaścittathatā, na kasyacittathatā / yataḥ sā na	kvacid taTatA, na kutaScid taTatA, na kasyacid taTatA / yatas sA na
   kasyacittathatā, tataḥ sā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā / evaṃ	kasyacid taTatA, tatas sA taTatA advayAt vEDIkArAH advayataTa tA / evam
   hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'nujātastathāgatasyākṛtatathatayā / yā ca	hi suBUtiH sTaviraH anujAtaH taTAgatasya akRta taTatayA / yA ca
   akṛtatathatā, na sā kadācinna tathatā / yataś ca (Vaidya 154) sā na	akRta taTatA, na sA kadAcid na taTatA / yatas ca (VEdyaH 154) sA na
   kadācinna tathatā, tataḥ sā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā / evaṃ	kadAcid na taTatA, tatas sA taTatA advayAt vEDIkArAH advayataTa tA / evam
   hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'nujātastathāgatam / yathā tathāgatatathatā sarvatra	hi suBUtiH sTaviraH anujAtaH taTAgatam / yaTA taTAgata taTatA sarvatra
   sarvadharmeṣvavikalpā nirvikalpā, evaṃ subhūtitathatā sarvatra	sarva Darmezu avikalpA nirvikalpA, evam suBUti taTa tA sarvatra
   sarvadharmeṣvavikalpā nirvikalpā / evameva ca	sarva Darmezu avikalpAH nirvikalpAH / evam eva ca
   tathāgatatathatayābhinirmitaḥ subhūtiśceti dvayamapyaluptametadabhinnaṃ	taTAgata taTa tayA aBinirmitaH suBUtiH ca iti dvayam api aluptam etat aBinnam
   bhedakānupalabdhitaḥ / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ /	Bedaka anupalabDitaH / evam hi suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatam anujAtaH /
   yathā tathāgatatathatā nānyatra sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ, evaṃ hi	yaTA taTAgata taTatA na anyatra sarva Darma taTatAyAH, evam hi
   subhūtitathatā nānyatra sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ / yā nānyatra	suBUti taTa tA na anyatra sarva Darma taTatAyAH / yA na anyatra
   sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ, na sā kasyacinna tathatā / saiva sā tathatā	sarva Darma taTatAyAH, na sA kasyacid na taTatA / sA eva sA taTatA
   sarvadharmatathatā / tāṃ tathatāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro	sarva Darma taTatA / tAm taTatAm suBUtiH sTaviraH 
   'nanyatathatānugamenopagataḥ / na cātra kaścinna kvacidanugatimupagataḥ /	ananya taTatA anugamena upagataH / na ca atra kaScid na kvacid anugatim upagataH /
   evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ / yathā tathāgatatathatā	evam hi suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatam anujAtaH / yaTA taTAgata taTatA
   nātītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā, evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā	na atItAH na anAgatAH na pratyutpannA, evam sarva Darma taTatA na atItA na anAgatA
   na pratyutpannā / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastāṃ	na pratyutpannA / evam hi suBUtiH sTaviraH tAm
   tathatāmanujātastathāgatamanujāta ityucyate / tathāgatatathatayāpi	taTatAm anujAtaH taTAgatam anujAtaH iti ucyate / taTAgata taTatayA api
   hyanugatastathatāṃ tathāgatatathatayā atītatathatāmanugataḥ /	hi anugataH taTatAm taTAgata taTatayA atIta taTatAm anugataH /
   atītatathatayā tathāgatatathatāmanugataḥ / tathāgatatathatayā	atIta taTa tayA taTAgata taTatAm anugataH / taTAgata taTatayA
   anāgatatathatāmanugataḥ / anāgatatathatayā tathāgatatathatāmanugataḥ /	anAgata taTatAm anugataH / anAgata taTa tayA taTAgata taTatAm anugataH /
   tathāgatatathatayā pratyutpannatathatāmanugataḥ / pratyutpannatathatayā	taTAgata taTatayA pratyutpanna taTatAm anugataH / pratyutpanna taTatayA
   tathāgatatathatāmanugataḥ / tathāgatatathatayā	taTAgata taTatAm anugataH / taTAgata taTatayA
   atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatāmanugataḥ / atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatayā	atIta anAgata pratyutpanna taTatAm anugataH / atIta anAgata pratyutpanna taTatayA
   tathāgatatathatāmanugataḥ / iti hi subhūtitathatā ca	taTAgata taTatAm anugataH / iti hi suBUti taTa tA ca
   atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca	atIta anAgata pratyutpanna taTatA ca taTAgata taTatA ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram / evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / evam sarva Darma taTatA ca suBUti taTa tA ca
   advayametadadvaidhīkāram / yaiva ca bhagavato bodhisattvabhūtasya tathatā,	advayam etat ad vEDIkAram / yA eva ca BagavataH boDisattva BUtasya taTatA,
   saiva bhagavato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya tathatā / iyaṃ	sA eva BagavataH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya taTatA / iyam
   sā tathatā, yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ	sA taTatA, yayA taTatayA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate / asyāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH san taTAgataH iti nAmaDeyam laBate / asyAm
   khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ	Kalu punar taTA tagataTatAyAm nirdiSyamAnAyAm iyam mahA pRTivI tasyAm
   velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat, prākampat, saṃprākampat,	velAyAm zaz vikAram azwAdaSa mahAnim ittam akampat, prAkampat, saMprAkampat,
   acalat prācalat saṃprācalat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat, araṇat	acalat prAcalat saMprAcalat, aveDat prAveDat saMprAveDat, araNat 
   prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat, agarjat	prAraNat saMprAraNat, akzuByat prAkzuByat saMprAkzuByat, agarjat 
   prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat tathāgatasyaivānuttarāṃ	prAk arjat saMprAgarjat taTAgatasya eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyamānasyeti / punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyamAnasya iti / punar aparam suBUtiH sTaviraH tAn
   devaputrānāmantrayate sma   evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ	deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  evam hi deva putrAH suBUtiH
   sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ //	sTaviraH taTAgatam anujAtaH //
   punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na	punar aparam suBUtiH sTaviraH na rUpam anujAtaH na vedanAm na saMjQAm na
   saṃskārān na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na	saMskArAt na vijQAnam anujAtaH na srotaApatti Palam anujAtaH na
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ na arhattvaphalamanujāto na	sakRdAgAmi Palam na anAgAmi Palam na arhat tva Palam anujAtaH na
   pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi	pratyekabudDa tvam anujAtaH na budDa tvam anujAtaH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi
   te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yairanujāyeta, ye cānujāyeran /	te DarmAH na saMvidyante na upalaByante yEH anujAya ita, ye ca anujAyeran /
   evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ //	evam hi suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatam anujAtaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat   gambhīracaryeyaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIra caryA iyam
   bhagavan yaduta tathatā / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat	Bagavan yat uta taTatA / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat 
     evametacchāriputra, evam etat / (Vaidya 155) gambhīracaryeyaṃ śāriputra	 evam etat SAriputra, evam etat / (VEdyaH 155) gamBIra caryA iyam SAriputra
   yaduta yathatā / asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ	yat uta yaTatA / asmin Kalu punar taTatA nirdeSe nirdiSyamAne trayANAm
   bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, pañcānāṃ ca	Bikzu SatAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni vimuktAni, paQcAnAm ca
   bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,	BikzuNI SatAnAm virajaH vigata malam Darmezu Darma cakzuH viSudDam,
   pañcabhiś ca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu	paQcaBiH ca deva putra sahasrEH pUrva parikarma kRtEH anutpattikezu Darmezu
   kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā, ṣaṣṭeś ca bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni	kzAntiH pratilabDA, zazweH ca boDisattvAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni
   vimuktāni //	vimuktAni //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH tezAm boDisattvAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni
   vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantametadavocat   ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo	vimuktAni viditvA Bagavantam etat avocat  kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayo
   yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni? bhagavānāha	yat etezAm boDisattvAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni vimuktAni? BagavAn Aha
     etaiḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni, sarvatra	 etEH SAriputra boDisattvEH paQca budDa SatAni paryupAsitA ani, sarvatra
   ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ	ca dAnam dattam SIlam rakzityam kzAntyA saMpAditam vIryam ArabDam
   dhyānānyutpāditāni / te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā	DyAnAni utpAditAni / te Kalu punar ime prajQApAramitayA aparigRhItA
   upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan / kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ	upAya kOSalyena ca virahitAH aBUvan / kiMca api SAriputraH etezAm
   bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā	boDisattvAnAm asti mArgaH SUnyatA vA Animitta caryA vA
   apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā, atha ca	apraNihita manasikAra tA vA, aTa ca
   punaretairupāyakauśalyavikalatvādbhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkṛtā, śrāvakabhūmau	punar etEH upAya kOSalya vikala tvAt BUtakowiH sAkzAtkRtA, SrAvaka BUmO
   nirjātāḥ, na buddhabhūmau / tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ	nirjAtAH, na budDa BUmO / tat yaTA api nAma SAriputra pakziNaH
   śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā	SakuneH yojana SatikaH vA dvi yojana SatikaH vA tri yojana SatikaH vA
   caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet / sa	catur yojana SatikaH vA paQca yojana SatikaH vA Atma BAvaH Bavet / sa
   trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu vartamāno jambūdvīpamāgantavyaṃ manyeta / sa khalu	trAyastriMSezu devezu vartamAnaH jambUdvIpam Agantavyam manyeta / sa Kalu
   punaḥ śāriputra pakṣī śakunirajātapakṣo vā bhavet, śīrṇapakṣo vā bhavet,	punar SAriputra pakzI SakuniH ajAta pakzaH vA Bavet, SIrNa pakzaH vA Bavet ,
   chinnapakṣo vā bhavet / sa trāyastriṃśato devanikāyādātmānamutsṛjet   iha	Cinna pakzaH vA Bavet / sa trAyastriMSataH deva nikAyAt AtmAnam utsRjet  iha
   jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti manyeta / atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ	jambUdvIpe pratizWAsyAmi iti manyeta / aTa tasya pakziNaH SakuneH tatas 
   patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet   aho batāhaṃ	patataH AkASe antarIkze sTitasya antarA cittasya evam Bavet  aho bata aham
   punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti / tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra	punar eva trAyastriMSezu devezu pratizWeyam iti / tat kim manyase SAriputra
   api nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu	api nu sa pakzI SakuniH pratibalaH punar eva trAyastriMSezu devezu
   pratiṣṭhātum? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha  	pratizWAtum? AyuzmAn SAriputraH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  
   sacetpunarevaṃ cintayet   aho batāhamakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe	saced punar evam cintayet  aho bata aham akRtaH anupahataH jambUdvIpe
   pratiṣṭheyamiti / tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto	pratizWeyam iti / tat kim manyase SAriputra api nu sa pakzI SakuniH akRtaH 
   'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet? śāriputra āha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / kṛtaś	anupahataH jambUdvIpe pratizWet? SAriputraH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / kRtaS
   ca sa bhagavan upahataś ca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā	ca sa Bagavan upahataH ca Bavet jambUdvIpe ca patitaH san maraNam vA
   nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetadbhagavan	nigacCet maraNa mAtrakam vA duHKam / tat kasya hetoH? evam hi etat Bagavan
   bhavati   yadasya mahāṃścātmabhāvo bhavati, pakṣau cāsya na bhavataḥ,	Bavati  yat asya mahAn= ca Atma BAvaH Bavati, pakzO ca asya na BavataH,
   uccācca prapatati //	uccAt ca prapatati //
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   evametacchāriputra,	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  evam etat SAriputra,
   evam etat / kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ	evam etat / kim ca api SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ	samyaksaMboDO cittAni utpAdya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWan dAnam
   dadyāt, śīlaṃ rakṣet, kṣāntyā saṃpādayet, vīryamārabheta, dhyānāni,	dadyAt, SIlam rakzet, kzAntyA saMpAdayet, vIryam AraBeta, DyAnAni,
   samāpadyeta, mahaccāsya prasthānaṃ bhavet, mahāṃścāsya cittotpādo	samApadyeta, mahat ca asya prasTAnam Bavet, mahAn= ca asya citta utpAdaH 
   bhavedanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā	Bavet anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / saced ayam prajQApAramitayA
   aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet, evaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā	aparigRhItaH upAya kOSalyena ca virahitaH Bavet, evam SrAvaka BUmim vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati //	pratyekabudDa BUmim vA patati //
   (Vaidya 156) punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	(VEdyaH 156) punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm tat SIlam tam samADim tAm
   prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati, ādhārayati	prajQAm tAm vimuktim tad vimukti jQAna darSanam samanvAharati, ADArayati
   nimittayogena, na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na	nimitta yogena, na sa taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm SIlam na
   jānāti na paśyati / na samādhiṃ na prajñāṃ na vimuktiṃ na	jAnAti na paSyati / na samADim na prajQAm na vimuktim na
   vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ jānāti, na	vimukti jQAna darSanam taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm jAnAti, na
   paśyati / so 'jānannapaśyan śūnyatāyāḥ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti / sa taṃ śabdaṃ	paSyati / saH ajAnan= apaSyan SUnyatAyAH Sabdam SRNoti / sa tam Sabdam
   nimittīkaroti / taṃ śabdaṃ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	nimittIkaroti / tam Sabdam nimittIkRtya anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmayitumicchati / tato veditavyam etat   sthāsyatyayaṃ śrāvakabhūmau	pariNAmayitum icCati / tatas veditavyam etat  sTAsyati ayam SrAvaka BUmO
   vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau veti / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetacchāriputra	vA pratyekabudDa BUmO vA iti / tat kasya hetoH? evam hi etat SAriputra
   bhavati   yatprajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahito	Bavati  yat prajQApAramitayA aparigRhItaH upAya kOSalyena ca virahitaH 
   bhavati //	Bavati //
   śāriputra āha   yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi   yo	SAriputraH Aha  yaTA aham Bagavan BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi  yaH 
   bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,	boDisattvaH prajQApAramitayA aparigRhItaH upAya kOSalyena ca virahitaH,
   kiṃcāpi sa bahunāpi puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca	kiMca api sa bahunA api puNya saMBAreNa yuktaH kalyANa mitra virahitaH ca
   bhavati, saṃśayastasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāptum / tasmāttarhi	Bavati, saMSayaH tasya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim prAptum / tasmAt tarhi
   bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ	Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmena prajQApAramitA BAvayitavyA,
   upāyakuśalena ca bhavitavyam / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	upAya kuSalena ca Bavitavyam / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam
   śāriputrametadavocat   evametacchāriputra, evam etat / yaḥ śāriputra	SAriputram etat avocat  evam etat SAriputra, evam etat / yaH SAriputra
   bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ, upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,	boDisattvaH prajQApAramitayA aparigRhItaH, upAya kOSalyena ca virahitaH,
   kiṃcāpi sa bahunā puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca bhavati,	kiMca api sa bahunA puNya saMBAreNa yuktaH kalyANa mitra virahitaH ca Bavati,
   saṃśayastasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāptum / tasmāttarhi śāriputra	saMSayaH tasya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim prAptum / tasmAt tarhi SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā, upāyakuśalena ca bhavitavyam //	prajQApAramitA BAvayitavyA, upAya kuSalena ca Bavitavyam //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ, brahmāpi	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH sArDam kAma avacarEH deva putrEH, brahmA api
   sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā	sahApatiH rUpAvacarEH deva putrEH sArDam Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrA
   bhagavan prajñāpāramitā, durabhisaṃbhavā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ	Bagavan prajQApAramitA, duraBisaMBavA Bagavan anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH
   / paramadurabhisaṃbhavā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhum /	/ parama duraBi saMBavA Bagavan anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum /
   atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān	aTa Kalu BagavAn= tAn Sakradeva indra pramuKAn kAma avacarAn deva putrAn
   sahāpatimahābrahmapramukhān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma  	sahApati mahA brahma pramuKAn rUpAvacarAn ca deva putrAn Amantrayate sma  
   evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat / gambhīreyaṃ devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā /	evam etat deva putrAH, evam etat / gamBIrA iyam deva putrAH prajQApAramitA /
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / parama duraBi saMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhuṃ	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum
   duṣprajñairhīnavīryairhīnādhimuktikairanupāyakuśalaiḥ pāpamitrasaṃsevibhiḥ	duzprajQEH hIna vIryEH hIna aDimuktikEH anupAya kuSalEH pApa mitra saMseviBiH
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   yadbhagavānevamāha  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  yat BagavAn evam Aha  
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / parama duraBi saMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhumiti, kathaṃ bhagavan durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum iti, kaTam Bagavan duraBisaMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhiḥ? paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	samyaksaMboDiH? parama duraBi saMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhum, yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate? tatkasya	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum, yatra na kaScid aBisaMbuDyate? tat kasya
   hetoḥ? śūnyatvādbhagavan sarvadharmāṇām / na sa kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate	hetoH? SUnya tvAt Bagavan sarva DarmANAm / na sa kaScid DarmaH saMvidyate
   yo dharmaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum / tathā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ /	yaH DarmaH SakyaH aBisaMbodDum / taTA hi Bagavan sarva DarmAH SUnyAH /
   yasyāpi bhagavan dharmasya prahāṇāya dharmo deśyate, so 'pi dharmo na	yasya api Bagavan Darmasya prahANAya DarmaH deSyate, saH api DarmaH na
   saṃvidyate / evaṃ yaścābhisaṃbudhyeta anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,	saMvidyate / evam yaH ca aBisaMbuDyeta anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim,
   yaccābhisaṃboddhavyam, yaś ca jānīyāt, yacca jñātavyam, (Vaidya 157) sarva	yat ca aBisaMbodDavyam, yaH ca jAnIyAt, yat ca jQAtavyam, (VEdyaH 157) sarva
   ete dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ / anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mamaivaṃ bhavati  	ete DarmAH SUnyAH / anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa mama evam Bavati  
   svabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhuṃ na durabhisaṃbhaveti	su aBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum na duraBi saMBava iti
   / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   asaṃbhavatvātsubhūte	/ evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  asaMBava tvAt suBUte
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / asadbhūtatvātsubhūte	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / asat BUta tvAt suBUte
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / avikalpatvātsubhūte	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / avikalpa tvAt suBUte
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / aviṭhapitvātsubhūte	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / aviWa pi tvAt suBUte
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / parama duraBi saMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhum //	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   śūnyamityanenāpyāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	SUnyam iti anena api Ayuzman suBUte paryAyeNa duraBisaMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	samyaksaMboDiH / parama duraBi saMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhum / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyāyuṣman subhūte	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum / tat kasya hetoH? na hi Ayuzman suBUte
   ākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati   ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti /	AkASasya evam Bavati  aham anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsye iti /
   evaṃ ca āyuṣman subhūte ime dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	evam ca Ayuzman suBUte ime DarmAH aBisaMbodDavyAH / tat kasya hetoH?
   ākāśasamā hyāyuṣman subhūte sarvadharmāḥ / yadi cāyuṣman subhūte	AkASa samAH hi Ayuzman suBUte sarva DarmAH / yadi ca Ayuzman suBUte
   svabhisaṃbhavā bhavedanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ, na tvevaṃ	su aBisaMBavA Bavet anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH, na tu evam
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivarterannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH boDisattvAH vivarterannanuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH /
   yasmāttarhyāyuṣman subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivartante	yasmAt tarhi Ayuzman suBUte gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH boDisattvAH vivartante
   'nuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tasmādāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vijñāyate  	anuttarayAH samyaksaMboDeH, tasmAt Ayuzman suBUte evam vijQAyate  
   durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / paramadubhisaṃbhavā anuttarā	duraBisaMBavA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / para maduBi saMBavA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhumiti //	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDum iti //
   evamukte āyuṣman subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat   kiṃ	evam ukte Ayuzman suBUtiH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  kim
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?	punar Ayuzman SAriputra rUpam vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH?
   śāriputra āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman	SAriputraH Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman
   śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ	SAriputra anyatra rUpAt sa DarmaH, yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ	samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vivartate	punar Ayuzman SAriputra vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam vivartate
   'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha  	anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  
   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo	kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskAreByaH 
   'nyatra vijñānāt sa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha	anyatra vijQAnAt sa DarmaH, yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH? Aha
     no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā	 naH hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra yA
   rūpatathatā, sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no	rUpa taTatA, sA vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no
   hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā	hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra yA
   vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā, yā vijñānatathatā, sā	vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA, yA vijQAna taTatA, sA
   vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /	vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa	suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra rUpa taTatAyAH sa
   dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman	DarmaH, yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman
   subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra	suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra
   vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ, anyatra	vedanA taTatAyAH saMjQA taTatAyAH saMskAra taTatAyAH, anyatra
   vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?	vijQAna taTatAyAH sa DarmaH, yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH?
   āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra	Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra
   rūpamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman	rUpam aBisaMbuDyate anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman
   subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā	suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra vedanA saMjQA saMskArA
   vijñānamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman	vijQAnam aBisaMbuDyate anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman
   subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman (Vaidya 158) śāriputra anyatra	suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman (VEdyaH 158) SAriputra anyatra
   rūpātsa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha   no	rUpAt sa DarmaH, yaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? Aha  no
   hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra	hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ, anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ, yo	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskAreByaH, anyatra vijQAnAt sa DarmaH, yaH 
   'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā anuttarāṃ	suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra rUpa taTatA anuttarAm
   saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha  	saMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  
   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā	kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA
   vijñānatathatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha   no	vijQAna taTatA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? Aha  no
   hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra	hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra
   rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?	rUpa taTatAyAH sa DarmaH, yaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate?
   āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra	Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra
   anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ, anyatra	anyatra vedanA taTatAyAH saMjQA taTatAyAH saMskAra taTatAyAH, anyatra
   vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?	vijQAna taTatAyAH sa DarmaH, yaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate?
   āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra	Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra
   rūpaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte	rUpam bodDavyam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte
   / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ	/ suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam
   boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /	bodDavyam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ, yo	suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra rUpAt sa DarmaH, yaH 
   boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /	bodDavyaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte /
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ	suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH
   saṃskārebhyaḥ, anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ	saMskAreByaH, anyatra vijQAnAt sa DarmaH yaH bodDavyaH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ	samyaksaMboDO ? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?	punar Ayuzman SAriputra rUpa taTatA bodDavyAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO?
   āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra	Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra
   vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā boddhavyā	vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA vijQAna taTatA bodDavyA
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha  	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  
   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo boddhavyo	kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra rUpa taTatAyAH sa DarmaH, yaH bodDavyaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha  	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  
   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ	kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra anyatra vedanA taTatAyAH saMjQA taTatAyAH
   saṃskāratathatāyāḥ, anyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo boddhavyo	saMskAra taTatAyAH, anyatra vijQAna taTatAyAH sa DarmaH, yaH bodDavyaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha  	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  
   tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartate anuttarāyāḥ	tat kim manyase Ayuzman SAriputra taTatA vivartate anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   tatkiṃ	samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  tat kim
   manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāṃ sa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ	manyase Ayuzman SAriputra taTatAyAm sa DarmaH, yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   tatkatamaḥ	samyaksaMboDeH? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  tat katamaH
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa dharmo yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?	punar Ayuzman SAriputra sa DarmaH yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH?
   yastasyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ sthitaḥ sarvadharmāsthānayogena? katamo vā punaḥ	yaH tasyAm eva DarmatAyAm sTitaH sarva Darma AsTAna yogena? katamaH vA punar 
   sa śāriputra dharmo yā tathatā? kaccidvā punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā	sa SAriputra DarmaH yA taTatA? kaccit vA punar Ayuzman SAriputra taTatA
   vivartiṣyate? āha   no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   evamāyuṣman	vivartizyate? Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  evam Ayuzman
   śāriputra satyataḥ sthitito 'nupalabhyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa	SAriputra satyataH sTititaH anupalaByamAnAnAm sarva DarmANAm katamaH sa
   dharmaḥ, yo vivartiṣyate anuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? evamukte āyuṣmān	DarmaH, yaH vivartizyate anuttarayAH samyaksaMboDeH? evam ukte AyuzmAn
   śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ (Vaidya 159) subhūtimetadavocat   yayā	SAriputraH Ayuzmantam (VEdyaH 159) suBUtim etat avocat  yayA
   dharmanayajātyā āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati, tayā na sa	Darma naya jAtyE AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH nirdiSati, tayA na sa
   kaściddharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / ye ca khalu	kaScid DarmaH yaH vivartate anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / ye ca Kalu
   punarime āyuṣman subhūte trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ	punar ime Ayuzman suBUte trayaH boDisattva yAnikAH
   pudgalāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ, eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ na bhavati /	pudgalAH taTAgatena AKyAtAH, ezAm trayANAm vyavasTAnam na Bavati /
   ekameva hi yānaṃ bhavati yaduta buddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ yathā	ekam eva hi yAnam Bavati yat uta budDa yAnam boDisattva yAnam yaTA
   āyuṣmataḥ subhūternirdeśaḥ //	AyuzmataH suBUteH nirdeSaH //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat  	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat  
   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ ekam api	kim punar Ayuzman SAriputraH AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH ekam api
   bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchati śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā	boDisattvam na aByupagacCati SrAvaka yAnikam vA pratyekabudDa yAnikam vA
   mahāyānikaṃ vā / praṣṭavyastāvadayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ / atha	mahAyAnikam vA / prazwavyaH tAvat ayam AyuzmAn suBUtiH sTaviraH / aTa
   khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kiṃ	Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kim
   punastvamāyuṣman subhūte ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchasi	punar tvam Ayuzman suBUte ekam api boDisattvam na aByupagacCasi
   śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā? subhūtirāha  	SrAvaka yAnikam vA pratyekabudDa yAnikam vA mahAyAnikam vA? suBUtiH Aha  
   kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā tathatāyāstathatā, tatra tathatāyāmekam api	kim punar Ayuzman SAriputra yA taTatAyAH taTatA, tatra taTatAyAm ekam api
   bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā	boDisattvam samanupaSyasi SrAvaka yAnikam vA pratyekabudDa yAnikam vA
   mahāyānikaṃ vā? śāriputra āha   na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte / tathatāpi tāvat	mahAyAnikam vA? SAriputraH Aha  na hi etat Ayuzman suBUte / taTatA api tAvat 
   tribhirākārairnopalabhyate, prāgeva bodhisattvaḥ / subhūtirāha   kiṃ	triBiH AkArEH na upalaByate, prAk eva boDisattvaH / suBUtiH Aha  kim
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā ekenāpyākāreṇopalabhyate? āha   na	punar Ayuzman SAriputra taTatA ekena api AkAreNa upalaByate? Aha  na
   hyetadāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   kaccitpunastvamāyuṣman śāriputra	hi etat Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  kaccit punar tvam Ayuzman SAriputra
   tathatāyāmekam api bodhisattvadharmaṃ samanupaśyasi? āha   na	taTatAyAm ekam api boDisattva Darmam samanupaSyasi? Aha  na
   hyetadāyuṣman subhūte / subhūtirāha   evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ	hi etat Ayuzman suBUte / suBUtiH Aha  evam Ayuzman SAriputra satyataH
   sthititastasya bodhisattvadharmasyānupalabhyamānasya kutastavaivaṃ bhavati	sTititaH tasya boDisattva Darmasya anupalaByamAnasya kutas tava evam Bavati
     ayaṃ śrāvakayānikaḥ, ayaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikaḥ, ayaṃ mahāyānika iti?	 ayam SrAvaka yAnikaH, ayam pratyekabudDa yAnikaH, ayam mahAyAnikaH iti?
   evameteṣāmāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ	evam etezAm Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvAnAm taTatAyAm
   pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya	praviBAvyamAnAnAm aviSeza tAm nirviSeza tAm nirnAnAkaraNa tAm SrutvA yasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya cittam na avalIyate na saMlIyate na

   (Vaidya 161)	(VEdyaH 161)

   dṛḍhacittena bhavitavyam, aprakampyacittenāsaṃhāryacittena bhavitavyam /	dRXa cittena Bavitavyam, aprakampya cittena asaMhArya cittena Bavitavyam /

   evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ / aparapraṇeyo	eva aham anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim svasyAm BUmO sTitaH / apara praNeyaH 
   bhavati, anavamardanīyaś ca bhavati svasyāṃ bhūmau / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā	Bavati, anavamardanIyaH ca Bavati svasyAm BUmO / tat kasya hetoH? taTA
   hi sa sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati /	hi sa sTitaH asaMhAryeNa cittena asaMhAryeNa jQAnena samanvAgataH Bavati /
   sacetkhalu punarmāraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrāmet, tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ	saced Kalu punar mAraH pApIyAn budDa vezeNa upasaMkrAmet, tam upasaMkramya evam
   vadet   ihaiva tvamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuru / na tvaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ	vadet  iha eva tvam arhat tvam sAkzAtkuru / na tvam vyAkRtaH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau / na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā	samyaksaMboDO / na tava te AkArAH tAni liFgAni tAni nimittAni vA
   saṃvidyante, yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo	saMvidyante, yEH AkArEH yEH liFgEH yEH nimittEH samanvAgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate / kiṃ vātra tvaṃ	mahAsattvaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate / kim vA atra tvam
   carasīti? sacetpunarbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyathā cittaṃ bhavati,	carasi iti? saced punar boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya anyaTA cittam Bavati,
   veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ	veditavyam etat suBUte na ayam boDisattvaH vyAkRtaH
   paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ	pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhāviti / sacetpunarevaṃ samanvāharati   māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān	samyaksaMboDO= iti / saced punar evam samanvAharati  mAraH bata ayam pApIyAn
   buddhaveṣamabhinirmāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ, mārādhiṣṭhito vā māranirmito veti,	budDa vezam aBinirmAya upasaMkrAntaH, mAra aDizWitaH vA mAra nirmitaH vA iti,
   nāyaṃ tathāgataḥ / yathoktaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena tathā	na ayam taTAgataH / yaToktam taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena taTA
   tannānyathā / sacedevaṃ pratyavekṣate, evaṃ samanvāharati   māro batāyaṃ	tat na anyaTA / saced evam pratyavekzate, evam samanvAharati  mAraH bata ayam
   pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo 'nuttarāyāḥ	pApIyAn budDa aDizWAnam kRtvA mAm vivecayitu kAmaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodhita iti / sacenmāraḥ pratyudāvartate, veditavyametatsubhūte	samyaksaMboDitaH iti / saced mAraH pratyudAvartate, veditavyam etat suBUte
   vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	vyAkRtaH ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ / sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo	pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH / sTitaH ayam boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau / sacetsubhūte	mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyAyAm boDisattva BUmO / saced suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya ime AkArAH imAni liFgAni imAni nimittAni
   saṃvidyante, veditavyametatsubhūte yathā asyeme guṇāḥ / addhā batāyaṃ	saMvidyante, veditavyam etat suBUte yaTA asya ime guNAH / adDA bata ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vyAkRtaH pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH
   samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ / sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ	samyaksaMbudDEH / sTitaH ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyAyAm
   bodhisattvabhūmau / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni	boDisattva BUmO / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi asya te AkArAH tAni liFgAni
   tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante, yāni avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya	tAni nimittAni saMvidyante, yAni avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya / ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ	mahAsattvasya / eBiH api suBUte AkArEH eBiH liFgEH eBiH nimittEH
   samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ	samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //	samyaksaMboDeH DArayitavyaH //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	punar aparam suBUte avinivartanIyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgam api karoti, jīvitaparityāgam	sat Darma parigrahasya kRtaSas Atma parityAgam api karoti, jIvita parityAgam
   api karoti / tasmādbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ	api karoti / tasmAt boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH
   saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ	sat Darma parigrahAya param udyogam Apadyate atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca / dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta	budDAnAm BagavatAm premNA ca gOraveNa ca / Darma kAyAH budDAH Bagavanta
   iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya (Vaidya 169) saddharmaparigrahaṃ	iti Darme prema ca gOravam ca upAdAya (VEdyaH 169) sat Darma parigraham
   karoti / nāyaṃ kevalamatītānāmeva buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	karoti / na ayam kevalam atItAnAm eva budDAnAm BagavatAm
   saddharmaparigrahaḥ, pratyutpannānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva	sat Darma parigrahaH, pratyutpannAnAm api budDAnAm BagavatAm ezaH eva
   saddharmaparigrahaḥ, anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva	sat Darma parigrahaH, anAgatAnAm api budDAnAm BagavatAm ezaH eva
   saddharmaparigrahaḥ   aham api tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	sat Darma parigrahaH  aham api tatra tezAm anAgatAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti, aham api tatra vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ	saMKyAm gaNanAm pravizwaH iti, aham api tatra vyAkRtaH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, mamāpyeṣa eva saddharmaparigraha iti / sa	samyaksaMboDO, mama api ezaH eva sat Darma parigrahaH iti / sa
   imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgam	imam api arTa vaSam saMpaSyan sat Darma parigrahasya kRtaSas Atma parityAgam
   api karoti, jīvitaparityāgam api karoti / na ca tatra saṃsīdati, na ca	api karoti, jIvita parityAgam api karoti / na ca tatra saMsIdati, na ca
   kausīdyamāpadyate / ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ	kOsIdyam Apadyate / eBiH api suBUte AkArEH eBiH liFgEH eBiH nimittEH
   samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ	samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //	samyaksaMboDeH DArayitavyaH //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo	punar aparam suBUte avinivartanIyaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na	mahAsattvaH taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya Darmam deSayataH na
   kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati / subhūtirāha   kiṃ tathāgatasyaiva bhagavan	kAFkzati, na vicikitsati / suBUtiH Aha  kim taTAgatasya eva Bagavan
   dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati, na śrāvakasya? bhagavānāha  	Darmam deSayataH na kAFkzati na vicikitsati, na SrAvakasya? BagavAn Aha  
   śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /	SrAvakasya api suBUte Darmam deSayataH na kAFkzati na vicikitsati /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu	tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi tena boDisattvena mahAsattvena anutpattikezu
   dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā / tena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatāmaviruddhāṃ	Darmezu kzAntiH pratilabDAH / tena sarva DarmANAm Darma tAm avirudDAm
   śṛṇoti / śṛṇvaṃś ca na kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati / ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ	SRNoti / SRNvan ca na kAFkzati, na vicikitsati / eBiH suBUte guNEH
   samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavati / imāny api	samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH Bavati / imAni api
   subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni	suBUte avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya AkAra liFga nimittAni
   veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //	veditavyAni anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāmavinivartanīyākāraliṅganimittaparivarto nāma saptadaśaḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm avinivartanIya AkAra liFga nimitta parivartaH nAma saptadaSaH
   (Vaidya 170)	(VEdyaH 170)
   ASP_18: śūnyatāparivarto 'ṣṭādaśaḥ /	ASP_18: SUnyatA parivartaH azwAdaSaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   āścaryaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  AScaryam Bagavan
   mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / apramāṇaguṇasamanvāgato	mahA guNa samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / apramANa guNa samanvAgataH 
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / aparimitaguṇasamanvāgato bhagavan	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / aparimita guNa samanvAgataH Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat  	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / tatkasya hetoḥ? avinivartanīyena hi subhūte	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / tat kasya hetoH? avinivartanIyena hi suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena anantam aparyantam jQAnam pratilabDam asaMhAryam
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ //	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH //
   subhūtirāha   pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya	suBUtiH Aha  pratibalaH Bagavan avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni	mahAsattvasya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn AkArAn liFgAni nimittAni
   nirdeṣṭum / ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi	nirdezwum / atas eva Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya gamBIrANi
   gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni / evamukte	gamBIrANi sTAnAni prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAni sUcayitavyAni / evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  sADu sADu suBUte yaH tvam
   gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ / gambhīramiti	gamBIrANi gamBIrANi sTAnAni AraBya nigamayitu kAmaH / gamBIram iti
   subhūte śūnyatāyā etadadhivacanam / ānimittasya apraṇihitasya	suBUte SUnyatAyAH etat aDivacanam / Animittasya apraNihitasya
   anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya	anaBisaMskArasya anutpAdasya ajAteH aBAvasya virAgasya niroDasya
   nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti //	nirvANasya vigamasya etat suBUte aDivacanam yat uta gamBIram iti //
   subhūtirāha   eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ	suBUtiH Aha  etezAm eva Bagavan kevalam etat DarmANAm aDivacanam na punar 
   sarvadharmāṇām? bhagavānāha   sarvadharmāṇāmapyetatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ	sarva DarmANAm? BagavAn Aha  sarva DarmANAm api etat suBUte aDivacanam
   yaduta gambhīramiti / tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte gambhīram / evaṃ	yat uta gamBIram iti / tat kasya hetoH? rUpam hi suBUte gamBIram / evam
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ hi subhūte gambhīram / kathaṃ ca	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam hi suBUte gamBIram / kaTam ca
   subhūte rūpaṃ gambhīram? kathaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ? kathaṃ ca subhūte	suBUte rUpam gamBIram? kaTam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH? kaTam ca suBUte
   vijñānaṃ gambhīram? yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam / evaṃ	vijQAnam gamBIram? yaTA suBUte taTatA, taTA gamBIram rUpam / evam
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / yaTA suBUte taTatA, taTA gamBIram vijQAnam
   / tatra subhūte yathā rūpatathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam / yathā	/ tatra suBUte yaTA rUpa taTatA, taTA gamBIram rUpam / yaTA
   vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā / tatra subhūte yathā	vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA / tatra suBUte yaTA
   vijñānatathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam / yatra subhūte na rūpam, iyaṃ	vijQAna taTatA, taTA gamBIram vijQAnam / yatra suBUte na rUpam, iyam
   rūpasya gambhīratā / yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na	rUpasya gamBIra tA / yatra suBUte na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na
   vijñānam, iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇām, iyaṃ vijñānasya gambhīratā //	vijQAnam, iyam vedanA saMjQA saMskArANAm, iyam vijQAnasya gamBIra tA //
   subhūtirāha   āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataś ca nivārito	suBUtiH Aha  AScaryam Bagavan yAvat sUkzmeNa upAyena rUpataH ca nivAritaH 
   nirvāṇaṃ ca sucitam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena	nirvANam ca sucitam / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / yAvat sUkzmeNa upAyena
   vijñānataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam / bhagavānāha   imāni subhūte	vijQAnataH ca nivAritaH nirvANam ca sUcitam / BagavAn Aha  imAni suBUte
   gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni	gamBIrANi gamBIrANi sTAnAni prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAni
   yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati   evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā	yaH cintayizyanti tulayizyati upaniDyAsyati  evam mayA sTAtavyam yaTA
   prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam / evaṃ mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yathā	prajQApAramitAyAm AjQaptam / evam mayA Sikzitavyam yaTA
   prajñāpāramitāyāmākhyātam / evaṃ mayā pratipattavyaṃ yathā	prajQApAramitAyAm AKyAtam / evam mayA pratipattavyam yaTA
   prajñāpāramitāyāmupadiṣṭam / tathā	prajQApAramitAyAm upadizwam / taTA
   saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā	saMpAdayamAnaH taTA upaniDyAyan= taTA upaparIkzamANaH taTA prayujyamAnaH taTA
   ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate / ayaṃ	GawamAnaH taTA vyAyacCamAnaH eka divasam api atra yogam Apadyate / ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenaikadivasena kiyatkarma karoti? tadyathāpi nāma	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tena eka divasena kiyat karma karoti? tat yaTA api nAma
   subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ / tasya puruṣasya	suBUte kaScid eva puruzaH rAga caritaH vitarka caritaH / tasya puruzasya
   rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā	rAga caritasya vitarka caritasya striyA aBirUpayA prAsAdikayA darSanIyayA
   saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet / sā khalu punaḥ strī (Vaidya 171)	saha saMketaH kRtaH Bavet / sA Kalu punar strI (VEdyaH 171)
   paraparigṛhītā bhavet / na vaśayedātmānamagārānniṣkramitum / tatkiṃ	para parigRhItA Bavet / na vaSayet AtmAnam agArAt nizkramitum / tat kim
   manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?	manyase suBUte kiMpratisaMyuktAH tasya puruzasya vitarkAH pravarteran?
   subhūtirāha   strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ	suBUtiH Aha  strI pratisaMyuktAH eva Bagavan= tasya puruzasya vitarkAH
   pravarteran   iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā / tayā sārdhamevaṃ kariṣyāmi, evaṃ	pravarteran  iyam AgacCati, iyam AgatA / tayA sArDam evam karizyAmi, evam
   ramiṣyāmi, evaṃ krīḍiṣyāmi, evaṃ pravicārayiṣyāmīti / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ	ramizyAmi, evam krIxizyAmi, evam pravicArayizyAmi iti / BagavAn Aha  tat kim
   manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā	manyase suBUte divasasya atyayena tasya puruzasya kiyantaH vitarkA
   utpadyeran? subhūtirāha   bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya	utpadyeran? suBUtiH Aha  bahavaH Bagavan divasasya atyayena tasya puruzasya
   vitarkā utpadyeran / bhagavānāha   yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya	vitarkAH utpadyeran / BagavAn Aha  yAvantaH suBUte tasya puruzasya
   divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran, iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo	divasasya atyayena vitarkAH utpadyeran, iyataH suBUte kalpAn boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti, ya iha	mahAsattvaH Corayati vipRzWIkaroti saMsArAt vyantIkaroti, yaH iha
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm yaTA AjQaptam yaTA AKyAtam yaTA upadizwam yaToddizwam
   yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,	yaTA nirdizwam tizWati Sikzate pratipadyate upaniDyAyati yogam Apadyate,
   tāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayati, yairdoṣairbodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartate	tAn ca dozAn vivarjayati, yEH dozEH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vivartate
   'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo	anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / evam hi suBUte yaH ca boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ, anena vihāreṇa viharan yaduta	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA yogam anu yuktaH, anena vihAreNa viharan yat uta
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ, ekadivasena tāvatkarma karoti /	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH, eka divasena tAvat karma karoti /
   yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	yaH ca prajQApAramitA virahitaH boDisattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt, ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo	kalpAn= tizWan dAnam dadyAt, ayam eva tatas viSizyate yaH ayam boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva evamekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate //	mahAsattvaH evam eka divasam api prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apadyate //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	punar aparam suBUte yaH ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, pratiṣṭhāpayet, evaṃ	kalpAn= tizWan srotaApanneByaH dAnam dadyAt, pratizWApayet, evam
   sakṛdāgāmiṣvanāgāmiṣvarhatsu dānaṃ dadyāt, pratiṣṭhāpayet /	sakRdAgAmizu anAgAmizu arhatsu dAnam dadyAt, pratizWApayet /
   pratyekabuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet / tathāgateṣvarhatsu	pratyekabudDezu dAnam dadyAt pratizWApayet / taTAgatezu arhatsu
   samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, virahitaś ca	samyaksaMbudDezu dAnam dadyAt pratizWApayet, virahitaH ca
   prajñāpāramitāyā / yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAH / yaH ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yaTA upadizwam
   yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta	yaTA uddizwam yaTA nirdizwam prajQApAramitAyAm taTA eva yogam Apadyeta
   ekadivasam api / ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ	eka divasam api / ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tatas 
   paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	pOrvakAt boDisattvat bahutaram puNyam prasavati //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan	punar aparam suBUte yaH boDisattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWan
   srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, śīleṣu	srotaApannezu yAvat samyaksaMbudDezu dAnam dadyAt pratizWApayet, SIlezu
   ca paripūrṇakārī bhavet, virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā bhavet / yaś ca	ca paripUrNa kArI Bavet, virahitaH ca prajQApAramitayA Bavet / yaH ca
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA vihArI tatas manasikArAt vyutTAya
   dharmaṃ deśayet, ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ	Darmam deSayet, ayam eva suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tatas 
   paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	pOrvakAt boDisattvAt bahutaram puNyam prasavati //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan	punar aparam suBUte yaH boDisattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWan
   srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, śīleṣu	srotaApannezu yAvat samyaksaMbudDezu dAnam dadyAt pratizWApayet, SIlezu
   ca paripūrṇakārī bhavet, kṣāntyā ca samanvāgato bhavet, virahitaś ca	ca paripUrNa kArI Bavet, kzAntyA ca samanvAgataH Bavet, virahitaH ca
   prajñāpāramitayā / yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī	prajQApAramitayA / yaH ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA vihArI
   tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt, ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo	tatas manasikAra dvyutTAya Darma dAnam dadyAt, ayam eva suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	mahAsattvaH mahAsattvaH tatas pOrvakAt boDisattvAt bahutaram puNyam
   prasavati //	prasavati //
   (Vaidya 172) punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	(VEdyaH 172) punar aparam suBUte yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn= tizWan srotaApannezu yAvat samyaksaMbudDezu
   dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, śīleṣu paripūrṇakārī kṣāntyā ca samanvāgataḥ,	dAnam dadyAt pratizWApayet, SIlezu paripUrNa kArI kzAntyA ca samanvAgataH,
   ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,	ArabDa vIryaH san DyAnezu boDi pakzezu ca Darmezu yogam Apadyeta,
   virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā / yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo	virahitaH ca prajQApAramitayA / yaH ca Kalu punar suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	mahAsattvaH taTA Darma dAnam datvA anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmayet, ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ	pariNAmayet, ayam eva suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tatas 
   paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	pOrvakAt boDisattvAt bahutaram puNyam prasavati //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH taTA Darma dAnam datvA
   prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,	prajQApAramitA uktena pariNAmena anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayet ,
   ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	ayam tatas bahutaram puNyam prasavati //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH taTA Darma dAnam datvA
   prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,	prajQApAramitA uktena pariNAmena anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayet ,
   pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta / yaś ca khalu punaḥ	pariNAmya ca pratisaMlAne na punar eva yogam Apadyeta / yaH ca Kalu punar 
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt, na punaḥ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH taTA Darma dAnam eva dadyAt, na punar 
   pratisaṃlāne yogamāpadyeta, sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ	pratisaMlAne yogam Apadyeta, sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na tAvat puNyam
   prasavati, yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	prasavati, yAvat yaH evam Darma dAnam dadat boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca	pratisaMlAne ca punar eva yogam ApadyamAnaH prajQApAramitayA ca
   parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā, ayaṃ	parigRhItaH tad pratisaMlAnam avirahitam karoti prajQApAramitayA, ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahutaram puNyam prasavati //
   subhūtirāha   yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā, tadā	suBUtiH Aha  yadA Bagavan aBisaMskAraH vikalpaH iti uktam BagavatA, tadA
   kathaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatītyucyate? bhagavānāha   so 'pīdānīṃ	kaTam bahutaram puNyam prasavati iti ucyate? BagavAn Aha  saH api idAnIm
   subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	suBUte puNya aBisaMskAraH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate, riktaka ityevākhyāyate, tucchaka	carataH SUnyakaH iti eva AKyAyate, riktakaH iti eva AKyAyate, tucCaka
   ityevākhyāyate, asāraka ityevākhyāyate / yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte	iti eva AKyAyate, asArakaH iti eva AKyAyate / yaTA yaTA Kalu punar suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate, tathā tathā	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam sarva DarmAn pratyavekzate, taTA taTA
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā / yathā	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avirahitaH Bavati prajQApAramitayA / yaTA
   yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati	yaTA ca suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avirahitaH Bavati
   prajñāpāramitayā, tathā tathā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //	prajQApAramitayA, taTA taTA aprameyam asaMKyeyam puNyam prasavati //
   subhūtirāha   aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,	suBUtiH Aha  aprameyasya ca Bagavan asaMKyeyasya ca kim nAnA karaNam vA,
   kaḥ prativiśeṣo vā? bhagavānāha   aprameyamiti subhūte yatra	kaH prativiSezaH vA? BagavAn Aha  aprameyam iti suBUte yatra
   pramāṇānyuparamante / asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi	pramANAni uparamante / asaMKyeyam iti suBUte yat na Sakyam saMKyayA api
   kṣapayitum //	kzapayitum //
   subhūtirāha   syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet, evaṃ vedanā	suBUtiH Aha  syAt Bagavan paryAyaH yat rUpam aprameyam Bavet, evam vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / syādbhagavan paryāyo yadvijñānamaprameyaṃ bhavet?	saMjQA saMskArAH / syAt Bagavan paryAyaH yat vijQAnam aprameyam Bavet ?
   bhagavānāha   yatsubhūtirevamāha   syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ	BagavAn Aha  yat suBUtiH evam Aha  syAt Bagavan paryAyaH yat rUpam aprameyam
   bhavet, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / syādbhagavan paryāyo	Bavet, evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / syAt Bagavan paryAyaH 
   yadvijñānamaprameyaṃ bhavediti / syātsubhūte paryāyo yena rūpamevāprameyaṃ	yat vijQAnam aprameyam Bavet iti / syAt suBUte paryAyaH yena rUpam eva aprameyam
   bhavet, evaṃ vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva / syātsubhūte paryāyo yena	Bavet, evam vedanA eva saMjQA eva saMskArAH eva / syAt suBUte paryAyaH yena
   vijñānamevāprameyaṃ bhavet / subhūtirāha   kasya punarbhagavan	vijQAnam eva aprameyam Bavet / suBUtiH Aha  kasya punar Bagavan
   etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti? bhagavānāha   śūnyatāyāḥ subhūte	etat aDivacanam aprameyam iti? BagavAn Aha  SUnyatAyAH suBUte
   etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti / ānimittasyaitadadhivacanam / apraṇihitasya	etat aDivacanam aprameyam iti / Animittasya etat aDivacanam / apraNihitasya
   subhūte etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti //	suBUte etat aDivacanam aprameyam iti //
   (Vaidya 173) subhūtirāha   kiṃ śūnyatāyā eva bhagavan	(VEdyaH 173) suBUtiH Aha  kim SUnyatAyAH eva Bagavan
   kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti, ānimittasyaiva apraṇihitasyaiva	kevalam etat aDivacanam aprameya miti, Animittasya eva apraNihitasya eva
   bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti, nānyeṣāṃ dharmāṇām?	Bagavan kevalam etat aDivacanam aprameyam iti, na anyezAm DarmANAm ?
   bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā	BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase suBUte nanu mayA sarva DarmAH SUnyA
   ityākhyātāḥ? subhūtirāha   śūnyā eva bhagavan	iti AKyAtAH? suBUtiH Aha  SUnyAH eva Bagavan
   sarvadharmāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ / bhagavānāha   ye ca subhūte śūnyāḥ,	sarva DarmAH taTAgatena AKyAtAH / BagavAn Aha  ye ca suBUte SUnyAH,
   akṣayā api te / yā ca śūnyatā, aprameyatāpi sā / tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ	akzayAH api te / yA ca SUnyatA, aprameya tA api sA / tasmAt tarhi suBUte ezAm
   dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate / abhilāpā ete	DarmANAm arTataH viSezaH vA nAnA karaNam vA na upalaByate / aBilApAH ete
   subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ   aprameyamiti vā, asaṃkhyeyamiti	suBUte taTAgatena AKyAtAH aBilapitAH  aprameyam iti vA, asaMKyeyam iti
   vā, akṣayamiti vā, śūnyamiti vā, ānimittamiti vā, apraṇihitamiti vā,	vA, akzayam iti vA, SUnyam iti vA, Animittam iti vA, apraNihitam iti vA,
   anabhisaṃskāra iti vā, anutpāda iti vā, ajātiriti vā abhāva iti vā, virāga	anaBisaMskAraH iti vA, anutpAdaH iti vA, ajAtiH iti vE aBAvaH iti vA, virAga
   iti vā, nirodha iti vā, nirvāṇamiti vā / deśanābhinirhāranirdeśa eṣa	iti vA, niroDaH iti vA, nirvANam iti vA / deSanA aBinirhAra nirdeSaH eza
   subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenākhyātaḥ //	suBUte taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena AKyAtaH //
   subhūtirāha   āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā	suBUtiH Aha  AScaryam Bagavan yAvat yat iyam taTAgatena arhatA
   samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā, sā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ	samyaksaMbudDena sarva DarmANAm DarmatA deSitA, sA ca sarva DarmANAm
   dharmatā anabhilāpyā / yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,	DarmatA anaBilApyAH / yaTA aham Bagavan BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi,
   tathā sarvadharmā api bhagavan anabhilāpyāḥ / bhagavānāha  	taTA sarva DarmAH api Bagavan anaBilApyAH / BagavAn Aha  
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / sarvadharmā api subhūte anabhilāpyāḥ /	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / sarva DarmAH api suBUte anaBilApyAH /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā, na sā śakyā	tat kasya hetoH? yA ca suBUte sarva DarmANAm SUnyatA, na sA SakyA
   abhilapitum / subhūtirāha   kiṃ punarbhagavan anabhilapyasyārthasya	aBilapitum / suBUtiH Aha  kim punar Bagavan anaBilapyasya arTasya
   vṛddhirvāsti, parihāṇirvā vidyate? bhagavānāha   no hīdaṃ subhūte /	vRdDiH vAsti, parihANiH vA vidyate? BagavAn Aha  no hi idam suBUte /
   subhūtirāhasacedbhagavan anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,	suBUtiH Ahasa ced Bagavan anaBilapyasya arTasya na vRdDiH na parihANiH,
   dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati / evaṃ	dAna pAramitAyAH api Bagavat na vRdDiH na parihANiH Bavizyati / evam
   śīlapāramitāyā api, kṣāntipāramitāyā api, vīryapāramitāyā api,	SIla pAramitAyAH api, kzAnti pAramitAyAH api, vIrya pAramitAyAH api,
   dhyānapāramitāyā api, prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna	DyAna pAramitAyAH api, prajQApAramitAyAH api Bagavat na vRdDiH na
   parihāṇirbhaviṣyati / sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna	parihANiH Bavizyati / saced Bagavan AsAm zaNNAm pAramitAnAm na vRdDiH na
   parihāṇiḥ, kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena	parihANiH, kaTam Bagavan vivarDamAnAnAm zaNNAm pAramitAnAm balena
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? kathaṃ ca	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? kaTam ca
   anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhyāsannībhavati? na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan	anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH aByAsannIBavati? na ca Bagavan apratipUrayan
   pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ	pAramitAm boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH aByAsannIBavati anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ / bhagavānāha   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / na khalu	samyaksaMboDeH / BagavAn Aha  evam etat suBUte, evam etat / na Kalu
   punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate / api	punar suBUte pAramitA arTasya kAcid vRdDiH vA asti parihANiH vA vidyate / api
   tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	tu Kalu punar suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati   iyaṃ	carataH prajQApAramitAm BAvayate upAya kuSalasya na evam Bavati  iyam
   dānapāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ dānapāramitā parihīyate iti / api tu khalu	dAna pAramitA vivarDate, iyam dAna pAramitA parihIyate iti / api tu Kalu
   punarasyaivaṃ bhavati   nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti / sa	punar asya evam Bavati  nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta dAna pAramitA iti / sa
   dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ	dAnam dadat tAn manasikArAn= tAn= citta utpAdAn= tAni kuSala mUlAni anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati / yathā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhistathā	samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati / yaTA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH taTA
   pariṇāmayati //	pariNAmayati //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati   iyaṃ	prajQApAramitAm BAvayataH upAya kuSalasya na evam Bavati  iyam
   śīlapāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ śīlapāramitā (Vaidya 174) parihīyate iti /	SIla pAramitA vivarDate, iyam SIla pAramitA (VEdyaH 174) parihIyate iti /
   api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati   nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta	api tu Kalu punar asya evam Bavati  nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta
   śīlapāramiteti / sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān	SIla pAramitA iti / sa SIlam samAdAya vartamAnaH tAn
   manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	manasikArAn= tAn= citta utpAdAn= tAni kuSala mUlAni anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariṇāmayati / yathā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhistathā pariṇāmayati //	pariNAmayati / yaTA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH taTA pariNAmayati //

   kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā parihīyate iti / api tu	kzAnti pAramitA vivarDate, iyam kzAnti pAramitA parihIyate iti / api tu

   (Vaidya 175)	(VEdyaH 175)
   ASP_19: gaṅgadevībhaginīparivarta ekonaviṃśaḥ /	ASP_19: gaFga devI BaginI parivarte ekonaviMSaH /

   prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ	praTama citta utpAdena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuttarAm

   mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? paurvako	mahAsattvaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? pOrvakaH

   avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā /	avikalpaH hi Ayuzman SAriputra svapnaH ca divasaH ca uktaH BagavatA /
