   divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tato 'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ	divase prajQApAramitAyAm carati, tatas asya prajQApAramitA aByAsataH
   svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena	svapna antara gatasya api boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA vEpulyena
   bhavitavyam / śāriputra āha   yatpunarāyuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā	Bavitavyam / SAriputraH Aha  yat punar Ayuzman suBUte strI vA puruzaH vA
   svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti, kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa	svapna antara gataH karma SuBam aSuBam vA karoti, kim Bavati tasya karmaNa
   ācayo vā upacayo vā? subhūtirāha   yathā svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā uktā	AcayaH vA upacayaH vA? suBUtiH Aha  yaTA svapna upamAH sarva DarmA uktA
   bhagavatā, tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā / atha	BagavatA, taTA na tasya karmaNaH Bavati AcayaH vA upacayaH vA / aTa
   punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan	punar Ayuzman SAriputra sa puruzaH prativibudDaH san vikalpayan
   hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati, (Vaidya 177) bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo	hata saMjQAm utpAdayati, (VEdyaH 177) Bavati tasya karmaNaH AcayaH vA upacayaH 
   vā / kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati?	vA / kaTam ca Ayuzman SAriputra vikalpayan hata saMjQAm utpAdayati?
   sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ	saced svapna antara gataH prANa atipAtam kRtvA prativibudDaH san= evam
   vikalpayati   aho hataḥ, sādhu hataḥ, suṣṭhu hataḥ, mayā hataḥ, ityevaṃ	vikalpayati  aho hataH, sADu hataH, suzWu hataH, mayA hataH, iti evam
   vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati / śāriputra āha   sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa	vikalpayan hata saMjQAm utpAdayati / SAriputraH Aha  saced Ayuzman suBUte sa
   puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati   aho hataḥ,	puruzaH prativibudDaH san vikalpayan hata saMjQAm utpAdayati  aho hataH,
   sādhu hataḥ, suṣṭhu hataḥ, mayā hata iti, bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā	sADu hataH, suzWu hataH, mayA hataH iti, Bavati tasya karmaNaH AcayaH vA
   upacayo vā? buddho bhagavān api vikalpayan kṣayasaṃjñāmutpādayati /	upacayaH vA? budDaH BagavAn api vikalpayan kzaya saMjQAm utpAdayati /
   tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet? subhūtirāha   no hīdamāyuṣman	tasya api karmaNaH AcayaH vA upacayaH vA Bavet? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Ayuzman
   śāriputra / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇo hi tathāgataḥ /	SAriputra / tat kasya hetoH? sarva kalpa vikalpa prahINaH hi taTAgataH /
   tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,	tat yaTA api nAma AkASam eva Ayuzman SAriputra nAnArambaNam karma utpadyate,
   nānārambaṇaṃ cittamutpadyate / tasmāttarhyāyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇameva	na anA ArambaNam cittam utpadyate / tasmAt tarhi Ayuzman SAriputra sArambaNam eva
   karmotpadyate, na anārambaṇam / sārambaṇameva cittamutpadyate, na	karma utpadyate, na anArambaNam / sArambaNam eva cittam utpadyate, na
   anārambaṇam / dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣvāyuṣman śāriputra dharmeṣu buddhiḥ	anArambaNam / dRzwa Sruta mata vijQAtezu Ayuzman SAriputra Darmezu budDiH
   pravartate / tatra kācidbuddhiḥ saṃkleśaṃ parigṛhṇāti,	pravartate / tatra kAcid budDiH saMkleSam parigRhNAti,
   kācidbuddhirvyavadānaṃ parigṛhṇāti / tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra	kAcid budDiH vyavadAnam parigRhNAti / tasmAt tarhi Ayuzman SAriputra
   sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā, sārambaṇameva karmotpadyate na	sa ArambaNa eva cetanA utpadyate na anArambaNA, sArambaNam eva karma utpadyate na
   anārambaṇam / śāriputra āha   yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni	anArambaNam / SAriputraH Aha  yat Ayuzman suBUte sarva ArambaNAni viviktAni
   ākhyātāni bhagavatā, tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva	AKyAtAni BagavatA, tadA kasmAt Ayuzman suBUte sa ArambaNa eva
   cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā? subhūtirāha   nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra	cetanA utpadyate na anArambaNA? suBUtiH Aha  nimittIkRtya Ayuzman SAriputra
   vidyamānamevārambaṇamārambaṇīkṛtya sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate, na	vidyamAnam eva ArambaNam ArambaNIkRtya sa ArambaNa eva cetanA utpadyate, na
   anārambaṇā / cetanāpyāyuṣman śāriputra viviktā, nimittam api viviktam /	anArambaNAH / cetanA api Ayuzman SAriputra viviktA, nimittam api viviktam /
   evamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā api viviktāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamapi,	evam avidyA pratyayAH saMskArAH api viviktAH, saMskAra pratyayam vijQAnam api,
   yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam api viviktam / evameva āyuṣman śāriputra	yAvat jAti pratyayam jarA maraNam api viviktam / evam eva Ayuzman SAriputra
   sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni / nimittena viviktā cetanā	sarva ArambaNAni viviktAni / nimittena viviktA cetanA
   lokavyavahāramupādāyotpadyata iti //	loka vyavahAram upAdAya utpadyate iti //
   śāriputra āha   yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato	SAriputraH Aha  yat Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH svapna antara gataH 
   dānaṃ dadyāt, tacca dānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /	dAnam dadyAt, tat ca dAnam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayati /
   pariṇāmitaṃ kiṃ taddānaṃ vaktavyam? subhūtirāha   ayamāyuṣman śāriputra	pariNAmitam kim tat dAnam vaktavyam? suBUtiH Aha  ayam Ayuzman SAriputra
   maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ / eṣa tathāgatena vyākṛto	mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH saMmuKIBUtaH / eza taTAgatena vyAkRtaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / eṣo 'trārthe kāyasākṣī / eṣa praṣṭavyaḥ /	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / ezaH atra arTe kAya sAkzI / eza prazwavyaH /
   eṣa enamarthaṃ visarjayiṣyati / atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ	ezaH enam arTam visarjayizyati / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH mEtreyam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat   ayamāyuṣman maitreya subhūtiḥ	boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat  ayam Ayuzman mEtreya suBUtiH
   sthavira evamāha   mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / eṣa enamarthaṃ	sTaviraH evam Aha  mayam mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / ezaH enam arTam
   visarjayiṣyatīti / visarjaya āyuṣmannajita enamartham / atha khalu	visarjayizyati iti / visarjaya Ayuzman= ajitaH enam arTam / aTa Kalu
   maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   yadāyuṣmān	mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yat AyuzmAn
   subhūtirevamāha   ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / eṣa enamarthaṃ	suBUtiH evam Aha  ayam mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / ezaH enam arTam
   visarjayiṣyatīti / kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya	visarjayizyati iti / kim punar Ayuzman suBUte yat etat nAmaDeyam mEtreya
   iti? etadenamarthaṃ visarjayiṣyati, uta rūpaṃ visarjayiṣyati, uta vedanā	iti? etat enam arTam visarjayizyati, uta rUpam visarjayizyati, uta vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, atha vijñānaṃ visarjayiṣyati, utāho varṇo	saMjQA saMskArAH, aTa vijQAnam visarjayizyati, uta aho varNaH 
   visarjayiṣyati, atha saṃsthānaṃ visarjayiṣyati, utāho yā rūpasya śūnyatā,	visarjayizyati, aTa saMsTAnam visarjayizyati, uta aho yAH rUpasya SUnyatA,
   sā visarjayiṣyati? evaṃ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, (Vaidya 178)	sA visarjayizyati? evam yAH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm, (VEdyaH 178)
   yā vijñānasya śūnyatā, sā visarjayiṣyati? yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte	yA vijQAnasya SUnyatA, sA visarjayizyati? yA Kalu punar Ayuzman suBUte
   rūpasya śūnyatā, na sā pratibalā visarjayitum / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ	rUpasya SUnyatA, na sA pratibalAH visarjayitum / evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH
   saṃskārāṇām / yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā, na sā	saMskArANAm / yA Kalu punar Ayuzman suBUte vijQAnasya SUnyatA, na sA
   pratibalā visarjayitum / tamapyahamāyuṣman subhūte dharmaṃ na	pratibalA visarjayitum / tam api aham Ayuzman suBUte Darmam na
   samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo visarjayet / tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,	samanupaSyAmi, yaH DarmaH visarjayet / tam api aham Darmam na samanupaSyAmi,
   yo dharmo visarjayitavyaḥ / tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yena	yaH DarmaH visarjayitavyaH / tam api aham Darmam na samanupaSyAmi, yena

   vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //	vyAkRtaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO //

   vācā bhāṣase? maitreya āha   na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ	vAcA BAzase? mEtreyaH Aha  na mayA Ayuzman SAriputraH ete DarmAH evam
   sākṣātkṛtāḥ, yathainān vācā bhāṣe / evamapyahamenānāyuṣman śāriputra	sAkzAtkRtAH, yaTA enAn vAcA BAze / evam api aham enAn Ayuzman SAriputra
   dharmānna vedmi, nopalabhe, na samanupaśyāmi, yathā vācā bhāṣe, cittena vā	DarmAt na vedmi, na upalaBe, na samanupaSyAmi, yaTA vAcA BAze, cittena vA
   cintayāmi / api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta, na	cintayAmi / api tu Kalu punar Ayuzman SAriputra na kAyena spRSyeta, na
   vācā bhāṣyeta, na manasā samanvāhriyeta / evaṃsvabhāvāḥ sarve dharmā	vAcA BAzya ita, na manasA samanvAhriyeta / evaMsvaBAvAH sarve DarmA
   asvabhāvatvāt / atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt   gambhīraprajño	asvaBAva tvAt / aTa Kalu AyuzmataH SAriputrasya etat aBUt  gamBIra prajQaH

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritāvī nirdiśati //	prajQApAramitAyAm caritAvI nirdiSati //
   atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma   kutaste	aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram Amantrayate sma  kutas te

   mahāsattva iti? samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa	mahAsattvaH iti? samanupaSyasi tvam SAriputra tam Darmam yena DarmeNa

   bhagavānāha   evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	BagavAn Aha  evam eva SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati   ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH na evam Bavati  ayam DarmaH vyAkRtaH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, ayaṃ dharmo vyākariṣyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,	samyaksaMboDO, ayam DarmaH vyAkarizyate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO,

   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate / evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyate / evam caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām / sa carannotrasyati, na saṃtrasyati, na	prajQApAramitAyAm / sa carannotrasyati, na saMtrasyati, na

   yogamāpadyate / sacedevaṃ carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //	yogam Apadyate / saced evam carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm //
   punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	punar aparam SAriputra vyAla kAntAra maDya gatena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   notrasitavyam, na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ?	na utrasitavyam, na saMtrasitavyam, na saMtrAsam Apattavyam / tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ	taTA hi tena boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarvam parityaktavyam
   sarvasattvānāmarthāya / tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam   yadi cenmāṃ vyālā	sarva sattvAnAm arTAya / tena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam  yadi ced mAm vyAlA
   bhakṣayeyuḥ, tebhya eva taddānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu / mama ca	BakzayeyuH, teByaH eva tat dAnam dattam Bavatu / mama ca

   sarvasvaparityāgakuśalābhiratā hi (Vaidya 179) bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	sarva sva parityAga kuSala aBiratA hi (VEdyaH 179) boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   bhavanti / utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ	Bavanti / utsRzwa kAyena api ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena Bavitavyam
   parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena / tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam  	parityakta sarva parizkAra upakaraNena / tena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam  
   sacenmama sattvāḥ sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni hareyuḥ, tebhya eva taddānaṃ	saced mama sattvAH sarva parizkAra upakaraNAni hareyuH, teByaH eva tad dAnam
   dattaṃ bhavatu / yadi cenmāṃ kecijjīvitādvyaparopayeyuḥ, tatra na mayā	dattam Bavatu / yadi ced mAm kecid jIvitAt vyaparopayeyuH, tatra na mayA
   vyāpādakrodharoṣā utpādayitavyāḥ / teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na	vyApAda kroDa rozAH utpAdayitavyAH / tezAm api ca mayA na kAyena na vAcA na
   manasā aparāddhavyam / evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca	manasA aparAdhavyam / evam ca me tasmin samaye dAna pAramitA ca

   samyaksaṃbodhirabhyāsannībhaviṣyati / tathā ca kariṣyāmi, tathā ca	samyaksaMboDiH aByAsannIBavizyati / taTA ca karizyAmi, taTA ca
   pratipatsye, yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya	pratipatsye, yaTA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya
   sataścorakāntārāṇy api tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ	sataH cora kAntArANi api tasmin budDa kzetre sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam
   na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante / tathā ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye	na Bavizyanti, na prajQAsyante / taTA ca budDa kzetra pariSudDaye
   vyāpatsye, yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin	vyApatsye, yaTA me anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya sataH tasmin
   buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na	budDa kzetre ete ca anye ca dozAH sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam na
   bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante //	Bavizyanti, na prajQAsyante //
   punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena	punar aparam SAriputram pAnIya kAntAra maDya gatena boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /	mahAsattvena na utrasitavyam na saMtrasitavyam na saMtrAsam Apattavyam /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃtrastānutrastadharmāṇo hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	tat kasya hetoH? asaMtrasta anutraH taDarmANaH hi boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   bhavanti / evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam   sarvasattvānāṃ mayā	Bavanti / evam ca anena cittam utpAdayitavyam  sarva sattvAnAm mayA
   sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam / na ca bodhisattvena	sarva tRzNA A= CedAya Sikzitavyam / na ca boDisattvena
   mahāsattvenotrasitavyam, na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /	mahAsattvena utrasitavyam, na saMtrasitavyam, na saMtrAsam Apattavyam /
   sacedahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi, pretaloke mamopapattirbhaviṣyatīti /	saced aham tRzNayA kAlam karizyAmi, preta loke mama upapattiH Bavizyati iti /

   prajñāyante / tathā punarahaṃ kariṣyāmi, tathā pratipatsye, yathā me	prajQAyante / taTA punar aham karizyAmi, taTA pratipatsye, yaTA me
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya sataH tasmin budDa kzetre sarveNa

   'mī bhaviṣyanti / tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,	amI Bavizyanti / taTA ca dRXam vIryam Arapsye sarva sattvAnAm kRtaSas ,

   bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya (Vaidya 182) tathāgatasyārhataḥ	BaginyAH dIpaMkarasya (VEdyaH 182) taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitam,	samyaksaMbudDasya antike praTama citta utpAda kuSala mUlam avaropitam,
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitaṃ ca / sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmitam ca / sa ca dIpaMkaraH taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ	arhan samyaksaMbudDaH suvarNa puzpEH eva avakIrNaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   prārthayamānayā / yadā mayā pañcabhirutpalairdīpaṃkarastathāgato 'rhan	prArTayamAnayA / yadA mayA paQcaBiH utpalEH dIpaMkaraH taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddho 'vakīrṇaḥ, anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ	samyaksaMbudDaH avakIrNaH, anutpattikezu ca mayA Darmezu kzAntiH
   pratilabdhā, tato 'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	pratilabDA, tatas aham dIpaMkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena

   vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi   aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya	vyAkaraNam SrutvA evam cittam udapAdi  aho bata aham api evam vyAkriyeya

   bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ	Bagavan kRta paryantA gaFgadevA BaginI vyAkRtAH anuttarAyAm

   ekonaviṃśatitamaḥ //	ekonaviMSatitamaH //
   (Vaidya 183)	(VEdyaH 183)
   ASP_20: upāyakauśalyamīmāṃsāparivarto viṃśatitamaḥ /	ASP_20: upAya kOSalya mImAMsA parivartaH viMSatitamaH /

   tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ / evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	tatra api niSritaH na pratizWitaH / evam eva suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati, śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti, ānimittavihāreṇa ca	SUnyatA vihAreNa viharati, SUnyatAyAm parijayam karoti, Animitta vihAreNa ca
   viharati, ānimitte ca parijayaṃ karoti, apraṇihitavihāreṇa ca viharati,	viharati, Animitte ca parijayam karoti, apraNihita vihAreNa ca viharati,
   apraṇihite ca parijayaṃ karoti / na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā	apraNihite ca parijayam karoti / na ca SUnyatAyAm vA Animitte vA
   apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte	apraNihite vA patati aparipUrNEH budDa DarmEH / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ / sa	bala vAn izvastra AcAryaH izu astra SikzAyAm su SikzitaH su parinizWitaH / sa
   ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣipet / ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ	UrDvam kANxam kzipet / UrDvam kANxam kziptvA tad anyEH kANxEH tad kANxam
   bhūmau patat pratinivārayet, vārayet, tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya	BUmO patat pratinivArayet, vArayet, tasya pOrvakasya kANxasya
   kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt, tāvattatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau na patat,	kANxa paraMparayA BUmO patanam na dadyAt, tAvat tat kANxam BUmO na patat,
   yāvannākāṅkṣet   aho batedaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patediti / evameva subhūte	yAvat na AkAFkzet  aho bata idam kANxam BUmO patet iti / evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran upAya kOSalya parigRhItaH
   tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti, yāvanna tāni	tAvat tAm paramAm BUtakowim na sAkzAtkaroti, yAvat na tAni
   kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni / yadā	kuSala mUlAni anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO paripakvAni su paripakvAni / yadA

   pratyavekṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā, na ca sākṣātkartavyā //	pratyavekzitavyA upaniDyAtavyA, na ca sAkzAtkartavyA //

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / paramaduṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / parama duzkara kArakaH Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ, yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati, śūnyatayā ca viharati, śūnyatāṃ ca	mahAsattvaH, yaH SUnyatAyAm carati, SUnya tayA ca viharati, SUnyatAm ca
   samādhiṃ samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti / atyāścaryamidaṃ	samADim samApadyate, na ca BUtakowim sAkzAtkaroti / ati AScaryam idam

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / parama duzkara kArakaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yaH
   śūnyatāyāṃ carati, śūnyatāyāṃ ca viharati, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhiṃ	SUnyatAyAm carati, SUnyatAyAm ca viharati, SUnyatAm ca samADim
   samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi	samApadyate, na ca BUtakowim sAkzAtkaroti / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ / tasyeme	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sarva sattvAH aparityaktAH / tasya ime

   iti / yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati   sarvasattvā	iti / yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam cittam aBinirharati  sarva sattvA

   parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ / tatkasya	parihIyate mEtrI samADitaH na karuNA m udita upekzA samADitaH / tat kasya

   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati  	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evam Bavati

   śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ / tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ	SuBa saMjQayA ca viparyastAH / taTA karizyAmi yaTA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya nitya saMjQAyAH suKa saMjQAyAH Atma saMjQAyAH

   anityametatsarvaṃ na nityamiti / duḥkhametatsarvaṃ na sukhamiti /	anityam etat sarvam na nityam iti / duHKam etat sarvam na suKam iti /

   / so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena	/ saH anena citta utpAdena samanvAgataH pOrvakeNa ca upAya kOSalyena

   samādhivimokṣamukhamupasaṃpadya viharati / na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti /	samADi vimokza muKam upasaMpadya viharati / na ca BUtakowim sAkzAtkaroti /
   na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā /	na ca parihIyate mEtrI itaH vA karuNA ataH vA mudita atas vA upekzAtaH vA /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā	tat kasya hetoH? upAya kOSalya parigRhItaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH BUyasyA

   yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,	yaH hi kaScid suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imam citta utpAdam utpAdayati,
   ityapīme sattvā dīrgharātramupalambhe caritāvinaḥ etarhyupalambhe caranti	iti api ime sattvAH dIrGarAtram upalamBe caritAvinaH etarhi upalamBe caranti
   / nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /	/ nimitta saMjQAyAm caritAvinaH etarhi api nimitta saMjQAyAm caranti /
   viparyāse caritāvinaḥ etarhy api viparyāse caranti / piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ	viparyAse caritAvinaH etarhi api viparyAse caranti / piNxa saMjQAyAm
   caritāvinaḥ etarhy api piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti / abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ	caritAvinaH etarhi api piNxa saMjQAyAm caranti / aBUta saMjQAyAm
   caritāvinaḥ etarhy api abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti / mithyādṛṣṭau caritāvinaḥ	caritAvinaH etarhi api aBUta saMjQAyAm caranti / miTyA dRzwO caritAvinaH
   etarhy api mithyādṛṣṭau caranti / tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ	etarhi api miTyA dRzwO caranti / taTA karizyAmi yaTA ezAm ete dozAH
   sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante / ityevaṃ	sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam na Bavizyanti, na prajQAsyante / iti evam
   sarvasattvān samanvāharati / evaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena	sarva sattvAn samanvAharati / evam ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anena
   smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena ca	smRti samanvAhAreNa anena citta utpAdena samanvAgataH upAya kOSalyena ca
   samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ	samanvAgataH prajQApAramitayA ca parigRhItaH evam etezAm gamBIrANAm
   dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā	DarmANAm Darma tAm pratyavekzamANaH SUnya tAtaH vA AnimittataH vA
   apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā /	apraNihitataH vA anaBisaMskArataH vA anutpAdataH vA ajAtitas vE aBAvataH vA /
   asthānametatsubhūte 'navakāśaḥ, yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ	asTAnam etat suBUte anavakASaH, yat sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam
   jñānasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā patet, traidhātukena vā sārdhaṃ	jQAna samanvAgataH anaBisaMskAre vA patet, trEDAtukena vA sArDam
   saṃvaset, naitatsthānaṃ vidyate //	saMvaset, na etat sTAnam vidyate //
   evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripraṣṭavyo bodhisattvena	evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pariprazwavyaH boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena   katameṣāṃ	mahAsattvena anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmena  katamezAm
   dharmāṇāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ? kiyadrūpāṇi ca cittānyabhinirhartavyāni?	DarmANAm parijayaH kartavyaH? kiyat rUpANi ca cittAni aBinirhartavyAni?
   yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,	yAni cittAni aBinirharan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na SUnyatAm sAkzAtkaroti,
   na ānimittaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na apraṇihitaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na anabhisaṃskāraṃ	na Animittam sAkzAtkaroti, na apraNihitam sAkzAtkaroti, na anaBisaMskAram
   sākṣātkaroti, na anutpādaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na ajātiṃ sākṣātkaroti, na	sAkzAtkaroti, na anutpAdam sAkzAtkaroti, na ajAtim sAkzAtkaroti, na
   abhāvaṃ sākṣātkaroti, prajñāpāramitāṃ ca bhāvayati / sacetsubhūte	aBAvam sAkzAtkaroti, prajQApAramitAm ca BAvayati / saced suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam pRzwaH evam vyAkaroti
     śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā / ānimittameva	 SUnyatA eva boDisattvena mahAsattvena manasi kartavyA / Animittam eva
   apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva	apraNihitam eva anaBisaMskAraH eva anutpAdaH eva ajAtiH eva aBAvaH eva
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti / sacettaṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena manasi kartavyaH iti / saced tam
   sarvasattvāparityāgacittotpādaṃ nopadarśayet, upāyakauśalyaṃ vā na	sarva sattva aparityAga citta utpAdam na upadarSayet, upAya kOSalyam vA na
   vyākuryāt, veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	vyAkuryAt, veditavyam etat suBUte na ayam vyAkRtaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO= avinivartanIya tve tEH
   paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? yo	pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH / tat kasya hetoH? yaH 
   hyasāvavinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmaḥ, taṃ	hi asO= avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya AveNikaH DarmaH, tam
   dharmaṃ na sūcayati, na prabhāvayati, nopadarśayati, na prajānāti,	Darmam na sUcayati, na praBAvayati, na upadarSayati, na prajAnAti,
   paripṛṣṭo na vyākaroti, na visarjayati, na tāṃ bhūmimavakrāmayati, yo	paripRzwaH na vyAkaroti, na visarjayati, na tAm BUmim avakrAmayati, yaH 
   'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhūmiriti //	avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya BUmiH iti //
   subhūtirāha   syātpunarbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo	suBUtiH Aha  syAt punar Bagavan paryAyaH yena paryAyeNa boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo (Vaidya 188) bhavet? bhagavānāha   syātsubhūte	mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH (VEdyaH 188) Bavet? BagavAn Aha  syAt suBUte
   sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavet	sa paryAyaH yena paryAyeNa sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIyaH Bavet 
   / sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va	/ saced boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imAm prajQApAramitAm SrutvA vA aSrutvA va
   evaṃ pratipadyeta, evaṃ visarjayet   avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	evam pratipadyeta, evam visarjayet  avinivartanIyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   veditavyaḥ / subhūtirāha   tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhāya caranti /	veditavyaH / suBUtiH Aha  tena hi Bagavan bahavaH boDAya caranti /
   alpakāḥ punarya evaṃ visarjayanti / bhagavānāha   tathā hi subhūte	alpakAH punar yaH evam visarjayanti / BagavAn Aha  taTA hi suBUte
   alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau	alpakAH te boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye vyAkRtAH avinivartanIyAyAm jQAna BUmO
   / ye punaste vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti, te evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti / te te	/ ye punar te vyAkRtAH Bavizyanti, te evam visarjayizyanti / te te
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā uttaptāvaropitakuśalamūlā veditavyāḥ / te te	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH uttapta avaropita kuSala mUlAH veditavyAH / te te
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena / sacetpunaḥ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH asaMhAryAH sa deva mAnuza asureNa lokena / saced punar 
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi svapnopamāḥ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH svapna antara gataH api svapna upamAH
   sarvadharmā iti vyavalokayati, na ca sākṣātkaroti, idam api subhūte	sarva DarmAH iti vyavalokayati, na ca sAkzAt karoti, idam api suBUte
   avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ	avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya avinivartanIya lakzaNam
   veditavyam //	veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH svapna antara gataH api

   spṛhāmanuśaṃsācittaṃ notpādayati, idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya	spRhAm anuSaMsA cittam na utpAdayati, idam api suBUte avinivartanIyasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya avinivartanIya lakzaNam veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH svapna antara gataH 
   'pyanekaśatāyāḥ parṣado 'nekasahasrāyā yāvadanekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāyāḥ	api aneka SatAyAH parzadaH aneka sahasrAyAH yAvat aneka kowI niyuta Sata sahasrAyAH
   parṣado madhyagataṃ maṇḍalamāle niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ	parzadaH maDya gatam maNxala mAle nizaNNam Bikzu saMGa parivRtam

   samyaksaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ paśyati / idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya	samyaksaMbudDam AtmAnam paSyati / idam api suBUte avinivartanIyasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya avinivartanIya lakzaNam veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH svapna antara gataH api

   saṃjānīte, tāṃś ca bhikṣūnabhinirmimīte, ye 'nyāsu dikṣu gatvā anyeṣu	saMjAnIte, tAn ca BikzUn aBinirmimIte, ye anyAsu dikzu gatvA anyezu
   lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti, dharmaṃ ca deśayanti / evam api subhūte	lokaDAtuzu budDa kRtyam kurvanti, Darmam ca deSayanti / evam api suBUte

   api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	api suBUte avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //	avinivartanIya lakzaNam veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo notrasyati, na	punar aparam suBUte svapna antara gataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na utrasyati, na
   saṃtrasyati, na saṃtrāsamāpadyate / grāmaghāte vā nagaraghāte vā	saMtrasyati, na saMtrAsam Apadyate / grAma GAte vA nagara GAte vA
   nigamaghāte vā janapadaghāte vā rāṣṭraghāte vā agnidāhe vā vartamāne	nigama GAte vA janapada GAte vA rAzwra GAte vE agni dAhe vA vartamAne
   vyālamṛgān vā tato 'nyān api vā kṣudramṛgajātīn dṛṣṭvā śiraśchede vā	vyAla mRgAn vA tatas anyAn api vA kzudra mRga jAtIn dRzwvA SiraH Cede vA
   pratyupasthite tato 'nyāny api vā mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhadaurmanasyāni	pratyupasTite tatas anyAni api vA mahA Baya BEravANi duHKa dOrmanasyAni
   vā prāpya tato 'nyeṣām api vā sattvānāṃ mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhāni	vA prApya tatas anyezAm api vA sattvAnAm mahA Baya BEravANi duHKAni
   dṛṣṭvā nāsya bhayabhairavamutpadyate, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na	dRzwvA na asya Baya BEravam utpadyate, na utrasyati na saMtrasyati na
   saṃtrāsamāpadyate / tataś ca svapnāntarātprativibuddhasya	saMtrAsam Apadyate / tatas ca svapna antarAt prativibudDasya
   samanantaravyutthitasyaivaṃ bhavati   svapnopamamidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukam	samanantara vyutTitasya evam Bavati  svapna upamam idam sarvam trEDAtukam
   / evaṃ ca mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samyagdeśayatā	/ evam ca mayA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya samyak deSayatA
   dharmo deśayitavya iti / idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya	DarmaH deSayitavyaH iti / idam api suBUte avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //	mahAsattvasya avinivartanIya lakzaNam veditavyam //
   (Vaidya 189) punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya	(VEdyaH 189) punar aparam suBUte avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasya nairayikān sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati  	mahAsattvasya svapna antara gatasya nErayikAn sattvAn dRzwvA evam Bavati  
   tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya	taTA karizyAmi yaTA me anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya
   buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na	budDa kzetre sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam sarve api apAyAH na
   bhaviṣyantīti / idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya	Bavizyanti iti / idam api suBUte avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //	mahAsattvasya apAya pariSudDi lakzaNam veditavyam //
   tatra subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyeta asyāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya	tatra suBUte kaTam vijQAyeta asya avinivartanIyasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre	mahAsattvasya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya budDa kzetre

   sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi	saced suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH svapna antara gataH api
   nirayagatāṃstiryakpretagatān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhate / sa	niraya gatAn= tiryak preta gatAn vA sattvAn dRzwvA smRtim pratilaBate / sa
   tāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhya evaṃ cintayati   tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ	tAm smRtim pratilaByaH evam cintayati  taTA karizyAmi yaTA me anuttarAm

   mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam / idam api subhūte	mahAsattvasya apAya pariSudDi lakzaNam veditavyam / idam api suBUte
   avivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ	avivartanIyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya avinivartanIya lakzaNam
   veditavyam //	veditavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nagaradāhe vā	punar aparam suBUte svapna antara gataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH nagara dAhe vA
   grāmadāhe vā vartamāne prativibuddhaḥ saṃstataḥ svapnādevaṃ samanvāharati	grAma dAhe vA vartamAne prativibudDaH san= tataH svapnAt evam samanvAharati
   yathā   mayā svapnāntaragatena ye ākārāḥ yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni	yaTA  mayA svapna antara gatena ye AkArAH yAni liFgAni yAni nimittAni
   dṛṣṭāni, yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittairavivartanīyo bodhisattvo	dRzwA ani, yEH AkArEH yEH liFgEH yEH nimittEH avivartanIyaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo dhārayitavyaḥ, te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama	mahAsattvaH DArayitavyaH, te AkArAH tAni liFgAni tAni nimittAni mama
   saṃvidyante / etena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāho vā grāmadāho vā	saMvidyante / etena satyena satya vacanena ayam nagara dAhaH vA grAma dAhaH vA
   vartamāna upaśāmyatu, śītibhavatu, astaṃ gacchatu / sacetsubhūte grāmadāho	vartamAnaH upaSAmyatu, SIti Bavatu, astam gacCatu / saced suBUte grAma dAhaH 
   vā nagaradāho vā upaśāmyati, śītībhavati, astaṃ gacchati,	vA nagara dAhaH vA upaSAmyati, SItIBavati, astam gacCati,
   veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ	veditavyam etat suBUte vyAkRtaH ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tEH
   paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairavinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ	pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH avinivartanIyaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheriti / sacennopaśāmyati, na śītībhavati, nāstaḥ gacchati,	samyaksaMboDeH iti / saced na upaSAmyati, na SItIBavati, na astaH gacCati,
   veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ	veditavyam etat suBUte na ayam vyAkRtaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhāviti / sacetpunaḥ subhūte so 'gnidāho 'tikramya gṛhādgṛhaṃ	samyaksaMboDO= iti / saced punar suBUte saH agnidAhaH atikramya gRhAt gRham
   rathyāyā rathyāmanyatarānyatarāṃ rathyāṃ vā gṛhaṃ vā gacchati, dahati,	raTyAyAH raTyAm anyatara anyatarAm raTyAm vA gRham vA gacCati, dahati,
   nopaśāmyati, na śītībhavati, nāstaṃ gacchati, veditavyametatsubhūte	na upaSAmyati, na SItIBavati, na astam gacCati, veditavyam etat suBUte
   dharmapratyākhyānaṃ duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	Darma pratyAKyAnam duzprajQa saMvartanIyam tena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   karmopacitam / tato 'syaitaddṛṣṭadharmasaṃvartanīyameva karma vipacyate /	karma upacitam / tatas asya etat dRzwa Darma saMvartanIyam eva karma vipacyate /

   subhūte heturayaṃ pratyayo 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	suBUte hetuH ayam pratyayaH asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   avinivartanīyalakṣaṇatāyā iti / ayam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	avinivartanIya lakzaNa tAyAH iti / ayam api suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //	avinivartanIyaH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH DArayitavyaH //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittairavinivartanīyo	punar aparam suBUte yEH AkArEH yEH liFgEH yEH nimittEH avinivartanIyaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyaḥ, tānākārāṃstāni liṅgāni tāni	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DArayitavyaH, tAn AkArAn= tAni liFgAni tAni
   nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi / tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca śṛṇu, manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye	nimittAni deSayizyAmi / tat sADu ca suzWu ca SRNu, manasi kuru, BAzizye
   'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavannityāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /	aham te / sADu Bagavan= iti AyuzmAn suBUtiH BagavataH pratyaSrOzIt /
   bhagavānetadavocat   sacetsubhūte kaścideva puruṣo vā strī vā dārako vā	BagavAn etat avocat  saced suBUte kaScid eva puruzaH vA strI vA dArakaH vA
   dārikā vā (Vaidya 190) amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto bhavedāviṣṭaḥ / tatra	dArikA vA (VEdyaH 190) amanuzyeNa gRhItaH Bavet AvizwaH / tatra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upasaṃkramya evamadhiṣṭhānaṃ samanvāhartavyam /	boDisattvena mahAsattvena upasaMkramya evam aDizWAnam samanvAhartavyam /
   sacedahaṃ haiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairvyākṛto	saced aham hEH pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH vyAkRtaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, pariśuddho me 'dhyāśayaḥ anuttarāṃ	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO, pariSudDaH me aDyASayaH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum / yathāhamanuttarāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum / yaTA aham anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ, pariśuddho me manasikāro 'nuttarāyāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmaH, pariSudDaH me manasikAraH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau / apagataṃ me śrāvakacittaṃ pratyekabuddhacittaṃ ca, tena	samyaksaMboDO / apagatam me SrAvaka cittam pratyekabudDa cittam ca, tena
   mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhavyā / nāhaṃ nānuttarāṃ	mayA anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbodDavyA / na aham na anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye / abhisaṃbhotsya evāhamanuttarāṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsye / aBisaMBotsyaH eva aham anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim / ye 'pi te aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā	samyaksaMboDim / ye api te aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu budDA
   bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, na teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante yApayanti, na tezAm taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā	samyaksaMbudDAnAm kiMcid ajQAtam vA adRzwam vA aviditam vA asAkzAt kRtam vA
   anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā / yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanto mamādhyāśayam  	anaBisaMbudDam vA / yaTA te budDAH BagavantaH jAnantaH mama aDyASayam  
   ityapyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti / anena satyena	iti api aham anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsye iti / anena satyena
   satyavacanena iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā yena	satya vacanena iyam strI vA puruzaH vA dArakaH vA dArikA vA yena

   (Vaidya 193) punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena	(VEdyaH 193) punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena nAma apadeSena

   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti, tathā	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya sataH idam nAmaDeyam Bavet iti, taTA
   tena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭamiti / sa evaṃ yacca nāmadheyaṃ svayamanuvicintitam,	tena BikzuNA nirdizwam iti / saH evam yat ca nAmaDeyam svayam anuvicintitam,
   yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena	yat ca tena mAreNa pApIyasA mArakAyikABiH vA devatABiH aBinirmitena
   mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam, tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā	mAra aDizWitena vA BikzuNA nAmaDeyam udIritam, tat uBayam tulayitvA yaTA
   ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ, yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama	ca mama citta utpAdaH utpannaH, yaTA ca anena BikzuNA nirdizwam mama
   nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā, nāmavyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ	nAmaDeyam sameti nAmnA, nAma vyAkRtaH aham tEH
   paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ	pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhāviti maṃsyate / yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ	samyaksaMboDO= iti maMsyate / yAni ca mayA suBUte avinivartanIyAnAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni, tāni tasya	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm AkArA liFgAni nimittAni AKyAta ani, tAni tasya
   na bhaviṣyanti / sa tairvirahito 'nena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena	na Bavizyanti / sa tEH virahitaH anena nAma apadeSena nAma vyAkaraNena
   manyanāmutpādayiṣyati / sa manyanāmutpādya tato 'nyān bodhisattvān	manyanAm utpAdayizyati / sa manyanAm utpAdya tatas anyAn boDisattvAn
   mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate   ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, naite	mahAsattvAn avamaMsyate  aham vyAkRtaH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO, na ete
   vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti / evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena	vyAkRtAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO= iti / evam sa tena mAnena atimAnena

   buddhajñānam / tasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya	budDa jQAnam / tasya prajQApAramitayA aparigRhItasya
   upāyakauśalyavirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya	upAya kOSalya virahitasya kalyANa mitra virahitasya pApa mitra parigRhItasya
   dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā   śrāvakabhūmirvā	dvayoH BUmyoH anyatarA BUmiH pratikAFkzitavyA  SrAvaka BUmiH vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā / sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya	pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA / saced punar ciram su ciram saMDAvya saMsRtya
   enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo	enAm eva prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmaH 
   bhavet, yadi cāsāvupasarpet kalyāṇamitrāṇi, abhīkṣṇaṃ ca	Bavet, yadi ca asO= upasarpet kalyANa mitrANi, aBIkzNam ca

   bhaviṣyati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya	Bavizyati / tat kasya hetoH? tAvat gurutaram hi suBUte boDisattvasya

   śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti, yato	SrAvaka yAnikasya SrAvaka BUmO catasraH mUla ApattayaH gurvyaH Bavanti, yatas 
   'nyatarānyatarā māpattimadhyāpadya abhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo 'śākyaputrīyaḥ,	anyatara anyatarA mA Apattim aDyApadya aBikzurBavati aSramaNaH aSAkya putrIyaH,

   mānacittotpādaḥ, yaduta nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya	mAna citta utpAdaH, yat uta nAma apadeSena boDisattvasya

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena mānasahagataścittotpāda utpannaḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya nAma apadeSena mAna sahagataH citta utpAdaH utpannaH

   mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante / tāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena boddhavyāni /	mAra karmANi utpatsyante / tAni boDisattvena mahAsattvena bodDavyAni /

   tathāgato varṇavādī araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādiṣu	taTAgataH varNa vAdI araNya vana prasTa giri guhA SmaSAna palAla puQja Adizu
   vihartavyamiti / na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ	vihartavyam iti / na ca aham suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evaMviDam
   vivekaṃ vadāmi, yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni	vivekam vadAmi, yat uta AraNyakAni prAntAni Sayana AsanAni vijana padAni
   viviktāni, vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni //	viviktAni, viviDAni vana prasTa giri guhA SmaSAna palAla puQja AdIni //
   subhūtirāha   katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo	suBUtiH Aha  katamaH punar sa Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya anyaH 
   viveko yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni	vivekaH yadi vA AraNyakAni prAntAni Sayana AsanAni vijanapadAni viviktAni

   nādhyāvasati, kiyadrūpaḥ punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānyo	na aDyAvasati, kiyat rUpaH punar Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya anyaH 
   vivekaḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   sacetsubhūte	vivekaH? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  saced suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH viviktaH Bavati SrAvaka pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH,

   vivekamupadekṣyati	vivekam upadekzyati

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayasaṃprasthito 'dhyāśayasaṃpanno viharati /	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH aDyASaya saMprasTitaH aDyASaya saMpannaH viharati /

   saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti, na viviktavihāreṇa /	saMkIrNa vihAreNa bata ime AyuzmantaH viharanti, na vivikta vihAreNa /

   / ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti, tān	/ ye te boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH vivikta vihAreNa viharanti, tAn

   saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharanti, tān sa viviktavihāreṇa samudācariṣyati, tatra	saMkIrNa vihAreNa viharanti, tAn sa vivikta vihAreNa samudAcarizyati, tatra

   smārye / eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi / kaṃ	smArye / eza suBUte vihAraH yena aham vihAreNa viharAmi / kam
   grāmāntavihāriṇamamanuṣyāścodayiṣyanti, kaṃ grāmāntare viharantamamanuṣyāḥ	grAma anta vihAriNam amanuzyAH ca udayizyanti, kam grAma antare viharantam amanuzyAH
   smārayiṣyanti, ityevaṃ hi bodhisattvayānikān pudgalānavamaṃsyate / ayaṃ	smArayizyanti, iti evam hi boDisattva yAnikAn pudgalAnavamaMsyate / ayam
   subhūte bodhisattvacaṇḍālo veditavyaḥ, bodhisattvadūṣī veditavyaḥ,	suBUte boDisattva caNxAlaH veditavyaH, boDisattva dUzI veditavyaH,
   bodhisattvapratirūpako veditavyaḥ, bodhisattvaprativarṇiko veditavyaḥ,	boDisattva pratirUpakaH veditavyaH, boDisattva prativarNikaH veditavyaH,

   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām, cauraḥ sadevakasya lokasya / tajjātīyaḥ	boDisattva yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm, cOraH sa devakasya lokasya / tad jAtIyaH
   khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ	KaluH punar suBUte pudgalaH na sevitavyaH na BaktavyaH na paryupAsitavyaH
   / tatkasya hetoḥ? abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /	/ tat kasya hetoH? aBimAna patitAH hi te taTArUpAH pudgalAH veditavyAH /
   anyeṣām api tathārūpāṇāmalpa (Vaidya 196) sthāmānācirayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ	anyezAm api taTArUpANAm alpa (VEdyaH 196) sTAmAna acira yAna saMprasTitAnAm

   ekaviṃśatitamaḥ //	ekaviMSatitamaH //

   / dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ	/ dIrGarAtram sattvAH ahaMkAre mamakAre caranti / BagavAn Aha  tat kim
   manyase subhūte api nu ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau? subhūtirāha   śūnyau	manyase suBUte api nu ahaMkAra m amakArO SUnyO? suBUtiH Aha  SUnyO
   bhagavan, śūnyau sugata / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ahaṃkāreṇa	Bagavan, SUnyO sugataH / BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase suBUte ahaMkAreNa
   mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti? subhūtirāha   evametadbhagavan,	mamakAreNa ca sattvAH saMsAre saMsaranti? suBUtiH Aha  evam etat Bagavan ,
   evametatsugata / ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti /	evam etat sugata / ahaMkAreNa mamakAreNa ca sattvAH saMsAre saMsaranti /
   bhagavānāha   evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate / yathā	BagavAn Aha  evam Kalu suBUte sattvAnAm saMkleSaH prajQAyate / yaTA
   sattvānāmudgraho 'bhiniveśaḥ, tathā saṃkleśaḥ / na cātra (Vaidya 199)	sattvAnAm udgrahaH aBiniveSaH, taTA saMkleSaH / na ca atra (VEdyaH 199)
   kaścitsaṃkliśyate / yathā ca subhūte anudgaho 'nabhiniveśaḥ, tathā	kaScid saMkliSyate / yaTA ca suBUte anudgahaH anaBiniveSaH, taTA
   nāhaṃkāramamakārau prajñāyete / evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ	na ahaMkAra m amakArO prajQAyete / evam Kalu suBUte sarva sattvAnAm
   vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate / yathā sattvānāmanudgraho 'nabhiniveśaḥ, tathā	vyavadAnam prajQAyate / yaTA sattvAnAm anudgrahaH anaBiniveSaH, taTA
   vyavadānam / na cātra kaścidvyavadāyati / evaṃ khalu subhūte caran	vyavadAnam / na ca atra kaScid vyavadAyati / evam Kalu suBUte caran
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ khalu subhūte	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam Kalu suBUte
   sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo	sarva Darmezu viviktezu sarva Darmezu SUnyezu sattvAnAm saMkleSaH 
   vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate / subhūtirāha   āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadidaṃ	vyavadAnam ca prajQAyate / suBUtiH Aha  AScaryam Bagavan yAvat yat idam
   sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo	sarva Darmezu viviktezu sarva Darmezu SUnyezu sattvAnAm saMkleSaH 
   vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate / evaṃ ca bhagavaṃścaran bodhisattvo	vyavadAnam ca prajQAyate / evam ca Bagavan= caran boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ hi caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahAsattvaH carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam hi caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   na rūpe carati, na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu, na vijñāne carati	na rUpe carati, na vedanAyAm na saMjQAyAm na saMskAra izu, na vijQAne carati
   / evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati	/ evam caran Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anavamardanIyaH Bavati
   sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena / evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	sa deva mAnuza asureNa lokena / evam caran Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ	sarvezAm SrAvaka yAnikAnAm pratyekabudDa yAnikAnAm ca pudgalAnAm
   caryāmabhibhavati, anabhibhūtaṃ ca sthānaṃ pratilabhate / tatkasya hetoḥ?	caryAm aBiBavati, anaBiBUtam ca sTAnam pratilaBate / tat kasya hetoH?
   anabhibhūtaṃ hi bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ	anaBiBUtam hi Bagavan budDa tvam taTAgata tvam svayaMBU tvam
   sarvajñatvam / anenāpi bhagavan manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena	sarvajQa tvam / anena api Bagavat manasikAreNa prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktena
   vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet, āsannaḥ	vihAreNa viharan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH rAtriMdinAni ati nAmayet, AsannaH
   syādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ	syAt anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH, kzipram ca anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyeta / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam
   subhūtimetadavocat   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / evaṃ caran subhūte	suBUtim etat avocat  evam etat suBUte, evam etat / evam caran suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ hi caran subhūte	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam hi caran suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati, na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na rUpe carati, na vedanAyAm na saMjQAyAm na
   saṃskāreṣu, na vijñāne carati / evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	saMskAra izu, na vijQAne carati / evam caran suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena / evaṃ caran subhūte	anavamardanIyaH Bavati sa deva mAnuza asureNa lokena / evam caran suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvezAm SrAvaka yAnikAnAm pratyekabudDa yAnikAnAm
   ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati, anabhibhūtaṃ ca sthānaṃ pratilabhate /	ca pudgalAnAm caryAm aBiBavati, anaBiBUtam ca sTAnam pratilaBate /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? anabhibhūtaṃ hi subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ	tat kasya hetoH? anaBiBUtam hi suBUte budDa tvam taTAgata tvam
   svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam / anenāpi subhūte manasikāreṇa	svayaMBU tvam sarvajQa tvam / anena api suBUte manasikAreNa
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktena vihAreNa viharan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   rātriṃdinānyatināmayet, āsannaḥ syādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, kṣipraṃ	rAtriMdinAni ati nAmayet, AsannaH syAt anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH, kzipram
   ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta //	ca anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyeta //
   sacetkhalu punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, te sarve 'pūrvācaramaṃ	saced Kalu punar suBUte ye jambUdvIpe sattvAH, te sarve apUrva Acaramam
   mānuṣyakamātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran, mānuṣyakamātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya	mAnuzyakam Atma BAvam pratilaBeran, mAnuzyakam Atma BAvam pratilaBya
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeran, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdayeran, anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   cittamutpādya yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭheyuḥ, yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto yāvajjīvaṃ	cittam utpAdya yAvajjIvam tizWeyuH, yAvajjIvam tizWantaH yAvat jIvam
   sarvatathāgatān satkuryurgurukuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyurarcayeyurapacāyeyuḥ,	sarva taTAgatAn satkuryuH gurukuryuH mAnayeyuH pUjayeyuH arcayeyuH apacAyeyuH,
   evaṃ sarvasattvebhyo 'pi dānaṃ dadyuḥ, tacca dānamanuttarāyāṃ	evam sarva sattveByaH api dAnam dadyuH, tat ca dAnam anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayeyuḥ / tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te	samyaksaMboDO pariNAmayeyuH / tat kim manyase suBUte api nu te
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha  	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasaveyuH? suBUtiH Aha  
   bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha   ataḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte sa	bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  atas Kalu punar suBUte sa
   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati, yo bodhisattvo	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam prasavati, yaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'ntataḥ ekadivasam api	mahAsattvaH antatas eka divasam api
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairviharati / (Vaidya 200) tatkasya	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH viharati / (VEdyaH 200) tat kasya
   hetoḥ? yathā yathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	hetoH? yaTA yaTA hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivaṃ viharati, tathā tathā	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH rAtriMdivam viharati, taTA taTA
   sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte	sarva sattvAnAm dakziNIyatAm gacCati / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi suBUte
   nāsti tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tādṛśaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ cittam, yathā tasya	na asti tad anyezAm sattvAnAm tAdRSam mEtrI saha gatam cittam, yaTA tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, sthāpayitvā buddhān bhagavataḥ / tatkasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya, sTApayitvA budDAn BagavataH / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? apratipudgalā hi subhūte tathāgatāḥ / nirupamā hi subhūte	hetoH? apratipudgalAH hi suBUte taTAgatAH / nirupamA hi suBUte
   tathāgatāḥ / acintyadharmasamanvāgatā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ	taTAgatAH / acintya Darma samanvAgatAH hi suBUte taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ //	samyaksaMbudDAH //
   kathaṃ ca subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	kaTam ca suBUte sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   tāvattatpuṇyamabhinirharati? tādṛśyā subhūte prajñayā samanvāgataḥ sa	tAvat tat puNyam aBinirharati? tAdRSyA suBUte prajQayA samanvAgataH sa
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati, yādṛśyā prajñayā samanvāgato	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Bavati, yAdRSyA prajQayA samanvAgataH 
   vadhyagatāniva sarvasattvān paśyati / tena tasyāṃ velāyāṃ	vaDya gatAn iva sarva sattvAn paSyati / tena tasyAm velAyAm
   mahākaruṇāparigṛhīto bhavati / sa divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokayan	mahA karuNA parigRhItaH Bavati / sa divyena cakzuzA vyavalokayan
   aprameyānasaṃkhyeyānaparimeyānaparimāṇān sattvānānantaryakarmasamanvāgatān	aprameyAn asaMKyeyAna parimeyAna parimANAn sattvAn Anantarya karma samanvAgatAn
   paśyati, akṣaṇaprāptāṃś ca vihanyamānāṃś ca dṛṣṭijālapraticchannāṃś ca	paSyati, akzaNa prAptAn ca vihanyamAnAn ca dRzwi jAla praticCannAn ca
   mārgamapratilabhamānān / aparāṃś ca kṣaṇaprāptān paśyati, kṣaṇāṃś ca	mArgam apratilaBamAnAn / aparAn ca kzaNa prAptAn paSyati, kzaNAn ca
   virāgayataḥ paśyati / tasya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahān saṃvega utpadyate / te	virAgayataH paSyati / tasya tasyAm velAyAm mahAn saMvegaH utpadyate / te
   cāsya sarvasattvāstayā mahāmaitryā tayā ca mahākaruṇayā sphāritvā	ca asya sarva sattvAH tayA mahAmEtryA tayA ca mahA karuNayA sPAritvA
   manasikṛtā bhavanti   ahameteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyāmi,	manasikRtAH Bavanti  aham etezAm sarvezAm sattvAnAm nATaH BavizyAmi,
   ahamenān sarvasattvān sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayiṣyāmīti / na ca tena vā anyena	aham enAn sarva sattvAn sarva duHKeByaH mocayizyAmi iti / na ca tena vE anyena
   vā nimittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati / ayam api subhūte bodhisattvasya	vA nimittena sArDam saMvasati / ayam api suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahān prajñāloko 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /	mahAsattvasya mahAn prajQA lokaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum /
   anena hi subhūte vihāreṇa viharanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokasya	anena hi suBUte vihAreNa viharantaH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sarva lokasya
   dakṣiṇīyatāṃ parigṛhṇanti, na ca vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /	dakziNIyatAm parigRhNanti, na ca vivartante anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH /
   yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca paribhuñjate	yezAm ca dAyakAnAm dAnapatInAm ca pariBuQjate
   cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān, asyāṃ	cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArAn, asyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sūpasthitacittāḥ, teṣāṃ dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca	prajQApAramitAyAm su upasTita cittAH, tezAm dAyakAnAm dAnapatInAm ca
   dānadakṣiṇāṃ viśodhayanti / sarvajñatā caiṣāmāsannībhavati / tasmāttarhi	dAna dakziNAm viSoDayanti / sarvajQa tA ca ezAm AsannIBavati / tasmAt tarhi
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭraṃ piṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena amoGam rAzwram piNxam pariBoktu kAmena
   sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamupadeṣṭukāmena vipulamavabhāsaṃ kartukāmena	sarva sattvAnAm mArgam upadezwu kAmena vipulam avaBAsam kartu kAmena
   saṃsāragatān sattvān saṃsārātparimocayitukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ	saMsAra gatAn sattvAn saMsArAt parimocayitu kAmena sarva sattvAnAm
   cakṣurviśodhayitukāmena anena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa	cakzuH viSoDayitu kAmena anena prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktena manasikAreNa
   vihartavyam / sacedanena manasikāreṇa vihartumicchati, tena	vihartavyam / sa ced anena manasikAreNa vihartum icCati, tena
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā manasikārāḥ samanvāhartavyāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ?	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAH manasikArAH samanvAhartavyAH / tat kasya hetoH?
   yo hyenān samanvāhartavyān maṃsyate, sa evāsya manasikāro bhaviṣyati /	yaH hi enAn samanvAhartavyAn maMsyate, saH eva asya manasikAraH Bavizyati /
   tato 'nyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāvirahitānāmavakāśo na dātavyaḥ /	tatas anyezAm manasikArANAm prajQApAramitA virahitAnAm avakASaH na dAtavyaH /
   tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai	taTA ca kartavyam yaTA ayam prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArE
   rātriṃdivāni kṣapayet / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacideva puruṣeṇa	rAtriMdivAni kzapayet / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte kenacid eva puruzeNa
   maṇiratnajñāne vartamānena maṇiratnajātijñena apratilabdhapūrvaṃ	maNi ratna jQAne vartamAnena maNi ratna jAti jQena apratilabDa pUrvam
   mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet / sa tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya	mahA maNi ratnam pratilabDam Bavet / sa tat mahA maNi ratnam pratilaBya
   mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet / tasya tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ	mahatA udAreNa prIti prAmodyena samanvAgataH Bavet / tasya tat mahA maNi ratnam
   punareva praṇaśyet / sa tatonidānaṃ mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃyujyeta	punar eva praNaSyet / sa tatonidAnam mahatA duHKa dOrmanasyena saMyujyeta
   / tasya satatasamitaṃ tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ prati saṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ	/ tasya satata samitam tat mahA maNi ratnam prati saMyuktAH eva manasikArAH
   pravarteran   aho batāhaṃ tena (Vaidya 201) mahāmaṇiratnena viprayukta iti	pravarteran  aho bata aham tena (VEdyaH 201) mahA maNi ratnena viprayuktaH iti
   hi sa puruṣastasya mahāmaṇiratnasya na vismaret yāvat tadvā anyadvā	hi sa puruzaH tasya mahA maNi ratnasya na vismaret yAvat tat vA anyat vA
   tadguṇaṃ tajjātikaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet / evameva	tad guNam tad jAtikam tena mahA maNi ratnam pratilabDam Bavet / evam eva
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāmahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭena mahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭeneva	prajQApAramitA mahA maNi ratna pariBrazwena mahA maNi ratna pariBrazwena iva
   mahāmaṇiratnena ratnasaṃjñinā prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāviprayuktena	mahA maNi ratnena ratna saMjQinA prajQApAramitA manasikArA vi prayuktena
   prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāvirahitasarvajñatācittena tāvadanveṣṭavyā, yāvatsā	prajQApAramitA manasikAra avirahita sarvajQa tA cittena tAvat anvezwavyA, yAvat sA
   vā anyā vā pratilabdhā bhavati / tāvattena	vA anyA vA pratilabDA Bavati / tAvat tena
   prajñāpāramitāmahāmaṇiratnapratilambhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ	prajQApAramitA mahA maNi ratna pratilamBa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   sarvajñatāmahāmaṇiratnapratilambhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahitena	sarvajQa tA mahA maNi ratna pratilamBa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH avirahitena
   bhavitavyam //	Bavitavyam //
   subhūtirāha   yatpunarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena	suBUtiH Aha  yat punar Bagavan sarva DarmAH sarva manasikArAH svaBAvena
   virahitāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā, tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	virahitAH SUnyAH uktA BagavatA, tat kaTam Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati? evamukte	sarvajQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH avirahitaH Bavati? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  saced suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva evaṃ manasi karoti   sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena viviktāḥ,	mahAsattvaH evam manasi karoti  sarva DarmAH svaBAvena viviktAH,
   sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā iti, evametanmanasi kurvan	sarva DarmAH svaBAvena SUnyAH iti, evam etat manasi kurvan
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ?	sarvajQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH avirahitaH Bavati / tat kasya hetoH?
   prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte śūnyā / sā naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate /	prajQApAramitA hi suBUte SUnyA / sA na eva vivarDate, na ca parihIyate /

   srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, tān api te	srotaApannAH sakRdAgAminaH anAgAminaH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH, tAn api te

   (Vaidya 206)	(VEdyaH 206)

   (Vaidya 207) punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ	(VEdyaH 207) punar aparam Ananda yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH asyAm gamBIrAyAm

   bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā / kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā? na hyevamatra	bata iyam prajQApAramitA / kim tava enayA SrutayA? na hi evam atra
   yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam /	yujyamAnam anyezu sUtrAntezu yaTA taTAgatena BAzitam /
   ahamapyasyāmagādhamāsvādaṃ na labhe / kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā likhitayā	aham api asyAm agADam AsvAdam na laBe / kim tava enayA SrutayA liKitayA
   veti? evamanyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vivecayate / asyāpyānanda	veti? evam anyAn api boDisattvAt mahAsattvAn vivecayate / asya api Ananda
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mAraH pApIyAn upasaMkrAmati
   viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, avatāraṃ cāsya labhate //	viheWana aBiprAyaH, avatAram ca asya laBate //
   punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyān	punar aparam Ananda yasmin samaye boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anyAn
   bodhisattvānavamanyate   ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi, nānye	boDisattvAn avamanyate  aham viveka vihAreNa viharAmi, na anye
   vivekavihāreṇa viharanti, nānyeṣāṃ vivekavihārāḥ saṃvidyante iti /	viveka vihAreNa viharanti, na anyezAm viveka vihArAH saMvidyante iti /
   tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ	tasmin= Ananda samaye mAraH pApIyAn= tuzwaH udagre Atta manAH pramuditaH
   prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati, saṃharṣajāto harṣitacittaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto	prIti sOmanasya jAtaH Bavati, saMharza jAtaH harzita cittaH prIti prAmodya jAtaH 
   bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ? dūrīkarotyeṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimiti //	Bavati / tat kasya hetoH? dUrIkaroti ezaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim iti //
   punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ	punar aparam Ananda yasmin samaye boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya nAma grahaNam
   vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati, evaṃ sa	vA gotra grahaNam vA Duta guNa parikIrtanam vA Bavati, evam sa
   tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo	tAvat mAtrakeNa tatas anyAn boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn peSalAn kalyANa DarmaNaH 
   'vamanyate / te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante, ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ	avamanyate / te ca tasya guNAH na saMvidyante, ye avinivartanIyAnAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ, te	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAyAm caratAm guNAH, te
   ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante / so	AkArAH tAni liFgAni tAni nimittAni tasya na saMvidyante / saH 
   'saṃvidyamāneṣvavinivartanīyaguṇeṣu kleśamutpādayati, yaduta	asaMvidyamAnezu avinivartanIya guNezu kleSam utpAdayati, yat uta
   ātmānamutkrośayati, parān paṃsayati   na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu	AtmAnam utkroSayati, parAn paMsayati  na Kalu ete tezu Darmezu

   na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti, utsadāni bhaviṣyanti /	na SUnyAni mAra BavanAni Bavizyanti, utsadAni Bavizyanti /

   pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti, ādeyavacanāś ca	pravRttAH aDyAkrAntA lABa satkAreNa Bavizyanti, Adeya vacanAH ca

   śikṣiṣyante, na tathatvāya pratipatsyante, na tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante /	Sikzizyante, na taTatvAya pratipatsyante, na taTatvAya yogam Apatsyante /
   evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ	evam te na taTatAyAm SikzamANA na taTatAyAm pratipadyamAnAH na taTatAyAm

   cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,	citta saMtatyAH yat yat eva karma Arapsyante kAyena vA vAcA vA manasA vA,
   tatsarvamanirdiṣṭatvāya akāntatvāya apriyatvāya amanaāpatvāya saṃvartsyate	tat sarvam anirdizwa tvAya akAnta tvAya apriya tvAya amanaApatvAya saMvartsyate

   'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe, paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco	aham parezu tvam iti api vAcam BAze, paruzam vA karkaSam vA prativacaH

   saṃjāne / etad api me na pratirūpam, yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api	saMjAne / etat api me na pratirUpam, yat aham pareza doza antaram api
   śrotavyaṃ manye / tatkasya hetoḥ? na mayā adhyāśayo vikopayitavyaḥ, yena	Srotavyam manye / tat kasya hetoH? na mayA aDyASayaH vikopayitavyaH, yena

   caturviṃśatitamaḥ //	caturviMSatitamaH //
   (Vaidya 210)	(VEdyaH 210)
   ASP_25: śikṣāparivartaḥ pañcaviṃśatitamaḥ /	ASP_25: SikzA parivartaH paQcaviMSatitamaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   kva punarbhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  kva punar Bagavan
   śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate? bhagavānāha  	SikzamANaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate? BagavAn Aha  
   sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate	saced suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzaye Sikzate, sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate
   / evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /	/ evam anutpAde aniroDe ajAtO aBAve viveke virAge AkASe DarmaDAtO /
   sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇe śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate	saced suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH nirvANe Sikzate, sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzate
   / subhūtirāha   kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye	/ suBUtiH Aha  kim kAraNam Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzaye
   śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām, evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve	SikzamANaH Sikzate sarvajQa tA AyAm, evam anutpAde aniroDe ajAtO aBAve
   viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?	viveke virAge AkASe DarmaDAtO nirvANe SikzamANaH Sikzate sarvajQa tAyAm?
   evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi  	evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yat suBUte evam vadasi

   / evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau	/ evam anutpAde aniroDe ajAtO aBAve viveke virAge AkASe DarmaDAtO

   tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,	taTAgatasya taTatA yayA taTatayA taTAgataH taTAgataH iti praBAvyate,
   api nu sā kṣīyate? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi	api nu sA kzIyate? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / tat kasya hetoH? na hi
   bhagavan kṣayaḥ kṣīyate / akṣayo hi bhagavan kṣayaḥ / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ	Bagavan kzayaH kzIyate / akzayaH hi Bagavan kzayaH / BagavAn Aha  tat kim
   manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata	manyase suBUte yA taTAgatasya taTatA yayA taTatayA taTAgataH taTAgata
   iti prabhāvyate, api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā	iti praBAvyate, api nu sA utpadyate vA niruDyate vA jAyate vA Bavati vA
   vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā	viBavati vA vivicyate vA rajyate vA virajyate vA AkASIBavati vA

   'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, teṣu gaṇanāṃ	alpatameByaH alpatamAH avinivartanIyAH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH, tezu gaNanAm
   gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, yogamāpattavyam //	gantu kAmena iha eva prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam, yogam Apattavyam //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evam prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na vicikitsāsahagataṃ	SikzamANasya na Kila saha gatam cittam utpadyate, na vicikitsA sahagatam
   cittamutpadyate, nerṣyāmātsaryasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na	cittam utpadyate, na IrzyA mAtsarya saha gatam cittam utpadyate, na
   dauḥśīlyasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na vyāpādasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,	dOHSIlya saha gatam cittam utpadyate, na vyApAda sahagatam cittam utpadyate,
   na kausīdyasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na vikṣepasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,	na kOsIdya sahagatam cittam utpadyate, na vikzepa saha gatam cittam utpadyate,
   na dauṣprajñasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate / evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	na dOzprajQa sahagatam cittam utpadyate / evam hi suBUte prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,	SikzamANena boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarvAH pAramitA saMgRhItAH Bavanti,
   sarvāḥ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti, sarvāḥ pāramitā anugatā bhavanti /	sarvAH pAramitAH udgRhItAH Bavanti, sarvAH pAramitAH anugatAH Bavanti /
   sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau	sarvAH pAramitAH antargatAH Bavanti / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte sat kAya dRzwO
   dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti, evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	dvAzazwi dRzwi gatAni antargatAni Bavanti, evam eva suBUte prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā	SikzamANasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya tasyAm sarvAH pAramitA antargatA
   bhavanti / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne	Bavanti / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte puruzasya jIvita indriye pravartamAne
   sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti, evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya	sarvANi indriyANi antargatAni Bavanti, evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya

   bhavanti / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe	Bavanti / tat yaTA api nAma suBUte puruzasya jIvita indriye nirudDe
   sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti, evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya	sarvANi indriyANi nirudDAni Bavanti, evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya

   dharmā niruddhā bhavanti, sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ	DarmAH nirudDAH Bavanti, sarvAH ca tad anyAH pAramitAH antargatAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti / tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	parigRhItAH Bavanti / tasmAt tarhi suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /	sarvAH pAramitAH parigrahItu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam /

   sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate / tatkasya hetoḥ? puṇyāgratvāt / tatkiṃ	sarva sattvAnAm agra tAyAm Sikzate / tat kasya hetoH? puNya agra tvAt / tat kim
   manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ	manyase suBUte yAvantaH tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sarva sattvAH
   sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ, api nu te bahavo bhavanti? subhūtirāha  	sattva saMgraheNa saMgRhyamANAH, api nu te bahavaH Bavanti? suBUtiH Aha

   trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ / bhagavānāha   yaḥ subhūte eko	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO sattvAH / BagavAn Aha  yaH suBUte ekaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yAvajjIvam tizWan= tAn sarva sattvAn

     bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata / bhagavānāha   ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo	 bahu Bagavan, bahu sugataH / BagavAn Aha  atas sa suBUte boDisattvaH

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam /

   tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi, yā tena na śikṣitā bhavati / subhūtirāha  	tAm saMpattim samanupaSyAmi, yA tena na SikzitA Bavati / suBUtiH Aha

   śrāvakagaṇāḥ, tān api sa jānāti, na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate / evaṃ ca	SrAvaka gaNAH, tAn api sa jAnAti, na ca tatra avatizWate / evam ca
   vyavacārayati, na ca prativahati   mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ	vyavacArayati, na ca prativahati  mayA api ete SrAvaka guNAH deSayitavyAH
   prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo	prakASayitavyAH iti Sikzate / evam SikzamANaH suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati / evaṃ	mahAsattvaH sa deva mAnuza asurasya lokasya dakziNIyatAm gacCati / evam
   śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān	SikzamANaH suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarvAn= tatas anyAn dakziNIyAn
   śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,	SrAvaka pratisaMyuktAn pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktAn= ca aBiBavati,
   sarvajñatā cāsya āsannībhavati / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo	sarvajQa tA ca asya AsannIBavati / evam SikzamANaH suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo na riñcati, prajñāpāramitāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyāmavirahitaḥ	mahAsattvaH na riQcati, prajQApAramitAm carati prajQApAramitAyAm avirahitaH
   prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa / evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	prajQApAramitA vihAreNa / evam caran suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH

   samyaksaṃbodheḥ / sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati   iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ	samyaksaMboDeH / saced punar asya evam Bavati  iyam sA prajQApAramitA imAm
   sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati, ityevaṃ saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitām / atha	sarvajQa tAm Aharizyati, iti evam saMjAnIte, carati prajQApAramitAm / aTa
   tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte   iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā, asya vā	tAm api prajQApAramitAm na saMjAnIte  iyam sA prajQApAramitA, asya vA

   mahāsattvaḥ, carati prajñāpāramitāyāmiti //	mahAsattvaH, carati prajQApAramitAyAm iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣāparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm SikzA parivartaH nAma
   pañcaviṃśatitamaḥ //	paQcaviMSatitamaH //
   (Vaidya 215)	(VEdyaH 215)
   ASP_26: māyopamaparivartaḥ ṣaḍviṃśatitamaḥ /	ASP_26: mAyA upama parivartaH zaxviMSatitamaH /
   atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   caranneva tāvadayaṃ	aTa Kalu Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  caran= eva tAvat ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati, kaḥ punarvādo yadā	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva sattvAn aBiBavati, kaH punar vAdaH yadA
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati / lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH Bavizyati / lABAH tezAm sattvAnAm
   sulabdhāḥ, sujīvitaṃ ca te sattvā jīvanti, yeṣāṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ cittaṃ	su labDAH, su jIvitam ca te sattvAH jIvanti, yezAm sarvajQa tAyAm cittam
   krāmati / kaḥ punarvādo yairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /	krAmati / kaH punar vAdaH yEH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditam /
   spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ	spRhaNIyAH te sattvAH ye sattva sArAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH mAndAravANi puzpANi aBinirmAya
   puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,	puzpANAm aQjalim kRtvA taTAgatam arhantam samyaksaMbudDam aByavAkirat,
   evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata   yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ	evam ca vAcam aBAzata  yEH boDisattva yAnikEH pudgalEH anuttarAyAm

   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe, abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyAmahe, aBisaMbuDya sarva sattvAt mahatA
   saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,	saMsAra arNavena uhyamAnAn same pArime tIre pratizWApayizyAmaH iti,
   samṛdhyantāṃ teṣāmabhīpsitāḥ paricintitāḥ, parigṛhītāścittotpādāḥ	samRDyantAm tezAm aBIpsitAH paricintitAH, parigRhItAH citta utpAdAH
   eteṣāmeva buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūraṇāya bhavantu, eteṣāmeva	etezAm eva budDa DarmANAm paripUraNAya Bavantu, etezAm eva

   paripūraṇāya bhavantu / na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate, yatte	paripUraNAya Bavantu / na me Bagavan ekacitta utpAdaH api utpadyate, yat te
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH mahA karuNayA samanvAgatAH vivarteran anuttarAyAH

   janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni	janayizyanti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO imAni saMsAra avacarANi duHKAni
   sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā	sattvAnAm saMpaSyantaH / tat kasya hetoH? tayA mahA karuNayA arTa kAmA
   hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ, ye	hita kAmAH hi te sa deva mAnuza asurasya lokasya anukampakAH, ye
   imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ	imEH evaMrUpEH citta utpAdEH samanvAgatAH kim iti vayam tIrNAH
   sattvāṃstārayema, muktā mocayema, āśvastā āśvāsayema, parinirvṛtāḥ	sattvAn= tArayema, muktAH mocayema, ASvastAH ASvAsayema, parinirvRtAH
   parinirvāpayema, ityetaiścittotpādairviharanti / yasteṣāṃ bhagavan	parinirvApayema, iti etEH citta utpAdEH viharanti / yaH tezAm Bagavan
   prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	praTama yAna saMprasTitAnAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   cittotpādānanumodate,	citta utpAdAn anumodate,
   avinivartanīyānāmapyavinivartanīyadharmatāmanumodate,	avinivartanIyAnAm api avinivartanIya Darma tAm anumodate,
   ekajātipratibaddhānām api bodhisattvānāṃ	eka jAti pratibadDAnAm api boDisattvAnAm
