   kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati? evamukte bhagavān	kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam prasavati? evam ukte BagavAn
   śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ	Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  syAt Kalu punar kOSika Sakyeta sumeroH
   parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika	parvata rAjasya pala agreNa tulya mAnasya pramANam grahItum, na tu eva kOSika
   tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya	tasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /	mahAsattvasya anumodanA sahagatasya citta utpAdasya puNya pramANam grahItum /
   syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa	syAt Kalu punar kOSika Sakyeta cAturmahAdvIpake lokaDAtO pala agreNa
   tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya	tulya mAne pramANam grahItum, na tu eva kOSika tasya anumodanA sahagasya
   cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum / syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta	citta utpAdasya puNya pramANam grahItum / syAt Kalu punar kOSika Sakyeta
   sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva	sAhasre cUlike lokaDAtO tulya mAne pala agreNa pramANam grahItum, na tu eva
   kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /	kOSika tasya anumodanA sahagatasya citta utpAdasya puNya pramANam grahItum /
   syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta (Vaidya 216) dvisāhasre madhyame	syAt Kalu punar kOSika Sakyeta (VEdyaH 216) dvi sAhasre maDyame
   lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika	lokaDAtO pala agreNa tulya mAne pramANam grahItum, na tu eva kOSika
   tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum / syātkhalu	tasya anumodanA sahagatasya citta utpAdasya puNya pramANam grahItum / syAt Kalu
   punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa	punar kOSika Sakyeta tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO tulya mAne pala agreNa
   pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā	pramANam grahItum, na tu eva kOSika tasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya anumodanA sahagatasya citta utpAdasya
   puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum //	puNya pramANam grahItum //
   evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   mārādhiṣṭhitāste	evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  mAra aDizWitAH te
   bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ, ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	Bagavan sattvAH veditavyAH, ye boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ	praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAnAm evam aprameyam anumodanA sahagatasya
   cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti, na jānanti, na paśyanti,	citta utpAdasya puNyam iti na SRNvanti, na jAnanti, na paSyanti,
   tāmanumodanāṃ na samanvāharanti / mārapakṣikā bhagavaṃste sattvā	tAm anumodanAm na samanvAharanti / mAra pakzikAH Bagavan= te sattvA
   bhaviṣyanti, ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimāṃścittotpādānnānumodiṣyante	Bavizyanti, ye boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm imAn= citta utpAdAt na anumodizyante
   / mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti, ya	/ mAra BavaneByaH ca te Bagavan sattvAH cyutA Bavizyanti, ya
   imāṃścittotpādāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nānumodiṣyante /	imAn= citta utpAdAn= tezAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm na anumodizyante /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā	tat kasya hetoH? mAra Bavana viDvaMsana karAH hi tEH Bagavan ime citta utpAdA
   abhinirhṛtāḥ, yairamī cittotpādā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitāḥ,	aBinirhRtAH, yEH amI citta utpAdAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pariNAmitAH,
   anumoditā vā amī cittopādāḥ / anumoditavyā bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	anumoditAH vE amI citta upAdAH / anumoditavyAH Bagavan= tezAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāmamī cittotpādāḥ, yairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairanuttarāyāṃ	mahAsattvAnAm amI citta utpAdAH, yEH boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam / yeṣāṃ bhagavaṃstathāgato 'parityaktaḥ,	samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditam / yezAm Bagavan= taTAgataH aparityaktaH,
   dharmo 'parityaktaḥ, saṃgho 'parityaktaḥ, taiḥ kulaputraiḥ	DarmaH aparityaktaH, saMGaH aparityaktaH, tEH kula putrEH
   kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditavyāḥ //	kula duhitRBiH ca ime citta utpAdAH anumoditavyAH //
   evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   evametatkauśika, evam	evam ukte BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  evam etat kOSika, evam
   etat / yeṣāṃ kauśika tathāgato 'parityaktaḥ, dharmo 'parityaktaḥ, saṃgho	etat / yezAm kOSika taTAgataH aparityaktaH, DarmaH aparityaktaH, saMGaH 
   'parityaktaḥ, taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditavyāḥ	aparityaktaH, tEH kula putrEH kula duhitRBiH ca ime citta utpAdAH anumoditavyAH
   / yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā	/ yEH kOSika kula putrEH kula duhitRBiH ca ime citta upAdA anumoditA
   bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā, te	boDisattva yAnikEH vA pratyekabudDa yAnikEH vA SrAvaka yAnikEH vA, te
   kṣipraṃ tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānārāgayiṣyanti, na virāgayiṣyanti	kzipram taTAgatAn arhataH samyaksaMbudDa an ArAgayizyanti, na virAgayizyanti
   / evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   evametadbhagavan,	/ evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  evam etat Bagavan ,
   evametatsugata / yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā	evam etat sugataH / yEH kula putrEH kula duhitRBiH ca ime citta utpAdA anumoditA
   bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā, te	boDisattva yAnikEH vA pratyekabudDa yAnikEH vA SrAvaka yAnikEH vA, te
   kṣipraṃ tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānārāgayiṣyanti, na virāgayiṣyanti	kzipram taTAgatAn arhataH samyaksaMbudDa an ArAgayizyanti, na virAgayizyanti
   / evaṃ tairanumodanāsahagataiścittotpādakuśalamūlairyatra	/ evam tEH anumodanA sahagatEH citta utpAda kuSala mUlEH yatra
   yatropapatsyante, tatra tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti, gurukṛtāś ca	yatra upapatsyante, tatra tatra satkRtAH ca Bavizyanti, gurukRtAH ca
   bhaviṣyanti, mānitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, pūjitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arcitāś ca	Bavizyanti, mAnitAH ca Bavizyanti, pUjitAH ca Bavizyanti, arcitAH ca
   bhaviṣyanti, apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti / na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi	Bavizyanti, apacAyitAH ca Bavizyanti / na ca te am anaApAni rUpANi
   drakṣyanti [NOTE: Conze translates "nor hear any unpleasant sounds"] / na	drakzyanti [NOTE: Conze tran slateH "noH hear any unpleasant sounds"] / na
   ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti / na ca te amanaāpān rasān	ca te amanaApAn ganDAn GrAsyanti / na ca te am anaApAn rasAn
   paribhokṣyante / na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti / na ca	pariBokzyante / na ca te am anaApAni sprazwavyAni sprakzyanti / na ca
   teṣāmapāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā / svargopapattisteṣāṃ	tezAm apAyezu upapattiH pratikAFkzitavyA / svarga upapattiH tezAm
   pratikāṅkṣitavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ	pratikAFkzitavyAH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi tEH kula putrEH
   kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvasattvasukhāvahānyaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ	kula duhitRBiH vA sarva sattva suKa AvahAni aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm
   kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye	kuSala mUlAni anumoditAni yEH api Bagavan= Candam utpAdya boDaye
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ, teṣāṃ te	boDisattva yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm te citta utpAdAH anumoditAH, tezAm te
   cittotpādā (Vaidya 217) vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā	citta utpAdAH (VEdyaH 217) vivarDamAnAH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH AhArakA
   bhaviṣyanti / te 'pyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya	Bavizyanti / te api anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya
   aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti / bhagavānāha  	aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn sattvAn parinirvApayizyanti / BagavAn Aha  
   evametatkauśikaḥ, evametat, yathā tvayā vāgbhāṣitā	evam etat kOSikaH, evam etat, yaTA tvayA vAc BAzitA
   tathāgatasyaivānubhāvena / yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā	taTAgatasya eva anuBAvena / yena kOSika kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ, anena kauśika	boDisattva yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm te citta utpAdAH anumoditAH, anena kOSika
   paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ	paryAyeNa tena kula putreNa vA kula duhitrA vA boDisattva yAnikAnAm
   pudgalānāṃ tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ	pudgalAnAm tAn= citta utpAdAn anumodya aprameyANAm sattvAnAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti, avaropitāni abhinirhṛtāni ca	sattvAnAm kuSala mUlAni anumoditAni Bavanti, avaropitAni aBinirhRtAni ca
   bhavanti //	Bavanti //
   subhūtirāha   kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ	suBUtiH Aha  kaTam ca Bagavat mAyA upamam cittam anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam
   subhūtimetadavocat   tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ	suBUtim etat avocat  tat kim manyase suBUte samanupaSyasi tvam mAyA upamam
   cittam? subhūtirāha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase	cittam? suBUtiH Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase
   subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām? āha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / nāhaṃ bhagavan	suBUte samanupaSyasi tvam mAyAm? Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / na aham Bagavan
   māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi / bhagavānāha   tatkiṃ manyase	mAyA upamam cittam na api mAyAm samanupaSyAmi / BagavAn Aha  tat kim manyase
   subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi, tatkiṃ	suBUte yat na mAyAm na api mAyA upamam cittam samanupaSyasi, tat kim
   tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo	tvam anyatra mAyAyAH mAyA upamAt vA cittAt tam Darmam samanupaSyasi yaH DarmaH 
   'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha   no hīdaṃ bhagavan / nāhaṃ	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? Aha  no hi idam Bagavan / na aham
   bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi, yo	Bagavan anyatra mAyAyAH mAyA upamAt vA cittAt tam Darmam samanupaSyAmi, yaH 
   dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate / so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra	DarmaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate / saH aham Bagavan anyatra
   māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi	mAyAyAH mAyA upamAt vA cittAt tam Darma samanuSyan katamam Darmam upadekzyAmi
   astīti vā nāstīti vā? yaś ca atyantavivikto dharmaḥ, na so 'stīti vā	asti iti vA na asti iti vA? yaH ca atyanta viviktaH DarmaH, na saH asti iti vA
   nāstīti vā upaiti / yo 'pi dharmo 'tyantatayā viviktaḥ, nāsāvanuttarāṃ	na asti iti vA upEti / yaH api DarmaH atyanta tayA viviktaH, na asO= anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate / tat kasya hetoH? na hi Bagavan
   asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /	asaMvidyamAnaH DarmaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate /
   tasmāttarhi bhagavan atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā / yaś ca dharmo	tasmAt tarhi Bagavan atyanta viviktA prajQApAramitA / yaH ca DarmaH 
   'tyantaviviktaḥ, nāsau dharmo bhāvayitavyaḥ / nāpyasau	atyanta viviktaH, na asO DarmaH BAvayitavyaH / na api asO
   kasyaciddharmasyāvāhako vā nirvāhako vā / kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo	kasyacid Darmasya AvAhakaH vA nirvAhakaH vA / kaTam Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ	mahAsattvaH atyanta viviktAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? anuttarāpi nāma bhagavan	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate? anuttarA api nAma Bagavan
   samyaksaṃbodhiratyantaviviktā / yadā bhagavan	samyaksaMboDiH atyanta viviktA / yadA Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāpyatyantaviviktā, anuttarāpi samyaksaṃbodhiratyantaviviktā,	prajQApAramitA api atyanta viviktA, anuttarA api samyaksaMboDiH atyanta viviktA,
   tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati? evamukte	tadA kaTam Bagavan viviktena viviktam aBisaMbudDam Bavati? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   sādhu sādhu subhūte /	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  sADu sADu suBUte /
   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / atyantaviviktā subhūte prajñāpāramitā,	evam etat suBUte, evam etat / atyanta viviktA suBUte prajQApAramitA,
   atyantaviviktaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / yata eva subhūte	atyanta viviktA eva anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / yatas eva suBUte
   atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā, ata eva atyantaviviktā anuttarā	atyanta viviktA prajQApAramitA, atas eva atyanta viviktA anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbudhyate / sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbuDyate / saced suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāmatyantaviviktāmiti saṃjānīte, na sā prajñāpāramitā syāt /	prajQApAramitAm atyanta viviktAm iti saMjAnIte, na sA prajQApAramitA syAt /
   evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ	evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm Agamya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, nāpi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmāgamya	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate, na api suBUte prajQApAramitAm Agamya
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate / na ca vivekena	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate / na ca vivekena
   vivekamabhisaṃbudhyate, abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	vivekam aBisaMbuDyate, aBisaMbuDyate ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim / na ca prajñāpāramitāmanāgamyābhisaṃbudhyate //	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim / na ca prajQApAramitAm anAgamyA aBisaMbuDyate //
   (Vaidya 218) subhūtirāha   yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato	(VEdyaH 218) suBUtiH Aha  yaTA aham Bagavan BagavataH 
   bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo	BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi, taTA gamBIre Bagavan arTe carati boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ / bhagavānāha   evametatsubhūte, evam etat / gambhīre 'rthe	mahAsattvaH / BagavAn Aha  evam etat suBUte, evam etat / gamBIre arTe
   subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / duṣkarakārakaḥ subhūte	suBUte carati boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / duzkara kArakaH suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, yo gambhīre 'rthe carati, taṃ cārthaṃ na	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH, yaH gamBIre arTe carati, tam ca arTam na
   sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā //	sAkzAtkaroti yat uta SrAvaka BUmO vA pratyekabudDa BUmO vA //
   subhūtirāha   yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā na	suBUtiH Aha  yaTA aham Bagavan BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi, taTA na
   kaścidduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi	kaScid duzkara kArakaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi
   bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt, so 'pi dharmo	Bagavan saH eva DarmaH na upalaByate yaH sAkzAt kuryAt, saH api DarmaH 
   nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkriyate, so 'pi dharmo nopalabhyate yena	na upalaByate yaH sAkzAt kriyate, saH api DarmaH na upalaByate yena
   sākṣātkriyeta / sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na	sAkzAtkriyeta / saced Bagavan evam BAzyamANaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na
   saṃsīdati, nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate, na vipṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na	saMsIdati, na avalIyate na saMlIyate, na vipRzWIBavati, na utrasyati na
   saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / saceccarāmīti	saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / saced carAmi iti
   na samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / āsannā me 'nuttarā	na samanupaSyati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / AsannA me anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām	samyaksaMboDiH iti saced evam ati na samanupaSyati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm
   / dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na	/ dUrIkRtA me SrAvaka BUmiH pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA iti saced asya evam api na
   bhavati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya	Bavati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan AkASasya
   naivaṃ bhavati   kasyacidahamāsannaḥ, kasyacidvā dūra iti / tatkasya	na evam Bavati  kasyacid aham AsannaH, kasyacid vA dUraH iti / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? avikalpatvādbhagavan ākāśasya / evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	hetoH? avikalpa tvAt Bagavan AkASasya / evam eva Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm
   carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati   anuttarāṃ	carataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati  anuttarAm
   samyaksabodhirmamāsannā, śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra	samyak sa boDiH mama AsannA, SrAvaka BUmiH pratyekabudDa BUmiH ca mama dUra
   iti / tatkasya hetoḥ? nirvikalpatvādbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ /	iti / tat kasya hetoH? nirvikalpa tvAt Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH /
   tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati   māyākāro	tat yaTA api nAma Bagavat mAyA puruzasya na evam Bavati  mAyA kAraH 
   mamāsannaḥ, yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /	mama AsannaH, yaH punar anyaH jana kAyaH saMnipatitaH sa mama dUraH iti /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādbhagavan māyāpuruṣasya / evameva bhagavan	tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt Bagavat mAyA puruzasya / evam eva Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati  	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati  
   anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā, śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca	anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH mama AsannA, SrAvaka BUmiH pratyekabudDa BUmiH ca
   mama dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ /	mama dUraH iti / tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH /

   pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne, ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā	pratiBAsaH utpadyate tat mama Asanne, ye tu Kalu punar atra na upasaMkrAntA
   ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ?	AdarSe vA udaka pAtre vA te mama dUraH iti / tat kasya hetoH?
   avikalpatvādbhagavan pratibhāsasya / evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	avikalpa tvAt Bagavan pratiBAsasya / evam eva Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm

   iti / tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi	iti / tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH / tat yaTA api
   nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,	nAma Bagavan= taTAgatasya kaScid priyaH vE apriyaH vA na saMvidyate,

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na kaScid priyaH vA
   apriyo vā saṃvidyate / tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādbhagavan	apriyaH vA saMvidyate / tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / yathaiva hi bhagavan	prajQApAramitAyAH / yaTA eva hi Bagavan

   samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ, na tasyaivaṃ bhavati  	samyaksaMbudDena yaH nirmitakaH nirmitaH, na tasya evam Bavati  
   śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre, anuttarā	SrAvaka BUmiH pratyekabudDa BUmiH ca mama dUre, anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsanneti / tatkasya (Vaidya 219) hetoḥ?	samyaksaMboDiH mama Asan= a iti / tat kasya (VEdyaH 219) hetoH?
   avikalpatvādbhagavannirmitasya / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya	avikalpa tvAt Bagavat nirmitasya / evam eva Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati   śrāvakabhūmiḥ	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAm carataH na evam Bavati  SrAvaka BUmiH
   pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsanneti /	pratyekabudDa BUmiH ca mama dUre, anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH mama Asanna iti /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi	tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt eva Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH / tat yaTA api
   nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ, tatkṛtyaṃ	nAma Bagavan sa nirmitakaH yasya kRtyasya kRtaSas nirmitaH, tad kRtyam
   karoti / sa ca nirmitako 'vikalpaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva	karoti / sa ca nirmitakaH avikalpaH / tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt eva

   imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti, sā ca prajñāpāramitā	imAm prajQApAramitAm BAvayati, tat ca kRtyam karoti, sA ca prajQApAramitA
   avikalpā / tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ /	avikalpAH / tat kasya hetoH? avikalpa tvAt eva Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH /
   tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā	tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan dakzeNa pala gaNxena vA pala gaNxa antevAsinA vA

   kṛtyasyārthāya kṛtaḥ, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca dārusaṃghāto 'vikalpaḥ /	kRtyasya arTAya kRtaH, tat ca kRtyam karoti / sa ca dAru saMGAtaH avikalpaH /

   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yasya kRtyasya kRtaSas imAm prajQApAramitAm
   bhāvayati, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti, sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā / tatkasya	BAvayati, tat ca kRtyam karoti, sA ca prajQApAramitA avikalpAH / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā iti //	hetoH? avikalpa tvAt eva Bagavan asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ māyopamaparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm mAyA upama parivartaH nAma
   ṣaḍviṃśatitamaḥ //	zaxviMSatitamaH //
   (Vaidya 220)	(VEdyaH 220)
   ASP_27: sāraparivartaḥ saptaviṃśatitamaḥ /	ASP_27: sAra parivartaH saptaviMSatitamaH /
   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   sāre	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  sAre
   batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati, yaḥ	bata ayam Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH carati, yaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati / evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm carati / evam ukte AyuzmAn suBUtiH Ayuzmantam
   śāriputrametadavocat   sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	SAriputram etat avocat  sAre bata ayam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaścarati, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati //	mahAsattvaH carati, yaH prajQApAramitAyAm carati //
   atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat  	aTa Kalu saMbahulAnAm kAma avacarANAm deva putra sahasrANAm etat aBavat  
   namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ, yairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	namaskartavyAH te sattvAH, yEH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   cittānyutpāditāni abhinirhṛtāni / ye ceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	cittAni utpAditAni aBinirhRtAni / ye ca iha gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   caranti, tathā caranto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkurvanti, yaduta śrāvakabhūmau	caranti, taTA carantaH BUtakowim na sAkzAt kurvanti, yat uta SrAvaka BUmO
   vā pratyakabuddhabhūmau vā / anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā	vA pratyakabudDa BUmO vA / anena api paryAyeNa duzkara kArakAH boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ, ye dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyāṃ caranti, na ca tāṃ	mahAsattvAH veditavyAH, ye DarmANAm DarmatAyAm caranti, na ca tAm
   dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti / atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ	DarmatAm sAkzAtkurvanti / aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH tezAm saMbahulAnAm
   kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni	kAma avacarANAm deva putra sahasrANAm cetasA eva cetaH parivitarkam AjQAya tAni

   devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram, yatte tāṃ	deva putrAH tezAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm duzkaram, yat te tAm
   bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkurvanti / idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	BUtakowim na sAkzAtkurvanti / idam tu deva putrAH tezAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,	mahAsattvAnAm duzkaram ca eva parama duzkaram ca eva,
   yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ	yat aprameyAn asaMKyeyAna pramANAn sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmaH iti saMnAham
   saṃnahyante / te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante, asaṃvidyamānā	saMnahyante / te ca sattvAH atyanta tayA na saMvidyante, asaMvidyamAnA
   nopalabhyante, sattvaviviktatvāt / evaṃ vainayikā atyantatayā na	na upalaByante, sattva vivikta tvAt / evam vEnayikAH atyanta tayA na
   saṃvidyante / evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ	saMvidyante / evam ca boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti, ākāśaṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum saMprasTitAH sattvAn vinezyAmaH iti, AkASam

   tataścarati prajñāpāramitāyām //	tatas carati prajQApAramitAyAm //
   atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   kiṃ kāraṇaṃ	aTa Kalu BagavAn jAnan= eva Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  kim kAraNam

   na saṃsīdati? subhūtirāha   (Vaidya 221) viviktatvādbhagavanna saṃsīdati /	na saMsIdati? suBUtiH Aha  (VEdyaH 221) vivikta tvAt Bagavat na saMsIdati /

   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati / nāpi bhagavan kaściddharmaḥ saṃsīdati /	BAzyamANAyAm na saMsIdati / na api Bagavan kaScid DarmaH saMsIdati /

   sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo	saced evam BAzyamANe deSyamAne nirdiSyamAne evam upadiSyamAne boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate, nāvalīyate na	mahAsattvaH na saMsIdati na vizIdati na vizAdam Apadyate, na avalIyate na

   evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata / sacedbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva	evam etat Bagavan, evam etat sugataH / saced Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattva
   evaṃ carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	evam carati, carati prajQApAramitAyAm / evam carantam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ	mahAsattvam sa indrakAH devAH sa brahmakAH sa prajApatikAH sa ISAnAH

   'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā	api te suBUte brahmakAyikAH devAH brahma purohitA brahmapArzadyA

   samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ / na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā	samyaksaMboDeH DArayitavyAH / na ca tezAm antarAyAH utpatsyante mArataH vA
   anyato vā / tatkasya hetoḥ? ye subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau	anyatas vA / tat kasya hetoH? ye suBUte tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO
   sattvāḥ, te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyuḥ / ekaikaś ca māraḥ	sattvAH, te sarve mArAH pApIyAMsaH BaveyuH / ekEkaH ca mAraH
   pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte / te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ	pApIyAn= tOvatIH A iva mArasenAH aBinirmimIte / te api suBUte mArAH
   pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	pApIyAMsaH tasya budDa samanvAhRtasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH na pratibalAH antarAyam kartum anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ / tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre	samyaksaMboDeH / tizWantu Kalu punar suBUte tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre
   lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ, yāvanta subhūte	lokaDAtO sarva sattvAH mArAH pApIyAMsaH, yAvanta suBUte
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te 'pi	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH, te api
   sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyuḥ, ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva	sarve mArAH pApIyAMsaH BaveyuH, ekEkaH ca mAraH pApIyAn= tAvatIH A iva
   mārasenā abhinirmimīte, te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya	mArasenAH aBinirmimIte, te api suBUte mArAH pApIyAMsaH tasya
   buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	budDa samanvAhRtasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH 
   na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / dvābhyāṃ	na pratibalAH antarAyam kartum anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / dvAByAm
   subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye	suBUte DarmAByAm samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tasmin samaye
   durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /	durDarzaH Bavati mArEH pApIyoBiH mArakAyikABiH vA devatABiH /
   katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? yaduta sarvasattvāścāsya aparityaktā bhavanti,	katamAByAm dvAByAm? yat uta sarva sattvAH ca asya aparityaktAH Bavanti,
   sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti / (Vaidya 222) ābhyāṃ	sarva DarmAH ca anena SUnyatAtaH vyavalokitAH Bavanti / (VEdyaH 222) AByAm
   subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo	suBUte dvAByAm DarmAByAm samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH durGarzaH 
   bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ / aparābhyāṃ subhūte	Bavati mArEH pApIyoBiH mArakAyikABiH vA devatABiH / aparAByAm suBUte
   dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati	dvAByAm DarmAByAm samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH durGarzaH Bavati
   māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ / katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām?	mArEH pApIyoBiH mArakAyikABiH vA devatABiH / katamAByAm dvAByAm ?
   yaduta yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati, buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ	yat uta yaTAvAdI taTA AkArI ca Bavati, budDEH ca BagavadBiH
   samanvāhriyate / ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo	samanvAhriyate / AByAm suBUte dvAByAm samanvAgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ	mahAsattvaH durGarzaH Bavati mArEH pApIyoBiH mArakAyikABiH vA devatABiH
   / evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā	/ evam carataH suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya devAH 
   apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante / upasaṃkramya ca paripraṣṭavyaṃ maṃsyante,	api upasaMkramitavyam maMsyante / upasaMkramya ca pariprazwavyam maMsyante,
   paripraśnīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante, paryupāsitavyaṃ maṃsyante, utsāhaṃ cāsya	paripraSnIkartavyam maMsyante, paryupAsitavyam maMsyante, utsAham ca asya
   vardhayiṣyanti   kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ	varDayizyanti  kzipram tvam kula putra anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase / tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase / tasmAt tarhi kula putra anena eva vihAreNa
   vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa / tatkasya hetoḥ? etenaiva hi tvaṃ	vihara yat uta prajQApAramitA vihAreNa / tat kasya hetoH? etena eva hi tvam
   kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi, atrāṇānāṃ	kula putra vihAreNa viharan anATAnAm sattvAnAm nATaH Bavizyasi, atrANAnAm
   sattvānāṃ trātā bhaviṣyasi, aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasi,	sattvAnAm trAtA Bavizyasi, aSaraNAnAm sattvAnAm SaraNam Bavizyasi,
   alayanānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhaviṣyasi, aparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ	alayanAnAm sattvAnAm layanam Bavizyasi, aparAyaNAnAm sattvAnAm parAyaNam
   bhaviṣyasi, advīpānāṃ sattvānāṃ dvīpo bhaviṣyasi, andhānāṃ sattvānāmāloko	Bavizyasi, advIpAnAm sattvAnAm dvIpaH Bavizyasi, anDAnAm sattvAnAm AlokaH 
   bhaviṣyasi, apariṇāyakānāṃ sattvānāṃ pariṇāyako bhaviṣyasi, agatikānāṃ	Bavizyasi, apariNAyakAnAm sattvAnAm pariNAyakaH Bavizyasi, agatikAnAm
   sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyasi, mārgapranaṣṭānāṃ sattvānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ	sattvAnAm gatiH Bavizyasi, mArga pranazwAnAm sattvAnAm apratiSaraNAnAm
   mārgapraṇetā pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasi / evaṃ te devaputrāstasya	mArga praNetA pratiSaraNam Bavizyasi / evam te deva putrAH tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? etena	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya utsAham varDayizyanti / tat kasya hetoH? etena
   hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye	hi suBUte prajQApAramitA vihAreNa viharataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya ye
   te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti	te aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti
   dhriyante yāpayanti, te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ	Driyante yApayanti, te api Bikzu saMGa parivRtAH boDisattva gaNa puraskRtAH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH viharataH tasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,	eBiH evaMrUpEH guNEH samanvAgatasya yat uta prajQApAramitA viharaNa guNEH,
   buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā	budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca gotram ca balam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpA
   dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /	Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti tasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya /
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte aham etarhi ratna ketoH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya,
   śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca	SiKinaH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya nAma ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca
   rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi, udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ	rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpaH Darmam deSayAmi, udAnam ca udAnayAmi aparezAm
   ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām, ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ	ca boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm, yaH etarhi akzoByasya taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti / evameva subhūte te 'pi	samyaksaMbudDasya antike brahmacaryam caranti / evam eva suBUte te api
   buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	budDAH BagavantaH ye etarhi iha mama budDa kzetre boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   brahmacaryaṃ caranti, anena ca prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharanti, teṣāṃ ca	brahmacaryam caranti, anena ca prajQApAramitA vihAreNa viharanti, tezAm ca
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm nAma ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca
   parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti //	parikIrtayamAna rUpAH Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti //
   subhūtirāha   kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma	suBUtiH Aha  kim sarvezAm eva Bagavan boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm nAma
   ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā	ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpAH te budDA
   bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti? bhagavānāha   no hīdaṃ	BagavantaH Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti? BagavAn Aha  no hi idam
   subhūte / na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ	suBUte / na suBUte sarvezAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm nAma ca gotram
   ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto	ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpAH te budDAH BagavantaH 
   dharmaṃ (Vaidya 223) deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti, kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye	Darmam (VEdyaH 223) deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti, kim tarhi suBUte ye
   te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ, teṣāṃ te	te avinivartanIyAH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sarva saFga vigatAH, tezAm te
   buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca	budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca
   parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti //	parikIrtayamAna rUpAH Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti //
   subhūtirāha   santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān	suBUtiH Aha  santi Bagavan avinivartanIyAn boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn
   sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto	sTApayitvA tatas anye boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH, yezAm te budDAH BagavantaH 
   nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ	nAma ca gotram ca balam varNam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpA Darmam
   deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti? bhagavānāha   santi subhūte	deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti? BagavAn Aha  santi suBUte
   pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān	pratipakza balinaH boDisattva yAnikAH pudgalAH avinivartanIyAn boDisattvAn
   mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā, yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca	mahAsattvAn sTApayitvA, yezAm te budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca gotram ca
   balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ	balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpA Darmam deSayanti, udAnam
   codānayanti / te punaḥ katame? ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ	ca udAnayanti / te punar katame? ye etarhi akzoByasya taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ	samyaksaMbudDasya boDisattva caryAm anuSikzamANa rUpA boDisattva cArikAm
   caranti, anuśikṣamāṇarūpā viharanti, ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ	caranti, anuSikzamANa rUpAH viharanti, ime te suBUte boDisattva yAnikAH
   pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te	pudgalAH avinivartanIyAn boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn sTApayitvA yezAm te
   buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca	budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca
   parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti / ye 'pi te	parikIrtayamAna rUpAH Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti / ye api te
   subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	suBUte ratna ketoH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti, anuśikṣamāṇā	boDisattva caryAm anuSikzamANa rUpA boDisattva caryAm caranti, anuSikzamANA
   viharanti, ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān	viharanti, ime api te suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH avinivartanIyAn
   bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca	boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn sTApayitvA yezAm te budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca
   gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ	gotram ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpA Darmam
   deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti //	deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ	punar aparam suBUte ye boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQApAramitAyAm carantaH
   sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti, na ca	sarva DarmAH anutpattikAH iti aDimuQcanti, na ca
   tāvadanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhā bhavanti / sarvadharmāḥ śāntā	tAvat anutpattika Darma kzAnti pratilabDAH Bavanti / sarva DarmAH SAntA
   ityadhimuñcanti, na ca sarvadharmeṣvavinivartanīyavaśitāprāptimavakrāntā	iti aDimuQcanti, na ca sarva Darmezu avinivartanIya vaSitA prAptim avakrAntA
   bhavanti / anenāpi subhūte vihāreṇa viharatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	Bavanti / anena api suBUte vihAreNa viharatAm tezAm boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca	mahAsattvAnAm te budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca
   rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti / yeṣāṃ	rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpAH Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti / yezAm
   khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma	Kalu punar suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm te budDAH BagavantaH nAma
   ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ	ca gotram ca balam ca varNam ca rUpam ca parikIrtayamAna rUpA Darmam
   deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti, prahīṇā teṣāṃ śrāvakabhūmiḥ	deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti, prahINA tezAm SrAvaka BUmiH
   pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca / buddhabhūmireva teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā / te 'pi	pratyekabudDa BUmiH ca / budDa BUmiH eva tezAm pratikAFkzitavyAH / te api
   vyākariṣyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tatkasya hetoḥ? yeṣāṃ hi	vyAkarizyante anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO / tat kasya hetoH? yezAm hi
   subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te	suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm evam prajQApAramitAyAm caratAm te
   buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca	budDAH BagavantaH nAma ca gotram ca balam ca varNam na rUpam ca
   parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti, te	parikIrtayamAna rUpAH Darmam deSayanti, udAnam ca udAnayanti, te
   'pyavinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyanti //	api avinivartanIya tAyAm sTAsyanti //
   punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ	punar aparam suBUte ye boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH imAm gamBIrAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti, na dhandhāyiṣyanti, na	prajQApAramitAm BAzyamANAm SrutvA aDimokzyanti, na DanDAyizyanti, na
   kāṅkṣiṣyanti, na vicikitsiṣyanti, evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā	kAFkzizyanti, na vicikitsizyanti, evam etat yaTA taTAgatena arhatA
   samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti, evaṃ ca	samyaksaMbudDena BAzitam iti aDimucya vistareNa Srozyanti, evam ca
   cittamutpādayiṣyanti   (Vaidya 224) imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya	cittam utpAdayizyanti  (VEdyaH 224) imAm vayam prajQApAramitAm akzoByasya
   tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti, teṣāṃ ca	taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya antikAt vistareNa SRNuyAma iti, tezAm ca
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ	boDisattva yAnikAnAm pudgalAnAm ye ca asya budDa kzetre brahmacaryam
   caranti, teṣāṃ cāntikādimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti, te	caranti, tezAm ca antikAt imAm eva prajQApAramitAm SrutvA aDimokzyanti, te
   'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā	api enAm prajQApAramitAm aDimucyamAnA yaTA taTAgatena BAzitA taTA
   cādhimokṣyante, tathā cādhimucyamānā avinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyanti / evaṃ	ca aDimokzyante, taTA ca aDimucyamAnAH avinivartanIya tAyAm sTAsyanti / evam
   subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi, kaḥ punarvādo ya	suBUte bahu karam prajQApAramitAyAH SravaNam api vadAmi, kaH punar vAdaH ya
   enāmadhimokṣyanti / adhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti / tathatvāya	enAm aDimokzyanti / aDimucya taTatvAya sTAsyanti / taTatvAya
   pratipatsyante / tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti	pratipatsyante / taTatvAya sTitvA taTatvAya pratipadya tizWanti
   tathatāyām / tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti //	taTatAyAm / taTatAyAm tizWantaH sarvajQa tAyAm ca Darmam deSayanti //
   subhūtirāha   yadā bhagavaṃstathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma	suBUtiH Aha  yadA Bagavan= taTatA vinirmuktaH na anyaH kaScid Darma
   upalabhyate, tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām, ko vā	upalaByate, tadA kaH ayam Bagavan DarmaH sTAsyati taTatA AyAm, kaH vA
   ayamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate, ko vā ayamimaṃ dharmaṃ	ayam anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyate, kaH vE ayam imam Darmam
   deśayiṣyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   yatsubhūte	deSayizyati? evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yat suBUte
   evaṃ vadasi   yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate, tadā	evam vadasi  yadA taTatA vinirmuktaH na anyaH kaScid DarmaH upalaByate, tadA
   ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati, ko vācamanuttarāṃ	kaH ayam Bagavan DarmaH taTatAyAm sTAsyati, kaH vAcam anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate, ko vāyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti / na	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyate, kaH vA ayam imam Darmam deSayizyati iti / na
   subhūte tathatāvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate, yo	suBUte taTatA vinirmuktaH anyaH kaScid DarmaH upalaByate, yaH 
   dharmastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati / tathataiva tāvatsubhūte nopalabhyate, kaḥ	DarmaH taTatAyAm sTAsyati / taTatA eva tAvat suBUte na upalaByate, kaH
   punarvādo yastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati / na subhūte tathatā anuttarāṃ	punar vAdaH yaH taTatAyAm sTAsyati / na suBUte taTatA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate / so 'pi subhūte dharmo na	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate / saH api suBUte DarmaH na
   kaścidupalabhyate, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho vā,	kaScid upalaByate, yaH anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH vA,
   abhisaṃbhotsyate vā, abhisaṃbudhyate vā / na subhūte tathatā dharmaṃ	aBisaMBotsyate vA, aBisaMbuDyate vA / na suBUte taTatA Darmam
   deśayati / so 'pi subhūte nopalabhyate, yo dharmo deśyeta //	deSayati / saH api suBUte na upalaByate, yaH DarmaH deSyeta //
   atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat   gambhīrā bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat  gamBIrAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā / duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, ye	prajQApAramitA / duzkara kArakAH Bagavan boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH, ye
   'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? na ca nāma	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmAH / tat kasya hetoH? na ca nAma

   nāvalīyante, nāpi kāṅkṣanti, nāpi dhandhāyante //	na avalIyante, na api kAFkzanti, na api DanDAyante //
   atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   yatkauśika	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  yat kOSika

   prajñāpāramitām api tāvanna samanupaśyati, nopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryaḥ	prajQApAramitAm api tAvat na samanupaSyati, na upalaBate, kutas punar yaH

   (Vaidya 226)	(VEdyaH 226)

   atha khalu tasmin samaye 'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ	aTa Kalu tasmin samaye anyataraH deva putraH trAyastriMSEH deva putrEH

   teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ	tezAm praviSatAm aBinizkrAmatAm viharatAm ca paQca varNikAnAm puzpANAm
   puṣpavarṣāḥ pravartiṣyante / tasmāttarhi ānanda	puzpa varzAH pravartizyante / tasmAt tarhi Ananda
   bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ	boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH uttamena vihAreNa vihartu kAmEH
   prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa (Vaidya 227) vihartavyam / tathāgatavihāreṇa ānanda	prajQApAramitA vihAreNa (VEdyaH 227) vihartavyam / taTAgata vihAreNa Ananda
   vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihartavyam / ye hi kecidānanda	vihartu kAmEH prajQApAramitA vihAreNa vihartavyam / ye hi kecid Ananda
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti, niṣṭhā tatra	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQApAramitAyAm carizyanti, nizWA tatra
   gantavyā   manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti / te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya	gantavyAH  manuzyeByaH eva ete cyutAH Bavizyanti / te iha upapannAH tuziteBya
   eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ / tatkasya	eva vA deva nikAyeByaH cyutAH Bavizyanti manuzyezu eva upapannAH / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa	hetoH? taTA hi manuzyezu tuzitezu ca devezu iyam prajQApAramitA vistareNa
   pracariṣyatīti / tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā	pracarizyati iti / taTAgata avalokitAH Kalu punar Ananda te boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ, ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti, ya imāṃ	mahAsattvAH veditavyAH, yaH iha prajQApAramitAyAm carizyanti, yaH imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti, dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti	prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti, DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti
   pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, antaśo	pravartayizyanti deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti, antaSas 
   likhiṣyanti, udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya	liKizyanti, udgRhya DArayitvA vAcayitvA paryavApya pravartya
   deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān	deSayitvA upadiSya uddiSya su ADyAyya antaSas liKitvA boDisattvAn
   mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti	mahAsattvAn avavadizyanti anuSAsizyanti saMdarSayizyanti samAdApayizyanti
   samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti / avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda	samuttejayizyanti saMpraharzayizyanti / avaropita kuSala mUlAH te Ananda
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu / na	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH veditavyAH taTAgatezu arhatsu samyaksaMbudDezu / na
   kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha	kevalam SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm antike tEH kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni iha
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum, niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitum, niHsaMSayam Kalu punar Ananda
   tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni	taTAgatezu arhatsu samyaksaMbudDezu tEH kuSala mUlAni avaropitAni
   bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ, ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣante, na	boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH, yaH iha prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzante, na
   cotrāsamāpadyante / ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti	cotrAsamApadyante / ye ca AnandaH enAm prajQApAramitAm udgrahIzyanti
   dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	DArayizyanti vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca, arthataś	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti ca, arTataH 
   ca dharmataś ca nayataścānugamiṣyanti, niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā  	ca DarmataH ca nayataH ca anugamizyanti, nizWA Ananda tatra gantavyAH  
   saṃmukhībhūtāste abhūvan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	saMmuKIBUtAH te aBUvan boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmiti / ye caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na pratikrośanti, na	samyaksaMbudDAnAm iti / ye ca enAm prajQApAramitAm na pratikroSanti, na
   prativahanti, na pratikopayanti, na pratisaṃharanti, na pratiṣedhayanti,	prativahanti, na pratikopayanti, na pratisaMharanti, na pratizeDayanti,
   na pratikṣipanti, na pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante, te 'pyānanda bodhisattvā	na pratikzipanti, na pratibADitavyAm maMsyante, te api Ananda boDisattvA
   mahāsattvāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā veditavyāḥ //	mahAsattvAH pUrva jina kRta aDikArAH veditavyAH //
   kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	kiMca api Ananda boDisattvena mahAsattvena taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam, evaṃ hi tanna	samyaksaMbudDAnAm antike kuSala mUlam avaropitam, evam hi tat na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya dāsyati vipākam / sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa tvAya dAsyati vipAkam / saced boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam, api tu khalu	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO na visaMvAdayizyati praNiDAnam, api tu Kalu
   punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ	punar Ananda prAyeNa tena boDisattvena mahAsattvena kRtajQena Bavitavyam
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā / tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi	prajQApAramitAyAm caritavatA / tasmAt tarhi te Ananda parIndAmi
   anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā	anupari indAmi imAm prajQApAramitAm BUyasyA mAtrayA
   akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya	akzara saMnipAtAt udgrahaNAya DAraNAya vAcanAya paryavAptaye pravartanAya
   cirasthitaye yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta / sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo	cira sTitaye yaTA iyam na antarDIyeta / saced tvam Ananda yaH mayA te DarmaH 
   deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām, tāṃ sarvāṃ	deSitaH sAkzAt sTApayitvA prajQApAramitAm, tAm sarvAm
   dharmadeśanāmudgṛhya punareva vipraṇāśayeḥ, punarevotsṛjeḥ vismārayeḥ, na	Darma deSanAm udgRhya punar eva vipraNASayeH, punar eva utsRjeH vismArayeH, na
   me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ / yatkhalu punastvamānanda	me tvam AnandaH etAvatA aparAdDaH syAH / yat Kalu punar tvam Ananda
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ, utsṛjeḥ,	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktam padam vA pada sAmantakam vA nASayeH, utsRjeH,
   vismārayeḥ, tāvatā tvamānanda mamāparāddhaḥ syāḥ, na ca me tvaṃ	vismArayeH, tAvatA tvam Ananda mama aparAdDaH syAH, na ca me tvam
   cittamārādhayeḥ / sacetpunastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhya punareva	cittam ArADayeH / saced punar tvam Ananda prajQApAramitAm udgRhya punar eva
   nāśayeḥ, punarevotsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, na tvayāhaṃ satkṛto gurukṛtaḥ syām,	na ASayeH, punar eva utsRjeH, vismArayeH, na tvayA aham satkRtaH gurukRtaH syAm,
   na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām / ye 'pi (Vaidya 228) te	na mAnitaH na pUjitaH na arcitaH na apacAyitaH syAm / ye api (VEdyaH 228) te
   ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ, te 'pi tvayā ānanda na	Ananda atIta anAgata pratyutpannAH budDAH BagavantaH, te api tvayA Ananda na
   satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti /	satkRtAH na gurukRtAH na mAnitAH na pUjitAH na arcitAH na apacAyitAH Bavanti /
   sacetpunastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhya punareva nāśayeḥ,	saced punar tvam Ananda prajQApAramitAm udgRhya punar eva nASayeH,
   punarevotsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, tāvatā tvamānanda mamāparāddhaḥ syāḥ, na ca me	punar eva utsRjeH, vismArayeH, tAvatA tvam Ananda mama aparAdDaH syAH, na ca me
   tvaṃ cittamārādhayeḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? uktametadānanda tathāgatena  	tvam cittam ArADayeH / tat kasya hetoH? uktam etat Ananda taTAgatena  
   prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	prajQApAramitA atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi /	samyaksaMbudDAnAm mAtA jananI janayitrI sarvajQa tAyAH AhArikA iti /
   tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,	tasmAt tarhi Ananda parIndAmi anupari indAmi te imAm prajQApAramitAm,
   yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta / udgrahītavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā,	yaTA iyam na antarDIyeta / udgrahItavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA,
   dhārayitavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā, vācayitavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā,	DArayitavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA, vAcayitavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA,
   paryavāptavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā, pravartayitavyeyamānanda	paryavAptavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA, pravartayitavyA iyam Ananda
   prajñāpāramitā, deśayitavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā, upadeṣṭavyeyamānanda	prajQApAramitA, deSayitavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA, upadezwavyA iyam Ananda
   prajñāpāramitā, uddeṣṭavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā, svādhyātavyeyamānanda	prajQApAramitA, uddezwavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA, su ADyAtavyA iyam Ananda
   prajñāpāramitā, likhitavyeyamānanda prajñāpāramitā, bhāvayitavyeyamānanda	prajQApAramitA, liKitavyA iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA, BAvayitavyA iyam Ananda
   prajñāpāramitā / sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā	prajQApAramitA / sumanasikRtA ca suDRtA ca su paryavAptA ca su pravartitA
   ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā /	ca tvayA AnandaH iyam prajQApAramitA kartavyA /
   suparivyaktenākṣarapadavyañjanena suniruktā codgrahītavyā / tatkasya	su parivyaktena akzara pada vyaQjanena su niruktA ca udgrahItavyA / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ	hetoH? atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm hi Ananda taTAgatAnAm arhatAm
   samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya / yathā	samyaksaMbudDAnAm DarmakAyatA iti tAm DarmatAm pramANIkRtya / yaTA
   tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato	tattvam AnandaH etarhi me taTAgatasya tizWataH DriyamANasya yApayataH 
   hitaiṣitayā premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā	hita ezitayA premataH vA gOravataH vA kalyANataH vA sparSa vihArataH vA
   kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase, tathaiva tvayā	kartavyam vA dAtavyam vA samanvAhartavyam vA manyase, taTA eva tvayA
   ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā	AnandaH iyam prajQApAramitA udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA
   paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā	paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA deSayitavyAH upadezwavyA uddezwavyA
   svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā	su ADyAtavyA liKitavyA BAvayitavyA satkartavyA guru kartavyA mAnayitavyA
   pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā, tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena	pUjayitavyA arcayitavyAH apacAyitavyA, tayA hita ezitayA tena premNA tena
   gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā / evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi, te ca	gOraveNa tayA guNavat tayA / evam tvayA Ananda aham pUjitaH BavAmi, te ca
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ / atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH / atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm ca budDAnAm
   bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati / yadi	BagavatAm antike prema ca prasAdaH ca gOravam ca utpAditam Bavati / yadi
   te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo 'parityaktastathāgataḥ, tataste ānanda iyaṃ	te Ananda aham priyaH manaA apaH aparityaktaH taTAgataH, tatas te AnandaH iyam
   prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu, yathā te ekapadam api	prajQApAramitA priyA manaA apA aparityajanIyAH Bavatu, yaTA te eka padam api
   na praṇaśyet, yathā nāntardhīyeta / bahv api te ānanda ahaṃ bhāṣeyaṃ	na praNaSyet, yaTA na antarDIyeta / bahu api te Ananda aham BAzeyam
   prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parīndanāmāramya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā	prajQApAramitAyAH parIndanAm Aramya kalpam vA kalpa avaSezam vA kalpa Satam vA
   kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīṃ vā kalpakoṭīśataṃ vā	kalpa sahasram vA kalpa Sata sahasram vA kalpa kowIm vA kalpa kowI Satam vA
   kalpakoṭīsahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā upari / saṃkṣepeṇa	kalpa kowI sahasram vA kalpa kowI Sata sahasram vA tatas vA upari / saMkzepeNa
   ānanda yādṛśastavāhaṃ śāstā, tādṛśī te prajñāpāramitā śāstā / yādṛśāste	Ananda yAdRSaH tava aham SAstA, tAdRSI te prajQApAramitA SAstA / yAdRSAH te
   atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAH budDAH BagavantaH sa deva mAnuza asurasya lokasya
   śāstāraḥ, tādṛśī prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya śāstā /	SAstAraH, tAdRSI prajQApAramitA sa deva mAnuza asurasya lokasya SAstA /
   tasmāttarhi ānanda aparimāṇā prajñāpāramitā / aparimāṇayā parīndanayā	tasmAt tarhi Ananda aparimANA prajQApAramitA / aparimANayA parIndanayA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ te parīndāmyanuparīndāmi sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya	prajQApAramitAm te parIndAmi anupari indAmi sa deva mAnuza asurasya lokasya
   hitāya sukhāya / yasya ānanda tathāgato na parityaktaḥ, dharmo na	hitAya suKAya / yasya Ananda taTAgataH na parityaktaH, DarmaH na
   parityaktaḥ, saṃgho na parityaktaḥ, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ	parityaktaH, saMGaH na parityaktaH, atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ bodhirna parityaktā, tasya prajñāpāramitā aparityaktā bhavatu /	BagavatAm boDiH na parityaktA, tasya prajQApAramitA aparityaktA Bavatu /
   iyamasmākamanuśāsanī / (Vaidya 229) yo 'pi kaścidānanda enāṃ	iyam asmAkam anuSAsanI / (VEdyaH 229) yaH api kaScid AnandaH enAm
   prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇīyāddhārayetparyadvācayedāpnuyātpravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet	prajQApAramitAm udgRhNIyAt DArayet paryat vAcayet ApnuyAt pravartayet deSayet upadiSet uddiSet svADyAyet
   likhedbhāvayet, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena	liKet BAvayet, atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm tena
   bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavet / yo hi kaścidānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	boDiH anuparigRhItAH Bavet / yaH hi kaScid AnandaH enAm prajQApAramitAm
   pralujyamānāmanuparigṛhṇīte, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ	pralujyamAnAm anuparigRhNIte, atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ?	BagavatAm tena boDiH anuparigRhItA Bavati / tat kasya hetoH?
   prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ / ye 'pi te	prajQApAramitA nirjAtAH hi Ananda budDAnAm BagavatAm boDiH / ye api te
   ānanda abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,	Ananda aBUvan= atIte aDvani taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH,
   teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā	tezAm api Ananda budDAnAm BagavatAm prajQApAramitA nirjAtA eva anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhūt / te 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti	samyaksaMboDiH aBUt / te api te Ananda anAgate aDvani Bavizyanti
   tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH, tezAm api Ananda budDAnAm BagavatAm
   prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirbhaviṣyati / ye 'pi te	prajQApAramitA nirjAtA eva anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH Bavizyati / ye api te
   ānanda aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā	Ananda aprameyezu asaMKyezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDA
   etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	etarhi tizWanti Driyante yApayanti, tezAm api Ananda budDAnAm BagavatAm
   prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / tasmāttarhi ānanda	prajQApAramitA nirjAtA eva anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH / tasmAt tarhi Ananda
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmena
   ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā	zawsu pAramitAsu Sikzitu kAmena iyam eva prajQApAramitA SrotavyA
   udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā	udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA
   deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā / ihaiva	deSayitavya upadezwa vya uddezwavyA su ADyAtavyAH liKitavyA / iha eva
