   nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā / na hi pramāṇavatīyamānanda	nAmakAya padakAya vyaQjana kAyAH prajQApAramitA / na hi pramANavatI iyam Ananda
   prajñāpāramitā / aparimāṇā hyānanda prajñāpāramitā //	prajQApAramitA / aparimANAH hi Ananda prajQApAramitA //
   ānanda āha   kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ	AnandaH Aha  kena punar kAraNena Bagavan BagavatA prajQApAramitAyAH
   pramāṇaṃ nākhyātam ? bhagavānāha   akṣayatvādānanda	pramANam na AKyAtam ? BagavAn Aha  akzaya tvAt Ananda
   prajñāpāramitāyāstathāgataḥ pramāṇaṃ na nirdiśati / viviktatvādānanda	prajQApAramitAyAH taTAgataH pramANam na nirdiSati / vivikta tvAt Ananda
   prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ tathāgatena nākhyātam / na hyānanda viviktasya	prajQApAramitAyAH pramANam taTAgatena na AKyAtam / na hi Ananda viviktasya
   dharmasya viviktatāpyupalabhyate, kutaḥ punarasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati?	Darmasya vivikta tA api upalaByate, kutas punar asya pramANam Bavizyati?
   evamānanda prajñāpāramitā aprameyatvādapramāṇā aparimāṇā / ye 'pi te	evam Ananda prajQApAramitA aprameya tvAt apramANAH aparimANAH / ye api te
   ānanda atīte 'dhvanyabhūvaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te	Ananda atIte aDvani aBUvan= taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH, te
   'pyānanda ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvitāḥ / na cānanda iyaṃ	api AnandaH itas eva prajQApAramitAtaH praBAvitAH / na ca AnandaH iyam
   prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā vā parikṣīṇā vā / ye 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani	prajQApAramitA kzINAH vA parikzINAH vA / ye api te Ananda anAgate aDvani
   bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pyānanda ita eva	Bavizyanti taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH, te api AnandaH itas eva
   prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvayiṣyante / na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA ataH praBAvayizyante / na ca AnandaH iyam prajQApAramitA
   kṣeṣyate vā parikṣeṣyate vā / ye 'pi te ānanda	kzezyate vA parikzezyate vA / ye api te Ananda
   etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ	etarhi aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te 'pyānanda ita eva	samyaksaMbudDAH tizWanti Driyante yApayanti, te api AnandaH itas eva
   prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvyante / na ceyamānanda prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā	prajQApAramitA ataH praBAvyante / na ca iyam Ananda prajQApAramitA kzIyate vA
   parikṣīyate vā / ahamapyānanda etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /	parikzIyate vA / aham api Anande etarhi taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH /
   mamāpyānanda ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvanā / na cānanda iyaṃ	mama api AnandaH itas eva prajQApAramitAtaH praBAvanA / na ca AnandaH iyam
   prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā / tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśaṃ hi sa	prajQApAramitA kzIyate vA parikzIyate vA / tat kasya hetoH? AkASam hi sa
   ānanda kṣayayitavyaṃ manyeta, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kṣayayitavyāṃ manyeta /	Ananda kzayayitavyam manyeta, yaH prajQApAramitAm kzayayitavyAm manyeta /
   tasmāttarhyānanda akṣayeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //	tasmAt tarhi Ananda akzayeyam prajQApAramitA //
   atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteretadabhavat   gambhīramidaṃ sthānaṃ	aTa Kalu AyuzmataH suBUteH etat aBavat  gamBIram idam sTAnam
   tathāgatena bhāṣitam / yannvahaṃ tathāgataṃ pṛccheyametatsthānam / atha	taTAgatena BAzitam / yat nu aham taTAgatam pRcCeyam etat sTAnam / aTa
   khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat   akṣayā bhagavan	Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat  akzayAH Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha   akṣayā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā yaduta	prajQApAramitA? BagavAn Aha  akzayA hi suBUte prajQApAramitA yat uta
   ākāśākṣayatvātsarvadharmānutpādataḥ / subhūtirāha   kathaṃ bhagavan	AkASa akzaya tvAt sarva Darma anutpAdataH / suBUtiH Aha  kaTam Bagavan
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā? bhagavānāha  	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA aBinirhartavyA? BagavAn Aha  
   rūpākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā	rUpa akzaya tvena suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA
   abhinirhartavyā / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānākṣayatvena subhūte	aBinirhartavyA / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAna akzaya tvena suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā / evaṃ khalu	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA aBinirhartavyA / evam Kalu
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA aBinirhartavyA /
   avidyākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā	avidyA kzaya tvena suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA
   abhinirhartavyā / evaṃ saṃskārākṣayatvena vijñānākṣayatvena	aBinirhartavyA / evam saMskAra akzaya tvena vijQAna akzaya tvena
   nāmarūpākṣayatvena ṣaḍāyatanākṣayatvena sparśākṣayatvena (Vaidya 232)	nAma rUpa akzaya tvena zaz Ayatana akzaya tvena sparSa akzaya tvena (VEdyaH 232)
   vedanākṣayatvena tṛṣṇākṣayatvena upādānākṣayatvena bhavākṣayatvena	vedanA kzaya tvena tRzNA kzaya tvena upAdAna akzaya tvena Bava akzaya tvena
   jātyakṣayatvena jarāmaraṇākṣayatvena	jAtya kzaya tvena jarA maraNa akzaya tvena
   śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena	Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsA kzaya tvena suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā / iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA aBinirhartavyA / iyam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya antadvayavivarjitā pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā / evaṃ	mahAsattvasya anta dvaya vivarjitA pratItyasamutpAda vyavalokanA / evam
   vyavalokayan subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	vyavalokayan suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   pratītyanutpādamanādyantamadhyaṃ taṃ vyavalokayati / ayaṃ subhūte	pratIti anutpAdam anAdi anta maDyam tam vyavalokayati / ayam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya, yadevaṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya AveNikaH DarmaH boDimaNxe nizaNNasya, yat evam
   pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati / evaṃ vyavalokayataḥ subhūte	pratItyasamutpAdam vyavalokayati / evam vyavalokayataH suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvajñajñānapratilambho	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pratItyasamutpAdaH sarvajQa jQAna pratilamBaH 
   bhavati / yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anena	Bavati / yaH hi kaScid suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anena
   akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ	akzaya aBinirhAreNa prajQApAramitAyAm caran pratItyasamutpAdam
   vyavalokayati, sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyati,	vyavalokayati, sa na SrAvaka BUmO vA pratyekabudDa BUmO vA sTAsyati,
   api tu sthāsyati sarvajñatāyām / ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	api tu sTAsyati sarvajQa tAyAm / ye kecid suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, sacet imān manasikārānidaṃ	vivartante anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH, saced imAn manasikArAn idam
   copāyakauśalyamanāgamya na jānanti   kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	ca upAya kOSalyam anAgamya na jAnanti  kaTam prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā	boDisattvena mahAsattvena akzaya aBinirhAreNa prajQApAramitA
   abhinirhartavyā, kathaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	aBinirhartavyA, kaTam ca akzaya aBinirhAreNa prajQApAramitAyAm
   pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavya iti / ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā	pratItyasamutpAdaH vyavalokayitavyaH iti / ye kecid suBUte boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā vivṛttā vivartante, vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ	mahAsattvAH vivRttAH vivartante, vivartsyante ca anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodheḥ, sarve te idamupāyakauśalyamanāgamya vivṛttā vivartante	samyaksaMboDeH, sarve te idam upAya kOSalyam anAgamya vivRttAH vivartante
   vivartsyante ca / ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivṛttā na	vivartsyante ca / ye kecid suBUte boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH na vivRttAH na
   vivartante na vivartsyante ca, sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya na	vivartante na vivartsyante ca, sarve te imAm prajQApAramitAm Agamya na
   vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /	vivRttAH na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH /
   evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	evam prajQApAramitAyAm caratA boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā / evaṃ ca	akzaya aBinirhAreNa prajQApAramitA aBinirhartavyA / evam ca
   akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ /	akzaya aBinirhAreNa prajQApAramitAyAm pratItyasamutpAdaH vyavalokayitavyaH /
   evaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ	evam Kalu punar suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pratItyasamutpAdam
   vyavalokayan na kaṃciddharmamahetukamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati, na	vyavalokayat na kaMcid Darmam ahetukam utpadyamAnam samanupaSyati, na
   kaṃciddharmaṃ nityaṃ vā dhruvaṃ vā śāśvataṃ vā avipariṇāmadharmakaṃ vā	kaMcid Darmam nityam vA Druvam vA SASvatam vA avipariNAma Darmakam vA
   samanupaśyati / na kaṃciddharmaṃ kārakaṃ vā vedakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /	samanupaSyati / na kaMcid Darmam kArakam vA vedakam vA samanupaSyati /
   iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ	iyam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharato 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAm akzaya aBinirhAreNa aBinirharataH asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   carataḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā / yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo	carataH pratItya samutpAda vyavalokanAH / yasmin samaye suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharan	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm akzaya aBinirhAreNa aBinirharan
   pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati, tasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo	pratItyasamutpAdam vyavalokayati, tasmin samaye suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati, na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān, na	mahAsattvaH na rUpam samanupaSyati, na vedanAm na saMjQAm na saMskArAn, na
   vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nāvidyāṃ samanupaśyati / evaṃ na saṃskārānna	vijQAnam samanupaSyati, na avidyAm samanupaSyati / evam na saMskArAn na
   vijñānaṃ na nāmarūpaṃ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sparśaṃ na vedanāṃ na tṛṣṇāṃ	vijQAnam na nAma rUpam na zaz Ayatanam na sparSam na vedanAm na tRzNAm
   nopādānaṃ na bhavaṃ na jātiṃ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na	na upAdAnam na Bavam na jAtim na jarA maraNam na
   śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān samanupaśyati / idaṃ buddhakṣetramiti	Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsAn samanupaSyati / idam budDa kzetram iti
   na samanupaśyati, anyadbuddhakṣetramiti na samanupaśyati / tam api dharmaṃ	na samanupaSyati, anyat budDa kzetram iti na samanupaSyati / tam api Darmam
   na samanupaśyati, yena dharmeṇa idaṃ vā anyadvā buddhakṣetraṃ samanupaśyet	na samanupaSyati, yena DarmeNa idam vE anyat vA budDa kzetram samanupaSyet 
   / iyaṃ sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā / yasmin	/ iyam sA suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitA / yasmin
   samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tasmin	samaye suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm carati, tasmin
   samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati / (Vaidya 233)	samaye mAraH pApIyAn parama Soka Salya samarpitaH Bavati / (VEdyaH 233)
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitṛṣu kālagateṣu	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte puruzaH mAtA pitRzu kAlagatezu
   paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati, evameva subhūte yasmin samaye	parama Soka Salya samarpitaH Bavati, evam eva suBUte yasmin samaye
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tasmin samaye māraḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm carati, tasmin samaye mAraH
   pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati //	pApIyAn parama Soka Salya samarpitaH Bavati //
   subhūtirāha   kimeka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito	suBUtiH Aha  kim ekaH eva Bagavat mAraH pApIyAn parama Soka Salya samarpitaH 
   bhavati, utāho bahavo mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,	Bavati, uta aho bahavaH mArAH pApIyAMsaH parama Soka Salya samarpitAH Bavanti,
   utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te 'pi sarve	uta aho ye tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO mArAH pApIyAMsaH te api sarve
   tasmin samaye paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti? evamukte	tasmin samaye parama Soka Salya samarpitAH Bavanti? evam ukte
   bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat   yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo	BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat  yasmin samaye suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati, tasmin samaye ye	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA vihAreNa viharati, tasmin samaye ye
   trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāṃ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te sarve	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO mArAm pApIyAMsaH te sarve
   paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti, svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante /	parama Soka Salya samarpitAH Bavanti, svaka svakezu Asanezu na ramante /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa hi viharato 'sya subhūte	tat kasya hetoH? prajQApAramitA vihAreNa hi viharataH asya suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sa deva mAnuza AsuraH lokaH avatAram na laBate
   grahaṇāya, gādhaṃ na labhate, yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā viheṭhayedvā vivartayedvā	grahaNAya, gADam na laBate, yatra enam gRhItvA viheWayet vA vivartayet vA
   anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ / tasmāttarhiḥ subhūte bodhisattvena	anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH / tasmAt tarhiH suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena	mahAsattvena anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi	prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam / tat kasya hetoH? prajQApAramitAyAm hi
   subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ	suBUte carataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA BAvanA paripUrim
   gacchati, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā	gacCati, evam SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA
   bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato	BAvanA paripUrim gacCati / prajQApAramitAyAm hi suBUte carataH 
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sarvAH zaw pAramitA BAvanA paripUrim
   gacchanti, sarvāṇi copāyakauśalyāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti / tasya	gacCanti, sarvANi ca upAya kOSalyAni BAvanA paripUrim gacCanti / tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH yAni
   kānicinmārakarmāṇyutpadyeran, sarvāṇi tānyutpadyamānānyeva sa prajñāsyati,	kAnicid mAra karmANi utpadyeran, sarvANi tAni utpadyamAnAni eva sa prajQAsyati,
   prajānan visarjayiṣyati / sarvopāyakauśalyāni subhūte parigrahītukāmena	prajAnan visarjayizyati / sarva upAya kOSalyAni suBUte parigrahItu kAmena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam, prajñāpāramitā	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam, prajQApAramitA
   bhāvayitavyā / yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BAvayitavyA / yasmin samaye suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharati, tasmin samaye	prajQApAramitAyAm carati, prajQApAramitAm aBinirharati, tasmin samaye
   subhūte na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu	suBUte na boDisattvena mahAsattvena ye aprameyezu asaMKyeyezu
   lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te	lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante yApayanti, te
   samanvāhartavyāḥ / teṣām api itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā yaduta	samanvAhartavyAH / tezAm api itas nirjAtA eva sarvajQa tA yat uta
   prajñāpāramitātaḥ / evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	prajQApAramitAtaH / evam samanvAhRtya tena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam   ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye	punar evam cittam utpAdayitavyam  aham api etAn DarmAn anuprApsyAmi ye
   tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuprāptā iti / evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena	tEH budDEH BagavadBiH anuprAptAH iti / evam suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA ime citta utpAdAH utpAdayitavyA
   abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena, antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api / yaś	aBinirhartavyAH divasasya atyayena, antaSas acCawA saMGAta mAtrakam api / yaH 
   ca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān	ca suBUte OpalamBikaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn
   dānaṃ dadyāt, ayameva tata aupalambhikādbodhisattvānmahāsattvādbahutaraṃ	dAnam dadyAt, ayam eva tatas OpalamBikAt boDisattvAt mahAsattvAt bahutaram
   puṇyaṃ prasavati, yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ	puNyam prasavati, yaH ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH divasasya atyayena imAm
   prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharet, antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api / ayaṃ	prajQApAramitAm aBinirharet, antaSas acCawA saMGAta mAtrakam api / ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati /	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avinivartanIya tAyAm sTAsyati /
   tathāgatasamanvāhṛtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, yo 'syāṃ	taTAgata samanvAhRtaH sa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH, yaH asyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imāṃścittotpādānutpādayati divasasyātyayena	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn= citta utpAdAn utpAdayati divasasya atyayena
   (Vaidya 234) antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api / kaḥ punarvādo yasyeme	(VEdyaH 234) antaSas acCawA saMGAta mAtrakam api / kaH punar vAdaH yasya ime
   cittotpādā divasamanuvarteran / tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte	citta utpAdAH divasam anuvarteran / taTAgata samanvAhRtasya hi suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā?	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kA gatiH pratikAFkzitavyA?
   tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā	taTAgata samanvAhRtasya hi suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na anyA
   gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /	gatiH pratikAFkzitavyAH anyatra anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH /
   abhavyaścāsāvapāyeṣūpapattum / svargopapattireva tasya pratikāṅkṣitavyā /	aBavyaH ca asO= apAyezu upapattum / svarga upapattiH eva tasya pratikAFkzitavyAH /
   tatrāpi tathāgatairavirahito bhaviṣyati, tathāgatāvirahiteṣu ca	tatra api taTAgatEH avirahitaH Bavizyati, taTAgata avirahitezu ca
   buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyate, sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati / ime 'pi subhūte	budDa kzetrezu upapatsyate, sattvAn ca paripAcayizyati / ime api suBUte
   guṇāḥ, ime 'pyanuśaṃsā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	guNAH, ime api anuSaMsA boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carataḥ, prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharataḥ, imāṃścittotpādānutpādayataḥ antaśo	carataH, prajQApAramitAm aBinirharataH, imAn= citta utpAda an utpAdayataH antaSas 
   'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api / kaḥ punarvādo yasyeme cittotpādā	acCawA saMGAta mAtrakam api / kaH punar vAdaH yasya ime citta utpAdA
   divasamanuvarteran, tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya	divasam anuvarteran, tat yaTA api nAma suBUte ganDahastinaH boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ	mahAsattvasya yaH etarhi akzoByasya taTAgatasya arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti //	samyaksaMbudDasya antike brahmacaryam carati iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavakīrṇakusumaparivarto	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avakIrNa kusuma parivartaH 
   nāmāṣṭāviṃśatitamaḥ //	nAma azwAviMSatitamaH //
   (Vaidya 235)	(VEdyaH 235)
   ASP_29: anugamaparivarta ekonatriṃśattamaḥ /	ASP_29: anugama parivarte ekonatriMSattamaH /
   punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam prajQApAramitA
   anugantavyā   sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	anugantavyA  sarva Darma asaFgataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmāsaṃbhedanataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva Darma asaMBedanataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmāsaṃbhavataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva Darma asaMBavataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmānirvikārasamā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva Darma anirvikAra samAH iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmāṇāmanātmavijñaptitaḥ prajñānubodhanataḥ prajñāpāramitā	sarva DarmANAm anAtma vijQaptitaH prajQA anuboDanataH prajQApAramitA
   anugantavyā / sarvadharmāś ca nāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante iti	anugantavyAH / sarva DarmAH ca nAma mAtreNa vyavahAra mAtreNa aBilapyante iti
   prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / vyavahāraś ca na kvacinna kutaścinna	prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / vyavahAraH ca na kvacid na kutaScid na
   kaścidvyavahāraḥ / sarvadharmā avyavahārā avyāhārā avyavahṛtā avyāhṛtā iti	kaScid vyavahAraH / sarva DarmAH avyavahArAH avyAhArAH avyavahRtAH avyAhRtAH iti
   prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / sarvadharmāpramāṇataḥ prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / sarva Darma apramANataH prajQApAramitA
   anugantavyā / rūpāpramāṇataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / evaṃ	anugantavyA / rUpa apramANataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / evam
   vedanāpramāṇataḥ saṃjñāpramāṇataḥ saṃskārāpramāṇataḥ / vijñānāpramāṇataḥ	vedanA pramANataH saMjQA pramANataH saMskAra apramANataH / vijQAna apramANataH
   prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / sarvadharmānimittataḥ prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / sarva Darma animittataH prajQApAramitA
   anugantavyā / sarvadharmanirvedhataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	anugantavyA / sarva Darma nirveDataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhitaḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva Darma prakRti pariSudDitaH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmāvacanataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva Darma avacanataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhataḥ prahāṇasamatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva DarmANAm aniroDataH prahANa sama tayA prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvāṇaprāptitastathatāsamatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā	sarva DarmANAm nirvANa prAptitaH taTatA samatayA prajQApAramitA anugantavyA
   / sarvadharmā nāgacchanti, na gacchanti, ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti	/ sarva DarmAH na AgacCanti, na gacCanti, ajAnAnAH ajAtAH atyanta ajAtitaH iti
   prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / ātmaparādarśanataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā	prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / Atma parAdarSanataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA
   / sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā	/ sarva DarmAH Arya arhantaH prakRti pariSudDAH iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA
   / apahṛtabhārāḥ sarvadharmābhārānāropaṇatayeti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā	/ apahRta BArAH sarva Darma aBArAn AropaNa tayA iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA
   / sarvadharmādeśāpradeśataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ ?	/ sarva Darma AdeSa apradeSataH prajQApAramitA anugantavyAH / tat kasya hetoH ?
   rūpaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛtisvabhāvataḥ / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā	rUpam hi suBUte adeSam apradeSam prakRti svaBAvataH / evam vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ	saMskArAH / vijQAnam hi suBUte adeSam apradeSam prakRIti svaBAvataH
   sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva Darma niroDa prahlAdana tvAt iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /
   aratyaviratitaḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / araktāviraktatayā	aratya viratitaH prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / arakta avirakta tayA
   prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena	prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / tat kasya hetoH? rUpam hi suBUte satattvena
   svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /	svaBAvena na rajyate na virajyate / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH /

   prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / sarvadharmā asaktāḥ	prakRti pariSudDa tvAt iti prajQApAramitAH anugantavyAH / sarva DarmAH asaktAH
   saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / bodhiḥ sarvadharmā	saFga AsaFga vigatAH iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / boDiH sarva DarmA
   buddhajñānāvabodhanatayeti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	budDa jQAna avaboDana tayA iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /

   iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā / sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ	iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA / sarva DarmAH brahma BUtAH dozAn utpAdanataH
   sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /	sarva dozAn utpAdanate iti prajQApAramitA anugantavyA /

   prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /	prajQApAramitA paryanta tA anugantavyA /

   vijñānaṃ kuśalākuśaladharmasaṃcayavigatam / rūpaṃ	vijQAnam kuSala akuSala Darma saMcaya vigatam / rUpam

   sarvadharmasaṃcayavigatam / rūpaṃ sarvadharmasamādhyaparyantatāsamam /	sarva Darma saMcaya vigatam / rUpam sarva Darma samADya paryanta tA samam /

   saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ vigamaḥ, (Vaidya 237) vijñānasvabhāvo	saMjQA saMskArAH / vijQAnam vigamaH, (VEdyaH 237) vijQAna svaBAvaH

   prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā //	prajQApAramitA anugantavyAH //

   prajñāpāramitāmanugamiṣyati, vyavacārayiṣyati avatariṣyati avabhotsyate	prajQApAramitAm anugamizyati, vyavacArayizyati avatarizyati avaBotsyate
   cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyati upaparīkṣiṣyate bhāvayiṣyati	cintayizyati tulayizyati upaparIkzizyate BAvayizyati

   tadā nāsya durlabhā bhaviṣyati sarvaguṇānāṃ paripūriḥ,	tadA na asya durlaBA Bavizyati sarva guNAnAm paripUriH,
   buddhakṣetrasyānuttarāṇāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūririti //	budDa kzetrasya anuttarANAm ca budDa DarmANAm paripUriH iti //

   nāmaikonatriṃśattamaḥ //	nAma ekonatriMSattamaH //
   (Vaidya 238)	(VEdyaH 238)

   sadāprarudita //	sadA praruditaH //

   / evaṃ cāśrauṣīt   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra	/ evam ca aSrOzIt  SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitezu ca tvayA kula putra

   na divasamanasikāramutpādayiṣyāmi / na śītamanasikāramutpādayiṣyāmi /	na divasa manasikAram utpAdayizyAmi / na SIta manasikAram utpAdayizyAmi /
   noṣṇamanasikāramutpādayiṣyāmi, yāvanna prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti /	na uzNa manasikAram utpAdayizyAmi, yAvat na prajQApAramitAm SrozyAmi iti /
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte kaScid eva puruzaH eka putrake kAlagate mahatA
   duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat, tasya putraśokena nānyaḥ	duHKa dOrmanasyena samanvAgataH aBavat, tasya putra Sokena na anyaH
   kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate, api tvekaputrakamanasikāra eva pravartate /	kaScid manasikAraH pravartate, api tu eka putraka mana sikAraH eva pravartate /
   evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin	evam eva suBUte sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya tasmin
   (Vaidya 240) samaye nānyaḥ kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate sma, api tu kadā	(VEdyaH 240) samaye na anyaH kaScid manasikAraH pravartate sma, api tu kadA
   nāmāhaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti //	nAma aham tAm prajQApAramitAm SrozyAmi iti //
   atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	aTa Kalu suBUte sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya

   sādhu kulaputra, yastvamenāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣase / evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair	sADu kula putra, yaH tvam enAm vAcam BAzase / evam hi kula putra pOrvakEH

   tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā	tvam kula putraH etena eva vIryeNa etena eva utsAhenam etayA eva arTika tayA

   itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī, saptabhiḥ	itas paQcaBiH yojana SatEH ganDavatI nAma nagarI sapta ratna mayI, saptaBiH

   yojanāni vistāreṇa, ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca	yojanAni vistAreNa, RdDA ca sPItA ca kzemA ca suBikzA ca
   ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca	AkIrNa bahu jana manuzyA ca

   asamasamairanutpīḍajanayugyayānasaṃkramaṇasthānasthāpitaiḥ sumāpitā /	asama samEH anutpIxa jana yugya yAna saMkramaNa sTAna sTApitEH su mApitAH /

   sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā / tasya ca	sarvAvatI ca sA nagarI sOvarNena kiFkiNI jAlena praticCannAH / tasya ca

   paricārayanti / sarvaṃ ca tadvāri utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchāditam,	paricArayanti / sarvam ca tat vAri utpala padma kumuda puNxarIka saMCAditam,

   saṃniśrayatayā (Vaidya 242) śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā śraddhotpādanena te	saMniSraya tayA (VEdyaH 242) SradDeya SraddaDAna tayA SradDA utpAdanena te

   śṛṇvanti / tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni	SRNvanti / tatra ca bahUni prANi SatAni bahUni prANi sahasrANi bahUni

   śroṣyasi //	Srozyasi //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH idam SrutvA tuzwaH udagra
   āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt / tadyathāpi nāma	Atta manaskaH pramuditaH prIti sOmanasya jAtaH aBUt / tat yaTA api nAma
   puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati, api tu kadā	puruzaH sa vizeNa Salyena vidDaH na anyam manasikAram utpAdayati, api tu kadA
   nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati, yo	nAma aham Salya hartAram vEdyam lapsye yaH mama idam Salyam udDarizyati, yaH 
   māmito duḥkhānmocayiṣyatīti / evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo	mAm itas duHKAt mocayizyati iti / evam eva sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti, api tu kadā	mahAsattvaH tasmin samaye na anyam kaMcid Darmam manasi karoti, api tu kadA
   nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,	nAma aham tam kula putram drakzyAmi yaH mAm prajQApAramitAm SrAvayizyati,
   yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti //	yat mama Darmam SrutvA upalamBa manasikArAH prahAsyante iti //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tasmin= eva pRTivI pradeSe
   sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ	sTitaH tasya Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAm
   deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma / śṛṇvaṃś ca sarvadharmeṣvaniśritasaṃjñāmutpādayati	deSayataH SRNoti sma / SRNvan ca sarva Darmezu aniSrita saMjQAm utpAdayati
   sma / tasyānekāni samādhimukhānyāmukhībhūtānyabhūvan /	sma / tasya anekAni samADi muKAni AmuKIBUtAni aBUvan /
   tadyathāsarvadharmasvabhāvavyavalokano nāma samādhiḥ /	tat yaTAsarva DarmasvaBAvavyavalokanaH nAma samADiH /
   sarvadharmasvabhāvānupalabdhirnāma samādhiḥ /	sarva Darma svaBAvA anupalabDiH nAma samADiH /
   sarvadharmasvabhāvajñānanirgamo nāma samādhiḥ / sarvadharmanirnānātvo nāma	sarvaDarmasvaBAvajQAna nirgamaH nAma samADiH / sarva Darma nirnAnAtvaH nAma
   samādhiḥ / sarvadharmanirvikāradarśī nāma samādhiḥ /	samADiH / sarvaDarmanirvikAra darSI nAma samADiH /
   sarvadharmāvabhāsakaro nāma samādhiḥ / sarvadharmatamopagato nāma samādhiḥ	sarvaDarma avaBAsa karaH nAma samADiH / sarva Darmatama upagataH nAma samADiH
   / sarvadharmajñānavidhvaṃsano nāma samādhiḥ / sarvadharmavidhūnano nāma	/ sarvaDarmajQAnaviDvaMsanaH nAma samADiH / sarva Darma viDUnanaH nAma
   samādhiḥ / sarvadharmānupalabdhirnāma samādhiḥ / kusumābhikīrṇo nāma	samADiH / sarva DarmAnupalabDiH nAma samADiH / kusuma aBikIrNaH nAma

   nāma samādhiḥ / ādarśamaṇḍalapratibhāsanirhāro nāma samādhiḥ /	nAma samADiH / AdarSamaNxalapratiBAsa nirhAraH nAma samADiH /
   sarvasattvarutanirhāro nāma samādhiḥ / rajopagato nāma samādhiḥ /	sarvasattvaruta nirhAraH nAma samADiH / raja upagataH nAma samADiH /

   samādhiḥ / nānārutapadavyañjanābhinirhāro nāma samādhiḥ / astambhito nāma	samADiH / nAnA arutapada vyaQjana aBinirhAraH nAma samADiH / astamBitaH nAma

   samādhiḥ / rājopagato nāma samādhiḥ / nāmaniruktipadavyañjano nāma	samADiH / rAjA upagataH nAma samADiH / nAmaniruktipada vyaQjanaH nAma

   nāma samādhiḥ / sarvadharmānāvaraṇakoṭirnāma samādhiḥ / gaganakalpo nāma	nAma samADiH / sarvaDarmAnAvaraNa kowiH nAma samADiH / gaganakalpaH nAma

   asapatnarājo nāma samādhiḥ / jayalabdho nāma samādhiḥ /	asapatna rAjaH nAma samADiH / jayalabDaH nAma samADiH /

   samādhiḥ / raśminirhāro nāma samādhiḥ / tathāgatadarśano nāma samādhiḥ /	samADiH / raSminirhAraH nAma samADiH / taTAgatadarSanaH nAma samADiH /
   sarvatathāgatadarśī nāma samādhiḥ / sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi	sarvataTAgatadarSI nAma samADiH / saH ezu samADizu sTitaH san daSa diSi
   loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva	loke budDAn BagavataH paSyati sma aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn imAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ / te ca	prajQApAramitAm prakASayataH boDisattveByaH mahAsattveByaH / te ca
   tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma, svāsanaṃ cāsya kurvanti sma / evaṃ	taTAgatAH sADu kAram dadati sma, sva Asanam ca asya kurvanti sma / evam
   cāvocan   asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva	ca avocan  asmABiH api kula putra pUrvam boDisattva caryAm caradBiH evam eva
   prajñāpāramitā parigaveṣitā / parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ	prajQApAramitA parigavezitAH / parigavezamANEH ca ete eva samADayaH
   pratilabdhāḥ, ye tvayaitarhi pratilabdhāḥ / enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya	pratilabDAH, ye tvayA etarhi pratilabDAH / enAn ca samADIn pratilaBya
   gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, prajñāpāramitāyāmavinivartanīyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu	gatiMgatAH saMvRttAH, prajQApAramitA AyAm avinivartanIyezu budDa Darmezu
   pratiṣṭhitāḥ / te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ	pratizWitAH / te vayam etezAm eva samADInAm prakRtim svaBAvam
   vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā	vyavalokayantaH tam Darmam na samanupaSyAmaH yaH samApadyate vA
   vyuttiṣṭhate vā, yo bodhāya caret, yo vā anuttarāṃ	vyuttizWate vA, yaH boDAya caret, yaH vA anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta / iyaṃ sā kulaputra prajñāpāramitā, yā na	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyeta / iyam sA kula putra prajQApAramitA, yA na
   kenaciddharmeṇa manyamānatā / amanyamānatāsthitairasmābhiriyamevaṃrūpā	kenacid DarmeNa manyamAna tA / amanyam Ana tA sTitEH asmABiH iyam evaMrUpA
   kāyasya suvarṇavarṇatā pratilabdhā / dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni /	kAyasya suvarNa varNa tA pratilabDAH / dvAtriMSat ca mahApuruza lakzaNAni /
   aśītiścānuvyañjanāni / vyāmaprabhatā ca / acintyaṃ ca anuttaraṃ	aSItiH ca anuvyaQjanAni / vyAma praBatA ca / acintyam ca anuttaram
   buddhajñānaṃ buddhaprajñā, anuttaraś ca buddhasamādhiḥ,	budDa jQAnam budDa prajQA, anuttaraH ca budDa samADiH,
   sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ	sarva budDa Darma guNa pAramitA ca anuprAptA yasyAH guNa pAramitAyAH na Sakyam
   tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum, kiṃ punaḥ	taTAgatEH eva tAvat pramANam grahItum paryantaH vA nidarSayitum, kim punar 
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ? tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu	SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH? tasmAt tarhi kula putraH etezu eva tvayA Darmezu
   gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /	gOravam utpAdayitavyam BUyasyA mAtrayA arTika tayA CandikatayA ca /
   arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā	arTikasya hi kula putra Candikasya ca na durlaBA Bavati anuttarA
   samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ	samyaksaMboDiH / kalyANa mitrezu ca tvayA kula putra tIvram
   gauravamutpādayitavyam, prema ca karaṇīyam, prasādaś ca karaṇīyaḥ /	gOravam utpAdayitavyam, prema ca karaNIyam, prasAdaH ca karaNIyaH /
   kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ	kalyANa mitra parigRhItAH hi boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH kzipram eva anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃstathāgatānetadavocat  	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tAn= taTAgatAn etat avocat  
   ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti? ta enametadavocan   dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ	kaH asmAkam kalyANa mitram iti? te enam etat avocan  dIrGarAtram tvam
   kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ	kula putra Darma udgatena boDisattvena mahAsattvena anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /	samyaksaMboDO paripAcitaH parigRhItaH ca /
   prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca śikṣāpitaḥ / sa tava	prajQApAramitAyAm upAya kOSalye budDa Darmezu ca SikzApitaH / sa tava
   kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca / tattvayā kṛtajñatayā	kula putra parigrAhakaH kalyANa mitram ca / tattvayA kRtajQa tayA
   kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam / sacettvaṃ kulaputra	kRta veditayA ca satkRtya tat kRtam DArayitavyam / saced tvam kula putra
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ (Vaidya 244) mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ dvau vā	Darma udgatam boDisattvam (VEdyaH 244) mahAsattvam ekam vA kalpam dvO vA
   kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā	kalpO trIn vA kalpAn kalpa Satam vA kalpa sahasram vA kalpa Sata sahasram vA
   tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā parikarṣeḥ, sarvasattvasukhopasthānaṃ	tatas vA uttare cEloNxukam iva SirasA parikarzeH, sarva sattva suKa upasTAnam
   cāsyopasthāpayeḥ, yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau	ca asya upasTApayeH, yAvantaH tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO

   kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet / tatkasya	kula putra tasya kula putrasya na eva kRtasya pratikRtam Bavet / tat kasya
   hetoḥ? tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ	hetoH? tasya hi kula putra kula putrasya anuBAvena tava ezAm evaMrUpANAm
   samādhīnāṃ pratilambhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaśravaś ca	samADInAm pratilamBaH saMvRttaH / prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalyaSravaH ca

   atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	aTa Kalu te taTAgatAH sadA praruditam boDisattvam mahAsattvam

   tathāgatā iti / sa tāṃstathāgatānapaśyan mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritasanaṃ	taTAgatAH iti / sa tAn= taTAgatAn apaSyat mahatIm utkaNWAm paritasanam
   cāpannaḥ / tasyaitadabhūt   āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	ca ApannaH / tasya etat aBUt  AryaH Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH

   saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca / dīrgharātraṃ ca mama tenārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /	saMparigrAhakaH kalyANa mitram ca / dIrGarAtram ca mama tena arTaH kRtaH /
   yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	yat nu aham etam arTam Darma udgatam boDisattvam
