   kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti //	kva vA te taTAgatAH gatAH iti //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Darma udgate boDisattve
   mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati /	mahAsattve prema ca prasAdam ca citrIkAram ca gOravam ca upasTApayati /
   upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat   kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ	upasTApya evam prAcintayat  kiyat rUpayA nu Kalu aham satkriyayA tam
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam? daridraścāsmi / na ca	Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam upasaMkrAmeyam? daridraH ca asmi / na ca
   me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā	me kiMcid taTArUpam vastram vA ratnam vA suvarNam vA maNayaH vA muktA vA
   vaidūryaṃ vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā	vEdUryam vA SaFKa SilA vA pravAlam vA rajatam vA puzpam vA DUpaH vA
   gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ	ganDaH vA mAlyam vA vilepanam vA cUrNam vA cIvaram vA Catram vA Dvajam
   vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate / kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	vA GaNwA vA patAkA vA saMvidyate / kena aham Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām? na ca mamaitatpratirūpaṃ bhavet,	mahAsattvam satkuryAm gurukuryAm? na ca mama etat pratirUpam Bavet ,
   yadahamevameva dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam /	yat aham evam eva Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam upasaMkrAmeyam /
   daridraścāsmi / na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate //	daridraH ca asmi / na ca me prItiH vA prAmoDam vA utpadyate //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattva
   evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ	evaMrUpEH guNEH gOrava manasikArEH gacCan anupUrveNa anyataram
   nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt / tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya etadabhūt  	nagaram anuprAptaH aBUt / tatra tasya antarApaNa maDya gatasya etat aBUt  
   yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya	yat nu aham imam Atma BAvam vikrIya tena mUlyena Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām / dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi	mahAsattvasya satkAram kuryAm / dIrGarAtram hi mama Atma BAva sahasrANi
   bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni / punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre	BagnAni kzINAni nirudDAni vikrItAni / punar punar aparimANe saMsAre
   aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni / na	aparimANAni ca niraya duHKAni mayA kAma hetoH kAma nidAnam anuBUtAni / na
   punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /	punar evaMrUpANAm DarmANAm kRtaSas evaMrUpANAm vA sattvAnAm satkArAya iti /
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattva untara ApaNa maDya gataH
   śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa, ghoṣamudīrayati sma   kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ	Sabdam anuSrAvayAmAsa, Gozam udIrayati sma  kaH puruzeNa arTikaH, kaH
   puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ puruṣaṃ kretumicchatīti //	puruzeNa arTikaH, kaH puruzam kretum icCati iti //
   atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt   ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo	aTa Kalu mArasya pApIyasaH etat aBUt  ayam sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya	mahAsattvaH Darma kAma tayA yadi AtmAnam vikrIya Darma udgatasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kariṣyati, (Vaidya 245)	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya satkAram karizyati, (VEdyaH 245)
   prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati   kathaṃ bodhisattvo	prajQApAramitAm upAya kOSalyam ca pariprakzyati  kaTam boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran kzipram anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   pariniṣpatsyate iti, tadā śrutasāgaratāṃ cānuprāpsyati, adhṛṣyaś ca	parinizpatsyate iti, tadA Sruta sAgara tAm ca anuprApsyati, aDRzyaH ca
   bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ, sarvaguṇapāramitāṃ	Bavizyati mAreNa vA mArakAyikABiH vA devatABiH, sarva guNa pAramitAm
   cānuprāpsyati / tatra ca bahūnāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kariṣyati / tāṃś ca mama	ca anuprApsyati / tatra ca bahUnAm sattvAnAm arTam karizyati / tAn ca mama
   viṣayādatikrāmayiṣyati anyāṃś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya /	vizayAt atikrAmayizyati anyAn ca anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya /
   yannvahamasyāntarāyaṃ kuryāmiti //	yat nu aham asya antarAyam kuryAm iti //
   atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā pratyutthāpayāmāsa,	aTa Kalu mAraH pApIyAn= tAn brAhmaNa gRhapatikAn= taTA pratyutTApayAmAsa,
   yathā te taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya	yaTA te tam Gozam na aSrOzuH sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya   kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ puruṣaṃ	mahAsattvasya  kaH puruzeNa arTikaH, kaH puruzeNa arTikaH, kaH puruzam
   kretumicchatīti / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā	kretum icCati iti / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yadA
   ātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate, tadā ekāntaṃ gatvā prārodīt, aśrūṇi	AtmanaH krAyakam na laBate, tadA ekAntam gatvA prArodIt, aSrUNi
   prāvartayat / evaṃ cāvocat   aho batāsmākaṃ durlabdhā lābhāḥ, ye	prAvartayat / evam ca avocat  aho bata asmAkam durlabDAH lABAH, ye
   vayamātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhāmahe   yadvayamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya	vayam Atma BAvasya api krAyakam na laBAmahe  yat vayam Atma BAvam vikrIya
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmeti //	Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkuryAm eti //
   atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   yannvahaṃ sadāpraruditaṃ	aTa Kalu Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  yat nu aham sadA praruditam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ tulayeyam   kiṃ nvayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo	boDisattvam mahAsattvam tulayA iyam  kim nu ayam sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayapratipanna ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ prati dharmakāmatayā,	mahAsattvaH aDyASaya pratipad naH Atma BAva parityAgam prati Darma kAma tayA,
   uta neti / atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamabhinirmāya yena	uta na iti / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH mANavaka vezam aBinirmAya yena
   sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāmati sma / upasaṃkramya	sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH, tena upasaMkrAmati sma / upasaMkramya
   sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat   kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra	sadA praruditam boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat  kim tvam kula putra
   dīnadīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ?	dIna dIna manAH utkaNWita mAnasaH aSrUNi pravartayamAnaH sTitaH?
   sadāpraruditastamevamāha   ahaṃ māṇavaka ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ / asya	sadA apraruditaH tam evam Aha  aham mANavakaH AtmAnam vikretu kAmaH / asya
   cātmabhāvasya krāyakaṃ na labhe / taṃ māṇavakarūpī śakra āha   kasya	ca Atma BAvasya krAyakam na laBe / tam mANavaka rUpI SakraH Aha  kasya
   punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāya ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ? sadāpraruditastamāha  	punar tvam kula putra arTAya AtmAnam vikretu kAmaH? sadA praruditaH tam Aha  
   ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,	aham mANavaka Darma kAma tayA imam AtmAnam vikrIya Darma pUjAm kartu kAmaH,
   āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ / so	Aryam Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam sat kartu kAmaH / saH 
   'hamasyātmabhāvasya krāyakaṃ na labhe / tasya me etadabhūt   aho	aham asya Atma BAvasya krAyakam na laBe / tasya me etat aBUt  aho
   batāhamatyalpapuṇyaḥ, yo 'hamasyātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhe, yena taṃ	bata aham ati alpa puNyaH, yaH aham asya Atma BAvasya api krAyakam na laBe, yena tam
   vikrīya prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāṃ kuryām, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	vikrIya prajQApAramitAyAH pUjAm kuryAm, Aryam ca Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti / atha khalu māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ	mahAsattvam satkuryAm iti / aTa Kalu mANavakaH sadA praruditam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat   na khalu mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa	boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat  na Kalu mama kula putra puruzeNa
   kṛtyam / api tu khalu punaḥ piturbhe yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ / tatra me puruṣasya	kRtyam / api tu Kalu punar pituH Be yajQaH yazwavyaH / tatra me puruzasya
   hṛdayena kṛtyam, lohitena ca asthimajjayā ca / taddāsyasi tvaṃ krayeṇa?	hRdayena kRtyam, lohitena ca asTi majjayA ca / tad dAsyasi tvam krayeNa?
   atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt   lābhā	aTa Kalu sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya etat aBUt  lABA
   me paramasulabdhāḥ, pariniṣpannaṃ cātmabhāvaṃ jāne	me parama sulabDAH, parinizpannam ca Atma BAvam jAne
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca, yanmayāyaṃ māṇavakaḥ krāyako	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalye budDa Darmezu ca, yat mayA ayam mANavakaH krAyakaH 
   labdhaḥ hṛdayasya rudhirasya ca asthimajjāyāśceti / sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ	labDaH hRdayasya ruDirasya ca asTi majjAyAH ca iti / sa hRzwa cittaH
   kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocat   dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena	kalya cittaH pramudita cittaH tam mANavakam etat avocat  dAsyAmi mANavaka yena
   yenaiva te iti ātmabhāvādarthaḥ / sa tametadavocat   kiṃ te kulaputra	yena eva te iti Atma BAvAt arTaH / sa tam etat avocat  kim te kula putra
   mūlyaṃ dadāmi? sa tametadavocat   yatte māṇavaka parityaktam, taddehīti /	mUlyam dadAmi? sa tam etat avocat  yat te mANavaka parityaktam, tat dehi iti /
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tIkzNam Sastram gRhItvA
   dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvayati sma / dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā	dakziNam bAhum vidDvA lohitam niHsrAvayati sma / dakziNam ca Urum vidDvA
   nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāmati sma / (Vaidya 246)	nirmAMsam kRtvA asTi Bettum kuxya mUlam upasaMkrAmati sma / (VEdyaH 246)
   atha khalu anyatarā śreṣṭhidārakā upariṣṭātprāsādatalagatābhūt / sā	aTa Kalu anyatarA SrezWi dArakAH uparizwAt prAsAda tala gatA aBUt / sA
   adrākṣītsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā rudhiraṃ	adrAkzIt sadA praruditam boDisattvam mahAsattvam bAhum vidDvA ruDiram
   niḥsrāvya ūruṃ nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntam /	niHsrAvyaH Urum nirmAMsam kRtvA asTi Bettum kuxya mUlam upasaMkrAntam /
   tasyā etadabhūt   kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kulaputra ātmanaivātmanaḥ īdṛśīṃ	tasyAH etat aBUt  kim nu Kalu ayam kula putraH AtmanA eva AtmanaH IdRSIm
   kāraṇāṃ kārayati? yannvahamenaṃ kulaputramupasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam /	kAraNAm kArayati? yat nu aham enam kula putram upasaMkramya paripRcCeyam /
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA yena sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntā / upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	mahAsattvaH tena upasaMkrAntA / upasaMkramya sadA praruditam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvametadavocat   kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ	mahAsattvam etat avocat  kim nu Kalu tvam kula putraH evaMrUpAm AtmanaH
   prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayasi? kiṃ cānena rudhireṇa kariṣyasi	prANa hAriNIm kAraNAm kArayasi? kim ca anena ruDireNa karizyasi
   tvamasthimajjābhyāṃ ca? sadāprarudita āha   asya dārike māṇavakasyāntike	tvam asTi majjAByAm ca? sadA praruditaH Aha  asya dArike mANavakasya antike
   idaṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ	idam vikrIya prajQApAramitAm pUjayizyAmi, Aryam ca Darma udgatam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi //	boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkarizyAmi //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA sadA praruditam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvatadavocat   kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate	mahAsattva tat avocat  kA punar te kula putra tatas guNa jAtiH nizpatsyate
   guṇaviśeṣo vā, yattvamātmano hṛdayaṃ rudhiraṃ cāsthimajjānaṃ ca vikrīya	guNa viSezaH vA, yat tvam AtmanaH hRdayam ruDiram ca asTi majjAnam ca vikrIya
   taṃ kulaputraṃ satkartukāmaḥ? sa tāṃ dārikāmetadavocat   sa dārike	tam kula putram sat kartu kAmaH? sa tAm dArikAm etat avocat  sa dArike
   kulaputro 'smākaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati / tatra ca	kula putraH asmAkam prajQApAramitAm upAya kOSalyam ca upadekzyati / tatra ca
   vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmahe / tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ	vayam SikzizyAmahe / tatra vayam SikzamANAH sarva sattvAnAm pratiSaraNam
   bhaviṣyāmaḥ / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya suvarṇavarṇaṃ ca	BavizyAmaH / anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya suvarNa varNam ca
   kāyaṃ pratilapsyāmahe / dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītiṃ	kAyam pratilapsyAmahe / dvAtriMSat ca mahApuruza lakzaNAni aSItim
   cānuvyañjanāni vyāmaprabhatāṃ ca anantaraśmitāṃ ca mahāmaitrī ca	ca anuvyaQjanAni vyAma praBatAm ca anantara SmitAm ca mahAmEtrI ca
   mahākaruṇāṃ ca mahāmuditāṃ ca mahopekṣāṃ ca / catvāri vaiśāradyāni	mahA karuNAm ca mahA muditAm ca mahA upekzAm ca / catvAri vESAradyAni
   pratilapsyāmahe, catasraś ca pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilapsyāmahe, aṣṭādaśa ca	pratilapsyAmahe, catasraH ca pratisaMvidaH pratilapsyAmahe, azwAdaSa ca
   āveṇikabuddhadharmān pratilapsyāmahe, pañca ca abhijñāḥ, acintyāṃ ca	AveNika budDa DarmAn pratilapsyAm ahe, paQca ca aBijQAH, acintyAm ca
   śīlaviśuddhim, acintyāṃ ca samādhiviśuddhim, acintyāṃ ca prajñāviśuddhim,	SIla viSudDim, acintyAm ca samADi viSudDim, acintyAm ca prajQA viSudDim,
   daśa ca tathāgatabalāni pratilapsyāmahe / anuttaraṃ ca	daSa ca taTAgata balAni pratilapsyAmahe / anuttaram ca
   buddhajñānamabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe / anuttaraṃ ca dharmaratnaṃ	budDa jQAnam aBisaMBotsyAmahe / anuttaram ca Darma ratnam
   pratilapsyāmahe, yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāma iti //	pratilapsyAm ahe, yena ca sarva sattvAnAm saMviBAgam karizyAmaH iti //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA sadA praruditam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvametadavocat   āścaryaṃ kulaputra yāvadudārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā	mahAsattvam etat avocat  AScaryam kula putra yAvat udArAH praNItAH ca amI tvayA
   dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ / ekaikasyāpi tāvatkulaputra evaṃrūpasya	DarmAH parikIrtitAH / ekEkasya api tAvat kula putraH evaMrUpasya
   dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān api kalpānātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā	Darmasya arTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn api kalpAn Atma BAvAH parityaktavyA
   bhaveyuḥ, prāgeva bahūnāmarthāya ekaḥ / tathodārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā	BaveyuH, prAk eva bahUnAm arTAya ekaH / taTA udArAH praNItAH ca amI tvayA
   dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ, yathā mamāpyete rocante kṣamante ca / api nu khalu	DarmAH parikIrtitAH, yaTA mama api ete rocante kzamante ca / api nu Kalu
   punaḥ kulaputra yena yenaivārthena te kṛtyam, tattatte dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā	punar kula putra yena yena eva arTena te kRtyam, tat tat te dAsyAmi suvarNam vA
   maṇīn vā muktāṃ vā rajataṃ vā vaidūryaṃ vā musāragalvaṃ vā lohitārkaṃ vā	maNIn vA muktAm vA rajatam vA vEdUryam vA musAra galvam vA lohita arkam vA
   sphāṭikaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ va vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ	sPAwikam vA puzpam vA DUpam vA ganDam vA mAlyam va vilepanam vA cUrNam
   vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā / tena	vA vastram vA Catram vA Dvajam vA GaNwAm vA patAkAm vA dIpam vA / tena
   tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi / mā ca ātmana	tvam tam Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkarizyasi / mA ca Atmana
   imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ / vayam api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ,	imAm evaMrUpAm kAraNAm kArzIH / vayam api tvayA eva sArDam gamizyAmaH,
   yenāryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ / vayam api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ	yena AryaH Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH / vayam api tvayA eva sArDam
   kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyāmaḥ, yaduta eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	kuSala mUlAni avaropayizyAmaH, yat uta ezAm evaMrUpANAm DarmANAm
   pratilambhāyeti //	pratilamBAya iti //
   (Vaidya 247) atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamantardhāpayitvā	(VEdyaH 247) aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH mANavaka vezam antarDApayitvA
   svakenātmabhāvena sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato	svakena Atma BAvena sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya puratas 
   'sthāt, idaṃ cāvocat   sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yasya te iyamevaṃrūpā	asTAt, idam ca avocat  sADu sADu kula putra, yasya te iyam evaMrUpA
   dṛḍhasamādānatā / evaṃrūpayā ca dharmārthikatayā pūrvakair api	dRXa samAdAna tA / evaMrUpayA ca Darma arTika tayA pUrvakEH api
   tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ	taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH pUrvam boDisattva caryAm caradBiH
   prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripṛcchadbhiranuttarā ca	prajQApAramitAm upAya kOSalyam ca paripRcCadBiH anuttarA ca
   samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā, dharmaratnaṃ ca pratilabdham / tanna mama	samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbudDA, Darma ratnam ca pratilabDam / tat na mama
   kulaputra hṛdayena kāryam, na rudhireṇa, nāsthimajjābhyām, api tu khalu	kula putra hRdayena kAryam, na ruDireNa, na asTi majjA aByAm, api tu Kalu
   punarahaṃ tvāmeva mīmāṃsitukāma ihāgataḥ / vṛṇīṣva kulaputra varam /	punar aham tvAm eva mImAMsitu kAmaH iha AgataH / vRNIzva kula putra varam /
   kiyadrūpaṃ te varaṃ dāsyāmīti? sa tāmāha   anuttarān me śakra	kiyat rUpam te varam dAsyAmi iti? sa tAm Aha  anuttarAt me Sakra
   buddhadharmān dehīti / devendra āha   na mamātra kulaputra viṣaye viṣayitā	budDa DarmAn dehi iti / devendraH Aha  na mama atra kula putra vizaye vizayi tA
   / buddhānāṃ punarbhagavatāmatra viṣaye viṣayitā / anyaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti /	/ budDAnAm punar BagavatAm atra vizaye vizayi tA / anyam varam vRNIzva iti /
   sadāprarudita āha   alpotsukastvaṃ devendra bhava atra sthāne	sadA praruditaH Aha  alpa utsukaH tvam deva indra Bava atra sTAne
   mamātmabhāvaparipūrimupādāya / svayamevāhamatra devendra satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ	mama Atma BAva paripUrim upAdAya / svayam eva aham atra deva indra satya aDizWAnam
   kariṣyāmi / yenāhaṃ satyena avinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ	karizyAmi / yena aham satyena avinivartanIyaH anuttarAyAH
   samyaksaṃbodhervyākṛtastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,	samyaksaMboDeH vyAkRtaH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH,
   jñātaścāsmyaśāṭhyenādhyāśayena, tena devendra satyena satyavacanena mama	jQAtaH ca asmi aSAWyena aDyASayena, tena deva indra satyena satya vacanena mama
   yathāpaurāṇo 'yamātmabhāvo bhavatu / atha khalu tatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ	yaTApOrANaH ayam Atma BAvaH Bavatu / aTa Kalu tad kzaNam tat lavam
   tanmuhūrtaṃ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhānubhāvena	tad muhUrtam sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya budDa anuBAvena
   āśayapariśuddhyā ca yathāpaurāṇo 'sya kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt, arogo	ASaya pariSudDyA ca yaTApOrANaH asya kAyaH saMsTitaH aBUt, arogaH 
   nirupadravaś ca / atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māraś ca pāpīyān	nirupadravaH ca / aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH mAraH ca pApIyAn
   niṣpratibhānaḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyottare	nizpratiBAnaH sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya uttare
   pratibhānamapratipadyamānastatraivāntarhito 'bhūt //	pratiBAnam apratipadyamAnaH tatra eva antarhitaH aBUt //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA sadA praruditam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvametadavocat   ehi tvaṃ kulaputra / yenāsmākaṃ niveśanam,	mahAsattvam etat avocat  ehi tvam kula putra / yena asmAkam niveSanam,
   tenopasaṃkrāma / ahaṃ te mātāpitṝṇāmantikāttaddhanaṃ dāpayiṣyāmi, yena	tena upasaMkrAma / aham te mAtA pitLNAm antikAt tad Danam dApayizyAmi, yena
   tvaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyasi, taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	tvam tAm prajQApAramitAm pUjayizyasi, tam cAryam Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi, yaduta dharmakāmatayā / atha khalu sadāprarudito	mahAsattvam satkarizyasi, yat uta Darma kAma tayA / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ tayā śreṣṭhadārikayā yenāsyāḥ svakaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sArDam tayA SrezWa dArikayA yena asyAH svakam
   niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma / upasaṃkramya dvāramūle 'sthāt //	niveSanam tena upasaMkrAmati sma / upasaMkramya dvAra mUle asTAt //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā svakaṃ niveśanaṃ praviśya svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA svakam niveSanam praviSya svAm mAtaram pitaram
   caitadavocat   amba tāta daddhvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni maṇīn vastrāṇi	ca etat avocat  amba tAta dadDvam hiraNyam suvarNam ratnAni maNIn vastrANi
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāḥ /	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkAH /
   nānāvidhāś ca divyā vādyaprakṛtīrutsṛjata, mām api sārdhamebhiḥ	nAnAviDAH ca divyA vAdya prakRtIH utsRjata, mAm api sArDam eBiH
   pañcabhirdārikāśatairyā mamopasthāyikā yuṣmabhireva dattāḥ / gamiṣyāmyaham	paQcaBiH dArikA SatEH yAH mama upasTAyikAH yuzmaBiH eva dattAH / gamizyAmi aham
   api sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ dharmodgatasya	api sadA praruditena boDisattvena mahAsattvena sArDam Darma udgatasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ tasya pūjārthaṃ ca / so 'smākaṃ dharmaṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya antikam tasya pUjA arTam ca / saH asmAkam Darmam
   deśayiṣyati / tena vayaṃ buddhadharmān pratilapsyāmahe / atha khalu tau	deSayizyati / tena vayam budDa DarmAn pratilapsyAmahe / aTa Kalu tO
   tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām   kaḥ punareṣa dārike	tasyAH dArikAyAH mAtA pitarO tAm dArikAm etat avocatAm  kaH punar eza dArike
   sadāprarudito nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, kva vā sa etarhi tiṣṭhati?	sadApraruditaH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH, kva vA saH etarhi tizWati?
   dārikā āha   eṣa kulaputro 'smākameva niveśanadvāramūle 'vasthitaḥ / eṣa	dArikAH Aha  eza kula putraH asmAkam eva niveSana dvAra mUle avasTitaH / eza
   ca kulaputro 'dhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ	ca kula putraH aDyASayena anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum
   saṃprasthitaḥ, yaduta sarvasattvānaparimāṇataḥ	saMprasTitaH, yat uta sarva sattvAn aparimANataH
   saṃsāraduḥkhānmocayitukāmaḥ, sarvadharmakāmatayātmānaṃ (Vaidya 248)	saMsAra duHKAt mocayitu kAmaH, sarva Darma kAmatayA AtmAnam (VEdyaH 248)
   vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitukāmaḥ, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	vikrIya prajQApAramitAm pUjayitu kAmaH, Aryam ca Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ / tasya cātmabhāvasya kaṃcitkrāyakaṃ na labhate	mahAsattvam sat kartu kAmaH / tasya ca Atma BAvasya kaMcid krAyakam na laBate
   / alabhamānaḥ san duḥkhito durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamanā aśrūṇi	/ alaBamAnaH san duHKitaH durmanAH praDyAyan dIna manAH aSrUNi
   pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ / sa śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa	pravartayamAnaH sTitaH / sa SakreNa devAnAm indreNa
   māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyoktaḥ   kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra duḥkhī durmanāḥ	mANavaka rUpam aBinirmAya uktaH  kim tvam kula putra duHKI durmanAH
   pradhyāyan dīnamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthita iti? sa tamāha  	praDyAyan dIna mAnasaH aSrUNi pravartayamAnaH sTitaH iti? sa tam Aha  
   ātmānaṃ vikretukāmo 'ham / tasya ca krāyakaṃ na labhe / māṇavakarūpī	AtmAnam vikretu kAmaH aham / tasya ca krAyakam na laBe / mANavaka rUpI
   śakrastamāha   kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāyātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?	SakraH tam Aha  kasya punar tvam kula putra arTAya AtmAnam vikretu kAmaH?
   sadāpraruditenoktaḥ   prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ	sadA praruditena uktaH  prajQApAramitAm pUjayizyAmi, Aryam ca Darma udgatam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayā / tatra	boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkarizyAmi yat uta Darma kAma tayA / tatra
   pratibaddhāś ca me buddhadharmā iti / māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha   na mama	pratibadDAH ca me budDa DarmAH iti / mANavaka rUpI SakraH tam Aha  na mama
   kulaputra tvayārthaḥ / api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño bhaviṣyati / tatra	kula putra tvayA arTaH / api tu Kalu punar pituH me yajQaH Bavizyati / tatra
   me puruṣasya hṛdayena rūdhireṇa asthimajjābhyāṃ ca kṛtyamiti / tata eṣa	me puruzasya hRdayena rUDireNa asTi majjAByAm ca kRtyam iti / tatas eza
   kulaputro 'viṣaṇṇamānasa āha   dāsyāmīti / sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā	kula putraH avizaNNa mAnasaH Aha  dAsyAmi iti / sa tIkzNam Sastram gRhItvA
   ātmano bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ ca nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi	AtmanaH bAhum vidDvA lohitam niHsrAvyaH Urum ca nirmAMsam kRtvA asTi
   bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntaḥ ekānte sthitvā asthi bhittvā majjānaṃ ca	Bettum kuxya mUlam upasaMkrAntaH ekAnte sTitvA asTi BittvA majjAnam ca
   dāsyāmīti / ahaṃ cainaṃ kulaputramupariṣṭātprāsādatalagatā	dAsyAmi iti / aham ca enam kula putram uparizwAt prAsAda tala gatA
   kṣaradrudhiramadrākṣam / tasyā mamaitadabhūt   kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ puruṣa	kzarat ruDiram adrAkzam / tasyAH mama etat aBUt  kim nu Kalu ayam puruza
   ātmanaivātmana evaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayatīti?	AtmanA eva AtmanaH evaMrUpAm kAraNAm kArayati iti?
   tamenamahamupasaṃkramyaivamavocam   kimarthaṃ tvayā kulaputra	tam enam aham upasaMkramya evam avocam  kim arTam tvayA kula putra
   ātmanaivātmana evaṃ kṣaradrūdhiraṃ śarīraṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtam? tata eṣa	AtmanA eva AtmanaH evam kzarat rUDiram SarIram vikRtam kRtam? tatas eza
   māmevamāha   asya dārike māṇavakasya lohitaṃ hṛdayamasthi majjānaṃ ca	mAm evam Aha  asya dArike mANavakasya lohitam hRdayam asTi majjAnam ca
   dāsyāmīti / tatkasya hetoḥ? na mamānyatkiṃciddhanaṃ saṃvidyate / daridro	dAsyAmi iti / tat kasya hetoH? na mama anyat kiMcid Danam saMvidyate / daridraH 
   'smīti / tamenamahamevamavocam   kiṃ punastvaṃ tena dhanena kariṣyasīti?	asmi iti / tam enam aham evam avocam  kim punar tvam tena Danena karizyasi iti?
   sa eṣa māmetadavocat   prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi, taṃ cāryaṃ	saH eza mAm etat avocat  prajQApAramitAm pUjayizyAmi, tam cAryam
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayeti	Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkarizyAmi yat uta Darma kAmatayA iti
   / tamenamahamevamavocam   kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirbhaviṣyati	/ tam enam aham evam avocam  kA punar te kula putra tatas guNa jAtiH Bavizyati
   guṇaviśeṣo veti? tataḥ so 'cintyān me buddhaguṇān varṇayati	guNa viSezaH vA iti? tatas saH acintyAt me budDa guNAn varNayati
   saṃprakāśayati, aprameyāṃś ca buddhadharmān   eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ	saMprakASayati, aprameyAn ca budDa DarmAn  ezAm evaMrUpANAm
   buddhadharmāṇāṃ me tata āgamo bhaviṣyatīti / tasya me mahattaraṃ	budDa DarmANAm me tatas AgamaH Bavizyati iti / tasya me mahattaram
   prītiprāmodyamutpannaṃ tānacintyān buddhaguṇān śrutvā / evaṃ ca me 'bhūt  	prIti prAmodyam utpannam tAn acintyAn budDa guNAn SrutvA / evam ca me aBUt  
   āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkarakārakaścāyaṃ kulaputro 'tīva dharmakāmaśca, yo	AScaryam yAvat duzkara kArakaH ca ayam kula putraH atIva Darma kAmaH ca, yaH 
   'yamevaṃrūpamātmanaḥ śarīrasya pīḍāsthānamutsahate / ayaṃ hi nāma	ayam evaMrUpam AtmanaH SarIrasya pIxA sTAnam utsahate / ayam hi nAma
   kulaputro dharmakāmatayā ātmānaṃ parityajati / kasmādasmābhirdharmo na	kula putraH Darma kAma tayA AtmAnam parityajati / kasmAt asmABiH DarmaH na
   pūjayitavyaḥ? evaṃrūpeṣu ca sthāneṣu praṇidhānaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt,	pUjayitavyaH? evaMrUpezu ca sTAnezu praNiDAnam na kartavyam syAt ,
   yeṣāmasmākaṃ prabhūtā vipulāś ca bhogāḥ saṃvidyante iti / sāhamenaṃ	yezAm asmAkam praBUtAH vipulAH ca BogAH saMvidyante iti / sA aham enam
   kulaputrametadavocam   mā mā tvaṃ kulaputra imāmevaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ	kula putram etat avocam  mA mA tvam kula putraH imAm evaMrUpAm AtmanaH
   prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ / ahaṃ te prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ	prANa hAriNIm kAraNAm kArzIH / aham te praBUta praBUtam
   dhanamanupradāpayiṣyāmi yena tavārthaḥ / tena tvaṃ tamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ	Danam anupradApayizyAmi yena tava arTaH / tena tvam tam Aryam Darma udgatam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi gurukariṣyasi / aham api tvayaiva	boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkarizyasi gurukarizyasi / aham api tvayA eva
   sārdhaṃ yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /	sArDam yena Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tena upasaMkramizyAmi /
   aham api tasya kulaputrasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi / vayamapyevaṃrūpān	aham api tasya kula putrasya pUjAm karizyAmi / vayam api evaMrUpAn
   dharmānniṣpādayiṣyāmo yaduta anuttarān buddhadharmān ye tvayā parikīrtitā	DarmAn nizpAdayizyAmaH yat uta anuttarAn budDa DarmAn ye tvayA parikIrtitA
   iti / tanmāmamba tāta anujānīta / prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ ca me dhanaskandhaṃ	iti / tat mAm amba tAta anujAnIta / praBUta praBUtam ca me Dana skanDam
   daddhvam, yenāhametenaiva kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ gatvā āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ	dadDvam, yena aham etena eva kula putreNa sArDam gatvA Aryam Darma udgatam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi //	boDisattvam mahAsattvam pUjayizyAmi //
   (Vaidya 249) atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ	(VEdyaH 249) aTa Kalu tO tasyAH dArikAyAH mAtA pitarO tAm
   dārikāmetadavocatām   āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkaraṃ ca tvametasya kulaputrasya	dArikAm etat avocatAm  AScaryam yAvat duzkaram ca tvam etasya kula putrasya
   sthānamācakṣe / ekāṃśenaiva te dharmā acintyāḥ, sarvalokaviśiṣṭāḥ	sTAnam Acakze / eka aMSena eva te DarmAH acintyAH, sarva loka viSizwAH
   sarvasattvasukhāvahāśca, yeṣāmeṣa kṛtaśaḥ kulaputro duṣkaraṃ	sarva sattva suKa AvahAH ca, yezAm eza kRtaSas kula putraH duzkaram
   sthānamevamutsahate / anujānīva āvāṃ tvāṃ dārike / āvayorapyavakāśaṃ kuru,	sTAnam evam utsahate / anujAni ivaH AvAm tvAm dArike / AvayoH api avakASam kuru,
   yadāvām api gacchāvastvayaiva sārdhaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	yadAvAm api gacCAvaH tvayA eva sArDam tam Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ pūjayituṃ ca //	mahAsattvam drazwum vanditum paryupAsitum pUjayitum ca //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitāṃ svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca viditvā	pUjA arTam satkAra arTam ca prasTitAm svAm mAtaram pitaram ca viditvA
   etadavocat   amba tāta evaṃ kuruta, yathā vadata / nāhaṃ	etat avocat  amba tAta evam kuruta, yaTA vadate / na aham
   kasyacitkuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi / ityuktvā evaṃ sā śreṣṭhidārikā	kasyacid kuSala pakzasya antarAyam karomi / iti uktvA evam sA SrezWi dArikA
   dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca	Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pUjA arTam satkAra arTam ca
   prasthitā babhūva //	prasTitAH baBUva //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa / tāni ca	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA paQca raTa SatAni alaMkArayAmAsa / tAni ca
   pañca dārikāśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa / alaṃkṛtya nānāvarṇāni vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi	paQca dArikA SatAni alaMkArayAmAsa / alaMkRtya nAnA varNAni vicitrANi puzpANi
   gṛhītvā nānāraṅgāṇi vastrāṇi	gRhItvA nAnA raFgANi vastrANi
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkAH ca
   gṛhītvā nānāratnāni ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi	gRhItvA nAnA ratnAni ca vicitrANi nAnA ratna mayAni ca vicitrANi puzpANi
   gṛhītvā prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā ekaṃ	gRhItvA praBUta praBUtam KAdanIyam BojanIyam svAdanIyam ca gRhItvA ekam
   rathaṃ sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhamabhiruhya taiḥ	raTam sadA praruditena boDisattvena mahAsattvena sArDam aBiruhya tEH
   pañcabhī rathaśataiḥ pañcadārikāśatābhirūḍhaiḥ parivṛttā puraskṛtā mahatā	paQcaBiH raTa SatEH paQca dArikA Sata aBirUXEH parivRttA puraskRtA mahatA
   ca parivāreṇa mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamā yena pūrvā dik tena prakrāntā /	ca parivAreNa mAtA pitR pUrvaMgamA yena pUrvA diS tena prakrAntAH /
   anupūrveṇa ca gacchan sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	anupUrveNa ca gacCan sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'drākṣīddūrādeva tāṃ gandhavatīṃ nagarīṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ citrāṃ	adrAkzIt dUrAt eva tAm ganDavatIm nagarIm saptAnAm ratnAnAm citrAm
   darśanīyāṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ saptaratnamayairanuparikṣiptāṃ	darSanIyAm saptaBiH prAkArEH sapta ratna mayEH anuparikziptAm
   saptabhistoraṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ parikhābhiḥ	saptaBiH toraNEH saptaBiH pariKABiH
   saptabhistālapaṅktibhiranuparikṣiptāṃ dvādaśa yojanāni vistāreṇa dvādaśa	saptaBiH tAla paFktiBiH anuparikziptAm dvAdaSa yojanAni vistAreNa dvAdaSa
   yojanānyāyāmena ṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ ca kṣemāṃ ca subhikṣāṃ ca	yojanAni AyAmena RdDAm sPItAm ca kzemAm ca suBikzAm ca
   ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃ ca	AkIrNa bahu jana manuzyAm ca
   pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthīśatairālekhyavicitracitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhāṃ	paQcaBiH antarApaNa vITI SatEH AleKya vicitra citra sadRSEH darSanIyEH nirvidDAm
   samasamairanutpīḍajanayugyayānasaṃkramaṇasthānasthāpitaiḥ sumāpitāṃ ca /	sama samEH anutpIxa jana yugya yAna saMkramaNa sTAna sTApitEH sumApitAm ca /
   madhye ca nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya adrākṣīddharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	maDye ca nagara SRFgAwakasya adrAkzIt Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   dharmāsanagatamanekaśatayā parṣadā anekasahasrayā anekaśatasahasrayā	Darma Asana gatam aneka SatayA parzadAH aneka sahasrayA aneka Sata sahasrayA
   parṣadā parivṛttaṃ puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam / sahadarśanenaiva ca	parzadA parivRttam puraskRtam Darmam deSayantam / saha darSanena eva ca
   tasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ saṃpratilabhate sma tadyathāpi nāma	tasya evaMrUpam suKam saMpratilaBate sma tat yaTA api nAma
   prathamadhyānasamāpanno bhikṣurekāgreṇa manasikāreṇa / dṛṣṭvā cāsya	praTama DyAna samApannaH BikzuH ekAgreNa manasikAreNa / dRzwvA ca asya
   etadabhūt   na mama pratirūpametadbhavet, yadahaṃ rathagata eva	etat aBUt  na mama pratirUpam etat Bavet, yat aham raTa gataH eva
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam / yannvahaṃ	Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam upasaMkrAmeyam / yat nu aham
   rathādavatareyam / sa tato rathādavātarat / tāny api pañca dārikāśatāni	raTAt avatareyam / sa tatas raTAt avAtarat / tAni api paQca dArikA SatAni
   śreṣṭhidārikayā saha rathebhyo 'vateruḥ / atha khalu sadāprarudito	SrezWi dArikayA saha raTeByaH avateruH / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SrezWi dArikA pUrvaMgamEH paQcaBiH dArikA SatEH
   parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'parimāṇapūjāvyūhena yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo	parivRtaH puraskRtaH aparimANa pUjA vyUhena yena Darma udgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma //	mahAsattvaH tena upasaMkrAmati sma //
   tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	tena Kalu punar samayena Darma udgatena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kāritamabhūt	prajQApAramitAyAH kRtaSas sapta ratna mayam kUwAgAram kAritam aBUt 
   lohitacandanālaṃkṛtaṃ muktājālaparikṣiptam / caturṣu kūṭāgārakoṇeṣu	lohita candana alaMkRtam muktA jAla parikziptam / caturzu kUwAgAra koNezu
   maṇiratnāni sthāpitāni, yāni pradīpakṛtyaṃ kurvanti sma / catasraś ca	maNi ratnAni sTApitAni, yAni pradIpa kRtyam kurvanti sma / catasraH ca
   dhūpaghaṭikā (Vaidya 250) rūpamayyaścaturdiśamavasaktāḥ, yatra śuddhaṃ	DUpa GawikAH (VEdyaH 250) rUpa mayyaH caturdiSam avasaktAH, yatra SudDam
   kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham / tasya ca	kRzNa aguru DUpyate sma yat uta prajQApAramitAyAH pUjA arTam / tasya ca
   kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt / caturṇāṃ	kUwAgArasya maDye sapta ratna mayaH paryaFkaH prajQaptaH aBUt / caturNAm
   ratnānāṃ peḍā kṛtā, yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā	ratnAnAm pexA kRtA, yatra prajQApAramitA prakziptA suvarNa pawwezu liKitA
   vilīnena vaidūryeṇa / tacca kūṭāgāraṃ nānācitrapaṭṭadāmabhiḥ	vilInena vEdUryeNa / tat ca kUwAgAram nAnA citra pawwa dAmaBiH
   pralambamānairalaṃkṛtamabhūt //	pralambamAnEH alaMkRtam aBUt //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sArDam
   śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ	SrezWi dArikA pUrvaMgamEH paQca dArikA SatEH tam
   kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam / anekāni ca tatra	kUwa AgAram adrAkzIt aparimANena pUjA vyUhena pratimaNxitam / anekAni ca tatra
   devatāsahasrāṇyadrākṣīt, śakraṃ ca devānāmindraṃ	devatA sahasrANi adrAkzIt, Sakram ca devAnAm indram
   divyairmāndāravapuṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca	divyEH mAnda Arava puzpEH divyEH candana cUrNEH divyEH ca
   suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇaistaṃ	suvarNa cUrNEH divyEH ca rUpya cUrNEH tam
   kūṭāgāramavakirantamabhyavakirantamabhiprakirantam / divyāni ca	kUwa AgAram avakirantam aByavakirantam aBiprakirantam / divyAni ca
   vādyānyaśrauṣīt / dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	vAdyAni aSrOzIt / dRzwvA SrutvA ca sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra	Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  kim arTam tvam deva indra
   anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ divyairmāndāravaiḥ	anekEH devatA sahasrEH sArDam idam ratna mayam kUwAgAram divyEH mAnda AravEH
   puṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiḥ suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca	puzpEH divyEH candana cUrNEH divyEH suvarNa cUrNEH divyEH ca
   rūpyacūrṇairavakirasi abhyavakirasi abhiprakirasi? imāni ca divyāni	rUpya cUrNEH avakirasi aByavakirasi aBiprakirasi? imAni ca divyAni
   vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni? evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ	vAdyAni devEH upari antarIkze pravAditAni? evam ukte SakraH devAnAm indraH
   sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat   na tvaṃ kulaputra	sadA praruditam boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat  na tvam kula putra
   jānīṣe? eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā	jAnIze? ezA hi sA prajQApAramitA boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm mAtA
   pariṇāyikā, yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ	pariNAyikA, yatra SikzamANAH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH
   sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca	sarva guNa pAramitA anugatAn sarva budDa DarmAn sarva AkAra jQa tAm ca
   kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti / evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	kzipram anuprApnuvanti iti / evam ukte sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat   kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā, yā	Sakram devAnAm indram etat avocat  kva asO kOSika prajQApAramitA, yA
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā? śakra āha   eṣā kulaputra	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm mAtA pariNAyikA? SakraH Aha  ezA kula putra
   asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa likhitvā āryeṇa	asya kUwAgArasya maDye suvarNa pawwezu vilInena vEdUryeNa liKitvA AryeNa
   dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā	Darma udgatena boDisattvena mahAsattvena saptaBiH mudrABiH mudrayitvA
   sthāpitā / sā na sukarā asmābhistava darśayitum / atha khalu sadāprarudito	sTApitA / sA na sukarAH asmABiH tava darSayitum / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sArDam SrezWi dArikA pramuKE
   pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ, yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni	paQcaBiH dArikA SatEH samagrIBUtEH, yAni anena puzpANi gRhItAni
   mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca	mAlya dAmAni ca vastra ratnAni ca
   dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca	DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkAH ca
   suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi, taiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāmakārṣuḥ,	suvarNa rUpya mayAni ca puzpANi, tEH prajQApAramitAyAH pUjAm akArzuH,
   anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya	anyatara anyataram ca tatas pratyaMSam sTApayAmAsuH yat uta Darma udgatasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya //	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya satkArAya //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tAni ca
   śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni	SrezWi dArikA pramuKAni paQca dArikA SatAni
   puṣpadhūpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ	puzpa DUpa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkABiH
   suvarṇarūpyamayaiś ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ	suvarNa rUpya mayEH ca puzpEH divyEH ca vAdyEH prajQApAramitAm pUrvam
   pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkramya	pUjayitvA yena Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tena upasaMkramya
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiścandanacūrṇaiḥ	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkABiH candana cUrNEH
   suvarṇarūpyamayaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran, divyāni	suvarNa rUpya mayEH ca puzpEH avAkiran aByavAkiran aBiprAkiran, divyAni
   ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya //	ca vAdyAni saMpravAdayati sma Darma pUjAm eva upAdAya //
   atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya	aTa Kalu tAni puzpANi Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan / tāni ca	mahAsattvasya uparizwAt mUrDni puzpa kUwAgAram prAtizWan / tAni ca
   nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi (Vaidya 251) vihāyasi	nAnA varNAni puzpANi suvarNa rUpya mayAni ca puzpANi (VEdyaH 251) vihAyasi
   vitānamiva sthitāni / tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe	vitAnam iva sTitAni / tAni api cIvarANi vastra ratnAni ca antarIkze
   nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt / adrākṣītkhalu	nAnA ratna mayaH aBra maNxapaH iva saMsTitaH aBUt / adrAkzIt Kalu
   sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni	sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tAni ca paQca dArikA SatAni
   śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya	SrezWi dArikA pramuKAni Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam / dṛṣṭvā ca punareṣāmetadabhūt  	mahAsattvasya idam evaMrUpam RdDi prAtihAryam / dRzwvA ca punar ezAm etat aBUt  
   āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	AScaryam yAvat mahardDikaH ca ayam Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ / bodhisattvacaryāmeva tāvaccarato 'sya	yAvat mahA anuBAvaH yAvat mahA ojaskaH / boDisattva caryAm eva tAvat carataH asya
   kulaputrasyaivaṃrūpā ṛddhivikurvaṇā, kiṃ punaryadāyamanuttarāṃ	kula putrasya evaMrUpA RdDi vikurvaNA, kim punar yadA ayam anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyatīti //	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH Bavizyati iti //
   atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate	aTa Kalu tAni SrezWi dArikA pUrvaMgamAni paQca dArikA SatAni Darma udgate
   bodhisattve mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena	boDisattve mahAsattve spRhAm utpAdya sarvAH tAH samagrIBUtAH aDyASayena
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayāmāsuḥ, evaṃ cāvocan   anena	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAdayAmAsuH, evam ca avocan  anena
   vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā	vayam kuSala mUlena anAgate aDvani taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDA
   bhavema / bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo	Bavema / boDisattva caryAm ca vayam carantyaH etezAm eva DarmANAm lABinyaH 
   bhavema, yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /	Bavema, yezAm DarmANAm ayam Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH lABI /
   evameva ca prajñāpāramitāṃ satkuryāma gurukuryāma, yathāyaṃ dharmodgato	evam eva ca prajQApAramitAm satkuryAma gurukuryAma, yaTA ayam Darma udgataH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti / bahujanasya ca	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH satkaroti gurukaroti / bahu janasya ca
   saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati	saMprakASayema yaTA ayam Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH saMprakASayati
   / evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /	/ evam eva ca prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca samanvAgatA Bavema /
   pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	parinizpadyemahi ca yaTA ayam Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca //	prajQApAramitayA upAya kOSalyena ca samanvAgataH parinizpannaH ca //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tAni ca
   śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā	SrezWi dArikA pramuKAni paQca dArikA SatAni prajQApAramitAm pUjayitvA
   dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya dharmodgatasya	Darma udgatam ca boDisattvam mahAsattvam satkRtya Darma udgatasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte sa gOravAH
   sapratīkṣāḥ prāñjalīn kṛtvātiṣṭhan / ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito	sa pratIkzAH prAQjalIn kRtvA atizWan / ekAnte sTitaH ca sadA praruditaH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat  	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat  
   ihāhaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ gaveṣamāṇo 'raṇyagato nirghoṣamaśrauṣam  	iha aham kula putra prajQApAramitAm gavezamANaH araNya gataH nirGozam aSrOzam  
   gaccha kulaputra pūrvāṃ diśam / tataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasīti / so 'haṃ	gacCa kula putra pUrvAm diSam / tatas prajQApAramitAm Srozyasi iti / saH aham
   samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ / tasya me	samyak tam nirGozam SrutvA yena pUrvA diS tena saMprasTitaH / tasya me
   etadabhūt   samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ / na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ	etat aBUt  samyak ca mayA nirGozaH SrutaH / na ca mayA sa nirGozaH
   paripṛṣṭaḥ   kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam, kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ	paripRzwaH  kiyat dUram mayA gantavyam, kasya vE antikAt prajQApAramitAm
   śroṣyāmi lapsye veti / tasya me mahaddaurmanasyamabhūt / so 'haṃ tena	SrozyAmi lapsye vA iti / tasya me mahat dOrmanasyam aBUt / saH aham tena
   daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam / tasminneva	dOrmanasyena mahatIm utkaNWAm paritapanam ca ApannaH aBUvam / tasmin= eva
   pṛthivīpradeśe saptarātriṃdivānyatināmayāmi utkaṇṭhitaḥ /	pRTivI pradeSe sapta rAtriMdivAni atinAmayAmi utkaNWitaH /
   nāhārasamudācāramutpādayāmi / api tu prajñāpāramitāmeva manasi karomi  	na AhAra samudAcAram utpAdayAmi / api tu prajQApAramitAm eva manasi karomi  
   kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam, kuto vā prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsye śravaṇāya? na ca	kiyat dUram mayA gantavyam, kutas vA prajQApAramitAm lapsye SravaNAya? na ca
   mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti / tato me tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ	mayA sa nirGozaH paripRzwaH iti / tatas me taTAgata vigrahaH puratas 
   prādurbhūtaḥ / sa māmevamāha   gaccha kulaputra itaḥ	prAdurBUtaH / sa mAm evam Aha  gacCa kula putraH itas 
   pañcabhiryojanaśatairanupūrveṇa gandhavatī nāma nagarī / tatra drakṣyasi	paQcaBiH yojana SatEH anupUrveNa ganDavatI nAma nagarI / tatra drakzyasi
   dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ	Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam prajQApAramitAm deSayantam
   prakāśayantamiti / tato 'haṃ mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ /	prakASayantam iti / tatas aham mahatA udAreNa prIti prAmodyena samanvAgataH /
   so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ	saH aham tena eva mahatA udAreNa prIti prAmodyena sPuwaH tatas 
   pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ, tava ca prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇomi /	pRTivI pradeSAt na calitaH, tava ca prajQApAramitAm deSayataH SRNomi /
   tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni / (Vaidya 252) tatra	tasya me SRNvataH bahUni samADi muKAni prAdurBUtAni / (VEdyaH 252) tatra
   sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,	sTitam mAm daSa diS loka DAtu sTitAH budDAH BagavantaH samASvAsayanti,
   sādhukāraṃ ca dadati   sādhu sādhu kulaputra, ete samādhayaḥ	sADu kAram ca dadati  sADu sADu kula putra, ete samADayaH
   prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ, yatra sthitairasmābhiḥ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ	prajQApAramitA nirjAtAH, yatra sTitEH asmABiH sarva budDa DarmAH
   pariniṣpāditā iti / te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya	parinizpAditAH iti / te mAm taTAgatAH sADu ca suzWu ca saMdarSya
   samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ / ahaṃ ca tataḥ	samAdApya samuttejya saMpraharzya antarhitAH / aham ca tatas 
   samādhervyutthitaḥ / tasya me etadabhūt   kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ, kva	samADeH vyutTitaH / tasya me etat aBUt  kutas nu te taTAgatAH AgatAH, kva
   vā te tathāgatā gatā iti? tasya ca me etadabhūt   āryo dharmodgato	vA te taTAgatAH gatAH iti? tasya ca me etat aBUt  AryaH Darma udgataH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DAraNI pratilabDaH paQca aBijQaH
   pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ upāyakauśalye	pUrva jina AkRta aDikAraH avaropita kuSala mUlaH, prajQApAramitAyAm upAya kOSalye
   ca suśikṣitaḥ / sa me enamarthaṃ yathāvadvicariṣyati, yataste tathāgatā	ca su SikzitaH / sa me enam arTam yaTAvat vicarizyati, yatas te taTAgatA
   āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti / so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya	AgatAH yatra vA te taTAgatAH gatAH iti / saH aham tasya taTAgata vigrahasya
   nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /	nirGozam SrutvA yaTA anuSizwam yena pUrvAm diS tena saMprasTitaH /
   āgacchaṃścāhaṃ dūrata evāryamadrākṣaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam / sahadarśanācca	AgacCan= ca aham dUratas eva Aryam adrAkzam Darmam deSayantam / saha darSanAt ca
   mamedṛśaṃ sukhaṃ prādurabhūt, tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya	mama IdRSam suKam prAduraBUt, tat yaTA api nAma praTama DyAna samApannasya
   bhikṣorekāgramanasikārasya / so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi   kutaste	BikzoH ekAgra manasikArasya / saH aham tvAm kula putra pRcCAmi  kutas te
   tathāgatā āgatāḥ, kutra te tathāgatā gatā iti? deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ	taTAgatAH AgatAH, kutra te taTAgatAH gatA iti? deSaya me kula putra tezAm
   tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca / yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ	taTAgatAnAm Agamanam gamanam ca / yaTA vayam tezAm taTAgatAnAm Agamanam
   gamanaṃ ca jānīma, avirahitāś ca bhavema tathāgatadarśaneneti //	gamanam ca jAnIma, avirahitAH ca Bavema taTAgata darSanena iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sadāpraruditaparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm sadA prarudita parivartaH nAma
   triṃśattamaḥ //	triMSattamaH //
   (Vaidya 253)	(VEdyaH 253)
   ASP_31: dharmodgataparivarta ekatriṃśattamaḥ /	ASP_31: Darma udgata parivarte ekatriMSattamaH /
   evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva	evam ukte Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sadA praruditam boDisattva
   mahāsattvametadavocat   na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti	mahAsattvam etat avocat  na Kalu kula putra taTAgatAH kutaScid AgacCanti
   vā gacchanti vā / acalitā hi tathatā / yā ca tathatā, sa tathāgataḥ / na	vA gacCanti vA / acalitA hi taTatA / yA ca taTatA, sa taTAgataH / na
   hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā / yaś ca anutpādaḥ, sa	hi kula putra anutpAdaH AgacCati vA gacCati vA / yaH ca anutpAdaH, sa
   tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate	taTAgataH / na hi kula putra BUtakowyA Agamanam vA gamanam vA prajQAyate
   / yā ca bhūtakoṭiḥ, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā	/ yA ca BUtakowiH, sa taTAgataH / na hi kula putra SUnyatAyAH Agamanam vA
   gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate / yā ca śūnyatā, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra	gamanam vA prajQAyate / yA ca SUnyatA, sa taTAgataH / na hi kula putra
   yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate / yā ca yathāvattā, sa	yaTAvat tAyAH Agamanam vA gamanam vA prajQAyate / yA ca yaTAvat tA, sa
   tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /	taTAgataH / na hi kula putra virAgasya Agamanam vA gamanam vA prajQAyate /
   yā ca virāgatā, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā	yA ca virAga tA, sa taTAgataH / na hi kula putra niroDasya Agamanam vA
   gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate / yaś ca nirodhaḥ, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra	gamanam vA prajQAyate / yaH ca niroDaH, sa taTAgataH / na hi kula putra
   ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate / yaś ca ākāśadhātuḥ, sa	AkASa DAtoH Agamanam vA gamanam vA prajQAyate / yaH ca AkASa DAtuH, sa
   tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ / yā ca	taTAgataH / na hi kula putra anyatra eByaH DarmeByaH taTAgataH / yA ca
   kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā, yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, yā ca	kula putraH ezAm eva DarmANAm taTatA, yA ca sarva Darma taTatA, yA ca
   tathāgatatathatā, ekaivaiṣā tathatā / nāsti kulaputra tathatāyā	taTAgata taTatA, ekA eva ezA taTatA / na asti kula putra taTatAyA
   dvaidhīkāraḥ / ekaivaiṣā tathatā kulaputra / tathatā na dve na tisraḥ /	dvEDIkAraH / ekA eva ezA taTatA kula putra / taTatA na dve na tisraH /
   gaṇanāvyativṛttā kulaputrā tathatā yaduta asattvāt / tadyathāpi nāma	gaNanA vyativRttA kula putrA taTatA yat uta asattvAt / tat yaTA api nAma
   kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate	kula putra puruzaH grIzma aBitaptaH grIzmANAm paScime mAse aBigate
   madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām / sa tena tena pradhāvet	maDyAhna kAla samaye marIcikAm paSyet syandamAnAm / sa tena tena praDAvet 
     atrodakaṃ pāsyāmi, apānīyaṃ pāsyāmīti / tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta	 atra udakam pAsyAmi, apAnIyam pAsyAmi iti / tat kim manyase kula putra kuta
   etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati, pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ	etat udakam Agatam kva vA tat udakam gacCati, pUrvam vA mahA samudram
   dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā? sadāprarudita āha   na hi kulaputra	dakziNam vA paScimam vA uttaram vA? sadA praruditaH Aha  na hi kula putra
   marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate / kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā	marIcikAyAm udakam saMvidyate / kim punar asya Agamanam vA gamanam vA
   prajñāyate? sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo	prajQAyate? sa Kalu punar kula putra puruzaH grIzma aBitaptaH bAla jAtIyaH 
   duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati / na	duzprajQa jAtIyaH marIcikAm dRzwvA anudake udaka saMjQAm utpAdayati / na
   punastatrodakaṃ svabhāvataḥ saṃvidyate / dharmodgata āha  	punar tatra udakam svaBAvataH saMvidyate / Darma udgataH Aha  
   evametatkulaputra, evam etat / evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa	evam etat kula putra, evam etat / evam eva kula putra ye kecid taTAgata rUpeNa
   vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ, te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca	vA GozeNa vE aBinivizwAH, te taTAgatasya Agamanam ca gamanam ca

   'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi tathāgato	anudake udaka saMjQAm utpAdayati / tat kasya hetoH? na hi taTAgataH 
   rūpakāyato draṣṭavyaḥ / dharmakāyāstathāgatāḥ / na ca kulaputra dharmatā	rUpakAyataH drazwavyaH / Darma kAyAH taTAgatAH / na ca kula putra Darma tA
   āgacchati vā gacchati vā / evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā	AgacCati vA gacCati vA / evam eva kula putra na asti taTAgatAnAm Agamanam vA
   gamanaṃ vā / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā	gamanam vA / tat yaTA api nAma kula putra mAyA kAra nirmitasya hasti kAyasya vA
   aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ	aSva kAyasya vA raTa kAyasya vA patti kAyasya vA na asti Agamanam vA gamanam
   vā, evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /	vA, evam eva kula putra na asti taTAgatAnAm Agamanam vA gamanam vA /

   vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā	vA nava vA daSa vA viMSatim vA triMSat vA catvAriMSat vA paQcASat vA Satam vA
   sahasraṃ vā, tato vā uttare / sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na	sahasram vA, tatas vA uttare / sa prativibudDaH san ekam api taTAgatam na
   paśyet / tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te	paSyet / tat kim manyase kula putra kutas te taTAgatAH AgatAH kva vA te
   tathāgatā gatā iti? sadāprarudita āha   na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne	taTAgatAH gatA iti? sadA praruditaH Aha  na Kalu punar kula putra svapne

   svapno 'bhūt / dharmodgata āha   evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā	svapnaH aBUt / Darma udgataH Aha  evam eva kula putra sarva DarmAH svapna upamA

   nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti, te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā	nirdeSitAn yaTABUtam na prajAnanti, te taTAgatAt nAma kAyena vA

   utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā / ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā	utpAdam vA niroDam vA / ye ca na kasyacid Darmasya Agamanam vA gamanam vA

   āsannā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheścaranti / te ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	AsannAH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH caranti / te ca prajQApAramitAyAm

   pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti, na dakṣiṇasyāḥ, na paścimāyāḥ, nottarasyāḥ, na	pUrvasyAH diSaH AgacCanti, na dakziNasyAH, na paScimAyAH, na uttarasyAH, na

   tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante	tu Kalu punar sattvAnAm kuSala mUlAni upAdAya mahA samudre ratnAni utpadyante

   prabhāvyante, teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati	praBAvyante, tezAm pratyayAnAm asatAm na tezAm ratnAnAm praBAvanA Bavati
   / evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna	/ evam eva kula putra tezAm taTAgatAnAm kAya parinizpattiH na

   prajñāyate / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na	prajQAyate / tat yaTA api nAma kula putra vINAyAH SabdaH utpadyamAnaH na

   kvacitsaṃkrāmati, pratītya ca hetupratyayasāmagrīmutpadyate hetvadhīnaḥ	kvacid saMkrAmati, pratItya ca hetu pratyaya sAmagrIm utpadyate hetu aDInaH
   pratyayādhīnaḥ / tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya	pratyaya aDInaH / tat yaTA api nAma droNIm ca pratItya carma ca pratItya
   tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca	tantrIH ca pratItya daNxam ca pratItya upaDAnIH ca pratItya koNam ca

   carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya	carmaNaH na tantrIByaH na daNxAn na upaDAnIByaH na koNAt na puruzasya

   samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate / nirudhyamāno 'pi śabdo na kvacidgacchati /	samAyogAt SabdaH prajQapyate / niruDyamAnaH api SabdaH na kvacid gacCati /

   caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā / na ca	ca ekatas pratyayataH na ca ekatas kuSala mUlataH budDa kAya praBAvanA / na ca
   nairhetukī / (Vaidya 255) bahuhetupratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannā sā na	nErhetukI / (VEdyaH 255) bahu hetu pratyaya sAmagryAm samutpannA sA na

   tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /	tvayA kula putra tezAm taTAgatAnAm Agamanam ca gamanam ca drazwavyam /
   sarvadharmāṇām api kulaputra tvayā iyameva dharmatā anugantavyā / yataḥ	sarva DarmANAm api kula putra tvayA iyam eva DarmatA anugantavyA / yatas 
   kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś	kula putra tvam evam taTAgatAn ca sarva DarmAn ca anutpannAn anirudDAn= 
   ca saṃprajñāsyasi, tatastvaṃ niyato bhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau	ca saMprajQAsyasi, tatas tvam niyataH Bavizyasi anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO
   / prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalye ca niyataṃ cariṣyasi //	/ prajQApAramitAyAm upAya kOSalye ca niyatam carizyasi //
   asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān	asmin Kalu punar taTAgatAnAm anAgatya gamana nirdeSe BAzyamANe mahAn
   bhūmicālo 'bhūt / sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ	BUmicAlaH aBUt / sarvaH ca tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH
   ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate, calati	zaz vikAra mahA daSa mahA nimittam kampate prakampate saMprakampate, calati
   pracalati saṃpracalati, vedhate pravedhate saṃpravedhate, raṇati praraṇati	pracalati saMpracalati, veDate praveDate saMpraveDate, raNati praraNati
   saṃpraraṇati, kṣubhyati prakṣubhyati saṃprakṣubhyati, garjati pragarjati	saMpraraNati, kzuByati prakzuByati saMprakzuByati, garjati pragarjati
   saṃpragarjati sma / sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni	saMpragarjati sma / sarvANi ca mAra BavanAni saMkzoBitAni jihmIBUtAni

   mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan / akālapuṣpāṇi cotsṛjanti sma /	mahAsattvaH tena praNatAH aBUvan / akAla puzpANi ca utsRjanti sma /

   devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	devAnAm indraH catvAraH ca mahA rAjAnaH Darma udgatam boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran	divyEH candana cUrNEH divyEH ca puzpEH avAkiran aByavAkiran aBiprAkiran
   / evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta   sādhu sādhu kulaputra / tava kulaputra	/ evam ca vAcam aBAzanta  sADu sADu kula putra / tava kula putra
   anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā	anuBAvena adya asmABiH parama arTa nirjAtA kaTA deSyamAnA SrutA
   sarvalokavipratyanīkā, yatrābhūmiḥ sarvasatkāyadṛṣṭipratiṣṭhitānāṃ	sarva loka vipratyanIkA, yatra aBUmiH sarva sat kAya dRzwi pratizWitAnAm
   sarvāsaddṛṣṭyabhiviniviṣṭānāṃ sattvānām //	sarva asat dRzwi aBivinivizwAnAm sattvAnAm //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvametadavocat   kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo 'sya	mahAsattvam etat avocat  kaH punar kula putra atra hetuH, kaH pratyayaH asya
   mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya? dharmodgato bodhisattvo	mahataH pRTivI cAlasya loke prAdurBAvAya? Darma udgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva āha   imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ tava ca	mahAsattvaH Aha  imam kula putra taTAgatAnAm anAgatya gamana nirdeSam tava ca
   pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ	pRcCataH mama ca nirdiSataH azwAnAm
   prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt / aśīteś ca	prANi sahasrANAm anutpattika Darma kzAnti pratilamBaH aBUt / aSIteH ca
   prāṇiniyutānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni, catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca	prANi niyutAnAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittAni utpannAni, catuHzazweH ca
   prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni	prANi sahasrANAm virajAMsi vigata malAni Darmezu Darma cakzUMzi viSudDAni
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH parama udAreNa
   prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt   lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ, yasya me	prIti prAmodyena samanvAgataH aBUt  lABAH me parama sulabDAH, yasya me
   prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ	prajQApAramitAm imam ca taTAgatAnAm anAgatya gamana nirdeSam paripRcCataH
   iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ / etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ	iyatAm sattvAnAm arTaH kRtaH / etat eva asmAkam paryAptam kuSalam
   bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye / na ca me bhūyo	Bavet anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH parinizpattaye / na ca me BUyo

   tathāgato bhaviṣyāmyarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ / sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena	taTAgataH BavizyAmi arhan samyaksaMbudDaH / sa tena eva prIti prAmodyena
   samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle sthitvā evaṃ	samanvAgataH sapta tAlam vihAyasam aByudgamya sapta tAle sTitvA evam
   cintayati sma   kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	cintayati sma  kena aham etarhi antarIkze sTitaH Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti? atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ	mahAsattvam satkuryAm iti? aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indra sadA praruditam

   divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma, evaṃ cāvocat  	divyAni ca asmE mAndAravANi puzpANi upanAmayati sma, evam ca avocat

   mahāsattvaṃ satkuru / satkartavyo hi kulaputra asmābhistava parigrāhakaḥ /	mahAsattvam satkuru / satkartavyaH hi kula putra asmABiH tava parigrAhakaH /

   'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā	aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn kalpAn utsahante mahAntam BAram udvoXum yaTA tvayA
   utsoḍham //	utsoXam //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Sakrasya

   mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt //	mahAsattvasya puratas prAQjalim kRtvA sTAt //
   atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ	aTa Kalu sA SrezWi dArikA tAni ca paQca dArikA SatAni sadA praruditam

   / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca	/ aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SrezWi dArikAm tAni ca

   ca paripraśnayadbhiriti //	ca paripraSnayadBiH iti //

   cāstaṃgamanakālo 'bhūt //	ca astaMgamana kAlaH aBUt //
   atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt  	aTa Kalu sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya etat aBUt

   niṣīdeyam, śayyāṃ ca parikalpayeyam / yannvahaṃ dvābhyāmeva (Vaidya 257)	nizIdeyam, SayyAm ca parikalpayeyam / yat nu aham dvAByAm eva (VEdyaH 257)
   īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,	IryA paTAByAm sTitvA sTAnena caMkrameNa ca kAlam atinAmayeyam,
