   yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti //	yat uta Darma saMprakASanAya iti //
   atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta	aTa Kalu Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sapta
   varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt /	varzANi eka samADi samApannaH eva aBUt /
   aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairbodhisattvasamādhisahasraiḥ	aprameyEH asaMKyeyEH boDisattva samADi sahasrEH
   prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyanirjātairvyāhārṣīt / sadāprarudito 'pi	prajQApAramitA upAya kOSalya nirjAtEH vyAhArzIt / sadA praruditaH api
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ	boDisattvaH mahA sattva sapta varzANi dvAByAm eva IryA paTAByAm
   kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa / sapta varṣāṇi ca	kAlam atinAmayan na styAnam idDam avakrAmayAmAsa / sapta varzANi ca
   kāmavitarkamutpādayāmāsa, na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na	kAma vitarkam utpAdayAmAsa, na vyApAda vitarkam na
   vihiṃsāvitarkamutpādayāmāsa, na rasagṛddhiṃ na cittaudbilyamutpādayāmāsa /	vihiMsA vitarkam utpAdayAmAsa, na rasa gRdDim na citta Odbilyam utpAdayAmAsa /
   api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	api tu kadA nAma Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati, yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva	asmAt samADeH vyutTAsyati, yat nu vayam Darma udgatasya boDisattva
   mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ, yatrāsau kulaputro niṣadya	mahAsattvasya Darma Asanam prajQapayizyAmaH, yatra asO kula putraH nizadya
   dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti / taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca	Darmam deSayizyati iti / tam ca pRTivI pradeSam su siktam su mRzwam ca
   kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam, yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo	karizyAmaH nAnA puzpa aBikIrNam, yatra pRTivI pradeSe Darma udgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm upAya kOSalyam ca saMprakASayizyati iti
   cintayāmāsa / tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni	cintayAmAsa / tAni api SrezWi dArikA pramuKAni paQca dArikA SatAni
   sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyāmeva	sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya anuSikzamANAni dvAByAm eva
   īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayāmāsuḥ sarvāḥ kriyāstasyānuvartamānāḥ //	IryA paTAByAm kAlam atinAmayAmAsuH sarvAH kriyAH tasya anuvartamAnAH //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt  	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH divyam nirGozam aSrOzIt  
   itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	itas saptame divase Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati, vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ	asmAt samADeH vyutTAsyati, vyutTAya ca maDyenagarasya nizadya Darmam
   deśayiṣyatīti / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ	deSayizyati iti / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam divyam
   nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ	nirGozam SrutvA tuzwaH udagre Atta manAH pramuditaH prIti sOmanasya jAtaH tam
   pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ	pRTivI pradeSam SoDayAmAsa sArDam SrezWi dArikA pramuKEH
   pañcadārikāśataiḥ, dharmāsanaṃ ca prajñapayāmāsa saptaratnamayam, svakaṃ	paQca dArikA SatEH, Darma Asanam ca prajQapayAmAsa sapta ratnam ayam, svakam
   cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma / atha khalu	ca uttarAsaFgam kAyAt avatArya tasya Asanasya upari prajQapayati sma / aTa Kalu
   tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni	tAH dArikAH sva ka svakAn uttarAsaFgAn kAyAt avatArya paQca uttarAsaFga SatAni
   tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	tatra Asane prajQapayAmAsuH atra Asane Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti / evaṃ tāś ca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya	nizadya Darmam deSayizyati iti / evam tAH ca sarvAH dArikA Darma udgatasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya Darma Asanam AstIrya tuzwAH udagrAH Atta manasaH
   pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan //	pramuditAH prIti sOmanasya jAtAH aBUvan //
   atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ	aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam pRTivI pradeSam
   sektukāmaḥ / na codakaṃ samantātparyeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate, yena taṃ	sektu kAmaH / na ca udakam samantAt paryezamANaH api laBate, yena tam
   pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñcet / yathāpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā	pRTivI pradeSam siQcet / yaTA api nAma mAreNa pApIyasA
   tatsarvamudakamantardhāpitamabhūt, apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya	tat sarvam udakam antar DApitam aBUt, api eva nAma asya sadA praruditasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,	boDisattvasya mahA sattvasya udakam alaBamAnasya cittam Kidyeta,
   duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ ca bhavet, cittasya vā anyathātvaṃ bhavet, yenāsya	duHKa dOrmanasyam ca Bavet, cittasya vE anyaTAtvam Bavet, yena asya
   kuśalamūlasyāntardhānaṃ bhavet, na vā pūjā bhrājeran //	kuSala mUlasya antarDAnam Bavet, na vA pUjA BrAjeran //
   atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt  	aTa Kalu sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya etat aBUt  
   yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /	yat nu aham AtmanaH kAyam vidDvA imam pRTivI pradeSam ruDireNa siQceyam /
   tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ hi pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ / mā rajodhāturito	tat kasya hetoH? ayam hi pRTivI pradeSaH udData rajaskaH / mA rajaH DAturitas 
   bhūpradeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet / kiṃ	BU pradeSAt Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kAye nipatet / kim
   vā anenātmabhāvenāvaśyaṃ bhedanadharmiṇā kuryām? varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ	vA anena Atma BAvena avaSyam Bedana DarmiNA kuryAm? varam Kalu punar mama ayam
   kāya (Vaidya 258) evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu, na tu niḥsāmarthyakriyayā	kAyaH (VEdyaH 258) evaMrUpayA kriyayA vinaSyatu, na tu niHsAmarTya kriyayA
   / api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ	/ api ca kAma hetoH kAmanidAnam bahUni me Atma BAva sahasrANi punar punar 
   saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni, na punarevaṃrūpeṣu sthāneṣu	saMsAre saMsarataH BinnAni, na punar evaMrUpezu sTAnezu
   saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ / yadi punarbhidyante, kāmamevaṃrūpeṣu	sat Darma parigrahasya kRtaSas / yadi punar Bidyante, kAmam evaMrUpezu
   bhidyantāmiti / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti	BidyantAm iti / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti
   pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ	pratisaMKyAya tIkzNam Sastram gRhItvA sva kAyam samantataH vidDvA tam
   pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat / tāny api	pRTivI pradeSam sva ruDireNa sarvam asiQcat / tAni api
   śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya	SrezWi dArikA pramuKAni paQca dArikA SatAni sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā	mahAsattvasya anuSikzamANAni sarvANi tAni tIkzNAni SastrANi gRhItvA
   svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakasvakairlohitaiḥ	sva ka svakAni SarIrANi vidDvA tam pRTivI pradeSam svaka svakEH lohitEH
   sarvamasiñcan / na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ	sarvam asiQcan / na ca sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya tAsAm
   vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt, yatra sa māraḥ	vA sarvAsAm dArikANAm cittasya anyaTAtvam aBUt, yatra sa mAraH
   pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet kuśalamūlāntarāyakaraṇāya //	pApIyAn avatAram laBet kuSala mUla antarAya karaNAya //
   atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt   āścaryaṃ	aTa Kalu Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt  AScaryam
   yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,	yAvat Darma kAmaH ca ayam sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH,
   yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaś ca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaś ca anapekṣaḥ kāye	yAvat dRXa samAdAnaH ca yAvat mahA saMnAha saMnadDaH ca anapekzaH kAye
   jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca, anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheradhigamāya	jIvitezu Bogezu ca, anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH aDigamAya
   adhyāśayasaṃprasthitaḥ / yaduta sarvasattvān mocayiṣyāmyaparimāṇataḥ	aDyASaya saMprasTitaH / yat uta sarva sattvAt mocayizyAmi aparimANataH
   saṃsāraduḥkhādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeti / atha khalu śakro	saMsAra duHKAt anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya iti / aTa Kalu SakraH 
   devānāmindrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,	devAnAm indraH tat sarvam lohita udakam divyam candana udakam aDyatizWat,
   samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya	samantAt ca tasya pRTivI pradeSasya acintyam parama udAram ganDam yasya
   divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam / yojanaśataṃ gandho vāti //	divyasya candana udakasya paripUrNam / yojana Satam ganDaH vAti //
   atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat	aTa SakraH devAnAm indraH sadA praruditam boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat 
     sādhu sādhu kulaputra / sādhu te kulaputra acintyaṃ vīryam, sādhvī ca te	 sADu sADu kula putra / sADu te kula putra acintyam vIryam, sADvI ca te
   anuttarā dharmakāmatā dharmaparīṣṭiś ca / evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena	anuttarA Darma kAma tA Darma parIzwiH ca / evaMrUpeNa kula putra aDyASayena
   evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ	evaMrUpeNa vIryeNa evaMrUpayA ca Darma kAma tayA tEH
   paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ	pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH
   samudānītā //	samudAnItAH //
   atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt  	aTa Kalu sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya etat aBUt  
   prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam /	prajQaptam mayA Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya Darma Asanam /
   ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ / kuto nu khalvahaṃ	ayam ca pRTivI pradeSaH su siktaH su saMmRzwaH ca kRtaH / kutas nu Kalu aham
   puṣpāṇi labheyam, yairahamimaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇaṃ kuryām,	puzpANi laBeyam, yEH aham imam pRTivI pradeSam puzpa aBikIrNam kuryAm,
   dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane	Darma udgatam ca boDisattvam mahAsattvam Darmam deSayantam Darma Asane
   niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam? atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ	nizaNNam aByavakireyam? aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH sadA praruditam
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat   imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa	boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat  imAni te kula putra pratigRhANa
   divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi / ebhistvamimaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇaṃ	divyAni mAndAravANi puzpANi / eBiH tvam imam pRTivI pradeSam puzpa aBikIrNam
   kuru, dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ	kuru, Darma udgatam ca boDisattvam mahAsattvam Darmam deSayantam
   dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakira / sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ	Darma Asane nizaNNam aByavakiraH / sa tasmE divyam KArI sahasram divyAnAm
   māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo	mAndArava puzpANAm upanAmayati sma / aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ	mahA sattvaH tAni puzpANi gRhItvA anyatarEH puzpEH tam pRTivI pradeSam
   puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt, anyataraiś ca puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ	puzpa aBikIrNam akArzIt, anyatarEH ca puzpEH Darma udgatam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvamabhyavākirat //	mahAsattvam aByavAkirat //
   atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena	aTa Kalu Darma udgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH saptAnAm varzANAm atyayena
   tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane	tatas samADeH vyutTAya yena Darma Asanam tena upasaMkramya prajQapte eva Asane
   nyaṣīdat, anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ	nyazIdat, aneka Sata sahasrayA parzadA parivRtaH puraskRtaH prajQApAramitAm
   deśayāmāsa //	deSayAmAsa //
   (Vaidya 259) atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	(VEdyaH 259) aTa Kalu sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ	saha darSanena eva Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya tAdRSam
   sukhaṃ pratilabhate sma, tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanna	suKam pratilaBate sma, tat yaTA api nAma praTama DyAna samApanna
   ekāgramanasikāro bhikṣuḥ / tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya	ekAgra manasikAraH BikzuH / tatra iyam Darma udgatasya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA deSanAyat uta sarva Darma samatayA
   prajñāpāramitāsamatā / sarvadharmaviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatā /	prajQApAramitA sama tA / sarva Darma vivikta tayA prajQApAramitA vivikta tA /
   sarvadharmācalanatayā prajñāpāramitācalanatā / sarvadharmāmananatayā	sarva Darma acalana tayA prajQApAramitA calana tA / sarva Darma Amanana tayA
   prajñāpāramitāmananatā / sarvadharmāstambhitatayā	prajQApAramitA mananatA / sarva Darma astamBita tayA
   prajñāpāramitāstambhitatā / savadharmaikarasatayā prajñāpāramitaikarasatā	prajQApAramitA stamBita tA / sa vaDarma eka rasa tayA prajQApAramitA eka rasa tA
   / sarvadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā /	/ sarva Darma aparyanta tayA prajQApAramitA paryanta tA /
   sarvadharmānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitānutpādatā / sarvadharmānirodhatayā	sarva Darma anutpAda tayA prajQApAramitA anutpAda tA / sarva Darma aniroDa tayA
   prajñāpāramitānirodhatā / gaganāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā /	prajQApAramitA niroDa tA / gagana aparyanta tayA prajQApAramitA paryanta tA /
   samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā / meruvicitratayā	samudra aparyanta tayA prajQApAramitA paryanta tA / meru vicitra tayA
   prajñāpāramitāvicitratā / gaganākalpanatayā prajñāpāramitākalpanatā /	prajQApAramitA vicitra tA / gagana akalpana tayA prajQApAramitA kalpanatA /
   rūpāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /	rUpa aparyanta tayA prajQApAramitA paryanta tA / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH /
   vijñānāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā / pṛthivīdhātvaparyantatatā	vijQAna aparyanta tayA prajQApAramitA paryanta tA / pRTivI DAtu aparyanta tatA
   prajñāpāramitāparyantatā /	prajQApAramitA paryanta tA /
   evamabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātvākāśadhātvaparyantatayā	evam ap DAtu tejaH DAtuvAyu DAtu AkASa DAtu aparyanta tayA
   prajñāpāramitāparyantatā / vijñānadhātvaparyantatayā	prajQApAramitA paryanta tA / vijQAna DAtu aparyanta tayA
   prajñāpāramitāparyantatā / vajropamadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā /	prajQApAramitA paryanta tA / vajra upama Darma sama tayA prajQApAramitA sama tA /
   sarvadharmāsaṃbhedanatayā prajñāpāramitāsaṃbhedanatā /	sarva Darma asaMBedana tayA prajQApAramitA saMBedanatA /
   sarvadharmānupalabdhitayā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhitā /	sarva Darma anupalabDi tayA prajQApAramitA anupalabDi tA /
   sarvadharmābhibhāvanāsamatayā prajñāpāramitābhibhāvanāsamatā /	sarva Darma aBiBAvanA samatayA prajQApAramitA aBiBAvanA samatA /
   sarvadharmaniśceṣṭatayā prajñāpāramitāniśceṣṭatā / sarvadharmācintyatayā	sarva Darma niScezwa tayA prajQApAramitA niScezwa tA / sarva Darma acintya tayA
   prajñāpāramitācintyatā veditavyeti //	prajQApAramitA acintya tA veditavyA iti //
   atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	aTa Kalu sadA praruditasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   tathāniṣaṇṇasyaiva tasyāṃ belāyāṃ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhirājo jātaḥ	taTA AnizaNNasya eva tasyAm belAyAm sarva Darma samatA nAma samADi rAjaH jAtaH
   / yataḥ sarvadharmaviviktaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmācalanaś ca nāma	/ yatas sarva Darma viviktaH ca nAma samADiH, sarva DarmAcalanaH ca nAma
   samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāmananaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāstambhitaś ca	samADiH, sarva DarmAmananaH ca nAma samADiH, sarva Darma astamBitaH ca
   nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmaikarasaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāparyantaś	nAma samADiH, sarva Darma ekarasaH ca nAma samADiH, sarva Darma aparyanta S
   ca nāma samādhi, sarvadharmānutpādaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmānirodhaś	ca nAma samADi, sarva DarmAnutpAdaH ca nAma samADiH, sarva Darma aniroDaH 
   ca nāma samādhiḥ, gaganāparyataś ca nāma samādhiḥ, samudrāparyantaś ca	ca nAma samADiH, gagana aparyataH ca nAma samADiH, samudra aparyantaH ca
   nāma samādhiḥ, meruvicitraś ca nāma samādhiḥ, gaganākalpaś ca nāma	nAma samADiH, meru vicitraH ca nAma samADiH, gaganAkalpaH ca nAma
   samādhiḥ, rūpāparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /	samADiH, rUpa aparyantaH ca nAma samADiH / evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH /
   vijñānāparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, pṛthivīdhātvaparyantaśva nāma samādhiḥ,	vijQAna aparyantaH ca nAma samADiH, pRTivIDAtvaparyantaSva nAma samADiH,
   evamabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātvākāśadhātvaparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ,	evam ap DAtu tejaH DAtuvAyu DAtu AkASa DAtu aparyantaH ca nAma samADiH,
   vijñānadhātvaparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, vajropamaś ca nāma samādhiḥ,	vijQAna DAtu aparyantaH ca nAma samADiH, vajra upamaH ca nAma samADiH,
   sarvadharmāsaṃbhedaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmānupalabdhiś ca nāma	sarva Darma asaMBedaH ca nAma samADiH, sarva Darma anupalabDiH ca nAma
   samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāvibhāvanāsamatā ca nāma samādhiḥ,	samADiH, sarva Darma aviBAvanA sama tA ca nAma samADiH,
   sarvadharmaniśceṣṭaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmācintyaś ca nāma samādhiḥ	sarva Darma niScezwaH ca nAma samADiH, sarva Darma acintyaH ca nAma samADiH
   / evaṃpramukhāni ṣaṣṭiḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi sadāpraruditena	/ evaMpramuKAni zazwiH samADi muKa Sata sahasrANi sadA praruditena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratilabdhānyabhūvanniti //	boDisattvena mahAsattvena pratilabDAni aBUvan= iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dharmodgataparivarto	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm Darma udgata parivartaH 
   nāmaikatriṃśattamaḥ //	nAma ekatriMSattamaH //
   (Vaidya 260)	(VEdyaH 260)
   ASP_32: parīndanāparivarto dvātriṃśattamaḥ /	ASP_32: parIndanA parivartaH dvAtriMSattamaH /
   sahapratilabdhānāṃ ca subhūte ṣaṣṭyāḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇāṃ	saha pratilabDAnAm ca suBUte zazwyAH samADi muKa Sata sahasrANAm
   sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi, dakṣiṇasyāṃ	sadA praruditaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pUrvasyAm diSi, dakziNasyAm
   paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi, vidikṣu adha ūrdhvaṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu	paScimAyAm uttarasyAm diSi, vidikzu aDas UrDvam ca diSi daSasu dikzu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrezu lokaDAtuzu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn BagavataH paSyati sma Bikzu saMGa parivRtAn
   bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtān etaireva nayairebhireva	boDisattva guNa puraskRtAn etEH eva nayEH eBiH eva
   nāmabhiretairevākṣarairimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇān / tadyathāpi	nAmaBiretEH eva akzarEH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm BAzamANAn / tat yaTA api
   nāma ahametarhi asminneva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmaṃ	nAma aham etarhi asmin= eva tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO Darmam
   deśayāmi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaḥ, ebhireva	deSayAmi Bikzu saMGa parivRtaH boDisattva gaNa puraskRtaH, eBiH eva
   nayairebhireva nāmabhirebhirevākṣarairimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe / so	nayEH eBiH eva nAmaBiH eBiH eva akzarEH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm BAze / saH 
   'cintyena bāhuśrutyena śrutasāgaratayā ca samanvāgato 'bhūt, sarvāsu ca	acintyena bAhu Srutyena Sruta sAgara tayA ca samanvAgataH aBUt, sarvAsu ca
   jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūt / yatra yatra buddhā bhagavantaḥ	jAtizu na jAtu budDa virahitaH aBUt / yatra yatra budDAH BagavantaH
   saṃmukhībhūtā bhavanti, tatra tatropapadyate sma / avirahitaś ca bhavati	saMmuKIBUtAH Bavanti, tatra tatra upapadyate sma / avirahitaH ca Bavati
   sma buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ, antataḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi / sarve ca anena	sma budDEH BagavadBiH, antatas svapna antara gataH api / sarve ca anena
   akṣaṇā vivarjitāḥ, kṣaṇasaṃpaccārāgitā //	akzaNAH vivarjitAH, kzaNa saMpad ca Ara agitAH //
   tatra khalu punarbhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma   tadanenāpi te	tatra Kalu punar BagavAn Ayuzmantam Anandam Amantrayate sma  tat anena api te
   ānanda paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam   ityapīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ	Ananda paryAyeNa evam veditavyam  iti api iyam prajQApAramitA boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhāriketi / tasmāttarhi ānanda	mahAsattvAnAm sarvajQa jQAnasya AhArikA iti / tasmAt tarhi Ananda
   bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilabdhukāmairasyāṃ	boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH sarvajQa jQAnam pratilabDu kAmEH asyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam / iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā	prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam / iyam prajQApAramitA SrotavyA udgrahItavyA
   dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā	DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA pravartayitavyA
   deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /	deSayitavya upadezwa vyoddezwavyA su ADyAtavyA liKitavyA /
   tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena mahāpustake pravyaktapravyaktairakṣaraiḥ sulikhitāṃ	taTAgata aDizWAnena mahApustake pravyakta pravyaktEH akzarEH suliKitAm
   kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā	kRtvA satkartavyA guru kartavyA mAnayitavyA pUjayitavyA arcayitavyA
   apacāyitavyā	apacAyitavyA
   puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇaiścīvarairvādyairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ	puzpEH DUpEH ganDEH mAlyEH vilepanEH cUrNEH cIvarEH vAdyEH vastrEH CatrEH DvajEH GaNwABiH
   patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ /	patAkABiH, samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH /
   iyamasmākamantikādānanda anuśāsanī / tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi	iyam asmAkam antikAt Ananda anuSAsanI / tat kasya hetoH? atra hi
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattirbhaviṣyati / tatkiṃ manyase	prajQApAramitAyAm sarvajQa jQAna parinizpattiH Bavizyati / tat kim manyase
   ānanda śāstā te tathāgataḥ? ānanda āha   śāstā me bhagavan, śāstā me	Ananda SAstA te taTAgataH? AnandaH Aha  SAstA me Bagavan, SAstA me
   sugata / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat   śāstā te ānanda	sugataH / evam ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam Anandam etat avocat  SAstA te Ananda
   tathāgataḥ / paricarito 'smyānanda tvayā maitreṇa kāyakarmaṇā manaāpena,	taTAgataH / paricaritaH asmi Ananda tvayA mEtreNa kAya karmaNA manaA apena,
   maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā manaāpena, maitreṇa manaḥkarmaṇā manaāpena /	mEtreNa vAc karmaNA manaA apena, mEtreNa manaH karmaNA manaApena /
   tasmāttarhi ānanda yathaiva tvayā mamaitarhi tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya	tasmAt tarhi Ananda yaTA eva tvayA mama etarhi tizWataH DriyamANasya
   yāpayato 'smin samucchraye prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ ca kṛtam,	yApayataH asmin samucCraye prema ca prasAdaH ca gOravam ca kRtam,
   tathaiva tvayā ānanda mamātyayādasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kartavyam / dvir	taTA eva tvayA Ananda mama atyayAt asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm kartavyam / dvis 
   api trir api te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi enāṃ prajñāpāramitām,	api tris api te Ananda parIndAmi anuparIndAmi enAm prajQApAramitAm,
   yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta, yathā nāsyāṃ tvamanyaḥ puruṣaḥ syāḥ / yāvadānanda	yaTA iyam na antarDIyeta, yaTA na asyAm tvam anyaH puruzaH syAH / yAvat Ananda
   iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā loke pracariṣyati, tāvattathāgatastiṣṭhatīti	iyam prajQApAramitA loke pracarizyati, tAvat taTAgataH tizWati iti
   veditavyam / tāvattathāgato dharmaṃ deśayatīti veditavyam / avirahitāste	veditavyam / tAvat taTAgataH Darmam deSayati iti veditavyam / avirahitAH te
   ānanda sattvā buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṃghopasthānena ca	Ananda sattvAH budDa darSanena Darma SravaNena saMGa upasTAnena ca
   veditavyam / tathāgatāntikāvacarāste ānanda sattvā veditavyāḥ, ya enāṃ	veditavyam / taTAgata antika avacarAH te Ananda sattvAH veditavyAH, yaH enAm
   prajñāpāramita (Vaidya 261) śroṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti	prajQApAramitaH (VEdyaH 261) Srozyanti udgrahIzyanti DArayizyanti
   vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti	vAcayizyanti paryavApsyanti pravartayizyanti
   deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti	deSayizyanti upadekzyanti uddekzyanti su ADyAsyanti liKizyanti
   satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti	satkarizyanti gurukarizyanti mAnayizyanti
   pūjayiṣyantyarcayiṣyantyapacāyiṣyanti	pUjayizyanti arcayizyanti apacAyizyanti
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ,	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja GaNwA patAkABiH,
   samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiriti //	samantAt ca dIpa mAlABiH, bahuviDABiH ca pUjABiH iti //
   idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ / te ca maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā	idam avocat BagavAn Atta manAH / te ca mEtreya pramuKAH boDisattvA
   mahāsattvāḥ āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputraḥ āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ	mahAsattvAH AyuzmAn ca suBUtiH AyuzmAn ca SAriputraH AyuzmAn= ca AnandaH
   śakraś ca devānāmindraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato	SakraH ca devAnAm indraH sa deva mAnuza asura garuxa ganDarvaH ca lokaH BagavataH 
   bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //	BAzitam aByanandan= iti //
   āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parīndanāparivarto nāma	Arya azwa sAhasrikAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm parIndanA parivartaH nAma
   dvātriṃśattamaḥ //	dvAtriMSattamaH //
   samāptā ceyaṃ bhagavatyā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā	samAptA ca iyam BagavatyA AryA azwa sAhasrikAyAH prajQApAramitA
   sarvatathāgatajananī bodhisattvapratyekajinaśrāvakāṇāṃ mātā, dharmamudrā	sarva taTAgata jananI boDisattva pratyeka jina SrAvakANAm mAtA, DarmamudrA
   dharmolkā dharmanābhirdharmabherī dharmanetrī dharmaratnanidhānam akṣayo	Darma ulkA DarmanABiH Darma BerI DarmanetrI Darma ratna niDAnam akzayaH 
   dharmaḥ acintyādbhutadarśananakṣatramālā	DarmaH acintya adButa darSana nakzatra mAlA
   sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvalokavanditā sarvasukhaheturiti //	sa deva mAnuza asura ganDarva loka vanditA sarva suKa hetuH iti //
   prajñāpāramitāṃ samyagudgṛhya paryavāpya ca dhārayitvā pravartya enāṃ	prajQApAramitAm samyak udgRhya paryavApya ca DArayitvA pravartya enAm
   viharantu sadārthina iti //	viharantu sadA arTinaH iti //
   ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /	ye DarmAH hetu praBAvAH hetuH tezAm taTAgataH hi avadat /
   teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //	tezAm ca yaH niroDaH evaMvAdI mahA ASramaNaH //
   deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyinyāḥ	deya DarmaH ayam pravara mahAyAna yAyinyAH
   paramopāsikasaurājrasutalakṣmīdharasya / yadatra puṇyaṃ	parama upAsika sOrAjra suta lakzmI Darasya / yat atra puNyam
   tadbhavatvācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā	tad Bavatu a AcArya upADyAya mAtA pitR pUrvaMgamam kRtvA
   sakalasattvarāśeranuttarajñānāvāptaye iti //	sakala sattva rASeH anuttara jQAna avAptaye iti //
